hKHxoKy_woxzakUHpdOc7A.text: We were in Vegas and heard this place was bomb. It was actually pretty good! I had the Thai bowl and some friends got the nachos and they were pretty tasty. Also, if you check in you get a free margarita so that was a plus!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

T_JW6WBadI9jgCqxaT522g.text: We went here on a whim after walking around the strip and shopping. We brought our 3 kids and were promptly seated with a smile.  The server was absolutely amazing! Rachel was very helpful in deciding what to order from drinks to apps to meals. We settled on the queso and salsa for a start and the presentation was very unique and fun! They put a tea candle underneath the dip to keep it warm. This allowed them to have a higher cheese ratio because it never cooled down, making for a tremendous queso dip! Probably on the the best I have ever had. (And I make a great one at home)  For our main meal we had tacos, bowls, and burritos. The kids meals were plentiful and varied. The kids tacos were huge and my 9yr old could barely finish it. The adult pork tacos almost busted at the seems with the delicious shredded Carnitas. The unique chicken Thai tacos were sweet savory and spicy, and will be reordered when we go back again this trip. My wife had the Thai chicken bowl and it was similar to the tacos but varied enough to mention. With the corn in the bowl it added a sweetness that really complimented the dish. The beef burrito was so big my 12yr old son took half back to the hotel with him.  For drinks the house margaritas are wonderful. They aren't too sweet and you can still taste some of the tequila. Bonus points for being served in mason jars!  I have to reiterate that our server was the best part. She helped us order to be sure we didn't repeat thing were were getting like chips and salsa and queso. She was engaging, enthusiastic and charming. You could see how she cared about her customers happiness.  We asked when she was working because we will go back this trip to have the same experience!

r4YTim4XDec9KmBmu2K1XA.text: So many vegan options!! And our sever Chase was great!  We got the vegan chick'n quesadilla and the vegan spicy burrito and were very impressed! Wasn't expecting to find a vegan friendly restaurant on the strip but was thoroughly impressed. Thank you Nacho Daddy!

yZ3g6ZLoHg1XTqyhlZ2Y_Q.text: Overall everything was decent but nothing special. Certainly nothing of an authentic Mexican place but that's not what they seem to be going for at all.  I'd give it 3.5/5 but if you're looking for something satisfying and a decent amount of food for the price I'd say give a shot.   They also offer some cheap margaritas to get your night (or afternoon) started

7oyeIu9BF_a9yPN5jB_eqg.text: Cool place to hang out and the nachos were delish!  Great bar after a hard day at work...super cool

puAIJqkFlTk1t8BZAft2OA.text: Love this place. Always stop by for some delicious food and drinks and great service when we are in Vegas no matter what hotel  we are staying in.

6OKGFSsqtXgcT1fQyaNPBg.text: Had a great meal, wish they had smaller proportions for the nachos, too big for one person. Great food and service. I'd definitely go back.

9as53POw3aKklvLg_Eib1A.text: One of our favorite places to eat while in town. Food is full of flavor. Service was amazing so we will definitely return.

It was filthy, which should have been a sign. Nachos were lackluster, in particular I was not impressed by the chip quality. Service not that great. Wouldn't go back or recommend it to anyone else.

nUmmwEro3P1C7FOPYsLk7A.text: Great portions! Me and my boyfriend at off on plate of chicken tanga nachos and had some leftover. Lots of toppings so no chip has to be lonely. Buffalo wings and bbq wings were average not better than an actual wing place. Definitely worth the try.

1RfJE6OoHZ-cA3aZSDaHig.text: Great little Hidden place on the Las Vegas Strip. Great atmosphere and wonderful serve. Awesome sever named Litzs took great care of us. Everything was quick to get and we had a big party as well. Great drinks and food!! Loved it!! :) we will definitely be back!!

zZJx0IbxkO8vmsAIfosjeg.text: I'm visiting from the bay area and heard this was a must try place! The food was bomb and portions were perfect to share with a group of friends! We had Litzs as our server and she was so sweet and never rushed us. It was also my friends birthday so right away she put in the free chocolate cake for him without us asking! Great place with great service and will definitely come back again!

wLAfvUVWOZ1Q-s9nIsqsKw.text: I came to this place 3 times during my 1 week stay (I'm from NC) and it exceeded my expectations each and every time. The bonus about this place they have multiple vegan options and each vegan course I had was amazing. Get the Vegan Loaded Nachos and I promise you will not be disappointed. The staff from top to bottom was amazing if you need a bartender ask for Shannon and if you need a manager who is vegan ask for Edward. They also have tequila specials on Tuesdays #VeganApproved

j3YCH-_gaTdHXrmRj6VNjA.text: Get your nachos today!  You will thank me later.  I don't even have to write much about this place.  You want nachos - this place specializes in nachos.  They use great ingredients for your drunk self to enjoy! :D

weN2vdpBuTlhxZnCfAn8Gw.text: Called to make reservations for Friday, was told "I Don't think we make reservations for Friday or Saturday because it's so busy". So it would be great if the website stated walk ins only Friday or Saturday. Annoying!

1w9UO5EMyo6hTgD1UfwLLw.text: So good! Especially after a long night of drinks and partying. It really hit the spot. And the michelada that I didn't take a picture of ()because it was so good I couldn't stop drinking.... I want another one right now. Mmmm.  We were walking by and decided to take a chance on this place and so glad we did! The nachos were good and the ceviche was fresh. It all took a little long to come out but it was worth it. The bartender was super nice. She was busy but when she'd come and talk to us she was totally attentive.  My bf also had a scorpion shot. With an actual scorpion in it!!  with tequila. He said it didn't taste like anything but I'll just take his word for it because I wasn't brave enough to try it. I had the enchilada nachos and he had the ones that were like a tostada. With so many amazing places in Vegas, I was not disappointed to try this one.

OuN9NE5xWrbcYlYk8Nz4kQ.text: Totally essential to your Vegas experience. The nachos are huge and the service is incredible.!5$3 spicy cucumber margarita is a must if you like tequila.  Our server (and one of the managers) Jovany is absolutely incredible. He was very helpful and fun and very energetic. Highly recommend this place, and request Jovany if possible!

u9QjaMfA-k4Q7O2UaQ1LQw.text: Excellent service and food!! They have so many different choices of nachos not your plain choices. This is a great place to watch games since they have a huge screen in the center of the back wall.

zVnWz1ouI62xPWL9pouBpA.text: Second visit while in Vegas.  First visit was 3 adults and one child.   Second larger group of adults.  Mentioning this because food here is good especially with all the vegetarian options they have.   However both visits, the delivery of food was extremely slow.  Even servers attending to our table took time.  Plan 3-4 hours of dining time if plan to eat here!

Re4K102bmeAqMVLRUlSNrQ.text: Food was great, and reasonably priced.   We ended up here for breakfast because we wanted somewhere close to the strip that was not $20 a plate. Our party of four was very satisfied. We actually went back for breakfast the next day too.   We ordered the breakfast burrito, veggie omelette, breakfast taco, lobster nachos, huevos rancheros and wet burrito. It was all great.    Great food at a good price is hard to find on the strip, we will definitely be back next time we are in Vegas.

NBvphBueMNg-4DlmWPTdpw.text: Very good!!! Sooo much food!  Will be back for sure!  Great drinks!  Lots of choices, good atmosphere.

nckRF6QcCn8BVDZOVjvmqA.text: Fish tacos met the challenge here tonight! Definitely in my top 10. We are tough in our critique. Must have great portion of fresh fish, cabbage, and smokin'' good sauce. Nacho Daddy had all three! Great job Vegas ND's! And server sat down and chatted at just the right time and mad our experience even better!

ItrF-jH2uq0vrsFsK3HrFQ.text: Nachos were amazing! We tried the Vegas nachos, the BBQ pork nachos and the fajitas all of which were fabulous!   The atmosphere was laid back and chill for a good evening. Lots of choices from the bar!  I highly recommend if you are traveling to Vegas and want a good, laid back place!

zdg6oXj29t_Arloe8xpzSA.text: Tbh it didn't live up to it's saying. I had more chips left over than the toppings that I had. Maybe it was just not a good day for the cook, but I probably wouldn't go again.

eNrkUCT59Tc32a5BnPJMFg.text: Cool restaurant with great prices, but food was pretty "meh". The nachos are below average.

-mYDxhjKuDYtd4DiQ01eHg.text: Food is really good. I've had pretty much all of the nachos on the menu (huge nacho fan) and I haven't been disappointed. The staff is hit or miss. There have been times people will sit down 10 minutes after we do, and get their food a good 10 - 15 minutes before ours. (Yes, I've waitressed, I know it can be that some food is made more quickly. However. This has happened multiple times, one of which the other table ordered the same thing we did.)  If you request alterations (add sour cream, no beans, whatever) make sure you repeat it a few times. The food is good when it's right, but often is rushed and not made how you've asked. All around, I'll definitely be back, but dining in has been a bit frustrating.

qVwZNBdRSaPu27doaFqp0w.text: Good nachos. Fast service. Perfect price. Recommended by a local and it made for a good lunch. Share!

AABiXPjgUtmdxMhkUs73Ow.text: Enough food for 2, love the all day breakfast option, check in on yelp for a free margarita or $8 towards one of the special margaritas, and you have the option to receive individual checks  definitely returning

v5l0G0zbra800TfDAvFPWw.text: WOW! I'm vegan and they have an entire page of vegan options. The guacamole and chips were amazing, the avocado was super fresh. I also had a chicken quesadilla, it had the best vegan cheese. The chicken nachos were okay, not much chicken.

j9PowzOBJ2A6gcnnIAsPWQ.text: We stopped in Nacho Daddy as a first meal once we arrived in Vegas. Mostly because it was opened and had no wait/wasn't too busy at the time. Staff was cool and friendly. Yelp checking gets you a free margarita but it was mostly sour mix. Not a hint of tequila.  We both had Huevos Rancheros which was quite a bit of food but not the best overall. Still, thankful for refuge from the chilly morning and away from crowds.  Or so we thought.  For some reason, the two large doors (think wide garage doors) on both floors were opened. This was around 11am and the temp was around 40 degrees. The entire restaurant was quickly  colder, forcing many patrons and some staff to put their jackets/coats/sweaters/scarves back on. WTF? And nobody was sitting outside or appeared to want to sit outside.   We were told by out waitress that a single person asked to have the doors opened so they were opened. Which, didn't make sense. So everyone else must suffer and have their hot food chilled? Why wouldn't they just go sit on the patio outside?  We didn't want to be a pain but it was getting to the point of possibly leaving before our food arrived which I didn't want to do. We pushed a bit more once our food arrived and she then said that the owner usually opens it when he arrives (he wasn't there yet) and she'll see what she can do to get it closed back up. They were closed about 5 minutes later and we all rejoiced. Actually, only the downstairs door was closed. About 15 minutes later, it was reopened and thankfully by then we were finishing up.  I get patio weather and wanting to draw in the crowds but it was FORTY DEGREES. Most everyone wanted to eat inside and the hottest part of the day had not hit yet. At the very least, please take the temperature into consideration - during the winter - before freezing out your customers.  Decent, affordable place to grab a bite but nothing I'd be rushing back to.

v-_laoWI3AEK070EPxJ7eA.text: Bomb Nachos! Great Margaritas! Awesome atmosphere! This place will NOT disappoint! We will be back.

Tp-we9cjnUhC3VRvO-YY0Q.text: My fiance and I dined here on our most recent trip to Las Vegas.  We had been drinking for quite sometime and I needed some sustenance.  This place had some great reviews so we decided to check it out.  It is located on the far South corner of the MGM Grand.  Location is kind of weird.  I thought we were going to end up at the Tropicana.  We had to go out of the building to enter.  We arrived right as Happy Hour was getting started and they had some very reasonable prices for food anywhere, but Happy Hour made it an even better deal. They have a scorpion tank when you enter, which freaked me out, but the man thought it was cool.  Because we were there early, it was not loud or crowded, but I imagine if it were a different time of day it could be very loud and very crowded and it is a good size restaurant with lots of wide open space.   I checked in on Yelp and got a free house margarita.  The man ordered a house margarita on Happy Hour.  Margarita was solid for a house/happy hour special.   You do have to pay for the chips and salsa, but they are minimally priced and unlimited.  They have both a hot and mild sauce that they will bring to you.  They were good.   For food we ordered the pork tacos which I really loved.  The man liked them less so.  It isn't that he didn't like them, but he likes, "American tacos" with their hard shells, lettuce, tomato and sour cream .  These were pork tacos with hot sauce and queso fresca  He didn't like the soft flour tortilla (It's more authentic!).  He didn't like that the hot sauce was chilled and the pork was hot.  Essentially, everything I loved about it, he didn't care for.  I thought the sizzling hot pork with the chilled hot sauce was a gorgeous blend of hot and cold.  The queso fresca was awesome and they had limes that you could squeeze over the tacos to add that bit of acidity. We apparently just have very different tastes in tacos.   I really enjoyed the food here.  If you want authentic, hole in the wall Taqueria,  go to Tacos El Gordo, but if you want good food in a casual atmosphere with reasonable prices then this a solid bet.  I would come back.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pork tacos

aum34M8f5tNKT_riopgbUg.text: First time here and definitely recommend!! The environment was probably my favorite thing aside the delicious food. The fiesta Nachos are a must try and the micheladas were soooooooooooooo good!

tOtKMcJb7gb4n443SpX8SA.text: Nachos were amazing!!! Service was great and everything was perfect!  Great place to get food while going to the Miracle Mile shops!

eSOxLUcOBvhAlxz2MnHBQA.text: The October special the Carnitas nachos were awesome and a portion of the sales go to support breast cancer awareness. Great food. Service could be better but you can tell they are still learning.

G5BaH6d_Km7Ff1pKVkQNyw.text: Nacho Daddy was the bomb...Ryan was a great server and my female friend wanted to let him know that he has some really nice arms!!!!

1GCLuPHeN0qnDazCPNWeVg.text: Loved the Vegan menu! Glad to have so many options! The free margarita was really good also!

zbtKqXE2_gu73UL_GoMmKg.text: We were greeted right when we got into the door which is usually a good sign. It was my birthday and we had an excellent bartender named Bryce. He recommended the scorpion shot , so five of us ate a scorpion and took down the shot. Just a great time and good memories, our glasses were never empty until we walked out. Thanks Bryce and nacho daddy, will be back if we are ever back in vegas.

sAz9Hmnl-nADVhTFJrKv3A.text: Nacho Daddy's is an absolute must when you're in Vegas! From the friendly host to the incredibly accommodating server, this is the place to be. The food is amazing and the atmosphere is so much fun. I'll definitely be back next time I'm in Vegas! (Especially to see Gabby, make sure to request her as your server!)

pyxCY0yTPDSeY5WQuoiiXA.text: We are visiting from San Francisco and Daria helped us get drunk and told us all the best clubs! We're going to come back in today for round two so I hope she's working

WEs6GynxqNBUaHbhPjANXA.text: Nacho Daddy is the PLACE for authentic Mexican food in Nevada! The Scorpion shot is dangerously awesome and the service... OMG! CHASE is professional, friendly and knowledgeable! Best time in Vegas yet! Thanks Nacho Daddy

7I2A7ZUkC-4fDysM4BE2LA.text: Service was fab here! The food was okay, we ordered off the happy hour menu and tried the sloppy joes and their burger nachos. It was pretty basic nothing to rave about. We also ordered a couple drinks, I personally really enjoyed their strawberry margarita. Added star for awesome servers, they were super attentive!

1nDQx8a5tlmTca22-1MWQw.text: Great place to eat, just what we were looking for.  Just got into town, we wanted Nachos and margaritas.  John, our server, did a great job steering us to the spicy Pina margarita.  Just spicy enough to feel a kick, but not burn your lips off.  Got the tostada supreme nachos with no sour cream, fantastic. Then topped it off with fried ice cream (haven't had this in years), served on a bed of Sopapia nachos and it was delicious. Just use the cinnamon fried nachos to scoop the ice cream. Yum.

FknGY5CQ5q6_SquGGXA2yQ.text: I love this place! Jovanny was a great waiter. Food was fantastic. Place is off the strip and not in a hotel so you're not dying from cigarette smoke.  Definitely coming back.

ZEiouqaxuVQoHGTBFJatKw.text: Got the filet minion nacho over priced and under whelming...the scorpion shot is the only reason they are getting two stars...and because you can't give a business negative stars...

Bpb4aNcx-5PZXr9UZh7olQ.text: Sat down excited to eat some nachos but after 20 mins of waiting just to be given some water and order taken, nothing happened. So we left and found food elsewhere

knmKZl_Ya7CSLxwaz_tqbw.text: I am not a fan of this place. The food is awful and its a bad location for locals.

W5fgW7V_VIqx09aqQBzIiw.text: Still waiting... called on Tuesday was told to call back when "Pete " was in. Dear Pete please give my money back and I will stop yelping. Thankx.

Q4L6S4OaSt-UYAggragTDw.text: We had a good lunch, great service with Jovanni. The margaritas are refreshing and the food very  fresh and tasty.

6Q2HxSAiQBQ6-62QDdMTxQ.text: Loved the menu options, conveniently located on the strip and 5 star service from Jovanny!

itVopT8xueZs_XQAbGATdw.text: On a quest to find a good place to eat in the area I saw the high ratings on Yelp and figured I would give this place a try. The Chicken Burrito was good as well as their chips and queso. Their pricing is fair and they have a lot of good choices on their menu and enough staff to accommodate all the traffic they get! I wasn't sure if we had someone new or if our waiter was flustered when we ordered and asked questions about the menu, but it was still a good experience.

yp5viM3WWWTufowWXA0IEg.text: Bomb.com! This restaurant was so good. Customer service was really great also. I'm happy my family and I choose this place. We ordered nachos, quesidillas, and enchiladas all so good and prices are reasonable also. My kids loved the live scorpions at the door. Great place we will definitely be going back!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster and crab enchilada with a fish taco. So yummy!

THbVzrs0mWPpo5fIWk4S-A.text: Great tasting food and a large selection of both vegan and gluten-free options. Seriously awesome margaritas!  Prices aren't cheap, but not super expensive either. Overall, nice place.

VQSAPAsJ1T4t3168AHh7UQ.text: The nachos were amazing! Wings need some work. Too saucy and extra spicy for what a buffalo sauce should be. Arianna was a great server and kept up with our party of six with no problem!

6FuSATIJMvV_Y8-zWssJtg.text: Love this place. I have a strong emotional connection with the kale scramble with chicken and quinoa. Would recommend highly. Jaylon provided exceptional service. What an experience.

9IUd14iLPcf8jTKVTv6x2w.text: I ate here today for lunch and it was delicious. They messed our order up but the food was so good that I didn't even care. I had the loaded nachos- definitely recommend them!! I am a very picky eater and I am glad I stopped in to appreciate this place!

VFTmX-BwH4AvhlbiWBgsYw.text: We decided to go to Nacho Daddy because we are staying across the street and can see it every day when we look out the window. Not to mention... Nachos are one of my favorite guilty pleasures. I am also in love with hot wings. To my absolute delight they offered a Spicy Buffalo Nacho.... Absolutely loved it! My husband and I shared it and we were both satisfied and not too full. As we were walking up we were handed coupons for free margaritas. They were excellent! Because we were on the strip we had drinks and had to finish them before we went in. As we finished our drinks we talked with the host for a bit. He was a very friendly young man named Jaylon. We decided to sit at the bar and our bartender Cassandra was very pleasant and attentive. As we were finishing our food Jaylon came in to see if we were enjoying the food. Not only did we get excellent service from start to finish but the food and drinks were really good and the prices were on point! Especially being on the Vegas Strip! Will definitely come back!

eeH9hJnfnl3hjbGM2NTXYw.text: We tried to go here for a late lunch on a Sunday.  Despite the place being 3/4 empty, we were told the wait was 15 minutes.  So we waited at the bar and got some drinks. 20 minutes later the hostess called my phone from a whole 10 feet away to tell us our table was ready.  Once we were seated at our table, we waited 20 minutes for a server to show up.  No one ever did, although someone had the time to come by and pick up our menus, otherwise ignoring us. I finally went up to the hostess stand to ask them to send us a server. Except the hostess was outside talking to someone, so I had to ask a busser. The hostess finally came by and said she'd send a server over. We waited another 15 minutes and no one showed up. We finally decided to move back to the bar since we knew at least the bartender was working and could put in an order. Apparently prep work was more important than paying customers, because one of our party overheard her tell the barback she was too busy to take our order.  One hour of waiting later, we walked out.  We specifically came here because of the nachos and because it was local. So much for supporting a local business.

TRG2a4OvjE8Q5e8npOQYzw.text: This place was awesome and started my trip off in Vegas wonderful. The thing that impressed me most with the team work in the place, our server Ryan was one of the best servers I've ever had and I'm in the industry ;he was very attentive and communication was awesome .He made sure we had everything we needed, checked on us often, and had a great personality.  We never lacked anything and I watched as he took care of several other tables and very missing a beat, he was the shit, simply said! The entire team worked together including the great friendly hosts, and expediter who was running food, also we had a chance to meet the manager Brian, who was truly the leader of the tribe who led by example bussing tables. I also met another manager  I can't remember her name, sorry but a cute dark haired female. The place was extremely busy and they didn't miss a beat, it was truly worth the wait. The food was awesome also, it was fresh tasting, came out hot and great portions. This was a great place to start a trip in Vegas the ambience was upbeat they had awesome music for all tastes and the restaurant was clean. I plan on visiting one more time before I leave Vegas, they made just that much of an impression with all the places that are available to eat!

nLVEFrhzr5ATIgr7lzITrg.text: The reviews on here were awesome and all Vegas food seems the same so we had to try. We ordered the buffalo chicken nachos and bbq pulled pork nachos. When the food came we had one bbq chicken and a bbq pulled pork. I tried to explain to the expo that I ordered buffalo chicken and he tried to tell me that's what I had in front of me. When the bartender came back to check on us I explained to her what happened. She said it was her fault and 10 minutes later my buffalo nachos came out. They were horrible. The chicken on top was fried chicken nuggets that were completely soggy. The entire plate was covered in Franks Red Hot (don't get me wrong franks is great but not alone on top of chips for $12.) Sad to say I was that person who sent it back. Our BBQ nachos were good but nothing I would come back for. The server was great and took off one of our drinks, which I can always appreciate good service. Maybe just drinks and a light snack is the way to go here.

XFzJ2AXj1II05kIGE7r4_w.text: For some asinine reason Yelpers in this town refer to themselves as las vegans making my search for a restaurant all the more painful than it usually is. Thankfully I stumbled upon Nacho Daddy which not only could accommodate a vegan diet but specializes in vegan dishes that are given almost the entirety of a page on their menu. I had the privilege of trying both the chick'n fajitas and the chick'n nachos which were both gargantuan dishes packed with a ton of flavor. Not to be outdone, their house margaritas are just as large and flavorful. I would definitely go with the Daddy Margarita because nothing will lubricate you for drinking more than thinking about your father. Also it's delicious.

K6tmiOZL9KkRM2cHPcU8Wg.text: Great food, awesome drinks! Also, get a free margarita when you check in! Loved that they have breakfast all day.

ab33Y81X4EU1_bHVavZSEA.text: GREAT PLACE!! Had the carnitas nachos a Margarita and Had a scorpion shot sooo good!! Will come back!!

KZ1-87Ez-9g7EQaPU54MNw.text: Just had lunch here. Really happy with the food and our server Judy. She gave us good recommendations. Atmosphere is like the typical Vegas atmosphere. Festive,  with a variety of music. Recommend for a casual lunch.

LimR5xPYFh2HmRIkEzA5DQ.text: Went here over the weekend and I was greeted by Jaylon and Sabrina . Amazing attitudes and service from these hostess . My waiter was Jovany , which was equally as amazing and helpful . On top of the atmosphere the food was flavorful and plated beautifully . I cannot wait to go back for the Fiesta Nachos and the trio dip .

Kco0ZG3UBnOIWGUUEdIVQg.text: Food was great, Margaritas were even better and the waiter was very nice and accommodating. I recommend ordering the nachos with French fries instead, A-mazing!

ogupKlqknFTwkXUfPkAuiw.text: I had the garlicky shrimp nachos and they were sooo good. I even took them to my room and ate them cold and they still rocked my world. Of course I had a margarita and for dessert I had the fried ice cream. That was really good also. I will definitely be back!

yG9_9wAue2wVeaZw56L2eg.text: I didn't like the margarita. It was sour and tart. The nachos were good but they were $18. I know. Everything is expensive in Vegas. It would have helped to have someone to share them with so I felt like I got a better deal. Spicy salsa was delicious. Service was great that's why I didn't rate it a 2.

6agV2dKoRDxe5nsy9m0Nfg.text: Great food, great atmosphere but slow service.....bartenders are super slow and forgot our appetizer......

bFCYWtGUswil5RfGNIy16g.text: This was our first time visiting a Nacho Daddy.  The atmosphere is very relaxed.  The menu has a ton of options, with many options you couldn't dream up.  We landed on the Mexican street burger with truffle fries, and the super tostado nachos.  Both were excellent.  The plates are huge.  The burger was very tender, the bacon crispy and the fries were amazing.  The nachos are piled high with tons of toppings making them delicious.  I only wish we saved room for deep fried ice cream.

_EbrBP1g7eDpiaoqQJk30w.text: We had the lobster and crab nachos and it did not disappoint! It was a little spicy but soooo good!! We also had the Cadillac and their famous margarita and they were both good, huge cup!

TYAhr9RuZeiFBAvYpMPecQ.text: Great staff, huge tv screen for sports, and good food. They seemed really busy and apologized for the backup but we got our food relatively quick. The manager was very friendly and hung out with us to chat for a bit. Definitely recommended and they got a live scorpion tank up front!

S7iBVC4niZby7aBl7K3Rqw.text: As a new LV resident, and someone who works right near this location, I REALLY hoped this place would be awesome, but was really disappointed with the experience.  Brought my two buddies here, after assuring them it would be awesome based on the the reviews.  Saturday night, around 8 not too crowded.  We had a waitress, who though very nice, was largely absent after seating us. When our food order arrived, we spent about 5 minutes waiting (and later searching) for her because we had 1) no plates 2) no silverware 3) our food order was wrong.  When we explained that we ordered the nachos with no tomatoes or onions (which were all over the nachos), she asked if she wanted to send it back.  We explained that we don't WANT to send it back, but need to send it back because we had someone in the party who can't do those items, and she begrudgingly abliged.  No apology, nothing.  The first and only thing should have been an apology and an offer to replace, we were very clear in our order..  When we were eventually brought the plates, they were soaking wet, as if right out g the washer..  we had to wipe them all down.  The food was good, but the service just RUINED the experience- I am no longer, according to my buddies, allowed to pick where we go out to eat , that's how bad this was- damn!  Edit: 2nd time was much better.  Granted it was just me at the bar but the bar tender was very attentive and food was great.  I will come back and hopefully add another star (or 2)!

z9j7OQPiA8wJGwZ97Se9jQ.text: Great server at this place! Jovany is the man helpful with everything showing you some great service is what Vegas is all about!

fyLVtNu1QqDxtDhgbp7x6Q.text: This is my first time here since im not a local. My fiance and i love splurging on nachos on the weekend so Nacho Daddy's totally seemed up our alley. Gabbby & Jio hooked it up and made me feel totally at home! So glad we popped in...ill be back on my next vegas trip for sure.

6f7HYAwIczjHf5z8DOqIsg.text: Food was great! Jovanny's service was amazing and made the experience here that much better.

9my6W3WbsWNIn0zrC9U8EQ.text: The music was Poppin, the food was delicious & the drinks were amazing. We went on a Wednesday night & I was jammin so I can't wait to see what's going on Friday and Saturday nights!

goww0QjxxBvgtcSiTL1xaQ.text: Walked in, they quickly sat us for a Friday night. I had a blast there! They are also know for their Scorpion tequila shot. I had the shrimp tacos! Boy was that very good :) my friends got the nachos they were really impressed. I also used the free drink for checking in on here. They know how to make a good Margarita :)

KLK9MbYihgqOpIz4cHc39A.text: With a friend's recommendation my wife and I went to Nacho Daddy when visiting Las Vegas.  With a check in I had their basic margarita, which was actually quite good even at 9 am.    We ordered the grilled Mexican corn, enchiladas, and the fiesta nachos.  The corn was tasty and can tell it was fresh because it was sweet and a bite to them.  The enchiladas were okay, not stellar.  Not a fan of neither red or green sauce, so can suggest one over the other.    Fiesta nachos were really good and what they say is True that not one chip was dry.  Also quantity was great and plentiful.   Service was also great.  Staff was friendly and attentive.  Also the scorpion tank as you enter the restaurant was pretty cool to look at.

PxQV5aMls6bKgkgTHR7bkA.text: We went to Las Vegas recently and normally have our go-to vegan spots. We decided to give this place a try, since we had never been. We both ordered bottomless mimosas which were AMAZING and worth the $20. Then we got the vegan chick'n nachos. Everything was good about them except the cheese. My boyfriend loved the cheese sauce but it didn't really taste homemade. Other than that, it was so great! Oh and the service was 100%

YAv68SMz-cMoYZ3L9TTkZA.text: Westley was amazing. Serving us the best margaritas in Vegas! It was nice meeting one of the local braddahs from Hawaii! Food was the bomb too! Much Mahalo from Maui

rRLLsh4fvrH24AkrN18FlA.text: - Our server was so nice and welcoming!  - The food was very good. We had many dishes, which we realized was way too much food... including, Street Corn, Triple Dip, The Spicy Shrimp Nachos and The Flaming Shrimp. The Queso, Spicy Shrimp Nachos and The Flaming Shrimp Tacos were my favorite.

vyJ5XelrWL__Z6yAGc8oEQ.text: This was our second time into this location and we were looking forward to it because our first visit was amazing! Unfortunately, we were let down this time. It took awhile to be seated, but that is no big deal as we understand when it's busy. However, when we got to the table, the service was less than mediocre. Our drinks were constantly needing refilling and the server barely came back to check on us. My son didn't care for his burger and needed it remade, but we never were asked how the food was and he ended up not eating anything. Also, the rest of our party got sick shortly after we left and we continued to be sick the next day. No bueno. Disappointing.

6LwdInUOru2u-W92I-V4hA.text: My wife and I went to Nacho Daddy's on April 13, 2019. I had read the reviews and figured we would give them a shot.  Drinks: I was driving, so no adult beverages for me, but they had Coke Zero available, so 1 gold star to start. My wife had the Mexican Candy Margarita, it was a bit spicy for her liking, she liked the flavor, just a bit too hot.  Food: Spicy shrimp appetizer, a nice size portion, it was served in a cast Iron skillet, was very tasty.  For dinner we split the Supreme Tostada Nacho.  This was the star of the show. Just enough spice so you know it's there. Ground beef seasoned well, the refried beans were spot on. I have NO suggestions for improvement.   Service: Friendly and attentive.  **I used the restroom to wash my hands after digging in the pile of Nachos. There was blood on the floor in the restroom, I brought it to the server's attention, hopefully they cleaned it quickly.  I do have ONE suggestion - Open a Nacho Daddy in the Phoenix area---PLEASE !

sJypx3FHr9Mc1ZKvN5oW2Q.text: This was my first time here. I got the fiesta nachos and It was delicious. My boyfriend got a burrito  and it's so good coz it's cheesy too. We will definitely going back specially if I crave for nachos lol

We had two margaritas and split nachos and tacos! The Pork tacos were the best! I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who comes to Vegas! Atmosphere and wait staff are great!

vRvfrGPxRoJfObOhcrpqww.text: Solid food- had the nacho supreme, fish tacos, fried avocado tacos and vegan chicken nachos. Plus blood orange margarita, pitcher of Micheladas and Cabernet. Food was good, nothing to write home about- Thursday at 2 pm, was a little slow. Service was average. Prices were average for Vegas. I wouldn't seek it out again necessarily but would return.

W_GVe9CiH-GXCBlmZrRk7w.text: I would definitely recommend this place to anyone and everyone who loves nachos. Ever since I came to this place I don't think I've found any other places that I love as much as this place. So delicious and different than other places. I came with my family if you times and they all loved it

C-4OoExACpLZ8pcNWA7AkQ.text: This place is no joke!!! Omg, the Cadillac Margaritas are bomb! Fajitas are to die for! Absolutely some of the best service ever received.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Queso chips and Salsa!

ny8ocq7eZi6b1PPJemcE6w.text: Can't lie the exterior looks gimmicky but once my food came it was worth the wait. I had the Filet Mignon Nachos which were a large portion but the nachos were so tasty that I cleaned my plate. I Never...Ever...Ever...Never..finish a plate of nachos but I did. I even got dessert! Fried Ice Cream is one of my favorite desserts and Nacho Daddy's does a nice job.

q4alYZ8zl6y0QhSBHUdsRQ.text: Boooooooooo. One of my favorite dishes is nachos, so I was super excited to find a place called NACHO DADDY!!!  Great name, classic, reliable dish almost everywhere.  We ordered the BBQ pork nachos...  how in the world could a place called NACHO DADDY not have bomb-ass nachos???    Chips, star of the show, are bland and not crispy-Chipotle chips are way better. Even Tostitos are more palatable.   "Never a Dry Chip" is the motto...  even printed on their nacho box.  Most of our chips were dry actually. There was a thick layer of pasty pork bbq, but underneath that rug was just bland, plain 'ole chips.    Now let's talk about the cheese. WTFuuuuuuhhhhhh???!!!!  It congeals like processed American cheese or Velveeta cheese.  Remember that slick plastic-y texture you achieved when microwaved American singles on chips as a kid??!  If not, this will jog your memory, but with a much higher price tag.    Chips + Cheese = Nachos  simple recipe, not calculus y'all!   The disappointment here is mind-blowing. It's suuuuuch a simple dish .  I'm just so mad at Nacho Daddy for funking it up so bad.   I'll end with something positive...  the grilled corn off the cob was pretty good.  But, again, the place is called NACHO DADDY, not Daddy's Grilled Corn.   If Nacho Mama is out there, please please please knock some sense into Nacho Daddy.  I think he may have forgotten the recipe for his core dish.  Glad to hear you will pass along the feedback, Taylor. How about a refund?!

qLuOkly88twfaZEEtjhYSQ.text: Perfect margaritas, and the nachos were fantastic. Right around the corner from Planet Hollywood. A great option if you're hungry for good food and don't want to break the bank. Wait staff were fantastic. Sat at the bar and made new friends with the couple next to us. Great atmosphere, a fun break from the noise and chaos of the strip. Thanks, Nacho Daddy!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nachos

RT6W5GUbGgkdS7y-nVLhUQ.text: Our waitress Aly was very polite and responsive. Food was fresh and anything beef filet tasted like quality meat. I would go back again if I was in the area.

7fj0wQXK0pjM6zR8tPg_xg.text: Come see Jovanny!!!! Best vegan nachos in town!!! 5 stars all the way!!

HmgupnZk_7wSzzJm5fELYA.text: Gave this place a second try and I am SO glad I did. We came here for the football game and it was packed but we were seated fairly quickly. Tried a variety of items: Nachos, burritos, corn, and wings and they did not disappoint. The food came out quick and the customer service was great. Will definitely be coming back again.

2Bbc7hI9XQGOWASWDRIBfg.text: Amazing food, we got the supreme nachos and the portions were huge. Excellent drinks. Great service staff.  The atmosphere was fun. Will return on or next trip!

GPWKyS173Gy10Yk2ExfSSg.text: Giovanny was the most accommodating server ever! Super friendly, would definitely come again if this is what customer service is like here! 5 stars for me. Drinks and food were BOMB.   Loved how he connected with us, his customers, by relating to us as we are from Orange County as well. Nothing more comforting than having something in common with your server and feeling welcomed on another level.

FJk6dmaUb7Ew7kYycr8y_A.text: Customer service was ok however Nachos was not.  I ordered Chicken Bar B Que Nachos and Mexican corn. Love the corn but the Nachos was a little dry.  They were light on adding corn, cheese and beans on the Nachos but the meat portion was good.

rAQHsV0JDdS8QW2XLT_lqA.text: Cool place, chill vibe. Came on a Friday afternoon. Staff was nice. Good music. Has an upstairs patio if you feel like eating outside. aw_haoivg-VtmA2YUw2seQ.text: Good food and great prices for being right off of the strip. The portions were big and good to share between two people. The staff was really friendly and attentive.

hfRyxpbRY-vHM1qdrrd2kw.text: Food was great drinks were great the bartenders Elise and Sierra were great! The nachos were amazing and the fajitas were awesome! They were set on a fiery show! Definetly worth the show!

jApeQCNy7ambYBKN_nnJLA.text: Food was awesome and the ambiance is great! Our server Aly did an awesome job serving all 30 of us. Didn't even make a mistake and our food came it right away. Highly recommend this place.

TtTGxTV0BjATgCJPf7toIA.text: This place was great right from the start when we walked in they greeted us  friendly took us to the table that we wanted, our server was amazing it was so much food we couldn't eat it all and everything tasted great

PhJ495xxOEYogoH7B6_Qvw.text: Service sucked from start to finish but the food was good and if I return it's because of the food not the service !!! Host was rude and skipped me and the couple who walked in before us and let 3 guys who walked in after all us sit first !!! And I had 3 ppl in my party as well !!!! They sat me at a high table top with a two year old thank god she didn't fall off the chair .... server forgot my Margarita I had to remind her. And we gave her our debt card took her ten mins to come back with it ..... ...... I give service a 1 and food a 10 !!!! Tell your host to smile more not once did she smile at all .....

9UHOwiKHpC9RoQBOVsMRxQ.text: Oh my nachos. I had been drinking, and I'm sure most of their customers have also been down the same alley leading up to this point in the night.   The check in deal on Yelp was a huge plus for a free house margarita, the cool server that everyone talks about, Jovanny, even let my wife and I have one each for checking in. He then forgot them and we had to ask again, all the sudden he brought out 4. (There was a table of 10 of us so we shared) Great customer service by him for not even making a big mistake it wasn't 2 minutes later than the rest of the drinks.  With such a large group I anticipated not only a wait to be seated, then a long wait for food. This wasn't the case at all, actually the place was pretty dead for a Friday night. We were seated immediately and had food and drinks quickly. I'm surprised there weren't more customers as I'd definitely return if I lived nearby.  I had just a standard nacho with beef, cheese, avocado, sour cream, etc. just your normal nacho. The amount of ground beef was ample, and they really built this nacho up. They didn't do the stack of chips then toppings, it was mixed in sporadically. The amount of real cheese, then also a nice nacho cheese made this wonderful.  I was very surprised to find that even by the end the nachos were not soggy, everything was still crisp and firm!  One nacho is enough to share for kind of a drunk meal to top off the night, most in our party got their own and did not finish, or get remotely close.  Only downside is someone in our party ordered wings. He absolutely hated them and thought they were horrible. He shared with several people at our table and no one was fond of them. He did tell our server and since he shared them it was no longer valid to be refunded. We weren't really bent on the refund, but what a silly policy. Over half still there and since he shared them he couldn't even get a discount. I didn't stop hearing about the wings all weekend. Bummer.

bmvJPtgNzKlF6Ofc6xnwSw.text: GREATEST NACHOS EVER!!!  Margaritas are tasty and so is all the salsas!   The service could have been a little better, but the food made up for it!!   If I'm ever back in Vegas i WILL go back!!!

KA-Vh-DJMnQ0bleW5HvXww.text: This place is great! The free margarita was amazing!!!! Great time with friends!!! Good vibes

j2Dmxkcc4D_h4_f_3N4J_g.text: Well my wife and I went here this morning for breakfast. Well what a treat !!  First service was great the server was attentive and she was extremely nice. She made sure we had everything we needed. The food  was very good I had the steak and eggs omelette and the steak was prepared well and the eggs were delicious!! We also redeemed our Yelp margarita check in and it was !! Then my son and his girlfriend joined us and they were served quickly and they enjoyed their meal great job we will be back!! And if your in Vegas please stop by you will not regret it.

6jw52sF1Zj5Rqg1t-yaPww.text: I have been to Nacho Daddy on several occasions now and have enjoyed it each time.  They have a ton of good food and drink options, as well as a really fun atmosphere.    During my most recent trip we ordered the Fiesta Nachos, which come with grilled chicken tenders, salsa, onions, beans, cheese, queso, pico, guac, and sour cream.  Soooo good!  Even though they had a ton of toppings, the chips stayed crisp.  For my meal I went with the chicken tacos.  I was a little disappointed in these.  Everything inside the tacos were good, but the shell was super heavy.  The soft shell tasted more like a gordita or something other than the traditional soft taco shell.  It was still good though.  Make sure to do one of the scorpion shots!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nacho
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken tacos

HN9eOMN2mq2I2mwp9cLszg.text: Love this bar/restaurant! This place is packed on a weekend night but we got right in by sitting at the bar. Scored a delicious free house margarita with our Yelp check in and then split the Filet Mignon nachos - oh my, they were so darn good! All of the nachos there look good, but I have the feeling the Filet is the best. Lot's of steak and toppings, so each chip was full. For breakfast, we had the breakfast burrito (was ok) and the Chilaquiles, which were delicious and so packed with chicken I could not even finish them. The beans are flavorful and the sauces are great - but some dishes like the enchaladas go a little overboard on the sauce. The service and food has always been great when we go there, and the awesome 80's music and MTV videos are fun to watch.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Perfect filet mignon nachos for two!

NGBQhQmu0H-bFIs8dKJCGQ.text: NACHO DADDY was definitely solid, but also very much over-hyped. I had the filet mignon nachos and they were good. My co-worker had the lobster tacos on freshly homemade tortillas, and those were even better. I wish I had ordered those.  Negative points for telling me 15 minute wait, and making us wait 45. The place is also very "sticky." It is popular, crowded with young folks, and quite frankly pretty dirty. All those sweet cocktails spilling all over the place has your feet sticking to the floor.  Really good food, aight service, crowded, dirty ambiance.  4 stars.

FeCr_kk74HFEo-ViOcV_VQ.text: Great service, affordable prices. You actually have to walk out of the mall to find the entrance, can't enter from inside of the mall. Bloody Mary stole the show and was spicy the way we like. Steak omelette was decent, not the best I've had, husband said chilaquiles were good. Enormous portions for a great price $11. I would probably just stick to the nachos which looked delicious but we didn't order since it was sorta early.

0QVWUi4u0ilvtkfDDtG0mg.text: Food was good, and the service was great!  Had a helpful and nice waiter. I got the breakfast enchiladas and my girlfriend got the chicken fajitas. They substitute tortillas for lettuce boats, so that's cool! Plate came out sizzling with a little show of fire!

Qhlfp-xBejYgh9Evqezb3Q.text: All I can say is bombbbb. I can't speak for everyone else who comes here, but for me, definitely deserves 5 stars. Checked into here on Yelp and got offered a free house margarita - which was already a good start. It made it even better that the margarita was actually good ! Because let's just be real, some places just don't know how to make good drinks but Nacho Daddy is not one of those places . Our server was amazing & very attentive. And the food....the food unexpectedly hit the spot. I usually don't order enchiladas anywhere because it never tastes "authentic" enough for me , and although this restaurant didn't exactly make them authentic either, It was the best enchiladas I had from a restaurant in a long time . Inside the restaurant is pretty small but very family friendly. This was my first time in Vegas and If I ever go back, I would definitely go eat at Nacho Daddy again.

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Enchiladas

DOynlezwJwPocdZugOCR_w.text: The food is good, but far from great. I think the people giving this place 5 Stars are doing it because the Margarita's are good and they like the ambience. They have loud music playing inside and there's a lot of video monitors everywhere which makes for sensory overload.  I ordered the Vegan Fully Loaded Nachos with water which was good. The guacamole was very good and I really liked the proportions and the way the cheese was spread throughout the nachos. A lot of places simply put the cheese on top and then the chips on the bottom don't get any cheese. That wasn't an issue last night so kudos there.  My biggest qualm was based on other complaints that being the cheese. You can tell it's real cheese because real cheese gets stringy. This cheese is more like Velveeta. It's kind of soft and mushy, nothing stringy about it at all. That was the reason I knocked a star off, and keeps this place from being great. If you're gonna make nachos you can't skimp on the cheese and that's exactly what they've done. The Vegan Nachos weren't cheap either at all, around $15 for my plate.   I've definitely had better nachos but I can see how younger folk would totally dig the ambience here.

hIwjPFlzfSAOS7KT4oOkQg.text: This was our first time at Nacho Daddy, and had the best service experience we've had in Vegas! VINCE was our server, and was spot on with our table! Very attentive and nice. Thank you VINCE and Nacho Daddy! Definitely will be back, but will hold off on appetizers because the food portions are giant!

6dGLJB68nnBxXYTHQEI90g.text: Nacho Daddy has carved out its place with Vegans as a dining experience that caters to casual family diners and young millennials looking for a super friendly and late-night restaurant in a fun environment.  The Nacho Daddy restaurant is open until 2 a.m. on weekdays and 3 a.m. on weekends. And in recognition of and early-risers looking for breakfast options, it opens at 8 a.m. and serves breakfast all day.  Amid all the publicity and visibility of this new location, Nacho Daddy's unique menu and awesome customer service is the foundation of its success. Nacho Daddy has a commissary in Las Vegas that continuously delivers fresh ingredients to their restaurants throughout the day. By upgrading ingredients, like using filet mignon in their street tacos, adding lobster to the menu and offering a popular vegan nacho, the restaurant owners want to make sure Nacho Daddy continues to emphasize substance over style.  I really enjoyed their chicken enchilada and pork taco combo. The taco shell is a really well and made thick shell that has a bit of crunch to it but is also foldable. It's served on a hot cast iron skillet with perfectly cooked beans and rice and garnished with sliced fresh cherry tomatoes.  I'll be back!

PXwfEFk5eqG0Hyost9TcaA.text: The environment was lively. The nachos are huge. I liked the lobster enchiladas. They were delicious, wet, with a tasty sauce. The customer service was great, servers were kind and constantly checked on us, but our food did take a little while to come out.

qXkxMmp6okz-AoXQL2iyZA.text: Now I know why this place was on the Elite picks list of restaurants in Vegas, everything about it was phenomenal!  The name itself is catchy so makes it easy for people to remember it. The restaurant has a huge logo in front so you can't miss it at all!  Their service was great! We really liked our server (too bad I forgot his name. Boo) cause his personality was pretty awesome- you can tell he enjoys his job and makes sure you're taken cared of. Their house margarita- just wow! Even my aunt who is very particular about margaritas said it was really good with just one sip. Kinda expensive cause they put a lot of ice in it so a pitcher is only good for about 4 glasses but hey, that's good margarita though. ;)  We tried their nachos, flaming shrimp, fish tacos and burritos, and all were amazingly delicious! Their taco shell isn't just an ordinary kind of shell too, it's this really crunchy and tasty thing like some sort of heaven in your mouth kind of thing. :) I mean we just enjoyed every single thing we ate- even their salsa was good.   Overall, this place is pricier compared to other restaurants that have the same theme but their unique food makes it worthy of trying. I actaully can't wait to go back for more!
