_S1UKAyUHuwlpP8HpkioIQ.text: Omg.. went to nachos daddy's during happy hour and I was blown away.  Love this place especially the burger nachos.. they are amazing if you substitute the cheese for white cheese... great happy prices for $5.. must yry

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Burger nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nachos

_90OkGtAVLxtvVHx6ZGM8A.text: Hellacious nachos and fantastic guacamole!  Not the cheapest but the food was delicious. The fish tacos were on point!  Do yourself a favor and give it a shot

tFTL3zzW6Lm8WP9PDi6Erw.text: Nacho Daddy is one of my favorites in Las Vegas. Their thai nachos are a MUST try. I take everyone that comes to visit to their nachos! Make sure you check in on yelp, because you get a free margarita with the purchase of a nacho. EASYYYYY.   One con is that the strip location service. We were seated and waited 45 mins for service. We couldn't even get a servers attention as they walked by. Make sure to go to the Fremont location instead! It's one block off Fremont.

-v4um96SFbTEK2kZ2lkG1w.text: This place deserves 100 stars - phenomenal. The queso dip had an excellent presentation and an even better taste. Our waitress was prompt and attentive and friendly. Even better, our fajita nacho was the best nacho we have ever had. The quac and refried beans were my favorite part of the nachos.   For about $16, the nacho fed both myself and my husband and we were STUFFED. I highly recommend sharing a nacho with your spouse/friend. All in all, this was a top-notch experience. Cheers!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

xr9gdhH5ClqF-2sGIq4qkg.text: Great place to share nachos. I highly recommend the Filet Mignon Nachos because the ranchero sauce is so delicious. The queso dip was good too. We also had the Fiesta Nachos but they were a bit bland. Great place to check out if you are in the area.

nj0ERKpjQnssOA_RrmV1SA.text: We went really early but there was already a full menu and bar was opened.  The queso is definitely a must try and I had the breakfast burrito.  It was good but a lot of egg!!  Michelada was good and service was fast and courteous.  Good place to visit!

4tZhd31hx8d2kEO-nJLPBw.text: Here's the breakdown:  1. This place is spacious and nicely decorated. The inside feels like a hip young people area, with music videos playing in the background that matches the music. There is outdoor sitting available.  2. The food portions are HUGE. You could easily share one nacho with two people.   3. The food is good too. I had the nacho and it was not only filling but very tasty.  4. There is a free house margarita coupon if you check in. You can also get any margarita with $8.95 discount if you use your check-in.   5. The service is very nice. Our waitress was very kind and warm. As well as any other employee who greeted us and sat us down.  6. The prices are good for Vegas. In Vegas, everything is expensive. For the taste and amount, the prices are very good here. Nachos are anywhere from $15-23 bucks.  I would definitely recommend this place for anyone visiting Vegas. The food was great, the service was good, and the environment was very nice. Prices are hard to beat for Vegas. Would come again.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Tostada Nachos

47-wcExliUS-ujglOZ9SQA.text: This is a gem for a vegetarian and vegan! They have options for meat eaters and us and it's really good. The service was great for a busy Vegas strip location.   There was about 9 of us and we all had food we could eat. The vegan sizzling chik'n fajitas were amazing!   The house margaritas are super delicious. I recommend checking this place out. The vibe was also very cool.

TQ_qogAn6zcub-v8oP-SsA.text: Yummy! Staff is great! Peter the manager was very nice! Definitely coming back for the nachos....breakfast was great along with the bottomless mimosas! Cheers

AxaEHJcx5BbtuQhdasERWg.text: The vegan options at Nacho Daddy are what continues to bring me back.  As my earlier review will show, I was not too impressed the first time I visited but, with vegan friends, options are a bit limited as to where we can eat.  Because of this, we have found ourselves at Nacho Daddy a few times. The second time I went (following my original Yelp review), I tried their Vegan Chick'n Chimichanga and I was thrilled.  Their vegan chicken tastes, looks, and feels so much like real chicken (BUT BETTER) that I had to ask to verify I wasn't eating actual chicken.   Since then, I've also tried their Vegan Daddy's Bowl.  I will continue to go to Nacho Daddy because their vegan options are, in my opinion, unbeatable and way better than their non-vegan options. My only complaint that remains is that on busy evenings (just following Happy Hour), their service can be a little slow.  Other than that, their vegan menu quickly made me a fan.

mUdfHD-_NIGqiptfq5tZ0Q.text: My husband and I decided to try this place after hearing so many friends rave about it. It did not disappoint! We split the Fiesta Nachos and they were so tasty! Very big portion so perfect for splitting. The nachos were loaded with lots of tender shredded chicken and the guacamole was so fresh. Everything about the nachos was amazing! I also ordered a peach margarita and I got a house margarita for free with my yelp check in. Both were great mixed well. Can't wait to come back and try some more nachos!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nachos! BOMB!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Loved the margaritas!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Peach margarita, so good!!

R7CRAQI08s69REVIY19cbw.text: The food was ok, I had the vegan chikin nachos my wife had the chicken quesadilla. The nachos were ok not enough vegan cheese and they were soggy when I got them. My wife's quesadilla was burnt and had more of a burnt flavor and had very little chicken. However, Waitress and staff were great very attentive and friendly. Overall good place to watch a game or drinking night out as maybe having a drink will distract from the taste of the bland food.

JTaGHVdSriRgGMNb7dVe0w.text: Free margaritas with check in?! What a steal considering this place is on the strip.   The nachos here are amazing!! Definitely share because they give a lot (unless you're like me and can finish a whole one myself..). They definitely don't skimp out of the toppings. The menu was right to say "never a dry chip". My enchilada nacho was filled with so much chicken breast. The meat was tender and flavorful from the enchilada sauce. There was plenty of cheese and bean as well.   Most of the tacos if you get them a la carte are 3 tacos for around $10-12 dollars. The fish tacos were delicious while the chicken taco was pretty standard tasting but still yummy.   Chicken wings were meh to me. It wasn't good but wasn't bad either. I don't think it's really worth ordering.   Definitely need to come back to try all the different nachos!

z_kArfe8qVa6uSTLO5zFpg.text: So much fun. TV screens, Margarita's, nachos & more. Service was attentive and atmosphere is fun. Outdoor & indoor seating available. If you are near, it's worth a visit. The desserts looked amazing but we were too full. Next time for sure!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. House Margarita&#39;s - yum
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Street corn

en6WtQSJNHyp8fHvwCe9-Q.text: This place is awesome! They have a scorpion tank when you walk in and they even have a scorpion shot (alcohol shot with real scorpion at the bottom... dead of course)! The service was great and the bartenders made my night! I got the filet mignon nachos. They were a little too spicy for me and not enough meat, but it was delicious. The bartender (Booker) made me an awesome Jameson cocktail and was super friendly and entertaining. The atmosphere is chill and the decor was cool. I will definitely be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon nachos!

1bT4uzbbP_sg9eTxjC5CpQ.text: We started out at the bar, with great bar service and transferred our tab to a table once it was ready.... however, there was a misunderstanding when we were sat at our table and waited quite a while to be helped. We asked two people and finally the manager came over who ended up making the experience amazing! I think his name was Joseph--great personality, great manager! We ordered the chips with vegan queso, vegan nachos and vegan chimichanga. Everything was delicious but HUGE servings so we ended up taking most of the chimichanga home.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan queso with hot and mild salsa

_zgiSXS1pplhlivIDPT7aQ.text: Loving this place once again! My family had to try this.. service is great and margaritas are so good! If you are in Vegas please visit!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Which one cocktails...

kbKO3ERRI0tZDBPGWWRV3A.text: Nacho Daddy, despite offering vegan items, just did not do it for me. I had a burrito that was underwelming; my son had tacos were even less pleasant. The seasoning just did not do my taste buds justice. I may give them another try, but as of now, it's a no for me.

PANJ2vQOPlfIR5TjfpjqGg.text: This place is awesome but what makes it even better is LITZS! She is super friendly and made us feel welcome from the start. So happy we decided to sit at the bar cause she made our experience here that much better. Will definitely be back! Thanks Litzs :)

YYnAOVZg8QuCPi3OBNOLgg.text: One of my Favorite spots to visit when visiting  Vehas! They have the BEST nachos and margaritas.

cOFF5LBmsHSXRr2A8Eez1g.text: Fun food and environment. They should probably mention that some of the items on the menu is super spicy

PJ2EwmQGWhblDLViJUYMpQ.text: Love the vegan options here!  Waitresses are amazing!  Special shout out to Marty!  Thank you for the outstanding service!

e3pZ-3x950JG1UwrQ-mM6g.text: Came here for dinner since it was close to our hotel room. It was also based on the name. It wasn't that full so we sat at the bar. The service was a little hit and miss. The bartender didn't seem to want to be there and left half way through our dinner so we got a new bartender which was a lot more attentive.   For food we got a couple different nachos and split them all. We got the buffalo chicken nachos, pulled pork nachos, and fiesta nachos. The buffalo chicken nachos good, but very heavy on the sauce. The pulled pork nachos were extremely good and more than enough for 2 people! The fiesta nachos had a nice kick to them as well.   There was a nice large menu of margaritas to choose from. We got the Cadillac margarita and it was on the sweeter side. Not too bad, but maybe a little too much triple sec.

v8PTKFcwBUxIbhO7drnjgQ.text: Was visiting Vegas with my mom and sister, walking the strip and stopped here because mom wanted Nachos. Apparently we hit the jackpot (no pun intended ).  We ordered the supreme tostada nachos. Thank goodness we decided to share. Big ol' plate of nachos.  The restaurant isn't anything special, your typical sports bar. Nachos were really good, could've used more guacamole....but seriously what doesn't?  The service was meh...not very busy and service was still super slow.

CjDetfYnskw76pYAO0gnuw.text: My new favorite spot to sneak off to on the strip! Strawberry margarita on the rocks is sooo good and the girls in the bar just made it better. The nachos are super and there really isn't a dry chip on the plate. Great prices, food, drink and atmosphere!!!

eMGqIoXFknGhpZljIlGVbA.text: Awesome food !  Awesome bartender !  Great experience !   I would definitely love to go back and they have a vegan menu

HmyXfvgs7qlElnwH-8WhJQ.text: I came in here on a mission.  The vegan menu. Blown away! The Vegan Queso was super yummy .. my friend and I loved it. I'm so glad for vegan options at a local Mexican. Give it a shot!!!

c7KgsPXsd8dPP_gQmuUXWg.text: Whew! This place was AWESOME! Me and some friends came during happy hour and it was the best thing we could've done! Food was great, server was great, and prices were great! Our server Jacob was super friendly and down to earth! Go here! It's worth it.

TZXIIaTvL5HhbW6B0fWdcQ.text: I came here last night with my coworkers because they wanted me to take the famed scorpion shot. I chose my shot with Jameson instead of the standard tequila. You get to take the shot glass home as a souvenir. I don't know if you're supposed to swallow or chew the scorpion, so I chewed. It's like eating something very dry.   There's a lot of TV screens around and seating so I can see it as a popular place for sports.   Shout out to our bartender Booker? for serving us last night!

LLvlUix2gkr1D4GrSlJc4Q.text: Yuck! This was the worst food I've ever had! The cheese was cold and the chips were VERY soggy. There are times when I can overlook bad food with good service but we couldn't even do that here as the service was very poor. Our waitress was unfriendly, unknowledgeable, and stank attitude all around. You'd be better off making your own nachos at home than wasting your money here.

L6mhjDRbSg46PdJNwwIBLw.text: My family and I just wanted some snacks so we only ordered 2 nacho items.   Wished we were hungrier because the food was so good!  Both the Vegas Golden Knights Nacho and the Thai Chicken Nacho were extremely flavorful.  You definitely can't go wrong with nacho here!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Thai Chicken Nacho
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegas Golden Knights Nacho

9pcRAiPUtdCa4DEm6WPfJg.text: Great service and great food. I got the steak nachos for my husband and I. It was a satisfying amount serving size for both of us.  Did I mention I received a free margarita for checking in on Yelp. It was the best Margarita

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

aNTl8mD0vefouNODHbmBjQ.text: This place was so much more than meets the eye. Everything we ate tasted so delicious and gourmet, it exceeded my expectations. We got the Thai Chicken Nachos which had an amazing sweet chili sauce on it that mixed well with the melted cheese.   We also got the Mexican Candy Margarita and it was spicy and great and tasted just like a Tamarindo candy. If you're sensitive to spicy you may not like it. I thought it was a good amount of spicy just for sipping but I couldn't down it in a thirst quenching way cuz it was too spicy for that.  Then we ended with the Caramel Apple Nachos and they were to die for. It was the perfect mix of sweetness from the ice cream, cinnamon and sugar from the crisp but airy chips and freshness from the apples. Yum, yum yum!  I'd recommend ordering each of those items.

kyoaQjSHsgQJrUelSKb2Ww.text: Nacho Daddy was REALLY good. I visited here twice on my 4 day LV trip. I wish there was a location in NY. The first time is really what blew us away. We got the nacho average nachos to start and we each got chicken enchiladas. The food was amazing-the best nachos I've ever had. The chicken enchiladas were really good as well. I got the yelp free margarita with a flavor for a bit extra and he got the margarita with the corona on top. We both loved our drinks. The service, food, and drinks were excellent!  We came a second time for happy hour. We got the bbq chicken nachos, which were tasty but not half as good as the nacho average. We also got Bangkok chicken tacos and the chimichangas. The chimichangas were my fav. Happy hour drinks were also very good.   Can't wait to come back!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Happy hour drinks and bites
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Enchiladas
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nacho Average Burger Nachos-get these!

Bd65RrEdl28eAOm6c3-nFA.text: Nacho daddy was delicious! it was my first time there, the food and the service was great! Plus, the manager gave us a blue margarita on the house cause my hubby was wearing a Rams jersey. That margarita was the best margarita I've had in a while! We didn't get get his name, and by the time we asked for him, he was gone. :(

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Delicious nachos, plus a margarita on the house cause my hubby was wearing a Rams jersey!

rh1kmW9U1r7kQCaguIIGcw.text: Nice open kitchen and the was amazing and fresh. Christine was super sweet and helpful. My pork taco was so filling and deliciously topped with carmelized onions. As a tourist I would highly recommend this place.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

jBjO27CX0oWGBkDOfRkkgg.text: Lots of great deals throughout the week. Took advantage of the street tacos when I went in, as well as the margarita check in bonus. The California burrito was very filling (almost too filling - I wish I took some in a box). A lot of great, hearty options on the menu. Worth checking out - be sure to reserve your spot in line before heading over, otherwise you might have a bit of a wait.

wfXbyB_7sG1VHCqGkpTfYw.text: BOMB!! The service was amazing- Our group of 4 was seating almost immediately despite the fact that the restaurant was packed. I ordered the chicken quesadillas which were really good! The food all around looked amazing. This restaurant had a dope environment where everyone was having a great time!

BrkhejDGnXoQBR_vI07QuA.text: Sooooo good!   Had my eye on the Thai nachos but was trying to be healthy and opted for the mexi-cobb salad and street corn.   Both dishes were so fresh and tasty! The dressing on the salad was so light, and not overpowering. Definitely hit the spot!!

SflR4oz-cml0oAWj_qD-rw.text: Great Mexican food! The price shows $$ but the portions they serve really make the price very reasonable. If you're expecting Downtown Las Vegas portion, come prepared - they serve humongous portions. The review is short of 5 stars as the wait staff assigned to us was pretty rude. Other than that, great place, great food.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

EPnzeVtdo1gSWFRYRu19OA.text: Best Mexican restaurant in Vegas they have a great vegan menu selection. 100% recommend to everyone.

B15u0FnneIpNMWL1gWUImg.text: Highly recommend! Portions are huge! The food was delicious. I wasn't sure if I was going to enjoy the evening because the hostesses were rude and seemed bothered by their job. However, our waitress Shawna was AWESOME! Super sweet with great customer service skills and patient. The other server whose name I unfortunately didn't  get who served us our food was also great! He waited for me to film him lightning up our fajitas! Really cool to see too! Honestly, it's a tourist attraction.  The portions are HUGE the prices aren't too horrible. The filet mignon nachos were BOMB!

qGZ3iFjhm2DPiPcc3aAPcg.text: Omgah. The nachos were bomb.  The atmosphere was awesome, they played great music from my generation. And the nachos were bomb!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pulled BBQ Pork Nacho Everything else after was a blur.  These were awesome.  Ask for the salsa for an extra kick!

_ajqnkF80iWp8QayoR7knQ.text: Cool place with a full gluten-free menu. The vegan nachos, which are also GF, were great. A huge portion for a reasonable price.   Staff was very accommodating to multiple dietary restrictions -- I came for breakfast and the server was able to suggest modifications to the menu to ensure that the dish was both gluten-free and dairy-free.   I got the huevos rancheros and they substituted the vegan sour cream and queso to ensure the dish was gluten free. Staff was knowledgeable about their offerings and willing to modify as needed.   Service was fast, especially at breakfast/lunch, so this is a great place to stop for lunch if you're in the area for a conference or just need a quick bite.

8vE1jeeAyWjfvRfRX2FFNw.text: Oh my gosh! You have to go to Nacho Daddy while in Vegas! The drinks are HUGE AND DELICIOUS and if you don't go and try something from the menu you've missed out on the 8th wonder of the world! Atmosphere is Vegas style, exciting and easy dining! We go every visit to Vegas! It's a craving!!! FIVE !

-ISizY-P2uLskltvWPAYeQ.text: First off, I appreciate that they had their own "vegan" page on the menu, makes my life easier. I wish I could've tried everything on the menu that was vegan, but I had the quesadilla, and the chocolate cake.  I give the quesadilla a 6/10, because the cheese could've been made with a vegan mozzarella to keep it more together, but instead it was made with a nacho type of cheese, which made it a bit soggy and drippy. Maybe that's the theme, not sure. It was still great with the guacamole, pico, and 'sour cream' that came with it. The chocolate vegan cake- 8/10, if you love rich sweet chocolate then you would love it. I took mine to go and with every bite I had to drink some coffee to wash it all down. Overall I would definitely go back and try the many different things they had available for vegans. Thank you nacho daddy! We need one of these in Houston

_PGkI8YaEeYd4Q_FyUyI3w.text: Bad don't expect a Pyle if nacho almost. Any place will be better poor service over priced

mUls2PpR3f7WFBru4JaDUw.text: So many different vegan options! The vegan nacho cheese was the best vegan cheese I've had and the flavors of the dish were amazing, crispy chips all throughout, other than being a little pricey, this place is perfect. P.S. for dessert try the vegan cake, it was so moist and full of delicious chocolate!

LwkYEcYPgZQTSm1Thdx4Og.text: Wasn't expecting much as this place is next to the miracle mile of shops in Las Vegas.  Surprise!  I like it!  Nachos are really good here and so close to where we are staying.  Cool hang out for the throngs of gamblers in Vegas.

M2wVjvcu2NWXfHr9MIvxWA.text: Best nacho ever ! We loved them.. so yummy service was awesome! cant wait to come back

M41DdQxNg5jUpHjCVbTM-A.text: Tried this spot because I have a couple vouchers. Drinks were good. Food I had to send back both meals. But once they got it right was decent. I had the fried fish tacos (not bad), daughter had chicken  Nachos she said it was OK but very spicy.

nZW2UGA9mV7R6zFtWXt6Dw.text: I wanted so bad to give this place 5 stars, but in order to keep things real it got 3 ...  So for being a restaurant that has "nacho" in the name of the place, don't you think you should have high quality chips? In my opinion the chips felt like they were from Albertsons and The ground beef sort of tasted like Taco Bell ! With that being said, the menu does offer steak and higher end toppings. The service was adequate and the ambiance was appealing. Overall not bad , but definitely not great !

o5c04p-nqiOo10Fcm5mlSg.text: Two words - VEGAN NACHOS!! I'm a recent addition to the vegan community and I come towing a gluten allergy, so eating out with me sucks. So, when I told my husband that I wanted to try a nacho spot, he was skeptical, to say the least. However, we were pleasantly surprised by how easy it was for me to order and I was elated by how delicious it was. I'm not one to eat large meals at dinner, so when I nearly finished the whole thing... it was a sign. Oh, he liked his food too - so you don't have to be vegan to appreciate this place. Highly recommend!

ivdCiDKEiN1WcZWTdNRrPg.text: This place had very good nachos.  Some of the best that I have had.    The free margarita for Yelp check-in could be a bit better.  I am somewhat skeptical of margaritas that are made very big because they will be very sugary unless they have a decent amount of tequila or other alcohol.  This one had way too much sugary mix and tasted like it had no liquor in it.  Perhaps it depends on the bartender.  Atmosphere is ok.  I don't quite get the open kitchen that isn't anything to look at.  It seems like the kitchen area wasn't intended for the restaurant to see and therefore should have been closed off by a wall.

mqrrqabQrfR4OUEzdkHdAQ.text: I ordered Cali Burrito and was expecting it to taste better than the burrito places I have been to. It turned out to be a mediocre, dry Cali Burrito with two small pieces of limes (not fresh) and chips & salsa.  I would come back here again and order an entree that is not burrito because chips & salsa tasted decent.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

14jmz4scrbyOd0IJoDG-FQ.text: Vegan menu is cool, ambiance is what you expect, but in a good way, and service is great most times.  The menu satisfies most of my friends who have ordered items I have not yet had.  I mainly eat vegan options and it is nice to have healthier options.  However, it's a bummer when some of the dishes are delicious and others lacking in comparison.  The hours are convenient for those who want to daytime dine or eat late at night.  I enjoy drinking here and they have a decent selection.  Overall I like this establishment.       I'd like to say that Vince on day shift is very professional, amiable, prompt and genuine.  He deserves whatever schedule he wants and should get a raise.  Make him an assistant manager or manager and have him teach some others on customer service!  I rarely sit at tables.  Preferring the bar because servers usually are lacking.  Not Vince!  He's on it!  Makes ya feel at home and I'd hope he'll be working I'd come by more often.  Never misses the opportunity to ask us if there is anything else he can do.  Knowledgeable on dishes, always suggesting more based on what we ordered without pushing it.  If nacho daddy had more employees like him.  You'd make more profit for sure.  He and Rene took care of the birthday boy's cake and just really made our day exceptionally much more enjoyable.  Ashley the bartender on the late shift was great as well.  She was quick and easy to order from.       I wanna mention that more often than not, the hostesses that seat ya have some pretty bad attitudes and are not professional.  Any questions asked by patrons to clarify leads to shitty rude faces and responses coming from them.  About 9 times I've had only bad experiences with the some of those hostesses.  I don't wanna generalize because some are lovely and helpful.  Again Vince saved the day on more than one occasion.      I would like some more authentic dishes overall but for what it is, it's pretty great.  I don't see much difference in service between the shifts, and frequently, I'm glad most times.  If they can have a spicier option for some salsas or peppers would be a welcomed addition.  The Vegan Chocolate Cake was one of the best I've ever had.  Guacamole and Chips were great, I personally like my guac with more lime and spice xD.  Vegan Chick n Quesadilla, Vegan Chicken Nachos, Chicken Chimichanga Vegan were all delicious also.  I'm going to be a regular here forsure, just wish they had local deals.

jjRRsDmWVXKBVC1cQUzDQw.text: Excellent vegan selections!  I got the Vegan Daddy's Bowl and it was delicious.  It is nice to have more than 1 or 2 vegan choices on the menu.

gbN-A5jQxqWxgCrQnkCYyw.text: Kristen is the best and who was freaking amazing I can't wait to come back!!! The pomegranate margarita was the best I've ever had. This service is amazing they have a really good team and even the person in training this

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tinga

o2ixnEOYg7pGTk5EvIfm2w.text: I only ordered a salad here at the bar alone, so my review is solely based on that. That being said the food was decent. The chicken was seasoned really nicely but everything else about it was average. I'm kind of a cheese snob so I expect a Mexican restaurant to not use cheddar on any of their dishes but that's just a personal preference. Maybe if they threw some queso fresco on their salad and I had a few of their margaritas I would be more in love with it.  Price wise it's a little expensive for what you get but considering it's a very touristy area I think they are priced about right.  The bar tender was very attentive, 5 stars for the service. My water was empty a lot, but between the combination of her being SUPER busy and me being SUPER thirsty, it's nothing to get upset over.  If I'm in town again I would maybe come back for a marg and an app, but nothing to write home about considering all the amazing restaurants in Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

yO8wbD9xt9VGlAUAojsjJg.text: They offered a somewhat rock tattoo atmosphere! I liked it despite the fact that I have no tattoos. I sat at the bar, and the bartender looks tough with her tattoos, but she's a total sweetheart. I got the spicy cucumber margarita (yup I'm basic), but boy was that amazing! Probably the best drink on Fremont. I also like their shrimp ceviche.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

pNu8aGj8tsz51GNIEPMlkQ.text: Tried this place out for the first time. They have a vegan/vegetarian menu.  My BF and I ordered the corn off the cob and the vegan chick'n nachos. Everything was so delicious and the portions are big. Booker took our order and did a great job making us feel welcomed. Great hospitality.

U-SykvPqyF_mhC9Z-eV8mA.text: 3.5 because at the end of the day, it's about the food.  First, let me say that as ridiculous as it sounds, finding good nachos in a restaurant is incredibly hard to find.  You wouldn't think chips, cheese, and some toppings wouldn't be hard to make well.  But I've had so many disappointments that I gave up ordering nachos.  Then comes along a news article that listed this place as one of the best in the country.  Being a nacho lover, I had to try it.  It's not easy to get to once you get into the Miracle Mile shops if youre a lazy oaf like me.  But at least the journey builds up your appetite.  Food:  I just read a review from 2 days prior about the Lobster Crab Nachos.  It's one of the more pricey items on the menu.  The review wasn't glowing.  After talking to the bartender, I decided to try it since he said they pride themselves on happy customers and I could ship it back if I was dissatisfied.  Can't turn that down so I got em.  Basically it tastes just as you would imagine Las Vegas strip lobster nachos would taste.  It wouldn't surprise me if the crab came out of the jar I see at Costco.  I took a bite of just the meat itself and it was tasteless except for the sauce.  The lobster meat was a bit better.  Kinda like what you get in a lobster roll.  If you want lobster for $25, I would rather get a lobster roll than this.  But I got it for the novelty if trying it once.  And I wasn't hungry.  So I didnt want to be a jerk and ship it back.  Service: 4 stars.  When i came in, I was ignored at first and another couple who sat down was immediately tended to.  But then I got service.  The guy helping me was very informative and pleasant.   I came when it was nearly empty so that helped a great deal.  I suspect the negative service reviews are from people who came in at dinner time.  He said he covers 32 bar seats and 250 dining seats.  Thats a lot of work for a couple of people.  I'll come back to try the filet mignon nachos.   But be smart and don't let your hopes and imagination run wild hoping for unforgettable nachos from the lobster crab one.

qC9LWBrDvCWo52LwYcqS3g.text: Was so excited to come here! After seeing the videos on Facebook of the trash can nachos I had to try this place out! Come here and ask Dymond if you come, he was the best server and so down to earth and will definitely hook you up LOL! Try the Scorpion shot!

iEaZ0OyotYTovKy6NbOS7w.text: AMAZING. I had been wanting to go here and I finally got the chance and MAN these nachos are so bomb!! They serve you a mountain of nachos so maybe consider sharing one. Also their margaritas are so good. SO recommend coming here.

H-b8VFnByZAzK1CeXHpJxQ.text: I love this place. It's so delicious, and it's always fun getting a free margarita when you check in!

RAJhi8Hlt0w9A4gMmDLAWw.text: Good music, cool ambiance and decent Mexican food for Vegas. The portions are large, so you can easily split one entree and an appetizer and be full to the brim. We had the filet mignon nachos and the shrimp and filet mignon fajita plate. The nachos were super tasty, with an added bonus flavor of stewed tomatoes.   The fajita was good as well, refried beans were excellent,  and they give you a little "show" by frying it tableside. Being from California,  we never expect too much from out of state Mexican food, but this place actually surprised us!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yay, dinner!

oCc6DcpZ2GKV67DU7bD5kg.text: I love this place!!! I'm so glad that they now have one on the strip not only the Fremont Street area. I have tried about half of their nachos on the menu. Very good. I'm not exactly a fan of the BBQ pork nachos, too saucy for me, but my friend LOVED them. Good margaritas and you even get a free one when you check in on Yelp!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

gikch0qjUqARoi9h5Udcfg.text: Nacho Daddy saved the day by having vegan options on the Las Vegas strip! Their vegan nacho plate did not disappoint. I had to call my server back to our table to make sure they were actually vegan because they tasted so "real"  My nachos came with nacho cheese sauce made in house, black beans, guacamole, jalapeno, pico de gallo, some kind of green sauce that was delicious, a red salsa and vegan sour cream. My service was great and the restaurant was very clean. I would definitely eat here again!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Loaded vegan nachos, so delicious you would never know they are vegan.

CZ6kRkq31niVAa_94HNX2g.text: Food was amazing!!!!!! The Filet mignon and beer batter lobster taco were super tasty! Ordered through grub hub and even with it being delivered still was on par with any high end meal I could have sat down to eat. I'm so not a fan of refried beans nor cabbage and both on these tacos were AMAZING! I highly recommend and look forward to eating there next time I'm in Vegas or any state that has one!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

8ntzvyd6IQSmqLTwxh8XIA.text: Loved it here. Great food and service and a lot of fun. I will make it my regular stop going to Vegas now.

arL4zJk_tBtwuSJoOGdetg.text: The hype is real. Was visiting for the weekend, and was looking for breakfast/brunch places nearby. Nacho daddy pooped up, and I noticed they did all day breakfast! The menu, the pictures, the reviews, it sold my friends and I!  The reviews are True. You have to try the nachos. We got the Burger Nachos and breakfast burrito and it sure was delicious. The portion of the nachos are huge, so definitely something to split. You also can't beat the free margarita with a Yelp check in!!   We got here around 2pm on a Saturday and it was packed. We waited about 30 minutes to be seated, but it was worth it I promise! Service was great as well.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

IeC5Cw1C4SFZCIcuDjeC8g.text: This place serves amazing Mexican food and drinks ! Everything we tried was yumilicious !

HmPxw3cX8P6qKtpy0EJIJw.text: Awesome, fresh food. Used Yelp check -in to get free house margarita and it was better than most places premium margaritas.  Ordered crab and lobster nachos and , again, was not disappointed. Fast, friendly service.

ep8w6O5mufnZSC5bc2I4iw.text: This is my "go to" place! I love the Enchilada Nachos. With chicken and without (depends on my mood). The scorpion tank is cool to look at too especially since I saw it being made on Tanked!! Super cool place!

I0FxvD5SwE5Jb9fBdJ9oCw.text: The food was delicious and the service was great. Our waitresses Savanna and Taylor were amazing, they made our experience memorable. Definitely coming back again.

IIS_UwXCki0GkTDMAT6HZw.text: The Fajitas were of good quality, and so was the quesadillas. We were a group of 6 and the service was fast. Convenient location on the strip, and not as pricey as the other restaurants.

WGJLQJlXQjD0BwqvJwn4Ew.text: We went here for their variety of vegan and other options. We were impressed and went again a couple nights later.  It is a neat atmosphere but was a bit loud (at least around dinner time). The service was good and we happily redeemed our (small) free margarita which was reported really good.  The two non vegans in our party thoroughly enjoyed their food. They liked the street tacos with filet mignon and the fajitas.  As for their whole page of vegan options, we tried the spicy burrito, the vegan nachos, the tacos with avocado, and the vegan quesadilla. Everything was fabulous, but the quesadilla which, while still good, was a bit too saucy.  The portions were perfect- not too big or small. The nachos, however, were huge and could be easily split by two in my opinion.

6AhQMg6BQg6IhJjTcxSJeQ.text: Looking for a relaxed place for dinner on A beautiful evening in Vegas and came across  Nacho Daddy with 4.5 Yelp stars...so guess where we ended up?  This place is totally legit!  When we arrived, there was a 20-30 minute wait so we went to the bar and ordered a pitcher of "Daddy's Margarita" and they were probably the best I've had in any restaurant ever!  We sat on the patio and had the "Golden Knights" Nachos, which are the Filet Mignon nacho's with extra spicy peppers and queso...delish!  We also got the ceviche, which was good too. Overall, we had a great dinner and recommend you stop by for some amazing Nachos! #nachodaddy

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. #nachodaddy Vegas Style!

ohWbsczOd53LjM5QpTecRw.text: OH MY OH MY. Diet = d e s t r o y e d. WAIT WHAT DIET?  Two Words: supreme toastada. 5/5.   Just know I could not even. Flavors. PORTION SIZE. Enough said.   NOTE: NACHO PLATES ARE SHARABLE BY TWO TO THE T. Take advantage of the free margarita with check in.   Going into food coma wonderland now. #RIP

fICy6S3YpCjxJNnTGozk7A.text: Heading into this establishment there was a scorpion housing container. It was pretty cool! It fit the desert-like ambiance.   The wait-time was relatively accurate.  Our server Vince was very helpful and attentive. The Assistant General Manager also seemed very supportive of his staff when they seemed to get slammed with a lot of customers. I know this because I stopped the AGM to inform him of a small piece of tortilla chip that was inside of my friend's beer flight. He immediately replaced a new one for us.   The Filet Mignon Nachos were amazing. The steak was very tender, and complemented the nachos very well!  Me and my friend just wanted to share those nachos, and it was the perfect size.   If you want to grab a couple brews, and something to snack on, try Nacho Daddy! Overall, great service, great food, and great selections on beers. Our favorite was the House Hefeweizen.   The location of this place is on the outer edge of PH. It neighbors BWW.   Cheers!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Inside!

CNZ9N-zP22cXp6F0Mj0aRA.text: This was my first visit and despite the fact they were closing in 40 minutes, I received great service and the fajitas were tasty.

g3tKhICScg2TAUiPgBTPKw.text: Really enjoyed this place.  The nachos were quite good but way too much food.  By the time you get down a layer the chips have gotten soggy.  Service is prompt and friendly.  There was a short wait of about 15 minutes but not bad at all.  2 huge plates of chicken nachos were $43.  Extremely good deal!

_S0Ae7ifjjTNj5q-7ld9Hw.text: On October 10 2018, we stopped in for breakfast.  How cool to see a scorpion catch a cricket (in a tank on the right upon entry -  you have to really look for the scorpion).  Wow, great service, great food (and large portions), and inexpensive for the area too.  We were promptly greeted and seated.  We ordered ice teas and looked at the menu and the building interior (neat!).  We asked a few questions about some menu items which were thoroughly answered by Ari and then we ordered the breakfast burrito and breakfast taco.  They were both delicious and plentiful!  We both skipped lunch!

kzsZCh3O4n21oyC0JnuB0g.text: Nachos and wings were good. The Chicken Quesadilla was dry... the drinks were good. Place is clean. Service was okay...  Place is clutch, been there multiple times - good value

MWIhNqS_fDVf4-CIUdpwVg.text: This is a great spot! My friend and I walked in and got a spot at the bar almost right away during dinner time. Portions are huge and food is delicious. Some of the best Mexican rice and beans I've had and delicious grilled fish tacos. Try their signature flour tortillas, they're thick and yummy. My friend got the chicken tinga nachos and said they were great. Note: nachos are for sharing (they're huge)!

xmTTQ3WcSilmoJFPoZF95g.text: Great food, great atmosphere, and great people here. Never a bad time.  Ask for Tina, she's great too!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

7zWjO20DeNy5HFWIPrrFFA.text: We went here on a whim. Don't let the name put you off. The food is pretty good for what you're paying.

xBCHHEuexNRznFo1GcuFTA.text: Love the food here because i love nachos and they have great choices. Had the special of the month Some Filet minion nachos with lots of great toppings. Also shared a strawberry Margarita with the wife and it was delicious. I try to go here every time I'm in Vegas. Sometimes there is a large wait because the place is not the biggest. Sometimes the wait staff is just mediocre which is why only 4 stars. But the food and drinks shine bright would give it a 10 stars for that.

_WrEyxUkCqXsnV1-MEvdeQ.text: Super good. Supreme nachos and house salad were great. Place has an interesting vibe. If you're really craving nachos, they have a lot of variety. We were happy!

dZxtC4F9OXA8teSdivsZ1w.text: I was staying at Planet Hollywood on the strip. Woke up Saturday morning after a night of clubbing and we were all super hungry. We found that this place had some good reviews, but all of us were apprehensive to try. "How good could a nacho joint be?" We all had expectations of food truck level food served in a restaurant.   This place is great. Ambiance is fun and comfortable. Nachos are as good as advertised. We asked our waitress about the fish tacos, and she made a recommendation of how many we should order considering the size of our group. We thought she was up-selling us, so we ordered less, but we regret this decision.   FISH TACOS ARE BOMB! ORDER EXTRA!  We ordered a lot of food, and then some more food, and then tequila shots. I was surprised we were able to finish everything we ordered, but the food was just THAT good. I highly recommend and will be back again!

IimNRkPEgBZSYBRBJiFTZw.text: Fantastic food and drinks, fairly cheap for a "strip" meal. The atmosphere is noisy as all hell, but that's the idea. Service was prompt and friendly, and the margarita selection is extensive. My only complaint (and it's a small one) is that most of the margaritas use sweet and sour, and my wife gets vicious heartburn from bar sweet and sour. We hoped the fact that theirs was advertised as house made might make a difference, but it did not.

eg9rlvUvjaypRaLcUaVAvA.text: What can I say about Nacho Daddy...... amazing Nachos, fantastic street tacos, dope margaritas, great service..... phenomenal prices!!!!! And a Vegan menu!!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shot of patron and house margarita on Taco Tuesday
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Loaded Vegan Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margarita

cZJk__VYZlyYCDy1fQxHEQ.text: Where do I start? During my visit to Las Vegas I decided to try this spot. It is conveniently located at Miracle Mile on the outside of the mall. Both the inside and bar area are  spacious. It has a sports bar feel, and the food is on par with many of my favorite Mexican restaurants. They are known for their nachos and boy they did not disappoint! I tried the filet mignon nachos and they were piled high with all of the toppings that should go on nachos. I had jalapenos on the side. The drinks were allso great!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shot of tequila with a scorpion. Any takers?
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Quesadillas were tasty and super huge
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet nachos...AWESOME!!

ADeqONbnRo35koceGlU3lA.text: My first time at Nacho Daddy was in beginning of 2018 and it was magical. We had drinks, tacos, wings, and of course nachos. The Lobster & crab nachos were ingrained in my memory.  Coming back to Vegas April 2019 I made it a point to get Nacho Daddy my first night there. As always, the service was excellent (I think our server's name was Mark with a beard. It's been a week, sorry!). Unfortunately, the food just wasn't the same and I ran into some cleanliness issues as well.  We ordered: **Free house margarita with check in per person!!** * Lobster & Crab Nacho - The moment our server set down the order, my boyfriend and I knew it was going to be a different experience. The cheese was only in the middle with the toppings towards one side of the plate. Compared to my previous experience, everything was spread out evenly. Cheese between the chips and surplus amount of lobster and crab spread out. This time, I couldnt tell the difference between crab and lobster.. it just wasn't as good. * Cali Buritto - As simple as it gets. Too simple? Cheese, meat, some fries. The order came with chips which was nice. The burrito got cold quickly. We finished neither orders :/ * White Peach Margarita + Blood Orange Margarita - The margaritas were great! At first we thought it tasted like juice, but the drinks were quite strong and we got a good buzz out of them. Available to go too!  Later in our meal I used a napkin to wipe my mouth. I folded the napkin in half after to find that there were orange stains and writing on it. I reported this to the server and the manager assisted us with the issue. As a kind gesture the manager offered to comp our margaritas. We really appreciated this.  Because of the good will gesture I solely rated this restaurant based on their food.

PwW_JW_Qt_S2gY-7OeDRjQ.text: If you're on the strip and looking for a cheap but filling and tasty spot this is it. We stopped here after a night out for some breakfast and my big meal was literally $9!! I had the breakfast tacos and it was so good. We also ordered the enchiladas and the sandwich all were big portions and the rice and beans were great sides. We didn't get nachos BUT would def go back. It's a nice break on the strip from the fancy expensive restaurants.

aM5KxQQtZs22jEqz8XnPFw.text: Pretty mediocre all around. I was impressed that not a single dish (salsa, fajitas, nachos, fish tacos) had any flavor at all. Seriously, I feel like they had to try really hard to have bland, flavorless food across the board. Service wasn't great, the menu was covered in some crusty substance, and the food was affirmatively bad.   But, the beer (in a bottle) was good and I didn't get food poisoning, so they earn a star for that. And a star for having vegan options (even if the vegan options are completely tasteless).   Def would never come back and would tell people not to go.

jtEoZ6q2gGK4sqWGKnZBKg.text: I was so excited to try this! I love nachos! I decided to go during happy hour because the sizes are smaller which I needed since I was eating alone for lunch. The burger nachos was delicious, the favor kind of reminded me of a better version of Taco Bell. I also ordered a cheese quesadilla for my toddler, it was huge!!! I enjoyed some of that as well, the tortilla was really good! The menu is rather extensive, everything looked really good. I'd like to come back sometime and try their queso and other nachos. The waitstaff was very nice and helpful as well, and the food came out fast!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Kids cheese quesadilla
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bacon Cheddar Burger nachos - happy hour size

ZsebkY1cROnX0xwSNzOfdw.text: Damn good nachos!!! OMG, if you like nachos you will absolutely love this place!!! BBQ nachos are a must to try.  Great place to eat on the strip and very friendly staff. They also have brunch!

uRDpf4n4cF_ePxO0iKd6Yg.text: Bad service horrible management dont ever come here.  They do not like Mexican all races.   They made us feel uncomfortable that we had to walk out.

aNeKmDv4nzHJTw7qz3uXxQ.text: Food was good but nothing special basic Mexican Fair with a few twist on Nachos. Service was average as well.

6aW_C9-FPWHqZ-zqBODy3A.text: Absolutely loved this place... Happy hour was our daily snack and a cheap way to introduce you to other food on the menu.  I had the vegan loaded tacos and vegan shrimp my husband had anything Pescatarian.  We were actually full.  One thing about Vegas it's hard to eat a full meal with all the heat, so this worked out perfectly where we were still able to walk the strip.    I didn't get any pictures of our plates.  I will definitely visit this place again if we ever go back to Vegas.  We were down here for a conference, We generally vacation in slow relaxing places, like Napa Valley.

rM23UjKtZ-EhX8VrlK78bg.text: Portions are a bit immense, and restaurant is smaller than I expected given all the hype. My spouse had vegan nacho that tasted vegan --- a shame given how fresh their veggies were.  Service was excellent but food was okay.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Several vegan options for those who prefer them.
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menus

Hx5FgoiHDTIMMvkqsvWlkw.text: The evening before we came in and were treated to the best food we have had in Vegas with MJ, Ruban and Jaylon. Not only was the service fantastic they each offered great advise on the menu and were personable . This is the only place we have visited twice and more than likely will be back once more. We came back a second time and we're happy to see Jaylon, Mark and our server Rebecca . Happy hour specials were something to write home about . The breakfast burrito made my boyfriend cry tears of joy.  Worth the walk

Ow3yTWDNpfC7XTOke68bSg.text: For lunch last Saturday, we all knew we wanted Mexican food, so after looking around on Yelp, we decided on this place because my boyfriend started craving nachos, and we saw you could get a free margarita with a Yelp check in! Lol. We walked quite a ways from our hotel and they were pretty busy, but luckily our wait wasn't long at all.  I forgot to take a picture of the margarita, but it was their house margarita and it was very good! For food, we started with the Triple Dip, which comes with salsa, guacamole, and queso. I was pretty impressed with everything! Not the best queso I've ever had, but I definitely enjoyed it and the guacamole, too. I didn't eat as much salsa because I was focused on the other things ;)   For lunch, my boyfriend had the Fajita Nachos, which he really enjoyed! I didn't taste any myself, but they looked really good and definitely weren't lacking on toppings haha. We'd both recommend sharing them, though - he got about halfway through and couldn't finish, and nachos don't save all that well lol. I was full from all the queso, so I just had the Southwest Chimichanga, which I loved. It's definitely more like a Mexican egg roll than a chimi in my opinion, but I really liked it. The dipping sauce was delish, too :)

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Southwest Chimichanga
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Triple Dip

SjHgGHPXzR5r28rjlC0ixg.text: Amazing service, giant portions and great frozen margaritas in a lively atmosphere!! I just wish someone would have eaten the scorpion while we were there.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. This frozen margarita was strong, but still tasted amazing!!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta nachos were great and were very SIZABLE.

xXGm7Frvg3DhmDrYuBn4Uw.text: Nacho Daddy was a fun place for casual dining. We made the mistake of not calling ahead to reserve a table so we ended up siting and waiting around for about 30 minutes. It wasn't so bad considering it was prime time Saturday night on the Vegas strip!   We were greeted with friendly smiles by everyone on staff. The waitress was very nice and attentive. The refilling of water kept coming. The nachos were excellent. I had a bowl instead of the nachos, but I was able to sample the nachos that my dining buddies ordered. The food came out pretty fast considering the crowded restaurant.  I would come here again because the food was delicious, the service was excellent, and you can't beat the price point! Just call ahead next time for reservations before heading there.

E6JT5pW4dkdf25GuMoVeNQ.text: We went twice in three days. It has an amazing value for money, which is not granted in Vegas (especially in this price range). It's lively but not crowded (we went on Thursday and Saturday nights), and the service is great. Both waitresses were really kind and helpful. Chips and salsa, or the dip trio, are great salsa. Be aware, the hot salsa is REALLY hot. For mains, of course nacho dishes! If you're really really hungry, you can consider splitting 2 dishes for 3 people, otherwise 1 dish every 2 people is more than plenty (especially if you've had the dip trio first). Good choice of beverages. I would definitively go back next time we're in Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Beautiful open kitchen

XJ3KGNtIUCR-ti3jxKboPA.text: Nacho day is the best Mexican on the strip hands down... if you are vegetarian or vegan then it's even better... we ordered nachos and replaced regular chicken with vegan chicken and damn it was off the hook.. really delicious.. we also ordered their vegan tacos and again... it's killer.. they don't use regular tortillas for their tacos.. they use a pan fried version that's crispy and flaky and super tasty... Needless to say we will be back when we are in Vegas..

aqLue9jPsOIsfPA_Ay1WsA.text: Great place with great nachos, I had the spinach chip nachos with shrimp which were amazing. Great place to chill and have some great nachos and drinks and sightsee.

Sxjty8sSy9lPZQo_Lx5aeQ.text: My friends and I went to Nacho Daddy during Labor Day Weekend in Vegas, so you know it was pretty busy. We got our food fairly fast and it was really amazing. I did have a mishap with my fajita nachos, but he manager did the absolute best, as did all the staff, to take care of this issue. They really went out of their way to make me feel like a valued guest. The food and drinks were excellent and so they get 5 stars :).

561jkmCTDTp2meH6AM5-LQ.text: Really enjoyed our visit here at Nacho Daddy. Came here pretty early in the morning for some breakfast so it wasn't too packed. Service was quick and friendly. Unique thing about their menu is they have vegan options which is pretty cool. And according to their waitress, they are one of the only restaurants that offers a vegan section in their menu. Also we got free margaritas for our first checkin! Never too early for a drink when in Vegas. I ordered a sausage breakfast burrito and it was so filling. Thick and stacked burrito that definitely hit the spot! Overall first experience here was awesome. Give nacho daddy a try, I'm sure you can find something to hit the spot off their menu!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken tostada! ( ^_^)b
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sausage breakfast burrito!  ( ^_^)b
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Free margarita with checkin!( ^_^)b

0Pv0Fp6zW4ZWJ5FAAxp-6g.text: I wish i could give this place negative stars. I planned a dinner for ten people based on their gluten free vegan menu options.  I got here and was told they fry their gluten free chips with flour tortillas.  Um hello- they aren't gluten free. So I'm now stuck at a dinner that i planned, unable to eat anything. Do not label your items as gluten free if they aren't.

iV0tayEeZskT0xGQGsPHTw.text: Two of my friends were craving tacos.  I wanted to try something that wasn't a major chain on the strip.  Thanks to Yelp, I found this gem just off the strip.  Based on their logo and layout of the restaurant, I thought this was a chain restaurant.  Actually, there are three locations, two in Vegas, and one elsewhere in Nevada. It has a sports bar vibe to it with all the TVs playing various games or music videos.    When it comes to the food, all I have to say is GET THE NACHOS! I failed to mention that I went here twice during my weekend vacation because the nachos were that good! I would recommend bring a friend with you because there's no way you can finish this on your own...I did get close the first time.  There are other food items such as tacos...and that's all I can remember because I was so engulfed with the nachos.  You can get your traditional type nachos, but they had some other fun flavors to try.  First time I went with the BBQ chicken, and the second time BBQ pork.  Okay so I might be addicted to BBQ, but the sauce was so sweet and combined with the melted cheese, and crispy chips...I was in food coma heaven.   Service was spot on both times.  I sat at the bar and a table.  The servers were quick and helpful as I always like hearing their recommendations.  A big plus is the current Yelp check-in offer is a house margarita!  One it was super delicious, but also there was no issue with using the check-in offer.  Not too many businesses in WI utilizes this tool, so a lot of staff are usually confused when I show it.  I was happy that wasn't a problem.  I would have no problem with Nacho Daddy expanding with more locations...like Wisconsin.

Ve36u50EfZvc_6-7wApktQ.text: Amazing maxican food I had .and very friendly and kind services by staff.plz do visit when you are in Vegas .

jkjemr4xCMi9_g8x5jAqOQ.text: TONS of vegan/vegetarian options. I tried the house beer flight and was surprised at the quality of the beers! The stout was particularly good -- chocolate and not too much roast character.

whhEdBblesVgh_upzYi7DA.text: Definitely get your monies worth here.  We had 2 orders of nachos for 4 adults and still had left overs.  Great atmosphere and a friendly wait staff.

P1nSHbsFXCBEXuqx8xU4hA.text: I was so bummed when Nacho Daddy closed the Henderson location. I was on the strip and was excited to go for my favorite vegan nachos. They have changed them from the prior  recipe but they still do not disappoint. They no longer serve tofu at this location .  No tofu but I did think the vegan cheese was excellent.  The portions are huge and tasty and staff was pleasant as always.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Nachos

yns2V4jXlogfoIcAv3ssyQ.text: Loved everything about Nacho Daddy's.  Cant say enough about the food, service and atmosphere.  Wish they were closer so I could go all the time!!

UjeiC9sLZTwxRqupkuB3Sg.text: Lovely ambience . Great food ! Love the vegan options on the menu . Definitely recommend trying the loaded vegan nachos

9f6ewoi2A8pWQO_OYMKypw.text: This place was absolutely amazing. We saw it on yelp before we arrived in Vegas and vowed to eat here before we left. The only thing I can say is I wish there were locations in SoCal! Sooo good! My wife and I had a drink, shared a supreme tostado nacho and a Carmel apple dessert nacho! It was perfect. What we really liked was that the waiter actually recommended some thing and not others...made us feel like our waiter, Ryan, knew what he was talking about and actually ate here. I hate it when a server says "everything is good"...that is not informative. I would highly recommend and we will be back! Delicious and such a great deal for the amount of food and beverage you get!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Caramel Apple Nachos! Wow!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Tostada nacho and white peach margarita.

5aQWwkLDSo1yVSpjaBZlvg.text: Slightly tucked away off the beaten path. Nacho daddy is a great spot for those who want to take a moment off the busyness of the strip but just a hop,skip and jump away.   I Was able to enjoy my breakfast on their patio with a great view with mild quietness from the strip. The strip is maybe 100 ft or so..?  I had the breakfast burrito which was great, added some guac. The coffee is a allstar as it comes in a French press. Service was also spectacular. Great breakfast spot!

yKGpHIFaLHbU39eqEAp-hw.text: My daughter and I watched the Tanked episode when they made the scorpion tank and she asked me to come here while I was in town for work.  I am blind as a bat, the address is correct, I had the MGM grand on the wrong corner, good thing my taste buds are working, the food and service are great.  Note, they moved last year and the Yelp address is incorrect, so if your not looking you will never find it.  Order the Buffalo Hot Nachos, popcorn chicken with hot sauce and the Mojo Pork Tamale, did not take long to get my food and it looks delicious.  The service is great, maybe because I am by myself or that I sat close to the kitchen, my favorite spot in any restaurant, but I am definitely not being ignored.  The tamale is fabulous, lots of meat, the mojo is so good, and the masa is light and not doughy like in some tamale I have had.  I would say it is definitely worth searching out when you come to Vagas. I am only holding back one star because they are hard to find.  Ok, I tried the nachos, they get the 5th star.

VmBynNHZuj-EBZFJSpACDA.text: The nachos were good. But the unusually loud music and videos playing on all of the walls took away any chance of talking during our meal. Not a fan. The food was fine but the rest you can keep.

FoIyzNk5gTU7ED5_zLlBkA.text: Cassandra was our bartender and she was amazing! We got lobster, filet and pork tacos. She Hooked us up with a deal on it and gave us great recommendations. Would definitely come back next time I'm here!

-s4PwuiuMEdpwbwVCwyUTw.text: Judy was great!  We got the filet mignon nacho to share and it was really filling and delicious!  Perfect if you love guac but don't like spicy food.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Re8jLXZyIcEVIfWC_kSUgg.text: They have a nice selection of vegan options. We had the vegan nachos. We were very satisfied with the meal. The staff was friendly. It is located off of Las Vegas Blvd and Harmon. Next to the miracle mile shops.

QGr9ydur31HAEfhOfaH-gg.text: Food and drinks were great. We had the shrimp tacos and filet mignon nachos. Both were delicious. Best nachos I've had ever. Service and atmosphere is fantastic

c_0TuUbscYfmZdMqLJq-2Q.text: A full page of vegan menu options brought us here while visiting Vegas.  I'm vegetarian and was traveling with a vegan friend and we both enjoyed our meal.  We ended up going back again during our stay and during the 2nd visit, they had beer battered avocado street tacos!!!

wnDGdBcNvS5VxYMqSWiXwA.text: The bacon and cheese enchiladas were amazing! The open patio/ bar layout is so inviting.  Service was a bit scatterbrained, but perhaps it's because she said she doesn't usually work the morning shifts.  Either way, the food was awesome, and a great atmosphere.

fu9CPL36oStPAedh9VGnFA.text: Nacho Daddy is a good spot to grab a bite. We went for lunch. Our server was Desi. She was very nice, a little preoccupied with a group of 7 guys. But that's wasn't too bad pretty girl has to make a tip. Nothing wrong with that. The service was 4/5, the food was really good and came out really fast. I expected to wait longer. Overall, I plan on coming back tonight.  Its definitely on my list of good food in Begas.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster &amp; Crab Nachos

i79dRG1Rwv9N7hgWlkeIwQ.text: Came here for the first time and loved it! Our waiter Matt was amazing. Their spicy shrimp nachos is the best! And if your looking for a refreshing and delicious margarita get the spicy cucumber margarita.

g_1OIXC5Fm2sKJXB4ywjBg.text: Lobster and crab nachos were amazing! It was a great ratio! The spicy cucumber margarita had a good kick to it as well! 10/10 would recommend!

VR5bjDaot-HX1zPHftKoUA.text: Loved it!  Best nacho experience ever!   Followed recommendation from culinary overlord on Special of the Day...Cuban nachos...generous amount of pulled pork, cooked to flavorful perfection, homemade potato chips generously coated in melted Swiss, topped with crispy pickles, picked onions and cilantro!  Per the Director of Food, "never a dry chip"!   He's right and you should head right over to one!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fun bar, great atmosphere and generous pours!   Staff of very friendly and excellent hosts!

6xOrTL12Py1wXUXo1k9qhg.text: This is a must when your visiting Vegas. Huge portion sizes for a reasonable price. The nachos are piled high with various toppings. We ordered the special nachos for the month (chimichanga) as well as the chicken tinga nacho. Both were really good, but I preferred the chicken tinga because of the chipotle tinga sauce they covered the nachos. It was super tangy and unique. The chicken quesadilla was a miss with our group. It just wasn't cheesy enough and tasted pretty plain. I would just stick with the nachos, and there's so many different ones to try! It's a fun atmosphere to come here with a big group of friends with all their shareable dishes.   Tip: if you check in on yelp, you get a free house margarita!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chimichanga nacho, chicken tinga nacho, chicken quesadilla

TgJJYq91OaslLlZRNaB_lw.text: Solid service, pretty cool establishment. Our waitress Ashley (has a right arm sleeve so you know it's her) was THEE BEST. I'd come back but I have to get her. She took care of the whole table, and just knew what we needed before we even asked. Management: give Ashley a raise! Nachos were HUMONGOUS! Definitely shareable. Everything tasted great here. Margaritas are tasty too! All in all a win here!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken tinga nachos

Uth_cKz0YsQHoEJbx4dtOg.text: A lot of bars and restaurants outside the casinos on the Strip are terrible. It's rare to find something that's not a chain. This place is locally owned. Nacho Daddy is not authentic Mexican but I still like it. There's good specials and they accommodate many dietary restrictions.   I was encouraged to try this by some new friends. They said it's their favorite, and what did I know about it? This place is great for vegetarians. It has so much to choose from. The food isn't cheap but it's not excessively expensively like some other places on the Strip. By checking in here you get a free margarita. That itself was good enough for me, but the food was good too. I got a vegetarian burrito. It's about $10 and comes with tortilla chips. This thing was filled to the max. Many times vegetarian burritos won't fill me up because they're so light. They stuffed this with beans, rice, and vegetables. Others I came with got burritos with beef or chicken, and beef and vegetarian tacos. They all looked as good as mine, and I think I should get tacos next time. It also has nachos of course. These also can be made vegetarian friendly.   It was better than going to Chipotle. It wasn't that much of a price difference either. The ingredients are higher quality and have much better taste.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margarita With The Vegan Burrito

_Bd-lvqNl287IPS-Kbuw3A.text: Americanized Mexican food with an extensive vegan menu. I came here with my omnivorous boyfriend and two vegan friends, and all of us left stuffed and buzzed for under $30 per person. This Nacho Daddy location is in a hectic area just off the Strip. The interior is modern sports bar-esque, with lots of huge TVs playing music videos. The place is huge but wildly popular, so expect a 30+ minute wait for a table. The hostesses and servers were all very sweet and efficient.   As the restaurant's name may suggest, the nachos here are incredible. We all loved the Vegan Loaded Nachos, which are completely smothered in rich, gooey cheese sauce that no one would know is vegan. The pico de gallo, salsa verde, and guacamole on top all tasted fresh and well spiced. For my entree I got the Vegan Fajita Salad, which was simple and satisfying, with seasoned Beyond Chicken strips atop fresh greens and grilled onions.   The Pineapple Mint Margarita was candy sweet and tasted artificially flavored, so I switched drinks with my boyfriend who got a Cadillac Margarita. This was slightly better, but still too sweet and did not have enough tequila considering the huge goblet size of the drink. While nothing amazed me aside from the nachos, I appreciate the inclusion of vegan options and would not hesitate to recommend.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan menu
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Flaming Chick&#39;n Fajitas
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margarita

poGZdZ3P7dRfq2tWwcP-uw.text: Read the reviews & was intrigued. Thai chicken nachos were good. Tried the monthly special- chimichurri nachos. Oh my! Perfection. Meat, chips, sauce perfect portion. Bummer that I did not check in on time for the feee margarita.  There was a burrito involved too. Everything was as it should be. No one left hungry. But everyone would do it again.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chimichurri nachos

0JDOCEJMGZnXUXiQG5RN7A.text: Great food, great service. Would highly recommend.  Ari was a great waitress with a great attitude. Nachos had excellent flavor and the quesadilla was good also!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Martini and nachos

hYEPAQpidQ-F3x8SvQRqbQ.text: Yummy margaritas and nachos. Great service. Will come Again. Fajitas nachos great for sharing. Hits the spot for Late night meal.

ayhNMKP8_nbB5FWoEHZmXw.text: Wanted Nachos and Nacho Daddy didn't disappoint!  Had the plate of three pork street tacos and shared the Supreme Tostada with my spouse. You can easily share one nacho plate - and this was just the best!  Spicy, cheesy and the right combination of cheese, guacamole and pico.   We ate on a busy Saturday afternoon and waited about 20 minutes for our table. The only negative I have is that the music was loud, so we had to raise our voices to hear each other.

rV8QFmFZew3bctHUcmudcA.text: Meant to write this review a week ago but forgot. I gotta say Nacho Daddy is one of my favorite casual food places to go in Vegas. It's got a ton of TVs with the games on or weird and entertaining music videos playing- gives you something to stare at when you're hungover af and waiting on your huge pile of nachos. Service was as good as it was gonna get given it was labor day weekend. Our waitress, I think her name was Carly, hustled so I dont have complaints. Menu is large with more than just nachos so there is something for everyone. Drinks are good too. Filet mignon nachos are hella good. I got the chicken tinga nachos last time.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Tinga Nacho

rTwIOMVON4pDZiJyViGPsQ.text: This place is great! We waited less than five mins to get seated despite it being busy, and we got our drinks and food almost right away! The atmosphere was very nice, and they had great music playing the whole time. The chicken tinga nachos were bomb and the portion was a lot bigger than we had expected. The chicken quesadilla was also really! really! good! Service was great and our waiter Kylo Ren (that's what his name tag said!) was super attentive . Overall a great experience and will definitely be back when in Vegas! (PS. You get a free margarita when checking in with purchase of an entree!)

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Quesadila

upyO2JI-BXhXWxnGvGxD3A.text: I can't even begin to explain how delicious the nachos were.   We had filet mignon navies and spicy shrimp nachos. The steak nachos were yummy and exactly what we expected. Warm crisp chips piled high topped with tender cuts of beef, beans, cheese, sour cream and really good guacamole.   The spicy nachos were a flavorful surprise, piled high with tender grilled shrimp, cheese sauce,  spicy salsa and guacamole.   The servers were excellent and knowledgeable and the overall vibe of the place was low key chill. Kristina, the bartender was wonderful and made us some really great margaritas.   Prices were very reasonable. There was ample seating, both indoors and outside.

ks1I4nHyaVe5OZuaMGyRMw.text: Nachos were drenched it what tasted like bottled pace Picante salsa or equivalent. Overpowered & ruined the Filet Mignon flavor & chips were soggy in minutes . Great friendly staff.

B2BAe2ARHbKuJ8QDjCrrTA.text: So glad I found this place! Wonderful Las Vegas happy hour. From the moment we stepped in the door we were treated with happy people. We scored a great table in the bar next to the scorpion tank,  which had me apprehensive at first, but I was assured by the wait staff that the scorpions pretty much hide out under the rocks in the tank and never have they gotten loose! Enjoyed the happy hour menu with a great selection of nachos and tacos. The shrimp tacos were super tasty with fresh ingredients and the nachos, which is there specialty, were dripping with toppings. Everything on happy hour is five bucks which is great for Vegas. Don't miss this hot spot!

wggMg2V3Ymn62CJTTWDQhw.text: Service was really good! And the nachos were even better. I ordered the hot buffalo chicken nachos with vegan cheese. . .the vegan cheese was really good. And they also had a full page of options for vegans, which I thought was neat. The portions are huge, so you may be able to get away with one nacho dinner for 2 people. Definitely try this place if you're in town!

Y32hUfdYL8NPJtohjcnPIA.text: First time here with the family. Chimichurri Steak Nacho's go crazy! Omg! When you check in, you get a free house margarita! Super worth it! Price is right! Great customer service! Must go to for sure if you are in Vegas or living here! Thank you to our server Delanes!

fkMBI5-3PftFgv6oAQjVDA.text: Great vegan menu. The "chicken" is great, the "cheese" is not.   The vegan loaded nachos were mediocre due to the cheese sauce. The vegan chimichanga was good. Both would have been better with refried beans instead (or in addition to) the unseasoned black beans.

A9UPQLWWkUpB8425B2Mzqg.text: 3 Stars All Day  It wasn't bad but it didn't blow me away. 1st of all it's on the Vegas Strip which I expect to pay a bit more but I still feel it was pricey for what I got. The chips weren't bad but they definitely are not home made from scratch. The toppings ratio to chip ratio was good. And the cheese wasn't bad. But nothing really stood out. Not mad I had it but wouldn't be a high recommendation either.   The positives are good location, friendly staff, cool vibe. If your looking for a place to have some drinks in the heart of it all and also have some nachos maybe this is your spot. But we weren't drinking and we were not impressed. We definitely have a bunch of better nachos spots in CT.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Golden Knights Nacho

EV8M8eYY7byUZD4Nx0F06g.text: I'd been wanting to try out this spot for a little while and I'm glad I did - it was very good.  The menu is full of mostly nacho dishes, each with different twists. I had the Supreme Tostada Nachos and that was a filling and flavorful plate of food. Each chip is loaded with toppings and a perfect combination of crunch, savory and tender meat. The plate was definitely enough as a meal for one person.  You pay "Strip" pricing since I think it's a bit high for what you're getting.   I'd visit this spot again if I were in the Miracle Mile Shops or Planet Hollywood area.

pku8eLr1J8zXNDjoUnwKzQ.text: I am wowed by this place! The fish street tacos with rice was amazing!! Everything about it was flavorful! Fiesta Nacho was a huge portion and was delicious! We came here on cinco de mayo, had a blast!

ypdfmanlWYqr8s26z5JVgg.text: Free margaritas!! You can never go wrong with that! Shannon our server was amazing. She super nice and very helpful. She has really good recommendations for our vegan friends.

0LYAtrABNz8CN0EyEU_hlA.text: I am so glad we walked to try this place! My boyfriend and I are both foodies and before traveling had scoped this place out. I had planned on ordering the lobster nachos but was told that the Thai Chicken was better. I am not sure about that comparison but what I do know is that I was NOT disappointed! The flavor was amazing and I was very impressed. My boyfriend said his filet fajitas were great as well. We will definitely be back next time we are in town and maybe I will try the lobster Nachos. Also the servers were some of the friendliest we have ever encountered and did not lead us astray! Please consider opening a restaurant closer to Michigan ;)
