MhXtbVoOlFXckBtA7ZAlcw.text: Yoooo bomb margaritas. I was deeply sauced and the vegan burrito was decent they could season the food better

6j5jLDIiCvQh0xI0yUYkYQ.text: Another great Nacho Daddy experience! This location on the strip outside of the Miracle Mile shops is very classy. I love the open style patio design. The white peach margarita is to die for! They are so delicious, that you forget there is tequila in them. I highly recommend the fish tacos. The best part of these tacos is the fresh flour tortillas. I also got to see someone do the shot of tequila with the scorpion in it. The scorpion is dead (thank God) and it is soaked in liquor. They serve it on top of a lime on the shot glass. The waitress rings a bell as the shot is being done. This is not my type of thing LOL, but it was great for the tourists that we took there.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpion shots

pcBFdkJ-BowaFKwZJPWPiw.text: Great vegan food! We came here because of the vegan menu and were not disappointed. Service was good too!

tl2MyZcZIpxmLZraH2wTKg.text: We ordered to-go, because there was an hour wait for a table. We split an order of the spicy shrimp nachos. The flavour was packin', but the contents were a bit basic; my bad, I should have read the menu description a lil' closer.  The hostess was really helpful and friendly. The  bathroom inside was trashed, but the ambiance  in the restaurant was cool.

pmUIY4SFFiv16o5VTCgqXA.text: The ambiance, drinks, and service were all on point, but that's pretty much it.  I had the crispy avocado tacos and the vegan nachos.  Both were not very good at all.  Main issue was I ordered the vegan chicken tacos and got the nachos instead.  Did not want to waste the food so I ended up nibbling on it but did not enjoy it.  Everyone who works there is super nice and friendly.  My server/ bartender was also a sweetheart, just not sure why the nachos were not comped since it was the wrong order.  Mistakes happen but the costumer should not be responsible in that situation.

X3j1mDNzQmoS1UzXEpKenw.text: Went here after we left Fremont. Drinks were outstanding. Service was quick and friendly. Nachos tasted really good, but I feel like they were overpriced. It seems like there are a ton of toppings, but I ran out of protein and cheese way before I ran out of chips. For what they charge, there should be at least some cheese underneath.

Wr0a3jsUXFxgDLKqVP0p9g.text: I was a little skeptical that a nacho place could have such high reviews, but eating here definitely convinced me.  I had the lobster and crab nachos, and it was honestly the best nacho experience of my life.  Very fresh and tender, just the right amount of heat, and a fun grouping of complementary flavors.  Shannon, my server, gave excellent recommendations and super friendly and attentive service.  Don't doubt the power of the nacho!

2gp4_qKaO3eFohxf3600dw.text: The food was delicious!  Great breakfast and amazing nachos. Service was fantastic!  You get a free margarita when you check in on yelp too!!

rbWTWbbDum6sGm8KU8fjEg.text: This is the place to go..i give this good food 10stars....also check out my opportunity thank you ...https://goo.gl/qn7PFw

Ac3K3JtR-uC0sQS89JtpSg.text: Super large serving sizes. Their chips and salsa was my favorite because I loved the flavor of their medium salsa. We tried the Supreme Nachos and the Southwest Chicken Soft Tacos in Chipotle sauce and found they use the same seasoning for both meats. The beans taste like they came from a can and the rice like it came from a rice box from the grocery store. My daughter enjoyed her sliders but could care less for the fries.

REsHrcUEF4S3wY3ZgviSIA.text: Margaritas are amazing! Use the check in offer to get a free house margarita, or a discount off specialty margaritas. Steak omelette was incredible and the steak was super tender. My favorite is the Cali burrito. The service here is exceptional. Would 100% eat here again.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margaritas

P0vAnJoPY61BSyv5k0gMHg.text: The filet mignon nachos were bomb! We also had the crab and lobster nachos but I didn't enjoy those as much.  There's also a yelp check in deal here to get a free margarita with purchase of an entree, and they didn't limit us. It was per entree basically, so two entree's, two  margaritas.  We also got a free birthday dessert, and since it was Tuesday, it was also BOGO Tequila shots! Our server was even awesome enough to let us buy it for him and his colleagues, so we all took shots together. All in all, a fun experience with the people of Las Vegas.  I would gladly come back again for some more filet mignon nachos. We were at Top Golf earlier this trip and had their nachos, they weren't horrible, but Nacho Daddy's were far better (and they better be with this kind of name...).

lmxsPUAReI6pjOepo-tr6g.text: Got the filet mignon nachos.  Might be the best nachos ive ever had. No joke.  Flavor and everything was on point.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon nachos. &#39;Nuff said

5m6RCi5F1F8LHEY_jF6LQA.text: Really great atmosphere with the windows open, and worth the short walk away from the strip. We went on a slow (for Vegas) day, and service was a bit lacking as our waitress disappeared for at least 20 minutes. Perhaps she was on break, but nobody else checked on us and we sat with empty drinks almost the entire time we were eating. Drinks were also a bit watered down, but drinkable. Food was great though. I had a breakfast scramble and hubby had loaded nachos and we both cleaned our plates. We'll be back next time we're in town!

rgFCVCw2jC7MXziJlfTtFw.text: Glad we finally had a chance to try this place while in Vegas this weekend. Great place to grab some late night food. I opted for the vegan chicken nachos and my husband ordered the vegan chicken chimichanga. They were both good without the vegan chicken. This place was a life savior, as we didn't have many vegan options to choose from at 2am. Oh and their vegan chocolate cake was the best we've had yet! It was rich and not dry at all.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

771tizVrRH1VCoBkfpgZJA.text: The vegan chik'n fajitas are life, made me feel like I was omni again! They even set it on fire tableside.   Very complete vegan menu. Even had vegan desserts, I had the richest chocolate cake with raspberries.

f8Cb5EmKx2U7YvN9frF_Zw.text: I really wanted to like this place since vegan nachos and quesadillas are extremely rare finds. They offer an entire vegan menu, including a dessert option, which is great. However, overall the food is really bland and flavorless. Let's start with appetizers. We asked for the "spicy" salsa, which was basically milder than mild salsa. Nothing spicy about it. The guacamole also had no flavor at all and the portion is small for what you're paying for. On a side note, it's a little obnoxious that the chips and salsa are not complimentary, which is pretty standard for Mexican restaurants. Moving on to entrees, the chick'n quesadilla was underwhelming. The vegan queso was okay, but, again, bland. I like that they offer faux meat and that gave the quesadilla more flavor and texture. However, it needs a little more. I actually liked the loaded vegan nachos. They were covered with a semi-spicy salsa, which was the first sign of flavor of the night (why didn't it come with the chips?). I would order those again. I must give Nacho Daddy props for its vegan chocolate cake. It was so delicious! Very rich, heavy on the frosting, and had a layer of Oreo crust (genius). My takeaway for vegans is that you shouldn't get your hopes up, but the chocolate cake is worth trying.

kvoduuyG8Pb9_fC_BKuzmw.text: The vegan tacos are worth every penny. If you are vegan and need to get your tacos on and be full and satisfied and happy and excite your taste buds this is a must visit place

uIlSI4wY84aceW1GAkZV_g.text: Great food and drinks. Nachos hit the spot and the spicy cucumber margaritas were very good

wvYh2ZIROlfAxcY69fp2UQ.text: Amazing food. Amazing service...Jovany is the best! Supreme nachos were fantastic! Very authentic red chili - NM native approved.

mlkA_-u9blJgNMWj5QwyiQ.text: Jovanny was an amazing server! He was extremely helpful and the cheviche was FIRE!!! Also the check in margaritas were a cool plus :)

-h2sknf5OxjkC_y9yDbb4A.text: Daddy Ryan was a smokin hot waiter with nice biceps, he got my friend the burrito she's always wanted and he didn't put salt on margarita to my requests.

g7TTJfivhRAzX0MISHNhBw.text: Tiffany was an amazing server! Drinks and nachos were awesome. Dessert was delicious!  Definitely will come back!  Back again. This time with Audre the fabulous Redhead.  Amazing service!  Took such great care of us!!!

rRZcR_eYV0qLUrjvlVBIlA.text: Service was awesome, Huck was fantastic. Answered all of our questions and was very helpful. Enchiladas were great and chips, salsa, and queso were delicious!!! Free marg from yelp didn't hurt either!!! It was so good!!!!

p1E-V_IkNmdQYgHWL9hzQw.text: This place was great. The food was really good. Probably the best nachos I've ever had at a restaurant. Usually they come out soggy, substandard meat and cheeses. rWVnaoVByRKrrRPnetgWWQ.text: Our waiter Aerrick made our visit to Nacho Daddy a GREAT EXPERIENCE. Amazing energy, fantastic smile, and on top of everything! Thanks!

SJhVqPhlzEtBGdz9GmQD_w.text: Every much as good as the DTLV location...with one exception. This location is open 24hrs Thurs - Sat. I'm never going home!   Don't forget to try to lobster tacos and the house margarita or take a scorpion shot! Or just take a look at the scorpion tank!

dVPM6xXOYlwy1ljrRGiidA.text: Can't explain how amazing this place was! We ordered the Spicy Shrimp nachos and the Vegan Nachos. OMG it was beyond delicious. We've had vegan nachos in a hot place in Beverly Hills and this place crushed it! The service was great (shout out to Kaitlin our server) and the ambiance has an industrial/Mexican feel. Overall it was great and will definitely be a staple to our Vegas trips from here on! Oh, and the michelada isn't made with Clamato, but it was still super tasty!

34hQBD4pcZwTPwDmI9B93g.text: This was definitely the best food and service I've had in Vegas! Jacob was amazing and the fried ice cream was on point!

fJgJfj4QXKJKsnl28ZF2yQ.text: Our server Aly was really nice. Aly helped us by guiding us through the menu and  welcoming us to nacho daddy's. It was a great experience

WMnlmmFQu_VlzuoRT5eHUQ.text: Great nachos!! Rude staff.  Have been twice and tried the filet mignon nachos and the enchilada nachos. Both excellent. However staff both times has been rude, especially the host that is in the front.

oByEeGW4TxbcNB-dyggBSQ.text: Nacho Daddy has a really good vibe and cool decorations. Got the Supreme tostada nachos and it was a pretty big portion. Super yummy!

BcSbPPZozAATxMkNhgLf_w.text: This place is a MUST when you visit Las Vegas! They have some pretty great vegan options that all taste amazing. I came here about 3 times during my 1 week stay in LV. The vegan quesadillas are super delicious, and the nacho dip tasted JUST like real cheese! Their salsa was surprisingly very flavorful and authentic, and everything that I could ask for in a salsa. I will definitely be returning every time I am in the area. 100000% recommend this place!

Dw_9MOVNOJUCJgl41rwcXw.text: The portions are huge and the food is great. Fun place.  You have to have a scorpion shot!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

OeG_yDvbYxdavBOAS9QMrw.text: Joe is amazing!  Free margaritas for checking in! They were refreshing and delicious!  Food and service were great! Good portions with affordable prices. You get your money's worth here. We ordered the chicken fajita bowl, American crunchy tacos and chilaquiles. All plates wwere delicious and enough to share with the table. This place is known for their scorpion shots. I might try one next time.  I will be back again during my next visit!

45cWwCnK2xs_MsAT14V39A.text: So bummed out , first time trying this place out and I ordered to go and they forgot the sour cream. Does anybody check the food before it's taken out to make sure it's accurate? And while I was waiting for my to go order to be brought out I saw they brought three bags out and whispered in the hostess ear. I waited and waited to see if they would call my name, I didn't want to be to eager to ask if one of those was mine cause I thought they would call my name out it it was mine! Eventually the hostess gave a "oops yea here's your order" look

KoteUaf-p3J0cyloLQNclw.text: Any restaurant that actually have vegan options is always a win with me. Not to mention food was very good. Absolutely would go back!

WYjnWz7AXnU4G8rKj7EMEw.text: Delicious. Definitely recommend to check this place out. The service was great and the food as well. Food came out quick. Free margarita if you check in as well. Got the chicken tinga nachos which were bomb and the avocado street tacos which were bomb as well. Many choices to choose from especially if you're vegan they have many options too. The churro sundae was good as well although the churro got hard possibly due to the ice cream but it was still worth it!

qtf98Nkn_ww86xwVllcOBA.text: Great food, great customer service. First time here and I loved it. Make sure you check in with Yelp and you get a free house margarita.

Q9vwJ0I5MCmD76Vn9sbmww.text: My friend and I shared the filet mignon nachos. It was too much for one person considering we ordered drinks as well. The filet mignon melted in your mouth! And the nachos were everything you want: crunchy chips, cheesy,  and piled high with all the fixings.   My margarita was delicious. It was a pineapple mint margarita on the rocks with a sugar rim. It wasn't overly sweet and it got the job done.   If I go back, I will order the fish tacos. I had a bite of my friends and the fish was so crunchy! There was no "fishy" flavor, just delicious, crunchiness. And the fish was not overly battered so you could taste the fish.

SBDSss1ygJD3CkwpE8wvgQ.text: Free Margarita at check in was great! Their portions are massive for the nachos, so great for sharing! Wish they did something for my girlfriend after we said it was her birthday, but they kind of left her hanging.

Hi Taylor thanks for responding. If you want one foodies advice (take it or leave it) I would cut the menu waaaaay down. Make 15 things that are awesome and  consistent as opposed to 50 things that are just solid. No worries either way. Just a dudes opinion. It's your joint. We will be back though.

tL-ZqdS6L4WksMhR7dL1VA.text: Just ok honestly. Wouldn't try the nachos again. Expected more being in the Southwest but

3iydIq29sjBRKirxtGR2qQ.text: I enjoyed this place tremendously! We were in Vegas for several days and had a large group that just wanted to get some good food and drinks before we began a long night. Someone suggested this place and we were able to get 12+ people sat at a table within a half hour around 7pm. Not bad at all.  The atmosphere was good and the staff was friendly. Make sure you check in on Yelp and get your free margarita! That was a nice perk that we did not notice until we had ordered a pitcher of margaritas, so we just indulged a little more haha.  We shared the guac and chips which was really good and a good portion. My wife got the pork tacos. They were good, nothing special, but they were not very expensive and she enjoyed them. I had the the enchilada trio and it was very tasty! I let a few other people try them and they were the consensus best meal of the table.   Good place to go in Vegas for some decent food and they can accommodate a decent sized party of people.

AT4DvCHYp-OPxcoB65scHw.text: Lots of Vegan options!! YAYY!! Great vegan queso dip, my cousin didn't even know it was animal free. Keep in mind the tacos are a bit spicy.

v3xFkxJPsa6PizNcYltA9Q.text: The chips and salsa were delicious. We got the triple dip. My friend ordered fish tacos which she said were delicious, I ordered cheesy enchiladas and wasn't a fan of the fact that they have corn tortilla. Another friend of mine ordered a veggie Burrito and ended up with a steak burrito. Eating steak is against our religion so that was great. I also was overcharged on my margarita which I called in and the manager was nice enough to take off.    Lexi was a great server though. She was polite and courteous and made sure we had water and food served on time.

pa0ry0Pl-kX1YBQCQuetVg.text: Great vegan food good portion size and amazing service the waiter was so friendly and informative best service iv probably ever had will for sure come back thanks AJ!!!

2aCFyBCrmyU4rKURg2L-IA.text: Great little restaurant right off of Fremont St. We stopped for breakfast, I had the juevos rancheros and my wife had a fajita bowl. Both dishes were very good. One of my favorite aspects of Nacho Daddy's is the French press coffee they offer, a very nice touch. The service was excellent as well. Don't miss this place if you are downtown in Vegas.

OxG2GqOe1XUzmQq5-cAEqg.text: Food was decent. Host was kind. Server was a bit rude and untimely. She also chose to flirt with a customer at the bar before coming to take our drink order, check on us throughout the meal and bring us our check. Nothing from this experience has me dying to come back. Overall it's nothing special.

uNQ7YMaslDGX1U9PJKJmnw.text: Enjoyed a great salad mid day.  Music was good   Nachos were good but peppers in it were surprising hot-  good but surprised us

n5uk3H_XKnH8z3-NmT6dnQ.text: Amazing food and a great place to bring people when they come and visit. The customer service from Kayla is always amazing. We always try to get her as our waitress when we are here. Her smile and help with drinks and food cannot surpass!!!

-dhn7j5y5Bi7FHpictbS9g.text: We were staying in the area... Walked to get take out.. Worse Worse experience. The young gal at the front...Rude. I had ordered from another wait staff... very nice.... but then waited 45 minutes to get my food. maybe 20-30 people in the place at 1:15 pm on a sunday so not busy. Wont go back to that place... but the food was good.

voa4axulkUsHi1iZ-I77zw.text: Great nachos- so many choices!! We all tried a different kind and shared. The BBQ pork were fantastic. The filet minot were ok not much meat. Also enjoyed the sloppy Jose and the buffalo chicken- recommend this spot! Service was excellent too.

QgT5JC2drAg_YWnij0aUKQ.text: Great service at the bar. We stopped in for a quick bite and a drink before a show.  It was early, 5:45p and there was a moderate crowd. Food was good, as advertised. The Yelp check-in free margarita was a nice perk!

MmQ91RAuPx9jU1hD19nNXw.text: The nachos here are killer, I loved the tostada supreme nachos and the BBQ chicken are great. Well hell they are all awesome. The bartenders are the best in town. Bryce made the night much more fun. If you are in town it is a must stop.

5PysYuQQ3Opyu9vQiikfAw.text: First time here had great experience food was great large portions and "Litzs" was our amazing server. We will definitely be back again!! Found our new go to Las Vegas Mexican restaurant!!

wknveh5gMaGDbVRtmHUJpA.text: This place is a cool atmosphere for people visiting. Happy hour deals, scorpion shot, and so much more! Would recommend if looking for a decent spot to grab before going out

dOvJH3pyMclo6imVI3FIzg.text: We had some good food and a few laughs. Sat outside and still had a good view of the TV. The server and the manager were good to have around and took care of everything. Be back again.

PIT7j5YOlh5fXxPLe5aDKw.text: Have been here twice in the last few months while working various tradeshows. The free margarita is cool, and tasty, but the food is seriously good at a very good price. If you are staying at the Marriott Grand Chateau - it's the best chill place to hang out and eat some tasty food and have some tequila after 11. Good service each time !

_ErtC7mTRYgrrAaf41MnCg.text: I would definitely consider myself a nacho expert. If there are ever nachos to be had, I will always chose them over any other appetizer, hands down. I would like to thank Nacho Daddy for their large vegan menu! There were a lot of really great options. We had the sweetest waitress, Ryan. She was great!  She let us know that her favs off the vegan menu were the Loaded Nachos and the Spicy Burrito. Done and done! When the order came, it looked SO good... we dug right in. A few bites in, I was questioning my entire life. I'm always such a paranoid freak when it comes to eating vegan at a non-vegan restaurant because people are humans and mistakes happen, but I'm not trying to realize it at the end of the meal. I had to ask Ryan to re-confirm for my insane mind that these delicious nachos were vegan, because the cheese tasted like straight up OG nacho cheese. It was definitely vegan but I feel like it would fool a non-vegan any day! I would add chikn to it next time, just to further my pigdom. The burrito was really flavorful! They somehow marinated the chikn to perfection and it actually held up a nice texture, unlike when I try to marinade chikn at home. If you are vegan and in Vegas, you have to try this place.

hxW-U3Tg4eNUYrwi4-kXpQ.text: This is the vacation of trying new things. Ordered the Thai chicken nachos and the pork enchiladas. Even got s free margarita for checking in :) the nachos had a sweet and tasty flavor. Hubby seemed to enjoy the enchiladas. Service was good, Hazel was very sweet and had a smile on her face the whole time.

46SEuDmiiUhEWGIVgPS0Cw.text: There was no cheese on my BBQ pork Nacho's. Was supposed to be white queso and there was none. Tons of chips with no toppings. Very disapointing. Food took forever to come. Not worth the money.

IpZrfxk70NUddZTzGi43XA.text: Everything was good but did not like the lobster nachos but the took it off our bill so that was nice

RX6-eVzZ0yCKhBVDTmCjXQ.text: Pretty tasty vegan food. I sat at the bar and had great service. I got the vegan chicken quesadilla and chips and salsa. If I'm back through Vegas I'll come again!

1fnT-gQ8R7HNgu-RzJK89w.text: Good food at reasonable prices! I recommend this as a nice spot a little off the beaten path for a very interesting menu with Tex-mex.

9Udp2LdOO-QecOqOXLq_-Q.text: Wasn't the worst Mexican food I've ever had, but not my favorite. I would be willing to try it again, maybe I should order something different next time. Nice place and decent prices

lLvpismEGUKHhr_conP0JA.text: Feb 28, 2018 was my first time trying Nacho Daddy. And honestly the only reason why they caught my eye is due to the fact that there is a vegan menu! That made me so happy. Hopefully more estashblishments will get with the program. Anyway, I ordered the loaded vegan nachos and let me just tell you I loved every bit! Those were absolutely the best nachos I've had....EVER!

En2OKQipwuA8lCWbIS3bxQ.text: The place was decent and prices were decent.  Nothing authentic with the menu.  Definitely a Tex-Mex restaurant. I got the enchiladas and they remained on the plate. Got a margarita and it took a long time to receive.  I believe it was the original and it tasted horrible.  How do you mess up a margarita? Anyway I would not return to this establishment.

3Pv78OzksT7UvLTvY8XzKQ.text: My first time here was a guys weekend trip and recommended by a family member.  The staff was attentive and friendly.  The bartender answered our questions and gave descriptions and recommendations for the various foods.  We heard the tacos are good but nachos are in the name.  We all had different enters and nobody was disappointed.   Hint...check in with Yelp and get a house margarita free.  Enjoy the scorpion shot if you feel up to it.  Overall,  a very pleasant experience and I will go back.

tvf2cP1xPrcz6MJ3FGJdGA.text: Great place to eat while you're in Vegas. Reasonably priced food. It wasn't the best Mexican I've ever had but it wasn't bad. Service was very good too!

lG-Ej9AciyQ4FC-z2VRsLA.text: I've never had nachos that weren't soggy until I got to Nacho Daddy. Best hangover cure ever.

D-gvorp_soBzuE6xle28wg.text: Amazing nachos. I had the lobster and crab and hubby had the supreme. Good portion sizes and great taste.

99pjobBkKnUlXGxJGPjV-Q.text: Pricey but after s certain time of night, it's hard to find vegan options and this place has some tasty vegan dishes. Definitely a good place to go late at night

TFMDAAzhjy3pxnrUIEOhaw.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the food here and the prices were reasonable. Good staff too. I would eat here again.

TyDe3b6Rv2bJbsD26dR_vQ.text: Yum!!! We loved the food and atmosphere. Awesome lobster nachos and located slightly off the strip to offer a more laid back scene.

-16ahPRGPdMW8CwuuOt2Wg.text: Super fun and surprisingly good food. Totally recommend for a fun night. Try the scorpion shot...not at all what I had envisioned. The street tacos rock!!!

lTXeWlN4ADNmDB5k37vhjg.text: Love the one downtown it's pretty good! I had the Tinga Nachos it was loaded with so much! Huge servings def worth the money

6cnrNaLWbPJkKrZIjKG08g.text: Meh...$20 nachos are good, but...they're $20 for a fairly inexpensive dish. Came with free margaritas with the check in though, so not a huge issue.   Our only issue was the server. He was actually super nice but seemed more interested in himself than us; I asked for a soda water and he responded that he doesn't like soda water, went ahead and served me flat water anyway. He didn't write anything down, so when I changed my mind on salad dressing, he went ahead and brought the one I originally asked about, and when our bill came he went ahead and charged us for the margaritas despite both of us checking in for the free ones.  I understand everyone has a bad day, but I mean, did he have to mess up *everything* we requested? It's all good though, because he was having fun which means we werent upset. We had fun with it overall, and weren't upset enough to bring it up to him.   Otherwise, atmosphere was fun and food was tasty.

aOxuHbavUUl4S3CGF1rwUQ.text: Beyonce was the coolest waitress! Went back in October.  Margaritas were good.  Would recommend the shrimp nachos!

Ny4a8YBmi-mQ56UbzJrQqQ.text: So So So GOOD!!!  We were looking for Mexican food on the way to the airport to drop off visitors...found Nacho Daddy and great reviews.  Reviews did not lie.  The nachos, the flaming shrimp tacos (lit on fire at the table) and the Nacho Daddy Beers were super yummy!  Will definitely be back!

azQymLkvP7ZB61FyqVqG6Q.text: This place is great! We came across it on our first day here and I'm so glad we did! We ended up going back on our last day too, both times we had Vince as our server and he was really good! Always checking up on us, making sure we were good, checking on our food/drinks! Overall really great service and nice workers. The nachos here are amazing as well as the queso! I got the bowl with steak and my husband got beer battered fish tacos and it was all so good and so filling. The second time around he got the Cali burrito and I got a breakfast burrito and it did not disappoint! I would highly suggest giving this restaurwnr a try, wish they would open a restaurant in San Diego because I'm definitely gonna miss this place!

R94BpaAkDNj2SH0N2TtoRw.text: Awesome Nachos! We got the BBQ pork & Vegan Loaded Nachos! There was a whole vegan menu for any vegetarians/vegans/health conscious people. I suggest the white peach margarita. Service was great too!

ZLxa2DbqImctK3W9kULuIg.text: Wow! The food here was awesome! Had the Baja Seafood Combo and was not disappointed. It was delicious, and the fish, lobster, and crab were cooked perfectly. The white peach margarita was good as well but definitely sweet. I would go back and try more menu options again without a doubt.

qgGLLovAmcEzaUwyKRrJ9g.text: Litzs is the best! Super nice, very helpful, great attitude, great tattoos, and the food was awesome.  Why get nachos anywhere else???

CRD0IzWUDls8pwHC7uuMAw.text: Terrible experience. Disorganized. Waited over 40 minutes to be seated when told it was a 20 minute wait. Other parties were being seated in front of us that came after us. Manager said they had reservations. This simply was not True. Food is decent but pass on the service.

FHA3LO1R-63oJJQp_1Sb2Q.text: Well another awesome find, with out ranting this place rocks! The food, 5 on flavor, 5 on price, 5 on portion size and service. Wish we had one back home.

MnVl3adYhZrCDPcvYb0zSA.text: The fish tacos and fiesta nachos were some of the best we've ever had. Wonderful wait staff, as well.

vxL2onMuO2LWVf-jUPtiug.text: I was so excited to try this place bc I love nachos! We went for happy hour. Service was good and we sat at the bar. The food was at best mediocre. If you've had good nachos (not just queso from a can) these won't light your fire. I got the burger nachos and my husband got the street tacos. Also if you live someplace that has good Mexican food you won't leave here loving what they offer. Prices were good and drinks were decent.

IFwOrvZLPRbipr4XVE9llg.text: Great place, great food! Came on a Wednesday night around 8pm & over half the place was empty. We were worried about a wait but they are probably slower during the week. Very nice atmosphere on the strip.   FOOD: Started with the dip trio. Salsa was spicy & flavorful, but not mouth burning. The guac was delicious! It was chunky & you could taste the onion and garlic. The cheese was zesty with jalapenos, but again not overpowering. I had the chicken chimichanga. I take my chimis bery seriously. Many places claim to have a fried shell but do not OR dont offer the fried shell. Well isnt that a burrito then? This chimi was large in size and had a perfectly fried shell! The chicken inside was flavored very well which mixed masterfully with the guac on top. One negative: there were also beans & the way mine was rolled it seemed like the right half was chicken & the left half was beans instead of being a great combo of each in every bite.  SERVICE: id have to agree with prior reviews & say it was disappointing. Our waitress greeted us with her depressing story about how shed rather be home in bed. Not what anyone wants to chat about before dinner. Perhaps some customer service lessons for the crew are in order.   Overall it was a great dinner & i would / will definitely be back for another try!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bar

qKInNJzjj5mnV_y2xGSwJg.text: Came here super late for some quick grub and a drink, and let me tell you. Probably one of the best enchiladas and nachos I've ever had is from here! The margaritas were alright but other than that, super yummy food!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The food was so good I forgot to take a picture before I started to devour it

v3qDYwXdobv7A-P4G6QV1A.text: Quick service. Food was fresh and menu had something for everyone! We would definitely go back to Nacho Daddy.

We were staying at Marriott Vacation Villas and returned for dinner with a Marriott discount. Some great healthy salad and vegan options in addition to good U.S. Style Mex. loved the bartender Scarlett during 1st happy hour visit. Dinner service 2nd visit a little slow. For price point and taste, great option.

We ordered the enchilada chicken nachos and the filet mignon nachos. The filet mignon was so tender and very flavorful. They have meat and cheese on ever nacho. The chicken nachos were so big I could not finish it but it was so delicious i wanted to keep eating. We also ordered there queso dip as well. Everything we had was amazing and flavorful. Its a must try when in vegas.

6VeSV5DuXhwLXcA7sB4E0w.text: Amazing place to eat. The food came out quick.  The service was great. We had the lobster tacos and filet fajita bowl that was also done to perfection.

RDC2p-j6Q7nUgf1zex0HRg.text: Got the "Nacho Average Burger Nacho" and it was really good. Plenty of interesting nacho combinations and plenty of Gluten Free options!

E92_l4HvBacIU_tDBGkY7g.text: Who the hell doesn't like nachos? Nacho Daddy is a heaven on earth for those that want stellar nachos with an overwhelming amount of toppings. Come hungry as the menu items will have you craving everything shown, there are authentic dishes and a mashup up American/Mexican dishes. The enchilada nachos were my favorite, not too spicy but offered a kick!

RpBGj-TJngdjVUhij9HvQQ.text: Allie deserves all the high fives and hugs in the world. I came with my boyfriend after seeing all the reviews and this place definitely lives up to the hype. We waited a little bit for a seat (because it's crowded as the food/quality is amazing) but it was well worth the short wait. Honestly I could've waited an hour and still been happy when the food came because it was that good. Highly recommend the fake chicken (my boyfriend said it was better than real chicken and he is a strict meat eater). We got a free margarita for checking in on yelp also and hoooooomygod the margaritas are huge and taste delicious. I honestly don't even like margaritas and I never have but I am not one to turn down a free margarita from a server and I am so glad I tried it. If you go, please remember to be kind to your server! They have a billion tables and they are making it work so props to them. So so happy with this place will definitely come back when I go back to Vegas.

1D-GIIXnZrpkXg5VC0xncw.text: Best nachos ever!  Drove an extra 25 miles just to have these for dinner, definitely worth the drive and the cost was very reasonable.  Staff was extremely friendly and the service was awesome!

_opuXoZgFKzefCfLftXEyg.text: this place is awesome. the environment is lively fun and entertaining (good for kids during the day, fun for adults at night), and the food is even better. the queso is hands down the best queso i've had in years and we even ordered more to take home w us. nacho sizes are huge so share w the table!!! i was recommended by a friend to try the white peach margarita and it was awesome. definitely a go to place if you are visiting las vegas!!!

g5g81PYwL5ABBPsrUZVp8Q.text: The food is great, I had the steak fajita and my Mrs. had the nacho tostada. But even better than the food are the people, from the hostess to the waitress. They were kind, helpful, concerned and friendly. What a great break from all the nonsense of the day.

sQCv9RTumgMMxBGctz-Sqw.text: My girlfriend and I ate there yesterday and shared the Buffalo Hot Nachos and a Chimichanga.  Food: I'm-content-good, but not knock-your-socks-off good.  Portions: on the large side.  Service: good - our waiter was straightforward and checked in on us an appropriate amount of times.  Speed: fine - we were sat down within 5-10 minutes, and the food came in about 10 minutes.  Price: Entrees were around $12-20. I thought this was a little pricey for what you're getting. If things were priced $8-14, I would feel happier and this would be a go-to place for me. At $12-20, it was good enough where I'm happy I tried it, but don't really see myself rushing to go back any time soon (Not that there aren't places at $12-20 I do rush to go back to; eg. Carson's Kitchen, Lotus of Siam).

uClfecHrLLQaRPA8uYWLqA.text: The margs were great and you can take them to go (hell yeah!) and you've got to get the smothered burrito with all three sauces on top. Make sure you ask for chips, queso, salsa and quac, too. You won't regret it! I was raving about this place all week while I was in Vegas - every time my friends asked where to eat I said that we should go back to Nacho Daddy.

rLP-JRbVD8Wdj6Ak3mprqA.text: A good non-hotel restaurant option for lunch that is on the strip.  I listened the bartender, Scarlett, and ordered the signature chicken tacos.  Two tacos, but the meal was filling for someone who just got done with a 5 hour flight. Margarita also hit the spot .  Great service, food, and enjoyed the 90s/00s music being played.

w3lBxZbBsXE8d71T_kDZCQ.text: Came here on my second night in vegas and got paired up with a great server named DJ very attentive and helpful, great energy! Also the portion size for the boneless wings were awesome for just 11-12$. Highly recommend the company and the food !

kyHkIwLEqAN4g3w-ZRUBXQ.text: Jovanny!   Jovanny's stellar reputation is well deserved. After a  couple of frustrating days (in which we had our car broken into and were burgled), we were in desperate need of some positive vibes. Meeting Jovanny was easily one of the best things about this (very eventful) trip. From his excellent customer service to his bubbly, warm personality, we were thrilled to have him as our server. He was very sympathetic to our plight and made our dining experience extra special to ensure we left feeling better about our time in Vegas.   The margaritas, nachos, and chips and salsa were all fantastic. I would rate Nacho Daddy a four or five based on that alone, but the service we experienced with Jov was second to none (and I'm serious - best ever). The staff who brought out our food were super polite and friendly as well. I only wish we could leave 10 stars.  Thank you for helping to salvage our vacation!

UIDRWUE94DH18XcwgZtOQg.text: Stopped in for a hungover lunch. Was immediately seated and our awesome waitress Ari took our orders and the food was out super quick. It was delicious and Ari was always nearby. This was a great lunch choice.

Ybr4YR0H04L7uUhVqjmBrw.text: Hmmm, when I came to write my review, yelp gave me a warning that there were multiple reviews completed from the same IP address for this restaurant. Anywho, the smothered burrito was very subpar to say this is a Mexican restaurant. The southwest egg rolls were typical frozen section egg rolls. Both the buffalo and BBQ chicken nachos were really good. The daddy margarita and house margarita were good, but missing alcohol. We left with no buzz at all. I would suggest going here for the nachos and a photo opp with the scorpion shot, ONLY! We went during happy hour and had coupons. The bartenders also go from touching everything from money to hair to cleaning without washing their hands. Totally not sanitary! But, no big deal if you're already drunk, right? lol

The Filet Nachos didn't disappoint either! Finished things off with Churro Sundae, too. Service was spot on! BTW, thanks for letting us know about the other locations, but we're perfectly content here.

UXc4WDOqoxH55gFiccXalw.text: Food was ok (we ordered wings, nachos, and soft tacos) but service was slow. Our server was friendly but we were seated right next to the kitchen where we saw all the madness. Floor was super greasy/slippery (even the bathroom) and we were startled a couple of times from noise of dropping trays.

nT1iY9OWFskA7H4IRCckLQ.text: This place is soooo yummy! Love it. If you have a with you this is good for you and a meet eater.

9spYB3KjILDT6CzoIA05iw.text: It was good, wife an I split the steak nachos, I think it needed a little more meat and little less sauce for the $20 For a $3 dollar dish. It's Vegas put some meat on it.  Margaritas were VERY good. Different flavor from on the rocks to the blended. On the rocks is the best. In Vegas a lot so will try it again.

Z0AUBrtMM30VzovVd6ex6A.text: Sorry Daddy, but you are Nacho my type.  I have dined at the downtown Nacho Daddy location and I also attended a Yelp Elite event at this location.  I returned to this location shortly before 6 pm on a Tuesday with a friend who had never been to Nacho Daddy.   Despite it being happy hour, there was not very many people dining and we were quickly taken to a large and comfortable booth to wait for our server. Personally, I felt like service was a little slow considering how empty the place was, but our waitress was very friendly.  We started out with margaritas which were excellent. No complimentary chips and salsa here, Daddy's a stingy one.   Since there was a taco Tuesday special (3 for $5), we decided to share a plate of the avocado tacos that I thought were the standout item served at the Elite event. Sadly, these were not as light and crispy as I remembered and they were served drenched in salsa.    I had never ordered nachos from either of the Nacho Daddy locations I had been to, so it seemed fitting that we share some and we decided on the Filet Mignon Nachos. While the nachos are quite large and easily enough for two people to share, I found the ingredients to not be well dispersed and the ranchero sauce overpowered the other flavors on the plate.   Total damage for 2 margaritas, the tacos which were on special and a plate of nachos to share was over $50, pretip. While this is by no means overboard for a dinner on the Strip, I do think it was a bit high for what we actually received.   I will keep Nacho Daddy in mind for the rare occasions I need a vegan-friendly spot to take guests for a meal. Personally, I don't foresee myself coming back for more than a margarita.

cAj9CAPMkwmbF0oE4ZBDjQ.text: SO MANY GREAT OPTIONS!!! Great food. The buffalo chicken was awesome, but just had less food. Went a few days later back again (because it was soo good) for a ground beef nacho dish and it had a lot more toppings. Margaritas were strong and for a great price (~$8/each) and the fires ice cream was delish. 11/10 would recommend

9BiNDIJzH6sRXYU6gqEWGg.text: Taco Bell is that you?   This Nacho Daddy is located inside the Miracle Mile Shops outside. To get here you have to walk about halfway through the shops, and then follow the signs for Harmon Street Restaurants. Then you go outside and walk a bit further and you will find it. It's next to BWW and Hot N Juicy. Not sure if there is anywhere closer to park, but it's quite a distance from the parking garage.   I met a friend here at 5:30p on a Tuesday. It was pretty quiet, yet it took a while for our server to approach our table. When she finally showed up, she was upbeat and friendly. She explained some specials to us and recommended a few items as well. We both got white peach margs on the rocks, which were good, although I feel like mine was a bit heavy handed on the sweet n sour. It was happy hour (3-6 weekdays) and tequila shots were only $4, so maybe add a shot if you like it a little stronger.  As for the food, it was nothing to write home about. It really tasted like Taco Bell, but with strip prices. We split an order of filet mignon nachos, and fried avocado tacos. The nachos come with beans, cheese, filet mignon, guacamole, pico, and sour cream. We asked for the pico on the side as it had jalapenos in it, but still the nachos were pretty spicy. I believe it was the ranchero sauce that was over powering and took away from any of the other flavors. The tacos were also spicy and I couldn't even really tell I was eating avocado. I was disappointed because my friend had raved about them, and we both really just thought they were meh. All in all, I would say that this is a one and done for me.

Rvf0z34YQvXm5Xiw3WKPTQ.text: (Late review -  visited 1/13/17)  My boyfriend and I were in Vegas for the day decided to try Nacho Daddy before we drove back to the Bay Area. To be honest, we were drawn in by the free margarita for checking in on Yelp.   We were quickly greeted by our server, Ari. She was amazing! She recommended Margaritas we might like and told us her favorite items off the menu. I got the garlic shrimp nachos, and my boyfriend got chimichangas. We were both pleased with our excellent service, comfortable atmosphere and amazing food! We will definitely be coming back next time we are in town!

7ZseCilVXhWjjhktSZTn2Q.text: Service was lacking. Our order was done wrong and the server didn't bother to apologize nor keep us updated with our order status. Never came back to our table until we asked for the check.  The food took a long time to come out both initially and when it was being re-made. The filet mignon nachos were really good though.

xApBUK-SDQUAScEO6DlrxA.text: The best nachos I have ever had! If you're visiting, I would definitely stop here. If you live here and haven't been, you're missing out!

HQnTlS8J320jjoCoFXnjsg.text: This was the perfect spot to grab something to munch on late at night. Their nachos were extremely well served, I mean they give you enough to feed 3 people and they were delicious and very very cheesy! Definitely satisfied our cravings! We ordered the filet mignon nachos, which I felt needed more filet mignon but other than that they were delicious. Their staff was friendly and welcoming as well!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

GtZcdfeGMUcx3D6aIZPKZw.text: I absolutely love this spot! Great food and amazing service!!! I will definitely return!!!!! Ari was great with explaining the menu!!! It was so difficult to choose because everything looked great! Thanks for making our dinning experience enjoyable Ari!!!!

apU3iQYpTCSecajSX_lXpg.text: Unfortunately I couldn't give this place less than one star. Rarely, do I rate so low,  but in this case... its necessary.  We went to this place because they have "Vegan" options,  and because my mother in Law, who was visiting, is not vegan. So it was a good move for us all.  We went to the one on the west side, on Sahara. Place looked great, plenty of TVs, awesome play list of songs, and it seemed clean. Place looked well staffed as well.   Our server lacked a certain spunk, and communication was not her strong suit.... at all. They dont provide chips or salsa, you have to buy those... most places, its complimentary, but no here. We had to ask our server for refills on chips and salsa. The food took 45 minutes to get to us, which it wasn't that packed to take that long. Server could have communicated a little or at the very least be on top of the refills. When the food finally got here, it was cold. The food was cold and i was full of chips because they took so long with food. Honestly, it was so bad... they never even followed up with is to see how the food was. Manager? What manager, they usually make their presence felt... not here. The manager was bussing. The food, besides being cold, was not that great... mother in law who not vegan didn't like her food and the presentation was horrible. Avocado tocos were good.  But the service was so bad, we will never return. To many options in this town. They could of made up ground with service despite cold and less than mediocre food... in truth i dont know what was worse, the service or the food.

lktLricE0VPSGsNHwjCt5g.text: Amazinggg experience. Great nachos. And the best margaritas I have had. Get the pomegranate margarita!! Laura and Kristen were dope

NmaQSVGfuXaOB-WaJ1cJag.text: I didn't give it five stars because i didn't really care for my nachos. The service was great as well as the atmosphere.

ulmjWVy5Y5muHEqr5_3Gsw.text: VEGAN WARNING--perhaps triple check your food--find pictures on yelp and compare it to what you get.    * if you order vegan, keep the order simple and do not distract the wait staff with any witty repartee or compliments while ordering.  you can always joke around AFTER the correct order comes in * when you get your dish, compare it to pics on yelp of vegan chicken, cheese, etc. if it looks TOO good to be True,... it just may be real chicken.  yes, i had an experience ordering the well reputed vegan chicken quesadilla (nachos also get a great rep on yelp). even asking a waiter if my order looked like real meat because the cheese/meat looked so amazing. he assured me it was the vegan version; then, a few bites later he warned me it was actually real chicken. (it was a mistake--probably in the ordering process.  they replaced it.  offered a a drink to apologize.  no management came by at the time, but the training manager at nacho daddy read my review and wrote me personally to get more details of the incident--so they could avoid future problems.  thank you, taylor.

UuZKXJdviD7ZZNLBjuEFbQ.text: Nachos and margaritas as 1030 in the morning!?   Heck yah! The Thai chicken nachos were amazing and full of flavor. The fiesta nachos were also on point.   We found one dry chip, the kitchen manager quickly remedied the problem by supplying us with more queso. We only brought it up to be funny, they got a kick out of it.   The margaritas were amazing!!! We both had a yelp house margarita coupon but we upgraded to the better tequila ones- totally worth it!  Definitely check this place out!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta and Thai nachos. Out of this world!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Two margaritas. Mango and Sunbliss(?) DELICIOUS!

KC7DHNNd5n7j3e77IZ3yPg.text: AMAZING...torn between ordering the SUPREME TOSTADA NACHOS or the FILET MIGNON NACHOS. While they were both extremely GOOD...my definite favorite were the TOSTADA NACHOS!!!! While the FILET MIGNON NACHOS were AMAZING they have a red sauce...if you're a fan of red sauce and filet mignon you'll LOVE THEM. I'm a CHEESY person so the SUPREME TOSTADA NACHOS were my ultimate fave. Everything we ordered was AMAZING...elote, Signature Soft Tacos the Signature flour tortillas are AMAZING and aren't your average flour tortilla...they're flaky and buttery. The Shell is filled with jack cheese, roasted chipotle salsa, carmelized chipotle onions and cilantro.   One item that we didn't order that seemed to be rather popular were the fajitas. I'll definitely give them a try next time around.   Parking can sometimes be complexed, as we weren't so lucky our first time around but the second time around we were able to valet park in the Miracle Mile Mall parking structure. While there are other locations this particular Nacho Daddy has the most stars and is worth everyone of them plus more.

bJSZNsfCN3wXzXjqaqw1_A.text: If you are in to nachos, this is the place.  I had the spinach and artichoke nachos and they were delicious.   Good sized too!

m7A_h6UCVfu5FLhqaZcaxA.text: Hidden gym in Fremont. Love this place creative menu good drink prices. Love that's a bar not a family restaurant who takes her kids to Vegas anyways.

_qzmDdMz78wVqJBeMfnGEA.text: Had the filet mignon nachos and they did not disappoint! They were delicious and the portion size was huge! We also ordered the naked wings which were delicious too especially since they tasted grilled rather than fried (I didn't confirm the cooking method).  This spot is open late which is great if you're looking for a late-night snack after a long day in Vegas. Will definitely be back next time I'm in town!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon nachos!

Xtxmkb7wQjEkbaJLR5ydWQ.text: Great staff, very good food and fun vibe at reasonable prices for the Vegas strip. We split the classic nachos which was plenty for a tasty lunch for two.

YHUGy214LH6nxyVLrIZYkw.text: Great vegan eats, but service was sub-par.  I was roaming the Vegas strip late one Friday night (after midnight) and discovered that Nacho Daddy had a wide assortment of vegan options, so I had to give them a try.   I was greeted by a friendly bartender who offered me a menu. After that, he didn't come back for quite some time because he was busy chatting with guests and co-workers. I understand that engaging with customers is great, but it took away from the quality and attentiveness of service that not only I received, but that others around me received as well.   Everyone raves about the amazing vegan nachos, but I wanted to be a bit more daring. I ordered the vegan chick'n quesadilla and it was outstanding. The only thing that seemed slightly off was the consistency of the vegan sour cream (very watery/runny), but otherwise I loved the dish. They were very good about repeating back my order multiple times, leading me to believe that they pay attention to detail and want to ge vegan orders right. I even had a chef (or manager?) ask me if I received the vegan quesadilla, although it was a bit odd that this happened after I had finished eating.   Back to the service. I didn't get any silverware or napkins with the meal and it took a while to get some.   The drinks were hit and miss. The white peach margarita was very good. I hesitated due to its $13 price tag, but it was large and delicious. The house margarita was just bad. Very syrupy and too sour. I rarely leave a drink unfinished, but I couldn't even drink half of it.   Speaking of the margarita, my bartender forgot the drink, not once, but twice. Maybe it's because it was free with my Yelp check-in? Who knows.   The patrons next to me didn't get the best service either. They ordered a flaming drink, but the bartender never lit the tealight. There were also multiple occasions that drinks and entrees were brought to the wrong people.   Overall, the vegan food really boosts this review, as the drinks were inconsistent and service were mediocre.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. House margarita. Stay away, as it was very syrupy and too sour. (This was free with the Yelp check-in)
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Thumbs up for the white peach margarita!

PobZ0yx8R2AzhXbYWAGqjA.text: You can get a free margarita with the yelp check in! Mine was strong too. Tried the filet mignon nachos, pretty good but I wish there was more pico on it. Split the breakfast burrito with my gfs, tbh it was ok. What stole the show was the ranchero salsa! Although my friend pointed out it tasted like marinara sauce i loved its savoriness lol! Churro pancake was just  pancake with tiny churro pieces but the cake batter was kinda chewy so awesome job there for the texture!

The nachos come in a large portion and I would recommend sharing, unless you are extremely hungry. Neat atmosphere and conveniently located on the main strip. 9DCNNOdqYF91a9jGiyIWbA.text: Excellent margaritas...and good tacos...but EXCELLENT MARGARITAS!!! The pork tacos were very tasty and came at a good price. The staff was attentive, professional, and friendly. The Spicy Cucumber Margaritas are sublime.

zYGVAZHbVfeYulXxjzRgNw.text: Server was Hazelanne, absolutely the best. Started with Daddy's Margarita and Kiwi Margarita with a Scorpion Shot. The scorpion got caught on a molar. I needed to chew it a little and rinse down with some water. Oh so good. Margarita's were very good. Portions here seemed large so we ordered and appetizer of street taco's and split an order of Supreme Nacho's. Fillet Mignon street taco's were tender and had all the flavor of a traditional beef street taco. Nacho's were a very large portion. Not to much of any one ingredient, well balanced. I will definitely return to this restaurant, after all a guy has to eat more than one scorpion in his life.

qLlXhx7zO9YTPiwI13OCNQ.text: I don't give 5 stars very often but they definitely earned each one. The server, AJ had a great attitude and told us all about his amazing week and was very knowledgeable about the menu and all the specials in the restaurant. I am so impressed with the size of the Vegan menu as my girlfriend is vegan and she was very happy. There is something on the menu for everyone. The only downside was one of my friends meals didn't make it out before everyone else had finished theirs. As soon as we notified AJ he quickly acknowledged and noted it would not be on the bill but it would be on the table. Even the manager came out and identified the problem and told us it was not going to be billed. If i lived in LV i would definitely be a regular! Wonderful service, staff and food. nNsVz476QgQ22RzYK9Fa4A.text: Found this place wondering around got served by dj my dudes got the top recommendations looks for him when you come thru

lSAK5MdMPQDpjVWyHHVE9w.text: My friend and I arrived on a Saturday night around 9pm and were seated immediately. Our server Laura came over soon after and got us waters and gave us helpful tips and recommendations.   We both checked in on Yelp for the free house margarita, which was strong and delicious. We ordered the filet mignon nachos and requested to add jalapenos and Mexican corn off the cob to share, which both came out pretty fast. Everything that people around us ordered looked so good and it was hard for us to decide on what to get, but we didn't want to order too much. That was the perfect amount of food. We actually devoured every single bite. The food was so delicious (and the music/ambiance is pretty loud) that we ate most of the time without talking to each other. I usually scoop off or request for food without sour cream and refried beans, but the nachos had just the right amount of everything that I was able to eat it without any complaints. A little more filet mignon meat would be better, but overall still amazing! The corn was the perfect side to eat in combination with the nachos, grilled to perfection. The jalapenos were super spicy, so we didn't need a lot for a nice spicy kick.  Laura was very attentive the entire time we were there. She brought extra napkins without us having to request, knowing that eating nachos can get messy. She also offered us to-go cups when she saw that we had some margarita left. We agreed that if we had this back home (in OC, CA), we would be there a lot!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon &amp; corn off the cob

o2kPMmXE7HIH0WF9rnRFKA.text: I had reservations about this place because of the slightly silly name, but this is seriously my new favorite happy hour place in Vegas! My husband and I had the mexican corn, each got a two tacos, and got the buffalo chicken mini nachos...all $5 specials on Mondays! (The taco orders come with two tacos). We also got an order of queso dip. Everything was super hot and fresh tasting. We also loved the indoor decor, super fun and inviting. Also, since my husband and I were already a few drinks deep, we were ballsy enough to try their famous scorpion shot. Phew, thaaaat was an experience, haha!  Super fun though, the bartenders ring bells for you to cheer you on!  Overall, super fun place to hang out during the day on the strip and have a great margarita and food. :)

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

jW80sSN5TrheLpfYqj_XQw.text: AMAZING and already recommended to all my party friends!!! Haha!  This place drew me in with 2800+ reviews and a solid 5 stars. I'm from SoCal so I LOVE a good super nacho... zero disappointment here!!! Our plates were practically licked clean from how delicious the food tasted.  Lowkey, they're also known for their $20 SCORPION shots!!!!! They looked small on the pics so I was down to get one for my BFF's dirty 30 bday... shocked to see how HUGE those suckers were... chewing did nothing. Just swallow. Yechh.. earned our souvenir scorpion shot glasses..  We also got a free margarita with Yelp checkin plus a free bday dessert (was offered a bday shot but we were already hammered lol)

The variety, smells, service and cleanliness are worth every penny. We might go back before our vacation ends.

tN5v-7OkMa9-3rYz00UHiQ.text: Dang, this place is pretty good. A little out of the way, as it is around the corner from the Planet Hollywood (off the strip). Everything our group of 4 had was great and very fresh.  We went during breakfast/brunch, but they were offering the entire menu also.   Prices are much less than any of the strip restaurants, which was nice after 3 days of paying out the nose to eat.    I give Nacho Daddy 4 stars as the service was good not great. The place was not very crowded, yet our server was not very attentive.  5 stars for food, prices and atmosphere. Will definitely go back next trip to Vegas.

FuyX9cUfdj6MPUW-xmnDXA.text: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! My family,and by that I mean my parents are super picky when comes to any type of Mexican food styles, and the fact that they, really liked this place goes to show how GOOD this place is! The Meat is super tender and seasoned amazingly, the food was exactly what it was, they don't try and hide it with fancy pants plating or designs, which I super appreciate it. GO! We had the Vegas Nachos, Burger Nachos, Mixed Fajitas, and the esquites. BOMB!! The reviews and stars live up to  it

a0kZ38QwFZlAa-hmzniRwQ.text: Im giving 5 starts for their spicy jalapeno margaritas and their service! Unfortunately, their vegan quesadilla wasn't good in my opinion. It tastes too processed. If you're vegan, order something else! But definitely try the margarita!!

zWol6CZvDUV4SiTNyk8-EQ.text: The nachos were monstrous. Love the free checkin margarita. came as a group after a tiring bachelorette party. Server was really sweet. I had the fajita entree which I shared with a friend. I definitely ordered wayyyyy too much. The shrimp ceviche was bombbbbbb!!!!  Be careful of ordering too much chip related entrees. LOL we ordered salsa and chips, then nachos, and the ceviche. It was chip overload. We were extremely hungry before ordering...

pC2LXRryIJdRSRzD-a0CYw.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by Nacho Daddy. The reviews were all great, so I shouldn't have been that surprised, but here I am being surprised anyway.  When you see a place with a zany name on the Strip, you expect to get overcharged for decent (but not terrific) food. Hence the surprise. I opted for a nice and healthy burrito bowl that was well-balanced and flavorful and fresh, and I paid somewhere south of $15 for it. That would be a good deal in any city, let alone on Las Vegas Boulevard.  The ambiance was fun too - industrial and not too self-important - with the clear ability to handle big parties.  Strong recommendation for great food that won't break the bank.

UsIX_8H5IgGCinYGZ4S5sA.text: If I was forced to only have one nachos for the rest of my life the Thai nachos would win 10/10 So perfect wood smash again and again

hmiNrXPlMEV4lVHd8evlWg.text: Love this place... torn between the downtown location and the one just off the Strip by Planet Hollywood and the Miracle Mile shops. Also torn between their food and their drinks!! Great menu, everything you can think of wanting in this type of restaurant. And the same is True for their tequila and margarita selection! I'm not even the biggest nacho fan, but so much more than that here!! Fun atmosphere, cool people, service with a smile and great food and drink... what's left to say!!

Recommend the one right of the strip, and to check in on yelp for a free house margarita.   Only downfall was "OpenTable" (reservation app yelp says they use) did not work and said that there were no tables left.. but called for a reservation and their was no wait... confusing. UHVS0lXmzldElY4fI14dYQ.text: As a nacho snob, I was SO excited to check out Nacho Daddy while I was in Vegas. I am very picky about my nachos and it is very hard for me to find what I call True nachos. Nothing bugs me more than restaurants calling a huge pile of chips with a few toppings thrown on it "nachos". That is most definitely not the case at Nacho Daddy.  I went with the Supreme Tostado Nachos after much debate. They have so many options it's hard to choose. They laid the most beautiful plate of nachos I've ever seen in front of me and I was instantly in love. The chip to topping ratio was on point. It wasn't a heaping pile of chips with a few toppings. It was even better once I ate it! So much flavor and so many toppings! So many toppings that it was near impossible to eat these without a fork.   All other restaurants should take a lesson from Nacho Daddy and learn what True nachos should be like!

C7FW90NEcjZkunGJvkdKFw.text: Yes! Yes! Yes! Nachos were awesome! Good ingredients and there were no "dry" chips. We started with the grilled Mexican corn off the cob, which was not so great. I wouldn't order it again. But then I had the fajita nachos for dinner and they were on point! I wish we wouldn't have ordered an appetizer so I could have finished my nachos! Also, I looked around and every plate of nachos is HUGE. So come hungry!

-yzTRMserqZbV7eSqvWfBw.text: This was definitely one of my favorite places near the strip. The atmosphere was very relaxing and totally our speed. My husband and I went here initially for the reviews we read about the vegan nachos(for myself). He ordered the filet mignon nachos, and I ordered the vegan loaded nachos and added the vegan chicken. Our food was so delicious and the skinny margaritas were also amazing. Besides the food being worth a second trip back, the service was also outstanding. We will definitely be back on our next trip to Vegas!

SODkmkMnPX2B829lUCS7Gg.text: I came her for breakfast and sat at the bar. Our server shannon was a delight and efficient. I got the all American breakfast with a mimosa and it was the best breakfast I had I'm vegas.

TF39fpbmkxEl7I5ck9fQwg.text: Worst Mexican restaurant I've Ever been to. I went to the Las Vegas strip location and the server was just terrible. I asked for a manager to come to the table. The manager literally took 12 minutes to come to talk to me and my guest. I explained everything that happened and I don't think I got through to the manager. I went ahead and paid the bill but I'm also gonna dialogue chargers with my bank. I had heard many bad stories about this restaurant but I wanted to give it a try. I should have listened to the friends. I won't be going back there ever and I won't recommend anyone either.

wBp4Cmw5oMoTJtvhBQmMpw.text: Tons of different types of nachos and Tex-Mex meals. The music is videos- at least at the Summerlin location- and if you love 80's Cheese- dang This is the place to reminisce. If you don't love 80's Cheese music videos- dang This is the place to learn to love them! Basically Nachos are a cheese sauce. But the extent of the flavor sensations don't end there! You have everything up to filet mignon to put on chips here. Drinks at the bar are the way to be. I've been to more than one location and I've suggested Nacho Daddy to friends when they're in town, or when we're hanging out.

FqjmA2e-Nq_NuR6rU9DP_w.text: Loved the food and atmosphere.   The free margarita was awesome!   Thanks for excellent service!

lKbF6OIbagU0KVRZf2MjLQ.text: Excellent food!  Service was great. Music and decor were on point! We had cheese enchiladas and were not disappointed!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

pUQwh6bPSsCJpzDUWfYLog.text: The last time I went to Nacho Daddy is when their first location had just opened downtown.  The menu has definitely gotten bigger and better since then! I was definitely impressed. They have a great selection of gluten free/vegan options that sounded appetizing. And a lot of non-gluten free/vegan options for those of you who don't worry about that kinda stuff.  We were just a party of 3, my friend, my son and I. We were seated rather quickly in a big booth. Kayla was our server and brought us menus. She was absolutely wonderful from start to finish! I know we've all been out to places where the server was less than pleasant.. It really puts a damper on things. This was totally not the case with Kayla- or any of the employees. Even the guy who bought us our food and the lovely gal who was clearing our table. I'm getting ahead of myself though.  Kayla made sure we knew what Nacho Daddy was all about before leaving us to browse the menus. T Money ordered off of the kids menu- 2 plain patties Lliterally, plain.. No cheese. No bun. Nada. Zip. Zilch. Zero..) and fries. I appreciated she didn't think I was a total weirdo ordering that for my kid and she let me know I wasn't the only parent that had to do that. We had a good laugh- I seriously appreciated that because sometimes I get a weird look ordering that. I wasn't too hungry, so my friend and I ordered the trio of dips with fresh tortilla chips- Queso, guac and salsa. My friend ordered two tacos on the flour tortillas sans sides. I also ordered the Daddy margarita and a house margarita later on.   Everything was brought out surprisingly quick. My margarita(s) were great- not too sweet either, which is just the way I like it. The guac was awesome. It was fresh and chunky. I didn't taste the queso (dairy allergy) but my friend gave it the thumbs up. And they serve it with a little tea light underneath to keep it warm and flowing. T Money's patties were a decent size. You can tell they were hand-formed and were also pretty thick. His fries came out hot and super fresh. He is legitimately the fry king and he liked them a lot.   To be frank, I hadn't come back to Nacho Daddy after the first time because our first time kinda sucked. This more than made up for it- enough for me to want to come back and regularly frequent this joint. They have some great happy hour specials I'd like to try AND the loaded vegan/gluten free nachos look amaaaaaazing.  Much love and props to Kayla! Be sure to ask for her if you stop in and she'll take great care of you.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Queso, Guac and Salsa
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Daddy&#39;s Margarita

aDUztlIVoeAlwLx2VdWTXg.text: Had low expectations for this place.  Generally whenever place's specialty is nachos, its kinda of off-putting.  However, I went inside and it was actually not bad at all.  Its priced as much as the other strip restaurants.   It's worth a try.

ptQNRP4I5kLvioT6Dk9U_A.text: The best to eat on a late night and the servers are very quick and accommodating. Of course, the nachos are to die for.

g9bdPDW2lgUgHri126soZQ.text: Free margarita with yelp check and purchase of entree.   Famous queso dip with chips. 8/10.  Really liked it. We ate it all haha.  Fish tacos:  grill 7.2/10  battered 7.6/10.   The grilled was a lil bit over salted .   Smothered burrito: 7/10. Descent burrito. Very large deff. Makes two meals.   Service was good. I had the flaming shrimp tacos - the shrimp were awesome, the sauces awesome, the tortillas appear to be True handmade street taco ones. Took half home as too much food. We ate at the bar instead of waiting and was fine.

rP2uGnu2JTLhuaLqQhUWgw.text: First time visiting this establishment while I'm LV. We are from out of town and asked for restaurant recommendations. We ordered the filet mignon nachos. They were absolutely amazing! The portions are large so I suggest sharing a plate. I would have given them 5 stars but It was my boyfriends birthday, and I just wish they offered something to him to celebrate especially since we told the waitress it was his birthday. She just said to him Happy Birthday and that's it .

QNMJyHZTcGKiBUJ9y-7MAQ.text: Food was amazing!! We were nicely surprised (yes even with the great Yelp reviews). The margaritas are huge and the food portions are pretty big as well.  Everyone in our party was super happy with the food, and we will definitely be back!  I forgot to mention the great vegan options they had!! My friend is a vegan and she 200% appreciated the extensive vegan options

SZhrNmEINhZMk2kVMg2RhA.text: What's not to love about Nacho Daddy? You'll get awesome drinks, super friendly servers, throwback music videos and delicious Mexican food. Happy hour includes $5 Daddy draft, margaritas, half nachos and tacos. The nachos here are unreal. They're covered in meat and queso. My brother loved his tacos, which were also stuffed to the brim with meat. My brother also tried the steak fajitas, which were really good. Tons of meat, veggies, rice and refried beans. It's just an awesome place to grab a casual bite in Vegas.

dErUWAWKXHi5naWPuDXaaA.text: Nacho daddy... well I'll call you daddy after the way these filet mignon nachos and peach margarita are making me feel  Good food and great drinks!

Starting with appetizers - Nacho, queso  and Gauc to entrees and drinks- everything is amazing. I forgot the person who helped us with the menu entree selection but he captured my requirements right and recommended the right food. The veggie enchiladas are dope . I order the supreme tostada nachos so so good & my husband ordered the lobster & crab enchiladas now I never had lobster & crab enchiladas nor did I ever think of eating or trying it. Well we are glad we did, it was amazing. A must try. We will be back when we visit again.

--0RCMwLPFE-6nzTFXsMSw.text: Nacho Daddy is the place I've been searching for my entire life and didn't even know it! Mexican food can usually be made to be vegetarian, but this place can make it vegan!! And not just a few selections but a whole section in the menu. The first time I went I got the Vegan Loaded Nachos with Vegan Chick'n and they were 10/10!! The vegan queso was bomb which is rare. Not everyone can master vegan cheese.  This time I got the Vegan Chick'n Chimichanga. For me it wasn't as good as the Nachos, but still very good! Especially if you like a lot of onions, peppers, and mushrooms cause it's filled with them! My friend got the vegan quesadilla which I can also say was 10/10! Can't wait to go back to try the rest of the menu.  So overall the service was great, restaurant nice and clean, and food BOMB! You must go.

k5bHf5hb8dVZhgdf9T09Mg.text: First of all our server, Ari, was amazing and sweet. Being someone who is in customer service, service is important to me, and she gave amazing customer service. Bottomless mimosas were awesome. We had the queso, filet mignon fajitas, and bottomless mimosas. Loved everything. Will be coming back. The atmosphere is great.  Thanks, Ari. You're a gem.

o22bZFvugFEQJSdXMJQm-Q.text: THE BEST NACHOS YOU'll EVER EAT. Nacho Daddy is located on the strip next to BWW. I love how late they stay open and how many big TV screens they have. We ordered the filet mignon nachos and boy were they delicious! I asked to add fajitas because I love grilled onions and bell peppers. Even though the nachos are pretty pricey (about $20), the taste is soo worth it. I only wish they opened a location in OC so I can eat it whenever I want. I can't wait to try the other flavored nachos on the menu next time I come back. Definitely a must to try Nacho Daddy when you go to Vegas!!

Today specifically Sierra at the bar served me and not only is she gorgeous, she's sooo nice. Best service I've ever had!

PDMXQNtJMX-hQXMPh4Hd7g.text: Their Firey Shrimp Tacos are delicious! A fun presentation initially, they literally light your food on fire. Pretty neat. Flavorful taste and a good amount of spice, for sure. Our appetizer was also extremely tasty and seemed like it was made to order.  Our server was also wonderful. She constantly made sure we had everything we needed, or had someone else stop by if she was tied up. She also sent us home with some fresh chips and salsa- something we really appreciated!  Great food, great service, cool atmosphere!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Firey Flaming Shrimp Tacos

d58Hke3N8e8tRKZBUgfMYg.text: After a night of drinking, we came here to satisfy our hunger.   Servers were very nice and friendly and were attentive. We started off with shrimp tacos, 3 for $7 because it was taco Tuesdays. If you want beef or chicken, it would be $5. Flavor was there and the shrimp was very delicious. It's topped with mango, onions, cilantro.   Our next order was the filet mignon nachos, cost around a whopping $19!!! I understand it's Las Vegas and prices are marked higher but it was ridiculous for a small plate of nachos. It seemed like they slumped out on the meat so it was mostly toppings with like 20 chips..   I was disappointed in presentation, nachos are meant to be a big plate!

SW_fYeHw2RjLm5tUE2I9DA.text: Love love love this restaurant!!  Their food is delicious, the servers are quick and friendly, the prices are reasonable, and it's always clean inside.  If there was one closer to my home, I'd probably be there every week.  Love it!

_NIGqaU7tF1yhaTKK6Paww.text: I went to Nacho Daddy with my family today and had a nice experience. We were able to be seated right away and the waitress was very kind and prompt. The margaritas were delicious! The mango was recommended and I'm glad I went with that one. They also have pitchers.. thankfully.   We ordered the trio dip and it was good! They have three levels of salsa, the spicy one was my favorite. My mom ordered the shrimp tacos and loved them. I had the vegan chicken nachos and they were the bomb. Sooo many vegetarian and vegan options. My dad and our friend split the chicken nachos and enjoyed that the chicken was shredded.   The presentation of the dishes were visually appealing and everything tasted good. I would say the best part about this restaurant is the service though. Our waitress was on it completely and other staff members stepped in multiple times just to make sure we were okay. We never had to wait on drink refills, and in my opinion, that's awesome service for a Vegas strip restaurant.  I would recommend this place, and would be happy to go back. Thanks Nacho Daddy!

T1Nfg1thBgk3QGQOx5SRoA.text: A lot of other places we went to didn't allow us to take out our Micheladas onto the strip but this place does! And they honestly have the best nachos I've personally tried

xCRCvly9XaCSuHXUeTnTWA.text: Some pretty delicious nachos! Ordered the filet minion nachos and blood orange margarita! Nachos were packed with meat and flavor. Almost every bite had toppings on it and not one dry chip. The margarita was sooooooo yummy!!! Would have given 5 stars but a fight broke out and the guy got arrested. My girlfriend has to get up from the table and calm down the situation. It was difficult to enjoy the rest of our food after the.

We ordered 2 different types of nachos, and they were pretty bomb! The only reason I didnt give it a full 5 stars is because they charge for black bean substitute, I dont eat pork (which is usually in refried beans) so I didnt have a choice.
