O4nHD9E7bwarmPdqqqRxaw.text: I heard this place had good nachos so I had to check it out. The staff was friendly and cool. And it was happy hour. Double bonus. I ordered the filet mignon nachos. You saw the letters I typed. Filet mignon nachos. Washed it down with 3 margaritas. Great meal. Also, I did a shot with Thor. Because Vegas. LOL!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet Mignon nachos

2vmSKLjm9jOvw1MyHffYHw.text: Located a short walk to the Tacobell Cantina, Nacho Daddy is the go-to place for... you guessed it, nachos! Personally I'm a fan of the hole-in-the-wall janky af Mexican restaurants (like the one further north up the strip) but my friend told me that she wanted to come here because she's vegan so why not?   As we arrived, the hostess told us the wait would be about 40 minutes so we went to the bar to order some water and look at the menu. It wasn't even 20 minutes before we were seated and ready to order. I used the yelp check-in and got a complimentary house margarita and the filet mignon nachos. I cannot emphasize it enough - it's so worth it! I was so tired of spending $15+ for a garbage meal elsewhere. The portions here are huge (check out the pictures from other reviews) so you can definitely share the entire thing with a friend.   My friend (not the vegan one) ended up getting the thai chicken nachos and it was super strange but delicious. That being said, I feel like you're able to adventurous when it comes to their variety of nachos. Just make sure you share, it's honestly too much food.  PS. The service was great, our server(s) were super attentive and came to check on us every 5 minutes.

QxL_kEe8256T8aRdDKxjsw.text: Free margarita for yelpers. Definitely a pro and a great way to start it off.   And then we had our server who didn't seem to want to take care of us. We were there an hour and I think we saw her when she brought our huge margarita and our food.   I need water Itzel (I don't remember her name but I am pretty sure it had a Z in it).   Tacos were a rollercoaster, at their peak they were great and at their valleys they were edible. None that I can specifically remember loving but you are pretty safe getting anything off the menu honestly.   Wasn't a huge fan of anything else here but it came highly recommended so I think... I went at the wrong time.   THE VERDICT: I have finally experienced it and now I know that it isn't a place for me. I had expectations of out of this world drunk food that would provide many tastegasms but unfortunately, I was just angry because I need to hydrate Itzel!!

KgBk3ODLNraHD1KTV4mGjQ.text: When you find yourself in Las Vegas, after a night of drinking or maybe you are just looking for a very filling meal, Nacho Daddy is the place to go. I stopped eating red meat about a year ago and what I was very surprised to find, was their vegan menu. Yes! Menu...they have an extended selection of vegan plates and they taste amazing. My boyfriend and I had their Tinga nachos one night and the next day we went back for their ultimate nachos. Yes, we were hooked. The portions are quite big between the both of us we were able to finish one order.  Customer service is very important to me, the staff and manager were delightful. Not only is the food amazing but their service is outstanding. I will definitely be coming back next time I am in town and I recommend you stop by also and try their amazing Mexican food, you will not regret it!

Z5Sr-Mbl9hW-j1n79wq4qw.text: "YES!" That is the word I will say when anyone asks me, "Do you want to go to Nacho Daddy?"  Loved this place so much! I had the lobster nachos and they were phenomenal! Wanted to try the scorpion shot but I just couldn't do it, next time for sure though!  I recommend this place to everybody... just go. You'll love it.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

lb-CRXRGJxVREYHnUpBkLw.text: The food is good good good good good! Not only was the food good but the wait staff was friendly and quick. You can't go wrong with any of the Nachos they are all good. I went with a big group and we all got different types so I almost had a taste of the whole nacho menu. Make sure when you go to check-in with your yelp app to get a free margarita or half off a drink with a purchase of food. Also, like almost all places on or near the Vegas strip, make reservations or wait a long time!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Free house margarita on the rocks with no salt
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

HXU2MJpPfR2o3NIQUviMYw.text: Nacho daddy really hit the spot after a long night out in the casinos. We ordered the wings and queso to begin with and they were both on point. The wings fell off the bone and were seasoned perfectly. The queso was thick and comforting. We ordered the the chicken Tinga nachos and they were insanely delicious. The chicken was tender and coated in a tangy smoky sauce that created the perfect silky texture to the crunchy chips and gooey cheese. They weren't kidding -- every chip was coated! I wouldn't give this place a second thought if you are considering coming in!

l8GAZnpj2K53trY-g-2scQ.text: Yum!  The anchors were amazing, service great.  Way too much sugar in the margaritas...but you can't win them all

Nn3ctkW8bHPD4BVaemDd8w.text: My fiance and I stopped in here for dinner last Sunday! We got there around 8 and only had a 5 min wait. The restaurant is right on the strip and it's pretty roomy inside. Once seated, we were greeted by our waitress, who was very attentive and kind the entire time! We started with the chips and queso and the elote. The chips and queso were so good! The chips were warm and the queso was flavorful, but a touch of spice. I wasn't a fan of the elote, but my fiance loved it, so I'm chalking that up to personal preference. For our entrees, I ordered the grilled chicken salad and my fiance ordered the Golden Knights nachos. My salad had cucumbers, avocado, cheese, tortilla strips and grilled chicken. Everything tasted fresh and flavorful! My fiance's nachos had a little bit of everything. The waitress recommended them and they didn't disappoint! We would definitely come back here next time we are in Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Golden Knight Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chips and queso
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Elote

JsbaJffZwM2D5X4j1l98jQ.text: I first tried it at Life is Beautiful music festival back in September and I tried to go again to their location in Downtown the same weekend but it was way too crowded! I came back and once I found out there was a location on the strip, I knew I had to go again!   We ordered the Naked Grilled Wings with BBQ sauce with ranch to start off with appetizers. Beware: their portions are pretty filling! If I knew this, I would've not ordered an appetizer! I ordered the Fiesta Nacho which is big enough to feed 2 people (I shared with my brother!); it consisted of chicken breast, salsa, onions, beans, cheese, green/red chips + tortilla chips, queso fresco, pico de gallo, guac and sour cream! SO GOOD. These nachos are life changing and I can't look at nachos the same way again.   My dad ordered a burrito as it was his favorite type of food and he loved it! My mom ordered the tamale-enchilada entree combination and she LOVED it. Nacho Daddy gives such a great amount of chicken breast meat and the portion size is definitely filling. I love how the tamale is open faced which is a different twist on how tamales are usually made!   The service was okay. They ran out of items we wanted to originally try. They ran out of the Daddy's Wings which is why we ended up ordering the Naked Grilled Wings (which was not a disappointment at all!) On top of that, they ran out of deep fried ice cream & ended up getting the Caramel Apple Nacho (which was not disappointing at all either). Overall, we ordered items we originally didn't plan to but still loved it!!  Nacho Daddy is going to become must-have when I go to Las Vegas! I can't wait to come back especially because I didn't get the chance to check in on Yelp for a free Margarita~

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nacho

owGNEsnW5Iy1MqbusCkAaQ.text: Really decent size order of nachos. We were pleasantly surprised how much we enjoyed it here. Got the special nachos to split and it was more than enough for us both.

Krzqg18pZa_L90qGprn5gw.text: If you love nachos like i do, you'll love this restaurant! Any way you could dream to create nachos they've mastered it. If you're down for a super chill atmosphere  and overly topped nacho piles, make sure you stop by, you won't regret it!

Sp8L3g_XoMmefitFkt_PHg.text: Honestly ... the BEST VEGAN FOOD EVER. I got the vegan cheese dip and the vegan chicken quesadillas, but didn't even get a picture because I was so excited and ate it all... sorry guys!! Highly recommend this restaurant, and the vegan options are endless.

RkXXxf8pkopUtVOv2pNndw.text: Yummy. Probably one of the best nachos I have eaten in a while. They have a vegan menu too which makes the vegetarian in me very happy!! We ordered the crispy avocado taco which was delicious. We ordered the supreme nachos for appetizers but instead of the beef they substituted black beans for us. The nachos were mind blowing and out of this world. The service could have been a little bit better and more attentive , but I guess we came in at a busy time. The only thing I did not like was that they charged me $1.50 extra for substituting beef with black beans in the nachos. That seems ridiculous to me. But anyways the next time that I am in vegas will definitely be coming back to this place for their nachos!

q5kCOfsZJnfNcPH3ZmmiQw.text: The food here is great, You'll find great staff fantastic drinks. You will find a large variety of nachos and vague enough to share plus they have other menu items are equally as good. Great place to meet your friends and have a good time

1ykKVd631L1AOaZwJJQchw.text: Amazing nachos. Excellent house margarita (no really, it's good). The only negative I have is you have to buy new pants after you eat here because the nachos a HUGE but they are so good you can't stop eating them. The atmosphere was decent but not amazing. I'm here for another week and a half and I'm trying to restrain so I don't go up two pants sizes. Maybe they could offer half sizes.   Oh wait, just saw they have mexican corn. I'm definitely going back. Eat now. Diet later.

-Z1X3tQEDr8X4zVUKtuzCQ.text: We came here on New Years Eve as I was craving some nachos!   I was blown away at how great it tasted! Excellent service, food came out in an appropriate time and the free check in margarita was absolutely delicious!!

YXBIppEMKV9Y-pXAwlEXiA.text: The BEST nachos I've ever ate in my life!!!! I ordered the one with Filet Mignon.!!!! It was heaven! I wouldn't mind driving 10 hours just to come here for the food!

WeVg-Np3y4JnGwxpAoGxBw.text: This was the third time trying Nacho Daddy I had a bad experience he last three times with my last two visits , due to the food choices I chose but I this time was completely opposite I loved it and the recommended nachos were perfect.

e1HlWelX9nSzqEbAqq-0zw.text: We loved this place so much, we went twice while we were in LV recently.  Our first visit was mid-morning, and we were hungry. Some of us love breakfast, some of us don't (kind of a hard group to work with in the mornings. . .). We had heard great things about Nacho Daddy, so we walked around the corner from Planet Hollywood, and found a seat at the bar. Kasandra greeted us, and quickly suggested the Bacon Cheese Enchiladas for my breakfast-loving husband. The rest of us ordered Crispy Chicken Sandwiches and Pork Tacos. Needless to say, we were so happy with the food and the service (thanks, Kasandra!) we came back the next afternoon for snacks before going to the airport.  Be sure to check in on YELP, for the free house Margarita (with entree purchase).

bQpenATrCnrOMi2viB-a3w.text: Nacho Daddy was an ok experience. I mainly came here for the scorpion shot and was not let down! It was an expensive shot, but I'll never do it again! We ordered the buffalo chicken nachos..and they were not that good. Chicken was too big and there was an absurd amount of celery. We split the cali burrito...and it was nasty. There were garlic fries in the burrito which sounded amazing, but it was gross. I went home and was sick. I gave it 3 stars because service was decent and we did the scorpion shot.

qwnhpQX6FS5iopqJTZ_L_w.text: Back in Vegas and had to stop in for dinner. Still love this place, however...  I'm very tempted to reduce my rating to 4 stars because they no longer have the Cuban nachos.  The nachos I had (filet mignon) were great, but could not compare to the Cuban nachos last summer. If anyone from management is reading this, bring them back PERMANENTLY.  Otherwise, everything was great. The bartender who served me (Scarlett) was lovely. She was professional, sociable, affable, and clearly likes her job.  I'll be back.

Sns-ZY_yuz5sVG5W-KJKhQ.text: My hopes were too high for this place. While the nachos were good (plentiful; brimming with cheese, chicken and pico de gallo), the margaritas were lackluster. Being from NYC, be aware that the margaritas at Nacho Daddy are like a process mess and taste watered down. I had to get an extra shot of Mezcal to feel any alcohol. The bar tenders were great and the atmosphere is fun, though!

8nt2E7csBER84Fh1rXNBKw.text: It may look like your average Mexican joint, but Nacho daddy is anything but! I wandered in with my boyfriend on a Saturday night, and was immediately greeted by the friendly staff and incredible aroma of food. We sat at the bar and ordered: 1 strawberry margarita, 1 Filet Mignon tacos, 1 dog fish head: 90 minute, 1 shrimp tacos. The food came well presented and hot! We loved everything about this place. The restaurant was filling up quickly! Highly recommend this restaurant!

P3tCaZGkSqBUcoQPaM-FDA.text: This is the first time that my quesadilla had more chicken them cheese and the cheese perfect crunch on the outside is out of this world the boneless wings were okay for some reason no sauce on the side I guess you have to ask for it my ice tea was delicious definitely we will came back and service great she was so nice and made us feel welcome the spicy stinger is definitely hot their scorpions in the front gives the cool vibe to the place awesome spot

lCBr7Z7j3IgCFiQ-d27LkQ.text: For me, Vegas is a place to fly into to get somewhere else. If I have to go back though, a visit to Nacho Daddy would make it not only tolerable, but maybe even enjoyable. The fish tacos...wow. My wife orders fish tacos almost anytime they are on a menu, and these may have been her favorite. My pescatarian son that doesn't like Mexican food was raving about the Vegan Chik'N Chimichanga (although the Chik'N seemed to be missing). For the strip, the prices were very reasonable, especially with our hotel discount.

Half of our order was cold, not even a bit warm, which was weird because they brought over our first part really quickly, apparently too quickly. The food itself was okay. Our server was nice but there was a tad bit of a long wait for her first to come to our table.

bRXdI_tvlEII5WzHj4_pDA.text: Wow! What a great first visit to Nacho Daddy.  Excellent House Margaritas, Burger Nachos, Flaming Filet Mignon Fajitas, and Endless Chips & Salsa.    The Nachos were a particular stand out for the blending of flavors that simultaneously maintained individual ingredients saying hello.  Nice touch that our server asked if we wanted to take a fun pic of the Flaming Fajitas, which we did.  Our bartender Scarlett was tops.  Daddy and I will definitely be reacquainting ourselves in the future. ;)

B8PDX6vHypVex1X9xHCVqQ.text: Shots shots shots shots!!!!! Best food so far. Got me good n full. Can sit indoor or outdoor. Full bar and great menu selections

pr6_wvS1hi26SL6YBaCpfw.text: Amazing service and we loved Delilah! Super friendly and food was delicious! First time here and was recommended by friends, so glad I decided to come in. Highly recommend Nacho Daddy!!!

x5Wh7xlah5sT6PrsWR39Sg.text: If you enjoy a nice plate of nachos, this is the place to go! Be warned... they aren't your average nachos. These servings are huge and shareable and they have a bunch of different combinations of meats and toppings in general. I ordered mine with carne asada and was blown away by the taste. One downfall... the chips tend to get soggy so next time I will be sure to get the salsa on the side. They also have a variety of margaritas... I had the Mexican candy and was not disappointed! They also have a vegan menu! Expect a wait if wanting to be seated at a table and expect slower service if sitting at the bar. I witnessed a group of 4 waiting about 30 minutes and also a couple that walked away before being served their food at the bar because the wait was ridiculously long... to order and to receive. On the plus side, they have purse hooks under the bar so you don't have to worry about keeping an eye on your purse if it's hanging on the seat!

A4AS0d5Xt7vfgMF5AwjnJQ.text: I must say, I do not know why my fiancee and I waited soooo long to go here. We finally went on Tuesday afternoon around 2pm in the afternoon. Place is located on Harmon Ave. Right next door to the Hot N Juicy restaurant, and near the Miracle Mile shops. Surprisingly, place was not packed knowing that is on the Strip. You will be able to find parking, not unless you park in the Miracle Mile garage.   Cool little spot on the strip. You will not get much of this, but they have outside patio dining, inside with table top and booth seating. They even have souvenirs if you are dropping in from out of town.   We were seated right away, and given a huge menu to take a look at. Looking through the menu: they have awesome appetizers for sharing, entree, combination plates, desserts, long list of alcohol, and nachos galore. Of course, they are known mostly for their nachos, free margaritas if you check in on yelp, and their scorpion shots.   What we ordered: the triple dip appetizer (queso, salsa, and house made guacamole), filet mignon nachos, and the ultimate enchilada (comes with beans and rice). Wait time was perfect since we were hungry enough to order appetizers this time. If not, you may want to come when you are extremely hungry or craving good mexican food.  The appetizer, queso was evenly seasoned with the perfect amount of spice. Guacamole had good amount of lime, onion, and has been one of the best that I have tasted in awhile. Salsa, was good all around. Now, do not let the pictures fool you. The filet mignon nachos is good to share for two. But, I was able to finish by myself (this has never happened before)! Loved the chili, salsa white sauce guacamole and cheese mix. One bite to just a few more is not enough!! You will want to keep eating. The enchiladas filled up my fiancee and he eats big. Again, do not let the size fool you.  Unfortunately, so we were both full, we did not get to try the dessert. We will soon be back. Thanks Nacho Daddy for the awesome food, service, and atmosphere.

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Triple dip

I got the nachos and omg it was amazing and huge. If we weren't flying I would have took it to go. I redeemed the free margarita. It was small and packed a punch. I dream of you.... Nacho Daddy.

gJFZKXc_Lpv8J9r0gBesvg.text: Great food! I stopped in for breakfast and was not disappointed. Edgy,  hip atmosphere and some great tex-mex selections mixed into the generous menu Service could have been just a bit more attentive,  but overall a great experience. .

IBdCrAEobEWENtyMGucNLA.text: Ok I was craving a strawberry margarita and some Mexican food and thankfully it was open til 1am in the kitchen! Our bartender was really nice and took great care of us. I got my strawberry margarita, the triple dip with queso, guac, and normal dip. It was awesome! It was so cute there was a little candle at bottom to make the queso warm and loved the fresh diced tomatoes on the guac!! I also got the taco enchilada combination and it was awesome! The pork taco was delicious, you guys have to try that one. Everything was cooked well and flavor was good. It's a big portion so I would say most items here are shareable. The music playing was also good! It was hip pop mostly with Chris Brown. Loved the music selection. The prices here weren't bad either it was affordable and you get what you pay for. Definitely recommend this for your Mexican cravings.

27GPCqiJMnTQOYF6f9L3sQ.text: Excellent food. Great service. Jovanny is awesome. He takes great care of his customers. He deserves a raise. The food is bomb. The vegan nachos are to die for. Hydrate before you dehydrate if you know what I mean.

X24VK2uRBJPEF66L12rRHg.text: Jovanny was our sever and was excellent! He helped us choose what we wanted to order since it was our first time here! We will definitely be back!

EfQgr0ju-ohRhekOXSgSSA.text: Amazing service! Definitely would go back and have Jovany as my server! Super outgoing & friendly. One of the best, amazing food of course!!

a1lAgbpcVPYomkbOvALCKQ.text: I had the best time at Nacho Daddys the other night. It was my first time there and I asked the server for a recommendatiin. Gabby who is also new and in training when over the menu and I finally decided on the Frajitas along with a whit peach margaritas. My friends picked their favorites. Service was great throughout the sercive. Gabby was a real gem. She is positive and really wanted our experience to be as great as the food. We all loved our choices.  Prices are also reasonable. Will rate 5 star and will be back soon

zu70RIQn7M4_FWEXs81uhg.text: Definitely a great spot for top notch tacos, nachos, and margaritas. Arieanna was AWESOME! Excellent service, attentive, and gave us great recommendations. Definitely recommend Nacho Daddy, and sit in her section if you can.

EGlrK5PzzF4Md-uR3g5k8w.text: Spending election night having a great time at Nacho Daddy's where the best Mex food in Vegas is! Plus ask for Kiel, best server in Nevada!

tTRv4DBjoOSC8kGGP38tcQ.text: First time here. This place is awesome. Our server Bryce was awesome. They should give him a raise. We'll be back every time we come to Vegas!

wDBjd_6QVJjr8h6G0x23aQ.text: Wow.... not pleased with this place... we came in about 1pm. Not only did we have to wait ( not busy at all ) they couldn't communicate with each other or us letting us know what is going on... then got seated to a wet table, then waited 5 min after gotten seated for the waiter to come and take our order... We ordered took 20 min for our food (not to bad) my boyfriend ordered a strawberry margarita... the manager made it cuz the 2 bartenders called off.. it was really thick was hard going down... then i asked for sour cream and the waiter didnt come back for over 10 min with it and by then i was done with the food.. never asked if i needed a refill of my tea.. i tryed asking her and next thing i know she is gone.. i have been in the food industry so i know people call off things happen but not like this... Thanks to the kitchen manager Ruben Garcia  came out and talked to us and we express our concern and what happend he was NOT happy... he took care of us made us feel we mattered.. and took care of the bill... tje food was great...

ZsvNymIQtelpuLK9AMUS7Q.text: Bad experience here ,after we've had finished our meals my wife and daughter had not gotten their orders when we asked what had happened  our waitress replied that she ran out of paper whatever that meant.Here on vacation for the holidays our hotel recommended this restaurant very disappointed with the service .

We both walked away feeling great about our meal and the prices were more than reasonable for the quality of food and compared to other restaurants in the area. Both of us would highly recommend this gem!

lyGvSnhOARnIOFAkib_pYw.text: Went for a quick drink and was pleasantly surprised by the happy hour specials! The service was great, Scarlett is awesome...took great care of me!

eAIvDqda4cjrOavAMNNQdw.text: My friend was in Vegas a week ago and she recommended this restaurant and location to me. I checked it out on here (yelp) and the reviews were amazing. I however am disappointed. Our server Vince was super nice, welcoming and accommodating! The atmosphere was really cool. My girlfriend got the pork taco and chicken enchilada plate. It both looked and tasted amazing. I got the spicy shrimp nachos but I'm thinking that mine was not seasoned properly. There was no spice at all and looked kind of plain. I am not saying that it was bad because it was not spicy as advertised. I don't even really care for spicy food. I just wanted shrimp nachos and that was the only one on the menu. There was just no flavor at all. Super bland. I personally give it a 3 but my girlfriend gives a 5 so I'll do a 4. I think that this was just a one off or I ordered the wrong thing. I might give this place another try but I'm not going out of my way to eat here as I did this time.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

mLaSlLROWp68PWlmynWG-w.text: Good food, decent service. My only complaint is the cucumber jalapeno virgin margarita tasted exactly like lemonade, phooey on that part. Likes, that delivery is available and will take advantage in the future, now that I've seen inside one. Cheers.  Updated, next time I won't be on medication, so no virgins for me.

osLkFtCFlxdxJxrboO32yQ.text: Seriously in love with Nacho Daddy!! The GM Chris was super nice and accommodating. We sat at the bar first and Austin and Devin were amazing!! Nachos were a great combination of ingredients in just the right quantities for two. The Cadillac Margarita was an excellent balance of sweet and sour with a strong Tequila kick. Stay away from the Daddy's Margarita however unless you like really sour margaritas as the homemade sour mix is sour.

iMF_ysv2N-JJmDXaGa8OAg.text: Had the best time here for my friends bachelor party! We had the server Litzs she was amazing!!! Great food and customer service 5 stars all the way!!!!

hzNXpjU3vk5S5vbQN1O-fA.text: Stumbled upon this place while I was walking around. I think I may have seen it on TV but either way any restaurant with the word " nacho" in their name is worth further investigation. Sad at the bar and the bartender was very nice and efficient. Had their dish that had cheese and salsa and guacamole separate with some chips. It was delicious. I would go back.

C-iMuhxVWvwqd8EXgfqKGQ.text: I was excited to try this place since it had several vegan options. It wasn't too far of a walk from the center of the strip. We placed a to go order.   We ordered the vegan nachos supreme and the chick'n quesadillas. The topics were generous on the nachos and the flavor was incredible. The presentation of the quesadilla was not as impressive, but it was delicious. The next time I'm in Vegas I'll definitely want to eat there again.

EroqOTf4pUV2HEaWfD43Qg.text: Super happy with Nacho Daddy. I've been rice and both times the atmosphere was dope. The service was quick. The nachos are so delicious. Also... 072FunmFeBn4mH84Uw4D0g.text: Nachos were good, service was ok, long wait.. server took long to come back. I would come back nachos were good

Kj2cMYnb-IzL-T-VcEEEOQ.text: One of my BF's favorite foods is nachos. So, when we saw there was a nacho daddy in Vegas we decided to give it a try. We were not disappointed! BF has literally tried nachos at DOZENS of restaurants. He ordered the  filet mignon nachos and said it was some of the best he has ever had.  I ordered the surf and turf tacos. Both the lobster and the filet mignon tacos were very good to excellent. The filet mignon was a bit too salty but very good.  The rice and beans that accompanied the tacos were nothing to write home about.  I ordered a cucumber and jalapeno margarita which was very good. BF had the free house margarita that they offer with a Yelp checking.  He said it was good.  We would definitely go back if we were in Vegas craving Mexican food!

bVPMpJvQ6O4l1LxDll9vdA.text: ..Love Guy so im probably a little biased but its good eats Lobster Nachos a winner for sure  For what it is its a step above Mexican American Chains and  Check it out I give them 4 stars a knock just for the service our server was new.

efqWI3q3axTq3rh9S-2O7A.text: Great recommendation by my lovely daughter. The service was great and the lobster and shrimp nachos were delicious. What a great concept. Make sure you stop by and grab your favorite nachos and be sure to share with someone. The plates are huge.

5y8SscXEDFh59qL8nSKV8Q.text: DJ our waiter was very professional and polite. He made sure to tell us the specials that were available. We enjoyed our time at Nacho Daddy and would eat here again. The food was affordable and tasty!!! Excellent service!

QyVaIzjf7FN1bKJk3HD00g.text: We had a late lunch at Nacho Daddy's and it was surprisingly very good.  I was not sure if they could pull off the nachos but I have to say the supreme and fajita nachos are very good and enough to share.  The house margaritas were also very good and complimentary with a Yelp check in so that was a win win!  I recommend you try this place if your missing Tex-Mex flavors.  Also, the wait staff was great and wait time was very reasonable.  However, I did say we were there for a late lunch.

eZyCbMtwXqjLONMvKWelSQ.text: First let me start by saying that yelp gave me a warning that there were multiple reviews done on the same IP address. With that said, we still wanted to give them a chance because they welcome families.  My review is more based on the service and perception.  Experience: We walked in and there are four hostess One with her back towards the entrance. They turn and look at us but did not say anything. Finally, one of the girls in the back turns to my kid and asked how many? Our server seemed to be rushing us to order drinks and order off the menu not giving us any time to look. We ordered our drinks and our food. I tell him I have a free house margarita for the Yelp check-in. He brings it over and All you can taste is the syrup, grossest margarita ever with no alcohol. I checked and made sure their house margarita had alcohol, I only took one sip and my jaw hurt. Tried mixing it and it still gross that i gave up.   Food: We ordered the shrimp spicy nachos with spinach chips, chicken enchilada nachos, and the cheese quesadilla. The food was maybe a 3.5 to 4 star quality.   Prices are good and location is good too, it's away from the strip maybe about a block away so it's not as busy and also not that far.   Overall I would not return and would not recommend. Also, next time I'll listen to yelp when it says something suspicious about the five-star reviews.

o8NYmRwCQLJs6nzzYgHNNw.text: Lobster and Crab Nacho...spot on delicious.  Prices were decent, the service was great. Modern and casual, a fun place to eat.

ZK3mdz0ArzaNh_0JHPv3lw.text: My first time in this place and the vibe was chill! We in Vegas so I'm thinking phukit let's see what's the binih! Good shyt made a Brotha feel comfy after a nice sized King Kong thumb of that Cali kill my munchies were subsided by some radical ass nachos and A quesadilla to make you want to slap ya chick for not putting it down in the kitchen like this here we love em though. A good looking on that discount for the drink cause it was fire and I did enjoy my time keep up you got my vote.

dZujzZtTubwXexb6KJrhpA.text: We were on the hunt for a late craving. We passed this place up but came back to it and so glad we did. I had the filet mignon nachos, which were amazing and the supreme tostada nachos were also so damn good! The service was great and the drinks were as great! The music added to the night life in Vegas with the tv screens showing the music videos.   I would so come back!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

pp6jIoElndZFvSwrS4qZGQ.text: I went here with my coworkers to unwind and enjoy good food. The food was good, the drinks were good, atmosphere is good. Going by my review everything would be good, right? Not so much.  Our food and drinks were served in a timely manner. This is where it goes downhill, Our server checked in on us once during our meal vs checking in after we had finished our meals. The ice in our waters had melted. We had finished our meals 45 minutes. So thinking by seeing empty plates one would check on us? Nope, we can understand letting your patrons eat their meals, but we were forgotten. Every server walked by us and didn't have the courtesy to let their fellow server know their table was done. We got a servers attention and requested to speak with the manager.   I guess to help "apologize" for being forgotten we were given a "free drink" voucher with a purchase of an entree and $4 off our meal. Having worked in the industry, it could've been resolved better.

FcU4rmhhekvG9MVAxacZ6w.text: Love this place! Mostly always order the filet mignon steak nachos. It's really a LOT OF FOOD!!! I always order pick up and it's ready the minute I pull up. Only thing about this location that's annoying is the parking. Other than that I could eat here everyday!!!

GuHTlOym1VEVx5mngon-uA.text: Nacho Daddy was the best... Everything was good... went twice since being in Vegas... when we come back in Feb we will be back.. I ordered the crab and lobster street  tacos... Loved Loved them second time ordered the fajitas... The best!!! Love this place

They are frik'n amazing! Also Rebekah at the bar was an awesome server. She really took great care of us. Next time I am in Las Vegas I will definitely be back.

fZMIaZVjlIXn3-C255E6xA.text: We came here to watch the football games, saw the reviews on yelp, and  I this place is most definitely 5 Star, our waitress was Rachel and she was 5star also.. she was very attentive and new her menu and drinks... I was so happy and comfortable here!!! This is a must visit... and hopefully when you come, Rachel will be here!!! Have the best experience!!! Thank you!!

BcasrwNvDXi9ucHzVIwHDA.text: Really nice people, but the food gets no stars. Honestly it was like straight of a can. Pretty sure i got food poising. They had really cool scorpions tho hahaha.

xxTbkphtq-DiKSuI_Y1nig.text: I hope no one takes this 3 star rating as a slight. These ain't ya daddy's nachos but they are still very good. This location isn't the easiest to uber to but for reference there is a area a little past the restaurant where the uber can drop you off. There is a aquarium in the front with a couple scorpions unfortunately they weren't social during my wait for the table. We got seated in about minutes. There were plenty of TVs for any night you're looking to catch a game. We got started with some chips and salsa which are a great way to soak up a tiny bit of alcohol. and our server started us off with a couple waters and took our drink orders. We got a frozen margarita no salt and a ginger ale We ended up with a classic margarita with salt and a pepsi. The classic margarita is good and strong. I'd call it a potential hair of the dog candidate.  It took about 15-20 minutes for a delicious plate of nachos make its way out but unfortunately it wasn't ours. The next two plates were and they were piled high with toppings. For the price a definite deal. They have a wide variety of nachos with different proteins for your tasting pleasure. We ended up getting the BBQ chicken nachos and the classic nachos. The chips kept their crunch throughout most of the plate I never ran out of toppings.  The service during this trip was just a little distracted. Our server seemed to have their mind elsewhere and brought out drinks that were different from what we ordered and had food sent out that wasn't ours but the nachos were good. Nacho Daddy is a place worth checking out if you're a nacho fan or simply need to absorb some alcohol with a little hair of the dog for the hangover. I don't think distracted service is a normal thing at Nacho Daddy.

Frb-rW2iFhjO09-UHWg7_w.text: I'm sad that the Ione and Eatern location is gone but the drinks are to die for with pretty good prices. It's been awhile since I've been since the location closed but I'll be there soon.

MC8MTZgBki5BfUtCAU94MQ.text: My husband and I ordered their smothered burrito with beef and red sauce and their nacho average nachos. The burrito was really good every bite had flavor and meat which we like. Their nacho cheese was really good, but I feel like they didn't put enough cheese. Their guac is really good. We also ordered traditional nacho daddy nachos which was way better than the nacho average nachos. They honored our Hilton card so we got 20% off as well. We'd eat at this place again but we'll try something else next time.

HH-r8s4ILLFtQUa-htUtCQ.text: Great food, great drinks, great service! We got the fajitas and the jalapeno/cucumber and pomegranate margaritas and it was the best food I've had in Vegas and by far the best fajitas anywhere.   Great service as well!!

Booker, thanks for making our night. Props to you - you deserve some love.

Rx8hQZezhibCjsmZ-k8rCg.text: Food was great!  I had queso and fish tacos!  Desi, the bartender, was slammed when I arrived and was super apologetic when she was able to take a breath!!  Will definitely be back!  Desi is awesome!  Thanks!!

Vgyp1PjhIqPmzbZy40b6vQ.text: This was a great experience! I got the enchilada nachos and my free margarita for checking in. I sat at the bar and the server was very friendly. Manager also came over to see how I liked my good. Overall very good.

ui_iFv-j6omWlYQCwz0DMw.text: This is a Vegas MUST VISIT restaurant! They have a scorpion tank in their entryway, an awesome greeter team, and uh- hello?? Freakin amazing nachos! This place can't get any cooler. My waitress, Amanda, was simply amazing. Extremely attentive and just candid and easy to interact with. Her recommendations were spot on. We had chips and guacamole for an appetizer (good for two people- order an extra if you have more than that), carne asada and the nacho average burger nachos (don't even try to share- get your own and eat the whole dang thing yourself. You deserve it. Hell, its Vegas! Be fat for a week). I was still recuperating from the previous night's drinks, so I didn't try their margaritas but I've heard they are to die for! Eat here! There's nothing else I can say. You have to experience this place for yourself. Oh! Almost forgot- this place is great for vegans! I'm a meat-eater, but thought it was pretty cool they had so many vegan options. The whole world needs to eat here.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpions!!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The bar!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carne asada nachos

okIzu8ouBfzNjZxyzjNU7w.text: I foolishly ordered the wings.....which were not epic!  Stick with the nachos choices

0Ubj-Wrp0p7vGEgdrPm6eQ.text: At first no one was in the restaurant, not sure if we should go in.  So glad we did.  The staff was great, not pushy and friendly.  The daddy margarita was tasty. The food was good with nice size portions at a great price. Will definitely go back next time we are in Las Vegas.

MMspVl5HKC-udnCaufBVcg.text: Great food! We were seated at the bar really quickly and served just as fast. A little disappointed that they ran out of the lobster and crab nachos, but the spicy shrimp was still good. The atmosphere is amazing as well. The hostesses was incredibly friendly and checked in with us several times, even when we were seated at the bar. Our bartender was helpful and nice at the beginning, but seemed to geta little frosty towards the end of our meal. Overall in highly recommend it!

gBL_p77fUnDVHEh3ldnJ8Q.text: Was in here yesterday with a party of 20 for my best friend's graduation. Jovany couldn't have been a better server. Waited on our every need with ease and not a single error! Great food, great atmosphere, great people.

vWLYDLmnm0gggXd1FZCB3w.text: I had the filet mignon nachos and they are so good. Now the blueberry margaritas were amazing a must try.

i52EgtiPNtoPH8VgqKIxDg.text: Amazing food! Came here for my graduation and had an amazing time! Jovany was an amazing server! He treated us like royalty. Will definitely be coming back

ol-igZrR99YOwJIUf84AyQ.text: Came here for margs and nachos on the strip before the Britney show--- had amaaaazing margs and the best service on the strip with Jovany! He was absolutely fabulous--- SUCH A BLAST,  will be bringing all my out of town gals here!

hMgNEM_FBY4Lbz1Q4-BERQ.text: Was a pleasant surprise coming here.  Saw this on yelp and took the dive to see if worth the visit.  We both loved it! The nacho's were spot on outstanding.  We had the chicken version, excellent taste profile.  Also enjoyed the shredded chicken tacos.  The margarita was good, can't enjoy a meal like this without this beverage...lol.  Our service was outstanding and attentive! Next time we are back in Vegas we will stop by again!

6o6ZXTAFf9P9nw3508rHgQ.text: Tasty nachos, piled high. Glad I went, but I don't have much interest to return. It seems like a novelty restaurant - drink a scorpion in a shot, get a t-shirt, racha mountain of nachos, move on. Service was super, super, super slow. I had to ask the hostess if we would ever see a waitress, or if we could change tables. The restaurant was only 1/4 full and seemed to have plenty of waitresses. To be fair, some in my group were a little less focused than they would have been if sober. The general manager was very friendly and helpful. Nice scorpion tank near the front door.

DIsNFjSlhjYQJDisK5L1Bw.text: Yum yum yummmm!!! This place was so delicious!! I got one of the huge burritos and it was to die for!! Their margaritas are also definitely amazing! The service was also great and the waitress was very knowledgeable about the food served there! I highly recommend this place!! They also play a good bit of 90's alternative which was nice to relive my childhood during our experience here!

A1V2q327cMcrmND3fHxJdA.text: Margaritas were good size & delicious. Portions on the nachos were generous & really too big as a entree for one person. Really yummy. Server was efficient, friendly & helpful.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Cd0H603HXaCXKD04KwqDuw.text: Jovany gave us great service and was very friendly . Very satisfied with the food and service.

eutzjZvUbIN1tik6wlyFIw.text: Below average Mexican food. Very expensive drinks.  I'm not sure why it gets such good reviews on here people must not have ever at good Mexican. I wouldn't go back.

mu3tbJyo3zGP1gf3Pyp01g.text: Jovanny was an amazing!! It was our first time here and jovanny made sure that we had a great time. Margarita was awesome.

njyrsSp06qPHOhmUAVmCBw.text: Great drinks and Desi (bartender) was very helpful with questions on the food and drink menus.. I'll definitely come back in the future.

toQ_oV9YwEhJJtVmRooNjQ.text: I fell in love with this place QUICKLY!!!! The waiter M.J was dope as hell!!! The food is amazing, This is the place to be if you're in town! STOP BY AND BE READY TO HAVE A GOOD TIME!!!

P-ftR-gz1C6WwKDDsyGUNA.text: Wonderful food and great service. Not to forget huge huge portions. We ordered flaming shrimps and corn off the cob as appetizers. Both were awesome and good for 2 persons and very tasty. Our entree was fiesta chicken nachos which was good. The portions is enough for 3 persons easily. Check-in on Yelp gives you a free margherita. Service is nice and servers are smiley and polite. Would definitely recommend this place.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta chicken nachos. Yummy for 3 easily.
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Flaming shrimps and corn off the cob along with the cooling margheritas.

njg3FFslAHQ9n2HRVkvvrw.text: Nacho Daddy....what an excellent fine! My husband literally laughed when I said I wanted to go here. When I showed him the high reviews, he realized I was serious. So, glad we swung by because this place is so fun!  Nacho Daddy is located on a side street literally right off the strip (basically on the strip) and they are known for.....nachos, you guessed it!   There is a check in deal for a free marg (amazing!) which I had and my husband got a jalapeno marg. They also do these things called scorpion shots. We didn't get these but our bar neighbor did. An actual scorpion in my drink is a solid no for me but to each your own!  We split the crab and lobster nachos. Insane portion and lots of crab and lobster. These are definitely spicy AND we got the siracha on the side. So delicious and like their motto "never a chip left dry".

0JbD0j3FQwnZ6FwSsTlqXw.text: Decent Mexican fare at reasonable prices. Not too crowded, sports on TV and friendly waitresses.   I ate here twice in one trip to Vegas. One breakfast of huevos rancheros that was very good and the second time was dinner of pork enchiladas. Prepared just right and tasty.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

uQdBLzRFfqlkEMJ9D3x4Og.text: The nacho plates are huge.  They could be shared by two if your not starving.  We were there for lunch and were seated right away.  My wife had the chicken quesadilla it was also large and delicious.  Service was good.  Our waitress was attentive.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Beef nacho supreme
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Daddy margaritas and nachos

SuERtBUkaaHn-uY97zlC_w.text: Service was amazing! Sarah is a wonderful server a 10 out of 10 exactly what you expect out of service! There fiesta nachos were amazing!! There's flavor in every bite! None of the chips were naked what's o ever!  They also have a lot of Vegan Options which is important to my family! The general assistant manager Edward is also super kind and checked in with us to see how we were doing! None the less you want a margarita or a michelada stop on by they are exceptional and if u want more then one don't worry they have pitchers too!! !!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Michelada with negra modelo!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nachos!

twd1LwbPSmijWpwS1Nc8og.text: We visited Nacho Daddy for lunch on 3/31. There was a 45 minute wait to be seated in the restaurant, but we found a stool at the bar, and couldn't have been happier! We both pulled up the Yelp check-in "free margarita" and the bartender quickly served us with delicious drinks. My wife ordered the Vegan Crispy Avocado Street Tacos and I had a variety of Street Tacos, including shrimp and chicken. Fresh, hot, and delicious! Topped it off with a Daddy's Margarita, which was great, too. Originally was going to try the Scorpion Shot, but can always do it next time. Will definitely visit Nacho Daddy again!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Free Margaritas after &#34;checking-in&#34; with Yelp app (and purchasing entrees).

0CM7I3zR9EjvoOffPbOLUg.text: Food was great! I highly recommend! We got the Fiesta nachos with black beans instead of refried beans (I would recommend doing that) and cheese enchiladas.  You should make it a must on your trip next time!

9iDWaKS35kVsyut2Eqq_Hg.text: Quick service to be seated and great happy hour specials. The Buffalo Chicken Nachos were great and all the food came out quick and fresh.

coOWwQ_pGb7Y-1dh6DsJzA.text: A new location.... easy to get to on the strip... YAS!!!  Hubby and I are huge nacho daddy fans. We went there almost every week when we lived there. I recently went back to Vegas with friends to visit and I just HAD to have nacho daddy while I was there (Sorry hubby)!!! I love this new location. All of the nachos are to die for!! (Pulled pork has always been my favorite) Prices are very reasonable (And there's a free YELP check in margarita right now)!! The waiter I had at this location was so great. I wish I remembered his name. I will definitely be back to Nacho Daddy every single time I'm in Vegas (hopefully hubby can join next time).

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Outside
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margaritas
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nachos and margaritas!! Yay

prtHGyOuI-kYhNVCiHsV7A.text: Was really disappointed...  The nachos are sub par and was expecting them to be great because of the business name.  It seemed like the place was 90% alcohol sales and 10% food. The flavor of the nachos reflects that.

7-Q9FC-v9XkNKclbPNMX6Q.text: The food here is amazing! You know how when you get drunk and Taco Bell always sounds really good, but then it's never satisfying? Well nacho daddy satisfies every desire in every way.

AsDaT2aSMkoTPA0LNpl9Qw.text: Best Margarita ever. Waiter said it's homemade sour mix. Also flaming shrimp tacos on my all time favorite list now. Wished I lived closer to Vegas.

Ha9R7YNp9P7dSF0oAwvWrg.text: Walked in on a Tuesday night.  Was completely dead but that's okay!  We sat at the bar and we were quicky helped by a loud bartender who easily was heard over the music videos. I ordered a fajita bowl, which was delicious and a margarita.  The margarita was a bit weak for me so I ordered a shot of Chamuco's, which is excellent tequila but hardly seen in bars.  Apparently on Tuesdays it is buy one tequila and get one free, which made the price worth it!

l-VIW91gWOlegfteQZqVoQ.text: Amazing place with delicious food!!! The nachos were to die for! I had the enchiladas and the plate was nicely put together and they were yum! They have a check in deal as well! The food came fast to the table. The deep fried ice cream was wow! 4 people can share and it's such the perfect dessert for the sweet tooth! Honestly super great place and no complains at all. Guacamole was super good!

WzV2ecrzyoPI_E1F6P7UuQ.text: This place is delicious!! Huge portions and yummy food!  Very happy and will come back again next visit!

Gw0SRdDvzfqEy3hX3pRTdQ.text: If you're craving nachos, this place definitely brings you some bomb nachos!!   I ordered the fiesta nacho and shared it with my friend. It was the perfect amount for 2 people. Very tasty and exactly how they described it to be. The price isn't as bad as other places in Vegas. The nachos are stuffed and packed with a lot of stuff! I was very satisfied.   There is a menu on the back for vegans! Which is a plus for friend groups with a vegan person.   Remember to check In on yelp to claim a house margarita ($8.99 for free) !!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Free house margarita with yelp check in!

p8rbeKSFJnzim7nCToHv5w.text: I am from Phoenix AZ where Mexican restaurants are in almost every corner. Nacho Daddy is the best Mexican restaurant I have ever had. My husband and I shared the fajitas and my son ordered the enchiladas. We all shared the cheese, guac, chips and salsa. The cheese dip was the best ever! I am salivating just thinking about it.

rbAj3QraFknDGL75Y4dJzw.text: Nacho Galore! This is what I've been waiting for. Sure you got buffets, 4 star restaurants, and super large pizzas in Vegas. But sometimes you just want Nachos, not just any nachos but ones that deliver on their motto "never a dry chip", and that my friends is Nacho Daddy!  Atmosphere: 5/5 Great for everyone. They've got a nice bar if you got a small group. Or a big place for a big party. Music is great, service is great too.   Nachos: 5/5 GREAT PORTIONs! Never a dry chip. So many places don't understand the importance of proportion but every chip you pick up will have a good proportion on the toppings as well.   I'll be back!

Vvvm6d607i2ri410XomANw.text: Ate at the nacho daddy in Vegas and we loved it. The quest dip is a must so delicious. The nachos are the best I e ever had.  Fun atmosphere too

aGyTfxyYOGwR0pwMkwALZg.text: The best Nacho I ever had. But I wasn't be able to use free margaritas redeem since happy hour menu.

j26191dl8l1SvxLUY85wPg.text: The food is really pricey and just ok. But this is Vegas and I guess that is to be expected. What I didn't like was the waitress telling a customer she got in trouble for not ringing his beer up and as he's leaving he's trying to pay her. She then proceeded to have a conversation with the manager that she used her too money to pay it. All the while we were waiting. When she finally came to take out order she of course was upset and made us feel uncomfortable. As if we were bothering her trying to place our order. We almost didn't stay but we were hungry. Needless to say mediocre food and bad service.

Bm8nXbbrFPSjkJjPM1i8lQ.text: I LOVE MEXICAN food, since moving to Las Vegas it has been hard finding a regular place to go for Mexican food. I still have not found that place, but this is one of the ones I would consider going to alot. There are several locations throughout the valley. The fist time here we had great service and great food!

cvH5ctfu85-uf-VNkieS3Q.text: This is the best new spot on the corner of the strip and Harmon. (Next to BWW) Stop by and ask for Jovany as your server...best friends on the spot! The whole staff is amazing and the food is all original recipes. Try the margaritas, the wings are great, and of coarse great nachos.... can't go wrong.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

OayAbDaZhjgYG8fIHSBJpQ.text: We found this place while walking around the planet Hollywood mall. You get a free margarita when you check in and it was actually really delicious. Food portions are large! We got the lobster enchilada, enchilada nachos, and chimichanga, and they were all delicious. I would come back to this place.

urxcQyUcYYzIwItPtc74Wg.text: I ate here for the first time yesterday while on vacation. I was drawn in due to their vegan menu.   I ordered the loaded vegan nachos. The reason I ordered this one over the Chik'n nachos was because of a review i had read on Yelp about the chick'n so I was naturally hesitant. Plus the chick'n nachos was around $1 more I believe.   Well they ended up bringing me the chick'n nachos instead of the one that I actually ordered. I was bummed but I didn't send it back because I didn't want to waste all of that food. It ended up being pretty good so I was satisfied at the end of the meal still.   Additionally, we got the triple dipper - I ate the guac and sauce while my boyfriend at the queso. We both agreed it was very good.  Our waitress (with mermaid hair color) was very attentive and kind to us while we sat at the bar as well.   I would definitely come back purely on the fact that they had a ton of vegan options! Kudos to Nacho Daddy for offering that!!

Esy7Mz0EnX2trh0JKphMLQ.text: Great place to go for lunch or dinner. They have a fair amount of vegan options and their cocktails are amazing. The white peach margarita is my favorite.  Jovanny the manager was very friendly and made the lunch experience enjoyable.  Their downtown location is also great. Had a late (past midnight) dinner there after walking through Fremont Street. They have nice yelp deals (free house margarita with check in!)

5HK0ANoKxlTvDuwdqwOzTg.text: Amazing atmosphere!! There's a vegan menu and the supervisor Jovany was the sweetest!!  Great service and nicely decorated. :))) very happy we came here!

iiMfYjD1g-MYdAF6nLrw4g.text: I got the filet mignon nachos and they were very good. With a meat as good as filet mignon, I do wish I could have had it without the spicy sauce on it, but it was still delicious. When I was typing delicious, it auto corrected to ferocious, which I feel is appropriate as well.

NAkSI1ooMyxc6ScEbrES4Q.text: This is one of my favorite spots I have to come to everytime were in Vegas.  There food is absolutely delicious and their customer service is amazing. Aly is a waitress we look for everytime we come in. She makes us and our friends super comfortable and welcoming. Check them out!

USorEN_tDM5NRv_t0LYE6g.text: Great place with quality food. And our server Jovany took care of us. Complimentary margaritas and shots. Going to come back real soon awesome place

z00JNAzhicFkXDTkE8Xn9Q.text: Celebrating my birthday weekend in Vegas and came in and got my free Margarita with my check in but our server, Jovany hooked us up with 2! Thank you so much!  food also looks bomb!

COFOp7JKx0dN_AeL-P0Q3A.text: Awesome margaritas and the best bartender in Las Vegas, REBECKa!!  Had the best nachos!! Great farewell to Las Vegas!!

DYE8VJQ-v1R62MDTDDj6qQ.text: Had a great lunch here on a Monday. Not very busy, got a great table right away and had excellent service. Margaritas were good, big portions for the food, and very reasonable prices for entrees (Vegas strip restaurants can be pricey). Really liked our nachos and enchiladas. Will definitely be back!

e8wTDJA0pEaGnhhDnBRKpQ.text: Great place.  Good food but the service made the difference.  Ryan - you rock!!! We will. Keep coming back for you my man!  Thank you for being so professional  And genuine.  Great server.

nNYI3blMCMZr70rmiNxIXQ.text: Jose was a great server! Good food and great service! Definitely worth checking out. I will definitely be coming backs to Nacho Daddy when I come back to Vegas. Thanks, Jose!!

L02DEixZGQ5ot4dtBq8VGw.text: Awesome meal - great food, great service! Chase was amazing. He kept all our drinks full and impressed my kids with how new Arnold Palmers kept magically appearing on the table.  The food was delicious - my husband had the Supreme Tostada nachos and devoured them. He loves nachos and orders them at restaurants everywhere, trying to find the best ones, and Nacho Daddy did not disappoint.  My daughter loved her enchilada nachos, and my son (who doesn't really care for Mexican food) found his perfect entree in the Nacho Average Burger Nachos, which was basically a cheeseburger on top of chips. I had the seafood nachos - lobster, crab, white queso, black beans, and a mango salsa/sweet chili sauce. They tasted amazing, and we were surprised and delighted to have them comped because there was a delay in my dish coming out.  The kitchen manager came out personally to tell us, and he was super courteous and apologetic. We didn't mind a little wait, but the great service and extra consideration made us loyal customers and we will definitely be coming back again!

UAhCM8ZrmdRnZu502bFopQ.text: Love this location. Everyone here is great! Manager peter is really cool, bartender arnold makes great drinks and is really nice and server ryan is awesome! The vegan, gluten free nachos are fabulous! Fun vibe on the strip and open late!!!

8tpHtbCd_2GAYP_AV5thyg.text: Stopped in on a Monday night around 10pm for some nomsZ. Place was pretty dead when we arrived but at least 12 people came in after us. Nachos artistically plated, perfect for my OCD dreams! Got a deal on a bucket of Coronas which was perfect to wash down NACHOS covered in my 2 favorite hot sauces - Cholula and Tapatio!'

Q2pExt-S0VC_iw85Llz2jw.text: Great place around the corner from the Elara. Best nachos I've had in a long time. Service was great and server was awesome. His name was Michael. Great work team. Thanks for making a late night snack worth it

734OtomMwk4B4yM94sl0XQ.text: Stopped in last year for my birthday, the barmaid was very nice and gave me a free drink for my birthday! They make a kick ass huge marguirita!

8Ql0Ik8xGpZxZolKHRtSqA.text: I have come here in the past and wasn't disappointed, but my recent experience made this restaurant lose my business. I came in the other evening and I was ignored for over 20 minutes while the short Asian bartender talked to other customers. She also used profane language in front of other customers very loudly. I left without being served. Would not recommend this establishment.

5wSjjJGbvLHk4nUT9cb6Jg.text: Breakfast was great. So good that we went back for lunch the next day! Lots of Gluten Free options, too. I have celiac disease and am used to having to just order a plain salad, but probably at least 1/3 of the offerings were marked as GF.

LcfidwZv_2vIZdfyCRf5vw.text: Come here a couple times a month.  The food is some of the cheapest on the strip AND the nachos are amazing!  I've never been disapointed with anything I've had here.  Shout out to the best bartenders in the world!  Especially Kimberly!

PlcfH4Knf-dKauU7KP78ng.text: First time at Nacho Daddy with our friends. The server's name was Jacob. He had a very out going and friendly personality. He was joking with us and made us feel so welcome. Food was absolutely delicious!! Loved the environment. We will be coming back

8PsONw9pXkkddES3PD5kvg.text: I wasn't sure about going to a place called Nacho Daddy. I expected to have Bubba Gump type of service and quality.   I am so happy that I didn't trust my gut and went in. My wife and I both agree that the food and service were as good as we received anywhere in Vegas. Please open a Nacho Daddy near my house!

92GFZaaWWkwOj-stU8n5hg.text: Waited 12 minutes for a waiter after being seated.  No one ever showed up.  Got up and left.  Avoid at all costs!!

ZRtjGi0KUmv5PbUOqlBvBQ.text: Great food and such a cool atmosphere. Arieanna was a wonderful waitress and always made sure we were doing ok. Loved it!

0Do_TKlJy4Pp_Cuw0l_YrQ.text: This place is absolute garbage. Doesn't even qualify as "Mexican" food, because there was no flavor and no authentic ingredients typically found at a Mexican restaurant. Unless you're drunk and just looking for a bar to take shots at and/or grab a margarita skip this place. Seriously. There's a Chipotle inside Planet Hollywood only a short walk away. Go there instead.

uEbMUSsLvv8O2UUJhvNcBA.text: Amanda and Tyler were amazing and so helpful with food and drink choices. We will definitely be back every time we're in town! It's our new go to place!!

niSECsA7MXh342ufkUmQkA.text: I loved the cucumber jalapeno Marg - super spicy and delish! It's a big one! Split the Vegas prime rib nachos - good portion, could've been a little cheesier.

2TRKc0pxXUWaV9eokArccQ.text: Love this place!  Their nacho so good and the services best.  Check in on yelp and get free house Margarita.

ao-aEllsWzrc2BAFZFsvdA.text: My fiance and I had a long day walking around and wanted to finally kick up our feet to relax. We decided to just walk down and see our options in the Miracle Mile we're. Nacho Daddy stood out because my friend had been raving about it since our last Vegas visiting. From the minute we walked in, everyone was so nice and helpful. The place has an open floor plan with tall ceilings and music loud, but I love that it was overpowering conversation. The menu was vast with so many surf, turf and vegan options I couldn't decide what to order. The first person to give me some warm feedback was Jovany. His honest opinions were so refreshing and ordered the Sizzling Shrimp Tacos without any hesitations. Then, he was delighted we were from OC and gave us two Nacho Daddy shot glasses on the house. Hello?! How awesome is it to connect with someone so real? Anyway, the strawberry margarita is stiff and good. I'm dancing my way out of here. Thanks so much for your hospitality, Jovany! We'll definitely be back!

g9t6GbqiqTjTCRNBAiwPCQ.text: The atmosphere of the restaurant is spectacular, but the quality of the food wasn't up to my standard. The nachos that we ordered was chicken and it was shredded like cheese. Overall, I wouldn't return to this restaurant but if you want a quick appetizer or a drink you should try them.

U9TZLQ5bLYihynehE8vxTA.text: Ask for Hazel as your waitress!! She is take care of you. She's the best. Get the BBQ nachos!

6NQmHx_xJ_CAxEP2O0HZdw.text: Food was great. Staff was friendly. And Rita was a great hostess. What more could you ask for? 10/10 would recommend.

D357l-fqQrQQMdbyfI7xVQ.text: We came by for my cousins bachelor week. Stopped by and the food was phenomenal. Big portions at a great price. MJ, our server, was awesome. By far she provided some of the best service we've had this week.

9uCBWq3axydYuqUwqsxGIw.text: Super disappointed from start to finish here. We came in pretty late so that may be part of the issue. But it's also Vegas so you'd think most places are able to accommodate at any hour. We came in around midnight and we waited for probably 30 minutes to get 4 to go meals. It was very busy so it was really disappointing. The menu is huge and I will commend them on having lots of vegetarian and vegan options to choose from. I got the vegan fajita bowl. It was not terrible but definitely not great. The meat replacement they add on top was very salty. I'm not sure if that was because of seasoning they used or if that particular brand of replacement meat is salty. The pico they added was alright but needed cilantro and lime for sure. The vegan sour cream was better than I assumed it would be. The guacamole was surprisingly good. Chunky and full of lime taste which was delicious. Another weird thing is the waitress came back to assume is out good was almost ready several times and told me twice "they're just figuring out your vegan bowl". I don't know what she meant by that but was kinda unsettling. Like I said it was terrible just won't be going back. If you're in a hurry definitely try somewhere else.

kp66BjOM6u_TX2KXkMYfKQ.text: This place is INCREDIBLE!! I came here at around 11 pm after a super long road trip from California and I was so happy with the food. I got the vegan fajita bowl and I was so happy with it. The chik'n was seasoned super well and the bottomless chips and salsa were so wonderful :) was a little bit pricey in general but I think the quality of the food was absolutely worth the price. Waiter was also very attentive to refill our drinks and get us anything we needed. Will be coming back next time I'm in Vegas for sure!!!

JvsRXvonP_bpUn5hRbeNXw.text: pretty impressed. food was very good and pretty reasonable. Naked hotwings were very good. we will eat here the next time we're in town! Definitely check this place out

BT6Y7IaP10D59FYCm8fptw.text: My friends and I visited this restaurant twice while in Las Vegas.  On the first occasion we stopped in to do the famous scorpion shot.  The shot of tequila went down easy and the scorpion was just crunchy.   The only problem we had was that you are supposed to be able to keep the glasses and we didn't know that.  On the second occasion we came back for dinner and everyone had a great meal!

x5RwTK0Fp77QPZfwWzn5qw.text: Cassandra was amazing, really sweet. The food was excellent. My friend had nachos, I had the enchiladas. He's a picky eater so this place worked out. I took the scorpion shot. It's a pricey shot but the excitement and the attention you get makes it worth it ! Checked in with yelp and got a free margarita and like 5 coupons to come back next time ! Which we definitely will.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

e_l0hh49miH7KQj1QQ_8Fw.text: I came in with my mom to order take out. My first annoyance was that I couldn't redeem the free margarita with check in despite spending over $40 for nachos, burrito, and enchilada. We were told that it is only for dine it. The second came when we paid. We ordered our take out with the hostess and paid cash. We only received dollar bills and was missing the change. When we inquired with the server, we were told that it is their policy to round down the change. I have lived a very transient lifestyle. I've lived in 7 different states and have traveled to many cities. I also eat out quite often, at least 2-3 times a week. I have NEVER encountered such a policy. To be quite honest, I question the legality of the policy. I will do a bit more research on that when I get home and on a laptop. This is not my area of practice. At best, it is a horrible, deceptive practice. At worst, it is illegal and they are stealing from their patrons.

W-_B_bN2zg3GsEbxEvOhGg.text: Cassandra is awesome! Thanks for keeping things fun! We will be back! Nachos are the way to go here I got the filet mignon one.

dXj4b9-mWPV3bP9t9DxZMw.text: Nacho daddy was a very good American Mexican restaurant to visit. The customer service was great. The house margarita with the "Yelp visit" was a great addition to the meal. The food was hot and tasty. The music in the venue reminded me of late 90s and the early 2000s so very nostalgic for me. The March madness basketball games were on tv. My server was very informative about the "scorpion shot" that the restaurant provides. I was very happy with the menu and will be sure to recommend to family and friends.

Wfh7JJnaTZmI0Aok5C8dnA.text: This place is awesome!!! I am a vegan and expect to see one or two items on a menu that I could eat. I don't expect any desserts.  This place had an entire page on its menu for their vegan food and included chocolate cake. My husband and I ordered the fully loaded nachos. We have not had nachos in years. They were amazing. The portions are enormous but we still ate every last bit of the nachos. I had a kale salad with vegan chicken. It was perfectly seasoned. They know how to cook here. And they make the vegan food with care and love!

T9-gqs84DwJbQinW2I_XTg.text: We came here after flying into Vegas pretty late on a Friday night. It was fairly empty and took a few minutes to be seated, but once we were, our server immediately came over and was very friendly. The ambience was nice. They were playing a fun variety of music videos on the many TVs.   We ordered the Thai chicken bowl, which was very yummy, and the buffalo hot nachos. Our server accidentally put the Thai chicken nachos into the computer, so those were initially brought out. She quickly realized her mistake, and the kitchen remade the order and brought them to the table within about five minutes. The nachos seemed a little rushed and lacking in toppings, but they were okay.

_IvkKCYupJ-HLdLepKyHSQ.text: I have had this the last two nights for dinner. First night I was recommended their grilled wings. Wow!!' Amazing!! Ordered extra spicy and they were delicious!!! Second night buffalo chicken nachos yummmm!! Amazing as well. The staff is amazing and goes above and beyond to make your experience great! This is one of my favorite places to come when visiting Vegas. I eat here every year and forget to review so here it is. Don't miss out!

jdggFxCoxu-L_2HXMXkSjA.text: Nacho Daddy Is Bomb Place to Eat at All The Employees are Super Cool! Bomb Food!  The Waitress "Samm" was Super Bomb She knows how to do it Right 5 BIG STARS FOR HER!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

e1JpBoJSTcmuU6gJeSNI9A.text: My friends and I were lured here by the Yelp check-in offer for a free margarita with an entree purchase.  Unfortunately, the margarita was overwhelmingly sweet and sour mix.  Their sweet and sour is made in house and actually pretty good, but the margarita itself was not well made.  I know it was free, but if it was a True representation of their margaritas, I wouldn't get one here.  Aside from that, this is a good place to eat affordably on the strip.  It's part of the Miracle Mile Shops, but the entrance is located on the outside of the shops.  There's plenty of seating and TVs everywhere for watching whatever is on.    As the name suggests, they have a large variety of nachos to choose from.  I couldn't decide which one to get, so I chose the Burger Nachos ($13.50) because it had a star next to it.  It had everything a burger would normally have, but tasted a lot like a taco salad.  They weren't bad, but something I could easily put together at home.  I was more impressed by my friend's enchilada nachos.  It tasted just like enchiladas, but in nacho form.  It's a cool place to go with your friends and grab a casual bite.  Just don't get the house margarita.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Burger Nachos

e8ckjofTgvG0h9lmujQTTA.text: So delicious! We had the vegan loaded nachos and vegan burrito. Both were so good. We will definitely be back on our next trip to Vegas.

rFHsne_TLshiva97ugpUNA.text: Not going to lie, my wife and I had an AMZING time here. We sat at the bar and were thoroughly entertained by the bar tender who obviously just woke up to start his 8pm shift. We drank mags, did shots, and ate fajitas! Honestly I had very low expectations for this place but we were absolutely pleasantly surprised. Now I will say that the food was decent, the margs were great but we also fell into a really fun experience. If we hadn't of bantered with the bar tender this place would have just been another chain Mexican restaurant. My recommendation is to sit at the bar and chat up the bar tenders. They're good peeps.

6ku8QYP8CxS4dUiuWeFffA.text: So delicious, Litzs is AMAZING  happy hour is daily so be sure to stop by! Plus pitchers of Margaritas

mcy1zu4nef4QwE7dDGE4-Q.text: Man this spot was GOOD!  Went with family and we all loved it. I had the lobster nachos and wife had the steak nachos. AMAZING! Coming back to try new combinations

r2zgM37NPLo1r3icJCw83A.text: Burger nachos were great! We got as an appetizer, but I'd prob order that just for the meal.... so good... My chicken chimichanga was kind of dry. It needed sauce or salsa. Our waitress however never came by after taking our order so I had to have it dry. Waited 40 min for a table when there were a few empty tables. The one we eventually got was empty the whole time. The wait along the the poor service brought my rating down but didn't completely ruin the experience. Maybe they were just short handed. I'd still go back.

iOSx7ipnJYX2ajAotKHLbg.text: Good food, very nice staff and great happy hour prices, what else can you ask for. Great assortment of nachos

Nbb5SF83rAHTrjXs2LiSdw.text: Great food. Many vegan options. Best vegan food I've had at a restaurant since changing my diet. Went twice and shared nachos with my partner the next day. Very filling and we couldn't finish it. Rest of dinner party enjoyed at well. No complaints.

epozg27SaK09JoisQKBq_w.text: We LOVE this place and will definitely be back!   Tasty, fresh food and good service.  It is reasonably priced for Vegas and the nachos were wonderful.  No camplaints except, I was too full to eat more!   We ate at a couple of less than stellar meals at other places and our comment afterwards was " we should have just gone back to Nacho Daddy!"

22iqUWmzost24UzrzP4phQ.text: Seriously the best place for nachos. I come here all the time, pulled pork nachos are the best(Mic Drop). Huck is my favorite server in Vegas. He just gets me, and he's all around awesome.

TD8-3gL79OVQ4qwLLtEVug.text: I came to Vegas to shoot a couple of days and was afraid there'd be no vegan options around. Jumped on Yelp and found Nacho Daddy. I couldn't believe it was rated number one when I searched "vegan", so I called and was told they had an entire menu!  Long story short I head over and went back three times! The Kale salad was a stand out for me, lots of fresh veggies with a fresh vinaigrette dressing. But the menu has all kinds of vegan mexican food! And The margaritas are bomb! The staff is really friendly and the crowd was chill. Thanks for having those options!

bAG8UDzM4nRSoBtQYYahqg.text: This place won't disappoint fiesta nachos are delicious and the ultimate enchilada platter was bomb , our sever Vince was amazing very attentive , was always around asking us if we're fine he was great would come back to nacho daddy for the food the service everything keep up the good work Vince .
