tp9XSDvjQq4xYM1Jw_jEOg.text: Right when you walk in there is a tank filled with 4-6 scorpions and crickets!  They have plenty of seating but it is a little hard to get into. I'd recommend parking at planet Hollywood and then walking through miracle mile and then walking outside.  Free margarita with check in!  Also ordered the enchiladas and they were pretty tasty! Good amount of cheese and great value for the price!  Our waitress was also amazing! Made sure everything went smoothly and separated checks with no hassle!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Free margarita with check in!

D7AqLOczw4MrJKeDFntFHg.text: We came in with a very large group of about 18 people. We made a reservation in advance but they didn't seem very prepared for us. Lots of screw ups with our orders but overall everyone enjoyed their food. I had the filet mignon tacos which were delcious and my husband loved his filet mignon nachos. Nobody had a complaint on the taste of the food. The only complaints were that we did not receive what was ordered. They did fix almost everyones order and it all worked out in the end. I would come back again.

Ide77eoP5DPPatACIbXaeA.text: Will not be going back to this location. First off I'm vegan but my husband is not. Thought it would be a good place to dine since they cater to both. I have gotten the vegan loaded nachos 2 other times prior to vist at this location & once at there other location on the westside. Everytime ordering the same thing vegan loaded nachos. My 1st experience ordering thru uber eats was fantastic.  I got everything plus more it arrived with a white vegan sauce & a yellow vegan cheese sauce ( mind you I never ordered this before) and this is what I got. I really enjoyed them & thought I have a new spot to get good vegan food. Then my 2nd uber eats order from same location everything went wrong I got a completely different experienc & order. Nothing like my 1st order I only one cheese sauce (yellow), no sour cream, no guacamole, no white cheese , no salsa so uber eats refinded my money. Went to dine in at other location on the westside & again was served 2 different cheese sauce at no extra charge everything was right.Then last night at downtown location I was charged $2 for asking for the white cheese sauce after getting my order with only the yellow cheese. 1st I asked to get both cheese sauces on the side our food comes out & I have NO Cheese sauces.  I sat waiting for my cheese sauces while my food got cold trying to get attention of our waiter tait who was just a blur running all over the Restaurant  when I finally got his attention I let him no I got no cheese sauce for my nachos. He told me he would get them as I  sat waiting & watching him do everything else but get my cheese sauce. I finally see a mgr & told him what happened & he immediately brings me out only the yellow cheese sauce so I start eating but I really wanted the white sauce that I'm use to & i like it better. So after flagging our waiter down I told him I still didn't get the white sauce so he had someone bring it out too me it was such a small bowl so I asked for another one then he let's me know I will be charged $1 so I said ok. I get my bill then I'm charged $2 so I asked why I got an extra charge when the white sauce is apart of the order & tells me it's not. I go on to tell him that I have ordered this many times from this location & other location and was never charged extra. He basically looks at me like I'm making this up or I miss understood all my previous orders @ this location & the other location.  He tells me that the white sauce is extra charge & that whom ever did my orders were wrong that its extra. So guess what that $2 he charged me for the white cheese sauce was his tip. Won't eat there again in person or uber eats.

pafBDkt30kg5UymK1fbhCQ.text: Delicious kid meals, nachos big enough for two (I ate it all by myself), fajitas for one that were also big enough for two, and great drinks...only thing bad was the inappropriate music videos that my kids couldn't look away from because they have TVs everywhere.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Dinner for the scorpion

PTn1qLy0suqFYnj-WRPfBg.text: Chances Of Going Back: 2/5 Would Suggest To Others? Yes What I Ordered: American Tacos (Ground Beef): 3/5 Murf's Tip: Check in on Yelp for a free margarita!  (+) - Cool Venue - Friendly Service - You Get A Free Drink!  (-) - The Meat Did Not Taste Fresh - Pretty Pricey  Nacho Daddy is what Yelp says a 3 star place is..."A-OK". The venue itself is a cool theme with televisions everywhere. Nacho Daddy is a cool place to catch a Golden Knights game or your favorite out of town team. The staff at Nacho Daddy is friendly and the food comes out fairly quick. The food is where the rating fell off. By no means was the food bad, but it also wasn't what we were hoping for either. The taco meat tasted like it had been sitting in a warming tray for a few hours. I always give places some credit, so judging by past reviews, I am going to guess we went at the wrong time or an off night.

YpFBlh_s_-eniDIWfUNnog.text: The nachos were delicious, and same with the avocado street tacos! Great option for vegetarians/vegans also.

QIYiGAsgT6GeTgYde48frA.text: So yummy!!!!!!! Cant wait to try more nachos! Great environment and great service!  Every time we come into town. Make sure you call ahead because it's so delicious it gets packed!!!! It would be fun to have small nacho and margarita "flights"

flSw5YjtUVi9DT0OvQcwvw.text: Don't get me wrong the food is delicious... but the service was absolutely terrible... we got zero refills, my margarita didn't come till after my food arrived. Only highlight of coming here was the free house marg.

The Yelp check-in offer was an excellent deal and if you don't want the house margarita, you can be apply it to any margarita on their menu for a discount. The chips, salsa, guacamole, and queso appetizer was perfect to share and a good start to the meal. I had the shrimp fajitas that could easily be shared by two people. It was delicious, only wish I could've eaten more. Highly recommend Nacho Daddy!!!

1HaUXTlXGxINqS_lu4SDaA.text: Cool bar, cool staff, Mexican Candy margarita is amazing.  strongest margs in the world.  they even give back massages as you eat.  god bless them for the back massages.

g4-A98tTCmrxsLfU50cdRQ.text: First timer here and the food was amazing. I was totally surprised by how many vegan options they had. We had an awesome waitress named litzs. So amazing and want to come back for more

sPCk-deANAZG_q7uYIsUyQ.text: The filet mignon tacos are the Sh*@! We loved this place great food! We got lured in due to the check in and a free Margarita. The Yelp rating is key when visiting Vegas! New indy food is kinda clutch! Decor....great food a must in the city of sin!

KevmFJMqM3EKRmqmj5NfEg.text: Came here late on Thursday, not real busy, decor was rustic, staff was friendly.  She ordered a Margarita while we waited.  She had a smothered chicken burrito and I had the super nachos.  While the food was very good, and plentiful, we waited for what seemed like forever and her margarita never came.  Then the food showed up followed by her margarita.  About 10 seconds later our waitress appeared for the first time since ordering.  Though we watched her talking with other staff in the kitchen, she gave us some bull about being really busy and someone else must've forgotten about her margarita.  We told her it just came and the manager comped the margarita.  If it weren't for the food being very good this would not be a recommending review.  But the food was worth it and the comped margarita softened the blow.  The pricing was good as well, not expensive at all.

dP4MC9PwZ0fkq5lMVW_L-w.text: Everything my husband and I are ordered was delicious! (Buffalo nachos & chili lime shrimp tacos) Including my sons bean and cheese burrito. It was a fun little spot with really good food and awesome waiters. Every single waiter I came across was friendly and friendly to my wild toddler. They made us feel very welcome and it definitely helps that the food was very enjoyable.

aqhamVPojdJSNX7yDuPAjA.text: When we arrived it was pretty packed so we had to choose between waiting or eating at the bar. We were so hungry that we elected to sit at the bar. We got served pretty quickly, which was great.   I ordered the Vegan Loaded Nachos but asked for regular yellow cheese instead. I...don't know that I made a good choice aha. It didn't taste like the traditional nacho cheese you have at sporting events and such. I think it just threw me off because it was not what I expected.   We also ordered the Buffalo Hot Nacho and my guy thoroughly enjoyed them!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Loaded Nachos (sub yellow cheese)
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Front

PK31RlcYDUf4EhcsSb5Itg.text: First visit, good mexican food n even better drinks! Ordered Virgin Margarita and Virgin Pina Colada, absolutely refreshing margarita. The Pina Colada had the right blend of coconut and pineapple- oh! So frothy.  Followed by Mexican corn in mayo and hot sauce drizzled with lime - absolutely refreshing with warm notes of spice. Not too overpowering.  Next in line Shrimp Ceviche - marinated fresh shrimp, with avocado, tomatoes, cilantro and lime. Accompanied by a dip - fresh, vibrant and flavorful.  The finale was Cheesy Enchilada - right blend of sauce, cheese and rice. 4* for 2 points, absolutely no salt! Had to adjust salt in ceviche, corn and enchiladas. Service could be better - no smile, way too stiff.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shrimp Ceviche

HCFdv143ZfHQthDjaKReoQ.text: Shared a Filet Mignon Nacho with the hubby. Portion is perfect for two hungry people.  The meat is tender and yummy. I felt a definite lack of cheese and beans on the nacho, this feeling was deepened by the overflowing sea salsa or pico de gallo drenching all the toppings and chips...  I feel like the nacho deserves a three star rating but our bartender/server (we sat at the bar) Scarlet was friendly, efficient, and gorgeous! Also, I think if I just got the sea of red sauce on the side...I would have probably enjoyed the food much more.   All in all, not sure if I would return on the next trip. If I do, it might be to try the fish taco.

LwUjKrBzj2v8NX1WthLX9A.text: The food was so good... our party had lots of dietary restrictions. Our server sat down with us & found the right food for us to eat. I ate everything so fast. I was going to give 4 stars because I felt sick after.  But I think that was my fault because  I ate way to fast because I was so happy !

JzgAwhvuU0w300O_fHNonA.text: TL;DR  - great variety of menu options, vegan-friendly, a variety of alcohol choices, and great service.   I came here for my Vegas trip because my boyfriend had wanted to try this place since last year! It was busy with an average of a 30 to 45-minute wait. Since it was on the strip, the wait was not as bad since we were able to walk around until they gave us a quick message to come back. That was very convenient.  As we sat down, our server was already attentive and provided us drinks and recommendations (since it was our first time) of the menu. My boyfriend got the VEGAS golden knights nacho and I got what our server recommended for tacos, the filet mignon tacos platter which came with two huge tacos, rice, and beans. I also got myself a margarita for fun and man, was it pretty strong. The food was absolutely filling, big in portions, and delicious.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

eUFfyfyFXwKaPd6hewOhQw.text: Not great. Margaritas taste Horrible (way too much powder mix). The nachos were subpar at best. Only reason it gets 2 stars is because the service/staff were all really nice

d-9qxklhLbXONGpWzI5Kbw.text: I am a huge fan of nachos and this is a perfect place for a nacho lover. They have many variety's of nachos and have huge portions. They are piled high with toppings so it's not just all chips with no fixings. My wife and I shared the chicken fiesta nachos with chicken enchiladas. The enchiladas were fabulous as well. All their meals are so big I recommend sharing if you wanna complete your meal.   The restaurant is located at the end of the strip across from New York New York hotel. The restaurant was super clean and no wait when we arrived. Even with our waiter training a new waitress employee the service was super fast and very friendly. Gonna be a go to restaurant when I am back in Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nacho
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Enchiladas

Zz_BoQDOu0etkRiA9NSGbg.text: Use the Yelp offer for a free margarita. Fun vibe, games were on, nachos were tasty, and server was wonderful. I'd go back in a second.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Great specials at Nacho Daddy!

JuGCXSpI44tSndD65sq68Q.text: Definitely worth a visit! My family and I randomly were craving nachos and happened to come across this place on Google, and so tried it out and wow it was amazing. The nacho plates are so big and filled with so many components! The flavors on the dish compliment each other so well, and it really proves to be on a different level of nachos. They also have an assortment of different options, so if you're not a nacho person you can still find something that you'd like.   Along with the amazing food, the service is incredible. The waiters and waitresses are so much fun and are so nice, it really sets up the customer to have the time of their life while eating the best nachos ever!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nacho!

P1rfr3BKb1dnOQPMCxD4Nw.text: YUM!! Love this concept of a restaurant! They really do serve the best nachos, and guess what? They're also PERFECTLY layered. You don't have to worry about the lack of toppings once you get to the last of the tortilla chips. I'm huge about that, and the chips/meat/toppings proportions are very generous.  If that hasn't convinced you to try Nacho Daddy yet, I don't know what will!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Tostada Nacho

Vi6tqwkTcTItMvXCKPhYeQ.text: If you take nothing else away from this review, remember this: order the carne asada burrito. I know what you're thinking, "the place is called NACHO DADDY, not burrito Daddy." But trust me, get the carne asada burrito - your tastebuds will thank me later.   My husband and I waited for about 15-20 minutes on a Saturday night before being seated at our table. We split an order of filet mignon nachos and also shared a carne asada burrito. Both were DIVINE. But the carne asada burrito absolutely stole the show. The tortilla was light and flaky which made it easier to take bites out of the burrito. The meat was flavorful. The pico on the burrito was fresh. It was everything burrito dreams are made of. To top it off we also took advantage of the free margarita for yelpers.   Our server was quick, knowledgeable and attentive. She helped us choose between my beloved carne asada burrito and boneless wings. She also allowed us to get two FREE margaritas!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet Mignon Nacho

a88Wb7kR3lXw8DCPaiYQkA.text: Holy. Huge. Portions.   A lot of gluten free options and taste soo good! Their queso dip is even GF which was soo tasty and nice to have that option. We got the fajita nachos and chicken enchilada nachos. Three very hungry women couldn't finish the two nachos and a "triple dip" appetizer.   We ordered a pitcher of margaritas and were disappointed with the amount of ice in the pitcher. The skinny marg was tasty, but it was more ice than liquid.   Very tasty and lots of gluten free options. Will be back next time I'm in Vegas.

Ow2HRQxIkedIj6xpZc0k7A.text: My girlfriend and I came looking for some late night eats after a long day and after some yelling, I came across this restaurant.   We parked in the free multistory parking building nearby and found parking fairly quickly. Finding the restaurant was a little tricky because I thought it was inside of the mall but it's actually located outside!  We were greeeted and seated immidiately and were sat with Manny. Manny offered great recommendations and was friendly. We ordered nachos to share which was more than enough for us two. The tostada nachos were delicious. We substituted the ground beef for the shredded chicken and it was incredible. The nachos are loaded! One of the great things I saw mentioned by other helpers was that the nachos never got soggy halfway through. This is very True, each bite, down to the last was just as fresh and crispy as the first.  With check-in, you get a free house margarita. I don't know what it was with this margarita....but it was damn near the best I've ever had. It was just a plain house margarita. Not sure if they make their own sour mix or not but it was just delicious. Even my girlfriend raved about it.  Prices were very fair for the location and portions of food. This place is a must try if you are in Vegas. This is also perfect late night munchie/drunken night food. Service was good, atmosphere was cool. We had a great time!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Vgn5YAegC1XMa5uKgL0Fwg.text: My girlfriend and I came to Vegas for 48 hours found them looking for vegan food. To our surprise they have a very large selection of vegan food they we decided to come for dinner the second night as well. Great service Manny took very good care of us.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Strawberry mimosa
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

KaRVb4v13ff0FUGL_rlyug.text: Want some delicious Mexican food?  Go to Nacho Daddy.  They have big servings and yummy food.  My hubby and I shared the ultimate enchiladas combo, a corn off the cob appetizer a blended margarita.  We were so full that we had no room for dessert.    We sat by the bar since we didn't want to wait for a table.  Our bartender/waitress was very attentive and provided us great service.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

h3TV1TBe2NQh5qvK8asaLQ.text: Nacho Daddy has the best Nachos I have ever tried so far - I loved them so much I went there twice during my stay and lucky for me it wasn't too far from our hotel. The fiesta chicken nachos are really good but the filet mignon nachos knocked it out the park for me. I tried the Golden knight nachos as well and those were a nice different flavor. Only reason I gave them 4 stars instead of 5 is because the service from the hostesses wasn't good both times; it's like they couldn't be bothered.  We sat at the bar the first time and our bartender was really lovely but ordered to-go the second time. Also don't forget to redeem your free drink with yelp check-in

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta chicken nachos to-go
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet Mignon Nacho*

2QCgu2JSFhwAyVuWp6kwWg.text: We found this place on Yelp before we made our trip and we instantly bookmarked it because it was a place that seemed right up our alley. We FINALLY made it there during our last night in Vegas and man, it did not disappoint. First, be sure to check in when you arrive because you get a free margarita when you do! Second, get the nachos. Don't think about it, just order them. As people who get loaded nachos and fries literally everywhere, these have to be in the top 5 we have ever had. They are right when they say no chip left uncovered! It is def large enough for two to split!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

YI3ziTON5klwzHyJuD3hrQ.text: My first stop in Vegas that was close to my hotel and the reviews were pretty good so I decided to have a late dinner before calling it a night. It was about a 5 minute wait for the hostess to  sit a party of 6. The server's name was Mark and he quickly brought us some water and took our orders. Make sure to check-in  at the restaurant because your first house Margarita on ice is on them. The bar is a good size with plenty of TVs if you want to watch a sports game.  I decided to order the fajita mix of chicken and filet mignon for two. It comes with flour tortilla and plenty of cooked onions and peppers to stuff your taco. Overall the service was great, the food was good and prices were fair. Parking is a little tricky. I recommend uber or you can park by nearby garages for a certain price.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Free Margarita with check-in
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bar area

1LM6bi2Vk6ce-Du1DeMNtw.text: **Free margarita with check-in + purchase of an entree**  SERVICE. It was a 20min wait for a table but bar seating was available at no wait, so we went along with that. We had such an awesome server! Her name was Shannon + she took really good care of us, constantly asking us if we needed anything. She was also really sweet and caring. When she found out we went to EDC, she told us to stay hydrated because of her bad experience a few years back. Luckily, this year the weather was so much cooler and we didn't have trouble with overheating. Good advice to stay hydrated in general though.   FOOD. My bf and I shared the lobster and crab nachos drizzled with white queso and serrano aioli. I only wish they distributed the toppings more evenly on top, but I guess it kept the other chips from getting soggy. I also think that the lobster and crab meat was a bit sparse. It felt like sometimes you were digging for buried treasure. Other than that, I really liked the flavors; it had a bit of a kick to it, probs from the sriracha + serrano aioli. Also, the tortilla chips were on the thinner side, so they might break on you if you load it with too much. I prefer the thicker chip myself but I liked how they were warm + made in-house.   I had a really fun experience here! They have tons of TVs to watch sports. The NBA Western Conference finals happened to be playing while we were there, so that was fun to watch. Highly recommend visiting for nachos + a margarita if you're feeling it!

FAJPc83xn1d-cGfPebm0sQ.text: Holy smokes! Right from the start they were awesome. Very friendly and accommodating. Plus the food!!! The waitress was so nice and above and beyond. The margaritas were very good.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Combo taco enchilada
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tostada supreme nachos

Vlaf9en-YGzgG2AKf2o2vQ.text: I shared pulled pork nachos,which is definitely enough for two, and their white queso was to die for. Then we completed our nachos with Carmel apple nachos and it hit the spot! Best experience and great service.

PQetqfbdNbf1ZTz7hd9gLQ.text: I ordered the steak omelette and it was big portioned and filling. You get a free house margarita for checking in! Awesome check in perk! Our waitress was wonderful. She was patient and friendly. This place was big and spacious inside. Lots of seats available inside. I would recommend this place for sure!

DndQ4hth3TX0QlPn1mtaIQ.text: Always a good time here, and food is legit and lots of tequila.!  Definitely check it out when you're in town or downtown Vegas, get their special shot ;) enjoy

6DJ5u5XJ1ZhpJl_4zq6rxg.text: WOAH!!!! I consider myself a nacho connoisseur and if you do as well, this place is a must! There is a whole page of different nachos to choose from! I went with 5 of my friends and we all got a different plate of nachos to try! I got the seafood, which was delicious! It came with shrimp, lobster and crab meat with a creamy queso, sriracha drizzle and fresh jalapenos. One of my favorites that was on the table but honestly, every nacho platter was yummy! From traditional to shrimp, to bbq chicken to pulled pork, I was not disappointed! Also, the drink specials were legit! We got there at 2pm and saw there were bottomless mimosas up until 3pm and then happy hour started at 3pm. You can eat and drink for a decent price and everything was delicious! GO GO GO!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Outside
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Seafood nachos

CKxzvu0q6L3-c7xatzQwvw.text: Over the weekend, my fiance, sister, and my sister's boyfriend and I needed to get some lunch, so since we wanted Mexican food, we picked this spot because you can get a free House Margarita with your Yelp check in :) I'd recommend it - it's a good margarita!!  For an appetizer, we got the Triple Dip and it was really good. I didn't love the salsa, but the queso and quac were both really tasty, and the chips were bottomless which I appreciate lol. Plus, it's a really great option when everyone prefers different dips.   For lunch, I got the Flaming Shrimp (the one in the skillet). They were really good, but I'll admit not quite as good as I was hoping... my fiance got the BBQ Pork Nachos, and while the meat and BBQ sauce was really good, I have to admit we thought this sounded better than it actually was... and in retrospect decided BBQ and nachos maybe isn't the best combo haha.   For those reasons I gave this place four stars... buuut my sister ordered the Southwest Chimichanga appetizer and her boyfriend got the Fiesta Nachos and they loved theirs, so maybe we just ordered wrong!  Other than that, our waitress was really nice but often took a long time to check on us. They were busy though so she maybe just had a lot of tables. Overall this was a good spot, but I'm not sure we'd come back since we aren't in Vegas that often!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Flaming Shrimp
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BBQ Pork Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Triple Dip

r6E2gPT7WGPT7THyWj_CeQ.text: Had the tostada nachos. The no dry chips is the real deal. Service was great. Got us in quick!

h32PBzP3JaNYyYd2CXQu6A.text: Nacho Daddy has some great food and good prices for a restaurant right off the strip. I've been to both the downtown Freemont location and this one, and the food was consistently good. There was a check in special for a free margarita, and it was a tasty average margarita. The service was great, really a pleasant surprise since it was the first March Madness weekend and the place was packed. The street tacos were filling, and my husband was pleasantly surprised by the amount of pork on his tacos. It was about $40 for two for lunch with 2 taco plates, water and a free margarita

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Free margarita

ZRIKwxpfMbEy-zZTYj5fyA.text: 1st time in Vegas, and was looking for a place to eat. Found this place on yelp as most of you are doing now. I ordered the vegan nachos, and a lime margarita. The food was very good, very large serving size. Margarita was blending well, no ice chips just smooth. One thing I enjoyed the most was the vibe, and music. Played a lot of alternative rock like weezer, all American rejects, and Green Day. So it reminisce my high school days. Definitely recommend this place to try it out!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

xz516s6QECx7o4HMDWo0zQ.text: Went for breakfast our first day in Vegas. No wait on a Thursday around 9:30am.   Bf got the sausage egg burrito, it was good but very greasy. He said all the grease pooled at the bottom like a cup, goo! My huevos rancheros were good. Only one waitress (with a trainee) for the main dining room, so service was a little slow.

Rqk5VijOcr7q_vNNRniF-Q.text: Love this place!!  Had their signature drink - spicy cucumber margarita, shared an order of the Golden Knights Nacho and ended with the deep fried ice cream!   Everything was delicious!! Delilah - our waitress was bright and bubbly and all around great!  5 stars for Nacho Daddy!!

g_RRfmiFBnJYKXSakGdb-A.text: Food and drinks were delicious and the desert was just as good maybe better!! Our server Delilah was great !!! 5 star rating on service and food.

Q9-XMB2dPMC1IYzIszZpAA.text: Great  customer service and tasty fun Mexican food. Had the fajita salad with chicken. Order the dressing on the side-otherwise gets a little overdressed. Salsa and chips were really good. Loved the music playing inside. Nice  place to take a break to get out of the heat:)

wLFkzHD9duVqSDQ8AOgQyA.text: Excellent!!  I got the nacho tostado, which was huge and fresh. The chips kept the crunch which was great.   We also got the buffalo chicken nachos.  The buffalo sauce was not mild. The buffalo sauce was very spicy and thick. If you like a hot dish this would be a good choice. It also had excellent cheese that was creamy and not clumpy.   Next time I will try the Asian one!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nacho tostada
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spicy margarita and buffalo nachos

30umy1HsWNuvWQaO-6Ejrg.text: This was a great surprise and experience.  The Nacho special was great and the margaritas were fantastic.  Ambiance was a bit loud and noisy but perfectly fine for Vegas.  The service was very good.  A little dark inside and dare I say "dingy" or "dive-y" but we were fine with it.  Extra bonus for us is when we checked in with Yelp, they were offering a free margarita for a first time check in.

Lz5j7i2hW78YGaV28i23cg.text: Vegan options are soooo gooooood! We had the vegan loaded nachos , vegan quesadilla and burrito. So good. Filling.  Cooked deliciously. They have this location on the strip.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

iZZHPkjKRu5R6E2BQAjQvg.text: Found this place through Yelp and OMG it was worth visiting! My only con was.... the margarita was very sweet. Just hope someday they will open locations such as San Diego!

ke5cCsp1OEb4qqvOPwtwvQ.text: We wandered into Nacho Daddy on the strip, because we got tired of trying to decide "where to eat" after checking into our rooms for a 4 day, girls only outing. We are on the mature end of the adult age scale, so have lots of opinions. We really appreciated our experience at this location!  First off, the greeter was friendly and happily answered some questions we had about our stay in Vegas (nothing to do with the food or Nacho Daddy). Then our server was just the best! Christina "Tina" advised us of special offers we might want to take advantage of.  She made great suggestions off the menu after hearing our dietary concerns. We learned that she was formerly from our home towns and had lively chats regarding our favorite sports teams, and the soon to be new home of the Raiders.  Enjoyed the food (generous portions and made to order). Fun place!!!

-Tw2Rd-bMe3vsrqlZZDL_g.text: Cool place. Came in at a busy time but we got sat imediately. Love the atmosphere of the place, the sign is bright and interesting and when you walk in they have a scorpion tank by the front desk, how cool is that!  The staff was wonderful, she took our orders quickly and was super nice to us.   Food took a while to come out but it was pretty good, not the best but still good. They added a little flair with the food presentation for the flaming shrimp taco where they lit it on fire in front of us.   Overall pretty good!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

_9SqpYy5PQhfcoyYTsGqPw.text: My cousin and I got the Supreme Tostada Nachos. They were good but a little too spicy for me. The bartenders at the bar were quick in making out drinks and very knowledgeable of the menu.   Don't forget to check-in! You'll get a free house margarita if you do! Upgrade to the larger one for only a couple dollars more!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

i-BRdh3RlVBqV42tfFp0yA.text: I haven't been to Nacho Daddy in years, since the one on Eastern. I really wanted to go for my birthday. I didn't know they took reservations so I decided to make one for 5 of us.   The location is a little tricky to get to. It's not inside miracle mile shops or planet Hollywood. We parked at miracle mile and then walked through to go outside to Nacho Daddy. It's pretty big and fun inside. There's lots of TVs for those who are all about sports.   Our server was just great! He was so quick with taking our orders and getting our food out. The enchilada nachos are awesome. There's a lot of chicken and the jalapenos give it a nice little kick. The fajita bowl with steak was delicious. My daughter thought the fries were the best she's had. The kids menu has a nice selection for kids. I wouldn't recommend getting an appetizer of chips and dips if you order nachos. It's quite the chip overload. The dips are tasty but it's just a lot.   Since it was my birthday I got a free dessert. They promised not to sing to me but I got to choose what I wanted. I went with the fried ice cream nachos. So massive!!! I shared with everyone and we still couldn't finish it. The cinnamon chips were my favorite.

1KTbAs7IsJfooEpVNPwV_Q.text: Great place, reasonable prices delicious food and very friendly staff. I would totally eat there again

95CHD8m5S4hxQcoKpL8OPQ.text: Litzs is the best.  She was down to earth and made me feel at home. Thanks for the good time.  This nacho daddy family is the best.

BLMftd87vjWPgktlMz4UMA.text: Prices are reasonable, maybe a bit on the expensive side. I went with some friends and I got the signature chicken tacos. The chicken was really dry. I would not recommend the chicken tacos. Most of the nacho dishes are probably pretty good, hard to get wrong.

YU6B191UNBGXS1BLDziomg.text: Great experience, great service, going back again before we leave town! Loved the vegan options as well.

2hKKT6Di4PSBlpKlSgsapw.text: I am in love with their vegan menu, the best vegan chicken I've had, I actually had to ask the bartender just to make sure that it wasn't real!  I've always had great service here as well!

3RMc27K2Oyigr9v_WBdSEg.text: I came back to nacho daddy for the second time this week because I enjoyed everything from the bubbly server to the hot  geese served to me sadly when I came back it wasn't the same... my server was very passive and wasn't caring and my cheese did not have the lite candle underneath so it was cold gross. I soon hope to forget the experience.

OiIuxdwmI1Rc0CIJzXIlqw.text: One of my favorite restaurants in Vegas! Very close to the strip, so great location, and the food is bomb. We got the bottomless chips and salsa -- definitely worth it! They come out quickly, salsa is good, chips are perfectly salted, so overall great start to the meal. I also ordered the shrimp and steak fajitas, which were good, but cooked in tequila. It made for a great show, but the tequila aftertaste was not something I enjoyed. The rice and beans were good and it came with guac!!! The fries were some of the best I've ever had. Nachos were also delicious, but I was sharing so I only got a few. Service was also good - quick and a good amount of attentive.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

1jKiIGtzMGMQzMrsVytFqQ.text: Best place ever! It's a now must go to place when I go to Vegas! My husband is addicted to hot wings an said hands down they have the best he's ever had. We shared the enchilada nachos an they were so delicious! It was worth the long ass wait times! My white peach margarita was soo delightful! I highly recommend this place. Only complaint is parking but then again you're in Vegas so it's predictable.

dGpLIPnrAPpupBKzGSPFag.text: Alex was awesome!! You can tell she actually enjoys her job and that goes a LONG way when it comes to service. Knowledgeable, fun and attentive. The food was very memorable as well. Definitely will be back next time we're in sin city!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

MTkOaInBc8lctawBllkrhA.text: Beautiful, coolest place to have drinks, watch football and awesome NACHOS , first time and awesome service, clean restroom

yZrYp2e3_9VxmM2bB5EblQ.text: We came in here on a week night for some late night dinner. There was a long wait for an actual table so we sat by the bar. We ordered a mango margharita, the trio dip with chips, the steak tacos, and the lobster and crab tacos. First things first, I like the vibe and the atmosphere. It's a nice place to hang out in groups, and they have nice 90's songs playing int he background and the basketball game going on. A lil something for everyone. The bartenders were great and our cocktail tasted delicious! Then we moved onto the app. I absolutely loved the guacamole and the homemade chips! It was so good. The salsa was good but the queso dip was just okay and we ended up barely touching it. Then we moved on to our tacos. They were probably the least enjoyable. The steak was a bit overdone and dry. It could use some liquid or sauce on it. The lobster and crab taco was also okay. Both tacos were served with double corn tortillas which is usually my fave but it didn't work that well here. I saw some other people's dishes and it looked really good. I wish we had gotten some nachos instead. Overall we had a decent meal and the drinks were great but would come back to try other things instead.

Q71itk3QyDqLy0qgw0hMSw.text: Another visit another great meal. Prime rib nachos and prime rib soft tacos. Great taste and full bar service available and pitchers of margaritas.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

iKTge6rZx-LGBd9VPP7yYw.text: Excellent nachos, but what else did you expect?? The guacamole was fresh, the toppings were colorful and arranged with just the right amount of coverage. Big fan.   Lots to look at too, including wall art, merchandise and a terrarium full of live scorpions. These lovely little insects, apparently, feature in their signature shot, which I refused to be talked into trying (our charming waitress did show us a jar full of them at the bar). Maybe steer clear when hungover   Was fairly empty before noon. We enjoyed a nice breeze and view of the patio from our seats at the bar.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

2Brpff9aRPeeP_8xpCqfaQ.text: Came here for breakfast. Was very pleased. Service was fast and friendly. Ordered chilaquiles and they were delicious. Very fun atmosphere with plenty of TV's.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Sl84W1KoL7OXPWb58-EBhA.text: First time eating here and it was soo good. Luckily I had yelp to help us pick this place to eat. I had the supreme nacho and it was like any other nacho but bigger. My cousin had the flaming filet mignon fajitas and omg it was the bomb! After tasting her food, I had wished I got the same. I also got a margarita and mmmm it was tasty. Although we didnt get a chance to come back before we left home in Hawaii, I am definitely coming back when I return to Vegas.

ykJyCaNjFF6cjHNWbTbVwA.text: So much yum!! This place is so unique and SO GOOD!!! Huck was our server and he was super attentive and fun. We got the Vegas Knight nacho which has filet steak on it and oh boy was it delicious!!

63GfbA3bQ1OBhZJkKl8q9Q.text: Came here for breakfast. We tried the Bacon-Cheese Enchiladas Rancheros and Chilaquiles. It had a fun atmosphere, I wish we went back for the nachos! Will try again next time.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

9vOYJQvjf8cyY6Hq5KKihQ.text: Ok..... So, I'm trying to be nice here because my friend really wanted to bring us here. Let me start off with the nachos where Bomb! However you should not sell a pitcher of michelada if you don't know how to make it. Even the bartender said it was not his fav. After we pretty much asked for extra lime/salt/pepper shit they should just bring the ingredients and have the customers make their own. Anyways, as we where finishing up the bomb nachos... a lady on a date near us asked for a margarita, she took one sip and made a face, had a second sip and sent it back she said it was nasty. Her face said it all. I'm sure it's the same face we all made when we drank out of our micheladas. I just remembered there where 2 girls sitting at the bar they also ordered 2 micheladas they made a face when they drank out of it and left half of their micheladas as they left. Maybe you should reconsider the mixed drinks. Or hire someone to help you figure out the correct ratios for them.

uTarMH_sj3yBe3glVbbOcA.text: Have stopped in at Nacho Daddy, 4 of last 5 trips to Vegas. This time was a request of my daughter, post Ka show.   roasted corn off the cob, is good. The funkiness of the cotijo cheese sits well with the corn's sweetness.   Knights Nachos were as good as a hat trick in a victory. Filet mignon was very tasty (marinated) and tender compared to any other "steak" nachos out there. 3 cheeses all over and the added sweetness of the sauted onions was a nice surprise. Peppers (green/ red) had good flavor and a hint of spice, bordering a philly cheese steak.(i mean that as a compliment) There were a few mushrooms thinly sliced and hidden in the nachos, would like more of that, good flavor and just wanted more.   Spicy Nachos - unfortunatley i didnt get too taste much because it was quickly devoured by my wife and daughter. The shrimp used was cooked appropriately, was anticipating an over cooked previously frozen shrimp. This may have been prev frozen but the texture was excellently firm.    I always have a shot or 3 of the Kimo Sabe Resposado on my visits.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. spicy Spicy Shrimp Nacho Gluten Free
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. close - Golden Knights Nacho
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. shotnof Kimo Sabe Reposado  Spicy Cucumber Margarita

oIl8HD1QbJr0KQsYbBjasQ.text: Bad service, bad attitudes and horrible Management. Never coming here again. I'll go eat some white castle next to you guys and get my moneys worth, (and I don't like White Castle).

0w6q2w7kUdCfhAEoYpouwA.text: First and foremost we have been initiated with our scorpion shots. Our amazing server Litzs was kind enough to share some pro tips with us. She went above and beyond and made this one night to remember.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shots shots shots

bk4Wt3AHyRlnAq4cJ-zcEg.text: This place is great. Food portion is huge. Could have definitely shared a meal.  I got the grilled fish tacos and my husband the smothered chicken burrito. Neither of them disappoint.  Will definitely be back

ZtkYUnB_yXW4fPFmAngB9g.text: I like this place. Looks like part of a local chain but the service was still friendly and the waitress was nice. The restaurant is about a block from the strip, and is definitely walkable from the strip.  I ordered lobster and crab soft tacos (the priciest soft tacos they had on the menu...prolly coz of the seafood) and loved that the food wasn't heavy. The tacos tasted fresh and light...and unlike many other mexican places I went to where you felt sluggish, bloated and sleepy afterwards...I felt energized after eating those tacos for sure.  Prices were reasonable, especially given the fact that they are in close vicinity from the strip. The waitress was also attentive, too. She was friendly and worked to refill our sodas promptly and took care of bringing the bill at the right timing as well.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster and crab soft tacos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pork burrito

vLX3NkvWCgYUQDQtdppetg.text: Definitely great food and right off the strip. The best thing for me was the margaritas!!!! Absolutely recommend trying the alcohol

7hWsBskm7NEzt3qMcam2mw.text: Good grief!  Nachos are huge and amazing!  We had BBQ and the Golden Knights.  The yelp margarita was fantastic

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

K_1oCoxxrVpIRb9fKF6Uqg.text: This is a review for a quick dinner on a Vegas night.  My husband and I were looking for something delicious to eat and nachos always sound good.  Combine this with the fact that it was taco Tuesday, and off to Nacho Daddy we went.  It was a quick Lyft ride from the NYNY where we are staying.  I highly recommend taking grandma to Vegas with you to watch the kids at night!    We weren't really sure what to expect.  On a Tuesday night, Nacho Daddy was pretty mellow.  When we walked in, I noticed a huge terrarium just inside with giant scorpions as long as your middle finger.  Yikes!  Of course, my husband thought it was cool.  We decided to sit at the bar.  Our bartender was a cool kid who had been working there for a few months.  He was very helpful as we asked about the nachos and tacos.  We went with the carne asada nachos and three chicken tacos/three carnitas tacos for $5 each (taco Tuesday deal).  I can tell you that the nachos were legit, super delicious.  Tacos were very good as well.  Pork tacos were stuffed with carnitas.  Can't forget to mention the drinks - I had a margarita.  It was classic and came with the right amount of salt.  My husband is a daredevil and went with a tequila shot with a (dead) scorpion on it.  Why?  I don't know.  Apparently they buy these dead scorpions by the jar from Arizona and people actually eat them - as did my husband.  He also bought one for the bartender.  They are allowed to accept up to two shots per shift from customers, haha.  Definitely worth a stop!  Check out the giant scorpion and have some nachos.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nachos and taco Tuesday pork and chicken tacos ($5 for three, they are bursting with meat)
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Close-up of filet nachos - bomb
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Daddy&#39;s Margarita  (not the house margarita you get with Yelp check-in, that comes in a mason jar)

lGaYX_Jt5UfM1Klrsl4p3A.text: First stop on our Vegas trip based on the reviews and it was totally meh. Sat at the bar. Music was good.  Bartender seemed miserable which put a damper on the experience. Ordered the fajita nachos with "filet mignon", no beans. Came out WITH the beans. Barely any meat. Totally bland. Major disappointment. Taco Bell cantina right up the road was much more satisfying later that night!

SO5OTK01zMYSqDivmbpN5A.text: The nachos were delicious (we got the supreme tostada nachos). The service was friendly as well; we had Sofia as our waitress. I'd definitely recommend stopping if you love nachos!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

eD54OIml1amgcP8MZUIL_Q.text: Yum yum yum!  Went here based on the Yelp reviews. Our server was so friendly and we received great service - wish we would have written down his name.  We ordered 3 nachos (Supreme Tostada Nacho, Chicken Tinga and Thai nachos). All were delicious but our favorite were the Thai nachos - so good.  We'll definitely be back, but I think we'll get 2 orders of the Thai nachos next time.

lkUkTSAYiW_jACPBrWYBYw.text: Great Nachos! It was the filet mignon nachos. Service at the bar was good. The nachos were delicious. The meat was of good quality. The nacho chips were not greasy or taste stale either. Thankfully the nachos were not overfilled with beans like most places. Good ratio with all the ingredients and good quality! Plus the name of th place is my favorite part.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carne Asada Nachos

4HUinpJ3Qhm3YT4OlXqf9w.text: Good spot right off the strip near Miracle Mile. There was a bit of a wait at 7:30pm so I walked over to the bar and was able grab a seat immediately. The menu was pretty extensive with a variety of nacho, taco, enchilada and fajitas choices.  After looking over the menu I decided to go with the filet mignon and shrimp fajitas. This place is known for its scorpion shot which features a real scorpion. I wasn't feeling that adventurous so I went with the Cadillac Margarita instead. The margarita was good and made with house made sweet and sour and premium liquor. The fajitas were served table side sizzling and what you would expect from a spot like Daddy Nacho. The filet was tender with a good portion of shrimp mixed with peppers, onions, jalapenos and cherry tomatoes. I was particularly pleased with the side of rice, refried beans, guacamole, lettuce and pickled onions that accompanied the fajitas. Overall a good spot that I'll be sure to visit again.   Tip: Check in on Yelp to receive a free house margarita.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

CJtsJk9n6oQaycWvCv6JFw.text: This is by far the best vegan meat product I've ever had. The vegan chicken nachos are amazing, if everything vegan tasted like this the entire world would switch in a heartbeat because they wouldn't know the difference. 100% will be back it was amazing!

IdWWfN2AlGZRM5Lzz9APBQ.text: I felt the prices were expensive for nachos!  Service average.  Average cleanliness.  Only cool thing was they set your fahitas on fire at the table!  Had to ask for more tortillas.  There are better places to eat at in Vegas for the same price with better service.

gYGdm5FcJ-G4BTmD6VRLmQ.text: It just doesn't get better.  Amazing bartenders and food.   Your belly and wallet will thank you. Best of Vegas for sure.

24e-UBsa7noDeFrVe_EB0Q.text: A pretty ideal late night snack. Massive portions, solid flavor and quality, tastes better when slightly (or more than slightly - hey, it's Vegas, give me a break) intoxicated. Located in Planet Hollywood, but off Las Vegas Blvd.   Did I mention the portions are huge? My appetite is far from small, but that could have satisfied at least 2 of me.

TN82PGEKkn9LwO0jnCVbCg.text: Ryan our waitress was excellent! I love the fact that they had a vegan menu! The loaded vegan nachos was bomb! We also did the beer battered avocado street tacos, um.. hell yes! We also got the michelada and the margarita. I could have probably have skipped the michelada, but I have an unusually high expectation for those, so I don't even take that into consideration when I am reviewing a place. Overall this is going to be a must visit every time I visit Vegas! Great job on the decor and location for this place as well!

UBcsCPjo_QoAq5tnVNekCw.text: REALLY yummy & flavorful vegan nachos; their chicken DOES taste like chicken! I don't have pictures since my bf and I were hungry and just devoured it on the Megabus. He got the Vegan Chick'n Nachos ($16.50) and I got the Vegan Fajita Bowl ($13.95).   The overall portions are filling, worth for Vegas price. We both had to take a break and finish it a few hours later lol. A must visit for vegans in Vegas!

6xQeTcoh1C02FUXyxSCI8Q.text: My favorite spot to get a bite to eat in Vegas! Reasonably priced, filet mignon nachos are delish, and top it off with a spicy Cucumber margarita....what else do you need?! The service is always on point and the wait is never long. Found this spot because my sister is vegan and they have an excellent extensive vegan menu. The vegan fajitas are bomb! A+++

cWYuW6QuqxqvkquFqGs8kg.text: Spicy Garlic Shrimp Nachos with House Made Spinach Chips were #DELICIOUS! I couldn't help but indulge in the Churro Sundae (Extra Caramel Drizzle). Booker the Bartender was very friendly with excellent customer service! More than likely I'll be eating here for the next three days while in training.

1k29bf8VbZc4Gkftdd2mTQ.text: This place is very good. My nachos were cold I got the 4 cheese nachos. But the server Alexius really made the experience so much better and the reason we gave 5 stars. She was extremely friendly and gave us good information and recommendations. The jalapeno margarita was yummy. I would recommend it

DnM2IlhBE7EwmRbSAzheaA.text: We were in Vegas for just one night and I needed a restaurant with vegan options.  This was right outside of Planet Hollywood where we were staying.  The ambiance was great and the restaurant and staff had a relaxed and welcoming vibe.  We ordered the vegan nachos and the enchilada nachos and they were terrific! The portions  were huge and my first thought was we are never going to finish all of this but we did! Every chip had a topping not a pile of plain chips like you get sometimes in other restaurants.  We also enjoyed the free house margarita for checking in on Yelp and a few $5 happy hour margaritas as well.  I wish our visit was longer so I could have went back.  There was a whole page of vegan options that looked amazing.  It will be my first stop next time I'm in Vegas!

VwS99hsQye4fho1sto8lUw.text: What an awesome name, too bad I have 1 bad experience to go with this establishment. My main gripe was that the buffalo nachos were just downright gross. I'm not sure if the buffalo chicken wasn't cooked properly or if buffalo sauce just doesn't go well with nachos. In any case, my recommendation is to never order it.  That said, this place isn't half bad, the drinks are decent and the waitresses were nice. I'm giving this place an extra star just because of the name.  I might give this place another chance if I stay at the Cosmo or any other hotel that's nearby.

TwnptS-Dfp3Q0BMFj-SkFQ.text: Love This Place!  Everytime we are in Vegas,  we find ourselves enjoying Nacho Daddy.  We ordered the queso, guacamole, chip sampler.   I highly recommend.  It's delicious.   Our Main course was Ultimate Enchilada.  So perfect!  (My husband and I share meals.  Room for dessert) :)

32f8LvX_S7p7yFQVVU2tgg.text: if you're looking for mexican food on the strip look no further, had an unreal loaded up nacho and a delicious California Burrito.

7uBzYYs0LJd32aFb3o4Mzw.text: Great service and patient staff. Was seated right away (party of 12) during a busy time and accommodating for all of our visit.  Didn't feel like the music was too loud, like some places on the strip but was still enjoyable with large TVs in every direction.  Portion sizes were large and the grilled corn appetizer was amazing

_ua1c9Nsl61SObDidmml1A.text: Bombbbbbbbbbbb af!!! Fave vegan breakfast spot in Vegas. The nachos are a must. Margs are on point. Hostess is not too pleasant. Still worth it though. Come here!!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

fpewj66xT3vM8ovHfOnUCg.text: Yessssss. Vegan cheese that tastes good. Not just good, but great. Everything tastes amazing and having multiple vegan options rules. The avocado street tacos are so good

8mwYWTdyNrAxOOSp2neJOQ.text: I just absolutely love this place. My first time here was perfect and same with my second time. I will alwaya stop by to eat here whenever I'm in Vegas. However, my third time was very interesting. The wait was pretty long. I was told it could be around 45 mins or more for a party of 6 and i said it was fine. We got our table in 10 mins. It was great. We ordered food and it took pretty long but i totally understand because it's so packed. But right when my friends got their food, i was told that they ran out of the food I ordered which was depressing because i wanted it. But they asked me if i wanted something else and I ordered another item. It actually took forever to get my food. I was told the kitchen is backed up like a few times. By the time i got my food, my friend were done eating. Our server, Mark. I think? He was being so cool about it and updating me what was going on and how he kept apologizing. He was honestly a great server. And i believe the manager there took care of our food. It really sucked what happened to my food and my experience there but Mark was being such an amazing server. He broke the scale for providing great service!

0whfk5bP5kIe_Ycsv1-19g.text: The food was good but how disappointing to be given a menu with the current special that's apparently not current. And instead of telling me that right away the waiter tells me they can make it anyway no problem. So everyone's orders get put it and then he comes back to tell me they can't make mine. So I have to figure out what else to get which means everyone else's orders come our way ahead of mine.

9zEsm4LsMnyACmH89Smatw.text: Great place. A lot of fun. A friend had the shot with a real scorpion in it but I stayed away. The food was perfect for cinco de quatro celebration. Not the best Mexican food but good enough. I will go back. I recommend the nachos.

QgLqOS5kLkzM9zMO11gYcg.text: Nacho Daddy is the racists place I've ever been to. The manager is a bitch. He threw someone out over wanting a refund. I will NEVER EVER come back to this place. I watched this situation unfold and the manger acted so immature and was being racist.

z-Mo4kWdDuY5dr1Rsi4G4w.text: Great place!!! Wow will be back for sure !! Fast service great vegan food and great staff

GY4Gb80f7yiCfI8IiOny-w.text: Not so great food as they recommended nachos more tortilla than anything the mix fajitas was mostly bell peppers onions and tomatoes hardly any beef and shrimp. Sadly won't be back or will not recommend

8j7uvMZjIYE6kUPktg5BOQ.text: Great place for Mexican food! Phenomenal service, excellent quality food, and nice vibe. Nacho Daddy adheres to vegetarian diets! We were drawn in because of the 2900+ awesome reviews! We got Vince as our server and he was awesome!!! Extremely nice and hospitable.  We had an issue at the very end because we subbed black beans instead of meat on our food and we were charged $1.50 x 2 (you would think it'd be cheaper because beans are cheaper than meat, not more), but the manager, Edward was great and removed those charges for us.  Will be back again!

qATB9Xf7EHinfHzS47kWrA.text: Probably one of the best values on the strip. I had the chicken Tinga Nachos and what a treat! Fresh chips, fresh meat and obviously well thought out flavors.  Service was kind, courteous and prompt by hostess, server (Manny) and food runner.  I hate recommending good places because they inevitably become more popular and busy!  Well I will definitely be back on my next visit to Las Vegas!   Location is convenient to well, everywhere.  I stayed at Bellagio and watched the fountains on the way.  Go here!

0P37HrO2IvP6YPafj8lz8Q.text: Awesome! The portions are HUGE..great wait staff. I'd recommend giving yourself an extra 15 minutes to be seated if you're going there during peak time.

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spicy Grilled Wings

Bd9DIyu5mKbt0X2z6Dta0w.text: The nachos were delicious and the queso is a must!! I had a fajita burrito and that was also a winner. My friends may have even liked my entree more than theirs!  I recommend it if you're looking for Mexican on the strip, not too pricey and tv's everywhere.   Make sure to check in and get the free margarita!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Czgnd-h0HlXnmFolAI4QBw.text: We stopped here for dinner because of the yelp check in (free house margarita with entree) and the close location to our hotel (Signature at MGM). We ended up coming here 3 times during our trip! They have happy hour on Monday-Friday 3-6, $5 margaritas and specials on other drinks/food  1. The frozen house margarita is awesome! Some previous reviews say it's not strong, but it was plenty strong for us, 28 & 30! ;p And not too sweet also.   2. My husband's favorite was the chicken enchilada nachos with both red & green sauce. I got the kale salad with shredded chicken 2 times! It was full of big pieces of veggies, a big salad, and the shredded chicken was great. For $10.50! We don't get great salads for that price in OKC.   3. For happy hour we got the mini BBQ chicken nachos & mini nacho average burger nachos. My husband really liked the nacho average burger nachos, meat seasoned well and lots of lettuce/tomatoes. The BBQ chicken had too much BBQ sauce for our taste. The toppings were good, just overpowered by the BBQ sauce.  Like I said, we made 3 stops here and I also bought a tank top with the silly nacho daddy on it. We will definitely return next time in Vegas!  Update: Returned to Vegas a year later and made 2 trips to Nacho Daddy again! We love this place! Can't get over how good the frozen house margaritas are!! I also love how they show music videos on some of the TV's while the song is playing. A lot of 90's-2000's music plays which appeals to us.   We tried some breakfast dishes this time. I had the the vegetable omelet - it was so good! Stuffed FULL of fresh veggies. Philip had the Bacon-cheese enchiladas rancheros. He said the bacon was amazing and enjoyed the dish.  Again, 5 stars for Nacho Daddy! Thanks for making our Vegas trips delicious! :)

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bacon-cheese enchiladas rancheros
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegetable omelet with hash browns and salsa (and frozen house margarita!)

cIf7gY_0-nYJDECI63cTGQ.text: Place was pretty good. Went here on a Sunday night. Wait was about 45 minutes. Hostess up front seemed really frustrated and didn't acknowledge us when we came up from receiving the text that we are ready to be seated and had not so good communication skills which is what the -1 star is for. Other than that, once we got seated, our server was nice, we got checked up a few times and the food was good! It was a chill experience. Honestly just reminded me of going to Buffalo Wild Wings or like Rock & Brews though. Pretty cool place. Good music.

vv-auXaJbOYIilbv7RqciA.text: rolled right in and sat at the bar... zeke was awesome and helpful with explaining the food options! Grilled chicken wings? YASSSSS! amazing!!! Mexican candy marg super yummy and corn off the cob was great too!!! Thanks ZEKE!

wHRLaM7zYYC5n_-6PMs9Wg.text: Got takeaway while in Vegas. Easy to order on app and the food was nice. The queso with beef was very yummy, the boneless wings and chimichanga was ok, not huge on flavour. Big serves of food.

NtV7QZfI1dfdQjcA4BVKog.text: This was our first stop once we arrived in Sin City, after 4 hours drive from Palm Spings. We were starving. After a necessary Yelp search, voila!!! Nacho Daddy came up as vegan friendly.   And, let me tell you, not everything that happens in Vegas, stays in Vegas... Because this random finding on The Strip is totally worth to mention.   This mexican joint has a surprisingly good vegan menu.   I had the Loaded Vegan Nachos and were delicious and filling. They are addictive, so watch out.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan nachos were an unexpected decadent surprise.
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The decor...

379_80wW3KDsUesGBXDlWQ.text: Went here after a couple of friends and I did a long hike in Zion.  This place like every place in LV is lively.  The staff was friendly and our waters were refilled while we were looking over our orders. I ordered some chicken shredded nachos.  The portion size of this nachos was gigantic.  No matter how hungry I was, I could not finish the dish at all.  It can easily be split between 2-3 people for the portion they served.  The nacho tasted okay.  I definitely had better.  The chicken was a bit dry tasting even with the sauce they covered it in.  I feel they loaded it up with more fillers like beans, cheese, sour cream then they did with the meat on there.  It was quite pricey for the dish itself, but then again this is LV. Expect to pay an arm and a leg for anything you eat in LV.

LvRVOsGig2zEWsJXktoyyw.text: Mexican food is normally not found anywhere outside of south Texas .. this place was a treat to find everything from salsa to rice and beans tasted like home..happy the reviews didn't disappoint..I enjoyed the fish tacos - the quesa was a favorite and the service was excellent. Current Music videos played on tvs around the place and good atmosphere.  Average prices great portions..would go back ..if I liked Vegas.  Now that's a whole other review.  ;)

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Grilled fish tacos , burritos,enchiladas,chicken tortilla soup ..all very good !

FdXD4j5Pu4Pl2oYHNhhVkg.text: The best nachos I've ever had in my life! Hands down! If you're hungry and want something filling i suggest this place! You won't be disappointed a bit! Service was great, Wait was short and food hot! Can't say enough about the food, won't do it justice. Go see for yourself!

IykHmxoUyYnkV_kkEVSalw.text: I found this restaurant first on a gluten free app and followed up on Yelp, and I have to say as someone who loves food and is celiac, it did not disappoint. Our sever Marty was knowledgeable about how the kitchen could accommodate most everything on the menu to be gluten free with the exceptions of refried beans and Mexican rice (they have GF wild rice). We enjoyed the fiesta nachos, chicken tacos, enchiladas, and lots of margaritas. We made it in time for happy hour and the $5 margaritas were amazing! If you check in on Yelp, you get a coupon for a free house margarita, which we were able to get to go (and it was huge). We didn't try the scorpion shot, but the concept is pretty cool. We wish we'd gone back for a second night!

jrcDbDSnRgBXNOGpfVKTMg.text: Golden knights nachos-sooo much good stuff! The seafood combo- filling. Michaladas-spicy! Like burn your mouth spicy.  Large portions.  Fun place.  Wish I had run to try the desserts.

Gb0QIuznRFdjfn5AS-Q42w.text: Mariah was our bartender and made great suggestions for food. Being gluten free and having an allergy to dairy it's rare to have Nachos! Wow I'm so happy Nacho Daddy offers both options to me. I had the filet mignon nachos and subbed vegan cheese and sour cream. I can't believe this place has been open for a while in town and I've never visited. Looking forward to the next visit. I also really enjoyed the music videos playing and great music.

O2RkvgzHE5IKpJ2a7Xo2Jg.text: In town visiting family and decided to stop by Nacho Daddy for a snack. We ordered buffalo nachos and the fiesta nachos. Wow.... these babies are huggge. We sat at the bar for faster service, which we received by the way. We had a great bartender by the name of Litzs who gave us amazing service, great recommendations the best Cadillac margaritas ever. I will definitely be back to visit when I'm back in Vegas!
