KeaI193UJGIPlZqfRxUcYA.text: My family & I were in Vegas over labor day weekend and were looking for something to eat right after our show at Planet Hollywood and decided on Nacho Daddy since it was super close and had great reviews. The place had a cool vibe & atmosphere. As for the Nachos they were good, not great. I had the Filet mignon nachos, my wife had the lobster & crab nachos, and my girls had the Nino's Nachos (cheese & chips). Now when it comes to Nachos I feel like the star of the show should be the CHEESE. While I can truly appreciate the fact that they take pride in piling up your nachos to where you don't have a dry chip, but I felt like all the piling up of all the ingredients it was hard for me to taste the CHEESE. The toppings were all delicious, the beans, the filet mingon, guac, sour cream, salsa, etc...But the star of this show was the SALSA. Way too much. I found myself reaching over to my daughters to grab a chip because all she had on her nachos was their delicious cheese! While I didn't try my wifes nachos, they looked delicious and she seemed to really like them. Would I go back, absolutely! I would probably just specify how I would like my nachos, or order something different.

Wg4gBfjpjkEKV0mCFo9xsw.text: When I tell You this was one of the Highlights of my Vegas Trip it would be a understatement. I received free margaritas for using yelp to come to Nacho Daddy.The wings are so Fuckin' Good like I don't know if it was the Liquor or the Wings but They we're out of this World...I came back and got a 10 pc before my flight back Home... The nachos was Hittin' too and the fries extra Crispy

GN7CeUNn0aAysSGtmlZTiQ.text: shock an surprise that i was disappoint in nacho daddy.. the owner reputayshun is great so i was expeck good service.. i was surprise how slow it was an how the level of service was substandard.. I had not been here before so i was asking abot future visits and was surprise to lern  happy hour existed today ... The AGM and bartender were not very encouraging to recommend or offer it (They forgot it was available on Sunday) we receve good service from the runner an back waiter.. chips and salsa were great.. I, the customer, had to ask to order three times like i was begging to order a beer, begging to order an appetizer, then had to ask to order food... The AGM and staff was sitting at a table talking and thought we was smiling at the conversation they were having and I said no I am still waiting and wondering where the beer order that i placed 15 minits ago is... (only 2 people were belly up to the bar and the bartender was at the table with the AGM and not serving the tables)  the food arrived before the beers... Not cool when you are sitting in the cantina area and cood sell more alcohol if drinks were offered.. the vegan offerings were great.. We had to ask for to go boxes.. to go bag.. i had to bring the credit card to the bartender ... Now i understand why none of my friends in Summerlin want to come here and as to why the Henderson location has closed.. The food is good but the service is like Roberto's self serve.. Not impress.. The manager asked for us to write a review as i was thrill to arrive and was taking photos of the food with big expectations.. That was abruptly halted.. Absolutely i will post a review and share this poorly run Sunday restaurant in Summerlin... Sad when the big boss is off the staff does not pay attention to locals.. service.. or qwality... Food can only get you so far.. Kudos to ALEX and MARC awesome team members and they is the least paid staff and was not making direck tips... it was so poorly run I will be calling the corporate office on Monday as I think Mark Evensvold will be surprise to lern of how his restaurant is run... Yes manager I am happy to write a report - this is my first review ever on yelp that i has written and am sad that it was from a poor experience... I do not recommend and will probably not return even for $1.00 beer.. I wood rather pay more and be acknowledged... I take that back ALEX & MARC were great I wood want to return juss to thank them for a good example of hospitality and service... PS also do bathroom checks in the Ladies room.. I was to disgusted to even make mention over the disarray and was just redy to leave and post this report as it is fresh in my heart.

MculgTNz5R1BwfOX7BA76g.text: For what it is (heavy mexican-american food) it's great.  Don't come here for filet mignon, I came here for a big dish of nachos and got the Supreme Tostada. They were excellent

h5mX43PS3VjPGFUfYBaHKA.text: disipointing, I guess its kinda what i should have expected from chain mexican on the strip but it had good review so I had higher expectations.

k5Yvdus56WejQlHKFcM4Ww.text: Really cool spot OUTSIDE of the Miracle Mile shop at Planet Hollywood. ALL the nacho choices are most excellent, but the Fillet Mignon Nachos are top of the nacho food chain. Staff is very very friendly, Scarlett  the bartender is awesome and the atmosphere is laid back and casual. Good crowd, good food and great service. Must go to spot in Las Vegas. Oh...and Beware the Scorpion Shot!! Juevos required.

wE_USmPO-wNxRE1xrLRQzA.text: Came here for a quick dinner with friends and was served by Jonathan. All the hostess were sweet and nice and everything was good up until my friends' orders came out so I waited for my order which never came. Our server was busy waiting a large group that came in after us, which was understandable but time kept going and the table needed refills and my friends' were basically done eating their huge plates of food before we were able to flag down our server about what happened to my order. A huge platter of tacos went to that table he was helping. He said he'll let us know and then goes over to the big party. Basically takes care of that big party the whole time. He walks by and says it'll be out soon. It's been well over 40 minutes for two tacos with rice and beans by that time. My friends are stuffed and done with their food and I had to go, it's close to an hour now. So I flagged the waiter down and just politely asked if we could just cancel my order. He tells me it's literally done but we've been sitting there and everyone in my party is sitting there done while he's been serving that one large party. I  needed to leave so I just told him it's ok I'd rather not take it because I wouldn't be able to eat it or keep it on me. I'm not one to take home food either if I didn't buy food for the whole family. He comes back and inquires about why I don't wanna take it home so I tell him I have things to do and I don't wanna eat all of this in front of my family and he replies with "so you don't eat in front of your family?" Which was pretty rude so I told him well I'm not gonna sit there and have them watch me eat and not have bought food for everyone? I've waited so long for this food and literally everyone was finished and we had to move on. The place was not even busy. Plus I don't understand why a small order was suddenly done when I wanted to cancel it and he's being rude to me about it. Oddly enough after getting us our check he apologizes and says it's all his fault. But it's insincere because just a minute ago he didn't understand how I wouldn't want to take the food with me when there could be a number of reasons why and it's no ones business. I would've been fine if he just canceled it but having to explain myself and having his comments just really made a bad experience.

CcInwHVcM516OpThlZCwkw.text: Super nice staff, clean, and the food is great. I got he cheesy enchiladas . Also, the margaritas are bomb.

A8uVjWmSjk_SyMsiKM2aIg.text: They have a whole page in the menu of vegan items! Awesome place! Thanks for the great service Jovanny!

XACwTvVvZ4_KRifB1XggZQ.text: Arieanna gave us the best service!!! The food was delicious give it a try!! You won't regret it!

M0wRG8ktTS_qE-efEsmVoA.text: Good spot to munch and have drinks with just about anyone. My kids loved the food and the adults liked the drinks and vibe. We were well taken care of by Jovany.

oIvfp9CryFyJJ1X5kgxNKw.text: Very reasonable prices, amazing nachos and rice bowls and even more amazing house margarita!! Strong, but so good. I don't even like margaritas much but these were fantastic. The service was really great and it was a nice break from the typical feel of the strip. Would definitely recommend!

MuU6CVTg7NRahd3E6w_Rcg.text: I went there with three friend on a Monday night and it was pretty short-staffed. We had to wait about 20 minutes for a table although there were free ones... But as we finally ordered, the food came quickly and was tasty! Prices were good, too.

oCgs6rjQI7bHMQLrnp7UWw.text: Nacho Daddy was close to our hotel so we tried it upon arriving in town. The food and margaritas were very delicious. We decided to eat here again before we left town and look forward to returning when out west again. Staff is friendly, knowledgeable and the queso is awesome! Definitely recommend.

27oaFZV2yVBNSr4sXWKT9g.text: Based on other reviews I had really high hopes but ended up being disappointed.  The atmosphere is great and the staff was very friendly and provided good service.  Unfortunately, the food was below average and over priced.

rz_sLtgBQ5_9_9D3YeoOww.text: Nacho portion was big enough to share. Salsa and guacamole tasted fresh. Delicious.

kFdFjds4wwshCpKxxu0iZA.text: Great lunch and drinks! AJ was super helpful, attentive and friendly! Gave us great ideas of things to do in the area and highly recommend this place and him as a server!!!

IjcsygosM_-yVtDq6W1iqA.text: Our first time here! Our waitress Victoria made the experience pleasant, she was helpful, kind and easy  going. Will definitely return in the future.

rwMA7cajR3F0CaIxfQYNug.text: Great place to eat.  Quick food for a great price and fun environment.  The manager Jovany was amazing very helpful

TdSd54G_CZVG35ZUnzr-4Q.text: The Thai chicken nachos were delicious! I will come back and order it again. Chase provided great service. Very helpful. Thanks for the free margarita!

wgFtH1PIZeilxYVmtCfC_g.text: So got in the restraunt thinking well this seems like a normal Mexican restraunt. But wow I was wrong. First the chips so amazing second the salsa also amazing. The rice is really good also. Would recommend this place to anyone! Thanks for the great meal!

V8d8cYzHTU3slA595nqLnA.text: Incredible meal.  Best Mexican food in Vegas.  The flakey flour tortillas were the best I've ever had.  Our waitress Ari was awesome.  Very helpful, courteous and service was excellent.  Highly recommended.

B5tTVx_1c4iX-pzPBpnmSg.text: Every time I come to Vegas, Nacho Daddy is one of the first stops I make. And I always end up going multiple times! It's conveniently located on the corner of Harmon and S Las Vegas Blvd. Plenty of tables, bar seating, and easy to find.  If you're going on a weekend, they're open 24 hours and it's a perfect place to get late night munchies! During the regular week, they're open until 2am, which is still pretty nice.  Their drinks are hard core legit. There are plenty of pamphlets and coupons around the strip and at your concierge desk for BOGO or a free margarita and they're pretty famous for them. I like the fruitier ones like blueberry, strawberry, and mango. But their classic is a classic for a reason. And they are HUGE. They are also known for their scorpion shots, which has a pickled scorpion in a shot of tequil. never tried one, but I'm sure it's a real conversation starter. They also have a full bar, so no matter what you're in the mood for, they can probably do it. But you have to have a margarita at lwast once here.  Secondly, their NACHOS. They do not disappoint their namesake. Literally not a dry chip! all the cheese mixtures they use are so perfect and melt evenly on the chips. They have a number of meats and other toppings too, but I've yet to have a flavor combo that goes wrong. Last time we were here, we got the filet mignon golden knight nachos and it was heavenly.  We've also been here before for breakfast! I got the churro pancake. it was MASSIVE, came with syrup and caramel sauce, and had a hidden lining of churros and cinnamon toadt crunch. Honestly, it was a gluttonous feast. I didn't finish it though. My husband got the huevos rancheros and it was perfect. Corn tortilla slathered in eggs, cheese, salsa. The guac on the side was great too.  Some other great things about this place-- staff is always super friendly, there are a ton of TVs that are always playing music videos (sometimes hip hop, sometimes throwbacks, always fun), and they have a scorpion tank in the front of house. Best part is you get a quality experience for a quality price.  I. Love. Nacho. Daddy.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Churro pancake!!!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Huevos rancheros! so good!!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Golden Knight filet mignon nachos

eWbj-s1Q8gmsLBu19RHqvQ.text: Of all the times we've been to Vegas I'm not sure how we haven't ended up here before but we will definitely be making this a stop each trip.   Checked in on yelp and each got a free house margarita with our check in and a purchase of an entree. Margarita was delicious and wasn't a super small glass like you would normally expect for a free item.   We each ordered a nacho entree - I ordered the BBQ pork nachos and my boyfriend ordered the nacho daddy burger nachos (names might be incorrect) and they were AMAZING. The plates were huge and we stuffed ourselves into a nacho coma. The white queso and BBQ sauce on the pork nachos were the perfect combination. The fried onion strings on the burger nachos were delicious and they should also come on the bbq pork nachos.   With our margaritas being free, our bill total was $30 and those nachos filled us up for the entire day.   There are a decent amount of TVs so if you're trying to catch a sports game this is a good stop.  15/10 would highly recommend.

_j6USNMGGhqUCEq5MmKFdA.text: Don't leave Vegas without trying Nacho Daddy.  If your going to order the nachos come hungry or share them between 2 people.  They are huge!  I had the lobster and crab nachos and they came out on a tray!  They were excellent.  It is a bit hard to find but just a few steps off the strip (look for Buffalo Wild Wings it's next door).  Enjoy!

TbEgDb6QZhMQfcFrFpDK_A.text: We really enjoy the food here and always make a point of going when we go to Vegas.  One disappointment this tine was that the lobster street tacos were discontinued.  We own a bar in Illinois and anytime someone is going to Vegas I tell them " Go to Nacho Daddys and order the lobster street tacos " . The food is still great tho!

FsJzokNpo_Yg-WQnLuyH5g.text: Cool concept. It works well in Vegas. I like that there open late. We tried there chicken Tinga nachos and I liked the flavors it was just a lot of flavors. The pickled red onions really made the dish. Really heavy and cheesey it needs the acid. I would have liked to have seen some cilantro or fresh jalapeno to break up the flavors a bit more. The marinade for the chix was great. The flavor of the Chipotle did stand out in the dish. I appreciated the queso fresco . I would have cut back slightly on the yellow cheese sauce. There chips were good and seemed to be house made. I liked the vibe and the place was buzzing. They were selling a lot of there famous scorpion shots, which looked like a shot of tequella  with a little scorpion inside. Not for me but it's a cool novelty. I had there pilsner and it was tasty. As a restaurant in Vegas it must be so hard to stand out because of the sheer volume of choices. I would come back here again. I may try a new  place first. I was not blown away  I feel like in Vegas you either need to be exceptional or novel to be successful. They have the novel down and there food is good. Thanks for a great night guys.

GiiYLUZw-zQJkBVlvvz1yA.text: My boyfriend and I decided to try this place after seeing the great reviews on Yelp and we weren't disappointed. We were both extremely hungry and decided to share the filet mignon nachos. It was a good move because the portion size was huge. The nachos came with so many toppings that each chip was covered in the end.   I also checked in on Yelp for the free margarita but it was mediocre and tasted like something I would make at home.

8JtLKQl4uBOis6497uJpog.text: Nachos were pretty good but overpriced. Very busy in there felt like any other Mexican joint.

3Di7NLXsnAglrRQ72MFTPw.text: I'll keep it short because Las Vegas is no place a long winded anything (already failed haha). Great for Nschos and drinks. Their service is slow and waited 15 minutes between asking for the check and getting back our final receipt. The food sucks. I ordered a vegan chimichanga and the flavors did not sit well, and the fish tacos my wife's aunt ordered were soaked in oil. The rice very clearly came from a box and weren't even Spanish rice. Gi for happy hour and nachos. That is all.

4GlCSKUSGvUE6rNuEp768g.text: A place we come to whenever we are in town! Definitely a must! Margaritas are the bomb! I  the jalapeno margarita!  just the way I like it.

aSXxiSqTfEI_UbOwfYJ7Cw.text: Not authentic mexican food, if that's what you were expecting. But this place is the business! One of the best quick places to eat on the strip. Beware though, with that comes CROWDS. It fills up with people very very easily. I got my food in a decent amount of time, but try to be understanding if they can't make it right away. The nachos are orgasmic, honestly they are worth every penny.

3ZTiJ52xptFghPxERwCvGw.text: Best nachos in Vegas since Diablo closed. Great food great service got a free margarita with a shout out on Yelp it's a great place got to go eat there.

0I-ieNLyLFbHwNpK9cCv5w.text: Omg best nachos ever in a great atmosphere! These aren't your standard nachos. They have a variety to order from like Enchilada Nachos (try them with both red and green sauce), BBQ chicken nachos, Steak Nachos etc.  They also have many other entrees besides Nachos!  Try the sangria! They have red and white and it's fantastic!

QqZLPPeqgfhgbLCvgcxd0g.text: We stopped in since it was so close to our resort for a quick bite to eat. We were greeted promptly at the door and escorted to our seats. The restaurant has a very nice setup of being able to watch different types of sports throughout the place. It has one huge screen in the middle that has a really good picture.  I ordered the bbq chicken nachos . Keep in mind, you won't leave this place hungry. The chips were fresh and had a nice seasoning on them. The roasted corn, black beans, cilantro and of course the bbq chicken all worked very well together. The quest cheese is very good. It is one of the best that I have ever had. What makes this dish pop though is the bbq sauce. I've had a lot of bbq sauce from all over the world and this is right up there in the top five.  If you are visiting for the first time, stop in and be ready to eat hearty!

utsuA-W5Us81A-trQJvEqg.text: Dude the nachos rock. Every chip was covered. We got the Filet Mignon Nachos. Super awesome and had a Margarita. Elise was the bartender and was very helpful and made a great drinks. Thanks Elise for making it memorable for us!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet Mignon Nacho* and Margarita

F3o2Ydo81j7zRlab43oaww.text: I was actually really impressed with Nacho Daddy. I was out in Vegas for work and was staying at Planet Hollywood. This location was right around the corner from PH and had great reviews so I definitely wanted to check it out. The first night I got to Vegas I ordered take out from here and was not disappointed. My salad was ready by the time I got there which was great because I was tried from my travel. I ordered the mexi-cobb salad which I really enjoyed it. When I picking up my food I got to check out a bit of the ambience and it definitely had a fun environment. I came back the next day and ate at the restaurant. This time I order their fajita bowl and really liked that as well. They gave a good amount that I even took some back to my room.   Since I was there for work alone I brought a book to read while I waited for my food and have to say the staff was really attentive and friendly. They really made a solo diner feel welcomed and well attended to. I wish there was a location in the East Coast cause it would probably be one of my more favorite chain "mexican" restaurants.

wcUfUl2XcCy2QUN1Ztkamg.text: My friends and I came to Nancho Daddy for brunch, our server was extremely nice and attentive, she recommended a lot of wonderful dishes! We were happy with all the food we ordered. The best part was you get a free Margarita upon checking in on Yelp! Love the ambiance, fast service, convenient location, right outside Planet Hollywood hotel! Because the margarita was so good here, each of us (6 of us) decided to order another one to go!  Only in Vegas, you can take alcohol with you in a to-go cup, which is amazingggg!!! I absolutely cannot wait to come back here for mexican-style brunch!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

kEcVS8kLm-Qj9YqhqCJ8Sg.text: I. LOVE. NACHO. DADDY.  Seriously, this place is awesome.  It has a great ambiance, great service, it's clean, has a fantastic and extensive menu, a free margarita with Yelp check in and entree purchase, and the food is delicious!  I could just stop right there.  But, really, you can get any kind of nachos you want and they are bomb; great flavor combinations, quality ingredients, and truly the worst part is trying to decide WHAT you are going to choose.  I've personally ordered the BBQ pork nachos which were OMG so GOOOOD and my own creation from their Gold something something, that was basically filet mignon and cheese.  Yeah.  SO GOOD.  The standard Mexican nachos got all the goodies on them and the buffalo chicken nachos are literally everything you think about when you order buffalo wings, BUT ON NACHOS!  I have a friend that ordered the ceviche and she says 'YUM', but I thought the portion was a little small.  For the amount and quality of food you get, the prices seem reasonable.  When in Vegas, you MUST GO HERE TO EAT.  If you don't, you will be sad.  In fact, I'm sad that that we didn't got a second time on our most recent trip.  But, thank goodness, we'll be back in a month.  CAN'T WAIT!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mmmmm
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nacho tweaked to make me happy

5ySzF3ZWWiS3sWmGdljBcA.text: This place was quite yum! Have great happy hour deals and outdoor seating. Ordered BBQ pork nachos - queso was the highlight but overall everything blended together well, great for sharing. Ordered some street tacos but nothing out of the ordinary to write home about, still good. Margaritas on point in cute mason jars. You can get 1 free by checking in through Yelp! Be adventurous and try their SCORPION shot - gimmicky and overpriced but a cool story to tell (decent sized baby scorpion included). EEK!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

isaxJEJK8mVLfza3asbPqQ.text: Omg they have a vegan section in their menu! First time here and had the Vegan Loaded Nachos are they were so good! Came back the next morning and had the best huevos rancheros! The service is outstanding as well! I'll be back when I visit Vegas again! Oh and get a skinny margarita while you're at it! Delish!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. So good!

ecGrFJEnYbRi7nerK0yrlw.text: Beware!! There is a Scorpion right at the entrance waiting to greet you! Ah, don't be scared! He is in a glass box but yes, at the entrance. Loved the ambiance of the restaurant, very rustic! There are huge screens where they play video songs which was very cool.  Got seated in a couple of minutes and we unlocked a couple of House Margaritas with Yelp check-ins and the drinks were good. Also tried Daddy's Margarita which was very good. Ordered Vegan Spicy Burrito and Thai Chicken Bowl. Both the dishes were really good but the latter in particular was very different from the ones I have ever eaten in Thai restaurants. Had a subtle sweetness from the sweet chili sauce in the dish. Absolutely delicious! The food was quite filling leaving no room for dessert.  Rating the following out of 5:  AMBIANCE - 5 Amazing rustic charm!  FOOD- 4 House Margarita - 4 Daddy's Margarita - 5 Vegan Spicy Burrito - 4 Thai Chicken Bowl - 5  CUSTOMER SERVICE - 4  WAIT TIME - 4 It was a weekday and we went in pretty late in the night. Not much of wait time.  HYGIENE - 4  PARKING - Not sure about the parking. We walked down from our hotel. Parking in Vegas, especially the strip is a bit cumbersome so it is better to take Uber/Lyft.

R1Mn7a_sEJqUFHJpJjsXsw.text: The Filet Mignon nachos were really good, margaritas a bit on the sweet side but still good, and great friendly service.

PIz8lMtteDhTzRZXKV0O5g.text: Not what I expected from the name. Figured it was a Taco Bell type place.  Wrong.  Excellent food.  The chips and salsa was outstanding as was the guacamole.  I had a burrito smothered in green/verde sauce.  The chicken was shredded and melt in your mouth.  Wife had fish tacos that she said we excellent.  Service was very good and prices were great considering we were in Vegas on the strip. Highly recommend.

Agmw3m0A1wlRjkLOuARUYQ.text: I came to Nacho Daddy for lunch. The food was pretty good but the service was not great. The servers were very nice but it took forever to get our food or flag our server down. And the place was no where near crowded. I would recommend if you have a lot of time to kill

msYpv7P0Ml1FAltEWqC1-A.text: Very friendly wait staff.  Nice clean environment.  Good margaritas.  Chips and salsa cost extra, but not much.  The nachos are large enough for 2 people and quite the variety of toppings.  We had buffalo chicken, it worked.

RDDAYXld6Kgf7FnTPGL6Nw.text: We had an amazing breakfast and excellent service!!!! Our server Heather was so engaging and friendly. They just opened and the food is delicious. The French pressed coffee is the BEST!!! The burritos were delicious. It is a must try.

LduqUV3Q9kCSggCrMFOR0g.text: Was waiting for table. Noone came. Everyone ignore us. Lights were dimmed. Place look like crap.

fVz3ruX98CBX4C_deTDbRg.text: First time there, filled up on appetizers so went straight to dessert. Amanda was our server she was great and checked on us frequently. The margaritas were the highlight of the meal for sure.

K3cw2jsbVq6D-SfT_OoxyQ.text: Nacho typically mediocre Mexican food!   Whether you're a vegan (like my g/f) or more omnivorous (like me). Their nachos are EPIC. We got the vegan "chicken" (tempeh) nachos with vegan cheese, which were indeed comparable to the "real" thing. Massively sized as well, but we're both gluttons - so this sufficed as our appetizer. I got the chicken fajitas, which were solid as well.   If you're looking for some legit Mexican food during your sojourn to Vegas, venga aqui!

qzccALUFNYP_ndfaTENWBg.text: Was bad food. We waited 40 mins for a take-our order and then it was REALLY dry and bland. Overpriced, too! I expected more. I got a fajita bowl and could have made it better myself.

eUVtD8mxvS2Cg8cJlyHgGw.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this place! Great food and sports are on everywhere! The service can be spotty, but the food helps you forget about that

161bhnIgiFlsQrNp2GB97Q.text: This food is horrible. Save your money and eat taco bell. Canned refried beans horrible flavorless rice. Hardly any sauce on the enchiladas.  Lesson learned.

aWWkRA1OglbxvU4vYMd8TA.text: We came into eat last night and had 4 orders of Nachos. Ryan our server, and the rest of the staff exceeded any and all expectations. If you want some of the most yummiest nachos, look no further. :):):)

lf7VmCtJP9cgQn_dLLLG3g.text: Audre made sure our time at Nacho Daddy was awesome! Great food, drinks, and service for a good price. 10/10 would recommend!!!

n_-Vx10BV6KNd_eUkPfzHg.text: So far, I have only tried their nachos - and I've been satisfied. They provide a very BIG serving for their nachos and have really unique combinations. I am a big nacho fan and so far my favorite is the chicken enchilada nachos. The prices I feel should not exceed $12, but since they do provide a large amount (probably enough to share), maybe it's okay for some to be almost $20? What I like the most about Nacho Daddy and what makes it unique, is that it has vegan options. Although I am not a vegan, I have numerous friends that are, and it's good to know that I can take them to a restaurant that we both can enjoy. My most favorite experience that I have was the deep fried ice cream - it was outstanding!

923sSF6othjg8jiHWzHldg.text: Love it!  Yummy Daddy's Margaritas, nachos and fajitas!  Our bartender Heather was super sweet and attentive.

FJsEXzmUww3JqtWVBZCeMw.text: Kayla gave us great customer service she made my experience extra and enjoyable... the food was so so good, nachos cheese and jalapeno was simple but had a unforgettable taste definitely coming back before I leave vegas !!!

PTqbpWA-wrn7q9x8i1e4gg.text: Fantastic food and margaritas. We had the pork street tacos and the filet street tacos and they were both phenomenal. The salsa and chips are homemade and amazing! Victoria was our server and Kayla was training with her. They were both fantastic! Best service we have had in Vegas!

PlbKlLZQiJswSyAdIi89Kw.text: This place is so so good!! I only got the 4 cheese nachos, but everyone else at my table got something different and absolutely loved them. Easily the best nachos I've ever had!! Everyone else at my table agreed! The service is great and pretty fast too!!! I love this place! Definitely a must stop in Las Vegas!!!

OAOim7TJmC_jBySdfdXwxA.text: Best nachos I have ever had - was in Vegas for 3 days and went back every day ! They have a huge selection of nachos available - vegan friendly also , the vegan chicken nachos were amazing , customize how you like , friendly staff ! They apparently have the best margaritas in Vegas too but for some reason we never ended up trying them ! Next time for sure !! Byeshttttt

vtQeC8OycD4WgknxRzjSdQ.text: My family and I were staying out here for a few days and it was very hard for me to find vegan restaurants which is very frustrating. Today was our first time coming here and on their menu there is a vegan sections which made my day! I tried the vegan chicken burrito and it was amazing and I highly recommend it. Our server was Jovanny and he took very great care of us and made sure everything was on point. The place was very great and I would describe the atmosphere as a fun popping place to go out with your girlfriends! If I lived out here I would want to work here!!!

6XOI-Sbf9plAVND9tATpsQ.text: Great food. Even better service. Fireball Margarita and spicy cucumber maragarita were amazing!

Gg2LFMi8-cRbq1LPQ4msVA.text: The skinny Margarita's are the best margarita other than what I make at home. Love their vegan menu, especially the avocado taco's, loaded vegan nachos, vegan queso and chocolate cake. The staff is friendly, the place is clean and food comes out fast & hot.  Prices aren't bad, especially HH $5 menu from 3-6. Love that they are open late and early enough for breakfast.

M59mkKdKwilpvNeOKz4nRw.text: Service wasn't great.  Food was weak.   Waitress did not understand simple math. They did not bring all of our food and we brought it to her attention she was still not understanding that we were overpaying.   Would not return or recommend

DmTWQS6XUWWeK2m_2Auj6w.text: Our waiter was Vince and he was so helpful cuz it was our first time here.  We got the buffalo chicken nachos and they were a tad on the salty side but still delish!  Kale salad balanced things out and the dressing was amazing. It was so good I devoured it w/o taking a pic!  Dessert was deep fried ice cream.  Yummmmm.

2gG8jO0zyOcls2R6wD3O5A.text: Came here while visiting Las Vegas. It was pretty good. The reason why there is only 4 stars is because it was overpriced. I'd go again. Service is great, free refills for iced tea and soda. Fajita lighting is cool. They forgot the tortillas and orders got a little bit mixed up. Music is loud and there are TVs everywhere. $92 for three people. I'd recommend the chicken quesadilla with kids and any nachos for their specialty

xhtMZM6rd9w-pHAUv8ghyA.text: This place is so fun and walk-in dining in was easy!! The staff is HOT and exceptionally nice!

U74Q5nPNbJuDv2l6-0ad2Q.text: Loved it!!!!!! Everything about this place was awesome! I will most definitely recommend this place. The margaritas were strong and the service was supee!

JOdK-YazBYX18j6JurPWvg.text: Location Tip: The entrance to this restaurant is outside on Harmon Ave. Don't waste your time running around inside of the Planet Hollywood shops like I did ;P Navigation issues aside, my Vegan Fajita Salad was much tastier than I expected it to be. The vegan chick'n was marinated in flavorful spices. Nice touch with the grill marks too. The pico de gallo and guacamole were fairly mediocre. The fajita pepper & onions added heartiness to the romaine lettuce. But the real standout ingredient was the onion thyme vinaigrette. Omg YUM! bit.ly/2l68mbD The BF had to work at an in-town trade show so I was dining alone. This place was extremely empty at 11am on a Monday. Saw about two other single diners and one small group in this large restaurant. But the friendly waitress did provide great service and checked in on me often.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Fajita Salad

ThxlX_YGtzegT9rTgVZEVQ.text: This place is so good. Friendly atmosphere, Bomb food, cool place to hang out with friends and family.  Will for sure make this a regular outing

zRemr-BDoISp_iuvi38Wug.text: As soon I got to Las Vegas, my Lyft driver recommended that I give Nacho Daddy a chance. I'm so glad I received that recommendation. I got the cajun shrimp nachos and the Daddy's Margarita! Rebecka was my bartender and waitress. Those nachos were filling and delicious! I've never had shrimp on nachos before but I'm glad I went for something new. The daddy margarita did not disappoint either. The food, drinks, and service are why I give Nacho Daddy 5 stars!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

2tmDDbdv7AUYvoQmdoPvQg.text: I was extremely excited to try this restaurant out. Yelp reviews were great and the name is hilarioussss!  We just went and were seated quickly, but sat without anyone coming to check on us for quite a long time. There were about five waiters standing at the bar area and waiters were walking past us. Super disappointed. We ended up walking out and were "thanked" for coming on the way out. Food on neighboring tables seemed good but service was below par.

KX7wZeWme41dAOXUGox34g.text: Whenever I come to Vegas, this will definitely be a place I will eat at.  There is something for everyone on this menu...even plenty of vegan options.  There was a 20 minute wait if we wanted to sit at a table, but immediate seating if we sat at the bar, which we took advantage of.  Ordered the spicy shrimp nachos...AMAZING!  Our friend ordered the bbq chicken nachos and those looked just as amazing...and I'm a pescatarian!  The waitstaff was extremely friendly, helpful and informative.  Great atmosphere.

Pu1-LyROkbQw2eZMcGXeeg.text: Absolutely delicious!!  I'm not sure what to say...the food, my mango margarita with Hornito's Tequilla and our waitress all rocked!!

DVaLxM3SAHMKGzdZ4MOXnA.text: Food was good and fresh.  For being fairly busy,  the wait and food time was pretty short.   Did not like seeing throw up all over one of the toilets though. Might want to check the bathrooms more often.

H7kk-XwjQc8QAYTgM8kL2g.text: Really enjoyed their Filet Nachos.  Great margaritas.   Their chicken fajitas was good.  We had a great time.  And thoroughly enjoyed the food.  Great visit.  Definitely recommend it.

WzmO6n3LQ8NyX9sFXCai7Q.text: Everything we tasted here was amazing... the fiesta nachos, the dry rubbed wings and the margarita was perfect. It wasn't weak but not too strong. Our server Kierstan was awesome!!

DhLa-pDRgak25X8G7RVQcw.text: We found Nacho Daddy thanks to a Yelp event years ago, and it was regular stop for us until they closed the Henderson location.  We would always take family and friends that visited from out town to dinner here.  The food was always very good, and the service was great.  I would assume the other locations are just as good, but we will continue to wait for a new Henderson location.  I would highly recommend to anyone.    We miss you in Henderson....

ey7O82vb1Gcy4X5TVak4JQ.text: Delicious food!!! Uber Eats will bring their delicious little morsels directly to your door.

tv9ryNS5FUG6rRM6Md-7rw.text: Was soooo happy to find this place when I stayed in Vegas! My boyfriend and I are vegan and it was so nice that they offered a full vegan menu! The nachos were amazing & pricing is nice as well especially for the portion size! I'm so sad this only exists in Vegas!

k12L5VhTYd2v4MW_uz79Pw.text: No wait, quick service and the filet mignon nachos were amazing! Our waiter said if I check in I get a free margarita, if I pay 2 bucks more I get better quality tequila in the drink. Paid the 2 bucks and got a great tasting margarita.

cCrRXYZeKj0--pPLdqPbXA.text: The food was actually pretty decent, and they had a great selection of vegan and vegetarian friendly items. It was fairly greasy and heavy though, but I guess it's the perfect drunk food.   The place was really pretty cool inside. They have embraced their scorpion theme with a giant scorpion terarium where you can watch them prey on little crickets, and they offer a scorpion shot that comes with a little baby scorpion in it.   Service was pretty blah. First they forgot our margaritas, then they forgot about 1/2 our order and had to come back to ask us what we wanted again. Good thing they did though because I wanted the vegan fajita bowl and they forgot it was even vegan!   Food came out and they forgot we ordered the garlic cheese fries, a side salad, no onions ina. Sandwich, and sour cream. So they had to go back and make it and bring back out.   Pretty slow service all around as well but there weren't that many people there.   would probably come back for late night drunk eats, and for the free margarita you get with a check in!

IILFtUq-wo05dpfqVCmUYw.text: The place is not as fancy and eye candy as other places, but the food is top quality! I ordered the lobster and crab nachos and it was really good! Normally, I'm not a big fan of cheese but the cheese in this nachos was not too cheesy. It was just right. Perfect place for just snacking or a complete meal. Will definitely come here again.

sbvrbeOpos6KOE4x37iCvA.text: The chicken was a bit on the salty side. It also made my quesadilla soggy because it was wet. The queso was good though. Check in offer works.

aDHa2L_KC2Mm3J0pZ6XW2A.text: Transients passing through Vegas...  needed some food to power us through the hangover into ARizona.  Our fearless leader found Nacho Daddy (love the name) and in we went.  There were four of us, I LOVED my chilaquile - the other 3 were not so enchanted.   In defense of Nache Daddy (in the light of my companions' "meh" assessment):  WHY in the name of God would you order kale & chicken stirfry or a "grilled chicken sandwich" in Vegas? I mean, do you go to the Szechuan province to get "THE best" chimichurri sauce?  Or to Seoul for the BEST Tikka Masala?  Do NOT blame Nacho Daddy for your imprudent decisions!    (BRIEF summary:  get the chilaquile for breakfast.  Delicious.)

VjO67q0KREFMGomCLeUb_Q.text: Food was amazing! Our bartender Booker was extremely great and helpful with the menu. Gave us great suggestions and food definitely reflected his word. Made delicious margaritas as well! 10/10 will definitely return!

RdMxSu1ObmjLA6iNoOjgdg.text: Our server was Chase and he was awesome. We had the Thai nachos, lobster/crab/shrimp tacos. It was so good.

_iqglECnSbrmhj09iYPxlw.text: We have enjoyed this restaurant several times in the last year or so. Food is great, service is excellent. Thanks Ryan for impeccable service today. The only disappointment is that they changed their coffee from Lion's Head to a local brand. I would gladly pay more to have an option to have Lion's Head.

mNe1LOF_nMbkqVyxyOphSA.text: ordered the lobster & crab nachos. the serving was pathetic in comparison to the other nacho plates & you have & the crab & lobster nachos are the most expensive of any. so if you want to pay the most & get the least order these. overall the nachos were tasty, but you're going to have to eat about 60-70% of the nachos naked because like i said the serving size is pretty pathetic just a lot of chips & pico to make it look bigger than what it is. overall wish i would have ordered a different kind of nachos because i didn't even taste much of the crab & lobster & would have obviously payed less & got more. the food came out fast though (it was a dead night maybe 5 other groups in there) but the server did suck she took over 10 minutes to come take our order which was pretty annoying since i told the hostess i already know what i want. mango pico was good though i give them that

deQMm7LlKpx0Fl1npAAXow.text: Good place to eat and very friendly staff. The portions were massive and tasty but I felt the prices were rather high even for vegas.   I would recommend that you visit this must cost place when in Vegas.   Another fast fact; the drink are delicious here.   Enjoy!

yoPStOjX5BPu0NiFoKeIlw.text: My boyfriend and I were originally going to Buffalo Wild Wings  but something about the name of the place next door was calling my name Nacho Daddy sounded funny but it intrigued me. We stepped in and as soon as we arrived they looked busy Katelyn the host was very friendly and told us it would be about a 10 minute wait. After about a minute or so The manager Joe approaches and asked if I had been helped and I said yes but is there anyway I could get a drink while I wait ? He said of course if you would like to grab a drink at the bar I will make sure to come and get you when your table is ready. I let him know I was 4 months pregnant ,he obviously couldn't tell and I felt weird sitting at the bar so he asked if there was something he could bring me? I asked for a virgin pina colada and a margarita for my boyfriend he said yes absolutely you sit there and relax and I will bring it over to you. Within a few minutes I had an awesome virgin pina colada with a huge whip Creamed topping and a cherry on top ! After a few minutes we were sat by Katelyn who chatted with us the whole way and said to enjoy our meal. Carly was our waitress and she is the sweetest ! She suggested the supreme nacho and the Thai nacho both were out of this world ! I was a little jealous of my boyfriend who got to do the scorpion shot which was creepy but they make you feel really special by ringing a bell , nacho daddy was so much fun and I wish I could have experienced that also. The whole staff was awesome and helpful I have never been blown away by a dining experience and quite honestly I didn't expect it . Kudos to management and the staff for the hard work and service. PS I don't yelp but Nacho Daddy is the reason I signed up! I can't wait to drop this baby and come back for a non virgin drink a plate full of nachos and that scorpion shot!! Please come to San Diego!!!

Yyv3iWz2ZIGFvAbWEicWcg.text: Great vegan nachos. I ate them all up they were so good. Check in for a free house margarita. They also play really cool music from the 80s and play the videos on their tv screens. Saw videos I'd never seen before of songs I love.

s4QK26dCcBBSBlXxpp5RQA.text: This is probably THE BEST Mexican food i've ever had. If you're going to eat casual Mxican food this is the right place to go! And our server Rachelle gave us the best service!

GWksi2FRtpPqu7TQm3XTVQ.text: Filet mignon nachos were awesome! Definitely enough to share with a couple of people.  The spicy cucumber margarita was great too!

Czo2Mg7MLVXQmbb3IbGCiA.text: Went in here a few nights ago, so posting a little late. The food here is always good, I ordered the hot buffalo nachos (my go to).  The only reason for a 3 star review, is it took quite a long time for anyone to notice we were standing at the host stand to be seated.  Normally this wouldn't bother me even in the slightest, knowing that high volume restaurants get busy.  But as we were eating we overheard the table with sight of the front door, was full of employees there for a party, and quite a few standing at the bar who never let any of the employees on the clock know we were standing there.  A little disappointing.  But our waitress was very pleasant and quick to refill drinks.

XcI_m8fRgqxnpsjekFjIgQ.text: This is must go ty o place. We went there three times during our stay in Vegas. The food is awesome and the drinks and good too!

v_s4t8gH3LWk55VjCf2a7g.text: I had an excellent time at Nacho Daddy! I definitely recommend coming to this place if you are visiting!! Also, I want to give a shout out to Jacob (eyebrow piercing and long hair guy). He was the best server we've had here in Vegas!!!!! -fellow Florida friends!

DSB8-nkfLxFOgK8OU-vtUg.text: Front line staff need a little bit more training on service.  There were four of them just chatting to each other ignoring us as we stand there waiting to get our name on the wait list. After we got our name on the list, We waited for 40 mins. Another patron waited for an hour before they got seated. Food is just ok. Chips are fine - thin, warm and crispy., you pay for a bottomless chips and salsa but they won't have time to refill it, because your wait staff will barely come by to check on you. The food was mediocre. Sharky's nachos taste better (and they don't have nacho on their name!) It was full consensus among my family members that we certainly won't wait in that line again. Service could be much better. One and done.

QXm8-AKkmTom-6G4bDS22Q.text: Great atmosphere, great food and great drinks. Love the ambience of this place. The lobster nachos were perfect. The margarita was excellent

AoQCTnal7KHcFML9QlC5ZQ.text: the food and the serivce was really good and i love the nachos n i will come back here again when im in vegas

MYGCLIMkXFag5zmoEslEzQ.text: Love the atmosphere great service. Loved the vegan option we  had a few strollers with us and the watched them at the fr9nt host desk which was great thank you nacho daddy

qHGKvTZzxVW6NfWMiL7dcA.text: Wow the house margaritas were amazing and they did not skimp on the alcohol even though it was free with checkin. Lots of vegan options. Vegan Chimichanga was delicious, as well as the loaded vegan nachos.

B-HzZb6ikqSioT-DeFhb0g.text: Service and food was amazing. My husband and I shared the Thai Nachos and Fish Tacos. The Thai nachos were so different and had the best flavor. We absolutely loved them! Our wait staff was very attentive and friendly. Wouldn't definitely come back again!

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

LD9Bz4wGXG4VW94NTT1I7Q.text: There is something to be said about going into a place without Yelping it. There is also something to be said going into a place on the Strip called "Nacho Daddy". It sounds like a gimmick to draw you in. We laughed at the name but glanced in and it seemed like a cool spot with open air and all we wanted was a snack to hold us over so it wasn't the end of the world if we had mediocre food.  Fish tacos sounded like a good option for a snack but the waitress upped the ante by suggesting the signature tacos because of the homemade tortilla. I can't possibly say no to that - I was game. And indeed, as she claimed, these grilled fish tacos on homemade tortillas were fantastic. What a great suggestion, one that got us to revisit this place a few days later.  What I will say about Nacho Daddy is that the service and hospitality was excellent in both of our visits. No one left you hanging - people came by right after we sat down but also checked in with us periodically to see how we were doing. This place was a pleasant surprise that was also convenient to our hotel.

oFgC59P6dQdV15hBPqzvXg.text: Good evening everyone, wow when it comes to vegetarian/vegan food they're second to none. All of their employees are awesome and make sure you're doing good. Moreover, they always have deals on their drinks, if that's what you're into as well. Also if you want to meet a great Bartender then Arnold is your man he's funny, charismatic, and makes sure you leave with a smile.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I ordered the vegan loaded nachos. It was delightful the vegan sour cream, cheese, and chicken were marvelous.

Great place to check out if you're on the strip and want some good old nachos.

trydIgaizHVwEgHExcwfgA.text: I wish I never would have eaten here because they ruined me. There food is so good. We mainly stopped in for appetizers and drinks and the triple dip is so freaking good. gxtoiV7rVUJB0Miqg8QUgw.text: Drinks-bomb. Nachos-bomb. Our server DJ- super cool, personable and made us feel at home! Would definitely recommend and come back and ask for DJ!!!(:

qhVPy5SKQDrgtdpNMg6V7Q.text: Found this place by accident. Decided to try & glad we did. Short wait, great service. The margaritas & nachos were delicious. Definitely would recommend

yDWxgB4af6udazDXwbJsJQ.text: Amazing food. Great flavors that make your mouth water.  I would definitely recommend this place for anyone if you don't like bland food. Ordered delivery from grubhub!

mF8BBbzmkplpXaqN0IJ2yg.text: Nacho Daddy was amazing. The service was great, maybe because it was a full table of beautiful ladies :). Regardless, none of us had any complaints with out food, We all order different items and was beyond full and content by the time we finished. We didn't have issues with billing, being that we were such a big party. This is forever be a stop when coming to Vegas & will be my number 1 suggestion when visiting Vegas.

mv6IklrYUqbO0WwCetYCxg.text: It is located around the corner from Planet Hollywood!! The nachos seemed very yummy and so my friend and I decided to give it a try. We happened to walked in during happy hour and so we ate the things off the happy hour menu. The regular nachos is a large portion so perfect for    sharing. The margaritas were very yummy. Definitely a spot to check out if you're in the area.

0KD56HKMpsJ_2iCBSCCcfA.text: I didn't stay long because I was in a hurry but the from the 5 star rating you can tell that I really enjoyed this place. I was visiting Vegas with my friends and wanted to stop by a place that had offered large amounts of food for an affordable price.   Before I even get to anything I want to say that if you check in with yelp you'll get a free margarita with the purchase of an entree. They'll include the tax on the margarita in your final bill but you're still saving around $12.  The interior of the place is sports themed and they have large TV's hung everywhere around the facility, which is nice because I didn't want to miss the NBA playoffs while I was busy eating. The atmosphere is very nice and they'll also have some sports music playing in the background.  Now onto the food. The food is huge. HUGE. I shared a filet mignon nacho with my friend and we were both full from eating it. The nacho itself costs around $20 but you have to consider just how large the thing is.  Finally, the waiting staff were fantastic and always attended to us whenever we needed anything promptly.  If I come to Vegas again, I will definitely stop by Nacho Daddy.

AKSaa0riliaPtZsBwGqYnA.text: I found this on Yelp. Menu had vegan options and it was close to our hotel so decided to go there. I ordered vegan chicken nachos and my brother got chicken wings and a signature combo. The vegan chicken was very close in taste to the real thing. Food was good. Quantity was huge. Prices are reasonable. Also since we checked in we got free margarita!! So overall very happy.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

qYnTldyjXUDGd8Wl9EIBlw.text: Average at best.  Service was poor and food was nothing special.  The Filet could just be skirt steak as tough as it was.

Cjmh_0MnX7_gQQhGgVz7BQ.text: I chose this place since it was the highest-rated two-$ restaurant on the Las Vegas strip.  It did not live up to the rating, however.  Very generic, "gringo" Mexican food!  I had the chicken enchiladas and my wife had the filet mignon tacos.  Neither of us were impressed.  This is Chipotle Level food.   My daughter, on the other hand, who loves Chipotle, thought her cheese enchiladas were very good.  So what do I know?  Nothing bad, just very mediocre food and slow service.  Not sure where the multi thousands of 4 and 5-star reviews are coming from!

DfWZEWampwUCTqauSfvSUQ.text: Service was outstanding (thanks Laura)!  The food was delicious and cheap ($5 during happy hour). The margaritas were just fantastic.  I would go again for sure.

jZJlSICjTlGvVq8DetgkTw.text: Great food and environment! The service is quick and doesn't leave you hanging. Phenomenal music and great vibes to keep the night going!

TLWVNBVgcGrLCPkAJg7jvw.text: this place is pretty good, the nachos could be better maybe they should cover all the nachos not just the top

Kxh-U3g_KsCuTnPp91VQDQ.text: This place was actually really good and the saying they go by like never a dry chip is pretty accurate I went on a random late night and was very satisfied... They also have a cool thank with a unique species in front.. u it out if your a nacho lover

zsQ0dJ2hLUhiRojpaY5Mpw.text: Experience and food was nothing special. Waiter got my order wrong and tried telling me what I said which was incorrect. Aside from that, the food my wife and I did get was subpar at best and not worth the hype. Queso got hard and cold fast and they charged $5 for extra steak and there was no extra steak on that plate. The only good thing about this experience was checking in and getting a free margarita then taking it to go. We won't be back. I can make better Nachos at home where I can be sure I get what I ordered.

Ljcu6NxN3ZnmQG3HtJg_5w.text: Finally came back here after 6 months and decided to sit at the bar since there was not wait. Glad we did because Kimberly was our bartender and she was amazing! Super friendly, down to earth, and provided great service. She made sure we were taken care of the whole time while taking care of all her other customers at the bar and making other customers' drinks outside the bar. Highly recommend coming here because the food and service is excellent! Thanks to Kimberly for making my second time here a much better experience!!

9INbA0Ywk6UEOEGN_BYN9g.text: Huge portions, great margaritas - right on the strip! What else do you need? They also have the famous scorpian shot (which I was not drunk enough to try ;) )  Loved the food. Special recommendation - hot buffalo nachos

t1m4GP7edJCrK_6WieMtXg.text: Our server Vince was probably the best server I've ever had- my husband agreed! It was busy and he was still on top of everything!   We ordered  pulled pork nachos and they were AMAZING!!! The house margarita was also delicious (and free).

Su0L7-IF3bbXr6sqwqOYzw.text: So far so good! Love the ambiance I just wish I would have made reservations. Messed that one up. But we are going to wait.  I forgot my update: IT WAS DEFINITELY WORTH THE WAIT! We will be back! Delicious!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Desert Shot

yKCYpHKwM0CVKobLUvL8TA.text: We arrived at the restaurant around 6 and were seated immediately. Laura was our server and she was excellent. We had the Cobb salad, Chimichanga burrito and the surf and turf taco. Top drawer food. Also if you're into beer they have a wonderful variety of beers that you will love. I had the flight of beers which is a taste of the four beers from this restaurant. This place fills up quick. By 6:30 the place was full of people. I think the prices were about right for a Las Vegas area place. Located in the Miracle Mile shopping mall but the entry is outside of the mall on the Polo Tower side. Easy to get to and free parking in the Planet Hollywood parking lot. Try it, you will love it!

a1yFkq-n3lGHoC3cpQzbEw.text: This spot is a 4 but our server Aly made it a 5 star! She was awesome and recommend exactly what we wanted, she was super sweet and attentive, definitely coming again and asking for her. And their Margaritas are the ish!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bar area

PtsCYYwi5aLXk9AvKl7dfg.text: Hostess horrible! We wanted a table for 7 people, was told it would be about 20 min (no big deal, right?), and we were never seated after 40 minutes. We kept seeing parties of 5 being seated but zero effort was made to have our party seated. We finally just ordered to go, very disappointing in the overall service, such a bummer... this shouldn't be THAT difficult. Nachos were good, but overall a fairly disappointing experi  Update Talked with management and they were very apologetic and attentive to our concerns. Thank you, I will give Nacho Daddy another try!

5XKpeCHmpJya-CvN105ytg.text: Such fun vibes in this place and super delicious food! The guacamole was exceptional and the margaritas so fun! Definitely coming back next time I'm in Vegas!

HaLqnBRXmvTJxmOtjuTBNw.text: With a name like Nacho Daddy...this place did not dissapoint....Great ambience, wonderful flavors, excellent service. Had a few Mexican dishes. ..absolutely wonderful   Endorsed by a real Mexican

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tamale-Enchilada Combo plate
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Drinks

oAhUuwhkxjV0zpaZ0vUpCw.text: Good Food, friendly staff, enjoyed the nacho daddy filet mignon nachos... very good and generous with the portions.  Plenty of filet.  I had the blood orange margarita and my GF had the peach margarita both were delicious but could have been stronger.  Great lunch spot to enjoy some good food and watch the games, lots of TVs, everywhere in the place you look there was a tv.

oAc-Tq0S_8j4eO9BkrIOlg.text: While visiting Vegas with my girlfriend I jumped on Yelp to find a good lunch option. I've been Vegan for five years and regularly use yelp to find places with Vegan options! This has to be my favorite restaurant now! They have a full vegan menu. I got the vegan fajitas and my girlfriend got ceviche. Their margaritas were delicious! The food and service were outstanding! I highly recommend Nacho Daddy if inVegas.

bKTAfgSrymL-0BhmBTqgZw.text: When you're on the Las Vegas Strip and someone says they want nachos - where do you go?  Nacho Daddy.  I'd never been to a nacho themed restaurant before. 10+ nacho varietals is pretty unusual - everything from traditional to buffalo/ranch. There's even a gluten free section of the menu!   I would not recommend the tacos. Stick with the nachos and a beer or margarita. Safe and easy. Even on a busy night it's pretty hard to mess up that order.   Definitely not fancy. Definitely not classy. Definitely good enough.

HMGnlAGF1frSogIs1X6kdA.text: We ate here for brunch on Saturday. I had the cucumber-jalepeno margarita, which was not super sweet. I had the chilaquiles with eggs over medium and my boyfriend had the enchilada rancheros. Aria was our server. She was awesome and helped me make my drink and food decision. The chilaquiles were AMAZING. the salsa was fresh, as was the guacamole.. When you check-in, you get a free house margarita but instead she put the price of the house margarita towards ANY margarita! I mentioned it was my birthday, so after we finished our meal, Aria asked if I wanted a free shot or free dessert! I took a shot of Patron, I mean, c'mon, we're in Vegas!  Basically, the service was excellent, the menu was extensive, and the food and drinks were superb. I'll be back here!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. free bday shot!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. the spicy cucumber-jalepeno margarita is the bomb!!!

2lTjqRVVmHLiXD0cNZsxYA.text: Horrible food!  Ordered nachos and we were asked if we wanted Pico de Gallo on it.  We said yes thinking it was actual chunky tomato's with some onion and cilantro.  What came was watery tomato sauce from a can dumped on our nachos.  We were starving and it took us a long time to get served so we just ate it anyway.  Highly disappointed!  We filled up on quest dip and plain chips instead.  Go somewhere else :(

IA2vdKEIwxAyENvv-29CUA.text: Best Nachos in Vegas. Great margaritas too! The spot has standard Tex Mex food that is the best on the strip. But the calling card is the Nachos.

z5vzDqPOs8X2Y1QZTE3aHQ.text: Place was awesome!! Food was amazing the nachos were amazing and the soft tacos were to die for!! I really recommend this place if you want to have a good time and have some good food before you hit the strip. THE MUSIC WAS AWESOME AND THE ATMOSPHERE WAS GREAT !!

5HIAwHcwUnPt7Sq7JCx0DQ.text: Ordered the fiesta nachos and they were delish. Chicken was flavorful and portions were large.

z6QTbdv7T_4HZ66IlcCaIA.text: Leaving our hotel, we saw Nacho Daddy, and my wife wanted to try it. I thought, really? a whole place for Nachos?   Well I was wrong.  It was great. As soon as you walk in you are greeted by a custom Scorpion Tank, made by the fellas from the TV show Tank'ed.  The staff is friendly and helpful.  I ordered the Thai Chicken Nachos. so good. perfect flavor. The cheese was just enough. The Thai  flavor was on point and it was more than enough. Loved it.   My wife got some sort of seafood Nacho. It had lobster and crab I believe. it looked awesome and  there was more than enough.  we both had margaritas which were good and strong. my only regret is not doing the Scorpion shot. There server Alyssa was great.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Thai Chicken Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

4mEBfGbyA0vFABt81gEE9w.text: Always heard great thing's about THIS place and my Husband and I finally went and OMG were the word's so True! He had the chicken and shrimp fajitas that were literally on fire and I had the Thai chicken bowl we're DEFINITELY going bk. We sat at the bar and even their margaritas was off the chain made so perfect. Thanks Guy's-Mahalo

tLWAIXxMGJRHRhTPsmjkHA.text: In Vegas for the weekend to celebrate my birthday & see JLo. Hubby loves Mexican food so he did what everyone else does & checks out Yelp. We took a short walk from The Park MGM across the street to the location next to Buffalo Wild Wings. Thought we had reservations and discovered there are 3 locations. Luckily we got right in. At first I was not impressed, Hot & hangry I suppose. I thought damn it's hot in here & it better be good (what a biatch). Man, was I pleasantly surprised!  By checking in on Yelp, you get a free house Margarita in a mason jar. I am not a huge fan but it was very very good! We order the queso trio to start (fresh chips, hot queso, guacamole & salsa), then the mix & match fajitas (shrimp & filet mignon) came with all the fixins & beans & rice and Elote (off the cob). Thank God we shared! It was amazing from start to finish and Taylor B. our waitress was awesome (all the staff were very friendly & helpful). We ended our meal with a complementary churro sundae that was yummy! And.....for an added bonus we were able to watch The Golden State Warriors win the 2018 NBA World Championship!! We loved the place & we will be back!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

OMCB-d0dK9m8doLRAbd3_g.text: This was my 2nd visit. This place does not disappoint. I had the buffalo nachos. Delicious, spicy and flavorful. I highly recommend if you like spice. My hubby got the pulled pork. Delicious as well and sweet. I look forward to eating here when I'm in town.

Df2Z0kcFnwg8sc1s8ErB5A.text: The bacon cheese enchiladas is scrumptious, it is basically an enchilada stuffed with bacon & cheese!! The huevos rancheros are delicious as well (I had the last visit)!! My husband loved the breakfast burrito, which was stuffed with egg, cheese, bacon, sausage, and hash browns!! I had a couple of the spicy cucumber margarita, great as well but could of used a lil more tequila!! Our waiter was cool, but may have been too busy check on us!! Luckily joe a new agm, came in a saved the day by showing us his superb customer service skills!! Will definitely be back!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bacon &amp; cheese enchiladas!!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spicy cucumber margarita!!

V3AOVslWfolRVnhCAWoDOA.text: What a great concept.  Unique food, great selection of speciality drinks and a fun atmosphere with big screens playing music videos etc.  Would like to see one of these come to the Seattle area.

Ufmv9MwjMN3j5-Oo3l-IHA.text: This was my second time being there and the food and service has been amazing. Their Cali burrito is delicious and their tostada nachos are my favorite. The margaritas are also amazing. I'll definitely be coming back for more. I love this place

YN1m9u6Ulek07I_sr2bjEA.text: Great vegan Mexican food and very friendly staff! After only eating fried casino food for a few days, I needed something a little healthier. Their vegan options were just what I needed!

KwJgs4tcFUZgXWKEVJu8Lw.text: Man the food was awesome, my wife and I celebrating 12 yrs and our friends were celebrating 28 years.. great place and our waitress ( I think her name was Sara?)  Was amazing.. I even asked to speak with the manager to brag about her performance! Thanks guys.. oh, Junior was badass too!

PHbqkU7B0iGArOOsWkJQCw.text: We have been twice but this is my first time reviewing.   The first time we went, everything was great. Food was hot, portion was good, nachos were cheesy, and service was quick. We went on a weekday during lunch hours (I don't recall what day it was). We left FULL and happy.  The second time was the polar opposite. We were seated quickly which is the only plus unfortunately. It took about 10 minutes for the server to even acknowledge we were here. By the time she came, we all knew what we wanted. It took maybe 25 minutes to get our food after ordering despite the fact that it wasn't busy (Monday evening). Two of us ordered nachos and we had to request more cheese! Getting the check took a while too. Maybe it was a bad night.   So three stars for inconsistency!

WBpZ_mE4qjxQrreqWpU0Sw.text: Had lunch at the bar. Chase was a great bartender and server! Great atmosphere. Access from Harmon Ave is easy. Nachos are amazing. Shrimp street tacos are sooooo good. Had a great time. Definitely will come back.

K8F8IYC3xXoJJ6GeZmXM6A.text: The best Nacho place I have ever had! The staff was friendly and courteous the food there is so good we had to go back a second time before we traveled back home. There margaritas are also really good and strong so be very cautious on the amount you drink.

gEv_u-xzvvE3nejGFfFVGg.text: Came in around Sunday 6:20pm.  Only had a few tables with customers so plenty of seating. We got some street tacos (beef and chicken). It was delicious. Beef winning by a small margin. An order of naked wings. Loved the charred taste, very backyard BBQ like. It was a tad spicy. Then we got an order of Fiesta Nachos. Large portion good for 3 people to share. Looking to explore other options on the menu next time.

ZZmRQeS26R-h5TLXar661g.text: The best nachos I've ever had! They aren't lying when they say no chip is dry. The chicken was so flavorful! The bartenders were super friendly! Loved that they play music videos to go along with the music. The margarita was good. Not amazing but was so easy to drink and went down smooth. I'm a foam girl so that's the only reason why I say that. My husband had the street tacos and loved them! Great food!

Amanda and scarlette were really nice! We all talked about Pokemon  and different drinks they have at this location. Great service from the girls. I'm definitely  coming after work  and definitely coming here with my local friends more!

okDTx8aVCKQPx8uRCQ1jnA.text: OMG. Food so good I could cry. Portions are big and the environment is even better !! Good music, lots of TVs and a great indoor outdoor experience !! Make sure if you sit at the bar you ask for Arnold,he's the best.

23GwYo1UZETcw3_RkphFEw.text: Decided to try this place after seeing all the rave reviews. I wouldn't classify it as the best Mexican food but the margaritas were excellent! Use the free house margarita offered through Yelp if it is still available. This margarita was very smooth, I even opted to order a second. The service here is unmatched...never felt I was searching for our server who was prompt at exchanging out my beef street tacos for something else when I discovered they were way too spicy for my pallet.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Daddy Margarita with Four Cheese Nachos.

G2jk1Gmhf9hSpcM91jS7kw.text: They are alright they Good nachos served here, but would like the portions to have been bigger for the price being paid. Then the service is so-so once you've ordered they pretty much to the next table and drink refills are far and in between unless it's alcohol and they see the contents in the glass low.

zdVqMay--rnyYUYys7T4sA.text: Best nachos ever! Free dessert on your birthday. We had great service from Darla today. Tyler was super last week. I highly recommend stopping here for a delicious plate of nachos! They have other food, but the nachos are to die for!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

eoc4rr1uEPlFJEJZhWooyg.text: Service is vreat.cood came out fast. Music was perfect. Vegan options were amazing. Everyone in our party was very happy with the food.

fbRHXzuu9GsxiZBMHLAfZw.text: EAT HERE!!!!!!! EAT HERE!!!!!! Either location is good downtown or strip. Those Fiesta nachos are CRAZY!!!! Wings aka WANGSSSS r so good and its just a plain wing so sauce or n e thing just grilled. Nacho Daddy we need u in NYC. Follow @jackies_food_jaunts for more vegas and ny eats. We had an african american waiter from LA who was DOPE!!. Loved him. So good we had to tell the manager. Food so good we ate here twice and I don't like to eat at the same place more than once during a single trip on vaca but this place was like CRACK hahaha. Dined with a group of 6 ladies in oct. check in with yelp and get a free marg which my homies said it was one of the best drinks they had on the trip.

6zsWQ5nQ5dq_sc4Xl5iJBw.text: Where to start? You walk in and see a pet scorpion in a glass tank. If you're feeling ballsy you can do a shot with a dead scorpion in it. Weirdest/coolest idea ever.  Our waiter was Gabby and she was awesome! She checked in with us a ton.  Highly recommend.

q7snOjEli1gtybZuPMBRKA.text: The food was SO GOOD!!! The service however, not amazing... The server was friendly, but she was pretty preoccupied with her male coworkers chatting, making our wait times ridiculously long when the place was pretty much empty.

fPsdzdMJVdvXio7nFNE3bA.text: By far the best Mexican I have ever had! I had a chimichanga and added queso. The queso is by far the best part about the place. Service was great and food came out very fast!

zpuAQhZBZ7CvRNAYX6bCBw.text: This place is super awesome when coming to vegas, the food is super tasty plus the bar tenders are just amazing. We started by sitting in the bar section and with in seconds Scartlett the bartender came to take our drink orders, I had my typical blue moon and my wife had a white peach margarita that Scarlett recommended, next she brought us chips and salsa and took our food order, I had the naked grilled wings buffalo flavor and my wife ordered the fillet Mignon nachos with in minutes our food was brought to us super hot and fresh as I took my first bite of the wing it just took me out of this world from all that flavor, next my wife tasted her nachos and her first word that came out of her mouth was OMG, the meat as my wife describes it was tender juicy and super delicious, drinks were absolutely amazing will definitely come back again.

qj-C3OlL5-zyq85CUgc4qg.text: I was lucky to arrive here at 5:45pm so just made happy hour. On the recommendation of the waitress (or was she a bartender) I got the chicken street tacos. Super tasty and at 3 for $5, you can't go past them.  Will have to come back for the nachos!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken street tacos

SkQqpQdinMfxkoSytHY69A.text: Perfect late night food for hungry Vegas dwellers. The staff was friendly and the beer was cold!

kSAnrTI9Y8VoS5ViZyeCWg.text: Thoroughly enjoyed the nachos here. We split between two people. Good prices for being just off the main Strip

68NumeuWo1WvuJQXRRon0w.text: Looks like a good restaurant but it's not. Got my  brothers order wrong took another 20 minutes to get so it so the rest of family was done eating by the time I got my food. I had multiple servers yet only one actually helped. Food was horrible rather eat at Taco Bell they don't overcook chicken

795JZsJl0ZH-hc_l9Sz3zA.text: Had an amazing time! Their margaritas are super tasty!! Thanks to Ryan H for being an awesome and fun waiter!!! I definitely recommend going and hanging here!!! 5 stars all the way

7yKZrGHMYGpxZbU0WA1RLA.text: The filet fajita salad was awesome. Our server Arriana was so great!!!! The portions are huge and the free margarita for checking in was really good!
