Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

rzv6fvR_2LhH60PA6yxR9Q.text: Oh my VEGAN GOODNESS!!! I ate here twice while visiting Vegas in December. I had the loaded vegan nachos the first time and the vegan quesadilla the second time. Absolutely delicious both times and this will be a regular stop anytime I'm in Vegas.

HPCh3Jwcc4PbgDmLG5kPkw.text: Sports lovers... this is your place to be! Not the usual Vegas crazy place but pretty for sunday football!   If you are with a group totally order maybe 2 or 3 nacho's they are a good size to share with the group. The BBQ Nacho is a sweeter bbq but still pretty good. My favorite that we had were the enchiladas nachos Grade A!!!  I was a little nervous to try to scorpion drinks but it was pretty cool seeing the tank full of scorpions when you first walk in!  The fried ice cream was ok... the chips that come with it make it alot better but the fried ice cream taste like it was rolled in cereal rather than actually fried... there wasn't any crunch which was a little disappointing but overall not too bad. I would just order ice cream with the chips that come with it if i ever get it again. scoop the ice cream with the chips!

MtdaVSgSzz0ug2o3YH2VWw.text: Yummy food.  Great atmosphere. Been to all 3 locations and the downtown location is my favorite.

lVnzoXCpZgeVYkW5O5u4fA.text: So good! I've been craving nachos every day since we were in on Friday. We had a big group and the staff was very accommodating. I'm going to have to come back to Vegas just for dinner!

n-AjuGX6gx5SYWR_iNHwuw.text: What an awesome time, great service, fast, friendly, and AMAZING nachos. We had a variety, the fiesta nachos were a party in my mouth, the filet mignon nachos were really bomb, then to top it off, the deep fried ice cream with sweet chips for dessert. Yo. This place is LIT. And the prices are totally reasonable as well. Our server was RYAN. Really tall, like, building tall, like, 19ft tall. Great server, friendly, considerate, and very knowledgeable about the menu. He recommended virtually everything since we had never been there before. His service (as well as the other staff we encountered) was an excellent 10/10. Commin back every time I'm in Vegas!!!

2EBxbK8m5t8LTGjZ8l1Cxw.text: Very clean restaurant. Vince was our waiter and was great.  Portions are huge. Fresh brewed ice tea. Ceviche was fresh and tasted amazing. The fajitas steak and shrimp were so delicious. Update: Okay so finished the meal.... well most of it highly recommend all of it. Everyone around me seems as satisfied as I was.  Manager even stopped to ask if everything was ok.  Will be my go to spot when I work Las Vegas area from now on.

97Jm-UhiElKX7Iy5H9j5JQ.text: We came here around 10am and were quickly greeted and sat on the patio.  Our server Miss Ari was so sweet and accommodating and the food was exceptional! They have so many options for vegans/gf like myself, I felt like I actually had a whole menu to choose from! We weren't rushed and loved the whole atmosphere. Definitely will be back

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

sYVv8hMg_P-NsWQ1yMRYaw.text: Free house margarita with the yelp check in! Very customizable menu. As a vegetarian it has a great selection. Good music. And we had the best server. His name was Dj.  He sat with us and talked about places to visit. Will for sure come back and have that dance battle.

fZ3SiCACLXbzIyHTQ1mvAw.text: I was really craving Mexican food while visiting Vegas, so I checked this place out for lunch. The servings were HUGE, and the staff was friendly. My only complaint is that they don't give complimentary chips and salsa like most Mexican restaurants do.

KmQ1ewYuMnmgV9xmlUOzfw.text: I was so excited to try this place on my recent visit to Las Vegas due to the fact that it had vegan options (allergic to dairy and eggs). Nacho Daddy did NOT disappoint! The food was wonderful, the atmosphere was fun, and the service was great. I loved getting a free margarita with the check in! Our waitress even let us upgrade to the bigger one for an up charge of $2. I recommended this place to a friend when he was coming to Vegas the following week. He loved it too! If I ever come back, this will be one of my first stops to eat!

py2ES8Cc06LK5Oy1FPgkiw.text: Very close to the strip. Solid vegan nachos and vegan quesadilla. It was great food to help soak up the dole whip daiquiri I had been sipping on earlier that day.  Food was easy to share. Bathroom was clean enough. Service was good and accommodating.

McpBp9KR5tumMjg4ghSqyw.text: The sweet chili  chicken nachos were okay. Don't understand all the hype. They forgot to add the jalapenos  and there were only three chunks of chicken.

DT45JrJVzB-0izQXXNvJVA.text: Really good food! And great prices! I would recommend this place to anyone visiting Vegas. The drinks are strong too! We got two free drinks for checking in which was amazing. The waiter was super nice. Overall this place is great.

gmSvdBtI-Ltjs_p3EZNmRQ.text: The host at the entrance did not have great people skills but once we were seated, the waitress was amazing. The food was excellent. We started with the chip trio which was a white cheese dip with jalapenos, salsa, & tasty guac! My husband and I shared the steak and shrimp fajitas which were so tasty also. I wanted to try the nachos since that's what drew me there but after the appetizer of chips, wanted something different. So good!

74cr-YuzhRHxlHkAiu8vnA.text: Filet Mignon Nachos where amazing..Margaritas were also great (Spicy Margaritas really spicy). Also had the Lobster and Crab taco and they were very yummy... Good casual spot. Better than most celebrity chef mexican joints..

l60iNUIJQF70smpzVSQkhw.text: The street tacos were fine, the enchiladas forgettable, but this place isn't called Taco Daddy or Enchilada Daddy.  Some of the best nachos we've ever had, and we eat a lot of nachos.  The margaritas were great as well.  If you need an affordable break from the extravagant Vegas strip restaurants, or your idea of good Mexican food usually comes from a truck and doesn't have $40 plates of fish, this place might be right up your alley.

tIUicLD16Pi1-_mH0wvY0Q.text: This is my second time visiting and I'm still hooked! Our server Brittany was amazing and so sweet. We were waiting for other people in our party and she told us not to worry and to take our time. We ordered the Sloppy "Jose" Nachos and they were amazing. Hot, flavorful, and not completely messy like other nachos I've had at other restaurants.  Everything was served to us quickly and Brittany checked on us frequently to see how we were doing. I had the spicy cucumber margarita and my husband had the Cadillac margarita. Both were tasty and prepared wonderfully.  We ended our meal with the deep fried ice cream! Ugh, best decision ever. Perfect amount of sweet to end a meal.   If you're looking for authentic Mexican food this is not the place. If you're looking for a twist on Mexican American food, this is absolutely your new to go stop.    P.S. The last time I visited I ordered the Thai bowl. Omg it was amazing. Something totally different and out of my comfort zone I thought I'd try. I was not disappointed at all!

onSAIRq8iUdYYLNZgAY87g.text: Ryan was really great.   She helped us with recommendation and was really personable and friendly.   The food was good and huge portions.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

NEaqXhOOy9jbDtxd33hTMw.text: Amazing customer service. Jovanny and Tyler give awesome service make you feel at home. We had a blast today our next Vegas trip we will definitely be come back.!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

BANvjerKnZLW2KLHezgnow.text: This is the best option for getting your Eat On when shopping or in the Miracle Mile Shops area! Exit the mall on the Harmon Street side and walk about 50 yards towards The Strip. You can't miss it.   I knew when I tasted the chips and salsa I was in for a treat. The beans and rice had great flavor which was a pleasant surprise, not your ordinary sides.  The entrees, Crab & Lobster Enchiladas and the Baja Combo, were stuffed with deliciousness and very flavorful! And ohhhh...say yes to the Watermelon Margaritas (when in season)!  The service was top notch: gave great recommendations, attentive and very friendly!   Nacho Daddy will definitely be one of our Go To spots when we're in Vegas! Thanks Mark & Mikey!

eqPxI2H7TRJYZ3g1eeZAyA.text: Just ate a full plate of the VGK Nachos and they were amazing! I don't usually do nachos but I crushed these. The flavours were amazing and the filet was perfectly cooked. The Daddy's Margarita is must have as well. Will definitely come back here.

IWZRCcbAcncpyEFMD_7Bsw.text: Definitely not five stars, but it deserves more than four. Solid on all fronts - pretty good food, solid house margarita, and above average service. The food (wet burrito without meat) was genuinely good, but there was no magic in it. That's the only thing that kept it from getting five stars.

wsDKO8esrcTMRw186xVcTg.text: Who doesn't love cheesy loaded nachos?! Definitely recommend this spot. Their HAPPY HOUR has great selection & pricing. Recommend the BBQ NACHOS...to die for ! & lovely service.

pBd1oeLcjq9ig1pbIx8a9A.text: The food was great we hand shrimp tacos, lobster Tacos, and a steak burrito for check in I got a free margarita and it was a . The only reason why I'm not giving this reviews a 4 status because the customer service it was not good tg  waitress was argument because one of our tacos hadn't made it to our table after about 40 min and we were ready to get the tab and no longer wanted to wait

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Specialty drinks

ccV7PpOYzysjvcJe3eU5IA.text: It's really awesome! Only spent a short amount of time in Vegas but I was definitely considering going back a second time! Ordered some of their specialty nachos with spinach chips... They were awesome but the drinks were perfect and pretty cheap compared to most places!

DMtRQsJgrUeuYkIH3pvQVQ.text: The sloppy joe nachos. Not too bad. The daddy margarita was good. We will be back to try more on the tasty looking menu.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

nx6GE1zaFwPwdZKhwXcSBA.text: The food was delicious. They have a full vegan menu which was great for me. I ordered the chik'n nachos. The chips were green. Everything was yummy. I almost ate the whole thing. My friend ordered the breakfast burrito. I didn't get a picture because I was too busy eating my nachos. I also ordered a michelada. Fun place to try it when in Vegas. I will be going again!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

XT14UDBZKep5SgFk_mIZbQ.text: Amazing food and service! I ordered the cheese enchiladas and substituted the corn tortillas to flour. Ended you with the trio (cheese, salsa and guacamole) and chips -- so delicious. I'll definitely be back for more!

wywdqEDKCk1-6_aTAjSeOQ.text: Can't beat a free margarita!  Seriously would have gone here even without the drink. The food was delicious.  Friendly and efficient service.  Would have liked free chips and salsa but didn't need it. Lots of vegan options which impressed me. Wish we lived closer.

GsRs9XRgdISBw62xXwhksw.text: Last week, my boyfriend and I visited Las Vegas. As a vegan, I wanted try out the chick'n fajitas.   Apparently, when I ordered, the server didn't hear me say "vegan," and when our food was brought out, I thought my chick'n looked a little odd until my boyfriend tried it and told me that it was definitely real chicken.   At the time, our server wasn't around, however one of the bartenders nearby approached our table and she handled it very well.   She was very empathetic and she quickly replaced my meal with what I actually ordered. She also asked me if I would like a courtesy drink. I wish I got her name. Thank you for making my visit so much better. :)

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan chick&#39;n fajitas were amazing!

QDV8OR0A7izwLueC81hHeg.text: Amazing nachos! They give a pretty big portion of nachos and they gave me a free birthday shot

5-8ZxAwXfCd_iC5rAqfq3Q.text: We got filet mignon nachos and substituted with lobster/crab. They were truly the best nachos I've ever had. So tasty! The filet mignon tacos... meat seemed over cooked. I'm a medium steak kind of girl where meat is cooked, and typically tender. The rice is pretty great. And hubby loooved the house margaritas. Great balance between sweet and sour. Staff were energetic and helpful. I plan to return.

PHWwVwzek3Xpef2VhPC8hg.text: This place is a must try, there ceviche appetizer was so good and there burritos are mouthwatering so cheesy and meaty definitely coming back.

NsmVSIL3A3to07WCDo9A-A.text: The steak sirloin nachos were mouthwatering, also the margaritas did not disappoint! The wait staff was really helpful and we got our food so quickly! I'd say about 5 minutes? Also lots of screens with different games showing so I'd say great for sports fans.

mSMfoM6gp6QdGrgQal_CTQ.text: Service was a little slow but the corn off the cob and filet mignon nachos were worth the trip! We will definitely come back the next time we are in Vegas. It was affordable and delicious.

tI0X9a-JSo24ozZYQbp_Aw.text: Rachel the bartender is exceptional!! Being a Vegas local, I've been around lots of bartenders and she is amazing! Always has a smile, always checking in, very welcoming and has a great attitude. Give her a raise! Food is not bad, I like it. Glad this place is around the corner from my hotel. I'll refer friends, family, and guests over here from now on.

3qj_WqCaQ3N4gExxA2h66g.text: Perfect in every way! Great music, food proportion is pretty big, you're best off sharing :) great staff . Def coming back , def our go to ;)

Wq67Z_3NcQ_TLtpFd5LmXQ.text: This place was great! It was nice to see a place with vegan options on the menu and the staff so friendly and accommodating.  The music was a little "off" for my family's taste and it's a bit on the pricey side. But what isn't on the strip ? I had the Vegan Spicy Burrito and my sister had the Vegan Chimichanga. We LOVED our food! Very satisfying and everything you dream of for vegan Mexican food. The grease, spiced rice, great salsa, and a good tortilla. I've tried other veganized Mexican foods and have been disappointed several times. Looks like I've found new contender for the best vegan Mexican food. My advice: Save your money, skip the sofritas at Chipotle and try this place out ASAP.

ZA0rKAbrCuFt7zJdMj-Pvw.text: This is probably the best biggest noches I've ever had. Every time I come to Vegas, guess where I'm going... one nacho plate feeds 2! Good price too!

wqxmmGUMOPOFsGQdT9nqlw.text: This place was awesome! Great food, great service, great prices!!! They take care of your nacho needs!

QhcERE77S_1f-J8NMHOfRw.text: Nacho Daddy gave us superlative Nachos piled high with cheese and meat etc!  Best servers and best Nachos ever!!!

YGYPK6guZ1pdm1eDKLhHXA.text: Stopped in here for lunch on a Tuesday. Really great deals on tacos and tequila! My boyfriend and I ordered three tacos and split an order of supreme nachos. All of which were quite tasty. The nachos, although good, seemed like your basic loaded nachos but the price was a little more than I would have quoted it to be. The service was fantastic and the atmosphere set you on vacation.

_Jk1ecjnafJGDmeHNqEhTg.text: Absolutely the best chimichunga I ever had!!the  portions are huge.the atmosphere and server were both perfect.thank you to nacho daddy!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The biggest best tasting chimichanga.Arrnold the waiter was fab

2LSys7s4AibX6RW7JzxGgA.text: Great selection of nachos and other fare, fun place... Just too many rowdy rednecks, at least at the downtown location. Overall good experience.

fFIl9gD0j3lr3zgpRm5cww.text: Good nachos, we had the filet mignon nachos. But ours is never as stacked high as next guys! Anyway, fun atmosphere, friendly wait staff and a yummy margarita with Yelp Check In. Oh and I was randomly chosen by the chef to do a tour of the kitchen. That was really nice. Will be back next time we're in town to try something else.

JQoUMwyhLSuNuu4EsG1okw.text: Looks like a very nice place. Love the scorpion shot!! Would love to come here next time with a bunch of friends. This spot is perfect for a group of friends to come after work (like I did), drink scorpions lol, eat the best nachos in town and just hangout. This was my first experience here and will DEFINITELY be returning!! I forgot to post pictures of the nachos I got, but TRUST ME, they were with excellent!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

dKZluM4BY6tGFXfZGgybgQ.text: The nachos here exceeded our expectations. The drinks we a bit overpriced but we got the special nachos (Cajun) that came with a house margarita that was pretty big and delicious. The service meet expectations, conveniently located, and atmosphere was decent for late nite. Definitely would return.

zZZ7_YTYV1P11yzMIbRJwg.text: So, this place was an all around hit for us during our trip to Vegas. The portions were huge, the margaritas were good and had a good amount of tequila in them (not too much though). We had the enchiladas nachos and the filet nachos and they were both delicious. Service was great too - thanks Luz!

omoBgk4Cm5V8qA7G3QD2Sg.text: Found this restaurant on yelp and gave it a try.  Excellent choice!  Atmosphere is a very cool industrial vibe and food and service were fantastic. I had one of their bowls - healthy, yummy and more food than I could possibly eat. Chips and salsa were delicious as well, with a nice texture and kick. Definitely recommend you give it a try.

8FY9qo8W4Yx3fBf7Z5CPxg.text: Asked for red enchiladas and chose hot but it was bland and taste like tomato sauce very disappointed

H3TOfrRkUmlpXll9ZdCSPw.text: The food here is super good! I had the chicken enchiladas and everyone had a bite and loved them our waitress was really nice (I forgot to get her name) and it was a nice place to grab a bite before heading back home

L3vOPIEAFJ4ttPvx5M30QA.text: The best Nachos I've ever had. The havero ranchero was delicious too. The staff was very attentive and Shannon did a awesome job making us feel comfortable. One of my favourite places we ate at during our visit to Vegas. Super reasonably priced for the quality of food you get.

VCBYgii_pPCmeiuOpTCDoA.text: Five stars! Nacho Daddy had a crazy amount of selections on the menu, there is bound to be something for everyone's taste! We got the filet mignon nachos and lobster and crab enchiladas and they were absolute perfection. Service was great, vibe was cool, food came out quick and the scorpion challenge was really cool, we saw someone do it! Highly recommend for anyone that is in Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Od-CbKZMwdXRsKpjFTxK_g.text: Omg, the best stuff after a long day. I got two bowls of nachos and I have no regrets.

d8HpDg1eIz_TpNSetMv4HQ.text: Allison was the best server we had all trip. The place seemed busy but we felt like the only people because she took the best care of us. The food was also really good obviously nachos.

2rIhRWsAJyHO2Ib8XRdwqg.text: This place is a short walk from my hotel (Aria) and much more reasonable than the hotel restaurants. I came here for lunch with a vegetarian colleague. I had the pork tamale. It was terrific. Came with beans and rice. Just the right portion for lunch. Not too small/not too big. The pork was delicious. My colleague got the veggie burrito which he liked a lot as well.   And the meal was only $12. I paid more than that for coffee and a breakfast sandwich at Starbucks in the hotel.    I'm so bummed though. I didn't realize until I finished my meal that I had a free margarita with check in on Yelp :). Not that a margarita for lunch mixes well with work, but one can always dream.

b5sAaeQOcHZbdHYG0Tm8Ew.text: I thought the price for the fish tacos was ridiculous but when they brought it out it was so worth it. They were giant and super yummy. I would order it again   Tried the crab and lobster nachos and it was just aite. Would not order again  Filet mignon nachos were super yummy. Would order again.   Plus free margaritas with every entree order when you check in with yelp. CANT BEAT IT

QFulg_cQ9-waqHiYNkf1Cg.text: Customer Service was excellent. Victoria was friendly, quick and checked on us if we needed anything. She gets 10!!!  Now the food, it was our first time here, it's located off the strip so it wasn't that busy which was nice. We ordered the Pork Nachos and the Queso, and Guacamole for the appetizer, they were delicious. The only complaint i have is for the price they could have loaded up on the nachos and more pork.  I ordered the Filet Mignon Street Tacos and they were delicioso. They loaded those tacos up with meat, by the 2nd taco I was full, with the 3rd taco I was stuffed. If you like tacos order these!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet Mignon Tacos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carnitas Nachos delicious

bHuq7xtzEsIaGcWmTDCXRg.text: Found this place on yelp and gave it a try. It was amazing had the Cuban Nachos and it did not disappoint. Frozen house margs were just the topping on the cake.. service was outstanding next time we are in Vegas we will definitely come back.

fZ80EF1lRhGroEUrRP-cjA.text: We couldn't get attention from our waitress but the food runner John was really eager to help us with extra utensils, refills, and sauces. We even got free guacamole! We weren't planning on getting desert, but John recommended the chocolate cake. It was amaaaaaazing. This cake is for you if you like really rich deserts. The nachos were not that great as I thought they would be. They look great since they give you such a big portion, but they get so soggy towards the center that can't really eat it without a fork.    Overall the experience was good and the restaurant had a fun vibe.

4iJtgI0fotKo1OXyBdkyfw.text: We loved Nacho Daddy! This place was recommended by a friend and honestly he couldn't have been more on!   I had a group of ten and the waitress was on point, the food was tasty and the drinks were great. I ordered the enchilada nachos to split with my wife and the filet mignon tacos, incredible. We loved both. Highly recommend and get a reservation.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Drink Menu

IgEKBLE1WLFEHXwHhM0V1g.text: Can I just say I was sad.... SAD that we went here the night before leaving to return home from vacation. I wanted to go back again! The place is pretty large so they are great about the turn over without making you feel rushed to eat either. The queso was great! But I would have probably ordered it without the onions if I would have known.  My husband Got the street tacos and I got the fajita burrito. Both of us were extremely happy with our meals. We did wish we would have got one of the nacho dishes as we saw a couple of those come out of the kitchen.  If you are in town hit this place up!

mWqjNSOrhdZ9dRK2jcxA0Q.text: I caved and ordered the buffalo chicken nachos because I'm a sucker for buffalo chicken. I don't recommend them. My friends got the supreme nacho and theirs was loaded with toppings! They also said they were the best nachos they've had! My didn't have much chicken and I had a lot of naked chips with nothing on them. We also got dessert; fried ice cream and churro sundae. Both were yummy! I look forward to coming back sometime and trying something else.  I also used the yelp check in to get the free margarita--thanks!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

mVAXmlFBGZbxrrklTZuyAg.text: Steak and Chicken Nachos - really delicious and got quantity for the price! Filet mignon fajitas were amazing too! They veggie nachos and fajitas is also really good!  The margarita and coffee is okay. The bottom mimosa is pretty good.   Service and atmosphere is excellent. There are plenty TVs with different sports.

cK9Bj2nY2mJC54N-ccpkxQ.text: Came here for my traditional post Rock 'n' Roll Marathon cheese enchiladas. We were in somewhat of a big group and were able to be seated within 20 minutes without a reservation. They have a novelty drink that is a shot of mezcal with a vodka soaked scorpion so of course we tried it and it was great. You get to keep the glass. Our server Eric was a real nice guy that was on his third day working there and we were his first big table to all order the shot. Everyone loves their food. My order was the only one at the table that was incorrect twice but they made me a fresh meal both times till they got it right. I didn't complain and they were very kind about it. Just a mix up nothing major. All in all a great night. We will be back again and again. The management here does a great job and I hope they all keep it up.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cheese enchiladas with half red and green sauce!!!!!

JWlXsimBcOki0SruD8WfCA.text: I came here with some girlfriends before they (NOT ME!) went to see Backstreet Boys at Planet Hollywood. I figured this place would fit the bill for a good booze buffer.  I was so happy to see an extensive vegan menu. I don't know what to do with that kind of choice. I went the nachos route, and it was a huge portion of pretty good vegan toppings. I got the free house margarita with the Yelp check-in, and it was surprisingly bad. I didn't drink much because it was too sweet for me, but my friends thought it was too sour so we left it behind. They seemed to like their upgraded margaritas.  Service was good, and I was surprised how calm the restaurant was on a Friday night. Apparently, Super Bowl Weekend in Vegas isn't the rager I thought it would be.  Bonus feature: the TVs had the kind of videos from the '90s and '00s that I'm nostalgic for: Rancid, Incubus, etc. No boy bands.

QAZYMA5uIrcMmQSjHYuIjw.text: Food was very good. The price was reasonable  The house margaritas were excellent with more than enough alcohol in them. And if you check in on yelp you get a complementary margarita.  The food is not authentic Mexican but it is more like Tex-Mex but very good I would go back again Btw. Service was top-notch.

JoCIbcaK_APNb7zc3X_YnA.text: So this was my first time coming to this location I came in with my family for a early dinner getting to the restaurant itself little pain in the butt even though we parked at the parking lot right across the street in order to get to the restaurant we had to cross the bridge up the elevator through little shopping center because one elevator was out of order finally arriving to the restaurant we folded our stroller left it up front with reassurance that our stroller would be safe we got seated right away were greeted and right away got our drink order taken unfortunately that's where not once but twice I received a dirty cup first one had a chunk of food on the side not wanting to guess if my cup was cleaned or not sent it back to receive another cup with lipstick on it oh boy come on man your already to a bad start sooo thirsty at this point come on dude all you gotta do is look at the cup while you grab it right manager gets sent to our table to apologize for there mistake not once but twice finally a clean cup least I hope with all those people in the kitchen come on man ended up ordering the bbq chicken nachos and they weren't as big as I remembered but still decent amount my husband ordered two scorpion shots before his dinner and the manager took care of our drinks I'm sure there's a system I hope there's a system food was good just too many hiccups for me soo I will return just maybe not this location

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bbq chicken nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

lYnFcjcmBn0dgo5QDIgrvA.text: We came hungry at 9 pm and it took a while to get our drink orders. Once they were brought, the bartender had messed up the maragritas and swapped sugar with salt. The waitress seemed pretty frustrated with us, despite the girls being clear with their order.  When we finally got our food order in, I was happy at least the food was good. Ordered the lobster tacos and they come with refried beans and rice. The breaded lobster was crispy and a perfect complement to the corn salsa and avocado. The beans and rice also had a unique flavor.  Summary - food delicious, service not so much.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

wqS6CE2398mDp1eoT5YCMw.text: What an awesome place to eat in Vegas! Huge menu with tons of great options. We got the Vegas Knight nachos, the meat melted in your mouth! Brother in law got the Thai nachos and they were also delicious. Ceviche was average! I didn't love the margarita I got, was a little heavy on the sour but our server switched it out for something else which was super nice of her! I wish I could remember her name but she gave us great service! Wish we had one of these in St. Louis

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ceviche appetizer

KicFeNnCt_otTLSnX0uSXQ.text: Great tasting, fresh, reasonable and quick!  And vegan options - a whole page of them (see photo)   The churro pancake my guest had was huge and recommended.  I was happy with my spicy vegan burrito lots of flavour and kept me going for a while.  Open early for breakfast and had great coffee.  We were staying across the strip at the Aria and this was easy to access from there.  Good service too, we'd go back.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

WejFbT7hgZhOMQTz2aldNA.text: This is Nacho average Nacho place! Came here twice while in Vegas for a conference. Had the Asian Chicken nachos, which sounds weird, but it works.  Interesting flavor mix.  When they say "Never a dry chip" they mean it!  I for one, hate a plate of nachos where half of the chips have nothing on them.  Not here folks. Second meal was the Daddy's Bowl.  Very hefty portion and good flavors. Chips and guac were pretty good, too. The peach margarita was tasty, but I'd skip their house margarita, its a bit on the sour side. Service was great.  Shout out to my server Huck!!  He's the man when it comes to providing excellent service.  He made great recommendations and took good care of me.  Happy belated birthday!

YTZi1ceWo2eCplDL3zaDMQ.text: We sat at the bar when we found an open table there  and we waited at least 15 minutes and no one came to clean it. They didn't even page us when a table opened up in the main dining area and served other people that came after us.

QKoVBi0ZKr0BoWKVl36cQQ.text: I was excited to try out the nachos from here but service was horrible our waitress Tina didn't seem to know what she was doing we had to remind her about our drinks she didn't stop to ask if we needed anything overall a bad experience

qtFFC0xl6oole4i-u3XeDQ.text: Everything here was delicious!!! Will return again for the drinks, white peach margarita, the food, and  the churro Sundae.

oE9UnUf0sGMQXXt0d2ZcRA.text: Ate here three times on a three day trip and regret nothing. The vegan menu was amazing, get anything with the vegan chicken. Remember to check in for a free marg!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

IbQEYIc0ZEypRLQw5pwvTg.text: Our server Dymond was amazing! Made us feel right at home and special. The white queso was to die for. Yummy chips. Street tacos were good, but I think I'd rather just do nachos next time. They created my favorite drink at the bar, even though it wasn't on their menu. They re-did my moms Bloody Mary when there was too much spice and tabasco and they were so kind to re make it so my mom could enjoy it. Would highly recommend this place and can't wait to go back!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tri dip queso guacamole chips salsa
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Miami Vice

OVvvcemFsi9zHU-jY30i6A.text: Big drink, big nachos , big burritos . Our waitress I wanna say her name was Natalie was awesome . She memorized my stupid annoying order . She was super awesome , this place is 5 stars for sure

hiYlh6z9jr3woqtSf01qsA.text: Great food & killer service!! We will definitely venture in next time we are in town.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

JhnqFVmImVmtllOJa6Lu0g.text: OMG!!! This place is amazing... We went this past weekend and noticed the street burgers were no longer on the menu. I spoke to Peter the General Manager and he did confirm that they no longer served burgers but then advised us that he would speak to the chef Ruben to see what he could do... Ruben came to our table and advised my daughter that he would cook something similar to what she wanted... This guy is over the top!!! My daughter was so happy that he took the time to cook something that was no longer on the menu... The burger of course was delicious... The food, atmosphere and of course the service is incredible!!! We love the nachos, appetizers, tortilla soup and burritos... We all agree that whenever we are in Vegas this is the spot that we will always go to... WE LOVE IT!!!

rTjUV2DbJUK9DETiI8Q1yA.text: After throwing up after a terrible hangover from a night of partying in Vegas - We finally went back to the strip and tried out Nacho Daddy!   Not a crazy fan of mexican food I was pretty amazed that I finished 2 Vegan Chicken tacos all by myself and it was actually extremely flavorful!  One of the best part about Nacho Daddy is that they have a band playing from different time slots and a extremely cool Scorpion tank when you walk into the restaurant. I was even fortunate enough to see a scorpion devour a cricket right before my eyes! It was oddly satisfying !

0PTo7oDFy6-lNvSn0_I5VA.text: It was a nice bonus and definitely a mood booster to get the free margarita from yelp. It was more of a bar vibe than a date out with the blasting music everywhere and patrons being allowed to walk around in bikinis. It was kinda uncomfortable between feeling like did I get lost on my way to the pool ? But our waitress was the sweetest lady ever and there were no problems with our food or service at all :)

nYlBM1FYTXScxLhYS5NqOA.text: Been excited about coming here since ive moved here. Finally got to go and was so disappointed. The food was "ok" but the service was just  bad. Didnt see ANY server with name tag, So I'm not sure who our server was. But you could tell by the way she waited on , not just OUR table, but her other guests as well, she didnt wanna be there. Had to ask for refills. Took forever to get get food. And no, they werent busy. Finally got our food. And not once did she come by to ask of we needed anything... (We did)  But because we already had to ask for refills on our drinks and she never made eye contact with is. We just did without. The General  Manager did come by and asked how we were doing. He got us refills. My wife did mention the bad service we were getting and he just saod " sorry"  And brought our to go boxes. Then the server decided to come ask if we needed anything. At that point we just wanted the check so we could go. Spend $60 on ok food and bad service. We'll stick with Lindo Michoacan!

0p13_AnR5ClDqAOVaar_9Q.text: It's not my nature to complain but our experience was really bad. Food without a doubt good. We sample several items and all were tasty. So the one star goes for the following:  * no plates available * mimosas took forever (food arrived before them) * manager would not come over to our table (ignored us) * everything was "backed up"

3nI_EDmAHEB8FXGVMdalZw.text: Free house margarita with check in! Very attentive staff. Vegetarian/vegan selection is impressive and yummy. Food came out quickly and tasted great! I have the vegan tacos which came in a soft fried pita like tortilla which I've never had before and thoroughly enjoyed!

32vl8xxofRnBvsFaYwTfZQ.text: Ordered supreme tostada nacho w/o meat and vegan fajita bowl with regular sour cream... Food was absolutely delicious and very filling. Will definitely come again! The nachos are spicy... If you can't handle spice... Stay away from it.

4Rg-tzWOgAyoR6xiMHE0PA.text: Love this place, the shrimp nachos my husband added fajita chicken to them,are awesome!

aq38kLtVsFavr0QC7ZspCg.text: If your drunk and want a huge plate of nachos for $15 this is the place for you. If you sober and want good Mexican food keep on looking. Nothing was terrible but it was all very simple and bland. There are too many great places in Vegas to eat to waste your time here. I will give it 2 stars though because our service was good

g3jJqqZ6X-wdJHt_cDW7SA.text: Nacho average Mexican food! But I must say Nacho Daddy is my new go to Mexican place on the Strip! Great drinks and food. But service is where they really hit it out of the park. Mark E. the manager is a great, hospitable host!

0CJknG4NBYCmfy4wJmNe0A.text: This place is absolutely spectacular. The portions are monstrous, Tyler, our server, was extremely friendly and attentive, and the margaritas are delicious. It's right off of the strip, and on a Sunday afternoon wasn't busy at all. Do yourself a favor and get the dipping trio appetizer. The melted cheese is pure heaven.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. So, so good.
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Raspberry margarita on the rocks.

-aIZ4QxP6RdZzZY28BvIjQ.text: I love Mexican food - and tequila just as much. I was happy to find this place near the Miracle Mile shopping area.  I was happy to learn they had specials on both on a sunny Tuesday in November.  Service was so- so.  The place was pretty empty and the server seemed hungover and dis-interested.  Luckily she did tell me about the taco and drink specials - 3 tacos for 5$ - YAY and 2 for 1 top shelf tequila!  Yay again!  Corn tortillas are a little thick and chewy for my taste, but I like that they have lobster and crab, both fresh and well seasoned.  I will be back to try the Nachos!

kYURmQ7wkdkAOWfnd3nfCg.text: Vince is the best server in this establishment. Awesome guy, great food, amazing customer service! A must go!

8ImqifwD0vVGRsxxQw0D-w.text: I had the vegetarian chick'n nachos. I could eat this every single day it was that good.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mouthwatering

YLS2GGa_Owh1WioJM0xKhw.text: The food was good. The drinks were okay. The people who were working when I was there... definitely seemed miserable like they hate their jobs.  The hostess just seemed generally miserable and had to ask another person how long she should make us wait right in front of us. I don't know if she was new or uncertain, but either way she was grumpy. I had to bite my tongue because this group that came in 10 minutes after us got seated before us. Same hostess said to them let me check where we are with tables and then immediately sat them. Meanwhile we were put us on a waitlist and said I would get a text which never happened.

Rc8HkWDgsXH7cIssY0H6lw.text: Arieanna was friendly and very knowledgeable  about the menu. We went with her recommendation and picked the Supreme Tostada Nacho and OMG!! These Nachos did not disappoint! It's so hard to find a good order of nachos, this place sure knows what they are doing! All of the ingredients tasted so fresh and tasty! It all came together perfectly! I also ordered the breakfast taco, the tortilla was soft and buttery, the beans were perfect, rice could've been softer but the great flavor was there!  Thanks for the recommendation and friendly service! You Rock!!! Please bring one to Orange County!!! Definitely looking forward to coming back here next time we visit, why we didn't come here more throughout our visit is beyond me! Come check them out, you won't be disappointed!

lWXvWqCNXmMF8CqibtIHhw.text: Let me just say- 2 for 1 breakfast yes please!! The bacon and cheese enchilada breakfast bomb.com. I literally scraped my entire plate clean! While I was here you know i had to try there nachos and OMG orgasmic in my mouth . There was just so much goodness from those nachos I ordered a to go plate for my late night munchies haha. Definitely my go to spot when visiting Vegas. Also there was plenty of seating and plenty of tv's .

SZqvDkWzpCUTG1xz1Y1EMQ.text: Nice surprise.  Delicious fajitas.  Great service.  Nice ambience.  Good value.  Reservations accepted.

uXUnenX0q8TNKo7YPjZjMg.text: Surprisingly delicious!! went in there with low expectations and was blown away, the nachos were so good! and my carne asada burrito was awesome! make sure you get the free margarita with a yelp check-in. It was a pretty strong drink *buzzed*

oB-aqoAQiKYtZwO_HV2NYQ.text: If your in Vegas, this is a must.  Go HERE! I  love it, ceviche is bomb, and the queso dip bomb bomb, addys margarita deliciouse Giovanni is awsome!!!!! Thanks, i think this is gunna be the spot when I come visit.  Giovanni is awesome, good luck hopefully you get him as your server!

ARfTKXzac8oNX8KwsUSj2g.text: Being vegan in Vegas is tricky. Nacho Daddy had great service and a large  selection of vegan food! We had the vegan queso and tortilla  bowl and both were delicious!! This place is a must!!!

Y2GLvpLkcDSslTWk2o72Vg.text: Loved the atmosphere & the food was good! Parking was easy. I got the flaming wraps and they were delicious.

5KUwYhu8CYNEpkROeRsa5w.text: Great nachos and great drinks and the service was excellent. Will come back on a future trip to sin city for sure

pySAo680MCy1sjRpQbNrAw.text: OoooooooooMmmmmmmmmGggggggggg Im more then amazed about the vegan options this place has and the great great service and atmosphere is freaking amazing tho!!!  Was sooooo worth 1.5mi walk from the room!!!!

dRk6prkDguhaNi4AdgMx_g.text: Two words to describe the food at this place: high quality. My family and I were extremely impressed by not only the amazing food but also the awesome attentive service. We found this restaurant and were shocked by the almost perfect reviews so we had to check it out and it did not disappoint. First place that we've seen that serves filet mignon in their nachos and fajitas which defines high quality. The atmosphere was so much fun and the services were extremely friendly. The free margarita due to our check in was an added bonus. This will be our go to spot from now on for our Vegas trips!!

NWg7HpDtLO7HipHkGb290w.text: Found this place late and got the fish tacos. Generous portion, topped with a lot of corn salsa. And came with rice and beans. Fun atmosphere and free margarita with check in on Yelp. Rico took care of us. Fun hang out and decent prices.

YdBcgIdb0nINcIoO_i1xUQ.text: Went to Nacho Daddy this past March and it was pretty good. Got a free margarita for checking into yelp. Service was good and their saying is never a dry chip. Have to say all my chips were covered in something. Great tv selection for watching all the college bball games. Food was nice and hot. Would come back to try again.

epY2xp-_Gx0Sb1vXqs2tQg.text: So first impressions: Vegan food has an actual menu! Most vegan options are pretty limited on the strip, but they have chick'n "meat" and the flavors are very well done. Looking for vegan options on the strip was limiting me to Wahlburgers for the impossible burger and fries. So when I saw this menu? I was in!   We ordered the chicken fajita platter and the special chick'n chimichanga. Both were vegan, although my dinner date didn't care for the black beans or wild rice. The flavored were good, and the unlimited chips and salsa have a good flavor. I liked their guacamole, it was really fresh and well flavored. I don't think the beans and rice were terrible enough to knock off a star, and the service was good, but a little slow. I liked the flavors, and the food was plated nicely and had good portions. I didn't the nachos, but they looked PHENOMENAL. Next time it's nacho time!   Entrees were about $15, and a small appetizer with two waters made it a big meal. Overall, $45 with a 20% tip for two wasn't bad at all.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

VV7JtG6ObEdW6-ixRgPqZQ.text: During our visit to Vegas, we went to many fancy places, but Nacho Daddy was the most memorable in our trip... and we ended up eating here twice! I am so going to miss their nachos. Simply THE BEST

hBRXZF9fnYgqdwjFOqGUOg.text: Great variety of deliciously tasting nachos in big portions. Quick and efficient service.

5RSzwpZ5AlI_X7k8_Qf2NA.text: Best NACHOS in Vegas! Arnold the bartender is awesome he makes great margaritas and the service is 5 stars. This place is a must stop when in Vegas. I will be back soon!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

wJAjjQlJdmhmAG4BZRNCmw.text: I dig it! Nacho Daddy kept coming up in my gluten free and vegetarian friendly searches (my friends are GF, I am veg). I didn't think we would end up going, but it was actually our first meal this trip in Vegas!  First and foremost--this place was HARD to find. It was listed as being in the miracle mile mall, but you actually have to enter from outside. Once we were outside, getting back to planet hollywood was no issue at all, but yeah, just a good note. If you are coming from the strip and facing the walgreens attached to the mall, you want to go down the block on the right, i think its 2 blocks.  We started off with a pitcher of skinny spicy margaritas. That isn't on the menu, but they were able to do it for us which was legit. Those margaritas were good and a great way to get the weekend rolling.  We had vegetarian queso, quite tasty. I wanted to get nachos with also ordering queso, I figured I should reign it in and I got Chick'n tacos. Anytime I can get fake meat at a restaurant I do, and this did not disappoint.  Very much recommend for a fun, casual meal.

4FMDhoh2RB6fIeN6XbEu3A.text: Great food & taco Tuesday deals. Excellent service. Our server Victoria was awesome!!! Entire staff rocked!

jCy62DI8nN80kbgV0WXjBQ.text: Go here and get the elote and chimmichangas at happy hour- you will not regret. While the margaritas were very average, the above mentioned small plates completely made up for it. They were so yummy that I came back and only ordered those two things multiple times.

6yr8NcXTlzGQAGwO96udLg.text: This place is a lot of fun. Found it on yelp and was there 30 mins later. We had 11 people and they were great to us! The nachos are REALLY impressive and the margaritas are equally delicious. The service was noticeably slow but we were a big group and didn't mind. Great restaurant and would gladly return on our next trip! I definitely liked the "beer-Rita"

iZbPVlmIE-mFbRBrwyfNKw.text: I had the happy hour special and it was amazing! I would recommend the Mexican corn and the Thai tacos! They are delicious! The only Problem is it's only two tacos so it's not that filling

z1uhS7U4M-fFLRIPEj_eew.text: This place weirded me out when I walked in. They have a huge container full of crickets right by the front door. I had to look closer and saw some black scorpions in there but they weren't eating the crickets so I didn't see any action lol.   I only ordered the daddy wings and the lobster/crab nachos. They were both great!!! I recommend that. I couldn't drink thier margaritas this time because I was taking a break from drinking but I will definitely come back when I am not on this alcoholic break haha.

6F7k7_j-Qwc0QqtRU4vErw.text: Food portions are generous and the atmosphere is fun. Litzs was friendly and quick! We will definitely be back.

7mMssgt6hOZXlS_BVaaoSg.text: So good! I was excited to checkout Nacho Daddy because I saw that they had a lot of vegan options. My boyfriend and I ended up going there our last day in Vegas for lunch and we were so impressed.   He got a plate of nachos with chicken and I got a fajita plate with vegan chicken and vegetables. Both of our plates came with a lot of food, and if you're interested in getting the same thing you could definitely share with someone else.   It all tastes really fresh and flavorful. My boyfriend also got a margarita and enjoyed that as well. Check it out, highly recommend!

lFZGEtnUVf_AwW9Env8FgA.text: Nacho daddy is soooo delicious their Baja shrimp burrito is the best absolutely to die for every one needs to try it you will not regret

smnV8_XxveToA8yE3bHBvw.text: Had a great dinner here last week- our server Sophia was fun, friendly, and took excellent care of us. Love the big page of vegan options!!! Also I enjoyed the music they were playing.

Filet nachos were good and definitely a shareable plate, plenty of food. Would recommended and return in the future.

8PsTlUSaPMfyquBQ-KFh9Q.text: Another great visit to Nacho Daddy on Harmon.  Excellent Breakfast Taco, and quick, polite, personable service from lovely server Ari.   I need to come back for dinner and try the Scorpion Shot!  Will return every trip !

4kyTE6Roska91_CbvrCs4g.text: Ok, so this is not Mexican food. Period.  It has a great potential since it's on the strip and everything else is super expensive but come on ... no spices no love  I had the chips and salsa which were a bit dry, felt like they came out of a bag from last week , no salt no lime what's up with that?  The meet dish was basic, no spices or flavor, someone needs to slap the kitchen staff and replace them all, or at least check their recipes, this was a waste of important real estate in my stomach.

E9yoi1JQiWYh7bq3ICTubg.text: Only complaint was they told us we were on a waiting list and after waiting more than 15 minutes we go back to the hostess to find out we weren't. But anywho the food was AMAZING!!!!!!!! I had a Vegan Chimichanga but added regular cheese and sour cream to it. IT WAS ABSOLUTELY DELICIOUS!!!! My husband had a fajita burrito and he said it was delicious as well. Definitely recommend if you are looking for Mexican!!!!

I_jwl7AbtHIOQamgstyKYQ.text: Great service, amazing food! Nachos were delicious! Perfect for sharing for 2 people with medium appetite. Order nachos with filet mignon!

sd5-bpy6459b7Wyz3WoDPQ.text: Good, not great. We got seated at the bar after waiting for a table, which was fine. Food was okay, I would've cared for more spice and flavor. If spicy is not your thing, then this is a good spot for you. It is also so strange that so many Mexican places in the area don't give free chips/salsa. As vegetarians, we don't always like to order from the vegan menu because we like cheese and sour cream. I thought it was weird that they charged us to replace refried beans with black beans, especially since we opted out of adding meat. Substitutions shouldn't be extra. Check in with yelp to get a free house margarita, if the offer still stands. That was worth it.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

-x-m2FHvpad6mkv418GWyA.text: With a name like Nacho Daddy, who wouldn't want to eat here???? Perfect casual Mexican spot with s great name so when we saw it on yelp, we had to try it. We sat at the bar so we could eat immediately given we were still on east coast time. The queso was delicious - the trio was a good call for an appetizer. As an entree, my surf and turf tacos were huge and super filling. Good flavor and unique taco shells worth trying. We didn't get the nachos but boy did they look great!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

aOhXXrC1WDl_qPvxOH29AA.text: Let me start by saying, I love nachos. When we were visiting Vegas, we couldn't pass up going to Nacho Daddy. When you walk in, there is a big scorpion tank. It's fun/creepy to watch while waiting for your table. It was a Friday night and we were seated within 5 minutes.  The service was great. Everyone was friendly. Waitress was attentive and our drinks were always full. For food, I shared the Fiesta Nachos with my mom. Definitely enough for 3-4 people. I'm not a huge guacamole fan, but Nacho Daddy's guacamole was the best I've ever had. The nachos were obviously delicious.  It was my birthday so they gave me a complimentary tequila shot. I also ordered the churro sundae which was phenomenal. It was a great atmosphere with yummy food. I'd recommend visiting while in Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Churro Sundae
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My complimentary birthday tequila shot
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nacho

Y-S1MKWB9NrRqCCBFMCZHg.text: If you're eating on the strip, don't.  If you still are, I guess Nacho Daddy is an okay place to do it.  I had a smothered burrito.  It was a little on the expensive side ($15+),but of course if you're eating on the strip you shouldn't expect to get out for under that.    The food came out pretty quick and it was decent.  The meat was flavorful, the guacamole was also solid.    My main issue is that like any place on the strip, if you drive 7 or 8 blocks to the East or West, you can get better food for less.

flxnMd_H6nDbJbo5LGpsbQ.text: A very meh place. Nothing horribly wrong, but I wouldn't go out of your way to come here. I got the chicken tamale and checked in on Yelp for a free house margarita. Our waiter told us to upgrade to the larger size for only $2-$3 for a higher grade of tequila, which 2 of my friends ordered. Here are my thoughts...  Chicken tamale: 3 stars. COMES WITH CILANTRO (not marked on the menu). It was definitely not the best tamale I've had. Not awful but I love tamales and I couldn't finish this one. It was too salty but not flavorful, if that makes sense. It lacked taste, and the salt only made it worse.   House margarita: 5 stars. Tasty and adequately alcoholic. The tequila in the house margarita actually tasted better than the upgraded one my friends got. This seemed more alcoholic as well.  Upgraded margarita: I can't rate this as I didn't order this but my friends said the tequila didn't taste good and it was barely alcoholic. Stick to the house margarita!  Service: 1.5 stars. Our waiter was nice but ohhhh my god was he slow. It took him 20 minutes to grab our bill, then another 20 to figure out how to separate our checks. My biggest complaint was his response to me not realizing there was cilantro on the chicken tamale. I specifically checked the menu to make sure cilantro wasn't listed, as for many other food items, it was on the description as an ingredient. When I told him I can't eat cilantro, he said "you should've told me this when you ordered" and he annoyedly took my plate back. Pretty sure all they did was scrape off the mound of cilantro on top, as I could still taste it and saw bits of it in my food when I got it back. Waiter has a point that I could've mentioned this, but he could've been nicer in his tone and the menu was misleading.  Would not come back, but if they're still running the Yelp deal for a free house margarita, sure, come here I guess...

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Tamale

1708cV3m-uXmBjG223Ny0g.text: This place is unique in many ways, design, food. The staff excels at service, conversation. Had the scorpion shot.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Had the . Still picking eco-skeleton out of my teeth. Yummy

FH5YH8S3t9QngeEfExsjAw.text: Got here for brunch and was so happy with the food and the service! We ordered vegan chicken loaded nachos, vegan chicken quesadillas and chicken fajitas. The vegan chicken loaded nachos are to die for! Soooo good! Loved the food here!!

0Eg3ntklWwtFAWPyNZE27w.text: Thanks to Yelp we found this quick Nacho and margarita place that's slightly off of the main strip. We got to sit outside and enjoy some sun.  I split an order of Fiesta Nachos which were delicious! They came out on a hot plate and a huge pile of chips and topped with cheesy goodness. Some of the best nachos I've had. Somehow the chips magically stayed intact under all the toppings without breaking into tiny pieces. The best part was that the prices weren't crazy high like everywhere else we went and the portions were hearty. I left full and happy!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nachos- yummy!

4PNYFcuPUhoTl1gH89JoSg.text: Overwhelming. If you like loads of stuff on your nachos knock yourself out. I like it simple and the plates are huge and pretty pricey. It was an experience but I won't be returning.

hHFyJyBN48P2JazcdqcQCw.text: The nachos were amazing! Definitely a huge portion you could definitely share these. The stresses was great and very friendly. The computers were down and she was very good about it we weren't in a rush and had no where else to go so it was no big deal and she was very apologetic.

McXUi_XMZ_aIlI43gZsjJQ.text: Delicious meal.  Got nachos of course and so filling! Definitely shareable between 2 people.  Not a dry chip in there...which is a plus and minus.  Ever chip had flavor, but because they used liquid cheese, the chips got soggy pretty fast.  Had margaritas to compliment the meal which was delicious as well! No complaints here!!

m-VQbzpTh_akw1_pyU6AgA.text: Kiel is extremely friendly and awesome if you stop in. I highly recommend stopping by if you are in town. The food is delicious and more then generous with the portions!

zIgnvdTQ0ixciB67D8iu5w.text: Great service. Good solid food. Hands down best margaritas with ridiculously too much tequila. Gonna feel it in the am but who cares. Would recommend anyone who wants a nice buzz or to get down on wings or  nachos it's a must try.

o-aUDIkgcP2mdiMqmqOnSw.text: I make better nachos drunk in my bathtub. Cool music videos, though. Decent location.

LAXYBUhuWq8gIao2HZKJuw.text: Arienna was an excellent sever. Great meal and great experience. I will definitely be returning.

m8cLiXmmzvsggmk_xXdi_A.text: Great service and killer food! If you are looking for nachos or Mexican food, Nacho Daddy is the place.

NfjyvVnVVOsFTMcQcIii7w.text: Awesome! Had a vegan menu addition to the regular menu so both my husband a I could could enjoy!  Food was out quick and service was great! Delicious

hi79Yp_HTv_1AEBT_OveWg.text: Not bad... great food, very good service as well. The nachos can be shared and the all you can drink mimosas is a good deal as well.

F61IVydlgbeHGOIrabn7mg.text: Giving this place five stars for five reasons... 1. Arieanna- She was super fantastic, honest, and charming. Listen to her suggestions! 2. The Cucumber Margarita- I substituted tequila for vodka and, ohhh myyyy!!! 3. Green Enchilada Nachos- Just yum. 4. Naked Chicken Wings 5. Ice Cream Churro Dessert- Drool.  If you're in a hurry for fast drinks and service, or if you are starving and looking forward to your main entree, skip this place. Also, skip the Pina Margarita, and Lobster Nachos, unless you are into super sweet food.   Will definitely come back.

ptQn7tO5eAKFFzTfj-AZUA.text: Jovanny is a terrific server at this restaurant!   We have enjoyed this spot since it opened.  Today, back again.   Jovanny had great food recommendations and super service and attitude.  A pleasure!

cOh7Lh4mAMgT4YrbLMu-7g.text: I was taken agast the moment I sat down with the friendly wait staff and very diverse Margarita menu. As the 90's alternative rock begin to loosen my loins I started to spread my legs to the idea of jalapenos in my Margarita. The nachos were pure nirvana, with chips worthy of a Chevrolet durability commercial; and freshly made guacamole on literally every chip. I started to lose myself in the sensory overload that is nacho daddy. I guess easy E described my experience with nacho daddy best, when he said  "Don't quote me boy 'Cus I ain't said shit".

zxG_L7tDkkUTmztUjLQkCg.text: After looking at pictures and reading reviews, my whole family was definitely excited about coming here. Our experience started out pretty well, we had a very friendly waitress who was very attentive. After about a 30 minute wait, the guy comes over with our food, with two mistakes. My sisters both ordered fish tacos without cilantro, and they came out as shrimp rather than fish, and it was topped with cilantro. 3 stars is sufficient enough for this place, their food and service are top-notch, though there are a few flaws overall... An above-average place, but did not meet our expectations.

ZO2zXpGt3XlfDBaSZRFdFg.text: Came here for my friends birthday and jovanny was amazing!! He helped make our experience so fun and memorable. Will definitely be back!

nw7eiVUpztLhxW3Vf7Us3g.text: The foods were great. We love fillet mignon nachos! You should definitely eat Mexican corn! Decoration is awesome. We just had a little problem at the beginning since no body came to our table to get our orders for 10 minutes. However mistakes happen, Mark solved the problem immediately. Next time we are in Vegas, we will try more food.

qR8Gl9__UD3F4l24poOgwA.text: Two of my friends and I came here late tonight to grab a bite to eat. This was the best decision ever!!! First, they have a vegan and vegetarian menu (I am vegetarian) and it was delish!!  My carnivore friends had a hamburger and the smothered burrito. The chicken in the burrito reportedly was very tasty and it was the best burrito she's ever had. The hamburger and fries were both really good!! We topped it off with the Carmel Apple Nacho which was sooooo good!!! Hazel, our server, was excellent and the manager, Edward, made the visit extra special! Thanks for making our trip to Vegas even more memorable!!

Y19N8zEt6_OoKuwq5GbK5Q.text: There were 4 of us who dined at this restaurant in Nov 2016. Veggie Spicy Burrito was good. The spicy sauce made it taste good. However, Burrito by itself tasted bland and had more tofu taste. Spicy sauce is very spicy so be careful. Veggie Loaded Nacho was good. Not great though! Enchiladas is good. However, my in-law had ordered some chicken plate and was very dry and we had to replace it with another enchilada. First it took them a while to get his order out and then to find it was all dry. Then by the time enchilada came, not much hunger or mood left! However, their dessert dried ice-cream was really good. The cancelled item showed up on the receipt and we asked them to cancel it which they honored.  Friendly customer service. But overall food was okay. Definitely try their Fried Ice-Cream! 1 Spicy Burrito = $12.95 1 V. Loaded Nacho = $14.95 2 Enchiladas = $19 Add Peppers = $1 Add Mushrooms = $0.50 1 Fried Ice-Cream = $8.95 Personally we will never visit this place.

n1MxDz8UGfPC8XCtISqVLg.text: Sadly I have to downgrade my previous review due to really horrible service but I ate at the bar so I think that the problem was the bartender. The food was great so I recommend NOT eating at the bar, the bartender seemed too overwhelmed by her responsibilities or she just didn't give a crap about someone who wasn't drinking and just wanted to eat,  Sit at a table and you will be OK

4Ognb-rHm0CC7uihcDbobQ.text: Went here with the gf because of the vegan options. Did not disappoint! We shared the vegan street tacos, which were delicious. She had a kale salad and I had the vegan nachos, which were an excellent approximation of the real ones, with plenty of pickled jalapeno. The service was also very friendly and fast.

C7ewUbOaOKRxHr2Lfgr1DA.text: Big portions of greasy food.  Good for groups getting drunk.  There is way better Mexican food around.

d2lqQOo7sj5aM85uu_PJ3w.text: We were visiting from Chicago and went to Nacho Daddy. The nachos were good BUT the the service was the best I have ever had ANYWHERE! Whitney was absolutely amazing! We were indecisive and she came back at perfect intervals to check on us.  She was the most friendly and attentive server ever! The managers came and asked us how everything was and even the man clearing the table asked if he could get us anything. I will definitely be back because of the service alone!

OvfbmXsG620hlIfQuDyZuA.text: We are finally back to Las Vegas and to not your Nacho Daddy's.  Service was great.  Thank you Eric.  The hostess seems to be the same young lady that was here last trip, she's great.   The food was wonderful and just as we expected.   We just had the Supreme Tostada Nacho.   It was great. During happy hour from 3 to 6 PM Monday through Friday house margaritas are only $5.

fuHRITRciWp4NjaXahDBPA.text: Will someone please be my investor so I can open one of these in Milwaukee? The sports bar vibe is great - plenty of TVs for watching games. I know there's a whole other part of the menu, but our group of 4 all got different nachos, and they were THE BEST I've ever had. Not only do they have 1 whole page of vegan options which is phenomenal, they also had some super interesting and different flavor combos (chicken tinga, Philly cheesesteak, lobster & crab, etc.) and they all come on a cute cast iron skillet. I got the Thai chicken nacho - plenty of chicken, wonderful sweet chili sauce, pickled jalapenos, heaps of ooey gooey delicious white queso and house-made spinach chips that didn't get soggy even towards the bottom of the pile. They also have their own beer which was tasty too. I really wish I had one closer to home!

668YHfTNsJMHJKbIJFpfuQ.text: It was great food, atmosphere, and service. We shared the quest and salsa. I opted to get the chicken tinga nachos and it was a massive size. I needed up taking it to go. My brother and dad shared the flaming chicken fajitas which I sampled. The chicken was tender and full of flavor. Our server lit the fajitas tableside! Would definitely recommend and return my next visit to Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu photo

LdzoZqIBq86NVgvOQ_sbxw.text: Here for the nachos but not the awful service from our waiter Buck. Would give this place 4-5 stars for the delicious food and friendly staff BUT our waiter (just him as the rest of the staff was awesome) was very rude. He didn't offer us water, didn't check on us aside from taking our order and bringing our food, and then he gave us attitude when we tried to redeem the free house margarita offer for checking in on yelp. The nachos were amazing though so I may have to go back in hopes that I get a nice waiter.

zbrgAeHu3u5ic2wzvAYG-Q.text: I've got to be honest here. I was certainly not impressed with my experience at Nacho Daddy. Me and my family were looking for a quick bite to eat before a concert and the wait wasn't super long at 5:00pm on a Friday. So we decided to give it a try. Not to mention that it has good reviews.   I guess I will tell you about the positives. The vibe is super cool. The restaurant was clean and the service was friendly. They also blasted old 90's music videos which were fun to watch and listen to.   The food on the other hand was not that good at all. Like seriously, it was not yum. First off, chips and salsa aren't given to the table. They were an appetizer for like $5.  I feel like complimentary chips and salsa are a must.   I ordered the California burrito and it luckily came with chips and salsa. Too bad they came out with my meal and not before. The burrito was cold and the green sauce it was smothered in tasted like water that was colored green. It was also cold. The chips were over salted. I left with a slight stomach ache.   I will not be back anytime soon.

-H2N_qzAo1egUTzNuHWhkQ.text: Pros Friendly service. ++ Food is good the vegan options are nice.  + House margaritas are tasty.+  Cons I feel it's a bit overpriced. Downtown location doesn't have a lot of room and they get busy.    Will visit again.

7c-e9sx08wnN2qcUT7oOvw.text: I love this place and make sure to stop by at least once per trip; it's a great location just around the corner from Planet Hollywood, an easy walk from any city center property.  Margaritas, nachos, and ambiance are all great. They're open late!  Be sure to get a Daddy's Margarita to go! Staff is always fun to hang with. I believe Tuesday is Taco and Tequila Tuesday.  A few months ago, I would have given this a full 5 stars, this is mostly a 4.5, but that's because they knocked off my favorite menu item:  Moco Loco Nachos.  Those were a must have every trip, but eh, get the Vegas Knights as an alternative, but man, if those Moco Loco are back, let me know!!!

clDkNG8C2oh8DRfHHA8xFA.text: I came here too full to want to live, but I couldn't leave Vegas without trying Nacho Daddy. I broke my POS FitBit here (RIP), but I ain't even mad.   They were packed on a Saturday night with a 40min wait for two, but my girlfriend and I managed a seat at the bar. We just ordered the vegan nachos and got a free margarita with Yelp check-in. They were probably the best vegan nachos I've had (or a close second to a place called Chive in Michigan), and would fool most anybody who didn't know better. It was also probably the first time I had nachos where there were more toppings than chips -- good shit.   I can't say much more about Nacho Daddy since I wasn't there long and didn't order much, but based on *just* the nachos... this place is p r i m o.   RIP FitBit.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan nachos. Pretty much impossible to tell the difference. Get these bad boiis.

BWu2aTjhCgXUyCPfyuhi-w.text: Came here for the scorpion shots. 10 pm on Saturday night not during peak season - it was relatively quiet. Despite this, service was kind of slow. Food was ok. There is a HUGE screen to watch a game on.   So, scorpion shot. Expensive for a shot, but they know why you're getting it. You get to keep the shotglass. Yes, I ate my scorpion. Swallowed the first one and when my buddy refused to eat us, chewed the second. Tasted kind of crunchy and herbally, not my favorite, but not disgusting. They are small anyway.  The inconsistent service and the lackluster food though makes it unlikely I will return.

s-KGUOphIyDdTGcSEyeSyQ.text: One of our places we always come too when we are in Vegas.  Crab & Lobster Nachos are the hot in my family & the Mexican corn!

l-_MFcALQLoAqWRK8nySOg.text: I really like this place!!   Nacho Daddy has very reasonable prices and an awesome happy hour (Monday - Thursday, 3 - 6)  I tried the enchilada nachos ($15) with red sauce and they were wonderful. Some of the fullest nachos I've ever had, each chip was beautifully smeared.   We sat on the patio and enjoyed people watching. Our server Emily was awesome, along with the host.  $5 Margaritas and small plates during happy hour!!  I am not vegan, however, they had an entire page on the menu with vegan options.  Located on the Harmon side of Miracle Mile near Buffalo Wild Wings / Taco Bell   I will return with every Vegas trip to come

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BBQ Brisket Sliders * Strawberry Marg * Enchilada Nachos

vY3sDrenCmDwClc3w8yHDQ.text: Ratings don't lie.  Busy Friday night 20 min wait no big deal.  Seated and helped by Liszt she was great.   Helpful and attentive!  Hey get the free margarita for check-in.   Super sweet with a nice kick.  Big portions so we kept the ordering under control.  MexiCobb salad fresh and crunchy.   Yes this is a nachos place so more toppings than greens but it all worked!   Flavorful dressing not drenched.  BBQ pork nachos were 'da bomb.   Mound of chips and warm queso.   Tangy tender pork.   Crispy onions on top.  More than plenty to share for 2.  Put it on your list to try.  We weren't really drinking but cocktail options look excellent.  Pretty noisy but not out of control.   Bar feel yes but you can still feel comfortable here as a family.

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Kitchen

sptwmCr8x3AB6qVCALPp3A.text: For vegan food on the strip, Nacho Daddy is certainly one of the better options. They feature a whole separate vegan menu, which is a lot more than can be said of most restaurants. But not only that, the food is actually pretty good!  I've now been a couple times, but was most impressed with my more recent dining experience. My co-worker and I went here for lunch during a conference. However, we got sort of lost/side-tracked on the way there. Nacho Daddy is not really part of a mall, but if you head through the Miracle Mile mall it will eventually spit you out right next to Nacho Daddy. I was first annoyed and frustrated that this appeared to be the only way to get to this part of the street. However, note if you keep heading towards Harmon from the strip you CAN get to Nacho Daddy without going through the mall. There is a small gap for a pedestrian walkway, but very easy to miss. Don't make our mistake and walk through that awful mall.  Coming for lunch on a weekday, the place had plenty of open seating (both outside and in). We got seated and started being served/assisted by a super friendly dude with a mohawk. I ordered the avocado beer battered tacos, and we shared an order of chips and guac. For the latter, maybe it's just because I've been temporarily based out of the east coast for a year and a half, but these chips tasted damn good. The tacos were also good, but I have had better (specifically, better beer battered avocado tacos). I think they needed better garnishing, etc. and possibly a more flavorful sauce. Still they were good, and also nice to be able to add some beans/rice on the side to fill out the meal.  Additionally, I ordered one of the house Nacho Daddy beers, this one being a hoppy pale. I was actually pretty impressed with it, though again, perhaps my judgment was skewed by what is normally a terrible beer selection on the strip.  The only downside, but not really avoidable in Vegas, was the priceyness of the food. But you're going to overpay on everything in Vegas, so not much you can do there.  While there are many vegan options in Vegas as a whole, it's nice to have something like this on the strip so you don't need to leave for every single meal.

_iqFdbE16DveiqwSLVL73A.text: A lot of my friends heard this place was bomb so we decided to come here for brunch. We had a large party and they were able to accommodate us on a busy Saturday Afternoon. We were quoted a 15-20 min wait.   Our party of 13 was seated in a secluded back corner which was great because the busy restaurant was quite loud. We had a very private meal among our party. If you check in on Yelp, you get a free house margarita or you can upgrade to a specialty  margarita for an additional fee.    My bf and I ordered the Filet mignon nacho and chicken quesadilla. The filet mignon nacho was alright. It was very big that can be shared with multiple people. We forgot to tell them no beans so of course it came with refried beans, sour cream, guac, pico de gallo, cheese, etc. I think it wasn't very flavorful...a bit bland...and the chips were soggy halfway through eating it.   The chicken quesadilla includes shredded chicken but they were able to sub the chicken to cubed chicken for an additional $3. The quesadilla came with fries and the fries were good...a bit salty though....but good! The quesadilla was mediocre...it came with guac and sour cream. The plate was actually pretty big and could have probably been shared as well.   The filet mignon nachos were $20 and the quesadilla was $13. I would say the deals are pretty great! But wished the food tasted better. The service was alright...with our big party, I understand if our server was swamped.

omqMfW6HSwlhn5INMoGhYQ.text: Seriously great, delicious nachos!!  Great wait staff, and if you can't finish your drink, ask for a to-go cup.

VlRQkpT01w8IS4BVh2lHXQ.text: One of the best nachos ever had even thou I come from Texas. Highly recommend Thai chicken and lobster and crab nachos. Very friendly people.
