Z0unplFf2f6AFEYFl9gd0g.text: It is what it is, pretty much just nachos and bar foods, I actually tried Nacho Daddy at Life is Beautiful which prompted my visit.   Hefty dollar sigh for a plate of nachos which was huge but still ... its just nachos at the end of the day. Split it with a friend, ordered a couple other appetizers which were ok, but I get it it's on the strip.   Im not much of an alcohol drinker, but this seems like a fun place to sit down with friends and drink a beer or two.

lWOB8rDF5kDdNCVEAQRBag.text: Always a good time at Nacho Daddy. The service is great, the Burger Nachos are our favorite and we love going when we are in Vegas for conferences.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

OXbXLP0lquQYRel_0IjyHg.text: Vegan/Vegetarian review: 4.5 stars             Eating vegan on the Vegas strip is not an easy feat. After shuffling through tons of eateries on the strip, Nacho Daddy seemed relatively centralized, appetizing, and decently priced. So I and a couple of meat eaters ventured over to the joint as it was my turn to pick a place where I had more to eat than a lousy salad and fries. Sure enough, Nacho Daddy provided an extensive vegan menu of nachos, burritos, tacos, enchiladas, quesadillas, fajitas, and salad bowls that left me at a lost as to what to pick from this massive list.  Not being a risk taker, we played it safe and got:  Vegan Chicken Nachos - 4.5/5         Traditionally loaded, with everything you could possibly think that would go on nachos, came on this dish... Protein (marinated chickn), beans, guac, pico de gallo, salsa, bell peppers, roasted corn, onions, mushrooms, and vegan queso with spinach chips (nothing special)         The chickn taste like store bought gardein strips. While not unique, I'm still grateful!  The cheeze is decent, and all the fixings were pretty good all together. It's nachos, so while it's easy to make delicious, it's hard to stand out!  As a vegan dish, the True test is the "cheese", and its flavor and texture. Although I knew it wasn't real cheese, it was still pretty tasty and a decent sized portion was given. My only ding is the lack luster vegan chicken.   Fillet Mignon Nachos (GF) - 3.5/5           A little less loaded on these guys... These house made standard tortilla chips are loaded with beef, refried beans, sour cream, ranchero sauce, guac, pico de gallo, and a mixture of cheese.           The meat eaters said that the fillet mignon pieces were scarce and a bit dry. They even admitted that the vegan chicken version looked more appetizing. XD But, they said theirs was still decent, because who doesn't like nachos!?  Haha  I had to go down in rating on their behalf, but stuck with the 5 stars for the massive vegan menu (despite not being a vegan place), not charging extra for the 'vegan' title, generous amount of food, and friendly service, although a bit slow.   I need you guys to be in business when I visit,  so 5 stars it is :D

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Chickn Nachos

zYpaEAISFSE2saUACQzT4w.text: I have now eaten here twice. Service has been great(Ryan was awesome). The Supreme Nachos were amazing. If you are looking for a place that has good prices and great food, Nacho Daddy is the place. A little off the strip next to Planet Hollywood.

wVtQOxlNZl1WVWMxbE8Wcg.text: I recently visited this strip location and I was pleasantly surprised by the food and most importantly the service! It was very busy when we arrived and our server handled it like a professional. Arieanna was so upbeat and helpful with everything, she knew the menu inside and out and gave us great recommendations! She did what most servers miss and that was making a genuine connection with us while giving flawless service. This will be a restaurant we will visit frequently and we'll be asking to sit in her section every time!

Km8CPT17HEHbaKnNaSgpdw.text: Love it. Great food. Scorpion shots is a plus.  My favorite nacho is the nacho fiesta. I also like the naked chicken. Ari is great waiter, love her, she is awesome.

Authentic spices and everything tasted so fresh. Our server Chase was so awesome and knowledgeable. Really felt welcome. My grandson took me and my daughter here. The family atmosphere makes you  want to just sit and enjoy. Kiddos to you and your staff! Maybe next I will be brave enough to do the scorpion shot! I will definitely be back

cba2CJvhy3KOiew9ksQryA.text: This place was excellent. Filet Mignon nachos and street tacos hit the spot. Good margaritas and great salsa and great service from Jovanny!!!He went above and beyond for us. Top notch service and tasty food and drinks.

hQTrx-AcbQqT5P6D54MiAw.text: Nacho daddy is a must try! Ryan particularly was amazing! He was so attentive to everything. I would definitely be back because of him

4ucel1apeK3p5alJXneX7w.text: Excellent Pomegranate Margarita and Supreme Nachos are ah-mazing!!  The Guacamole is so fresh and Sierra is an awesome bartender!  Very sociable and fun!!

oteHvpgkUt8C-FJnVpF7Dg.text: love this place bunches. the filet mignon nachos were . we also got the deep fried lobster tacos. deelish! our server ryan was amazing!!! she was super attentive and friendly and gave great recommendations! some servers just suggest the most expensive things on the menu but she was real with us. very appreciated! the vibe in this place was laid back which was a nice change of pace from the noisy casinos nearby. the only thing i didnt like was the lame 90's music videos constantly playing on the big screen near our table. but it wasn't enough to take off a star because ryan made our experience perfect. we will be back for sure!

kfAn4gexAZc9OzOZlBuYvw.text: My husband and I are True foodies! We rely on other Yelp reviews to go outside the box of usual in Vegas. Nacho Daddy great reviews....well they almost lost our business when it took us 29 minutes to get a beer at the bar. No it wasn't busy!  Meanwhile they lost 3 potential customers during the same wait at the bar and lack of acknowledgment, on a Sunday afternoon. However, patience does preserver, we saw how slow the bartender was moving and ordered a bucket of beers, and put our order in once we got her attention. Well we got the beers, server forgot to place our food order, oops!! We were determined to experience what all reviews were saying. We did finally get the right order and wow INCREDIBLE!! Imagine how much more they could impress overall and grow demand if they could fix who hires and trains the staff. Food incredible but sad how much we saw them lose out on due to poor staff training. NACHO Daddy has great potential. We will return but be prepared for long delays in order to get the incredible filet mignon nachos.

zNuWlgiZeHEBceFQdvtAHw.text: We loved our server Julie, she's #1. We could not have a better server. She was extremely attentive and helpful. She was so informed about the menu and her recommendations were spot on. I loved the kale salad and hope they keep that on the menu for a long time. It was perfect. I don't need to eat fat on fat in Vegas everyday, so Nacho Daddy was perfect. The nachos were AWESOME! Generous portions and a real value for the Strip. I also liked the coffee. They serve French Press. So I was able to get three cups out of it and feel like I was awake after a long night staying up. I highly recommend this place and it's a great place to relax and get off the beaten path. Everyone at the restaurant was attentive and friendly. Huge plus, the place is extremely clean and spacious!! Thank you Nacho Daddy!!

45pzFc9oYK8kU2-a4pVQ-w.text: Jovanny was  the best!!!   Awesome server and made our trip worthwhile!!!  Be back soon!!!

chcgRVlzrBL_KDUNK831fw.text: Audre our waitress was amazing!! The vegan nachos were phenomenal! Their chick'n and vegan cheese are on point- taste like the real deal and guilt free :)

uXjxW4QQaC9KTFStrr7YaA.text: Best Mexican food in Vegas!  Ryan, our waiter, was amazing!!  Loved everything we ate and the scorpion shots left us feeling great and ready for a great night on the strip!

PIQeUrtLaAdD-cSg3FXs0Q.text: We had high hopes due to the reviews but were very disappointed. The fajitas we got were way too salty and the queso dip was not warm. After ordering a beer it didn't come out until we were already done eating. I would not go back. The portions were good and well presented but the taste and quality left much to be desired.

R65WFpLbcZBrf4Y6L7CieA.text: Jovany is great! Excellent service from the beginning, very friendly, and informative! Food so far is great, I would definitely come back to this location.

V2gjTdne6nl6RcZUhjeahQ.text: Came out looking for a place to eat here since we we watching s show here at the mall. Went solely off reviews. Ordered ceviche for myself and kids nachos and kids quesadilla. Ceviche was tasty and very fresh. Only thing is I think there's to many chips for the serving. Picture to follow. Kids nachos were big portion we added chicken to them which was very good. Quesadilla was not very tasty. Needs to have less cheese and more crisp tortilla. It taste more like oil. Our server Gio was friendly and upbeat! Made good conversation and took care of us. Overall it's a good place to eat as a family. Lots of tvs and we got the Sunday night game after asking the GM! When we asked a server passing by he came back saying the owner wanted to watch the hockey game. So when he came by asking what could he do to make our expierence better we asked for the Sunday night game which he said ok to. We thought it was wired when we got the first response. Glad they decided to put it on.

It was drenched it sweat Thai sauce and I didn't find a lot of lobster on it. And my girlfriend got the chick'n tacos: veeery savor, best chicken I had. But the ambience was awesome.

The only issue we had was with one of the servers who was hurried and did not seem to like checking on the guests. But the bartender was really nice and helped us with any questions we had.  I apologize for putting 3 stars prior but the food is really really good.

Ee1Z4lgolZxRYXxyg3npXA.text: I come to Vegas often and i never miss going to Nacho Daddy at least one time. Bomb food + bomb margaritas= 100% satisfaction

9-LrzBL954YWlBDwZJ5E2g.text: Nacho Daddy is my favorite place to satisfy my craving for a margarita! The nachos are out of this world as well, with a selection of really unique options. I prefer mine spicy and that's exactly what they have!  Plan on sharing because the portions generous! But my absolute favorite is their skinny margarita, made with a ton of fresh lime and agave! It is so good and refreshing! It really is the best margarita I've ever had. They have a great atmosphere and the service is top notch :) I always go there when I'm in town for work or pleasure. This is my go to and anyone that comes to Vegas should go there!

GUUFPZEe_suVv-3bIo9yDA.text: Food wasn't great but wasn't the worst. We sat at the bar in order not to have to wait yet there were 10 open tables. The salsa was good and spicy, the margarita was disgusting though.

8M0LAGl1wDgEAC84iRluIQ.text: I come here to watch golden knights games, have a drink and a bite of food. Their nachos are great. Will be back for more :-) yum yum.

aQjK17ZDrweuMJC-bB0MEA.text: Casual. Great service. Food was good. The chicken on our nachos and tacos was a bit dry, but otherwise no complaints.

kA8qQLDvc5NjCWsiONT7_g.text: Food was good but waitress got 4 out of 4 meals wrong and when we told the server as he brought out the food he was irritated and said I'll talk to her and she came back and said you confirmed your order. I didn't get it wrong. First of all it is her responsibility to get it right and her accent was thick and she was talking fast so I didn't pay attention to what she was saying. She and the server were seen arguing over whose fault it was and she said she was going to talk to the manager. You'd think the manager would come by and apologize or at least take the chips off our bill or something small but nothing was done. Mistakes happen and the waitress was sweet to us and apologized however the 3 stars is for the managements lack of attentiveness to customers.

R2SZdQaKau102OLwSrrMgQ.text: My first time to Nacho Daddy, loved it! Not super easy to find, went through the mall but entrance is actually outside.  I had the chicken fajita my girlfriend had the vegan "chicken " chimichanga and loved it.   We topped it off by having a vegan chocolate cake with raspberry topping. Don't let the word vegan scare you off, it was all about the chocolate.    BTW loved our server DJ!

JHiovJnzyG9kgRZI4zmbxA.text: Vince was awesome. Gave us an awesome experience here at nacho daddy and made my birthday night great. Offered us amazing drinks and gave us great advise on which nachos to choose.

oo0gNzDt1Lh5dNbLobY8tQ.text: This place is a great atmosphere for that Friday when you want to just enjoy happy hour with friends and family. However, the food always seems to come out colder than expected except the fajitas.....lol  Still a great place so enjoy  BTW stay away from the scorpion regrettably mine still had the stinger and was stuck in my young for a couple of days good thing the poison was not effective still good vibes and atmosphere

F-bQZeRmLMWmouVVlelLrA.text: Great food, Excellent service, took a star off for the wait.  It was only 40% full on a Saturday early evening, had to wait for over 20 mins to be seated, seemed to be a staffing issue.  We got lucky and had a great server, Taylor B.  She did a great job explaining everything and making suggestions.  She was accommodating with everything.  We took advantage of the Yelp check-in margarita and it was good.  The food came out quickly and it was delicious!  Great evening and definite spot to return!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

SDMtvMxWQ2FrtSGr097R1g.text: Heck yeah! I had no idea they were planning on opening new locations of this restaurant around the city! I was so pumped to have it in the Miracle Miles connected to my hotel. (Note that if you're looking for it, it does not connect to the inside of the shop area - it only has an outside entrance.)  Yayyy they had their scorpions stocked! I had been to the downtown location over a year ago looking for the scorpion shots, and they had run out of scorpions. I was so psyched to get to try them this time, and the location so convenient.  The bartender recommended a really smooth silver tequila - I can't remember what it was. It came in a double shot, totaling $14 I think. Totally worth it! However... I did not dare eat/swallow the scorpion. I was not that adventurous. I totally disappointed everyone in the restaurant who watched when they heard the bartender ring the bell (they do that to bring attention to someone buying the scorpion shot). Oh well, I got my photo and experience of having a dead scorpion in my mouth for a few seconds! Haha.  OH YEAH and they have a vegan section fo their menu I never knew about. Since I am trying to have the majority of my meals plant-based now, this will be great for me!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

pgff4HRcOeaPERDRHXGHWQ.text: Loved the the food and the vibe... Go there with hunger because the nachos are great!!! I had the Filet Mignon Nachos that fill my belly... and a must have is the scorpion shoot of tequila. It's not a water down tequila, but smooth and strong tequila that make your eyes pop and bring a big smile on your face... my daughter enjoyed the kids meal, and wife loved the tacos... it has become a must go when I come to Vegas with my family.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Just remember not to eat the scorpion
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I could not help it... I had to eat it all

pfGdX0UmY-Qc-OoUIsjwRg.text: A little spendy for me but it was super good. And with a family member who is Vegan there was a whole menu for him to choose from as well.

0i6P1-zCB_r75duyyrbUpA.text: To whom this may concern:  *Fellow Vegan friends, beware of the lack of menu knowledge from Nacho Daddy's staff members*  Literally at loss for words. Yesterday My vegan friends and I went to Nacho Daddy for lunch, not only because they had great yelp reviews but also because of the accommodating Separate vegan menu they offered. Between the 3 of us we ordered, the Vegan avocado tacos, The vegan chicken bowl and A VEGAN CHIMICHANGA! As the chimichanga was served to the table my friend had cut the end piece to find out that the "Vegan chicken" was shredded. To our surprise we all had never seen "Shredded vegan chicken meat" so to be on the "safe side" we politely called our waitress over to ask her about the inside of our chimichanga, she reassured us that the meat WAS VEGAN and that it was house-made and delivered from a outside commissary daily. Because of the reassurance WE ATE THE ENTIRE BURRITO! In fact, We were so impressed by our faux meat vegan burrito that we anticipated ordering some again later that evening. As I ordered 3 vegan chimichangas to go expecting the same burrito I had ordered earlier.. I come to find out it was completely different. It had black beans, corn and rice... and NO shredded vegan chicken...hmmmm...I called in to verify if there may had been a possible miscommunication, but when I talked to the manager Edward (who also claimed to also be vegan) he told me that the burrito with the shredded chicken WAS NOT VEGAN. I repeat, NOT VEGAN!!! I even checked the receipt from earlier that day and it said "V.chimichanga." So either it was the kitchens mistake or she grabbed the wrong burrito. Regardless, WE asked her... she saw us eat it.. and she reassured us!! Edward apologized and said that he would replace the burritos but honestly, I am just completely disgusted. Eating meat goes against everything I believe in. It goes against my personal faith and beliefs. I can cry right now because I feel cheated. I spent $100 on a lunch, to be swindled into eating a burrito filled with dead carcass. I no longer have faith in Nacho Daddy. My friends and I never ever step foot into this establishment again!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. $100 for lunch including tip for a &#34;V.Chimichanga&#34; (vegan chimichanga) that ended up a regular CHICKEN CHIMICHANGA! :(

A38Ib5pRa-I3G8L0XB-qaQ.text: This place was a pleasant surprise!  Thought would give it a shot based on yelp reviews and was glad that we did.  Not surprisingly this place specializes in nachos.  They have over a dozen different options where it is more than just changing a topping a two.  We started with the queso dip.  This was actually one of the best ones that I have had.  It was a nice portion and the unique aspect was that it was set up almost like a fondue holder having a flame underneath to keep the cheese melted.  We then had an order of the spicy shrimp nachos and the smothered burrito.  Both hit the spot!  The nachos are definitely big enough for 2 to share and be more than filled.  This isn't going to be fine dining by any means but if you are looking for something above fast food Mexican at a reasonable price this is a solid option.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

-tlIfg535fFbBuKgfq8d8w.text: Rachel is he best!!! Thank you for making this day amazing and for being professional! Give her as raise!!!

R_BoMvk5SkvADT2WvzbnKQ.text: Make reservations if you can; this place fills up!   It's located a little off Las Vegas Blvd, on Harmon. Free margarita with Yelp check in!   5 of us got 3 different nachos: Filet Mignon, Fiesta, and BBQ Chicken, and 1 person got Chicken Fajitas. Between 5 of us, we were barely able to finish 3 of the nacho orders... they were HUGE! Affordably priced (for anything on the strip), and delicious. Great place to watch any games going on, as they have a lot of sports screens up all around the restaurant. They are known for their scorpion shot and even have a scorpion tank up front.   Nachos had a great ratio of chip to toppings. They advertise "never a dry chip", and that was completely accurate. The group favorites were between the BBQ Chicken and the Filet Mignon nachos. Both were loaded with toppings and also were pretty different from each other. There are quite a bit of varieties to choose from. They even have dessert nachos!  Great sports bar atmosphere; nice break from the frenzy of the strip.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

9o7ePnCD9jEukx0nBBJ76w.text: Their beer battered fish tacos are some of the best I've had (and I'm from California)!   Was pleasantly surprised that a quoted 45 minute wait on a Friday, was only 25.   The service was great and will definitely come back on my next visit!

r2ERF_s0SdRlstT-RhYHMg.text: Very good Mexican and nachos reasonable priced for the Strip. Food was very good and menu offers a large variety. $5 happy hour items are plenty large.  Nacho Daddy loses a star because free house margarita with Yelp check in does not apply to Happy Hour food. Unfortunately, our server informed me of this after doing the check in and ordering. Felt like a little disingenuous.

0lPYwfzbyEp_pn4pEjtsWA.text: We enjoyed the ambience. The fried avocado taco was delicious. So was the margarita. The service was a little slow but the food makes up for it! The pork taco tasted good to me only when I added chilli sauce to it.

ueClMR2Z-BNf-6JlYQfblg.text: I can only speak for the Love Bites 2018 Yelp! event they catered for Valentine's Day, as I've never been to any Nacho Daddy as of yet. They had the Cinnamon Margarita, Daddy Margarita, and a Scorpion shot which they're known for. My favorite was their Daddy margarita but the Scorpion shot is a must try! I definitely felt like a "weasel" (Encino Man reference) lol! I actually swallowed the first one, but the second one refused to go down then  lodged in my throat and I coughed that baby up lol. It's definitely something all tequila drinkers must try at least once. The best part about the booth were the ladies behind it serving up these concoctions, especially Rebecka (awesome personality and great attitude) to whom I'll be paying a visit to soon at the Miracle Mike Shoppes during happy hour Monday's from 3-6 PM. See ya all soon!

UJ_Gyz0tpCpakQAJf_IfCg.text: We visited Nacho Daddy for the first time during a family trip to Vegas.  We LOVED it!  The staff was super friendly and very attentive.  We had vegans in our party and our server, Dalaney, was quick to offer suggestions and alterations to menu items to accommodate their diets.  Our entire party was very happy with our meals.  The meals were huge, but we did our best tackle every bit.  The margaritas were so good!  We had a wonderful experience!  We loved it so much, we came back a second time during our week-long stay.

cza9q2SeX_Guc-LMN6OuIw.text: We had the Cali Bureto... I wouldn't have called it authentic Mexican food, more like comfort Mexican food.  It did taste great though and I would go back

7vDby1C53IF2xH-2T8Ur9w.text: Just a wonderful experience from the start. TVs to watch the games and great food.  Don't forget that they have a free check in right now for a margarita.  They let my wife and I both get a free one!  And, since it was my birthday I got a free dessert!!!  We walked away only paying $50!  We ordered the flaming filet mignon fajitas.  It is awesome as they make a full display of lighting the fajitas on fire at your table!  Pure fun!  The fajitas for two came with a full compliment of rice, beans, and guacamole.  You could get sour cream as well, but we opted for more guacamole.  The steak was excellent and plenty of grilled veggies to fill the tortillas.  The dessert was an apple nacho display and it was tasty.  Service was perfect even though it was very busy.  Tip - this restaurant is located on the outside of the shops at Planet Hollywood.  We made the mistake of going into the shops and got a little lost.   Overall, an excellent meal.  If I lived here, I would come back for the nachos next time.

XIsNWnMS9m6zd54M4tbIOA.text: We came during off peak hours and if check in with YELP app they offer a free margarita. Our waitress Ariana had no problem giving it to 2 people in our party. She was courteous and fast with our order. She explained to us about ordering the edible SCORPION and the extra cost to any drink.  Our nachos were enough for two so we shared them with others. They were real good. The scorpion, we were advised to chew it and not swallow it whole, tasted like tequila. On top of the great service they added a 20% military discount.

Kimberly Behind The Bar Is A Wonderful Bartender...Great Customer Service And Right There When You Need Something! Highly Recommend This Place For Your Appetite! Get The Triple Duo...Delicious  We Will DEFINITELY Be Back Soon!

aAeiyIy1CGNSDez38gp3mg.text: First time here! Such a hip vibe! Food and margaritas were amazing! The best service ever from Rico! We will be back as soon as we can! Highly recommend!!!

JjwmGSvggs4cf7-vjgcJdg.text: The food was good, bar service was great. It's worth trying! Good location. When we visited, we checked in on Yelp and got a free drink. Definitely a plus!

pXz2_Ws3160AV87G1VhsRg.text: I wasn't a huge fan of the tex-mex food here - it was merely okay. One exception, however, are Nacho Daddy's pigeons. They fly through the restaurant and are free for the taking if you can catch them yourself.  They're delicious raw, and most importantly, fresh! I will definitely return for more soon!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. There are so many pigeons at Nacho Daddy that you can just reach out and grab one!

1BRM1Cs1UKkNfl2W7kUjew.text: Visited here last week while on vacay with my sister. Stopped in on a Sunday evening and it was busy but not too crowded. Our wait for 2 people was about 10-15 minutes. We were able to grab a seat right near the hostess stand to wait. When seated we were greeted by our server Litzs who gave us a warm welcome. We were seated in a more quieter section of the restaurant which was nice. Thanks to a yelp check in, we got a free house margarita to start with. For the appetizer we got the queso dip and added ground beef. I could've eaten that all night! The presentation was very cute in its own little pot over a tea candle. The chips were fresh and Litzs even brought us a refill on chips! They made a great snack the next day. For entree I went with the surf and turf tacos. The lobster was yummy and the steak was well marinated. My rice was a tad cold but nothing to really whine about. The beans were nice too. My sister went with the ground beef enchiladas and again presentation was great! She was pleased with her meal as well. Both entrees were filling and we had the gumption to have a second margarita. We both went with the white peach frozen. I was too full to finish mine but it was quite tasty! Lastly we went for the churro sundae. My sister didn't love the raspberry but I enjoyed it. Kinda wished we had more churros to go with the ice cream but still good! Definitely looking forward to returning next time we are in town! Ask for Litzs she's great!!

eXqqTaukpoQmRyePQm3KUg.text: Nacho Daddy was PHENOMENAL! Wonderful customer service--the waitress was very knowledgeable about the vegan items on the menu. (They didn't even complain or rush our table when we stayed to chat an hour after our bill was paid!)  The food was so delicious! We ordered the guacamole, spicy burrito and beer-battered avocado tacos. Everything was extremely tasty. Even most of the margaritas are vegan! The bathrooms are very clean and nice. I LOVE the decor and set-up of the restaurant; they have books, art, and plenty of things to look at. The music was on point and it was so fun to watch sports and old music videos on the TV screens. We will be back soon with lots of company!

5VjcPj4SPUvhFwzJXWyjFg.text: Great dishes, great service, quality time w friends, spices on the spot. Easily one of best tex-mex restaurants in town. The place itself is kinda dark inside and music way louder that expected. Amazing Fajitas..

Rs17sSy2Pf6NUj0omEclVg.text: This is my favorite restaurant in Vegas! I appreciate the entire vegan section (former vegan) and margaritas are great too. I've been there a dozen times or so and always recommend it! Go! Go! Why aren't you there already!??

LRg1V9Nhg5lBEqwEXm67bQ.text: I had the opportunity to go anywhere however I decided to go to Nacho Daddy's and the wings were very good. Upon ordering one of waitresses said what I am ordering is not a happy our item I said that's no problem then I ordered a draft beer and again she said that's not a happy hour item . I said ok I'll take it anyway i don't mind paying for the price. We are not from here what would you recommend she said that's up to you i don't have any recommendations. Really girl you are supposed to help us with a recommendation ok I went with the flow. Then I got on Yelp again because they said if I ordered any food items they would give me a on house margarita  but guess what only if you order another item which is a appetizer why didn't they say that or why didn't the yelp advertising say free margarita but only if it it's purchased with a appetizer please be specific. I don't mind paying but please explain to out of towners. Bottom line your staff is not very friendly or helpful.

sYlTjcDQRdNMx91zqID6MA.text: Ate here twice in one day. First we had breakfast. The breakfast burrito and enchiladas were delicious. Then we decided that the dinner menu look good, so we came back. The fajitas could use more meat but the taste was delicious. They have a good happy hour special.

8oSwJZfs6Y6T0ync6REsRg.text: Perfect for foodies & nacho lovers! Nice seating arrangements and views of the T.V.s  too.   I've ate/eaten here twice and ordered the same thing (Lobster & Crab Nachos) because it's so good! Topped with delicious mango pico de gallo!

ghZ5rrISXET5YogJYFeUdw.text: 4 stars, people? We're talking nachos here! And not just any plain nachos, a huge heaping pile of nachos! So totally Vegas.  Started off with no wait time. Then, our waiter was super friendly and attended to us appropriately. We honestly don't like being bothered too often; keep our drinks full, have the check ready, and that's all we need to be happy.  I had the tostada nacho and my husband got the burger one. I didn't taste his, but he said his was good. I know mine was really good; I can't stop thinking about it. I also had the Daddy's margarita and found that to be really tasty and refreshing.  Overall, great experience for those that are absolute nacho fanatics like myself. Would I come back? Yes!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Tostada Nacho for me (featuring Daddy&#39;s margarita) and the Nacho Average Burger Nacho for my husband

46aBEfZ77hFhV3dXsgmhlw.text: Amazing nachos; can't have the name nacho daddy and be wack, right!?  Service was nice but started to slow down when got busy. I ordered the Filet mignon nachos and a margarita. The margarita was good. The nachos were huge and had a lot of extras on top

ONHrHx37eyTEXhD45I51Ig.text: Best nachos I've ever had. Shrimp tacos AMAZING ! Ashley was spot on with recommendations. Sweet & smart, thanks Ashley!   Churro sundae came up short. They aren't freshly made. They were hard and crunchy.  but everything was so good. I'd come again and I'd recommend this place

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Crab &amp; Lobster Nachos

F-WEx3FD1w6lvc17LFOZQQ.text: We did a "nacho tour" while in Vegas, and they hands down have the best nachos (guess we should've just trusted the name).  The group of us got The Supreme, Lobster and Shrimp, Thai Chicken, and BBQ. EVERY SINGLE DISH WAS AMAZING. You don't think of nachos as having much Diversity, but every plate was completely different and deliciousThe portions were also large so our group was completely full when we left. Service was friendly and quick. We will be back on our next Vegas trip!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

DvMsoFPycEuZq9-Iog5BGA.text: Great atmosphere, nice location, very friendly and food was excellent. We didn't make reservations so we sat and ate at bar instead of waiting for a table. Bartender was a great help and knowledgeable of the food options.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Place is great!

FGC3kTtfZpanKDUXZ6ZJnQ.text: Lots of vegetarian/vegan options. I got the daddy's bowl and it was good but honestly the hit was the queso/guacamole/salsa chip dip. Soooo good! Staff was sweet and drinks were good.

dRLsGvFHT_KEflUqaO5yag.text: Walking downtown Las Vegas, we decided to get something mexican. The choice was made fairly  easy, considering review/stars rate.  I had vegetarian chimichanga, while my gf got shrimp tacos. Let me go over my thoughts on every one of these very briefly. So Vegetarian Chick'n Chimichanga is based on soy-chicken, as well as a bunch of 'vegetarian' options on the menu, but my first question is, why are you trying to make vegetarian option be a substitution for meat in how it looks or tastes, if there are a plenty of great vegetarian stuff you can put into a chimichanga?! Most of the places I've been to offer tofu or chiles rellenos inside.. Second thing, way too much chopped onions. Chimichanga was topped with something like pico de gallo, but the main ingredient was.. well, you may've guessed:) Now, okay I can understand that there are no chips and salsa offered once you take a seat as most places do, but it wasnt even offered aside the entree..  I'd say I took a half of a star for what mentioned above.  In general, chimichanga was just fine. As to the grilled shrimp tacos, there were no complaines here, however there was nothing remarkable as well. They were nice and solid. I took the second half of a star for service. Although our server was trying to be nice, it was quite obvious she wasn't doing fine. She was placing dishes on the table while just walking by, did not even turn to us while serving, no 'enjoy' wishes nothing like it. Nothing offensive, of course, but I would've suggested be a little friendlier, life is great!)

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegetarian Chick&#39;n Burrito
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Grilled shrimp tacos

g4CMG5ojZHupzsWfZ6ckyQ.text: I came here for breakfast. I decided on the churro pancake which is one huge pancake with whip cream, churros crushed up on top. It was really tasty but I couldn't eat it all. I ordered two eggs, which came out looking more like 4 eggs in two separate containers. Odd. They were way overcooked and not good at all so I sent them back and stuck with my pancake and my mimosa. The mimosa came in a mason jar, nice! However the juice they use isn't very tasty and takes away from the drink. Really nice space and nice decor. I'd come back to try the lunch/dinner. It was about 3-5 minutes walk from the Hilton Elara hotel.

qSb_S_AyrUjYqI8WqsYmaw.text: Food was so good couldn't even take a picture. We got the fiesta nachos, boneless buffalo wings and the shrimp street tacos. Buffalo chicken was the best I've ever had. Food was hot and fresh. Will be back again

Dm-bXOzbaCQDzwTnhpq8eA.text: We ordered a combination dish with 1 taco and 1 enchilada with red sauce, the filet mignon nachos, and the elote appetizer. First, the corn (elote) was off-the-cob and just dressed with the usual elote flavors. The corn is not Green Giant corn but actually fresh corn, but it wasn't sweet. Not-sweet corn = not-great elote.  The filet mignon nachos were pretty pricey and looked really huge when it came out, but it is definitely do-able for 2-3 hungry people: the large chips piled on top of each other make it look like a lot more food than it is. It's extremely saucy and wet, and there were no dry chips, as promised. It tasted pretty good, and if I were to come back to this restaurant, I wouldn't mind having it again. We asked for extra pickled jalapenos and chopped fresh jalapenos, and they were happy to oblige.   The tortilla that they use for the taco looked homemade, but it was a little too thick and bulky for my tastes. It was as thick as a pita. lol. I did not like the enchilada's red sauce - that was a pass for me...it was kind of bitter and not really enjoyable.   Overall, it's a completely gaudy, inauthentic mexican joint that fits in perfectly on the strip. The service was decent, the food was decent, and the location was prime. Would I come again? Yeah, I wouldn't mind....just don't tell my foodie friends.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Elote. Wasn&#39;t really feeling this bc corn wasn&#39;t sweet
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon nachos. Very saucy and good
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Combo taco and enchilada with red sauce. Meh

dE13XEKtH-jqfKiUNXHoJw.text: Fun spot on the Vegas Strip. Food & drinks were delicious and came with professional service... In a trendy modern venue. Parking is still free at Planet Hollywood so you might take advantage of that. However, be prepared for a bit of a walk.

RCCgJ_xWerPPgDWGuLqM-g.text: Jacob at this location was so kind so sweet made me smile all night. He was fast and even gave me suggestions on what to order from the menu. I recommend coming to this place and sitting at the bar and asking for Jacob.

M0-owXSzNX0XGTq8szDNtQ.text: We went here for a late dinner on April 16th. We were greeted by a super friendly host and seated within 5 minutes.  We ordered the Mexican Corn as an appetizer! I LOVE elotes! So, I was excited to try this. It was very delicious. The corn was crisp & sweet. There was a light taste of cheese & spice. Nothing heavy or overwhelming. I could've ate it all myself. But, I was good and shared  So, that may be something to think about... The Mexican Corn appetizer is only portioned for 1-2 persons! We ordered the Flaming Fajitas for two. We got the mix and match, so we ordered the shrimp & the filet mignon. They bring it table side and flame it up! Our waiter told us it was time to bring the camera out for videos or picture. We said we are just ready to eat... and he lit it up. So if you have pyrophobia, you may not want to order this. Hehehe The fajitas proteins come in a skillet atop grilled veggies. It comes with a side of rice and beans, and two generous scoops of guacamole & sour cream. I would've loved more rice, though! And more corn tortillas... My hubby doesn't like his meat well done. So he thought it was dry. It was flavorful but chewy. The shrimp was cooked to perfection.  We left full and satisfied. And we'd love to return again when we are in the area.  Funny story: The table next to us wanted to go catch a smoke while they waited for their entrees. So the waiter said he'll need to hold onto their credit card. The second both the waiter & couple moved away from their table, the busboy cleaned up everything within a minute. The waiter came back mortified. And he let the couple know right away and got them new drinks once they sat back down. FYI: Possibly fake news! But, my hubby heard that you can get married at the Taco Bell Cantina and the get a divorce at Nacho Daddy. LoL

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Waiting to be seated!

uoJdz6XZPrdRMMGoUP5g9A.text: I fell in love with this place amazing food and great pricing it was my 1st time going there and i will definitely keep on going back when i visit Vegas! You have to try their grilled chicken wings.

p7tX7Q0gAjhTw8Stq-kyAg.text: This place was good. The Margarita was tasty as well. I loved the chips and salsa. Also our waiter Vince was GREAT excellent customer service. So if the owner or manager read this post. He need a raise!!!!!! ASAP lol. Overall the food was delicious and the setting was good. No complaints at all. #TeamVince

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

_hPuQHE-ZVrazsQyTXw06w.text: Omgeeeeeee Nacho Daddy!!!! I'm jumping up and down as I type this. This was one of the most heavenly dining experiences ever. When I see a place that has over two thousand great Yelp reviews, I come with high expectations. Well Nacho Daddy did not disappoint!! I sat at the bar, and received wonderful service. I ordered a pomegranate margarita while I waited for my food. It was strong enough and a decent size for the price--it almost didn't make it as my dinner drink! But man oh man, when my food arrived, words can't describe the lust that was in my eyes. I was greeted with such a beautifully presented plate dancing with steam and reeking of sinfully delicious smells. After my first bite, it was pure love.   I ordered the Baja Seafood Platter, which consisted of their signature fish taco, a lobster and crab enchilada, refried beans, rice, and Pico de Gallo. ALL of it was perfect--and reasonably priced!!! Nacho Daddy can have my money any day. I'll be in the area for three more days and I'm seriously considering going back again before I go!!

We got scorpion shots, tasty margaritas and happy hour beers. The Vegan chicken was just like actual chicken, amazing! We will be back!

cAfe1EL3jFtA-Kafh06sKw.text: The Nacho was delicious, I would not call it phenomenal though. I ordered a Cadillac margarita for $14.95 and it came in a great big margarita glass although I don't think there was a lick of alcohol in it except for possibly the Grand Marnier float. 8jBaMvxVeoASwVIBtOebJw.text: One of my go-to breakfast places on the strip (or strip adjacent if we want to be technical).   The service is quick and the food is good - especially after a night of drinking.   I gave 4 stars for this review because the beer listing on the menu wasn't correct and the server had to go back and forth to the bar to verify what they had on tap. Not fun for the server!   Next time I'm in Vegas, I'll be visiting again.

hZKjYAGtySf8opixy8mBRw.text: Cons - guac is meh.  Pros - literally everything else rocks here! Service is A+. Free house margarita w/Yelp check-in? Score! (Really good margarita, too - def didn't skimp on alcohol or flavor). Enchilada combo was A-MAZING. Seriously, so so good, and HUGE.   Price wasn't bad, reasonable for the Strip (pricey for anywhere else, but we're not anywhere else so no complaints here).  I knocked a star off bc guac is Mexican 101 - but it was honestly a tough call bc everything else about my visit was stellar.  Oh, did I mention they donate 1 meal to a child in need for every meal they sell?? Bumped up a star for being a restaurant with a heart.

p5JetXmkM-y_UUOCCYbxGw.text: Great experience! We had house margs, triple dip appetizer, and BBQ chicken nachos and everything was delicious. We would definitely come back.

cSO6EBtpzwv-TD7vT5pQ7g.text: We loved the atmosphere, the service, but most especially the nachos! So delicious and we couldn't stop ourselves. It might be named Nacho Daddy, but our tummies looked more like Nacho Baby when we were done. My husband did the scorpion challenge too!

hm1aQcyAPJnLbjpj0wU4Cw.text: Despite the name, the nachos didn't lure us to the place, the free house margarita with check in did that.  Note, this review is not biased because of that, however I should note that I went here twice within a few days and the free house margarita was honored both times.  The second time was with a group of 10, and we easily had $100 of strong and good margaritas on the house.  Our servers were Ryan and Judy (across two visits), and they were both extremely friendly, attentive, and had very poignant recommendations.  I followed Judy's recommendation to get the shrimp and steak fajitas and was extremely pleased.  A very good spread of toppings, a generous serving of meat and choice of flour or corn tortillas.  We ordered bottomless chips and salsa for the table, and there was never a dry bowl or empty basket for our 10 person party.  We never had to ask for more chips or salsa, it just kept coming.  As far as I know, everyone enjoyed their meal.  This place is legit.  Come for the free margarita, and stay for the excellent service and food.  I was also impressed by their selection of vegetarian and vegan options, even though I'm a carnivore to the bone.

MFuH9iDjVG7H7dkPnetNBg.text: Wow.  So good. Got the trio. The queso was life changing. Also get a free margarita for checking in. I will definitely be coming back here.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Trio. So good with a margarita.

ypOhHfeeuXqvB3StMyUAlQ.text: Really good food, and a lot of it. Margaritas are bomb! I got Mexican Candy one it was delicious.

L_YOzd6VADTVbfIXp_AN0g.text: This place makes some delicious nachos! I went with a couple friends and its was pretty busy but we got a food fast enough. There is so much to choose from!

m_aLplDNgzTYGviwR8FPNA.text: Nacho Daddy I believe can be either a hit or miss and this last visit that I just had here which was the second one fell in between the two. I'd received a gift card of some sort to use up before next year and I had a good friend in town and after playing tourist we struck up an appetite. I thought to myself well why not try Nacho Daddy out again.   When we first arrived there was somebody who was standing at the front whom we thought was the server. I inquired with the young lady about taking a table outside and was told that she wasn't the hostess but yet a server.. You know just hanging out I guess. The hostess was off at the bar talking. Interesting.. Anyways while we waited for the hostess to be done I told my friend I would run to the restroom. Came out to only still find him just standing there. The thing I thought was most odd about this was that they weren't even busy so us not being able to be seated right away was throwing me off. Nonetheless we finally were escorted out to one of the table tops outside on the little patio. Weather was great so why not enjoy some great drinks and people watch?  Our server came out, introduced himself and even made some suggestions about some of the drinks. With the check-in on YELP they were offering a free "house margarita" which we ended up throwing in a few extra dollars to upgrade it to a more better tequila! Nice touch I have to give it to our server for having a great explanation and knowledge around the different tequilas!  Now with margaritas generally when you order them you are asked with salt, sugar or nothing on the rim. Being so indulged into conversation my friend and I didn't even notice this wasn't asked until we got these margaritas with all this salt haha. No biggie! Manager came around to check in on how everything was going and ended up fixing those again for us this time with no salt. Very much appreciated. Overall score for the drink was a 4/5.  On to the food! Yes! So I've been on this whole seafood kick lately so with that being said I went for the shrimp fajitas for two! Yes.. for 2! I had already made plans to order enough to eat there and then also bring some home. When ordering this for two I got some hesitation from our waiter and a face that all but kind of said "are you sure" listen if something says for two and that's what one person orders you have to be careful about having a prejudging tone/expression because it's a great thing I'm not overweight or else I would've felt some type of way like that wasn't necessary regardless if you are trying to make a point that it's a lot of food. Anyways.. The plate came out and sure it was a lot but were there even enough shrimp to warrant that $28.99 price? The jury is still out on that. How did they taste? GREAT! So that's all that matters right? 5/5 for those. My friend ordered the steak nachos and loved every bite.   Overall the visit was pretty decent. You may ask about why 3 stars out of the 5 huh? Well like any other restaurant rule, the food can be damn good but if the service is spotty that can make or break the whole experience. I think that in the start of the visit the area of opportunity could be to ensure you always have somebody at the front hostess station and even if they have to run to the bathroom or help another person whatever the case is, having somebody to fill in for that time frame can go a long way. Perception is reality so having the server who was there just chillin but not helping was off...

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

6TIV6WwOa77584NtvSn0Sg.text: Still sitting here, trying to finish 1 order of the Fiesta Nachos and a side of street corn...my husband and I are eaters, not sure that's something I should brag about, but, it is what it is...the portions are huge, we are sharing!! Not 1 chip is dry, if anything, you need more chips?! When have you ever had that problem! Service is engaging, prompt and not pushy (we are sitting at the bar) it's hot as crap outside but nice and cool in here! Happy hour just started and options are plentiful, their beer is delish, music and videos are on point, bathroom clean...cannot say a bad thing! OH and for those Vegans, huge choice, a whole page dedicated to you! Yay, Nacho Daddy...or should I say YES YOUR DADDY!

qkWHntrRMJwAfzhxBnBFew.text: The nachos here really are all that! Flew into Vegas Saturday morning and met up with my sister and brother-in-law. We got checked into our hotels and decided to head out for some gambling and food. Nacho Daddy's excellent Yelp reviews did not steer us wrong!  The only reason I'm not giving this place 5 stars is that the front desk really needed to get their act together. No one was at the hostess stand and things were clearly very disorganized. That being said, once we finally got seated our waitress was great.   The three of us split two nachos, the spicy shrimp and the steak nachos. Both were great, lots of flavor and plenty of food for sure! We added guacamole to the shrimp, but it came later, and honestly for the extra $2 it wasn't really worth it.  Free margarita with the Yelp check in, so that was nice! Apparently you can upgrade to a higher quality margarita and then just pay the difference, but I'm not picky and the house margarita was just fine, especially at the price :-).  So many great places to eat in Vegas, but if you're craving nachos at a reasonable price, this place should definitely make your list!

ZpassyUfXvQ9OBN_ynoSog.text: Great casual dining location with fresh food and great drinks.  This was our first visit and it will be the first of many to come.  Our server Mark was on point and helped direct us to some great selections of food and margaritas.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

KP8-Q_5NwGHu1JTKvmitOQ.text: Let's get the bad out of the way- service, while very friendly, was a tad slow. At one point our waitress vanished and I couldn't get a water refill, but when she was on point, she was very on point. Side note- she was very cute and had a rocking hair cut. Anyway, randomly picked Nacho Daddy for a night out with my friends after we finished our conference responsibilities for the trip and we wanted nothing more than to get away from the conference center and down the strip for some food (and refreshments for my friends, which I passed on). The waitress gave great recommendations. Between the four of us we got the cheese enchiladas, the filet mignon nachos, lobster tacos, mini fish tacos, and the Mexican corn. I had the corn and the fish tacos.   The corn was tasty but not the best I've had -it was very, very light on the cojita cheese, and the seasoning was only on side of the corn, and barely had any crema. Elote is one of my favourite foods, so I was a tad disappointed. The fish tacos were tasty, I liked the mango salsa. My friends enjoyed their food and drinks as well. The servings were humongous, and the prices were reasonable- and it must have been happy hour because my tacos were discounted. I asked about the Yelp check in but it was after we ordered and apparently we didn't have the right kind of margarita, but definitely take them up on that, it's a great offer.   Would definitely try the nachos if I were to ever return, I just felt like getting something with more protein than cheese (full disclosure, I'm pescetarian- I did like the option of the vegan menu but wanted to try two smaller menu items instead. Would try them in the future if I were to return though!). The decor and vibe of the place was great and we were seated in a cozy booth with a good view of the open kitchen!

InyWbSAls_tHihJmAHPe1A.text: Most excellent management and service staff experience I've had dining out since I can't remember when!  Great selection of vegan dishes (with a taste to die for!) Clean, friendly, inviting, and tasty! Plenty to see, smell, taste,  and experience.  Definitely recommend to ANYONE that loves food!  COME HUNGRY!!!!

A1oI-WSijeBl1awR9HiamA.text: Annie, the bartender in the Fremont St/Downtown location was great! We had tacos and a order of nachos- both were great. I would definitely go back.

VpuXGKnVqlsyVRxK_E4BOA.text: Stopped here for lunch and am glad we did!  Our table had the Tortilla Soup, Mexi-Cobb Salad and Buffalo Chicken Nachos.  Our server, Vince, was excellent. The food was delicious and way more than we could eat. Please bring Nacho Daddy to FL. Highly recommended.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

H9spzEPQk1BgAQr3yA4gsA.text: This was one of my favorite meals in Vegas... I might be biased though because I love nachos. Either way, delicious food, good happy hour, and our server was on top of his game!

nozENwatYQnQegWD8VIORg.text: Food was delicious, great customer service nice atmosphere had a live scorpion in a cage.

K5HZ0QnTTpB4m1wV2WV4_w.text: Loved this place! The restaurant aesthetic was very trendy, the service was fantastic, and the food was amazing. I got the chimichanga smothered in red and green sauce and a margarita (yes, they honor the yelp deal!). My friend got nachos- I'm not sure which one- but they were also pretty good. I have nothing but good things to say about this place-- a must-go before leaving Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

fRFj8ng5YIOIGXIOHfJDzw.text: Great place for beer, Margaritas and really good food near the Miracle Mile shops. They also have a good vegan menu with tasty choices. Highly recommended!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Y0HW3hhH6tn8v4mZAQ3gFg.text: Vegan Mexican food paradise! So many options. The servers are friendly and the vibe is upbeat, without by club like.

PbDzqR_qpdcCf6lSJERleA.text: Good portion sizes, prices, and service. There's ample seating in this establishment, and most of the nacho items are definitely meant for sharing between 2-4 people. I had the Lobster & Crab nachos, which we thought was a fantastic choice, although the portion size for this one comes out looking smaller than some of the other nacho choices. The presentation is excellent, and we could easily distinguish between the lobster and crab bits.

sEwwbons8Klth62Yd5UHIw.text: Okay, this place was awesome. I wanted some nachos so I decided to give this place a try (it didn't hurt that they offer a free margarita with check in too).   Of course, because nacho is in the name, I had to get nachos right?! I ordered the BBQ chicken nachos based on recommendation from our waitress and they were fantastic. Everything tasted fresh and the portion was huge. I was starving from walking around the Vegas Strip in 100 degree heat, and I could barely finish it all.   The atmosphere of the restaurant was chill and laid back, they had a bunch of 90s-early 2000s music videos playing all around the restaurant which I thought was fun and nostalgic. Our waitress was also fantastic and was spot on with her recommendation of the BBQ chicken nachos. She was also prompt in refilling our drinks, which was a full time job as the we were thirsty from walking around all day.   Oh, and the margarita they give you for free was great! Definitely consider getting it to go as you walk around the Strip. I can't recommend this place enough. I will definitely return when I come back to the area.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BBQ Chicken Nachos (full order)
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Complimentary margarita to go (with Yelp check in)

sauRkYtk5Hz5UKp0CHRK8w.text: If you're on the strip or staying at the Elara, do yourself a favor and head to this place ! They have great ratings for a reason. I am a plant based athlete and you have no idea how special they made me feel in this restaurant. For once I didn't have to spend minutes trying to figure out how to find a protein source or what I was going to be able to eat. They really cater to every diet and have delicious LARGE meals for everyone.

CoDGrRECP3BzCgYTmQraHg.text: Found this place through yelp and 100% wound recommend it. Been to Vegas 6 times and can't believe I waited this long to try it. Menu is super reasonable and has some unique dishes. I ended up trying the spicy shrimp nachos and it was sooooooooooo good.   Great modern twist on nachos !!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Brunch menu
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu

gQ61POYJgsS7O7V_o3_lNw.text: Place can be a bit confusing to find especially if you're inebriated.  You have to turn the corner on the strip when your walking and you'll see it.  The place itself was really cool, they have a scorpion in a tank as soon as you walk in.  There's a bar area and in the eat in area there's a massive projector with music videos.  Their song selection was really good (at least while I was there).  They played everything from Kid Cudi to Linkin Park. The food itself is okay.  Nothing special and it isn't really authentic Mexican food.  It definitely is very Americanized but i think that's what they're going for.  It's closer to like a Baja Fresh if you have ever been to one.  Place is really cool and food is decent.  Wouldn't try again soely based on food but I might come back to try their drinks.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ABczlf9ka_bXmhIHLRtN-Q.text: Nacho Daddy is a great place to get munchies to soak up all the vegas liquor.    Located "on the strip" but really it is around the corner from the main street. Large inside, ton of seating.   Service was friendly. Food came out fast.   Yelp check in gets you a free margarita with purchase! A full margarita!!! Frozen or rocks. Both were stronger then expected.   Fiesta Chicken Nachos - $17.50 - I liked how the nachos were layers correctly, base layer of chips had toppings and then the top layer had toppings. Shredded chicken was tender and flavorful. All the toppings mixed well, even the beans. Pricey but the portion is huge. Easily can fill up 2-3 people.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Inside
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu 4
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Rocks &amp; Frozen Margarita - $8.95 each, free with yelp check in

VEtCLYsMxehRSZ4mf8JigQ.text: Officially one of my favorite spots in Vegas!! We ordered both house margs, a strawberry , chicken fajitas, burger nachos, chipotle sliders.  The drinks were super good!!! I took mine to go and continued sipping. I didn't have much time to finish because I was so full from the food.  The chicken fajitas were DELICIOUS. Loved the fire presentation at the table upon arrival. The condiments were good too. Huge portion.   The nachos were a happy hour item and even though it was small, it was enough. It really did taste like a burger. Was delicious and a different twist to nachos.  But my FAVORITE favorite favorite was the sliders during happy hour. Oh my god whatever seasoning and cheese on it was just to die for !! Ill order it every single time I'm back. Was so so good.  Location was difficult to find . But once it's found--HEAVEN. Customer service was friendly and accommodating too

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Y6My0LM993PDh9qwY2Qp5g.text: Loved this restaurant! Cured my Mexican food craving for the week.   My gf and I stopped by for happy hour which is AWESOME! Super cheap drinks and food!  We got the "nacho average nachos" (love the name), chipotle sliders, and chicken fajita. The beef on the nachos were very flavorful and I loved the seasoning they used! Definitely not your average nachos. This place has a very unique spin on the taste of their nachos.  The sliders were delicious. The bun was so good and the beef was cooked well!   The fajita literally came out on fire. It was super extra but so is my gf....who ordered this dish, of course.  The drinks were cheap but not a lot of alcohol, to be honest. I didn't even care because I was so full and the all of the food tasted phenomenal.    Highly recommend! Our server was great as well!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

eNj61pvQrDPTzOJ9OA0mrQ.text: A free house margarita for checking in on the Yelp app? Yes please!   We came here after an exhausting drive back from the national parks in Utah. We were starving and this place definitely satisfied our cravings.   We ordered the triple dip. It was a ton of food and definitely worth the price tag. We didn't even make a dent in the app before our food was delivered. The queso, salsa, and guac were all equally delicious in their own ways.   There is a huge full-page vegan menu with lots and lots of options (including vegan cheeses, proteins, and more). I wanted to go all-out, so I opted for the burrito with vegan chik'n added to it as my protein. It was so, so, so much food and it came with a side of chips, salsa, and guac.   I ended up eating it all, something I regretted later that evening, but it just goes to show how delicious it all was. #worthit. The free margarita was also delicious. Not overwhelmingly tart or sweet; the perfect balance.  A few suggestions for the biz:  - the men's bathroom was disgusting when I went to wash my hands (remnants of someone partying too much that day) - since I didn't get a protein added to my burrito like chicken or steak, I asked for the vegan chik'n. They ended up charging me for that. I was a little ticked about that.  - it was busy, but not overwhelmingly busy and our service was spotty.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Trio dip app and free margaritas for checking in on Yelp app!

hGk5ze9K3aHlmwd9xjvhwg.text: I was stalking the pictures before I even came here and When i tell you the food was amazing!!! We got the white queso as an appetizer and since we checked in on yelp, the margaritas were free and boy were they strong!!! I ordered the filet mignon nachos and my bf had the three enchiladas with rice and beans. We also got two chicken tacos which are $5 on the happy hour menu. Nacho Daddy did not disappoint AT ALL!!

GbUoKZaza9pDmc2uRRI8xw.text: A group of us (16 in our party) went in for dinner on Saturday night. The place was packed and after dining here I can see why. The drinks are fantastic. I ordered the Jalapeno Cucumber Margarita - WOW. Everyone enjoyed the food. There is nothing ordinary about their menu. Everything we tried was beyond exceptional. I had the Poke Nachos which were superb. Looking forward to returning on my next visit to the area

jJxB3rCW4v8gjEXFjbwCUA.text: I absolutely love Nacho Daddy!  This is my 2nd time dining at Nacho Daddy (1st time at this location though), and both the food and drinks are DELISH!  While the location in downtown seems much livelier, the new location on the strip is great too.  The restaurant is a little hidden, located on the side of Planet Hollywood near the Miracle Mile shops, but outside.  Took us a little bit of navigating to find it.  Once inside though, you are immediately greeted with a warm welcome.  We arrived around 2pm, and the place was pretty packed.  We tried the "nachos of the month", Chimichuri Nachos, and OMG were they good, and with an ice cold Daddy's Margarita...YUMMY!  We also ordered the lobster tacos to share.  One word to describe the tacos...AMAZING! Definitely recommend Nacho Daddy for good drinks, food, and fun!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

mtLWWvaxD8MAxpy16CoTXg.text: If I could give this place 6 stars; I would.   Came in around 11PM on a Saturday night with some friends and we were seated immediately. There isn't much in the way of parking as it's on the strip, so having a cab or Uber drop you off is ideal.   We started with scorpion shots. They consisted of a small dead scorpion atop a slice of lime that was wedged on a tall shot of tequila. The proper way to enjoy this is dropping the scorpion into the tequila, squeezing the lime juice into the tequila, taking the shot into your mouth, chewing up the scorpion, and swallowing thereafter. Note: My compatriot tried to just swallow it and almost choked to death, so be a pro and chew your scorpions ;-).  On to the nachos! Hard to go wrong with filet mignon or lobster & crab nachos. I opted for the lobster & crab variety and was blown away. Easily the beat nachos I've ever had. Pro Tip: It's kinda spicy by itself with the generous amount of sriracha, so if you're not a spicy food fan, order it without. If you are a spicy food fan...well...add some of their house hot sauce. It's not crazy hot, but has excellent flavor.  You saved room for dessert right? Well I did and made the mistake of getting the churro Sunday. It was fine, but the real winner was the deep fried ice cream. That stuff was phenomenal. This place needs to expand to having a location or three in every city. You're coming to Kansas City soon, right?

ov3iEI5WdIqU3tAX2jPMuA.text: This is a must when in Vegas!! and Of course, you have to try Nacho's, that's what they're known for. I ordered the Supreme Tostada Nachos and yumm! It was sooo good. I really wanted to be able to eat it all but it's A LOT of food, so fair warning. Come hungry! I also tried the flight of Nacho Daddy's brews and I wasn't all that impressed with the house beers. Out of the Stout, Hefe, Pilsner, and Pale Ale... Pale Ale was the best. Super hoppy with big floral notes at the end. I'll be back in Vegas in October... and I will be back here!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Here with the ladies!

fQXkkTg9ag1L_ssu4TqiHw.text: We wanted to give this place a try for a snack and it didn't disappoint! We ordered the Thai Chicken, Supreme tostada, and Filet Mignon Nachos. They were pretty big portions for nachos but the server said each entree are good to share among 2 people. My favorite was Thai Chicken! Each bite was filled with flavor and it wasn't like any other nachos.  Supreme tostada and Filet Mignon is pretty standard for nachos. Pretty good for a quick fix.   You can also get a shot with a scorpion inside for $20! We didn't try it but it seemed pretty cool.  Also, if you check in - you get a free house margarita! I believe it was lemonade + a shot of tequila. I got a good buzz from it!

3WbuqcT_Yz1wJhC9EJkdSQ.text: I came here with my dad because I wanted him to try some vegan food so I can convert him LOL. We had the impossible enchiladas and the vegan chicken fajita salad. Our server Vince was really well versed in everything they had which was really refreshing. The food was incredible, Vince was spectacular, the menu was outrageous in all of the best ways, accommodating vegans and non vegans. Not enough stars available for this place! Thanks for making our day Vince!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

d8_Eg6G1GLREq-p8vfCj7w.text: A great place to go if you are looking for something out of the casinos. We had the filet mignon nachos and a couple of beers. One order is plenty to share.   The price was a welcome change from the overpriced casino restaurants.   They also have a free margarita with the yelp check in. Also they do have a patio as well.

LR10OulX-tPKmnM4rY6W9g.text: Great vegan menu!!! We started with the queso dip, guac, and salsa (hot). Queso dip was bomb! Perfect queso consistency and great flavor. Vegan cheesy goodness! Guac was ok. Salsa was great--I appreciated that it was ACTUALLY hot. So many times I order *hot* salsa and it's basically tomato sauce lol so thanks for that Nacho Daddy.  For my entree, I ordered the vegan chicken fajitas. It was one of the more expensive items but it came with A LOT of food. And it was delicious!!! I took the rest with me to go and although it was better fresh off the sizzling skillet, it was still good the next day. I never thought I'd have vegan chicken fajitas... And that they would be that good!  We finished with the vegan chocolate cake. MMMM sooo good. Very chocolatey and not too sweet or rich, just right. I normally don't even like cake (vegan or non vegan) but it was pretty great. We devoured it alarmingly fast...  This is a great spot on the strip if you're vegan and visiting with non vegans, since they have a non vegan menu. So everyone can enjoy! The restaurant had a fun ambiance and our server was great and attentive. If I'm ever in Vegas again I'm DEFINITELY hitting this place up again!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Chocolate Cake to finish the meal
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan chicken fajitas -- you heard me right!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan queso, guac, and salsa (hiding in the back) served with chips

iIRAGe5TM3yh8K4KtZk3xQ.text: Pretty sure we asked for regular cheese and they brought us vegan cheese in our food. I'm allergic to soy so I don't prefer vegan food so got a horrible tummy ache after this. The salsa is good lol. That's about it.

S906QtNAutWlt1eoDm3Ayw.text: Great service, huge portions, delicious margaritas, and great location   Note: vegan options = tastes good to the average carnivore  Expect to take a whole meal home with ya ;)

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Loaded Nachos Lobster &amp; Crab Nacho Filet Mignon Fajitas*

26UzrjzxjtZIlGmUmdWI4Q.text: Meh.  Tortillas were dry and not fresh.  Food was just ok. Salty.  Service was just meh. Spent 90 for two.  Expectation were more for cost.

0pU4J1Ov40DyYV4_CUjM_A.text: The food was really pretty good. I had a chicken bowl and my husband had the fajita nachos. Both had lots of plentiful tasty ingredients. Our waitress was great and very attentive. We sat at the bar since there was a wait for a table. The reason for the 3 star rating is that this is the first Mexican restaurant I've ever been to that didn't serve complimentary chips and salsa! I really missed them! Also, the frozen margaritas were very watery tasting, no tart lime flavor, and were pricy for their lack of flavor.

Y457akI7ffVHnAp1GBd_og.text: It's hard to find a satisfying and filling meal in Vegas as a vegetarian and or vegan. It's even harder to find one that's a vegetarian/vegan Mexican place. That's why I'm so thankful that we found nacho daddy!! So delicious. Our waitress was able to guide me in choosing a savory and filling meal...chimichanga! Plus their free house margarita when you check in goes great with the meal.  !

vF3nOqApMyKYnzsyXFbSVA.text: Really like this place for breakfast/brunch.  They have $20 bottomless mimosas (current at the time of writing, June '17) and our bartender had no problem adding bubbly when we thought the OJ ratio was a bit high.  Second piece of boozing advice is their Cadillac Margarita is MUCH better if you ask the bartender to make it with lime juice instead of sour mix; makes it taste much more like a proper margarita, but I know some people like the (sweet) sour mix that I think makes margaritas taste like lime sports drink, so get it normal if that's your thing.  The Grand Marnier floater makes it compete pretty closely with Margaritaville's $12 'perfect margarita' which has no mix, just booze and lime.  For food, I've had the chicken enchiladas with salsa verde (green sauce, not red) and they were definitely above average as far as enchiladas go.  Obviously not authentic Mexican but reasonable for a touristy Vegas Strip restaurant.  The chicken quesadillas are huge; my wife ate half and was full.  I had one and it was also above average.  For the price, and location, I'm giving four stars because most Vegas Strip places are just mediocre food at high prices, and I left here feeling like I got a good meal and some decent drinks, at a price that matched.  A bit of side entertainment while we dined was watching some other folks at the bar order the tourist trap scorpion tequila shot, basically $20 for a shot of tequila that has an actual scorpion inside that you're supposed to eat.  The advice I heard the server giving them was chew it, don't try to swallow it.  They hadn't worked up the courage to down it by the time we left lol.

0-t8qFX1mbD3YxNY-ABIdA.text: After my initial review I was contacted by the manager and told that the employee was spoken to as well as reminders given about cleanliness to all staff.  I was also given a gift certificate for a future return date of my choosing.  Although this definitely was not expected and surely was not my intention of seeking compensation, I do sincerely appreciate the nice gesture.

ZfWIZqMCuRGnhvU8nX1zZA.text: Atmosphere was okay, service was good menu mediocre wasn't really anything special like I expected not a big fan but the service was good professional.

GAV8GY1XAJAyXs6RsDOH5g.text: I don't think I've every destroyed tacos that fast while completely 7 sheets to the wind wasted.

z-kP1mJnP6XtXjLIgtmu6Q.text: All the food is delicious and served quickly! We actually ate here 4 times during our trip because it was super convenient and just that good. A little pricey (but not really for Vegas) but huge portions, so no need to order a ton. Highly recommend nachos,  fajitas, dip trio, margaritas and the churros - not all at once though :)

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

j59VLDYaSVumWIftN1WLGg.text: I NEVER EVER EVER write reviews!! And I'm still going to make this one short and to the point.. Hands down best nachos I've ever had in my life. Supreme Tostada Nachos are outrageously good. Everything from the queso to the chips to the guac is ON POINT HOLY WOW! I dream about the fried green jalapenos. Bloody Mary also tip-top. I fly in to Vegas almost exclusively to go here. I hope they never sell out for smaller portions so they can get richer or I will make a video that will embarrass them thoroughly. I'm a video Artist and if they stop making Nachos on this level I'm going to make sure they go bankrupt. Keep making the best nachos ever or else. It's a long fall from the top. Thank you Nacho Daddy!

iWQXZK-9r7750ykLzjdTDQ.text: Surprised at how much we liked this place. Went here on a whim and were so glad we did. The filet mignon nachos are amazing. Do yourself a favor and add the white queso to them. You're welcome. The grilled naked wings are also winners!   We liked this place so much we came back the next day. Probably the most reasonably priced and best tasting place we found on the strip this time around. Must go.

SYCjYhGREyvCfWzzVh2VBQ.text: The Golden Knights nachos were amazing and a huge portion! My husband and I split them and were very full from the deliciousness!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Golden Knights Nachos. $20 and the portion was big enough to split with my husband!

VI1dOk9MrtkpdCN1fFRXHw.text: Awesome place! We got the fajita nachos and they were great. We split them based on the recommendation from the waitress and thank goodness we did. They were huge. Fun spot!!

DfT_tPUQTKYnXJfjWRRPDg.text: Our waitress  Savannah was amazing!!! Our first time here and she explained the menu and suggested the best drinks! I will definitely come back here and ask for her!

eR46YwPpJQa23vY8CVu3Vg.text: There aren't a lot of vegan comfort food options on the strip, but this place changes that! Their vegan nachos are fantastic. Now every time I visit Vegas this place is #1 on my list of places to go to.

4IU5Eti0RNMQDxY6TpODfA.text: Stopped in for a margarita and was actually really impressed with their house margarita. They have a nice sweet and sour mix and it tasted really authentic. The bartender was very friendly and attentive and the host gave us a little information we didn't know about scorpions since they have a scorpion tank by the host stand. We did open the menu and find they have an awesome selection of nachos. Can't wait to come back and bring friends. I'm sure this place gets pretty busy for game days!

cg_sNkEP6A5WQu0ebQC8XQ.text: Sunday Funday Checked in for the free Margaritas! Immediately got a warning about multiple reviews that may have been connected with the same server but I had to try it myself. 3 stars for the food but none for the service and cleanliness of this place. We ordered the fiesta nachos ( delicious but not enough chips ), filet mignon street tacos ( overpriced for these 3 mini tacos but again delicious ). Margaritas were strong and served quickly. No stars for the service. It took about 20min just to receive our waters which we asked 3 different servers from. The glasses were filthy and still had someone's lipstick on it. Server apologized and gave another water, offered a free margarita but never came back.

53Gdq6ZbYYGdYMUPvREI9Q.text: This was an excellent place for lunch on the Las Vegas strip. We stopped in during happy hour, and ordered cheese nachos, and a few mini nacho plates and tacos from the happy hour menu. The cheese nachos were delicious, and covered with pickled jalapenos. The strawberry margaritas were delicious, and only $5 during happy hour. The service was excellent and the bartenders were very friendly! Definitely would come back here again.

VBbyMpgTQ1596sD0IxTMsA.text: This place has vegan chocolate cake! What more needs to be said? Actually the "chicken" fajitas were really good too and the staff was nice. Good location

7uazwvCPunOSpz-otRrV2Q.text: Decent Mexican place to eat and drink. Food is good. I tried Thai nachos and triple dip. The hostess Kristen was very informative and professional. This place is a right place to spend afternoon for quick lunch and drinks.   House margarita frozen drink is good one to try...
