OQFj91fQuJCT3pKbduOdYQ.text: For can food I can buy at my local retail store and heat up and add more spices to make it taste better  They taste like straight from a can food nothing added to make it taste better

7DiDyyqwZiBxheZJ5_CfdQ.text: Great food, outstanding service. No complaints. I'll definitely return. Tostada, enchiladas & burrito all excellent. Table made guacamole flavorful and made to your choice. Margaritas are a little pricey, its vegas, but very good.

J_REWIHMNlAR2-nn7Q8MVA.text: I loved this place!!!! My husband and I stopped here on our recent trip to Vegas. It is on a side street off the strip so you do have to pay attention for it (right next to Buffalo Wild Wings). Our waitress was very sweet and down to earth, and we had fun just chatting with her. To start, we had the buffalo wings which were awesome. We shared he loaded nachos, which our server recommended as a shareable entree although if you were pretty hungry I'd recommend getting your own portion and not sharing. We had the fried ice cream to finish which was sooooo good I was actually dreaming about it when we got home. Definitely a fun, delicious restaurant and one of the few places in Vegas where I didn't feel ripped off... yippee!

ryPM77zxQD5e7iAQdJAN0Q.text: Super surprised vegan options!  Grandkids wanted to go...didn't figure there would be much to eat for me and my plant based diet. Wow! A whole page on the menu of vegan options. THANKS, nacho daddy.

mC4CkNAQm79Q_FRESENzmA.text: This was a great find! Lots of options, ordered the queso, it was delicious!! Also had a chicken taco that was very good. Great service, we will definitely return.

G6R_UhVLts6HQtqRGLB7Pw.text: Disappointed with my nachos, they were really chips with a little melted cheese. My chicken burrito was great

ufXAV-ewOCk31aUCqPNvnQ.text: Love this place!  In 4 days, we went once for lunch and twice for breakfast!  Nachos are the shiznit and the breakfast taco in the morning is AWESOME!

eQrQqizVLrjXKZEl_29yUQ.text: Loved this place! Serena was fantastic. To be honest I was a little skeptical from the name. The first thing we noticed was inside though was the music videos. Great mix. I was worried the food my not be of the same level. I was wrong. The crab and lobster nachos we so yummy. We can't wait to come back again.

FrfqIIPcg89GE_XDN6ptrQ.text: They have a separate vegan menu and items are marked as gluten free, vegetarian or vegan. The vegan nachos and vegan kale salad are really great. Get them. You won't regret it. I would have rated the restaurant higher but for the egg shell found in the huevo rancheros.

DY81igf3ILP9bbYsIalsCQ.text: We Want Nachos!!!! The nachos here on on point! Great place to stop for happy hour too!!!

EyLYI90qITC_qSnG_0ENUA.text: Fiesta nachos, tacos, and enchiladas were all really good! Would recommend! Food was delicious!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

300fmGurlzERBvt6qD3nIA.text: Food was ok but the margaritas were basically just cups of margarita mix with ice. I was super disappointed because the reviews raved about the margaritas here but I don't see what the hype is.

R9ZN52cCp9CJwPAb0xMKGA.text: So. Good!! My wife and I hadn't eaten much the whole day and were looking for something hearty but not crazy expensive. Started with the triple play of queso, guacamole and salsa. Goodness gracious that queso is bonkers. I could bathe in that cheesy deliciousness. I got the supreme tostada nachos and my wife got the taco and enchilada combo. The nachos were really good - lots of toppings and fresh ingredients. My wife's plate was excellent as well - tender, flavorful meats and the taco shell was one of the best I've ever had - crispy and chewy st the same time. I'd come back in a heartbeat.

tH4O0W7l8V7Ej1NZTqXB0w.text: Omgee! I underestimated the quality of this place, when my girlfriend told me in Cali that we needed to eat here. When we arrived I was still a little unsure but the free Margarita for checking in began to reel me. The enchilada nachos are now a Las Vegas Favorite for me. Great for 2 or 3 people.

mv3kUpRdDCKIFgQF8D7XBA.text: LOVED this place! Best margaritas I've ever had...and that's saying a lot, I've had a lot of margaritas haha! And our server AJ was fantastic, so friendly and just one of the sweetest most real people I've ever had as a server. He took such good care of us and was more than helpful with tips about the city. Wish I lived nearby, this would absolutely be my go to spot. Thank you AJ, hope to see you soon!!

euWLYaBc9NKzxEMnNxIocg.text: I came here with my wife for a drink before dinner time.  We ordered a couple of daddy's margaritas which were good a little sweet so we added a shot to it for $5 and it was good for the money.  We also got a free house margarita for checking in which was good as well.  Ordered the BBQ chicken nachos to split, the BBQ sauce was kind of spicy which was really good.  Overall the bartenders were really nice and attentive, enjoyed this place would come back again!

Gjo5njaB471rtlyGUbe7HQ.text: The food was good and the service was sub par.  We had to ask for sides a few times that we ordered, the server failed to mention extra charges for certain requested items, which is crucial. Then she forgot to give me all my change. So overall, the experience was okay but the service could be better.

Mgy5dZBDQUGTRmB36TrWXw.text: Pretty darn goods nachos I have tried many good Mexican place and this is the best on the strip. It is a fun place and they have really attentive and friendly service. They price is stopping me from giving 5 stars but the nachos are good so they get a solid 4 stars

i9UG_rt5M_xTFgOKHYUM4g.text: AJ was absolutely amazing, charming, and incredibly helpful! He made our lunch at Nacho Daddy fantastic. Thank you AJ!

EvoW1-r5Y2yh2XGUrFAPPQ.text: Holy goodness!! Best nachos I have ever had and I live in Cali! (For you outsiders that means we in Cali have the best mexican food, hands down).  We had the Enchilada Nachos (BOMB, especially if you like enchiladas).  The Fiesta Nachos, super dang good!  And both naked (bbq) and regular wings (buffalo) and both were amazing!  I didn't try the scorpion shot because I hate scorpions, but the dude next to us made a epic thizz face when he had it and his friends seemed to enjoy it lol

RdL7ZmbKt4KHCPbCrVsXtg.text: Very good place to eat Mexican off the strip. Lots of options. Good drinks. Will be back. Huge portions. Next time will share.

RbyJnnBkbqqtKqirqvSmVA.text: By far the best food and price we've had so far. Way better value than even the food courts in the casinos and on the strip. I had BBQ chicken nachos. My husband had buffalo chicken nachos. We shared the free margarita from Yelp. All was delicious, portion size was huge. Wait staff very nice, and not at all busy on a Monday just before noon. Did not see any scorpions in the tank.

wqGjdCKgENxr6SwUvuIsNQ.text: Awesome service from jovanny.   He was a great server and was always there with a smile as well as super helpful with menu selections.     Awesome house margaritas and chips!!!!!

-PgxH3p4FOFSyx5m_3uiuA.text: This place is legit, even if you are from Cali. Sometimes it's hard to find good Mexican food elsewhere. If you like nachos, this place is amazing. Great nachos and tacos. Will definitely go back and would highly recommend you check them out if you are in Vegas.

LVSMoQVAbv-QJKgSCZYrmA.text: Filet mignon nachos were great and the service was amazing! Kudos to Ari... super nice bartender! I also had the mango jalapeno margarita which was not on the menu. Not too sweet with a little kick. Will come back next time I'm in Vegas!

9ZCgUmVMMaItyLFzF4chKA.text: Food was amazing. Our waitresses, Victoria, recommended the lobster enchiladas and they were incredible.

097EVzmoQpD9bjOjAPTCBA.text: First time here the food and atmosphere was amazing. I give them an A+ for customer service. Huck is the best!!

Hi3KuhoqJjKIYssijqzyqQ.text: This was my second time visiting Vegas and coming to Nacho Daddy. The difference this time was Kirsten!  She was very pleasant and had conversation with us that was very genuine. She made recommendations for our meal and stopped by to check on us to make sure it was all good. Very pleasant and personable....top notch server and a definite plus for the Nacho Daddy team!

FH2Ri7SmneGKvFWU77D_nQ.text: Was excited about trying a laid back place on the strip so we chose this place within walking distance. We walked in a party of 2 to a nearly completely empty restaurant and then had to wait 10 minutes for them to "put a table together" before we finally just decided to sit at the bar. Ordered the Supreme something or other and both of us  specifically said sour cream on the side, so of course when it comes out we have to send it back being it was covered in sour cream! They took care of it without issue but it just meant waiting a little longer for food. Service was OK at the bar as the bartender seemed attentive enough but there wasn't a lot for her to do as the place was empty. The bar itself had a musty smell like dirty water that kept wafting through as we tried to hang out and enjoy the ambiance.. But alas the stomachs started churning and we spent the most of the rest of the night sick and nauseated and ended up turning in early.. And side note the one beer we had there was all that was drank that night so it wasn't an illness due to any recreational activities.. Sad our first night in Vegas ended in duress but we will make more educated decisions in the future!

OYnodTU_CzFuVVfNSBlKUw.text: Been here twice before. Great staff and cool vibes. They play music and music videos on large screen in restaurant.

31ogyCzKRSzBYG3zImTyJA.text: We walked all the way there for over an hour and a half for the guy with the curly long hair and glasses to tell us that the kitchen was closed although it says that the restaurant doesn't close until 3

6Hf1AEgRbIfVm1PjKeOhIA.text: My friends and I came here for late night munchies and we weren't disappointed. Our server Arnold was really chill. (thank you!!) The portions are really big so I'd recommend sharing one nacho plate for 2 people, unless you're really hungry. PS: THE RICE IS TO DIE FOR. It came as a side for the enchiladas. But you can order a side for $3. Do it. Bomb af. Also, don't forget to Yelp check in for free margarita!

CsVLqs2_1sNma1VhQwy65Q.text: Excellent blackberry marg!! Great service!! Enchilada nachos excellent to share! Pit stop for cocktails and a snack.

hUhN4LcnkD7P6Dv8qE41ag.text: A little frustrating to find.  Outside the Miracle Mile shops, well worth the journey.

FYJtj9utBTEFXnZC4SCWPg.text: The strip and Fremont locations both have good service. Best nachos I've ever had. There's more to see at the strip location, but Fremont has it's own (low key) vibe. I tell all my friends to go there at least once when in LV. I'll be back!

WOHlOxXL6QkuxvrRiYk1Lw.text: Nachos good. Arieanna made the experience though! Handled large party seamlessly and super personable. Food came out fast!

K7Y4XWf7EB5PuRU7zXvvkg.text: This place is awesome! I went to Vegas for four days and ate here three times. They have food specials, awesome queso dip (we got it all three times) and amazing service. Audre the hostess was so sweet and very personable, she was really welcoming! Hazelanne was our server twice and she was phenomenal, gave us recommendations and everything was delicious. Jordan ran our food and was super nice too, he helped us out anytime we needed anything. Our bartender Scarlett had our drinks flowing and was always there when we needed anything. Angie was one of the managers we talked to and she was really nice as well. We took one of the scorpion shots (something I neverrr thought I would do) it was weird but definitely an experience. If I were you I would ABSOLUTELY check this place out!

RmVkKrqyPXUa96snRmXSQQ.text: Not at all what we expected.  We stopped in for Happy Hour and were surprised by the fun atmosphere and great music.  We sat at the bar and they could not have been more attentive.  Our Margarita's were perfect and the food was very good.  They even had some healthy items for us.  Very nice - highly recommend.

PuL-HkOLxmydRxlAZ75I8g.text: The server Ari was great and friendly.  Food was great. Tortilla soup was flavorful and authentic.

yyP3_jk8nf-uArFO6phLfw.text: The service was the worst that we have experienced. The place was not that busy. I don't get it. I wouldn't recommend this pmace.

81Q5WsLC2O0PAgdzV-hMOg.text: The food was huge and delicious and a great price for the area. LOVED the nachos and the free margarita is actually a good size and is not watered down. Would definitely come back and gave already referred friends who also had great experiences

y2lnGFs1eJF4smBPHjLupg.text: We come to Vegas at least once a year. This was our first time here! Our bartender , Scarlett, was personable , made the best Margarita, and steered us right on food!  What a great find! We will be back!!

0pqpgfCw4Wm2IAzwcdRoJQ.text: We used the free offer on margaritas. Expected maybe watered down version...  no way awesome!!  Fiesta nachos the bomb!!!  Definitely will be back!

tgKvNnx_5lKLEHVb-1VDgQ.text: Just tried Nacho Daddy for the first time. Nice size menu for Vegans which is super hard to in Vegas. Our server was AJ. He was super helpful and just made our experience here a million times better! The food was great, generous portion size for the price! Would recommend for sure. Nacho Daddy needs to come to LA/Long Beach Area :)

8eUzu1hS-bqW6Ni4LwZvTg.text: Nachos were AMAZING!!!!! Highly recommend getting those and the margarita on the rocks! It's an unspeakable sin!

9CrKL7uvm8wct7oVsepUhw.text: Too bad zero stars wasn't an option. My bf I were excited to try their nachos because of all the rave reviews. The host sat us down and told us to wait for our server. The place was dead. Several servers walked past us as we were patiently waiting to have our orders taken. 10 mins passed by until we asked our host for some service. Waited another 5 minutes and had no choice but to walk out. I can't say it was bad service. There was NO service.

QFM0HDV907UUyBTXufDMeQ.text: Came in today for my besties birthday lunch, it was amazing. I ended up getting the red and green enchiladas and a couple of specialty drinks all recommend by Our amazing waiter AJ his enthusiasm and product knowledge where above par, be sure to make #NACHODADDY a stop on your Vegas to-do list!

BkLRfXbf5QEig7g5yVUhqA.text: Our server Judy was so kind and informational She made our first time here great cant wait to come back, loved the food it was deelicious !  loved the fiesta nachos.. great food, great service!!

RoqJ3tq959zbH9gEEjDofA.text: Jovany was an amazing server! So much product knowledge and I had an amazing experience! Definitely a regular

peRrdpRhFYc_PNmAxLjELQ.text: Fun place to eat. Not to busy during lunch. Drinks are great! Food is fantastic.  Staff is fast and friendly!

zEfGa9tNDELKv039qQZmcA.text: Jovany was our server. He was very helpful, confident, and friendly. We got the sloppy joe nachos and Thai chicken nachos between my wife and I.  They were amazing and large servings! Establishment is nice,  trendy rustic wood and industrial decor. Fun "current hip hop" music playing, but not too loud.  A small patio for those who want to sit outside.

V_rCfm-azcASwFGazFHdwA.text: Had a great experience here with Amanda as our server. she was highly attentive and a great host. The food selection was amazing and the portions were very generous. I didn't find the BBQ pork nachos to my liking but there were a ton of other entries I wanted to try. I will definitely come again

7B7Q2yddvLKmhDibgM8nVg.text: Nachos are amazing and free check in margarita fits my picky taste! Great prices and huge helping of nachos! Got the chicken Thai ones

3Lww97XXVi_yrwzrtFGBDg.text: Love this place!! Judy was our server and she nailed it with her recommendations! We're trying to figure out how to make it happen that we can come back here one more time before we leave tomorrow.  I ordered the Filet nachos and the Peach margarita. The filet is so tender and flavorful. It's the only time I've actually enjoyed the steak on a steak nacho. The peach marg was the perfect sweetness.. not too much, not too little. Is it wrong to come back to Vegas for Nacho Daddy? I don't think so! #JudyRocks #NachoDaddyFanForLife

GtePntuxny9W0khCCu8dzw.text: My first time here and Gabby & Gio were super friendly and helpful.   She gave us tips on  the food and other local places to visit while in town.   We will definitely come back for the food and service.

-jXDKmeSztCvpLRXiBpPbg.text: Gabby & Gio were awesome and so friendly with our group.  They provided fast, friendly and impeccable service!!  It was my first time here and Food was great but the service was even better!!  I definitely recommend this place!!

u7R5JwUtdT_QNgu_joAuug.text: Went here after a long day of drinking. Sat at the bar and Desi was our server. She was awesome and very attentive. I had the breakfast burrito and my buddy had the breakfast sliders and we split BBQ chicken nachos!! Best thing I ate while in Vegas.

9j89nNuuE2X8mMLNvvOHKA.text: Great food, went twice while I was in town.  The customer service is spot on, super friendly, and willing to make you feel comfortable.  I definitely recommend this for folks wanting bar food and drinks on the strip.

Rb8pFknlzengibRQkmjFag.text: Had the Supreme nachos and the chicken street tacos.  Great food and the margaritas we got for checking in were great!  Judy did a great job as our server as well and was great at helping us sort out the robust menu.

VZPRfNHNsYb8DH1Sdu-sLg.text: So we seen this spot just across the way and it was a real treat! We wanted something quick easy. Or server who was Tiffany was amazing! She was prompt with taking our orders and service was always with a smile.  The nachos were excellent please try bbq chicken they went quick lol. All in all we had excellent service and great food.

R9RpdpKVb-a34lhSTmxuOA.text: Very cool place, great food with fun shareable options, cool music and great vibe. The staff was friendly and helpful. Someone in our party had a service dog with them and the staff was very accommodating. Our server Ryan was great and we loved the nachos!

os-t4Wmkf90g6Ew_mBmC3g.text: Delicious!!! I got the fish tacos and they were super good, as were the beans and rice that came with them. The peach margarita is the top choice, is super peachy and delicious. My partner got a chicken burrito and it was HUMONGOUS. The wait staff is friendly, the music is great and the atmosphere is fun.

3WtUKfQGZdr5__P0B2Cqtg.text: Picture this -  It's almost 10 pm, you haven't eaten all day, and you're scrolling Yelp in your Vegas hotel room overwhelmed with options. "Free House Margarita with Check-In!" Say. No. More. OMW!  Disclaimer, for those who don't read, it's with the purchase of an entree. Don't let that harsh your sparkle, though, the entrees are BOMB.   We got there late, and there was ample seating options throughout the restaurant. We chose to sit at the bar for faster drink service. The atmosphere definitely makes me feel like this place is on and poppin' during happy hour.   But I'm really missing the point here, the star of this place is the food. Any restaurant with an ENTIRE PAGE of vegetarian options that all sound so good I struggle to pick ONE - automatic five stars. I went with the chick'n chimichanga which was HANDS DOWN the best chimichanga I've ever had. It was crispy, but not greasy, and stuffed full of veggie and meat sub goodness. I STILL think about it when I'm back home disappointed with my lack of options any time I want Mexican food.   Our bartender was great. She was extremely attentive and was very courteous when clarifying the free drink voucher. I would definitely come back here if I return to Vegas.

45RDnrGX2g4E2zMd1Xu06A.text: Nachos were great. Enchiladas were good. It's really good late night food on the strip. Thanks!

HiAtvIOrQR00iRPtoGP5iQ.text: Excellent Margaritas  and huge plates of Nachos absolutely delicious..we got the cheeseburger nachos ....  I do think the adult beverages are small except for the margaritas  Margaritas definitely on point.

jp4raupzFEBMGdmLODlXjA.text: Filet mignon nachos were so good! So much flavor and different ingredients than usual nachos. Food came out relatively quickly. The bartender was also very nice

3zW8TG9VvGESeWmFGMEvWw.text: Our table ordered nachos, burritos, enchiladas, tortilla soup, queso, and salad. Service was excellent and our server was courteous and professional.  Definitely share the nachos because they are a very generous portion. Even the house salad was huge.  The queso was delicious and one of the kids ordered a side of steak with the queso which made all of us jealous when it arrived.

SUP6cWly5kO4Ql__SxZjfQ.text: If you had a few drinks the night before and need a good breakfast for another afternoon/night of drinking this is the place to be! First of all they serve you a french press of coffee, which means it's strong as hell and wakes you up! There are no free refills of the french press, but you are able to share it between two people with a cup and a half between the two of you. Trust me it's all you need. The breakfast menu is limited, but it covers the basics from breakfast burritos to breakfast sandwiches. When we got there the service was a little slow for anyone to come to us and that's only because the bartender was around the corner of the bar making two bloody mary masterpieces for two other guests at the bar. They looked delicious (if I liked tomato juice I would get one). They are probably the only restaurant that still does bottomless mimosa's!!!!   The food was tasty and surprisingly light for being so much of it. They use fresh ingredients so that makes all the difference. We can't wait to go here for Nachos and margaritas one night!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast burrito with sausage

hEi3jkF5DZ33ES_4qWhL_A.text: Casual Mexican Joint Right Off the Strip.   Great drinks and good food.  Portion sizes are large.   Price: $$  Food: Very Good, Huge portion sizes. Nachos were only $13 and it was enough to share.  Drinks: happy hour daily and top shelf for a margarita was only $11. Considering you are in Las Vegas, this is a deal.   If your looking for good food, good service and a meal that won't kill the wallet. Try this place. Will not be disappointed.

BqZbb1g9PNvyg1YdroSD6A.text: Definitely recommend. Good food and atmosphere. Very comfortable place for friends dinner.

louqd4rcPiJrU22dnUQA6A.text: Awesome vegan gluten-free nachos--that alone deserves 5 stars!! Still thinking about those nachos 4 months later.

PuMnjCr_8tpEbs4soMetjw.text: Good nachos and fun variety.  Great ambiance and style.  Would come back next time I'm in Vegas.

Tk8cesXL5lwwIqTqmyweNw.text: We saw Nacho Daddy when we were walking around The Strip and figured we'd give it a shot since it was close to the Aria. We took advantage of the Free Margarita with check in and it did not disappoint! Ordered the mix and match fajitas for two with some chips and guac and it hit the spot! The atmosphere was great, really laid back and had awesome throwbacks playing with some hockey too. If you're looking for a bite to eat and a good drink with a chill atmosphere, look no further! If I find myself on The Strip again looking for food, this is definitely my go-to.

f5aORSTHgk_jlepjS_sVzw.text: I was in Vegas for a business trip and heard about this place because they have a full vegan menu. Me and a group of coworkers went and were beyond pleased!   Kirsten was our waitress and let me tell you that if you have her you are in for an amazing customer experience. She was incredibly sensitive to our vegan needs and had suggestions on the ready. We also had a coworker that is gluten free and had some other allergies and she checked on everything for her.   As for the food, it was really delicious and well presented. I had the crispy avocado street tacos for my entree. We all shared the vegan triple dip - their queso is UNREAL. And we finished with the vegan chocolate cake. Fresh and classic comfort food.  Well done! Thanks for giving so many options for vegan diners and taking such good care of us!

JmrcPc8WGEkzGlmQIgT2Rw.text: Great experience!!! We had great time at the restaurant. Food was delicious, we had the Supreme Nachos, flaming fajitas and kids chicken casadia and 2 big house margaritas. All was great, service great, good atmosphere. Defenetly a place to have dinner.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

WT8r_ZKDEh3orapskjcKew.text: I love nachos and this place did not disappoint at all!! Best nachos I have ever had... Nachos are my favorite appetizer and when they made it a meal... they did just that!! Will continue to eat there whenever I'm in town

oo-y_aLPwwAAmLfoSgoyJg.text: This may be my new favorite place in Vegas. I used to head to Vegas all the dang time and have my vegetarian/vegan friendly stops. It had been a couple years since my last trip and we had an evening free for a casual dinner. Off to yelp to find a place with vegetarian and GF options for our various dietary and allergy restrictions. So happy this result was so high on the list!   We walked in and they advised that they're computer systems were down, so they could not take credit cards. That was a bit frustrating, so we had to walk around the corner to CVS to withdraw cash. But just a few  minutes later, we were seated on the patio with a great waitress. She asked what salsa we wanted, and sensing out indecision, she offered to bring us all that they offer! We each had out favorite, so it worked out well.  I ordered the vegan chick'n quesadilla and my friend had some sort of tacos and we both LOVED our meals. The service was nice and they were apologetic about the delay with the checks. But I loved our meal and cannot wait until I'm back in Vegas!

sbN6i-tD-I-YEJxjguza2g.text: Ten of us visited while on a guys trip.   Our server was on top of things!  Nachos part of their name, they don't disappoint!   Got the filet mignon nachos.... recommended.   good balance of chips, cheese, meat and goodies.  Everyone got great food.  Happy hour menu is solid   i'll be back.

YH6OastyDTG71uwKU1GSeg.text: Good wings it's basically a bww but with nachos and better drinks and food menu  Would come back

vIq2gqUxeOsWeUItcd6jAg.text: I came here for dinner the first night my boyfriend and I was in LV to take advantage of the free yelp check-in drinks. Once we got to the restaurant there was no wait because it was 9:00PM on a rainy weekday. When we ordered, our food came out right after our drinks and it was nice and warm. We ordered the buffalo nachos, fish tacos, and enchiladas. The portions here were so big that we ended up taking half of our entrees back to the hotel! We will definitely be coming back in the future to try different types of nachos.

1mJU4qy7nY_TZ8DVu7lm9w.text: The day we came in for lunch was a pretty busy Sunday. We had heard great things about this place from tourists and locals, so I was excited to try it. It's a huge space with really interesting decor and a variety of music videos on the TV playlist.   The vegan options on the menu were a pleasant surprise-- I got vegan nachos and the queso was almost as good as the real thing.   Unfortunately, despite the enjoyable drinks and an interesting and varied menu, the experience pretty much felt like a waste of 2.5 hours. The service was slow, the bar was so backed up that we were encouraged not to order second drinks, which was a first for me, and the crowded restaurant mixed with the high ceilings made it nearly impossible to have a conversation.   What could have been a relaxing lunch left me anxious to leave and disappointed to have chosen the wrong restaurant during a short weekend trip.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Loaded Nachos-- if you didn&#39;t know they were vegan you may not even guess.

t2YEK5Clfe0p4o5f7BAjqQ.text: I have ordered from here on three separate occasions on uber eats and all three times my order was cancelled. I ordered within the given time limit and everything and each time, 30 minutes to an hour later my order would be cancelled by them due to unknown reasons.

QJtbv7I6jbnFTqtOuZmiaA.text: A great escape from the high prices up and down the strip!  The nacho plates here are out of this world and for under $20 bucks 2 people can eat like a King!  They have great mixed drinks and shots with scorpions in them!

qyLbTjfe4Rb2BwokAZ6Beg.text: Expectations were minimal but this ended up being a great spot!  We were craving Mexican and ended up going here TWICE during our long weekend. Great alternative to all the overpriced tourist traps.

W12XvQv0VgtrvJZPVXQaaQ.text: The best LOADED nachos on the strip, my sister a Thai rice bowl which was also full of flavor and our waitress was very sweet. All 5 of us were happy with our order and so happy our hotel concierge at the Hilton recommended it with 20% off our full order!

REoNZhqb-Uas1Z-Xi69HrQ.text: Fantastic food. Great free margarita with check in. We didn't have to wait either time we went and the service was excellent. The nachos and their brunch items were some of the better food I had on the trip.

5ZgbWRqds0wxedbjH2Tkuw.text: The BEST food! Hands down. Everyone I was with loved it. Vegans. Non vegans etc!! Delicious salsa and chips, yummy burritos. My friend said he had the beet chicken tacos he's ever had in his life! I will always bring people here. Please open one in LA!!!

shfrib7DEAKscLx7utMI5w.text: Awesome place for some quality Mexican food! We split the vegan nachos and they were fantastic! Our waitress was great and very attentive. I will be back for sure!

o82U_oeo1Z0spD9GdWFPGg.text: Good nachos, a little bit on the pricey side for nachos. Good nachos tho. They staff was a little rude but in the end we got what we came for.   We all checked in for the free house margarita but they claimed they only saw 5/6 of the check ins. After we showed them that we all did it, we all got our drinks.   Other then that, good stuff here.

a4-LRjomElng7eC84pYnIw.text: Nacho Daddy is a welcomed find on the Las Vegas strip.  The male  bartender was a bit of a jerk when we first arrived but after we were seated the food and everything else made up for it.  Jacob our server was great!  Attentive, knowledgeable about the menu and took good  care of us, just a super guy. My table had flaming fajitas, pork nachos and vegan nachos and all were excellent!  We ended our meal with a delicious vegan chocolate cake.    We sat in the back right by the open kitchen and it was nice to see such a happy group getting along so well.      Next time I'm in Vegas I'll be back.

B4Gx10BH-gRC6iKdTMK2rA.text: Tina is amazing!  Super cool knew exactly what to recommend for all my visiting guests.  When you come here, ask for Tina!

_qm1U0Q_iWu6Tcqv3ZI8PQ.text: Great Mexican food with a great atmosphere. I can't justify expensive Mexican food but this place definitely does it and it great. The beers and margaritas were on point and the food was prepared perfectly as a burrito and nacho should.

GCTWztZ9CtBmX8neskXUtg.text: Not good. Nachos were ok. Went back for tacos and was very disappointed. Hard shell served laying on the rice, so a total greasy mess. Chips and salsa were not very good, primarily because of the salsa.

I-HKN16rvz9gYeQFoaaC3g.text: Fab service! Jovany easily handled our group of 15 with a breeze. He got all our orders correct on the first shot, got our drink orders to us within minutes, and left us feeling like royalty.  Thanks for the great time, food, service, and friendly smiles :)

tLovNVu6ErO9RQeKBRRkqA.text: Loved being able to eat vegan In Vegas! Sat at the bar and loved our server, Arnold, he was the best! Thanks for a great experience!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

IRAgd0lboKaGNArqOOKgpw.text: I really wanted to love this place. The menu was awesome when I opened it. It wasn't too busy but our waitress was pretty slow. I gave her a free pass as we were a table of 8, and I know it's not easy. I ordered the smothered filet mignon burrito, it was 17.50. I was super excited to eat it and as I worked my way through it there wasn't much steak in it. For a $5 up charge to have the steak there seemed to be only a few nibbles and tons of rice. I think the burrito would of been a 10/10 if there was more steak in it. I'm also not totally convinced it was filet mignon either. Seemed more of a skirt steak similar to what you'd use for carne asada. It was a stringing beef. Either way, I feel like the flavor was there but it was just lacking on the beef that I paid extra for. I'd be willing to try it again though. Maybe if I'm in the area I'll give it another go.

F5guFKhg4wif-LiG11JYyQ.text: Great vegan food that is affordable.  The portions are huge.  The chef even came out to our table and served our food.  We loved the vegan Nachos and the vegan "chicken" fajitas.  You will not be disappointed.

1azMEcgecP2dkD38c8oHOw.text: A group of 6 of us came here in the mid afternoon. We were seated right away. Our server Daria was extremely friendly and provided great recommendations. She mentioned that 1 nacho was enough to split. I'm glad we did because we got the supreme tostada nachos. They were not only gluten free but so good. It was definitely enough for myself and my fiance to split.  Fun fact: they have a scorpion shot. That's out of my league but definitely something to try if you are feeling dangerous.

IaDFmP-K5QGuBqRSl1AcdQ.text: Loved it! We got the shrimp tacos, Golden Knight nachos (substituted shrimp), and fish tacos. Everything was delicious! We had fish tacos the night before at Jose Andres China Poblano and these were MUCH better. It also happened to be Taco Tuesday so we got a great deal on the tacos. Our server, Huck, was great and friendly too!

dAwE6BSU8P8vGkCXZ4F9zw.text: Yummy! Delicious nachos,  great server! In a town with celebrity chefs and amazing restaurants,  a downhome, relaxed environment.

ZhdZXiOGa4U372oOOHiiLg.text: Fantastic atmosphere and very high quality food at some of the best prices in Vegas. The breakfast taco is Soooo Good, as is the pancake

hg2A2B-uFWqyNQhAkEAUag.text: Oh Nacho Daddy, how I love thee...I've been to every (I think?) location in town and it goes like this. If your friends are just like whatever, I need food and I don't care- Downtown is a great option. If they are like ugh downtown ugh, we are staying on the strip- bring them here. There's a tank with live scorpions in the waiting area for Pete's sakes! It's a great breakfast option because  A) if you just flew in, you need fuel to get you through the day of bar hopping and living it up on the strip; B) if you flew in last night, you are probably nursing a hangover. Hearty breakfast nachos are where it's at!  It's also a great all other meal option for pretty much same reason.   I also think it's a great central location in a pretty cool setting at a very fair price.   They are located in Planet Hollywood, so you can still get shocking free parking at Miracle Mile shops and across from City Center, so you definitely have your mid strip glitz and glam.   Their entrance faces Harmon, should your Uber driver be confused about life.   Some faves- any Nacho Daddy Bowl, Spicy Shrimp Nachos and Loco Moco Nachos definitely hit the spot, especially if you are consuming your most important meal of the day. Margaritas. Love the margaritas. There are also some crazy good sliders, if that's your thing.  Oh and your morning coffee- French press. Ooh. Aah.

d0Wty_4G-SGsiNKstoMHSQ.text: Great food and specials. Everything we got here was great! Waiter Vincent was great at recommending food and telling us about specials!

CatK8Ok4T9N2YIGIx6a0og.text: Me and my gf were soooo excited to go to the Bellagio buffet or the Caesar's palace buffet... but they were closed at 10pm (which is insane for Vegas- the palazzo pool is open til 10pm for God's sake).  We did a quick yelp and though we weren't in the mood for Mexican food, it was Cinco de mayo... so we picked here.   Holy. Cow. Just go. If you're considering it, just go. We had Edward and Rebecca serving us at the bar-they couldn't be friendly or more attentive. Edward recommended a new menu item- Nashville Nachos. Chicken, Mac n cheese, chipotle spicy mustard sauce, hot cherry peppers, pickles, cheese... and it was the size of a cookie sheet/piled high to feed an army. My gf got the Cali burrito- Filet mignon, garlic fries, homemade salsa and chips and it was soooo delicious and filling. Just a perfect experience/atmosphere/gem.   What started as a place to "settle" on and eat has instantly become a Vegas staple for future trips. It's affordable, quality, and we got two free, loaded, delicious frozen house margaritas by checking in with yelp and buying an entree. The review came after our meal and free drink (just had to check in to get it)... but had to write to share how much I loved this place. Enjoy!  Try these two menu items, you won't be disappointed!

zRtg9DKHNDMFYjys-aSHoQ.text: Love, love the service. Very helpful, great nachos. Yum! We will be back! Margaritas were stellar & drank many of them. Can't go wrong. Talk to Edward, he's the manager. Great guy!!! Woot

cvoClx2zHChcyURlx_4l7Q.text: Ate here after walking through the entire miracle mile looking for something appetizing .  This is on the outside next to Buffalo Wild Wings .  I was prepared for crappy Mexican food and overpriced drinks , but I was highly surprised !  We got the bbq pork nachos and the guacamole which were both amazing .  Also got a frozen margarita that actually had good flavor and wasn't weak at all .  Our particular waitress was very attentive .    Something unexpected - as my wife has a very restricted diet , they have TONS of vegan options .  An added bonus for us !  Surprisingly , there prices are really reasonable for a restaurant on hen strip .    Nice atmosphere too!  Highly recommend .

cc9guYj4tBaTplMO_yMSNA.text: BOOKER. IS. THE. MAN!!! You want great drinks? Amazing service?! Hilarious, super nice, cares about giving you the best experience possible. He is the reason we keep coming back! Ask for him, seek him out, talk to him. He rocks. Everything.  Every time!!!!

7wI561_RzyGueIYLePtu6w.text: Got the tostada nachos and the enchilada nachos. I'd stick to the tostada ones. Super good!! We ordered margaritas too, got the free one for checking in. Sent both back. We're not very good. The one we ordered was the jalapeno one. Wasn't very spicy at all. Even ordered it extra spicy. Tastes very sweet. But, I'm a margarita snob. Haha.  I would come back for food. 4 stars just because margaritas weren't that great.

Rw2sHlFobZQH52Wno520hA.text: Love this spot. Love they they have breakfast at all hours. I ordered a super keto meal tonight and was so happy with the amount of food I got. The service is always awesome also! You have to get a scorpion shot just to say you did it.

mlVLsvXYgjkHwccaT5tMBw.text: Went there for my birthday great food my waiter was a awesome guy gave me a free shot for my birthday so that was preety kool food was on point I order the bbqs pork nachos I recommend everyone should at least go there once

OB1M55lcyTF1mN10qcFxrA.text: Enjoyed 2 meals here. One was breakfast and then a dinner. Good service and good food.  Nice drinks as well!  Friendly for Vegas...will be back

G0pVzT9Gjt8cdZzk_DoRew.text: Delicious burritos and chimichangas. We had salsa with the burrito and it was so good it made me wish we'd gotten some before the meal. Service was a little slow, but they were pretty busy. Overall, great food, great place.

3uN-MSp7tO9zyDnhHLuLZQ.text: The food was better the visit.  The service would have been better. We went there for brunch the place was fairly empty. So I expected punctual service

9cYCy0_jaLh3NW_uIGiRyg.text: The crab and lobster nachos were amazing and also the shrimp burrito! Service was excellent

2RAoSfGsNNq6PZyVmLs5EQ.text: Stopped in here for a late night snack. Met with very friendly hostess. Server was very accommodating we had the enchilada nachos with both green and red sauce chicken by the way. Excellent flavor. Very filling. Manager even stopped by to check on usgreat Vegas spot

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

dGlI3la2HNmkRqfRd7357w.text: What a great time we had last night at Nacho Daddy Miracle Mile,  complete with delicious food, great margaritas, fun atmosphere and terrific service.Our server was Mark and he was super nice and attentive.  I always love to go to Nacho Daddy and there's no place quite like it in LV. I've been to all the locations and  I have never been disappointed.

9eMe0xoiHVbbKIYwgfQABA.text: Litzs was a great waitress! She was very attentive to our table. Help us with making great meal choices. The flaky tortillas were delicious and a great recommendation. The scorpion tank was impressive.

07_px_5dosi3gU3_qiE2-A.text: I ordered off of the Yelp app through GrubHub. The estimated wait time was 55 to 65 minutes. I waited the hour to go and pick up my food. I get there they never received my order. So I still had to wait for another 30 minutes for the meal to be made. I was very specific that I could not have rice or grains in my meal. I get back to my hotel room there is so much rice in my burrito it is unedible. There is no way to pull all of the rice off of the cheese and meat inside the burrito.

SQPAuGERbd-o01qmK86tbA.text: While the chips and salsa are good here, the service was terrible. We waited 20 minutes before we got our food and then some of the dishes were cold. I appreciate that they were busy but does that mean that service to each table is diminished?

NWjCoC12uiJb7mb_k4DTAg.text: Lobster and crab nachos were pretty good. Unfortunately it was all a little cold, but maybe it's supposed to be? I don't know, but I did enjoy it anyway and there was a fair amount of meat on there. Debbie is very nice and friendly.

1teksX-UxbP6koWm-xk_lQ.text: My husband LOVED this place! The atmosphere is fun, but I wasn't personally impressed with the food. I would give it another try for sure, because they had so many different options on their menu. I didn't care for the plates, they come on hot iron type plates to keep the food warm, but it ended up making the food soggy. My husband wanted the veggies and guacamole separate from his chimichanga but ended up layered all over it, he had to scrape it all off, but he still loved eating it! I'm happy for him, lol. We will come visit again the next time we are in town. :)

taZYRgxiJlu68-hWzbr0DA.text: Be prepared to wait every time you come here. The wait to get in is long and the wait to get your food is long, but we still keep coming back because the food is so good and the atmosphere is so fun. I've come here for business and pleasure and each time has been super enjoyable. I love all the music videos they play, especially when I found out my 7 year old knows all the lyrics to Nelly's "ride with me" because she was signing it with the entire restaurant the last time we were here. I don't know how she knows that song, but my point is...the nacho's are awesome and they bring out the best in everyone.

jhBwWN35v0AM0qBS5_1Ygg.text: Hands down some of the best nachos I have had. You get an insane amount, and friendly service, win win.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Oh boy! Here we go!

wOwGUA7wXS1FTpieeHSS7A.text: I ordered the $20 filet mignon nacho and checked in on yelp for a free house margarita. The food was good and service was just okay. Seemed like the server didn't want to work there. The nacho was huge where it fed the both of us. With the server's attitude and $20 nacho, I wouldn't come back. The host that seated us was super friendly. It was good for a first and one time only experience.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. $20 filet mignon nachos

M1FIDPs0G4BE_bLsbgXpqQ.text: They are very friendly and got awesome food. Now i dont think i shpuld have paid 20 plus a person to eat there it was good but not 100 dollars for 3 people to eat

dz10QtJU0iGYVl4p-6YZ_Q.text: Good solid joint. We had 5 people ordering the American breakfast, the Huevos rancheros, steak omelet and the enchiladas everything was good so I don't think you can order wrong. Nothing stood out as fantastic it was all just really good.

lpfKg067IIfczzaayNng8A.text: Simply delicious! We ordered the California burrito (my son said there were no words to describe how delicious it was); I had the cheesy enchiladas and they had excellent flavor. We also received a free birthday dessert for my son. Also- great customer service (we made online reservations that did not show up on their system but they sat us at our reservation time anyway)- thank you!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

0iIlEZw3Qat_-QVOKAS9pw.text: An amazing selection of nachos. You might think, what can they do with nachos that I haven't already seen? Well...lots! From enchilada nachos with green or red sauce (or both) to BBQ chicken nachos with their own sauce. Another bonus: they make their own chips and you can taste the difference. Oh man can you taste the difference. A nacho plate will easily feed 2 people. That massive quantity coupled with the superb quality makes this a must do in Vegas. And the ladies working the bar were incredibly friendly, don't want to end the review without noting that. Worth the walk, worth the wait, just do it.

melNP-mwyDTZgxyJyEEbmQ.text: I went to Nacho Daddy back in August while I was in Vegas for my birthday. I was extremely pleased with the amount of vegan options the menu has! I of course had to get the vegan loaded nachos because it is a Nacho place after all, and they were the BEST nachos I have ever eaten. Highly recommend visiting, especially if you're vegan! Can't wait to come again the next time I'm in Vegas!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

bkNMRn-1HL8BPyEKI5SJGw.text: This place is great! Came in with a group of 9 and everybody was extremely happy BOTH times we came. (So good we had to come back and try more dishes) I'm vegetarian and gluten free and had so many options!

zlfqv-esTzuwsbJOpbjJUA.text: There is better Mexican food on the strip, but Nacho Daddy has probably the best Mexican rice I have ever had.  My friend finished his rice and not his tacos, that's how good the rice was, and how bland the tacos were.  On the bright side, the house margaritas are strong and delicious, and my enchiladas were up to snuff.

ScIzhK1GqhIZTfjayv1mwA.text: The service was pretty good. I was craving a fish taco so I ordered 1, but I figured the best bet of the menu was going to be nachos. So we got Fiesta Nachos to share. The fish taco wasn't anything to write home about & I didn't finish it. The nachos, however, were really good and we ate every last bite. I got jalapenos on the side. The Fiesta nachos weren't spicy on their own so the fresh jalapenos really did a lot for me because I like a little heat. It's True there wasn't a dry chip. Moral of the story - Stick with the nachos if you go here. It's just their thing.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fried fish taco, fiesta nachos. The taco was just alright. The nachos were great!

5piae6Ktckf9fn9Mv3qUxA.text: So good!! Food and service were excellent!!! Our server was amazing!! Gosh I wish I remembered her name! Cute brunette little short thing. Adorable. We were seated In a barstool type table next to bar and window that rolls up. Not sure if servers work same area, but she was awesome. My son ordered the fiesta nachos and I ordered the soft tacos. One chicken and one pork. Highly recommend the chicken. Huge portions, lots of meat. Delicious  The nachos were loaded with meat and goodies, all the way to the bottom. Not like your typical nachos, where you only get the good stuff on top, and then dry chips the rest of the way. Not here. Come hungry.

QUu44Twfo2WbLouGZaw0xA.text: I don't know how they manage it but EVERY chip in the sky high pile on the sizzling plate got its fair share of toppings. That NEVER happens when I make nachos. Leave it to the experts at Nacho Daddy and get any one of the many nacho concoctions on the menu. We went with the classic Fiesta Nacho and it was all that and more. I can't wait to get back to Vegas to try another.

-XvTAMTSJJEI9YssCEik2Q.text: Filet nachos were delicious. Hot until the last bite and it was a decent size portion that took me a while to eat. Great service

Sr5gKuwWr-QEzq7fC0NJbQ.text: Amazing service, fresh ingredients, and a great atmosphere- what's not to love! I have been here twice so far; once for a hosted event and once for a weekend lunch. Their menu has something for everyone, including more than half a page dedicated to real, fulfilling and creative VEGAN options! The avocado tacos are heavenly.   Like their namesake suggests, they are taking your average plate of nachos over the top with unique interpretations of familiar flavors. My favorite nacho option is the Thai Chicken nacho- full of the classic Thai flavors but with a Tex Mex essence.   Their drink menu is also impressive, with high quality, amazingly fresh margaritas; you can watch them squeeze the limes fresh at the bar! We tried the house, blood orange, Daddy's, and spicy cucumber margaritas- all delicious! If you're feeling extra brave, you can attempt their signature scorpion shot!   This location may be in the center of The Strip, but has all of the welcoming atmosphere and service you'd expect from a local restaurant and the pride in their Vegas roots shows. From the managers, bartenders and servers, they spend so much time connecting with guests and expediently sharing top notch Mexican offerings with locals and tourists alike. Definitely a stand out option for a laid back lunch or dinner any day in Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margs on margs! The spicy cucumber and Daddy&#39;s margaritas, cheers!

poCtYTeRF_bQD7KnBCt5lw.text: Food is ok, not great, but I like that they have vegan options. Service is horrible at the West Sahara location, however.

zDUelRPQPpw2SLpj-2ZCJA.text: Went to Vegas for my husband's work conference and didn't want to wait 30 minutes to eat brunch at another restaurant. Saw Nacho Daddy on Yelp and decided to come here instead. I was pleasantly surprised that everything was flavorful. To be honest, I thought it would be another "Chevy's" type of restaurant but I was so  wrong.  My husband ordered the Surf & Turf Taco Combo and I ordered the Baja Seafood Combo.  From the Spanish rice to the refried beans, everything was delicious.  I wanted to try my husband's food but he ate it all up before I could take a bite!  Even the free margarita with Yelp check-in was yummy!  Our waitress was super nice too! Left very satisfied!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
