hljp6YMCjClBktVDsmYY1Q.text: Excellent food and even better service!! When our food came out extra spicy, they/Christina didn't hesitate to get us a new plate with the sauce on the side.  The atmosphere is awesome! Always showing good Sporting events and/or music videos.  I've eaten here multiple times and will definitely be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

cenj00u2Owpl9vHRo8IQGg.text: Absolutely delicious! I love how big of a selection they have on their menu. They even have a separate vegan menu that has a full page of stuff! I tried the vegan chicken quesadilla. I was blown away by the vegan cheese...better than the real thing in my opinion. Tried two different margaritas which were also to die for and complimented my meal perfectly. I love that they play cool music videos too. Great atmosphere.

-_vCChyd08HadCkblKkrHg.text: I had the fajita salad. I went in wanting nachos, but desired a simple nacho: ground beef, cheese, pico , guacamole.... not bbq chicken or seafood. It seemed like it went from plain 3 cheese to over the top. No middle ground. So, I got the fajita salad. It was fresh, flavorful, and the chicken was grilled perfectly with some char. We also ordered the queso , which was delicious. The prices were very decent. It missed the hospitable feel of complimentary chips and salsa, but it's on the strip so still top notch as far as I'm concerned.  The open kitchen and decor was fun as well.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

NeBDCdMFwdv41rtgAh3roA.text: Great Mexican food with comfortable and upscale environment. Drinks are even better. Live scorpion tank as you walk in.

0i3SRvLlea0M-Jqze8_r4w.text: Place was great. Food was great Drinks were great too. Still not sure about the scorpion in my Tequila shot but, hey you only live once

2BlbjwXz57jfYt8OARCcjQ.text: Went on yelp to find a place to eat came across nacho daddy never been there.  When you walk in they have a tank with scorpions it pretty cool to see.  We sat down look at the menu and got a order of filet mignon, it was good!  Bartenders there are great when we sat at the bar.  Booker T or daddy nacho he wanted to be called . He Made me and my GF a Jameson margarita it was BOMB!  You have to try it.  Definitely coming back here.

x1Gs0cXRd0c93FyfZm63Aw.text: Got the fiesta nachos and my husband got the filet mignon nachos, they were amazing but not as good as DJ! Love this place!

iifk-3tYDGC7v_A55_bMig.text: This place is amazing and I definitely would recommend it! I got the buffalo chicken nachos and they were delicious but they were VERY hot!! If you get these and aren't super good wit spicy, ask for the sauce on the side. Their margaritas are delicious and huge, so those are great as well. The Mexican candy one is very good but super spicy as well! Would for sure go back.

mpDU4fuxlWSXAWFx3OXcWg.text: Not impressed with the vegan nachos but the staff were very nice and the margarita was pretty good.

4i7oPg5NRn_WhPneV-hucw.text: Nacho Daddy was fun!!! Good food, great service(thanks Luz) and a free margarita! We will be back, but will share-the portions are large.

FdVYWP8vi28guVhvA4vrTQ.text: The service was great. The meal was just average. A fun atmosphere to kick off an evening in Vegas.

NoW93SOUbFFdX1G5lHeETw.text: If you want the best nacho cheese you've ever had, come here. Any nachos are a great choice!

LltKvPDyv9i2eN3mDEqmWQ.text: So GOOD! Everything we ordered was solid and what an amazing value. Especially for Vegas. I had the corn appetizer, filet mignon and Golden Knight nachos, and beer bettered fish tacos. Oh - and free margaritas with Yelp check-in! One of the least expensive meals during my time in Vegas and one of my favorite. YUM!!

yvuH5Gx5W8m_DYjqF_G2fw.text: Do not hesitate to dine here! Great service and delicious food. That is all. Our server went out of his way to put a smile on our faces. The burritos and nachos were delicious.

epTHiRFRm2fnNhQA1CGqmg.text: Great food and service!  My husband and I visited here while on our anniversary trip and we weren't disappointed. This was the first restaurant we ate at when we got off the plane and we were happy. We had 1 order of nachos and our waiter helped us customize how we wanted it. It was enough for the both of us and it was very tasty. We sat near the outside patio and enjoyed the fresh air.   The next night we ordered the naked hot wings and they were SUPER AMAZING! The sauce came on the side which was great bc the wings had a bold char grilled flavor which tasted great. It was like having two types of wings with fried which were also very tasty.   Overall the food was great with good quality ingredients and taste. Everything was fresh!

Qa79dyv9UN4_VqX8Q_23yw.text: Awesome nachos and great margaritas.  While I was not brave enough to do the tequila shot with the scorpion, I will surely be back next time I am in Vegas!

HI24FQ12mPtFs-laPNDaUA.text: Margs were great. A little walk from the strip but it was really good. They had great queso and great customer service

sPFGLPYVAulgtTyTrRvYxA.text: This was our first time in Vegas we came out for my birthday since our hotel was across the street. Kristen the serve is amazing she took care of us and made my birthday thank Kristen. If you are in Vegas and want to eat good Mexican food go down to nacho daddy and ask for Kristen great server. You won't be disappointed

XSI-K9tgovox15mQDTuMrw.text: FIVE FREAKING STARS!!!!   First of all, our server LAUREN was absolutely adorable! Beautiful, attentive, funny, and had the chillest personality. Second of all, I came here for the VEGAN NACHOS. Let's just talk about this really quick. Vegan. Nachos. Do I need to say much more? I do? Okay, let me continue. They are vegan, and gluten free, and DELICIOUS! The portion is huge and so is the FLAVA! I would recommend this restaurant to any one with food restrictions or allergies like my self. The FULL vegan menu and the crazy list of tequila options are... LIFE CHANGING. I dare you to try the scorpion shot.... I was to cowardly to do it... but it looked intense. Remember ask for LAUREN if you go. She made it worth the walk down to Planet Hollywood.

Tr69O5WeKpyCT-GTf7ja4Q.text: Nacho Daddy was fun and yummy. The yelp deal on the free house margaritas is great and our waiter CJ was really nice and helpful.  We shared the lobster and crab nachos- they didn't really have enough of the seafood and had too much sriracha- next time I'd ask for it on the side. Also they were not very hot when they came out. The Mexican corn side dish was delicious.  Others in our party had the chicken enchiladas and plain cheese nachos and said they were good.  The Mexican Candy margarita was very pretty to look at and was delicious- it is very sweet!! The ambiance in the restaurant left a little to be desired - it was pretty warm in the restaurant. Granted it was over 100 outside and the restaurant has very high ceilings, so I am sure it's hard to keep it cool, but we would have been more comfortable had the restaurant been cooler. Also, the music needed to be a little bit louder to create more of a fun atmosphere. We always gauge places by whether or not we would go back- I would go back but I will try something different next time!

8L2zM2nWHwAFE0qAo9rn1A.text: This is my 3rd time bringing my family here. One of the best places in Vegas to get nachos with Unique delicious margaritas. Great fast and friendly service loved our waiter Lee. Will most definitely be back soon.

TOveUmX7UwmNt2kUEeZT_A.text: A must in Vegas for happy hour! Mini nachos, two tacos, two margaritas all for $20! Drinks were strong and tacos have a ton of chicken. My friend got the chimichangas and the dip is so good.

GsNZBUZsJJkiKLEGAfpzPQ.text: Nacho Daddy gets a well deserved 4-stars. Some reviews comment in higher than average pricing. I respect this point but counterpoint the quality of food is above average.  Case in point: people in my party ordered different plates that contained what appeared to be similar pulled pork. But each plate was True to their descriptions and had distinctly different taste.  This is worth a stop if you're walking the strip and want good Mexican eats.

T4Sgd84ntIr-xnu5YdHUUw.text: Great place wonderful food and the white peach margarita was on point. We will be back soon food so good we have made it a tradition to stop here whenever we r in Las Vegas

8-i_Lyt0Xl7tnX1EpC7mjA.text: The food is amazing on a drunk night. However service is pretty slow to be on Fremont. I would recommend this place to anyone drinking downtown.

1v8n51j8yfqn-6H0eXxPnw.text: These nachos are gross. Soggy and gross. Wouldn't come here again. We came for football but the chairs are uncomfortable and the food was bad.   Service was good. Two stars for that.

ZWt3UjFr2LCB79VkzqI33g.text: Lunch for nine on Thanksgiving Thursday. Stayed across the street at the Cosmopolitan, walked over the walkway into the Miracle Mile shopping mall of Planet Hollywood. Found Nacho Daddy on Yelp reviews and was pleasantly happy with the great meals. Started with guacamole/chips, chicken wings, and the group had the usual array of tacos, enchiladas, breakfast and drinks. Service was really great. Food was fresh, nothing too spicy. One person sent her breakfast back because she asked for no jalapeno peppers on her omelet and it came loaded. Kitchen manager came by to check on our meals. A couple of the meals - were doused with brandy and lit up, which was fun for the kids. Ended with a couple of fried ice creams. Garage door windows were opened allowing fresh air and a few small birds to buzz around in the high ceiling restaurant.  Definitely a great choice for lunch.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

nZw3ORPn5yf4AgXGkK74cg.text: Nacho Daddy was delicious! We called ahead for a Friday night and they had a pretty reasonable wait time. The group met there and put our names in their reservation texting system (which I always appreciate). We were notified via text that our table was almost ready and seated promptly after our arrival. We ordered the queso which was good but I don't think the tea light candle does much to keep it warm. I got the cali burrito which was AMAZING! I've eaten many burritos in my life and this was definitely one of the tastiest. My husband got the fish taco and enchilada which were also good. Portions were huge! Waiter was nice but he didn't fill out waters which wasn't great. We were way too full for dessert.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fish taco and enchilada
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cali burrito! Delicious!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Queso

u55WP7ZT1Y753sdquFc8tQ.text: Hello,   Omg this is place so good. I like to order the steak fajitas the seafood nachos and the margaritas. I once ordered the scorpion shot margarita and i recommend it for anyone daring to try. The nacho sauce is nice and creamy with a hint of spice and flavor. The portions are big to share with a good chip to topping ratio. This place has fast seating and the service is pretty decent. I love to dine here when i am in town. I have also been for breakfast and the pancake is a must have!! Big buttery with nice cinnamon butter flavor.

oYwhy984GvYWDyEv7EMHUA.text: Food was good. Service was good. Price was good. Location was good. Nothing crazy great. Margarita was a little too sweet. Nachos were big enough for two to share. Great for a few people to snack on food and a have a drink.

mCXL1JCFUmLxFk7smYigyQ.text: Unfortunately I can't review the food. We went on a Saturday night. We were seated actually fairly quickly but it was upstairs. That is what I am reviewing. DO NOT ACCEPT a table upstairs. They have limited seating (I like privacy, but not like that) and heat rises, so it is a little warmer up there. Both of those I can deal with. But remember the stairs.  We sat up there for approximately 20-30 minutes, no server came up those stairs during that time.  There was one group of about 8 people at another table (they had drinks, but I am sure they got them at the bar before they went up).  The place had great reviews and it seemed to be a good atmosphere, but those stairs and the "out of sight, out of mind" mentality will leave you a little frustrated.   Again, I have no complaints about the food (since we never were able to try any) it's about being in a part of the restaurant that is not easily accessible by the waiting staff.

a4fVavERqVEZ4qmepMgWOg.text: Fun place just off the strip. Fun atmosphere and solid food. Quesso cheese dip was good and the margaritas were delicious.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

LDbJmJoir3BPR5K0geNdeQ.text: Queso is killer. Recommend getting the chips and salsa with queso. Shrimp tacos, fish tacos and seafood enchiladas all fantastic. White peach margaritas were good too. Fun atmosphere and quick service.  It's a bit tricky to find as it's around the corner on a side street by Planet Hollywood, but would recommend.

6h31iKLb2SrQfoT9k59jhQ.text: Booker is such an awesome guy. Will be coming back to see him soon!!!!! He made our experience one to remember.

amnlNzsfBKCADefRAZkpLQ.text: Yum. Yum. Yum.   I came hungry, had a house marg and the Nacho Average Burger nachos. So good. Come during happy hour, great value all-around.  I didn't change anything on my order: crisp lettuce, loads of toppings, cheese was yummy, and beef was perfectly seasoned. Bacon bits were a bit lacking, I only realized they were there on the bottom when I found one or two and had already eaten all my chips..  If I was gonna be nit-picky: 1) Would love to see red onion slightly less and bacon bits slightly more. Word to the wise: If you're on the fence about onion, maybe ask to hold... there's a lot.  2) As a solo diner, the contents of the plate were cold by the time I finished. That may be just me being a slow diner, if shared obviously not an issue. What if there was some sort of flame underneath like an asian style solo hotpot? Or a hotter steel plate? JK. It's probably not an issue for anyone else.  Everything else people ordered looked delicious. No wait, sat right at the bar. Food and drinks came quick. Service was friendly. Would highly recommend if you're in the area and looking for a good-value dinner, Very, very tasty.

4K0dgTQh1YQeYMiUdIuk-g.text: My fiance and I were in Vegas last weekend and he had heard about the Scorpion Tequilla shot and wanted to try it. We stopped by around 8PM, and it was pretty busy, but we were able to find seats at the bar. We didn't order food, but I ordered a white peach margarita which was super delicious, and a pineapple mint margarita which sounded better than it tasted, lol. We also got a beer flight which was awesome. My fiance finally took his scorpion shot (so gross, but cool), then we headed out. The bartenders were very personable and made us laugh, which was refreshing after having some not so pleasant bartender encounters the entire day! Only suggestion would be to have some more upbeat music, they were playing some sad songs which didn't seem like it fit the environment.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpion shot!

lYWuB9qQYvA3Rc3inLFVAw.text: Omg this place is truly amazing . The food is just super delicious and I'm already dreaming of going back to Vegas and getting their enchiladas .

EA86ScNffXYuKucZGsuvOg.text: Definitely enjoyed the lobster nachos at this place. The drinks were not watered down. We chose this spot because our hotel room was not ready. So glad we did and I'm sure we will visit again when we are in Las Vegas. The crowd was light in the early afternoon. A cool thing to check out is the scorpions' terrarium. At the time we visited the female was pregnant. Not too often do you see this type of creature in a restaurant but I thought it was a cool touch being that they have a scorpion feature drink I believe, on the menu.

oZn_T1BBBfALoi7gIYkABQ.text: Best nachos I've ever had, no cap! The filet mignon was so tender and the shrimp nice and juicy. Not to mention that the peppers were very fresh and full of flavor.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The fajita style filet mignon nachos with added shrimp!!!

WlFyz8RisIWwjhoMbpsvQQ.text: Love. Love. Love. I have no complaints about this place. It was a fun place to go and hang out with friends.

eFKene3oNAxKPA6wDsppAw.text: Oh man do I love nachos. Out of all the choices in LV to dine, I still chose to eat here twice in 3 days. I had the BBQ pulled pork option the first time and it was nothing short of amazing. Fresh, hot and crisp, with cool sour cream and guacamole. Yum!!!! If you like tex-mex style food, you will not be disappointed.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bbq pork nachos I think? This was our second day in LV and I had been drinking for 24 hours with no sleep

9oOTOxj8YHn_3FQciPhhyQ.text: So let me just start out by saying how awesome the service is here!!  We had an amazing waitress and the chefs did a special for us and made the nachos with flour tortillas instead of corn, so we were very happy with that!!!  We got the chicken nachos and they were just so dry and the regrows beans were runny...  I'm so sad because this place had awesome reviews and I was hoping for awesome food.  Also if your going to get margaritas makes sure you order them individually instead of the pitcher it is a way better deal because they fill the pitcher to the brim with ice not leaving much room at all for drinks.  But the margaritas are so good, we had the daddy's margarita and loved it!!!

gUGzGPdTdF8Ov5n2YhkeoA.text: Warmest Nachos I've ever had.  Coulda been zapped in the microwave or something before arriving at our table, but they were tasty. We (2 stocky men) shared just 1 order... wanted to save room for dinner. I was still hungry after, but I eventually survived.  The birds inside the restaurant were pretty cute, but I didn't save them any leftovers. Daddy was hungry.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme with tiny chopped up jalapeños- spicy and yummy and warm?  Heat them better next time, please-- K bye.

OWqA5g2PKMXULuo0ur6peA.text: Literally sooo bomb! I ordered their Thai chili chicken nacho and fell in love with it. It was filled with queso, and topped with stir fried bean sprouts and carrots and chicken and drizzled with wil sweet chili sauce! If you'd like to try something different this is the place!

BRqps1gMCzVWjeHjwj6jow.text: It was OK.  The Nachos are average at best and when the business has "Nacho" in the name it had better be the best efing nachos you have ever had.... far from it.  You can get better nachos at any decent taco shop. The cheese was like the stuff you get at the fair, running and out of a can.  Beer selection was limited as well, they only had one IPA on tap and it was from one of the big brewers.  They should always have local flavor.  Any ways... I imagine HH is good, but I'd try something other than the nachos.

TWHCNXTibMOvNmCXQFDfrQ.text: We stopped here for lunch today and I was very surprised by how good and affordable this place is since it's on the strip. I had the chicken fajitas and the one person portion is big enough for you . Fresh veggies and lots of chicken . Mg partner had the cheese enchiladas and he really enjoyed it. Our server Huck was personable and attentive . The establishment was kept nice abc clean. We will visit again.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

6nsMA7vL-4e9SWguCm0Kfw.text: I went out of my way to go to this place with a busted ankle and it was worth it. Service was amazing (I forget my bartenders name but a pretty brunette). I was really lost and because I checked Yelp I got a free margarita. I'm a server and would never normally do so, but it was 106 degrees outside and I found this out trying to get my ass there lol. I'm a bartender as well and this was a well made Margarita. I would have drank anything at this point, but it's like a $11 drink. Good service.   For the management though...Those trays are CRAZY heavy. I had I think the rancheros or chilaquilles and after it cooled I picked up both pieces separately. Both weighed about 5lbs each.   I work at a tourist trap with huge serving trays that destroy my shoulders. I can't even imagine carrying those safely and I've been doing this for 10plus years.   Don't kill your servers like that. Love San Francisco s Fisherman Wharf. Not the same, but each piece was insanely heavy. Take care of your staff. Your food is great

wqpShis6NG-40Jb4cR_Wfw.text: My husband and I shared the filet nachos with daddy's margaritas for an afternoon snack. Food and drinks were great!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet nachos and daddy&#39;s margarita

eTCDuveO-qWkL10zbGQgMQ.text: Second time I've eaten here and just as amazing!   Started with a comp margarita from a check in and then ordered the special chimichurri nachos.  They came out speedy and were enough for two!   Loaded with cheese, white queso, cherry tomatoes, cotija cheese, onions, jalapenos, marinated steak and the delish chimichurri sauce.  Wait staff was super friendly.   Even though there was some unusual Vegas rain, the huge umbrella was enough to cover my table and food outside on their sidewalk patio.  Located on the south end outside of the miracle mile shops.   Great menu that covers anything you could want!  Love the random videos they have playing in multiple screens.  Beautiful concrete bar.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

1UusoY08K3FPoAQkDDBGnA.text: Everything about this place made me want to give them 5 stars. The service was great, the food came out incredibly fast, and it tasted sooo good.  I got the fiesta nachos and my husband got the cali burrito. He gets the Cali burrito every place he goes, and this one was the best one. They put garlic fries instead of regular, and it changed the whole dynamic. If you get the nachos, I would share with someone. It's honestly a mountain of nachos and i had to take more than half back as leftovers.  The only thing that made the experience less than perfect was hearing a waiter go "can someone take this to table **" and another waiter responded with "that's not my table, i don't give a f***". So i would just be careful what is said when tables are right next to the kitchen. Other than that, i would suggest this place to anyone an a heartbeat.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

qzyHjCAW3xSMueclss4i4Q.text: Avocado taco's were really good, but should be served with a different rice, it had with a wild rice, didn't care for it.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

3g666WAN4lj8H07rUvSghQ.text: Awesome place. The whole family loved it. My youngest son said they they had the best wings ever. :)

UYN8SRwGz2nx-DOof__y7g.text: Our group walked in with some Fat Tuesdays and beer in hand, Nacho Daddy does not allow outside drinks so they offered to take our items and keep them in the freezer until we're ready to leave! That was pretty convenient and kept our drinks nice and cold. Our waitress was also friendly and the service was good.  Free margarita with Yelp check-in! It was almost too sweet for my liking.. but hey, it was free and you cant beat that.  To start, my boyfriend and I shared the ceviche. It was a mixture of shrimp, tomatoes, onions, cucumber, cilantro, chilies, and avocado. It had the perfect amount of citrus and tasted really fresh! Just the right amount of spice too. I liked the larger chunks too, some ceviches have the ingredients cut into really small pieces.  I wish we knew how large the nachos were before ordering them.. they were definitely way bigger than anticipated and too much for just two people. We shared the Fiesta Nachos which had chicken breast, salsa, sauteed onions, refried beans, different cheeses, pico de gallo, guacamole & sour cream. They were delicious! I wish we could have eaten more but I was stuffed (also didn't want to take the leftovers to-go, soggy nachos are no good).  I will definitely return with a bigger appetite!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ceviche
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ceviche and chips

LpHTz4maew0Jx2UmV25bWg.text: First place to eat coming to Vegas. I love Mexican/Tex-Mex style food. I like seafood, so I opted for the Lobster & Crab Nachos. I love spicy but my friend doesn't, so I had the condiments on the side. The server was cool and warned me that it may be dry. It was ok bc they gave us a lot of the condiments on the side. It came with jalapenos, sriracha, spicy aoli, and mango salsa. I wish there was more of lobster and crab. Nachos were ok. Lots of melted cheese, but the chips were cold. I still tried to eat it all bc it's $23! I love spicy, so I took advantage of topping everything with the condiments.   My friends got seafood chimichangas and steak fajitas. Everyone's looked good and tasted good.   Tip: Check-In for free margarita! It's actually really good! You get a free bday cake for your bday! Try the scorpion shots! When we went, they were out!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

uYDFvRNOdcXYwdn08rtG1A.text: GREAT service, GREAT food & even the staff is amazing :') will stop by next time i'm in LV (-:

_ayilYbF2ElbY3ABoI33sw.text: I placed an order through Yelp, which got lost in translation with the restaurant, who in turn prepared my ONLINE order for "here" instead of to go. I get to the restaurant at the time I was told to be there, and my order is nowhere in sight. I placed the order at 8:50pm on a Thursday, and it was finally ready for me to take at 10:04pm. I ordered the BBQ Nachos without cilantro, and this is what I got. No black bean corn salsa as stated, and not a crunchy nacho left. (I work five minutes away, and this was just a mess.) I wasted an entire lunch break and a half waiting for this disaster.   My advice: Set your expectations really low, or take your money and spend it elsewhere.   The two stars are for the hostess, who was at least apologetic and polite.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I waited over an hour for this mess, and it wasn&#39;t even the correct order.

AG31DfB9rLq7M6Om5Wg3VQ.text: They have a whole vegan menu with more than 2 options, it's fantastic!!!  I try to stop here every time I'm in Vegas.  I love the atmosphere of being in a busy area and the service has always been fantastic. The girls behind the bar are adorable and attentive. Drinks are always full and I never go thirsty!  Food is delicious and comes out pretty quickly. They have an extensive vegan menu ranging from their famous nachos to burritos and tacos salads. They use Daiya cheese and Gardien products.   The queso dip is not bad, they are the only place in Vegas serving a vegan queso dip so I can't complain.  However it could use a bit for nacho seasoning, or spice. Like if the chilis and jalapenos were blended into the cheese.   The vegan chicken tacos are my favorite by far followed by the vegan nachos.  The vegan fajitas are pretty flavorful and the taco salad is pretty large.  Can't wait to try some of the other items!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Loaded Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan queso dip
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Chick&#39;n Tacos (2) with black bean roasted corn salsa

31UXL83h2JVdi8NAcDuJyQ.text: Walked into nacho daddy not knowing what to expect of the food and was below average.  The enchilada nachos did not hit the spot, but the staff and scorpion shot brought the score back to a 3.

Rrr3oTBMqAQXgCt8OfIBTw.text: Nacho Daddy exceeded my expectations! Great service bomb food and bomb drinks. I would definitely recommend trying them out. Free bomb margarita for just checking in

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Gil et Mignon Nacho*

1n2xjkhXJhQlZWe5LkzKrQ.text: Amazing food and ambiance, a must-do if you're downtown visiting Fremont St. I goto Vegas several times a year and Nacho Daddy is always a crowd favorite.

0qCcJSkwsTgyFe89Pr9rUw.text: The food and drinks are 5 STARS. The service I would rate maybe a 2. When we arrived it felt like we were inconveniencing the server. She wanted absolutely nothing to do with us. It was pretty bad.   We arrived before happy hour and were maybe looking at ordering another round of drinks. The server didn't come back to see if we wanted another round or more food. We had to ask to see the happy hour menu because we overheard it from another table. We just ended up leaving because I don't enjoy chasing down servers, especially when I used to be one.  The PROS - we weren't super hungry and were looking for a small bite to eat before dinner with some drinks. We ordered the seasonal nachos which were delicious!!! It had shredded chicken, artichokes and lots of cheese on it. We added jalapenos to spice things up a bit, well worth it.   The CONS - Our server! Lack of care, attention to detail, personality.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

jFrAdi-V4kBekr7V7sbSqw.text: This place would put every single "El Torito" out of business within a week. A beast of restaurant! No other place on earth comes close to the quality of nacho's Nacho Daddy delivers.   Ordered the BBQ Chicken Nachos, how is the sauce and cheese that superior to anything else I have eaten in my life? My god nearly ordered a plate to go if I hadn't shoveled a plate for two all by myself. My partner order the fajitas, holy cow, best fajitas on earth. Hot, spicy, juicy, flavorful, and had an aroma that entices senses for days.   Wish we had a Nacho Daddy in Orange County, it would put every single Mexican food chain to shame and truthfully out of business. I would recommend shorten the menu extremely, deliver on those items, and then go national. That way the quality cannot deteriorate. Right now Orange County restaurant Mexican food is dominated by the likes of Don Jose and El Torito, both cannot and will never come close to delivering the quality I had at Nacho Daddy. I feel I should sue both Mexican chains for serving such garbage after eating here.   Make an easy choice, come here for great food, excellent service, and Mexican food that blows away the competition by miles.

hYFPDpxQ7-QHn43OVlqhIA.text: We had 17 people with us for dinner.  We had a reservation and everything was set for us when we arrived. The servers were great. I need gluten and dairy free food and the servers were really helpful. Everyone loved their food. There was a lot of food. We could have shared many of the dishes. It was an enjoyable evening.

jqQp9uiN5QNytbEN_coTVQ.text: The nachos keep me coming back! Love the golden knights and buffalo nachos. Service is awesome especially John. He helped us with everything we needed and hooked my buddy up with extra chocolate sauce. Thanks.

XxXxno0nJb6uYLvHlOnk8g.text: This is tex-mex not really mexican food, very very americanized, tasted like everything came out of a can, i cant believe they have such high rating

urKoNnTAP_MRmp5-M-ToWg.text: (No pictures...food was too good) Came here around 11 pm after the SuperBowl... really nice. No wait. Food was delicious... I had the Cali Burrito... and to say the least it was GREAT!!! The Margaritas are okay... My only problem was the fan!!! It was really cold and despite my numerous request to turn the fan off, it NEVER happened. End result.. cold fries but they were good for the short period they were still hot. Also...  did a Yelp check-in and got a FREE house margarita!!! Whooo hoooo... can't say NO to that!!!

XKClHvSFlSnR8Gw8i4jjXg.text: I continue to enjoy eating here. The restaurant is clean and the kitchen area looks clean, too. The American Tacos are my all time favorite and I always get such good service here!

R5sJWlN8JZvXyURpxUszWg.text: This was my 2nd visit to Nacho Daddy and as usual the service was prompt, friendly and knowledgeable. We got the sloppy Joe nachos this time. They were tasty but due to the wetness of the sloppy Joe meat the chips get soft. We had the supreme nachos the first time and I'd think I'd stick with them again. The guac was creamy and tasty and fresh. The naked grilled wings are really tasty. They don't need the buffalo sauce that comes with them. They are good just the way they come to the table. Be sure to check in on Yelp and get your free margarita. Free and tasty makes it a bonus!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

yL4VsyRYg_oD_O_NPvpBTA.text: Best vegan nachos!!!!!!  Service was great.... margaritas were wonderful.... a definite must try when you are in Vegas!

T7RudZWEnzHuSxOrfyOUeA.text: My wife and I came in from orange county and googled best Mexican restaurant in downtown Las Vegas came in had an awesome experience with Ariel she was the best  Great customer service and the food was great too Thank you Ariel!!!

Adq-cQ3zRXySUVEJdoXBew.text: I visited this restaurant 3 times on my visit to Vegas.  I had a great experience on my first visit that I wrote them a fantastic review.  On my second visit I wanted to try their breakfast.  I am vegetarian and ordered the vegetarian omelet.  I was very specific with what I wanted and told my waitress, egg whites and no cheese.  Just like on my first visit I got my order with cheese.  This waitress did not say I'm sorry or anything and no smiles either. On my first visit my waitress was very apologetic and even took it out of our bill.  ...On my third visit I brought 2 other friends. Again I ordered breakfast, vegetarian omelet and was also specific, egg whites no cheese.   I again was given cheese on my eggs.  ...So here's my final follow up review, overall the food is great. It is on the greasy side but great food and great atmosphere.  Orders with specific changes however seem to get lost.  I wanted to give you 3 stars but because my first visit was so exceptional that I gave you the extra star.

CP89NVrDZAVsJcRv-hvSTA.text: Fun place and not far off the strip at all! Sierra is the best bartender, fun and personable. DJ watched the bar for a bit, pours the best water!! He knows!! He was so fun to talk with, that's what a bar should be. Food was good, you will be happily stuffed. Go try it, you won't be disappointed!

Mx8zfwnaiwxtDXEltzKm2g.text: Decent mexican food just off the Strip!  So happy this location opened and we ordered take out.  Other than forgetting to include one of the items we ordered (went back to pick it up) it was exactly what we wanted. Plus the name is great - it's fun to hear them answer the phone.

JlpShrN6qR_3nRxjoklI2Q.text: ,Audre is an amazing server and made the visit very enjoyable! I will definitely be coming back here soon because of the food and hospitality! A must go to spot in Las Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

TymWGKLIREdCwpryqh6blw.text: Our server, DJ, was so great! He brought the birthday boy in our group a great shot of tequila, and our food was served really quickly! Great quality--the queso was my favorite part of the meal. The margaritas are amazing, and I especially loved the blackberry one.

SvUbLxhRpG_SaR-onSgWSQ.text: Great place to eat love the nachos.  The manager Jovany was great everyone was very helpful. The food was great can't wait to come back and visit them again.

fEzg5aix74l5fD05s6ZAHQ.text: Never have I ever stepped into a restaurant and felt so alive. Las Vegas has that affect on people, simply just walking the strip is electrifying and come 2:00AM, we realize that our stomachs weren't having as good of a time as we were - they were hollering at us, saying, "we need food, dude!" So, as we took the corner, we noticed there was a Buffalo Wild Wings and a Nacho Daddy. Of course, we've eaten at BWW before but never heard of Nacho Daddy and so we decided to take the dive and try it. We're happy we did.  The second we walked in, we were greeted by a gentleman by the name of Jacob. Jacob was our server and aside from wielding what was the world's greatest mustache, he also had an incredible personality, was welcoming and not for a second did we feel unappreciated. We took advantage of the free house margarita by checking into Yelp and it honestly was one of the best margaritas I've ever had. I've had a lot in my days on Earth and honestly can say Nacho Daddy takes the cake for the best tequila ever. Aside from the margaritas, the nachos were bomb. It was as if God himself cooked our meal for us. Not a dry chip on the plate as advertised. I had the Crab & Lobster nachos which I treated myself to with my winnings from the Bellagio (thank you Mr. Bellagio) and it was incredible. We also tried a chicken sandwich and some other nachos which were also really, really, really, really (x250 really) good. Service, atmosphere, food, it was all a 6 star experience. Yep, you read it here first... 6 stars, not 5. Pricing? It was reasonable considering we were on The Strip so there are no complaints there either!  All in all, it was incredible and it's ashamed we are leaving this afternoon because we would have been back tonight for some more margaritas and nachos. And this is for you Jacob, if you ever read this, you keep on doing what you're doing. You earned every cent of that tip we left for you and there is no doubt in the world you deserve a raise. Never lose your stripes, kid.  Cheers.

-3b6iW2RpbHtqBYuJi7Tbg.text: Awesome nachos, great environment. Got us in fast. The bar is open seating. We watched the Knights beat the Capitals and it was awesome. Great people (working there and customers), and we enjoyed Alex.

RReBvxUou990dB_IxLGwtQ.text: What's more American than Nachos? The filet mignon nachos is one of my favorite guilty pleasures now!  To top off everything, the service from the bartender Bryce was on point. I travel often by myself and always sit at bars to cut down on the introverted characteristics I have. Come on in and have a seat at the bar for some great food, drinks and discussions with Bryce.

JR7gJG4JrMkzDVLVk_0g4g.text: This place is amazing. They have the best vegan nachos I have ever had!!!!! Their deep fried avocado tacos were ok. Nothing special. But go for their tacos. Incredible!!

cBtgSJAFIgz7hCH6Ve_OwA.text: This was our first stop after arriving to Vegas since it was close to our hotel (Planet Hollywood). Arienne was our waitress and she was awesome!! Very attentive and on top of everything, especially when we (as a group of 4) were joined by friends and expanded to a group of 10.  Food was great! Had variety for a Mexican restaurant (Buffalo chicken nachos!) and brought the authentic flavor of Mexican food.  Highly recommend this place!! And if you check in on Yelp- you can get any 1 Margarita for 8.95. ;)

aUkPOMUOaJP0snmMCZYXvQ.text: This place is amazing! The food was delicious and the margaritas were yummy! If you're craving Mexican food this is the place to go off Fremont Street!

EZdwiMk4pAuoqC0fjWRKHw.text: Veggie omelette was great, good mix of sauteed veggies & everything was seasoned well. I really enjoyed the hash browns and my family shared the churro pancake, which everyone loved. Service was good, not great, but we did have a larger party so we have to cut my man some slack. Door is kept open, which is nice, but also lets birds in. All in all the family was happy we found this place. Would go again...oh & prices are very reasonable.

wXsUMANKCt3mz4q_Ms2jHQ.text: Of course being here, we did order nachos and they were perfect. My boyfriend and I got one plate to share because it was definitely a lot of food. This place was really busy when we arrived so we got placed on a waitlist and went to taco bell for a slushee while we waited. When it was our turn to be seated, we returned but I hadn't finished my drink and they wouldn't allow me to take it to my table. Awesome thing was that they were able to save it for me. Now, for the highlight, I got a margarita here since there was some language in the menu saying that it was the best margarita. I have had many and definitely agree with that statement. It's the best one I've EVER had. I still have dreams about trying it again one day. It had the perfect balance of mix and tequila. So perfect in every way! Love this place and can't wait to go back to that margarita...  Oh yeah, I got my slushee back after dinner, but i was wishing it was that margarita in the cup... haha

f7MTFlaOfqWmHN7x5T1dnQ.text: Taylor was a fantastic bartender. Good drinks and checking in to make sure I was good on all levels.   Shrimp tacos are awesome! Grilled with mango salsa?! Yesssss.   Chicken tacos were dry. I had to ask for salsa to zuzzz them up a bit.   Great place to watch a game.   Their happy hour is AWESOME. $5 for a ton of different food options and draft beer, house margs and house wines. Currently from 3-6pm Monday-Friday.   Free marg with yelp check in. Get on it.   It's hard to find. It is NOT in the Miracle Mile Shops. You'll need to go out on the street on Harmon a little bit east of the Strip to find it.

v-9MyvZf4vFFpMpX94feYQ.text: Excellent portions, not cheap but plenty to share. Obviously couldn't come here and not get nachos, I had the chicken. Barely made a dent and they were delicious. Really good service.  Make sure you use your check in offer for the free house margarita. You can upgrade to a larger size or a better tequila if you choose. I didn't. It was pretty tasty.  Recommend.

1zESjTL6_bNUbvILNdN3uw.text: Cali burrito: A Beer battered fish tacos: A Free check in margarita: C- This was an awesome place to chill, grab a bite and relax. My friends and I decided to eat before we caught the show we won.  The atmosphere was low key and inviting, our waiter Vince was funny and very polite.  The food was amazing!!! I don't even eat fish, but I did taste one of these tacos.  OMG... the crisp alone from the batter was phenomenal.  Then the salad garnish that topped it brought out all the rest of the flavors. This Cali burrito was BOMB!!! Stuffed with French fries, steak, guacamole and everything else.  However the margarita was bitter even with the sugar I added to the glass rim.

De_cv_9Z6s6K_LGug7osDQ.text: Omg.... I was headed to Tacos El Gordo when a local told me to go here. Well I was staying at the SLS and this place was attached to Planet Hollywood and the Elara which was more toward the middle of The Strip. Anyway, I took Lyft ride share-- around 10 bucks. And at 1st I was mad at myself about that 10 buck ride, but maaaannnnnnn those enchiladas!!!! I got the lobster and crab enchiladas and they were absolutely delicious! Definitely worth stopping in to eat and I will be back very soon! A little pricey ($18.95), but.... it's The Vegas Strip. This is located on Harmon Ave, the same side as Walgreens..... it's not inside the mall, but actually on the street. Go and enjoy!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster and Crab Enchiladas (small portion for $18.95)

TnHlpBeNdep_PNipF8UQDw.text: You know what?! Nacho Daddy could very well be my daddy... for one night in Vegas (wink wink). But in all seriousness, this place is absolutely SCRUMPTIOUS! Mm mm! Scrum-diddly-umptious! Nom nom nom.   When in Vegas, you must get your eat and drank on amongst other things. Welp, I got my nacho on too. These nachos are LOADED to the max! You better come hungry! One plate of nachos is easily enough to feed 2 and maybe even 3 people. Nacho Daddy is located just steps away from the Strip and poses as the perfect tummy stuffer and alcohol complement (or hangover remedy if you need it).   After perusing the strip, I found myself getting hangry. It was late and Nacho Daddy was still open for business. Their bright entry sign will ensure that their building isn't missed. Ended up sitting at the bar and got distracted by their bright TV screens. They play a mix of old music videos ranging from the 80's to the early 2000's. The interior is very open and the bar setup is easy on the eyes. Litzs attended to me that night and while she was very sweet, it seemed like she and the other bartender were preoccupied doing other things. It didn't seem that busy but maybe something else was going on behind the scenes.   Speaking of this, my food took a really long time to come out. Litzs noticed that it was taking a while to come out too and told me that she'd check with the kitchen, but she never let me know of the status. When it finally did arrive, it looked fantastic! I ordered the supreme tostada nachos and boy were they a dream. First of all, how about that GUAC though? Just give me ALL of that green goodness puh-lease. They truly hooked a sista UP with all of that guac. These nachos were stacked incredibly high with the goods. There was no shortage of ground beef, cheese, guac, pico, or sour cream. It was honestly perfect. I don't eat nachos very often, but this ranks up there as some of the best that I've had.   I kept eating until my belly couldn't stretch anymore. And, what a shame because it looked like I had barely touched my plate when in fact I had probably devoured a pound of nachos. Just SO much effing food! Let's not forget about those delicious DRANKS too! One of the best check-in offers that you'll find; a FREE house margarita with the purchase of an entree (gasp)!!! Oh em gee! Their margs are straight FIYAAAH boo thang! The sweetness is just right and they make 'em strooong.   Litzs really knows how to work her magic at the bar for sure. I also indulged in a blood orange margarita which tasted even more delicious than their classic house marg. They've got so many different margarita flavors to choose from. It honestly doesn't matter WHAT flavor you get... just make sure that you get at least one... or two... or five! Okay maybe not five, but you catch my drift. Or... you CAN get five! Bahahaha! JUST try one. You won't be disappointed.  I really enjoyed Nacho Daddy and I'd totes come back for those delicious nachos and margs any day. If you're hittin' the strip and are looking for some yummy comfort food and tasty drinks, you need to try Nacho Daddy.

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Why yes... yes I do! ;)

wTK_NOQK1qTgZ4qY58fo9A.text: While I really enjoyed the play on words, I felt like my experience was a mini playground. The overall experience was fun but really awkward.   My group came here for lunch time and were hoping to get a place to get seated. Instead, we found out the line was long and the estimated wait would be close to 25 minutes. As a result, we opted to just order to-go since we were planning on attending an event later and wanted to get ready for that. The hostess told us the food would take about 25 minutes which we thought would be perfectly acceptable.   I specifically ordered their Poke Nachos while various members of our group ordered other items. During this time, of one the hostess was kind enough to get water for us. After waiting for about 35 min our orders started to come out. In this time frame, I asked if it was possible to get more water but another hostess told me I needed to go to their bar, which was super busy, to get water. I just politely declined but thought it was kind of lame to be quite honest.  Anyways, that wasn't what caused this low of a review. The main crux of this rating wasn't their food which isn't that good to begin with but their lack of communication. After my group's orders arrived around 35 min, my order was the last one remaining. After another 10 minutes pass I ask the hostess if they could check and found out that the Poke Nachos don't exist anymore. At that point, I wasn't even sure if being frustrated was the right emotion. I think I just found it hilarious. If it wasn't for the fact this same hostess who got us water also fought for us to get a replacement order expedited and a free margarita I would highly never recommend this place.   That said, I was able to get a replacement order made within the next 20 min and their daddy(?) margarita as compensation. I wasn't charged more so that worked out but if you're coming here just beware it's a little disorganized.  If you're talking about food, I would also just be cautious. I personally found the food to be quite bland. The most interesting thing about my replacement dish, surf and turf tacos were that the tacos were made of a flakey pancake similar to scallion pancakes. The tacos weren't that impressive, too much filling with vegetables and the meat wasn't well seasoned (needed more salt). Additionally, my friends also complained that their dishes were a bit bland.   TL;DR service was mediocre and they forgot a menu item didn't exist after 45 mins. Food is okay at best with it lacking in seasoning.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Surf &amp; Turf Taco Combo

mmBH_KPrTSnKCd_d-4vhRg.text: We were there for brunch and my hubby got the steak omelet and our server recommended the veggie omelet over the chicken and kale due to the omelet had potatoes! bLB6phRhDVrWWrgQevVP9g.text: Took a $20 Uber starving and met up w my friend for dinner. Sat at the bar and got to check into Yelp for 1 Free house margarita ($8.95). _IZkbXjOCYt2SgF5H3gghA.text: Definitely worth the hype! Don't forget to check into Yelp for a free house margarita (with purchase of an entree).   Don't skip on the Queso Dip! Group favorite of the night. It's white queso with the jalapeno and pico de gallo and DIVINE.   For entrees, I tried the Tortilla Soup and Cali Burrito. Huge portion sizes and both were delicious. If you're unsure what to get, I highly recommend the Cali Burrito, the garlic cotija fries inside were great. Tortilla Soup is a good choice too if you're not too hungry but looking to have a lil something.  Our waiter was awesome and very patient with us. If there's no wait, definitely try Nacho Daddy.

sgp6Md1sNell9QtvHWyNBw.text: Ok, let's get straight to the point... Nacho Daddy may possibly be the best restaurant in Vegas! The plethora of vegan options made my little vegetarian heart sing! It was very convenient, we walked from the hotel! Also a nice surprise when I checked in, I got a free margarita!! How awesome! Manny, our server was absolutely amazing! So accommodating and had an amazing attitude! We got mimosas, margaritas and vegan chickn chimichangas! And I can not explain how delicious this was other than we both finished the entire thing! And it's not a small entree! The vegan sour cream was delectable! The food was so good we actually planned on coming back to try their brunch with bottomless mimosas before we even left our dinner! Due to some late night activities in Vegas, we ended up missing out on brunch but we couldn't get Nacho Daddy off our minds! We came back a second time and got the same thing!! So delicious!! Thank you again to Manny for the wonderful service as well! He was amazing and made this experience even better than we could have hoped for!

jl2PSIN7qWS3FAOxB7yszQ.text: Nacho Daddy is a Nacho heaven for all types of nacho lovers! I was too hype after learning they have vegan nacho cheese, that was BOMB!! I had the seafood nachos with vegan nacho cheese & 2 margs. In True Vegas fashion, the portion size was huge, and my greedy self ate every morsel. I loved the flavor combo, everything was really fresh as well. I also appreciated the seasoning on the chips too, I hate a dry chip, Lawd.   We only waited for about 5 minutes on a busy night and our waiter was efficient, and friendly. There are so many different types of nachos, I'm sure you'll find something you like, you won't be disappointed!   Don't forget to checkin and get your free house marg!!!

v9_2pH6lzaR50UOxMOZ-DQ.text: Although it may have taken me a while to finally come here, you better believe I've had my eye on Nacho Daddy for quite some time. I mean, how could anyone not be intrigued? Between their name, how there's nothing else like them on The Strip, and all of the delicious looking photos of their nachos on Yelp, it was really just a matter of time before I'd make my way here. That and the proper group of friends (and playoff games to watch) to crush some nachos with! Since they aren't technically on The Strip (they're around the corner from Planet Hollywood and the Miracle Mile on East Harmon), Nacho Daddy can be easy to miss if you aren't looking for it or see their signage. While cut from the same cloth as Nachoria in the Bay Area (pretty cool to see that they've expanded to Vegas!), the menu here actually has more to offer both in the way of nachos and overall size - over a dozen varieties of nachos, along with an array of apps, enchiladas, fajitas, burritos, tacos, soups, and salads, as well as a solid selection of beers and cocktails. -- FILET MIGNON NACHOS - Grilled Filet Mignon, Refried Beans, Cheddar & Jack Cheese, Ranchero Sauce, Sour Cream, Pico de Gallo, Guacamole, and (no) Cilantro on Housemade Corn Chips...$19.95 (yelp.com/biz_photos/nach...) Quite simply, when I think of a plate of nachos, it usually looks something like this (except bigger...). The filet mignon was flavorful and meaty, the chips were crispy, and the ranchero sauce was great, complemented well by the pico de gallo, sour cream, and guacamole -- BBQ PORK NACHOS - Tender Pulled Pork, Housemade BBQ Sauce, White Queso Topped with Fried Onion Strings, and (no) Cilantro on Housemade Corn Chips...$13.95 (yelp.com/biz_photos/nach...) This may not have looked as impressive by comparison, but this tasted almost just as good. Not only was there a fair amount of pork, but I loved the addition of the onion strings. There could've been a bit more cheese (soe of the outer chips were naked), but this was pretty good otherwise. -- BONELESS WINGS - Pound of Crispy, Buttermilk Marinated Boneless Chicken Breast, Tossed with BBQ Sauce and served with Ranch Dressing...$11.95 (yelp.com/biz_photos/nach...) In hindsight, we probably should've just got their regular wings, but these weren't bad by any means. While the batter was a little thick, all of the pieces were big, meaty and, most importantly, weren't drowning in BBQ sauce, which had a nice smokiness to it. As good as the food was, I was even more impressed with the service here. The hosts and wait staff were great, but our server, Sarah, was fantastic - she came by often, she was very responsive, and she was super friendly. What's more, despite how we tied up one of her table for a few hours as we killed time before heading to the airport, she never gave us the stink eye or tried to kick us out (we made sure to get her back on the tip). Considering how solid both the food and service was, I can't say I really have much to complain about. That being said, I do have one major regret though - I wish I had remembered to check-in on Yelp before we left. Sucks to know that I could have got myself a free house margarita if I had. Fail on my part, but all the more reason to go back!

I thought they would have a few vegan options but they have an entire page on the menu of vegan dishes. I tried the vegan enchiladas and I honestly could've had seconds. It was SO DELICIOUS    We ate at the bar and Mariah was such a great server. Very friendly and attentive but not overly attentive. She gave us some nice spots in Fremont to visit. Peter, the manager, wanted to know how the vegan enchiladas were and I assured him they were phenomenal!   My friend had chicken fajitas and she loved them. She said the chicken was extremely tender and so flavorful.   AND they are reasonably priced. A must eat at restaurant when you visit Vegas.

6Fm5gpeQBW5nwTZPOdCPAg.text: There were so many great reviews about this place, plus you get a complementary margarita with check in on Yelp (with the purchase of an entree) so I knew I had to give this place a try and I'm so glad I did! The atmosphere of the restaurant is so relaxing, and the staff is friendly.  The menu has so many different options, so if you're not wanting nachos, you're in luck! They have tacos, burritos, enchiladas, you name it. I decided to go with the 3 enchiladas. It came with ground beef, chicken, and pork so it was nice to try a taste of each!  The rice and beans that came with the enchiladas was so tasty. That rice had amazing flavor, it was so good! We ended up getting our margarita to go since we were so full, plus it was a nice refreshing drink to have in the Vegas heat. Give this place a try!
