ItL23OPPnqg-M25tuO4eSw.text: Amazing!!! Stumbled upon this place last night while on a mini vacation here in Vegas. Seated fairly quickly on a Friday night and our server was awesome. I believe he said his name was DJ. Super fun with great energy and very attentive. They have a humongous TV that plays music videos, which made the experience even better.   The food was great. A little pricey for nachos, but 1. It's Vegas & 2. The portion size was very large - it fed my boyfriend and I and we took the left overs in a box to go. A worker asked US if we would like an extra side of fresh guacamole and didn't charge for it. I thought that was pretty awesome. Over all amazing experience, great service, delicious food. Will definitely be returning next time were in Vegas!!

PmOsiuNWfltDc0BGn1j-ig.text: They claim there are no dry chips in their nachos which was True for all of the nacho orders at our table of 9 people. Very good nachos and family friendly environment. My wife and i shared a plate and we felt there was enough for both of us.   The pitcher of house margarita was a bit weak and unremarkable (besides being overly sweet)... but in all fairness i did just say "house margarita" which is usually synonymous with weak and unremarkable in most places, so there that is.   Fun place, the staff was friendly and service was timely. The kids and adults all enjoyed the food, service and environment.

W-kVyrh7HRFjoocNaL2kgA.text: It is alright. It might be just I am not big fan of Nacho. Make sure you check-in and get your house margarita for free. There is parking structure near that you can park your car for free.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Wmyaw2LpmsuiwGBpDf4CTA.text: I'm a big nacho fan so this place of course had appeal to me! I had the queso with ground beef for an appetizer and then the seafood nachos. Both were excellent (though the portions are big so it's too much food for two people to get an appetizer and each a plate of nachos). I recommend sharing if you can agree on what to get! The seafood nachos were just the right amount of sweet and spicy

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Seafood Nachos

fobPpN4E_SjqwyoN1d02Aw.text: This place is AWESOME!  If you are a vegan or vegetarian, please stop here and give this place a try.  pro tip! check in on yelp and get a free margarita.  The portion size was generous and the Vegetarian nachos were AWESOME!!! This place completely and totally lived up to the hype.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Check in and get yourself a free margarita

aqNGIbl2bXOh8NayWR_tlA.text: We had a reservation at 9:15, and showed up 20 min early and were still seated before 9:15. We both got the free house margaritas with the yelp check in and they were delicious and you could definitely taste the tequila. We got the supreme tostado nachos and it was enough to share between two people. These were hands down the best nachos Ive ever had. There was not a dry chip, and the beef tasted amazing. I highly suggest coming here for dinner when you're in Vegas, its one of the cheaper restaurants but the quality is up there with the most expensive.

mQ-m29S8GB7CyPHomQvosA.text: Stopped by this place our first night in Vegas and couldn't be more happy how the food turned out. My Husband and I are vegetarian and they have an intense amount of vegan options that were to die for.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Chicken Chimichanga Vegan had my mouth watering

svUWrkLHvtTQarVB7mhuew.text: GO HERE FOR YOUR HANGOVER CURE. I came here with 3 other friends on a saturday morning. We got fajita with shrimp and chicken, pork chimichanga, and Filet Mignon Nachos. They were all great, the fajita veggies were soooo well seasoned I was so surprised, the shrimps and chicken were alright. The chimichanga was my least favorite of the three, it was pretty heavy with too much carbs and the pork was not super seasoned - it was too much of a mush. The Filet Mignon Nachos, however, was amazing!!! highly recommend it. The meat was well seasoned with crunch from nachos and creaminess from cheese and extra toppings from the tomatoes and guacamole. I did not like the beans in it though, but that's my fault for forgetting to ask for it off.  Overall Taste 4/5 Service 4/5 great service, our waiter and host were so nice and fast Parking 3/5 hotel parking Price 4/5 typical Vegas price

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

q1sYO4uqbn_YWyQ6jESrfQ.text: Great GF nachos and pitchers of margaritas (or beer for the gluten loving friends). Had something for the vegetarians, the GF and was kid friendly! Super nice wait staff. Worth the trip for sure! Then ride SlotZilla to really cap off the night.

HzyLC3v6G5291myfROoTXQ.text: Awesome food!! It was fresh, and cooked and seasoned well! The margarita was really good, I got raspberry which was not too sweet. The shrimp was good and so were the side items.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

BB3Exf7txK0pUrV8g_X_Dg.text: Had the pitchers of margarita and the filet mignon nachos  Notthing was over the top fabulous but it was decent and fed three of us for about sixty bucks total  Watched the sharks hockey game on all their TVs   We came here after seeing MJ Live at the stratosphere and that was fantastic  We could walk to,our hotel on a gorgeous balmy warm night at 10 pm

7MkdGzpoF9eBy0udjB4MJg.text: Second meal in Vegas! We saw an episode of Mystery Diners and thought the food looked yummy! Couldn't wait to try their nachos and some of the other offerings.   The host was on break when we came in....3 of the four servers on the floor looked at us and just went about their duties. I was mildly pissed off and about to leave. The hostess finally came down and I made sure she didn't seat us with any of them. Our resultant server, Ryan, was a sweetie pie!  We've been sitting for about 25 minutes drinking water. Our appetizers have yet to come out despite the fact that it's barely half full. I ordered the Sloppy Joe nachos and my daughter ordered the fiesta nachos. They were awesome!  I asked for a few red onions...so not disappointed! My daughter also loved hers.   Today is Taco Tuesday...we got two pork and one beef. Thank God they are only $5....they were horrendous (blech). HUGE benefit? Check in on Yelp for a free margarita!   So the manager just came by and offered to comp part of our meal and give my daughter a free dessert for her birthday! We got the apple pie nachos! OMG!! Soooo delicious. The nachos are soft and flavorful. Sweet and savory. The apples are fried to perfection and the whipped cream Is fresh so yum!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Apple pie sundae!!!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta tacos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sloppy Joe nachos

8pDS3Sm2LlWj9SHnju_6Bw.text: Great for late night munchies! We ordered the filet mignon nachos and shrimp tacos. Everything was delicious! The shrimps were cooked perfectly and the nachos portion was huge! I would definitely come back when I'm in Vegas again to try the other nacho options.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shrimp Tacos &amp; Filet Mignon Nachos

IB4NTHtC4onHqk7xojaFzQ.text: Bomb! This place is great. Food taste great everything if done well and the service is impeccable. Ya for great restaurants that know how to do it right!

dJtf8hWn6K8xwWLyn4fveA.text: Good food, great wait staff. Nachos were very good. Come hungry as the portions were large. Sat at the bar, and watched the ladies do a very cheorgrahed dance as they worked the bar. It was very organized and funny chaos as they kept serving.

DiiJ7jPLtXYkle1M5uyOGw.text: The food was incredible! The ingredients tasted fresh, and the chips were definitely homemade. Great prices and fast service!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Napkin with logo
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Empty plate
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Dining area. Supreme Tostada Nachos.

MpBVBkVdZMzW7aS0DrEw6A.text: Second time here. My plate was very good but I was embarrassed that I took my boss here raving about it and they completely messed up his order, then told him they already had onions and peppers pre cut up for the fajitas and refuse to cut the peppers without the onions. Then they took awhile to bring out the burrito he ordered instead.

lOno_BgkIOjJOJqUijd-6Q.text: Omg this place is delicious ! We got the spicy shrimp nachos and the filet mignon nachos! Best decision ever. Our service was great too! The margaritas were all perfect. I wish they had this restaurant on the east coast !

0QY3unbafzpxHWV6uMRLoA.text: We ate here on Saturday afternoon for the first time.  We had an awesome server named Matt who made the experience a fantastic one!  Matt was extremely personable and did a great job checking back on us and keeping our drinks refilled!   We ordered the Chicken Fiesta nachos.  It was loaded with shredded chicken - and I mean loaded!!  We substituted hot salsa for the medium and it was very good - had a good kick and nice flavoring.  All toppings were generous.    A definite return to spot and we will for sure ask for a table on Matt's section!

0bJltxkq79Gq1vZVGyrZoA.text: OMG THE FOOD WAS TERRIBLE. No taste, it was super bland. On top of that it took forever to order even though they weren't that packed.   We kept having to track down our server and having breakfast here took way longer than it should have. I would not recommend this place for breakfast.

6PM7Onj_zBRluojzIcdgPg.text: It is a good place to grab a frozen or on the rocks Margarita. I also liked their tacos and nachos. I enjoyed happy hour from 3 pm to 6 pm I just wished they had a late night happy hour. Overall everything was swell.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

vQAmSWrGN4o5m9dt3IcH-Q.text: This was is no joke! Beware of food coma and a good night! The portions were huge and its something I'd recommend sharing. No matter which nachos you order, you can't go wrong! They are flexible and let us 'customize' our nacho (yellow queso instead of shredded cheese). Its definitely a heart attack waiting to happen. The chips were on the thin side which made them flimsy with all the filling. The meat was cooked to perfection and our server had a great sense of humor!

WnABtmEeRFl-NGd_5FrS1w.text: great food and fun just off Fremont Street. Man up for some tequila shots and don't muss the thai chicken nachos.

VFOUeOCx2km8E8pp74Szog.text: Definitely my favorite place to eat nachos in town.  So bummed the Henderson location is gone, as I don't get downtown as much.  Terrific Nachos and good food overall.  Good selection of cocktails, always good service and kids eat free on Mondays!!  One of the best places in town---I bring out of town guests and they rave about it...

rpoGiXwQyWlE4lysj5zGbA.text: Bomb!! Get the cajun nachos, you will not be disappointed, very flavorful, huge serving, nice staff, cool atmosphere, ill be visiting everytime I go to Vegas

rVzhoUwsxouH5aq-nvalog.text: We only waited about 5 mins to be sat.  With the check-in on YELP they were offering a free "house margarita" which was pretty tasty!  As an appetizer we had the queso dip which was surprisingly delicious!  Super cheesy with pico de gallo and jalapenos.  They keep it warm with a flame underneath, nice lil touch!We ordered the mignon nachos which were just ok, wasn't quality meat to say they were filet mignon and a bit overpriced!  Its kinda off the strip so it's not crazy busy.  I'll give it another try on my next visit to Vegas!

PkhU0oLKvPm0AQwoub9xsQ.text: Literally the BEST Mexican food ever!!! Thank you SO much for having vegan options on the menu! Came here on my birthday and was absolutely thrilled, and our server was great! Will 100% be back next time I'm in Vegas!

7PEGyY-HFTqNmG89RkQUnA.text: Probably the best nachos I have had on the strip. The service was amazing and there is a great selection of beer. The food came fast and looked great. The taste was remarkable! Kirsten was very attentive and made great recommendations for first timers.

MW6RK_08ubZLJl114BpqQA.text: We loved the pork tacos and the margarita with pineapple.  Good atmosphere, friendly staff.

UK2XADmNrIAADmmEX-ly8w.text: Yes this restaurant deserves 5 stars as others have attested. Huuuge portions, good quality and IMHO the best salsa that goes on the (enchilada) nachos and fajitas that we had.   In addition the Pacifico beer went down so well with the food smothered with salsa, guac and sour cream.  Also had the huevos rancheros on an earlier visit and would return again for that breakfast.

d0C8EcoYcn_9NdmFIVeDyg.text: Wildly mediocre. The Irish nachos has so much mustard they were inedible, the knife work is aweful. How are you supposed to eat chips with a giant chunk of meat that is 5 inches long? It's nachos for God sake. Either way, I wouldn't recommend you eat here at all. We ordered two Cadillac margaritas and barely had a buzz for $50. On top of that our waiter was MIA our whole meal.  Unless you want to spend $100 and walk away being disappointed.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I like mustard but come on!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nice big piece of grissle.

2Vgv2tnbBN6OkC0RcvlmSA.text: Spicy chicken wings: superb  Supreme nachos: great  Quesadilla: meh Service: There was service?  What happened to our server today? We did not get much follow up after initial contact. We were the ones closest to the entrance by the server station. Family of three. Yep, that was us. At one point, our server was preoccupied with trying to create a cocktail for the table next to us, I guess. Before that, I have no idea why she didn't come by occasionally. After we finished our meal we waited for approx 15 min to just pay. I had to contact another server who was nice enough to cash us out.  Sorry for the review, but we had a bad experience today. I'm retired and very patient, but I do have a liking to a somewhat timely pace. Please look at your customers tables and be able to judge their needs.

LYbZvX1ulA-4SebHuwmIvQ.text: Free margaritas not worth the review, extremely sweet.  Best thing out of it was that they were free with the review. Besides that I can't complain because it was free.      Music here was great and it's a nice atmosphere. Would recommend napkins at the tables.

3ShNODYkDvF7DB1uAWVkpw.text: Love this place excellent vegan menu.. Our waitress was the best.. Solid margaritas and a bunch of great options for kids too.

Tmcteo07byYIjz2ofI0Pcw.text: Worst customer service went there yesterday for dinner took them one hour to bring check no one even asked once for refills for drinks nvr going back to this place

z3QDYe6eJp6FVgcG8HuAig.text: Omg seriously this place is absolutely amazing .. best food phenomenal service .. shout out to Aly & Dom .. you two girls made our day .. thank you for everything .. we will definitely be back & make sure to spread the word !!!Thanks Peter for letting me be your taster !!

EnWtn-kLLOdSGqbkoAj8Lw.text: Food was great. Atmosphere very fun and great service. Cali Burrito and smothered burrito definitely 2 thumbs up!

5ZoffVDByKVAq2HujgSYzA.text: We went here for lunch. Used the Yelp offer and got a free house margarita! We ordered nachos and a burrito. After about 15 minutes, the server passed by and was surprised we hadn't gotten our food yet. He said he would check on it. I think he forgot to put the order in. After about 5 minutes, I noticed nachos and a burrito sitting under the heating lamp. It sat there for another 15 minutes and our server was missing. It seemed like he was really hard-working so I don't blame him for being assigned too many tables. But by the time we got our food, all the chips in the nachos were completely soggy so we had to pick out the chips and eat it with a fork. It was also about 75% chicken, which meat lovers might like, but I didn't because after a few bites all that was left was shredded chicken and soggy chips.   As the server gave us our check, he apologized and seemed genuine. But I don't think I'll be back based on the food.

CyJu6_a-jMBRcykQUAPv7A.text: Went here for a birthday gathering with 12 other people. Our server was Ryan and he was so great. I feel like big groups are often annoying for the people involved and particularly the server. He didn't seem bothered by us and was really friendly and positive the whole time.  We all loved our food! I love that they have a special vegan section on the menu. Those loaded nachos are fantastic!!! When you do the scorpion shot, it is really a small scorpion in the shot of tequila. But if you do the shot you get a shirt or shot glass to take home.

_w30y6_x9nuzqaa7kUN1Bg.text: We've been here for the bar but this was our first time eating here. Our server Kirsten was bomb AF! She had great suggestion and knew what she was talking about. If you find yourself here ask for her  :) 10/10 would recommend.

ziVgy-UIId_5HdC6z0aWDg.text: Fun atmosphere! Great food with vegan options.

c_CFCELO_g9tSlm_VGUkGg.text: My first time here. I heard about it from tank the show. I came on vacation and I checked it out. Our server Ryan was wonderful and he made our dining experience awesome.  Our food was delicious and he even helped us make our choices. Great customer service. I would come back here again.

Lqokwyw0yN3792cKSrm68Q.text: Jovanni our server was amazing and funny! He made great recommendation for food! Make sure you ask for him when you come! Everyone was also very welcoming when we first arrived to the restaurant. Nice atmosphere as well.

NtQ3uK-gFJn4xmcFYx3EYg.text: Typical food joint. Decent portion for the price you pay, doesn't taste amazing but not bad either. Got tacos, fajitas, and a burrito.

YHn7U4lY2Vo50Q6CF69l4Q.text: Vince was our server and he was a gem.  We started with guacamole cheese salsa and chips. Yummy. We ordered the Baja seafood enchilada with fish taco. It came with rice and beans. Nice. The margaritas were fine, but one was too sweet and one was too sour, but still good. We also had the fajitas which were flaming at the table. Nice and tasty. The music was a little too rap and loud for us old timers. We could barely finish the large portions. We had a good time and left full and happy.

T-xuVqIelBplbH8lRAW47A.text: This place is so great!! The nachos are to die for and the drinks are to live for!! If your in Vegas don't miss the chance to check this place out and I dare to to take a scorpion shot!! Also Kimberly is the greatest at the bar!!

PkDzMDayN-l2tseB_k0Wag.text: Food was good but the service was terrible. Came around midnight and it wasn't too crazy, plenty of open tables but took at LEAST 10 min before a hostess/staff came over to the front. There were plenty of staff around but just seemed like they were disappearing and took so long to order and get our check. I think the staff needs better training and organization.

qKyau7Ah_Jwi6X347I7Etw.text: I love nacho daddy !! We always made sure to go to downtown Vegas to get our fix, but now it's on the strip !   Hands down the best nacho place I've had. I've had the supreme tostado and hot buffalo nachos which I extremely enjoy!!   If you like margaritas ! You got to try their margaritas !   Thanks to our waitress, Heather, for her great hospitality .   **Update: One star for this experience. The classic nachos still 5 stars though.   This is about my 10th time going to Nachodaddy whether downtown Vegas and now this. I was reached out to by an area supervisor and was told to contact the manager the next time I came in for my review!  I told Ryan our server at the time who seemed chill and cool when we first met her. I mean it didn't know what that meant when I got the email to ask for a manager next time I came in but I did it. Once I told Ryan our server about it she told me the area supervisor got fired and I felt like she didn't want to reach out to a manager... so nothing happened. Also, I feel like she wasn't extremely great after she took our order. She never really came around not even glanced at our table. I mean we'd get what we needed but it lacked the hospitality Vegas is known for. And then when I went into the restroom I realized why she never seemed to be around ... she was on the phone in a stall. I get it life happens we have other priorities but one she wasn't really there and then bam caught the culprit.

ZHj9cVG1dSIaDsud-rfpiw.text: Awesome breakfast spot!  This Mexican restaurant is much more than just their great nachos!  Leave the strip and eat here!  French press coffee, excellent breakfast choices - everything tasted great.  And a fraction of the crazy strip breakfast prices!  We will definitely be back for breakfast, lunch, dinner, drinks, snacks, and NACHOS.  Love the "buenos nachos" t-shirts!

_VQ1ycXHxjSbrc5YfT2BwA.text: Big servings. You can definitely share one order of nachos with another person and have plenty to eat. Good nachos. Margaritas are nice and strong. Recommend sitting at bar and ordering do you don't have to wait.

g4Az28jRBSH4h_E8etSWTQ.text: SO yummy! Stopped here with a group of 5 after walking the Strip all day long- needless to say we were ready for drinks and just about starving. We ordered margaritas and the dip trio to start.. salsa and gauc were both okay but the queso was thebomb.com... (do people still say that!?) Anyway, I ordered the surf and turf tacos (steak and lobster) and they were both awesome. Everyone else at the table enjoyed their meals too- most ordered nachos (obviously!).. I would definitely come back here.. wish there was one closer to home!!

9iNtK7cWFAOTphUjzErpSQ.text: Nacho average burger nachos were AMAZING. Bacon bits ground beef cheese etc The Whole chabang. I'm from Texas and have eaten some good quality nachos but these are worth the trip. And the chimmichanga egg rolls were great. Amazing happy hour menu for cheap food and the margaritas were decent.

FqsKRGOcECxS1Libhl_4Ug.text: I just had the most incredible time at the bar here with Arnold and Booker! I brought my friend mclovin and he was a huge hit with the staff! Such charismatic and caring service, will definently be visiting again! Thanks nacho daddy!!

YEtV9zV3dhZqIvWcjrDHiA.text: VEGAN & GLUTEN FREE REVIEW:  On a Saturday evening, while everybody was dieting to get into that cute dress to see Hardwell, we were doing the complete opposite with the hopes that Hardwell thought we were still cute.   The vegan nachos was my favorite on the menu. The nachos were soy-based, which worked out for my nut-allergies, and I was told that the dish was also gluten free. I saw another server bring out an order of the same, and couldn't believe that the giant sized plate was the same our table had received. Apparently, I had scarfed down the entire thing, and still wanted more.  Our server Dezi was so nice. She made us feel welcomed and was quick to take care of our needs.

7QOdgM89XSP7BLSJczN6xw.text: The food is really good, I just wish it wasn't so expensive.

VKJ3ZqD7B8Z9Q0kkITez0Q.text: Giovanny was our server and he was extremely friendly and tentative! I brought my 4 year old, two year old, and husband and they all loved the food and really enjoyed themselves! This place is a must to try out while you're in Vegas!

f5s5WfOaZ7qSlMj6jSNQvA.text: Great place . The chicken fajitas are delicious . And have a fab presentation . Splurge on the fried ice cream .

Tga_74rIGwg_Tnnc8E3yyg.text: Great food and fun atmosphere! Those scorpion shots are crazy haha.. Definitely recommend this place..

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

BXh7c8E63Whj5XrE3uaRNg.text: We love this place. Great atmosphere and tons of choices. Very good customer service. Jovany the server was the best. He was so helpful and personable. Definitely come here when you're in Vegas.

f5cSQHHI-5ZPoBlGDRZYfg.text: Not too shabby for a quick lunch of enchiladas.  I had the beef enhilada which was perfectly spiced with yummy beans and rice. The free 8oz margarita is just right.  Service is friendly and quick.  It however is not haute cuisine and the ambiance is decidedly hip grunge.  I'd come back with friends.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ZK2voBv6AszaSrASCQtxpg.text: We only had breakfast, and had the same thing (breakfast burrito - which was delicious and very filling), but the experience was good, and would definitely go back. Cool vibe, great margaritas (I liked the house over the specialty my husband got). The breakfast came with chips and salsa, which was really tasty. I think the portions and prices were definitely really good as well!  Give it a try, I don't think you'll be disappointed!

LkG5rpYU2A4cdljZsvB-Ug.text: Staying at the Marriot,i noticed this place called Nacho Daddy. I was intrigued. On my fiancees and I last day we stopped here for lunch. Arieanna our server was friendly right off the bat. Her knowledge of the menu and recommendations were on point. She recommended the supreme tostada nachos. Holy perfect nachos Batman. These were the best nachos ive ever had. The freshness of the ingredients with the perfect balance made this a  masterpiece. Arieanna really knew what she was talking about. Do your self a favor and get down to Nacho Daddy and ask for Arieanna. Thank you so much for the wonderful food and hospitality. Will be back for sure.

ubhoydZIVMJuAyig_Dah0A.text: If you love nachos, then this is your jam! They have so many options that it's dizzying, but once you've selected a dish you won't be disappointed. The drinks could be more inventive, but this is the perfect night spot for drinking buddies who need a snack!

CeO1ey_DWlewxUJ-H9HxfA.text: Jovanny was amazing! We are vegetarian's from Seattle who arrived in Vegas late.  Starving we went looking for food. Not only was Nacho Daddy one of the only places still open but they also offered a huge selection of vegetarian, Vegan and Gluten free options.  The Nacho's are incredible! Jovanny kept us well hydrated with their perfectly crafted house margaritas and well entertained with his beautiful personality.  This is definitely a new favorite of ours.

2ZhaXvndxV2SvdUbKcPiEg.text: Had lunch here while in town for a convention. Food was very tasty. Ruben, the kitchen manager, checked in on us and even brought us a great dessert. Enjoyed our visit with him.

339ZpbPqe1KFrp_e-hUBYw.text: This place rocked.  The wait staff was very helpful and the drinks were awesome.  Had the spicy shrimp nacho and it was really delicious!  I highly recommend coming here for lunch or a drink!

HzlxIzbr8F3cPqxUEUZ5iw.text: Susy is legit! She was super friendly and accommodating! She really took care of our group!

xAGjkDK9KpMaGcwL6kp-lg.text: The food here was absolutely delicious; definitely recommend the nachos! You get a whole lot of it for the price. By the end of our meal (which just included the main course) I felt like I was ready to pop! Our server, Christina, was very friendly and attentive, even while they were busy. This was our first time here, but definitely won't be our last!

jNpQEEBOwdOoabxL-yOgNA.text: So good! Tyler took care of us & was awesome!  He made sure we were happy & content.  He recommended the pork street tacos & daddy's margarita..they were really good. I also got the chips & salsa!

E3slHVrGhaZg8kCiBajYeQ.text: Pulled chicken and beef really?? Come on I just came from San Diego and Rubios is 100x better even Taco Bell uses real chicken and not pulled chicken. Baja Fresh is really good fast food Mexican. So we asked the waiter if they had tacos with real chicken not the pulled crap she ensures us they do and I order a taco and to find out its pulled chicken I tell her this is not what I ordered and she argues with me I never mentioned anything about non pulled chicken it's funny we had 10 food items come to our table we didn't order because the waitress put in the wrong table she brought us the wrong nachos and pretended they were the correct ones but the cook told her she was wrong and she seemed confused but tried to pawn off her mistakes on someone else. Hope this place goes out of business

YDbteIvIX4VOg9fYN4KatA.text: such a fun place!!! i would recommend! the atmosphere was fun and it's a good place to bring friends and have a few drinks!

lpTOeHcs0a35LE_DVrLweg.text: Great food and drinks. Had the vegan chick'n tacos and strawberry margarita they were amazing. We had Ryan as our server and she was great. Will highly recommend it to anyone.

ewAUSBagf0HytINFIXbtLQ.text: Very good Mexican restaurant just near the main Strip area (right near Planet Hollywood). They have unique nacho dishes worth trying along with traditional Mexican and Tex-Mex food. Servers are very nice and like a sports bar type of atmosphere with lots of sports games on TVs everywhere. It's a good and fine place to bring kids (don't have to worry about them yelling in a quiet restaurant). According to our waiter, place just opened about 3 months ago, but already very popular. Some dishes are a little pricey, but not as bad as eating at some of the main Strip hotel restaurants. Worth trying!

A8h6lSK6LhHxv0UfIWN6fQ.text: Took the wife and didn't know what to expect.  Service was great and the food was much better than l thought, but our waitress lied to us... she said the nachos were big enough for two, wrong they're big enough for four, we were stuffed and the wife's margarita excellent. Great customer service, even the manager came around several times.... So the next time you're in Vegas....

JOLAsMJjgRztg-Xx4yngyw.text: So Rolando was a great help and was super helpful. Brought aome killer margaritas and some bomb nachos. Check this place out right off the strip!!! The nachos seriously are insanely good here. There is plenty of space and the food is ready quick and served hot. Pulled pork nachos came out fantastic for our midnight craving. (You know, being in vegas and all) check this place out.

HrJ21iyhXeZZmZ0YVsLCng.text: We ordered the Shrimp tacos and filet mignon nachos, both were  good but not great. Service was good and we got our food quickly. Maybe our expectations were just too high after the high reviews but with all the other really good places to eat in Vegas I wouldn't come back.

oECp9L4UPB8ykeHA0_z5fQ.text: Absolutely wish they had some of these in the SF Bay Area. Fantastic Tex Mex style food! Elisia, our server, was fantastic. Efficient with her time, totally wanted us to feel comfortable-- very on top of the water for our table, and even OFFERED to split our checks, since we had a large party. Fantastic, fresh food as well!  HIGHLY recommend!

G3rCZJ38Rj2egADbPyEQgw.text: Nachos were bomb and the free drinks were a plus! Plus our waitress looked like Mariah Carey

KMPGxFQfgJjJnPe3FDw4cw.text: Awesome experience - the nachos were loaded up tall and wide with delicious ingredients (literally, what seemed like everything under the sun).  Judy was a Rock Star - delivering positively outrageous service our entire meal.  The atmosphere was chill - the perfect spot to decompress after our flight from KC.  I'd definitely revisit Nacho Daddy.

Gu5acukjMPuUQu9HywZsOg.text: Nacho Daddy is not that good. I went there and from my experience I did not feel like their chips were made in house. Not that that is important but I don't know if I was going to be marketing nachos I would try to make my own chips and I do not like it when I order nachos ma pile on some chips and then they pour everything on top because then none of the chips get anything on the bottom. I guess it's really bothered me because I don't know anybody that likes it like that and you're calling yourself nacho Daddy's you should know that people like the chips and all the toppings to be intermingled. The ambience is okay not that great and the customer service was okay nothing special kind of pricey

8x0WGarLM9j9MEZc0C4kXQ.text: Every time i come to Vegas i have to eat here ! Food is great as well as the people who work there

zGwoozViCg6dTDO48fwC6A.text: I've wanted to eat here for awhile and was glad to see a location right down the street from where we were staying in Las Vegas.  My husband and I wanted dinner so around 7:30 pm we went down and put our name in.  It took about 30 minutes to get seated which we expected.  Anyway, finally got seated and they have a pretty big menu so it took awhile to decide.  I ordered a Cadillac Margarita to start.  It came out very quickly and it was pretty good.  However, I didn't realize that it came rimmed with sugar instead of salt.  No big deal but I typically like salt on the rim and assumed that how it came.   Husband ordered fajitas and I ordered the Supreme Nacho.  You get a lot of food at this place so it's a pretty good deal.  Husband and I were not able to finish our dinner because there was so much food.   The cool thing about the fajitas is that they will light them on fire when they bring them to you.   The service is pretty on point and quick at this location which was appreciated.

Ay8EPtQrRVxr_Nx-iv-peg.text: If youre a Nacho fan, this is the place. The menu can take a minute to navigate but the Nachos were great. Service was friendly and timely. Great spot for something different while in vegas.

_mIuhZ3qrsARuufdZYqxWg.text: Asked for sausages got bacon instead. There was practically no wait but still disappointed. There was also hair in food.   Not going back

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Asked for sausages got bacon anyway... Also there was a hair in the food  Never going back

DWI9LZ4i9XpuDJ5r-BQ8qQ.text: I thought the food the food itself was good. I had the bbq nachos and the flavor was great. However, I wasnt very impressed with the portion size

eSr-miKCTMUqmeDvdu2snQ.text: Some of the best fajitas I've had. My wife and I shared the mixed (steak and shrimp) fajitas. Very tasty and fresh tasting. Also had the BBQ pork nachos. Very tasty, but really like an open face pulled pork sandwich with chips instead of bread. Not much cheese on there, which is what I think of when I think nachos. Still really good and filling.  Nice rustic western ambiance with an open feel. Service was very good. Hostess and waitress were helpful in navigating the menu.  House beers were mediocre, but they do have Dog Fish on tap.  We would go here again.

iyMAY6UXS50SffDowWBOHg.text: The restaurant was close to our hotel and I couldn't resist the name so we gave it a try.  The restaurant was bigger and nicer inside than I expected.  We tried the world famous nachos and they were excellent.  I have to say, I have had better, but they were good and there was plenty.  My wife and I got two different kinds of margaritas and while they were a little different, we didn't have a preference.  Both were very good.  We had an awesome dessert.  A chocolate chip cookie or brownie or something with ice cream.... similar to others you get but it was excellent nonetheless.  One thing we were both impressed by ... our waitress was absolutely awesome.  I forget her name or I would toot her horn, but she was friendly, talked to us like she was interested in us and wasn't in a hurry to go to the next table.  She was the reason we would go back and she was fabulous.  Overall, it was a great experience.  Pricey, but everything on the strip is, so you can't complain about that.  Don't go to Vegas if you don't want to pay big prices for food and drink.

cJF3vyAbdWoRjP18Mo11hg.text: I don't even know where to begin. All of the reviews were great. Maybe we came on an off night, an hour before closing. Basically, we were greeted oddly at the door then finally decided to seat ourselves at the bar top area. Our bartender was very nice and got us our drinks, took our nacho order and proceeded to talk to her colleagues. 30 minutes later we realized we still had not received our nachos. Our bartender continued to dance and talk to her colleagues while we just stared at each other wondering if we should say something. They were not crazy busy, so finally the bar back decided to ask if we needed anything because no one else had checked on us. The look on our servers face made it clear that she probably forgot to put our order in and went straight to the kitchen. An hour later our nachos are finally ready and we decided that we are so over it and just ask for it to go. Nachos were just okay :/ wish it was worth the wait.

a6Tz-tjElTsSwXNnAS4lsg.text: Great ambiance, great food but..... the hostess was not at the entrance booth, we waited about 3-4min before anyone come over, we had a few of the servers walk past us w/ out acknowledging us & there were people lining up behind us to get seats.

cq70UU1-xtMqlDYemWGUjA.text: This place was great! Had the vegan nachos delivered to our hotel one night and we fell in love. The next day we noticed they were right across the street from our hotel and stopped in. Checked in and had the free margaritas--- we upgraded for top shelf tequila and they were yummy! We also had the chicken tacos and a burrito and all the food was good. Service was quick and our hostess and super nice.

Q1QNd51T6Z7RGfkucOnuJw.text: Who's your daddy? The Vegas born and raised Nacho Daddy is!! My date and I ordered the house marg (free with entree check-in offer!!) The flavor was great. Not too sweet and the tequila was mixed in well. Our entree of choice was the spicy shrimp nachos and we subbed vegan queso instead of monterey jack. House made spinach chips topped with mounds of queso, crema sauce, spicy salsa, shrimp and cilantro. The chips were a delicious twist, it was our first time trying spinach chips! We added extra hot sauce but the spicy shrimp had a kick.  The waitstaff and manager, Peter, are wonderful. Excellent customer service. Looking forward to coming back and trying more of the menu!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

hkmq_zAkR9FHrsNVVAIDOw.text: Very good nachos; different variations to choose from and piled up high. Music is a little loud, otherwise good atmosphere. Great place for kids since nachos are a kid friendly food. Ok beer selection, have their own microbrew. Many margaritas to choose from

IiB4jqcw6zneq5HVK4tlwA.text: Great place..!! Food was really good and I liked their stout beer too - in house brewed ..!! And they have a great vegan menu too!! Check it out for sure

fB3JtgIIBx66HPU4_nii8w.text: One of the best mexican food in vegas may be.  Geeat nachos and great vegan food. Huge portions and loved margarita

zJXy_TKUbkt4YsWS0sgGpA.text: At Nacho Daddy"s in Las Vegas AGAIN!! It never fails every time I come here. Love me some queso And pork tacos! Ari was awesome and got everything we wanted quick fast and in a hurry. Can't wait for my next trip to meet with my queso once again!

3n7zjFew7eaPTFolgCfAfQ.text: Awesome nachos good environment on the strip Las Vegas.You have to see Litzs food server.Shes knowledgeable kind Down to earth person

peZG7KJpisLbo0LDn1yTgQ.text: Honestly this is probably the best burrito I have ever had. When I go back to Vegas in definitely coming back here again. Great food, great staff.

Z9eHyIkP7H8mXPCH3Z2iuw.text: The MANAGER JEFF NEEDS TO BE FIRED this was the second incident that I witnessed this night alone!  That first one was that a man sitting behind me was trying to get a refund or at least for them to remake his food,  because it looked like someone had taken a piece of his food and JEFF THE MANAGER denied such a request even after looking at his food. And called the police on him and had him removed from the restaurant. The second incident was that My family and I were eating outside  and down the street a couple got into a fight with someone else not involving the restaurant and we were trying to find the officers that were JUST THERE for another incident involving someone inside of the restaurant. Once that couple came down to were we were sitting they started cussing my little cousin out that's UNDERAGE, while one of NACHO DADDY's WORKERS were sitting out at the hostess booth. So we approached them telling them they need to apologize to her and they started to fight us and JEFF TOLD US THAT WE STARTED THE FIGHT AND THAT WE NEEDED TO GET OUT. While NACHO DADDY's Worker was telling him that it was the people on the outside instead of us. He kicked us out with out letting us get our stuff.

I7MREV-SqeAJu9b9qgUwuA.text: I love Nacho Daddy they have lots of Vegan options and I love the beer. I recommend you all come here.

We sat at the bar only because we were starving and didn't want to wait 20 minuets for a table. Scarlett(?) I believe was her name was awesome, super attentive and personable. We got margaritas, filet nachos, Mexican corn, and chicken quesadillas. The nachos were out of this world. We will definitely be back!

zeKRSh98vQr3TvVDfj8laA.text: We were in Las Vegas last weekend and stumbled upon this amazing restaurant.  They have delicious margaritas and the food is outstanding.  Our servers Booker and Shannon were fantastic!!!  I am hoping they open one up in the Houston/Katy Texas area!!!!  Do yourself a favor and check out this restaurant.  You sure don't want to miss out on the terrific service and wonderful food!!!  We will return the next time we are in Vegas!!  Mark and Brenda Denker Katy, TX.

Lu2lxN4urQdqT6706hj8Lg.text: We came for lunch on a Wednesday, not crowded at all, which was nice.  Used the free house Margarita for 'checking in"...our server AJ was awesome and very helpful.  The food was good and the portions were just right.  The salsa was really good (lots of cilantro...I happen to like lots of cilantro).   The only issue that we had was that the music was a little loud, there were times it was difficult to hear exactly what our server (AJ) was saying.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. We put a major dent in the dips

bps2IrKsD54AaCrAZg9NAA.text: Did someone say... "new dank af Mexican spot on The Strip with an amazing atmosphere, attentive staff, awesome ambiance, and strong drinks?"   Why yes... yes I did.  This place was AWESOME and we had a great time coming here. After spending all day at Marquee Dayclub seeing Galantis (amazing live btw, trust me), we were looking for a new spot to try that we hadn't been to yet. My fiancee and I come to Vegas at least once a year, and so we've got many trips under our belt and believe it or not, feel like we've tried nearly everything out there.   I've always felt that The Strip lacked a really, really solid Mexican restaurant. Sure, there's Diablo's Cantina, but... meh. It's just okay. When we found this place on Yelp, of course I was down to give it a try. Mexican food is DELICIOUS, amiright? And a free margarita with a Yelp check-in? We'll now you're just being nice.  We headed over there for an early dinner around 5PM. The spot wasn't packed but there were people in there, and it definitely started to fill up with a fun crowd by the time we left. I still technically call this place "on the strip," but you will have to walk about 40 seconds down a side street to get to it so if you don't immediately see it, it's just around the corner.   I ordered a chicken and carne asada taco plate and my fiancee got a salad. Both were absolutely FANTASTIC. We also got this delicious drip trio which came with chips (duh), guac, salsa (AMAZING!), and the most out-of-this-world bomb-dot-com queso dip that was just the best ever. If you're anything like me, you know that what can seriously make or break a Mexican spot is their chips and salsa -- for me, even if the food is meh, and the chips and salsa are amazing, it's a win in my book. Happy to say, this place nails it on all regards.  As I mentioned, food is amazing quality. Carne, Chicken, and my fiancee's salad were all on point, and the drinks were delicious, refreshing and strong (as they should be).  If you've made it this far in the review, I'm not sure why you're still reading and haven't already started heading over there... unless you have at which point I'll commend you for being such a damn good multitasker. Anyways, you won't regret your trip here. The vibe and customer service are fantastic and it's a great place to grab some food before you paint Sin City red.

mDgQG0-SaKW5AWjZM0_96Q.text: We went for breakfast. The food was good. The coffee was horrible. It tasted like hot water. Also they charge $4.50 without refills. The service was really not great. The server was snappy and made us feel guilty about asking for what we needed. We waited forever for her to come back after our food was delivered to ask for knives (we were only given forks and had to stir our coffees with them). When she finally came she threw the knives on the table... three knives for five people. The service really put a damper on what would have otherwise been a decent meal.

LJL6MPdw_MXH-oygYMj-9A.text: Best service ever ask for my boy DJ thank sir..... recommend the spicy grilled wings fire!

eKz9n2db74-M_xyAO3rJbg.text: The food was good. We tried fish taco, veggie quesadilla( custom made) and Special nacho for that day and everything was fresh and good. Great service was a cherry on the cake!

BnlprjyAWvkY1k2MBbB8mg.text: Love the atmosphere and the music. The food was ok not that great but could use some tweaking on the beans. Our waitress was very attentive and helpful.

lcBOyZNrwXkSAW6GxSsRkw.text: Poor service across the board. Ate here 2x to take my client out for lunch and dinner and the server never came by except for food order. The hostess he sat me to our drink order not the waitress and waitress never checked on us for refill or how food was. I saw numerous groups sit down and leave because they never got served. Horrible place for service. Food is always good but don't expect much from staff.

aduRQecDqxNzyWmUWlK_uA.text: Love the name and the food lol , great environment and staff!! Everybody was so polite and made one feel welcomed with great food.

uJLjGNKFJsOd2eIAqTd1RQ.text: Great food for the value price in this expensive town.  Loved the vegan chicken chimichanga, endless chips and salsa, and bargain margaritas using yelp app!

5TYunHyBmW3AqG8eA_g-Nw.text: Absolutely delicious !! Big plates, nice servers and really clean atmosphere I will become a regular here!!

3VQoDThx-6fweQ3mgrN7Hg.text: The free marg with a Yelp check-in was solid, but everything else about the meal was just average. For exclaiming bold flavors, etc., I was a little underwhelmed with my meal and it was served on the cold side. My husband got a giant plate of nachos and was certainly impressed with the quantity of food received.

IW1yuYdO4ddSkiYcViAOCw.text: Great little spot. Nachos were awesome. Good beer selection and house margarita was very good. Service was great.

V1yZRoTiXlrTLuOliKPG3A.text: Good food, better service! My boy DJ took care of our huge party like a champ. #wakandaforever

4BbNEagrmEWSjURSS17GkA.text: Street tacos were okay but the Nachos were loaded and out of this world. Do try any nacho dish when you are around.

7A7xKTKZ14jpbnSILYteZg.text: One of my favorite Restaurants, i always recommend Nacho Daddy to Our Guest. My favorite is the Vegan Menu

Cq9uV8yKHc7UIeXUmT2YKg.text: I have eaten at 2 of their restaurants, several times. Food has always been good as has the service.

4sROdNOIZVotuPFAWX9_Ug.text: Came here looking for some good eats after being disappointed at the Carnival buffet the previous night. The free margaritas were nice. I was leaning towards the fajitas, but as a visitor I felt like I needed to get the nachos for the name sake. Glad I did! Service was friendly but a little slow, but we didn't mind.. we were in Vegas!! I would definitely recommend if you are walking the Strip and want to take a break and grab a bite!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

nlYJ93EWYG5aHbsCEPchEQ.text: Our waitress Kayla was great.   It's not very often that your first thought for the comment box isn't "my compliments to the photographer", but for once the food was actually served looking better than the great pictures.   Presentation, taste, and cost was awesome.

7fNFLVsR9UWQhozzMpFZQA.text: As an ex employee I am trying to get my yelp reviews up for the community and my honest review of this place from a guest perspective is amazing. The food is nachos brought to a whole other level but that's not what makes this place unique the staff is very friendly and the new General Manager Peter truly has the guests best interest in mind. Nacho Daddy is a new company but you can tell will be around for a very long time. Best in Vegas margaritas and they hold the title high and definitely earned it. The atmosphere is defiantly a party/bar atmosphere where you can have a great time with friends and take advantage of the awesome cocktails. If your visiting and looking for a memorable experience get a scorpion shot, you defiantly won't regret it!!!

NAO7DuyNNsc2xFLoYIKXzw.text: I am new to Vegas and my sister was visiting from Chicago. We had an afternoon on the strip and decided to try Nacho Daddy for dinner. We absolutely loved the atmosphere and the music was incredible.  The staff was exceptional and even recommended a dish and sauce, which we ordered. Cheese quesadillas with refried beans and Spanish rice, with the red sauce. The food was an explosion of flavor in every bite. The salsa was exceptional, not to hot not to mild exploding with flavor. The retired beans had a great texture and also exploded with flavor. The Spanish rice also had an exceptional flavor. I highly recommend this place and plan to revisit soon.

fCIWT6mkuius9TTpx_PA4Q.text: Great service, thanks Gabby! We had the fajitas bowls and they were fresh, delicious and filling. We both checked in and received complimentary margaritas! We're here for several days so we will be back. Prices were reasonable in an expensive city.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Delicious fajitas bowl
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yum!

-FS6yYNDTcqe2cKo6Qffzg.text: "Jeo" Jovanny and Brian gave great service! Drove past this place and the name caught my eye. Came back the following day after walking through the Miracle Mile. Jovanny helped me choose my nachos. So many great options! I chose the Filet Mignon nachos which were delicious! The food and ambience here is great! Large screen tv and lots of other tvs playing good music videos. Nachos and drinks were perfect. The staff here are so welcoming as well! Manager Brian was very personable and our waiter Jovanny had us laughing and eating good! Will definitely return. It's just outside the Miracle Mile. Maybe I will be brave next time and get a scorpion shot!  Tip- try not to over fill up on salsa and chips before your nachos! But try the salsa for sure! There were 3 bowls, mild, medium, and hot!

G6LidgEiYzj76nKafJb8Rw.text: Never going back.  Terrible tasting food and the service, No wonder it is no longer in business on Eastern Ave here in Las Vegas.  You were doomed from the get go.  Not your kind of Nachos.

QhMSUJi-fwEnkAljDdBH5A.text: Vegan nachos, do I need to say more. Lots of options for vegetarian and vegans as well as meat lovers. There was about a half hour wait when we went. We decided to sit at the bar and received great service! You will leave satisfied and full!

Odo3nTZrR6h3j_xF2iWmig.text: Nacho daddy is one of my favorite Vegas eats. The service is always awesome and the food is to die for.  On tuesdays, they have a deal on the tacos which are phenomenal. I get the chicken tacos and dip them in queso - another awesome thing on the menu.  I recommend the queso dip as an app as well.  I usually get the Buffalo Nachos. They never get old and I eat them at least once a week! They're the right amount of spicy, too. They're quite large and there also on the happy hour menu.   I recommend everyone getting the margarita you get for free when you check in. Their margaritas are so yummy and they're pretty potent . I recommend this place to anyone looking for a cool, kick ass local place.

ECDpxR6GoFG0GjBJwE_7mA.text: Food and service was Awesomeeeee. The nachos are great if you're a nacho lover like me. The breakfast looked really good when I saw a couple order it next to me. The fries are very good(A++), and they make  a surprisingly really great hamburger. My server Korleen (if that's how you spell it) was really nice and helpful. I will positively go back when in town.

mkqFcIMjN0GqzVp1_xA7rA.text: Stopped in for a quick bite. Happened to be happy hour. $4 nachos and $5 margaritas! Sierra was my bartender she recommended the bbq chicken nachos and they where amazing! Good drinks great food and even better service.

KDXtjc8WhWcWJTVl9A6ntg.text: Got the vegan loaded nachos and added the vegan chicken and they were amazing. Had to have my boyfriend try it first because I couldn't believe it was all vegan. Yummy!

I am new to the vegan eating so this place was a much needed experience for me. I got the vegan chicken nachos. They were great. I miss nacho cheese but the vegan nacho cheese was pretty close and got the job done. Bonus was checking in got my wife a free house margarita. Only thing I could complain about would be the price but it's Vegas and it's not a fast food restaurant so you can't expect dollar menu prices. When I comeback to Vegas I will love to comeback to eat.

BdU2yOOGVya6G3MfxZlimw.text: We walked from Treasure Island to this place on a really hot day and it was totally worth it. We ordered the Enchilada nachos, soo bomb! The staff was friendly and good beer selection.

HGiE6XrObUJdQq-2NjWpOA.text: First, Jovanny was our waiter and had excellent customer service which made us enjoy the atmosphere even more. We got the corn on the cob appetizer, chicken enchiladas, filet mignon nachos, and the house margaritas. The food and drinks were delicious and portions were generous! Definitely recommend coming here!

yxoZk4XVYjU0kGWUYabycA.text: Amazing gluten free food! I highly recommend them. Try the chicken bowl and the fajitas!!

c8UBytjsoNxdYXfQmEwCGg.text: Love it here. Walk in a great by a helpful hostess who brought us in. Our server Huck was amazing super friendly and funny. Sings all the jams they play in the restaurant. Food was good and got a free margarita on check in. I guess Vegas is lucky for me after all

tfoC4bJiqPWQnZETQBKycQ.text: On paper this is a grand concept, especially to someone like myself that loves nachos so much. This one is in an odd location just off the strip, but is worth finding if you want some nachos while watching some sports. There is a lot of indoor seating and some outdoor as well. They have a lot of televisions through out.  We started with an order of the Queso Dip. It is a good sized portion and was a nice way to start the meal. In hind sight we likely did not need an appetizer but we were happy with it none the less. For the meal we ordered the Nacho Average Burger Nacho. I liked the idea of going a little off the grid for my selection. All the normal parts of a burger, less the bun, on a bed of chips. It was interesting, but tasty. I enjoyed it. The portion was massive. You can easily share them with multiple friends.  This is a good casual spot to load up on bar food and watch the game. It is pretty affordable too.

2R8ztptn7oJsg2UXYcpDRA.text: After being severely overstimulated by everything that is the Vegas strip, nacho daddy came as a godsend and temporary relief from the cold. We went on a Sunday night, so not exactly the food rush, but the service was excellent! Ryan was the best, we loved chatting with her and she was really attentive to us! The Thai nachos were sublime. Super weird if you're a nacho traditionalist, but if you appreciate a walk on the wild side then definitely go for it! The fajita salad was a standard Mexican style salad, and an excellent way to add vegetables. Three of us shared these two entrees and bottomless chips and salsa, we all walked away full and extremely happy we chose to stop in!   Also, the margarita is incredible.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margarita on the rocks, just do it.
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fajita salad
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Thai nachos are a MUST

RKy3VuVCSqSrqoa6fNPYIA.text: I was so excited to try this place but my excitement quickly declined.  When we first went in, we asked if we could sit in a booth because we saw a couple that were open.  He said, he needed to have the table wiped down.  Shouldn't take more than a minute, right?  Wrong!  After waiting and watching , no one wipe down the table... including the host , who could have easily grabbed a rag and wipe it down quickly, we decided to sit near the hostess stand until it was done.  Next thing we know, we look up- and there is a party of 5 in the Booth!  We asked the host, "what's up?" And he shrugged and said "sorry".  At that moment I was so pissed, that we headed to the bar and sat down.  Thank goodness for Arnold, the bartender- he made an amazing margarita.  I was excited to try the nachos because they claim every chip would drip.. not so much but, they were still tasty.

We used the check in to get the free margarita and we ordered the chicken fajitas and the buffalo chicken nachos. The nachos was ok, nothing special and portion wasn't as crazy as some people made it out to be. For the price, it wasn't anything amazing. The fajitas were loaded with onions and stingy on the chicken. Overall, it was average. For the price and hype, I expected more.

twpzONcs5jx5XgJ0T_lEJA.text: VEGAN MENU!!!!  Finally, vegan food that taste soooooooo good!!!!  We frequent Las Vegas a few times throughout the year and we always eat at the same Vegan eateries and although those other places are good... NACHO DADDY is the absolute best!!!!! We came in for the first time with our car club family and have never heard of this place before, and since we were invited we kinda were just gonna settle with a salad or something because most places don't offer a vegan menu. Surprisingly this place hand one and we were super excited.  I ordered the Fajta Bowl and my husband ordered the chicken fajitas. We had some special request and the waitress SERRENA got our order right on the spot!!  Fast forward to today. We are going back home to San Francisco so we stopped in for breakfast since they opened at 8. And guess who our waistress was... We got our seats and our waitress SERRENA immediately remembered us from the other night AND she also remembered what we ordered AND the specifics (no cilantro, add jalapenos etc) i was immediately impressed and she is super sweet and friendly! The funniest part was when she caught my husband inspecting his vegan chicken and she came up to ask if everything was ok. We laughed because one he got caught and two because the reason he was inspecting it was because it taste just like real chicken and the flavor was amazing! Hands down the best service and vegan food in all of Las Vegas!! I hope the manager reads this and let's Serrena know that she's an awesome person and is a huge reason why we will return!!

-rhZcEj8akiOznSpjZR-tw.text: We fell in love with Nacho Daddy!  It was originally a "filler" lunch spot during a recent business trip to Vegas - we normally plan out our meals to maximize our culinary experiences but just wanted something quick and easy after we arrived in town.  The dining area had a small wait when we arrived so we chose to sit at the bar.  This was a great decision!  The bartenders are all extremely friendly and conversational.  We were also able to claim free house margaritas thanks to Yelp check in!  We chose the mini chimis (unsure of the official name but it was an appetizer) and filet nachos to share.  Both dishes were well-portioned and delicious. We will definitely make this our regular stop for quick eats or a casual drink when in town!

We were seated relatively quickly and drink orders taken right away.  Nice selection of tequila and beers. Food was awesome. The filet mignon nachos were great, though I'd probably try something else the next time. Those chicken wings though... Would come back just for them! Service was friendly as well.

The reason for the 3 stars was the service, it was horrible. We were never asked if we wanted to order drinks besides water. (I would have loved to try their margaritas). No one asked if our food was good. We had to work to get the bartenders attention to put in our food order and to get water refills. I will be back, but not to this location.

lsCU4G5lg1tlr_RCstsDqg.text: This was literally the peak of our dining experience on our Honeymoon. The setting was casual but the decor was a rustic Tex-Mex vibe. Everyone was smiling as old music videos played on the near by flat screens. The food was as tasty as it gets with lots of vegan and vegetarian options. Our server was one of the nicest locals we met; he constantly checked on us to make sure if we were still getting along alright. For the price you can't beat the amount of food they'll give you. You either need to A) Come VERY hungry or B) Be prepared to leave with a box. All in all, my only regret with Nacho Daddy was that I was unable to finish my mountain of delicious pulled-pork nachos.

O6s4x08z9JUisQUaF7rv2g.text: You get a decent meal here and you don't leave hungry. Nachos are $10-20. Other menu items are also mostly $10-20. They have happy hour snack specials for $4 and $5 that are a very good deal. A dinner of fiesta nachos and the seafood enchiladas came to $36, not including drinks.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

7am8FBeUoAtr29murAf3UA.text: Who is your daddy?? Or as my 5 year old would say, What kind of cheese isn't yours?? Nacho cheese....How about both of those words into one for a great name....NACHO DADDY!   I have a challenge to eat at 24 new places in 2017. This was #11.   OVERALL RATING: 5 (SCORED 24 OUT OF 25) STAFF: 5 (All very friendly and enjoy working) FOOD: 5 SERVICE: 5 (Multiple people working on your table, not just one waiter/waitress) CLEANNESS: 5 PRICE: 4  Everyone has to love Nacho's...so what a better place to go to than a place called Nacho Daddy while in Las Vegas.   The address is Las Vegas Blvd, but it is on the front of a side street. Not far from the strip.   A lot of ingredients and mixers for drinks are all made in house! Which means better and fresh flavors.   Make sure to check in on Yelp while there and you get a FREE margarita. Not a cheap, piss pour one either. It was the same as the one we paid for! Had great flavor, mixed well too.   STAFF: Everyone was very friendly. The waiter spent time with us and the menu. Not once did they try to rush us and get us out of the place.   FOOD: Lots and Lots of it. Nachos can be split with a few people they are that big. However, since I was bowling nationals that day, I wasn't going to be eating much and ate it all to myself. Yes, I am a pig I know. Lots of flavor, not over whelming though. I had the crab and lobster nachos. I would def. order them again when I go back.   SERVICE: OUTSTANDING. Everyone was very attentive and helpful. Not once did we hear I am sorry you are not my table. Everyone asked if we needed anything else, etc.   CLEANNESS: Tables cleaned while you are sitting at them. Never a mess left at a table once people are gone. Food was picked up off the floor, which is a good thing because we know how messy nachos can be.   PRICE: You might look and think it is expensive...however, the size of the platter that the nachos come out on is HUGE and with lots of ingredients.   If you are in Vegas, this is a must mid day snack stop!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sign outside

gndDUeD9BtsWbDuRdzYCSQ.text: Banging atmosphere and food! Service was amazing. Great location on Freemont and close to bus stops lyft/uber pickup spot

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Smashed the nacho last nite!! Was really good. Adding to my favorite spot on Freemont.

agXjaa6sfK40dvdhxqI9jA.text: Food and service was amazing today. We ordered the crab and lobster enchiladas and endless chips and salsa.  Day shift staff has it together.  We got really lucky with our server,  Vince. Glad we decided to eat here and not BWW next door.

tZInr8Bl25fdDX4mUMlUcQ.text: The nachos were amazing.  Definitely rank among the top nachos I have ever consumed.  I will definitely have to visit again.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nachos!!

3ya0huZzmSRTYKJmiwoMAg.text: Great happy hour specials. I really enjoyed the $20 sirloin nachos. It comes out on a big plate so it's shareable and I definitely could not finish that by myself. The chicken tacos are delicious, however their corn tortilla are a little bit soggy like it has been sitting out for a while. Other than that, great place for happy hour.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

P8wxKePPlhHHt8-Cr13cAw.text: If you feel like Mexican and margaritas, Nacho daddy is the joint. We took advantage of the free house margarita from our yelp check in. Just a massive amount of nachos really! Ordered the fajita nachos and the lobster and crab nachos. In my opinion the fajita nachos were much better. A lot of topping and really evenly distributed. The lobster and crab much less so. The restaurant is cool and the servers are attentive and friendly. Don't need to eat nachos for a long time after that meal. Let the food coma commence

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fajita Nachos ($16.95) lobster and crab nachos ($23.95)
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Daddy&#39;s margarita

4-dwmY2rhEMxZhEcoEkISA.text: Booker took care of us at the bar, gave us suggestions we hadn't had before and was fantastic! Great job booger

c1yUsoRV9m723o3vAxpgpw.text: Good for Vegas food, not the best. Large portion, decent price. Good customer service! Nachos had delicious toppings and cooked well. We will be back.

xOAdvRgCdWGl919_E34p1g.text: You'll definitely get your moneys worth here! The chimichanga is my go to, but literally anything you get is delicious and super filling. If you ask nice they'll give you fries on the side. The staff is really nice as well perfect for when you're hungover

wvNvHyNYBRcLuCBdcVsfeA.text: The food was beyond amazing! Our server Huck was absolutely amazing and attentive! Thus far has been the best dining experience we have had in Vegas so far! Two of us shared the fajitas for one and the trio for $34 and are beyond stuffed with left overs!!! Sooo good!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

dLZOdDgMJ-w_TC-kiA_XWA.text: First time there and it's a new must when we are in town! We were looking for a yummy place to have breakfast that wouldn't break the bank! Hands down the best breakfast we had all week while we were there. We will definitely be back and would love to try other parts of their menu.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

CKNfONfJkVKkqAGlgtCx8Q.text: Great nachos and great margs. Don't forget the free marg for checking in here. Also the tacos are meh, but the nachos are so good they make up for it.

x-jKibNQqu9uetA41HD_UQ.text: Wel let's start with the food amaze balls. I had the vegan burrito & shrimp taco. Soooooo good. But a place can have great food and fail with the staff. But let me tell you shannon our bartender waitress was great. I adore her energy , personality , her overal demeaner. She was busy but made sure to give attention to all of her patrons. No one was left in the dark. I would come back to this place off of her alone. The food is just an extra bonus!!!!  Can't wait for my next visit to Vegas !!! Thanks shannon you were absolutely thee best !!

b6yrruOwBoxKaOKpQwjmiA.text: 10 's.... this place was awesome! It was a little walk for us but well worth the trip! Welcomed by friendly staff, and the waitress was super great for our family! Helped us pick recommend items and drinks. The nachos are freaky the best! I wish I had this place local! I will be back when I come back to Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

m0FkaalJFI9LwAuCI2nW1g.text: Good food  , great service. Big portions and we enjoyed our meal . I would recommend this place and would come here again . Thanks for your great meal on My Birthday .

QgyQOy_AW2NnVkVujqpG_g.text: AMAZING!! My bf and I ordered the Fiesta Nachos and a Daddy's bowl, expecting it to be just enough and not filling. To our surprise, the nachos alone were a huge portion and enough for both of us to leave feeling stuffed. We only had 3 bites of the Daddy's bowl and took the rest to-go. We also took advantage of the free house margaritas when we check in on Yelp. Our server (who we unfortunately forgot the name of) was also very friendly and attentive. Overall, we had a great experience here and will be returning the next time we're in Vegas :)

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nachos! No dry chips indeed haha

Joszak1WDTLxEXAQsCsaZw.text: If it wasn't for the food being outstanding, this place would have only earned 2 stars- and that is being kind.  Service was less than desirable.  From the moment we walked in, to our server half heartedly greeting us, we thought this place was a big mistake.  Had to wait for a table to be cleared when there were plenty of empty tables. Confusing.  Our server threw straws at us when serving water.  Our food was delivered half-assed: we had to ask for the tortillas that accompanied fajitas and a plate for assembly.  WTF?  If you're planning on visiting, check out the FREE house margarita offer on Yelp to help dull the terrible service.  Remember: the food is great!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Trying Nacho Daddy for the first time!!

H7OH-h7MLfbBaKuU2UBabg.text: Best nachos EVER!!!!  We had the Cajun nachos and Supreme Tostada and we had to take doggie bags.  No disappointment.  Definitely will be coming back.  Pricey BUT well worth it. Cajun has several types of meat plus shrimp.  Supreme was altered, I changed it from beef to chicken and oh my Goshhhhh!!!  OUR server Paula was the bomb!!!  Me and my guy both admitted that she's the best server we've had. It was easy to tip her past the 20%.. She made my bday SOOOOOO worth it!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. He had Cajun nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. SUPREME TOSTADO NACHO

3PtrPeZ5CPvmCNgVqr_u_A.text: We had our company holiday party here and it was fabulous! They have a private loft upstairs that overlooks part of the strip. It was a great atmosphere for a private gathering. Our server Hazel, and chef Ruben took great care of us! They were attentive and the food was delicious! The Thai Nachos and the chicken wings were my favorite! I highly recommend Nacho Daddy and can't wait to go back!

Jp73TJG2c3YSPYLli2jEYA.text: The portion sizes are gigantic, and the nachos were delicious.  There's a lot of great places to eat in Vegas, but this one hit the spot after a night on the town.

d1hCUjF5i-YrX0txmQQttA.text: Had fun went here late after night for some awesome Mexican food! Would come back again!

irFRS99LhWqSljWvNaomAA.text: A non-food review. Had to sit at the bar because it was going to be a long wait, according to the hostess. Sat at the bar, ordered margaritas, then nothing. Looked at the food menu while we were waiting, and waiting, for the margaritas. We made our selection and waited for the bartender to come back. She never came back. She made other drinks, took orders from other customers and basically ignored us. We ended up leaving after 15 minutes. We never even got water.

7IHVUjx0dEI3uetLHqTWRw.text: Just checked in and AJ is taking great care of us. The menu has a variety of items to choose from. So looking forward to my meal. I got the breakfast enchiladas and they were amazing. Great margaritas!!  Looking forward to coming back....real soon.

sH5HElP_8ia51VpEDJGkfQ.text: If you love nachos, I recommend this place!  Gourmet nachos...so many different types to try. My favorites are the Thai chicken or the Enchalada nachos.

ebPa0RDZxnwPt69gRWbn9g.text: Awesome late night comfort food. Tortilla chips and toppings on their nachos were terrific. Staff was friendly, atmosphere was really comfortable and modern with a rustic feel.

DQ4ULqGAKLOtt-gos0vrSQ.text: Great nachos and reasonable prices for being right off the strip. Jovanny was a great server! Fantastic personality and service.

bATLaGnguWphpdO0tluPew.text: The food is great! Nachos of any kind are a must. Margaritas are tasty! We will definitely be back!   Staffing was iffy. Our waitress was super nice but she had way too many tables. I never saw a hostess and there was a line of people at the door at most times. Maybe due to it being a holiday they were understaffed. Not sure? If you don't mind mediocre service, then this place is for you!

7fgl-t21xovnK6Dq1R46Cg.text: Loved sitting at the bar on cinco d mayo Desi is supper sweet.  Never seen nachos like this. Tried the buffalo chicken nachos.

0E1KrMwqgv9ejCY7y8xDXg.text: So many amazing vegan options, and Scarlett was the sweetest! Extremely helpful and attentive, and super knowledgable about vegan food as well! Vegan loaded nachos were fantastic, will definitely be back.

DssH4VEaAHs1TrVn7Z9H7w.text: Never even made it long enough to eat. The service here is ridiculous. We waited in line and were skipped over multiple times. Finally we said something and they told us to have a seat at the bar...we sit at the bar with two bartenders in front of us, not even acknowledging us. Three young guys come in a few minutes behind us and a third bartender runs over saying "I want to take this group." Again, at this point we hadn't even been acknowledged and they were sitting next to us. We waited for her to finish taking their order, thinking we were next....nope. We had enough and walked out. You seriously need to train your staff on customer service or hire genuinely nice people who don't stereotype. By the way, we were both servers and always leave huge tips.

GWE3IcAOO_SGRSs7ET6aZA.text: I love that there is a Nacho Daddy on the strip now, my experience here was awesome. Sabrina was really friendly , greeted me with a smile and seated me quickly, MJ was one of the best waitresses I've ever had ! I'm definitely coming back to this location !

r9PWfaM2vPf16GiXgyae5Q.text: The supervisor Jovanny was providing amazing service. Loved him and loved this place! Highly recommend.

ZTGvzeBx1xyhuvvCVDYc1Q.text: This place is awesome!!!! Our server Kirsten was the best.... She recommended the Thai chicken nachos and the spicy cucumber margarita. Excellent combination. Thanks Kirsten I will definitely be coming back.

je9Lzu5xQeI06HVDHSj7JQ.text: Good food but the service was bad! Not once was I asked if I needed a refill. We also waited for ever to get charged. Not coming back again.

9vPIh9h9UN0QaU5pJyA8OA.text: Gabby is so friendly and courteous! She is very nice and caters to you like a friend! Ask for her and she get you the best deals! Will for sure come back and ask for her!

4LY9C5CNSMXLhbnW4baY6g.text: Had the filet mignon nachos, holy smokes. Absolutely delicious and was plenty of food for my wife and I. Good beer selection as well, staff was friendly and the booths were comfy.

8P0g3eGeCePTYQ3A-s6qdg.text: Amazing food. The Vegan Tacos were one of the best I have had and guac and chips were fresh and tasty too.

Z6WTZGwsh_wgO-FBdaVbdA.text: Service was great. Margaritas are large so they are worth the price. Scorpion shot was fun and the bartender Scarlett was great. Good time!

OG-W2cLtiw_q-zBCl9PqPw.text: Best vegan nachos and the margaritas are also great! Great bartenders! Will be coming back next time I am in Vegas

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Daddy&#39;s margarita

aEne6cJvucOC7gz8yFyYWQ.text: Fun bar, prompt service, delicious food, large portions, plus a free margarita upon check-in!  That's 5 for 5 in my book!
