Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Award winning drinks

mRiZKc4Ukd3kxa4zqUVlqg.text: Had to try to this place due to the high review on Yelp. We ordered their Filet Mignon Nacho with two orders of their house margaritas -- nachos were OK, margaritas were amazing and definitely is a must try!  To be honest, the food here looks just OK. If you are craving nachos or hungry after a night of clubbing, then this will definitely hit the spot.  Special shoutout to out waitress Litzs for her amazing service!

Z66WAWTINfTmySjh4DCDnw.text: The food was great!  We started with the buffalo wings and I had the Mexican Cobb salad. My husband had the burrito.  Both of us left very full and we loved the place.  Atmosphere and service were great too.

FBkAVvrmT3RKeKQAplWwjQ.text: Initially, it had good reviews and it was close to our hotel. Service was severely lacking. My husband and I were told  we could sit at bar without a wait, but no one ever came to bus the dirty dishes at our spot. So we got up and went back to the hostess stand to wait for a table. After 10 min, hostess said we could go sit at one of the 4 open tables in the bar. It took a while to get drinks, our server forgot my husband's food (and as long as it took for him to bring it to the table, it must've not even been put in and had to be made from the beginning), and 4 top behind us got their food long before us even though they sat down & ordered after us. The food was mediocre at best. I would not recommend it or want to go back.

BuZDXMZpR1Ij8O4Oo9hpoQ.text: It was delicious And the place is also nice. I would totally go back. A little expensive though.

vWgn81AW9BGtlYTtaz-fYQ.text: Very good LATE night food!! Was happy to have a place to sit down and relax after walking Fremont Street for so long.  The nachos did not disappoint.  The Margaritas were very tasty as well.

F8GFUegBRbYZYX8LpGdQ7A.text: I didn't favor this Downtown location, I'd suggest the one of Las Vegas Blvd.. Too many flies during the summer

w8gqz6tpxsP62n9rw2UGlw.text: My hubby and I went to this place on Saturday. The service was good, but the food not so great!  I was really disappointed. I order the spicy shrimp nachos. There was barely any shrimps on them. I use to order this item all the time, when they had their Henderson location. I remember the nachos having so type of garlic white sauce (NOT WHITE QUESO), which made the nacho taste really good and different. This time, I had it & it tasted really basic and flavorless. My husband order the filet mignon nacho. It had so many beans on them, he couldn't enjoy it. We were so disappointed!! We actually use to love this place.

IcmL4pDlTq6X_1mHG9Emlw.text: Oh my goodness!! I look forward to getting back to Vegas and go back!! I had the vegan chik'n chimichanga and it was the absolute best!! I will eat here every time I'm in Vegas!!

AAgeLz46qWS91LScfPLHLw.text: Very good nachos. We had the filet mignon nachos. 1 serving was perfect for sharing. The filet was perfectly flavored and super tender! Tons of gluten free options!

fvBYRYCQIqbraUv7sr747Q.text: Great food, slow service. Waited 45 minutes then thy didnt have our name on the list. Great food though.

qRQtRpehkJ0XewWoT1HWQQ.text: Great place. Nachos are huge!!! If it's busy, they take your name and will text you, so you can go walk around.

w8EslPDd3iOB2PF_9PnNRQ.text: I love this place!! I tried the fiesta nachos with a side of queso dip..FANTABULOUS!!! The chicken was seasoned to perfection! I also had a house frozen margarita and it was yummy...dont forget to check in and get your free margarita!!!  They also have a whole vegan page of food on their menu..that's definitely a plus!! Staff was great and atmosphere was chill

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eating at my spot for taco Tuesday!

i4eHt-BAeBJWPTnJWRBUsA.text: We came across this place while walking around, to our surprise the food and drinks were great! It's hard finding great food around the strip, wish it wasn't so hidden because this place is really a gem.   It was actually breakfast time and their menu was pretty great. We paired it with their fabulous margaritas and they truly are delicious. Not too sweet and the perfect hit of alcohol. We were really happy with this place!  Prices are great. Service was excellent. Will definitely come back for some good munchies!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

5EIhMCbGzCrHa7pG2rek0g.text: Shrimp tacos were amazing as was the California Burrito.  The Bloody Mary was a bit too sour for my liking, but the food was great and service excellent!

RWBe72Y5H3Ix2HU0V9lMRQ.text: Great portions. Great taste. Great atmosphere.   Was on a business trip to Vegas and was craving some late-night grub and cake across this place. So glad I did as it was some of the best Nachos I've ever had.

3UBHIa70zFnfotYAUKeZLg.text: Overall a really good experience. Loved the atmosphere. Expected the nachos to be a bit better but good overall. Had the chicken tacos which were amazing, comes with spicy rice which was also very good!

uDxEJKoVc3YL4Oc6QUH01A.text: This place is AMAZING for vegan/vegetarian people. We ended up coming here multiple times during our trip to Vegas because the food we got the first time was so good. There's so many options to try and all the dishes we got were delicious and beautifully plated. When we got vegan fajitas, they actually brought them out and did the flambe in front of us! The drinks were strong and tasty, and a great price for being on strip. Service was really attentive and friendly too. This place has become a staple of all future trips to Vegas for me.   (PS. If you're vegan, try the vegan queso. Just try the vegan queso. You will never receive better life advice than to try the vegan queso)

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

TYfssBsT0VwkE9N2uExF4A.text: OMG Cadillac margaritas are huge.  We stay at the Marriott across the street and never came in here. My husband yelped Mexican food and this came up with 4 1/2*. The filet and fish tacos were the best. The filet was off the charts, so full and meat with a crispy tortilla to boot.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. OMG Cadillac margarita and beer

gW4efkHIRJIj84HVcqlYzw.text: Ok, seriously the best nachos I've ever had. Hands down awesome. I couldn't stop eating the fiesta chicken nachos. My husband tried the sloppy joe nachos and said the were great also.

-Vk2O1s2Q3JacQl8IB2EdQ.text: Excellent food and atmosphere.Our server Judy gave great recommendations and service. Looking forward to returning there soon. Thanks

Ed9WWLQsfngqcx8psCll1Q.text: My friends and I went in at 1 am and Cerah was our server. I ordered the Mexican corn on the cob and my friends ordered chicken quesadillas and the endless chips and salsa. My Mexican corn on the cob was fantastic. It was a small appetizer portion, so I ordered myself a chicken quesadilla as well. The best quesadilla I've ever had in my life. Great service by Cerah, and fantastic experience overall. We were very happy and will be back.

G4SrYImCgDcV_DEgfGF7kA.text: Great place for taco Tuesday & classic margaritas! Our server Mark was very polite & exceeded expectations. We would definitely return.

lVm0FQmI5fSKxp6wnoY49w.text: Nacho Daddy is nacho typical Mexican place.  Great Mexican food found right outside Planet Hollywood.  Opens late until three on the weekend.  Free margarita when you check in on yelp.  Excellent service and well made drinks by the super awesome waitress, Cerah.  At this visit my buddy and I ordered chips and salsa, wings, lobster and crab enchiladas, 4 cheese nachos, and filet mignon street tacos.    Chips are fresh, simple and bottomless.  The lobster and crab enchiladas are flavorful and surprisingly the rice that comes with the combo is delicious.  Four cheese nachos also simple and great for cheese lovers.  The street tacos are good; however, the meat itself is slightly dry.   Overall a great experience.  I recommend this and I don't do reviews often.  Definitely one of my go to places when I'm in Vegas.    Try the scorpion shot; I tried it my first visit and it was fun.  You can either swallow or chew the scorpion, really doesn't have much taste outside your tequila.  You get a souvenir shot glass when you try it.

h37GE-d5A2JmhnFCflPH5w.text: Can't wait to come here! I love nachos! I know the food will be great. I've only heard great things about this location.

vQE6P0CNB3IXYq-Jc1AbUA.text: Awesome place for breakfast.  Traditional American breakfast is really good and Breakfast taco was awesome.  Reasonable prices.  Check in on yelp for free margarita.  Will definitely be back when we come back to Vegas.

iiZXJpndKae-d9F0p17NgA.text: Came here for the first time and had chicken tortilla soup and filet mignon nachos. They were both so good.  Food is fresh and tortilla chips are delicious. Service was excellent. A must try place.

P__BV0PzYrvLTMxXc-BmUA.text: Had to come to Nacho Daddy again while in Vegas. Great food and great service. Kirsten was awesome, very friendly, and gave the right amount of attentiveness!!! I will be back next time in Vegas. Oh, the Yelp Margarita deal makes Nacho Daddy a no brainer

Qo71VocGXmHNchPgx75xSg.text: I absolutely love nachos and this place is NOT it. We got the lobster and crab nachos and it was not good.  Had barely any cheese on it and we thought the meat would be chunks of meat but it was more like pureed meat.  I thought the cheese quesadilla would be safe to order but it was just okay.  Again... barely any cheese.  We also go the wings, which the husband liked as well as the margaritas.  Our server/bartender Sierra was sweet though.  Would not come back.

_CkuRNWPJA6rSR1nLFyR5w.text: Waiter Jovanny was very welcoming and the food came out very quick. The atmosphere is super dope.

KBTb2qedxjazMx3NaOP-LQ.text: Had the best time! First stop on our Vegas trip! Jovany and serena were amazing.. great customer service and margs for days.

7uEPBiuQV6WfzY1IkIpVJw.text: Nacho Daddy...is daddy. I had the best taco salad of my life there and they had an entire vegan menu. SO SO good 10/10. I wish they had locations in AZ! I think it would do well there!

j5xeJhqWLFNn6YPQiwzCAQ.text: On vacation in need of Mexican food, the place setup was kinda small and hard to maneuver our stroller in however, the staff were friendly and accommodating for my son giving us warm water for his baby bottle. We purchased guacamole and endless chips for our table which went fast. ( definitely not enough guac or chips in my opinion ) but very delicious. The Dr Pepper we ordered was watered down but they immediately changed the syrup in the soda machine for us so we didn't have to wait long. Overall the food came out fast except my tortillas were a kinda dry and brittle for my  fajitas to be rolled up in but delicious non the less. I would definitely come here again!

PgrhU6ZGPKa619G4ie52HQ.text: Bomb food, good vibes, great server AJ, very helpful knew the menu and the beers up and down! 10/10 would come again.

a3OwPDEfP0jF8HwmG5t7Fg.text: Nachos were bomb. Margaritas were strong! Scorpion shot was interesting, got nice shot glass to take home.

Nh8j0zHqFatEtAs1YKehag.text: Great margaritas, food and service. Wish there was a Nacho Daddy in the Chicago area.

4O37azetCURa9PmMrQWvlA.text: Amazing nachos and definitely sharing size. Service was great and the prices are totally reasonable.

i3UXTrL_mrUnWgMtNzJv0A.text: Cool spot.. you can tell it wasn't everyday they came across parents with children so close to the strip but from the host to our waitress .. better yet every staff member we came in contact with was super nice. They allowed up to flow up our stroller up front right under the camera and reminded to us to take our valuables out. They brought up a booster seat but we both decided a high chair was better.. they seated us at the end which was a great choice for our crazy toddler. Lots to choose from , great portion sizes .. 2 people could share 1 plate of nachos because they pile it high. Our waitress was super laid back she was so awesome in making sure we had everything we needed .. even the food runner accommodated us by getting us an extra side of chicken from the kitchen at it wasn't even his table. Great experience will definitely come back here Our waitress even ran down the block to catch us on the strip to give back my sons sippy cup.  I totally don't remember her name but girl you rock!!

0n_FFT2BVFqlfUpmCmFvAQ.text: first timer here, conveniently located near Marriott Vacation Club and Planet Hollywood.  We came for lunch, but there is no lunch menu.  Food is ok but not great for the price.  We ordered both types of wings, they were good.  I liked the naked wings better than Daddy wings which had too much BBQ sauce for me.  My fav items were the chips and gauc, chips were nice and thin.  Other items we ordered were ok, not great - chicken enchilldas and pork tamales.  Margaritas were good, it was interesting to see the people taking scorpio shots!  Service was alittle slow, as our server didnt really check on us after she took the order.

7n8jPBGq7ORNznC4QNh3vA.text: Went for lunch. Fast, friendly service. Food was great. Decent sized portions and very affordable. Great atmosphere and very clean. Will be back for sure.

SzN0Jk1IbJbQHFUYOX060w.text: This place was fantastic!  Our group of 3 ladies had a lunch here and it was just what the doctor ordered!  Their queso was amazing and the fajitas and nachos and enchilada were all a huge hit.   We didn't know what to expect and thought it might be like a typical chain-restaurant experience, but it was for sure better than that.   Special thanks to Huck, our server that day.

FQzYMDiZ9ovmZo0FQCCI-Q.text: Chase my main man recommended some great options for our group.  Shrimp nachos, corn, and the naked wings were fab!

ZK831bCcw0x1yj7aBOn_hA.text: Awesome place great food and service our server Chase was wonderful and very accommodating and made some great suggestions which we were very pleased with.  Thank you Chase!!

Aq1rn-Y_bMLRS_fCb4Guaw.text: I love Nacho Daddy! I had the most amazing time, as always, at the bar. Jade and Arnold are the best bartenders in Vegas, they were so much fun and informative. We ended up with the Enchilada Nachos, and 2 SCORPION shots! That's right, REAL scorpions. A must stop next time you're in the city of sin! And did I mention how hilarious the hostess was?! Thank you for making my girlfriend's Vegas trip so memorable!

IfCi1fpjWZIaW7vgqTvl0w.text: This was my first and last visit to this place. I ordered takeout last night. When i walked in, no one was there to greet me. I actually waited there for about 5 minutes before i decided to walk throughout the restaurant to find someone to help me. Once i found someone, they told me they would be right with me. They took my food to the front where i waited another 5 minutes before someone came to close out the check. If that wasnt frustrating enough, got back to my room with the food and it was cold. And I'm sure that didnt help the taste because i ordered the baja combo and it was just disgusting. Seafood enchilada smelled bad and i had one bite and threw it away. The worst mexican food I've had. So disappointing. Never again.

Kz4oxykeznYdjpfMyzOUfg.text: Great prices and solid food. You can't go wrong hitting up this place near the strip.

7zuA-34ZNd16O5okg9dfwA.text: Jovany was such a gent. Made wonderful suggestions n his recommendation was spot on. Thanks!

3Zh8xSaVD6V99RcTYD1HFA.text: Great cocktails and good food.  Great place for a group, something for everyone.  Service was outstanding!...  It's on the Vegas go to for casual FUN food and drink.

WKU4NozmqoK3QkPL7AMwWg.text: This place was great and affordable.  What made the experience stand out though was MJ, our server.  She was friendly, fun, and provided great recommendations.  I will return the next time I am in Vegas!?

ylr-dq4CqtfMRBfZfKpHwg.text: We can here for my friends birthday a party of six, two of us got here a little early and was greeted by the hostess Audre and she set us right away! Audre was very nice and charming, she introduced us to our server Richard and he was very nice and friendly took our drink orders right as the rest of party arrived he took their drink order as well. He gave us a few minutes to look at the menu and took our order. Two of us order American tacos which were great! Two others had the Ultimate Enchiladas combo which very super great!!! One of us had the Chicken Enchiladas and he really enjoy the dish. I order the Mexican Street Burger that I totally loved. The service was great, food was serve nice and hot, our refills were plenty on our drinks. Would bring my friends here anytime and would recommend it to my customers.

l6VmtpwWBxr8_S0vMxIy2A.text: Nacho Daddy was awesome because of Jovanny. He was awesome. Food was awesome. It was a lituation like no other. I recommend everyone to come in and see Jovanny. Definitely deserves a promotion. I love Vegas more because of him.

WlXtWaQXEnVOvY271C3y3Q.text: Great staff great food! We had street tacos, nachos and seafood enchiladas. Yum!  Nachos were big enough to share and piled with delicious goodies. Will go again.

nwkfXI7566l8rbKHgx-H_g.text: The supreme nachos tostada was awesome. Our server AJ was on point and very attentive to our needs before we asked for anything. We'd come back again and ask for AJ.

5NhtkqJ93GLnzoNoXJqdQA.text: Great place near Planet Hollywood.  We ordered steak nachos and they were very good.  The quacomole was exceptional.  Service was super.  We would definitely  go back.

7RkzYDty7YFsFLF-j5Qaww.text: Great experience.  It was busy at lunchtime, so we ate at the bar.  Service was good.  Food was quick. Enjoyed the margaritas.  Nachos were ok, just not as gourmet as the marketing claimed.

xXc2A7454_BuiwecjAfkSA.text: Great option for a late night craving if you want something substantial but on a decent budget. The ambiance is nice--it's rather dark inside but not overly so, and the tank of scorpions at the entrance was definitely eye-catching. The menu is pretty large, as are the actual nacho dishes themselves. I am not sure if they are all the same size, but we went with the Supreme Tostada Nachos and they were definitely enough for two people. Even though there wasn't a lot of food per se, there were enough calories in all the cheese and saucy goodness to last for a long while. All in all the dish was balanced and done very well, with the chips remaining crispy while we ate and flavorful salsa and ground meat distributed all around. They did screw up on the Daddy's Wings though; while the meat was perfectly done, the sauce on the outside was way too salty and made the wings pretty hard to eat. Maybe just a fluke? Remember to check in for that margarita.

taqq2FLlMRkKOaX3cbixhg.text: This is a great place to stop.  My wife and I stopped here for lunch one day and had a great time.  Nachos are incredibly delicious.  Staff attentive and professional.  Fun environment.  Highly recommend stopping in.

4docgpIaNp0_WUClk_YzsA.text: This new Nacho Daddy location has a wonderful staff and a fun atmosphere! Heather was our server and she was very personable and attentive. Food was great- We had the ceviche to start, then shrimp fajitas, the vegan nachos (actually very good!), and a chicken burrito. I also recommend the mango margarita, which was AMAZING. Overall, awesome new place and we will definitely be back!

EpmV_85FBPID5el8BK3ZCg.text: I would not recommend this facility. When we were led to our seat, we waited almost 10 minutes before we saw the waitress. When she arrived, she spoke and walked away from the table before we could even speak back. When she came back, we asked if we could move to a booth, she rolled her eyes and waldisappointing.  ked away. She came back, took the water off the table, and informed us that we could sit there and someone would be by to clean it off-then she rolled her eyes and walked away. My friends (it was 4 of us) decided to walk out. When I informed the manager of why we were leaving, her response was "ok sorry, have a great day". I understand why the worker's attitude is subpar, as the manager's attitude isn't reflective of someone who cares about the customer; she expressed no sympathy for the fact that we were leaving or the actions of her employee. We were visiting from out of town and went that because of the reviews and the restaurant being zagat rated.  Very disappointing.

vv8X3c85qUI0T5akgq0_hg.text: This is my favorite Nacho Daddy in the Valley,  although you must drive to the Strip! This location has a great vibe and quick friendly service. The Cadillac Margarita is very tasty and I love the Vegan nacho cheese! If possible, sit in Huck's section he is an amazing server with a great personality!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cadallic Margarita

Xss_2kht0T_w41zYbB8EHg.text: This place was delicious ! It was on a limb that we decided we wanted Mexican food in Vegas but once we walked into the place we instantly loved the atmosphere ! The drinks were amazing, bartenders were very attentive, and gave awesome food recommendations. I loved the promo "check in and get a free margarita !" Who doesn't love a free margarita ?!?   Tinga chicken nachos ... AMAZING !!! Don't skip this on the menu !!   Flaming shrimp nachos ... literally flaming !!!   Filet mignon and shrimp fajitas ... to die for ... plus a fabulous presentation.   Lastly the churro Sunday ... mouth watering and was the perfect dessert to compliment the dinner.

eODo9g7YUcTDJwvsHbEjtA.text: One of the best and fun places to eat in Vegas.... great staff and fun staff.  Cannot wait to go back and try something else.... everything was simply GREAT!

XLk1wl8isdHpLW_EaZVM0Q.text: Conveniently located on the strip, right by planet  Hollywood, Nacho Daddy is a really good late night food place.   We got a table for 2 immediately when we got there around 11pm. The waiters all seemed super friendly.   They have lots of options on their menu for all sorts of dietary requirements, including vegetarian/vegan/gluten free. They're also very flexible and can customize the items to your liking. Just keep in mind that the nacho portions are pretty huge! We got the nacho supreme and got the meat on the side.   The drinks are pretty great too - I had to get a refill of my Daddy's Mule! Highly recommended for a late night snack/meal!

VIqCQHbdgS8RHOvNMgXyAQ.text: This place is a great place to eat at. There nachos are soooooo so good I would most definitely eat here again

DRXuc1FnjsWJHBQnjmpHCA.text: The vegan menu is top notch. I love coming here on occasion when I'm really craving it. The service is good and the waiters really know how to help me choose what I'm looking for. Always recommend this place to friends.

XKZJDlf9HRAuvOG8AranQw.text: Vegan chimichanga= heaven in my mouth! Margaritas are yummy and everyone was very friendly! Thank you nacho daddy!!

FVhYoZ5CaA_ZbpqQiffpfQ.text: Food was VERY good! Got the crab and lobster nachos. And the ceviche was very flavorful. Whenever I'm in the Vegas area I will be returning. Would suggest anyone visiting Vegas to attend.

5kPEWjT8h2wxiXgzLBn3Sw.text: What a amazing place. Had the lobster nachos  They were unbelievable Magirritta was so good Must do scorpion shot must try. DEE is great waiter he knew  How to make a meal an experience.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fried ice cream

Swe3u70t7ZwaPrQIz9LT1g.text: Yummy place. We came here after we landed and checked in our hotel. Despite our hangryness, our server was nice and very laid back. We didn't have to wait that long, but it was on a Wednesday at around 1pm so we may have already missed the lunch crowd. Anyway, our food came quickly and truth be told, I was expecting it to be just okay. I got the steak fajita bowl and my boyfriend got the chilequiles. We both loved our plates! We still had a little bit for leftovers, but unfortunately we couldn't take anything back since we are tourists.  A good place to stop! BTW, they have vegan options for anyone who is vegan/vegetarian.

mtJBJ614G2JORP0Yw2G9DQ.text: Not sure how this placed ranks 4.5 Stars. Food is good, not great. Chicken fajitas had literally 5 pieces of chicken, made a big deal about flambeau of the fajita plate table side, should have made a bigger deal of including chicken. Service was less than stellar. Came in, were the only couple at reception area, was told it would take 5 minutes to clear our table. Two more couples walk in, a different hostess comes up and seats them ahead of us. The original hostess returns and apologizes for the other hostess, says she's an airhead.   Not great. Will not return.

_zLZY7jd1aak53Hxt3DmIw.text: No chips were left dry. Wings were grilled to perfection with lots of flavor Food came out very fast. If you like nachos. This place is a must go

bKCE3aLV1nVb5DllY-l3Dw.text: With Nachos in the name I really didn't want to waste time going but I'm so glad we went. Our server Ashly was great. Atmosphere was great. Happy hour drink prices were great and the main thing the food was yummy. I would return next time I'm in Vegas.

OpLHwkwXGiV7A-o-S7CbDQ.text: Awesome food and the service was great. To bad I wasn't still in Vegas because I'm craving nachos. Next time I'm in town it's on.

0x1dR7qjyktOi1dhtvkivA.text: This place was SO good!  We ordered one plate of nachos and it was plenty for two.

1R3S_dwmAR50jQlb1rSBGQ.text: My family and I stayed in Planet Hollywood, so we decided to eat at Nacho Daddy for the first time. And all I can say is that It was amazing! We started off with some delicious chips and medium salsa, and they were hot and salty (a great combo for chips). We also got an appetizer of wings and they were to die for! I got the filet mignon tacos and they were juicy and delicious. We actually went back to Nacho Daddy a second time on this trip, because It was so good. However, they have birds in their restaurant which we weren't sure was intentional or not, but they could do without the birds. Other than that, we loved It!

XFSobL7rWqSUVzpGYUw9nA.text: Yes yes yes YES. The most killer Mexican food in the coolest restaurant set up! Right off of the strip, free parking right behind - Planet Hollywood - what more could I ask for?  Any of their breakfast items are amazing. The menu is huge and so hard to choose from because it all sounds mouthwatering! We got the pulled pork nachos and they were some of the best that I've ever had. They will be my Nacho Daddy forever.

We had some tasty and appropriately strong drinks to start and then enjoyed 3 plates of nachos and one fajita. It's a little more than your run of the mill american mexican joint but the options are worth it and relative to the strip prices you're making out like a bandit here. Enjoy!

6zIBX8WTv-dJFnhccgpgCA.text: Great micheladas!! Gets pretty busy in the evenings and on the weekend so the wait can be quite long, but there is usually space for 1 or 2 at the bar.   The buffalo chicken nachos are

DVgnOFUW7C-tuB0e9Yznhw.text: I love this place so much  I always come here when I'm in Vegas! Seriously the best nachos. I always get the crab and lobster nachos and they give you so much seafood. You definitely have to share it with someone because it's a pretty big portion. The service is amazing. The host gave me water while I waiting because I think she heard me say that I was thirsty haha and I always get a Michelada with modelo negra!! BOMB. There's usually a wait so I normally set seat the bar if there's open seating. Best nachos ever!

J6wcCUS4XEIotbujbGTeww.text: Not a bad joint but not the best nacho experience I've had. Portions are large, but in the end I thought the product quality was average.   If you go one order of any of the signature anchors is plenty for two people. Keep in mind it's Vegas so by the time you split an order of nachos and have a couple of margaritas you are in it for $50 plus for well nachos.

EuFzcfL9Eoh2yt8mCS0FiQ.text: I have eaten here once before.  Service is great, margaritas tasty, sizzling shrimp app and filet mignon nachos both delicious.  Will definitely be coming back when in town!

V9n0Dxtf2NnwegAkPP-UTQ.text: Best kept secret in Vegas for nachos and good Mexican food and margaritas!  Loved the tostado nachos with ground beef!  The atmosphere and setup was really hip but the food was really really awesome!  It's just off the strip next to the Walgreens.

OjpKR6SOOqT4CXgusDecyw.text: Edward De La Rosa, the assistant general manager, helped me and my girl out tonight while we were at the bar. He was so nice and professional, not to mention informative about the menu! He even made our drinks! It's awesome to see a manager so involved with the overall operations of the restaurant and the customers! He's fantastic and we will definitely seek him out the next time we go to Nacho Daddy!!! Thanks Edward for making our experience extra enjoyable!

ds24TxW0qbHG6KBPBPwr_Q.text: Awesome place!  Scorpion shots were a must - I had just gotten married and the hubs and I are both scorpios.  Food was great as well. I had some kind of bowl with rice, steak, and cheese and it was delicious.  Definitely returning when back in Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

_1brt5jWSmr3vKRI8wDwEQ.text: This place is awesome. If you're on the boarder about going here or going to your usual Vegas dinner/bar stop, opt for Nacho Daddy instead.   The vibes here are awesome. Walking in and seeing a giant scorpion in a terrarium?! Unreal. Plenty of TV's showcasing sport games? Yes please.   The menu had a ton of "non nacho" options for all the haters, but I narrowed my focus to the nacho options. I had to try the filet mignon nachos, which sounded so perfect. I had zero regrets doing so. The nachos were super flavorful, and the beef on there was amazing. Our party all ordered different nachos with the intent to share, but we all horded our own as soon as we got them. Beware of this.   They also have a scorpion shot drink, with a real scorpion in it! We don't drink, but asked if we could have a scorpion anyways to try. It didn't taste great, but added to the experience! Our server was super nice, and went above and beyond to make sure we were taken care of during our visit.   Overall, be sure to check it out. Don't settle for a mediocre Vegas buffet when you can tour Vegas for cool places like Nacho Daddy.

ZYXVjlBSBg1ddOr42mcMBA.text: The nachos and some bean paste were very good they've become my favourite things to think about.

XIkLCdEDBLtuc9yAnivSBA.text: Stumbled on this hip mexican spot on Yelp as we were hungry after a 5 hour flight.....  The chips and salsa although 3 bucks are a great buy......  Now on to my fajita steak and cheese sandwich,the steak and onions were all cooked to perfection and the melted cheese was a great touch. The meal comes with fries and for a dollar more you can have garlic fries which I opted out of due to not wanting to deal with my own garlic breath.  My fiance ordered the open chicken tamale that comes with refried beans and rice which I had a bite of and to my surprise taste like a typical chicken tamale nothing special just not my cup of tea.  Overall the place was well kept with thee exception of the baby bird flying around. Our waiter was a bit slow but very polite.  And if you can please try the house Margarita it was the best Margarita I've had in a while.

4QlECtuSRxIR98QQ-XlGIg.text: Meh. I have a hard time coming up with a way to describe this place other than mediocre. When we came to Vegas we were looking for highly reviewed places to visit and this was on the list. When we walked in the atmosphere was nice, but they were packed. I get it, it's Vegas. The one thing that kinda grossed me out was there was several birds flying around inside. Aside from all that we were eventually seated about 30 minutes after arriving. I was so excited to try the Bloody Mary and some carne Asada nachos. The Bloody Mary came and it was so bland. For Vegas my expectations are high on any type of drink and I was majorly disappointed. Then the food arrived. The nachos were soggy. It came quickly so I know it wasn't sitting out long. It could be too much moisture in that specific dish but there are few things worse while eating out than a soggy chip. Overall it was fine. The waitress was nice and the service was prompt but there are plenty of other places in Vegas that I would rather go.

sdKfbr75B5T0vMsjDskdWQ.text: Jovany is the man! He took great care of our astronomically sized group of pseudo-adults.   Margaritas are free with a check-in! Great fun with great company. Believe it!

The food came out in an adequate amount of time. I got the vegan nachos. Not bad at all. I plan on trying other items once i return.

yL-sWel5NzmU55mqFBMrSw.text: Went to Vegas for my birthday and nacho Daddy was excellent and has reasonable prices for the amount of food you get also they offer a free birthday shot or dessert for your birthday. My server hulk was great would definitely eat here again.

rbO8Z5CdTpYzeCeqSRd3Pw.text: How to find it: street level, around the corner from Planet Hollywood, just past Buffalo Wild Wings. We had the fiesta nachos and they did not disappoint. It's a mountain of nachos that's easily enough for two hungry (and slightly drunk) people. Our server, Ryan, was awesome. Check in on Yelp for a free margarita - pretty great considering the steep drink prices on the Strip.

mFdJOzNdPYWcQTLzSV4aNQ.text: On New Years my and my partner decided to come to this restaurant and man I'm so happy I did . We were walking back to our hotel and was hungry and my eye just caught the sign that read "scorpion shot" and I wanted to try it right away , so we went in and order 3 shots with scorpions and took them towards the end of the meal. My partner ordered the shrimp nachos and I don't remember what I ordered but it was okay . I ate 3/4th of it. But the shot was amazing and consuming a scorpion was a 1st . I love it

ahc8snwvjXNqTlOM7uXGIg.text: We were very happy with the service and food! Our waitress was awesome and being vegetarians there was a lot of options available to us. You have to go try the food out!

_XFyUVR_6OnKj8dkcs8zbA.text: Love this place and the music selection. Definitely a must when you want a satisfying meal to cure the drunchies... pa la cruda!!

EwKHOEG6jiVwJfCLIAbbFw.text: Honestly, the best nachos I've ever had. My husband and I came for lunch while we were killing time yesterday waiting to head to the airport for our flight. We decided that a place called "Nacho Daddy" was too good to pass up.   It's a little strangely located, on the outside of the Miracle Mile shops, around the corner from the main drag. You can only get to it from the outside, not from inside the mall. We didn't have a problem finding it, but the location did surprise us.   We were promptly seated. I was quite frankly a little shocked to see that the windows and doors were propped open despite it being 100 degrees outside, but the air inside was kept refreshing and cool. Unlike a lot of places in Vegas, I wasn't shivering from the blasting AC, and I wasn't sweating through my clothes from stale air. It was literally perfect.  As for the food, it was AWESOME. We ordered two things of nachos, the BBQ Chicken and the Nacho Hamburger Nachos. True to their slogan, there was not a single dry nacho. The flavors were really unique and enjoyable, but both my husband and I preferred the flavor of the Nacho Hamburger Nachos. Two plates of nachos was a lot of food for the two of us. We were able to finish it, but were feeling pretty full and a little bloated for several hours afterwards.  I also ordered the tortilla soup which was really delicious, and I added a side of avocado to it which was perfectly ripe and a great addition.   We also had a lot of fun watching the music videos that were playing from the 2000s on the televisions around the restaurant! That's a fun idea.

C7YGDmKOOk9Uh696MFe8ww.text: Was craving nachos for my last food in Vegas before traveling and decided to check it out. Really cool environment, loved the old school videoclips playing. Ceviche was ok for a Mexican one, but the nachos really made me sad. Ordered a filet mignon Nacho and couldn't eat so spice it was (not stated on the menu) and I really like spice food so I knew it was TOO much. So much tomato paste (in nachos?? Really? ) that I wasn't able to taste the food itself. I only had the meat and the guacamole which was all I could eat and taste properly. If you want nachos I'd suggest you ordering something else.. it sounds delicious but at least mine wasn't.. I complained about it and they didn't charge me the nachos (fair enough since I barely touched it) and got me free dessert which was THE BEST CHURRO ICE CREAM EVER! Really, so so good!! You have to try it! Super fresh and yummy, it's not too sweet as I thought it'd be.  Overall, we had a good service and was happy i didn't have to pay for the food I didn't eat but I had higher expectations for a place that is specialized in nachos..

They were amazing. The crab and lobster was cooked perfectly. We also got the street corn, AMAZING!!! I was highly impressed and will be returning the next time I'm in town visiting. I had a house margarita!! It was one of the best I've ever had.

FA8KBtYIVNZpHbmIU1Dxnw.text: I've been craving nachos for awhile, but I can't have dairy anymore. Nacho Daddy was the PERFECT solution. I had the vegan chix nachos with "real" chicken. Never had vegan sour cream and it was a nice addition of flavor. The margarita was just okay and I was hoping for a little cheese on every chip, but that wasn't the case, thus the 4 stars.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Eez5frpbnIAwljoFqguCLA.text: Soooooo soooooo good! Came here twice on our vegas trip and both times had great service and amazing food!!! My husband has the golden knight nachos which has filet mignon, nacho cheese, jalepenos, bell peppers and a whole lot more I cant think of but was freaking amazing! The chips are crunchy not soggy and everything was made to ordered. I had the chilaquiles which were chips with red ranchero sauce, two eggs and beans also soooooo soooooo good!!!  I cant get enough of this place and will definitely be back. Also, did I mention the wings?? To die for! A MUST TRY!

0DRdoxJFBAm6xYUmZMnEWA.text: Excellent food and service. Portions are generous and our waitress was both friendly and attentive. We would absolutely go again.

qrqZYONpI9CLB8lyUtygNg.text: Great margs, solid music and environment. 10/10 would recommend to the fellow traveller makong their way through the desert sands of Nevada. Scorpion shit is also high on the list of things to do while in the food establishment.

PDB1mGV_XB20VMdyObn64Q.text: This place has the best Mexican food in Vegas. DJ was our server tonight, he did a fabulous job. He provided us with extra rice with our chicken fajitas, was quick to refill our drinks, and had a good attitude. They also have a fun scorpion exhibit with live moving scorpions, you can even get a SHOT with a scorpion. Overall, a good pick when looking to try something different, would definitely recommend.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken nachos

nppHGyOp3398wiz4uEu0_g.text: Went there twice. Food is delicious. Some of the staff is amazing. Was met with two staff issues. The second one was that our food came out wrong. The runner took it back to fix. Then came back with the same incorrect order and a side of ground beef that should have been on the nachos to begin with. So the ground been was hot. The nachos that had come out twice and that were sitting while the ground beef was being put on the aide were barely not cold on top and just barely warm inside. Just a lazy call by the runner or the kitchen manager trying to save a buck.

GFfR_1mPkyIWk5k_lsgshg.text: Man this was an Amazing place but really great views.    It sure beats Hooters any day

DRJJ8eLcq_pzj9Y84scc_g.text: Excellent food and exceptional service! Got the pork nachos and a margarita which I normally would not order but both were very good. Highly recommend as a place that is not your typical strip over priced restaurant.

aTvnMgp_5V0hwEzgdcll1A.text: Best filet nachos ever!!!  Called at 6 for a reservation that night and got one at 8.  Good thing I did cause there was a 25 minute wait.  Cool spot.  Still thinking about those nachos.  Added fresh raw jalapeno slices to it and they had the seeds in them.  Spicy yum Yums!  If you go here have to get the nacho's, skip the other stuff.

xIWGdzC9rh9TV-stpjmfMw.text: We came here on a whim! Daddy's mule Was awesome and so was their beer called who's ya daddy. The enchilladas and tacos we delish! Hidden downtown gem.

LIE_RroOEhy-YIpl2vAJKA.text: Love this place! HUGE portions & reasonably priced for the amount of food you get. My friend and I got the BBQ pork nachos, beef burrito smothered in white queso & the Mexican style corn. SO GOOD. Also the wait was short and the food was very fast. Highly recommend.

ldYXP63_ptuhD7QWfrUQqg.text: Ok let me start off by saying this place is fantastic I went on my birthday and got the chimichanga it was so good. They give you a lot of food and it's also made with love everything in Vegas is good all the food that I've tasted was really good and Im from Dallas Texas and shout-out to the waitress who hook me up with a shot for my birthday thinking it was Sierra not sure cuz it was my birthday but man great music it was it was really fun.

ABL_mSjVwK0WaIfQgG9VAQ.text: What a great find on our weekend excursion. The nachos were huge so we shared and it was perfect. Our waitress Sarah was incredible.

E5EJD_C9iyEb4tnCENOlEg.text: Did not disappoint!!! I'm always suspicious of highly rated restaurants, but this place is amazing. Great food, excellent service, great location. We will be back. Cassandra is an excellent bartender.

dgyQPFLxSvRXgVKnlWG0OQ.text: Loved the ambiance.  Loved the drinks. Food was beyond amazing. Best salsa I've had in a long time

ksr-VxzFLVQokhZ7J-0FZg.text: Again!!!  Nacho Daddy's beats our expectations!   Vegan food was delicious!!!  Thank ya our so much. Third time in a row. SAM was also great. We own a restaurant and are amazed at the fun the staff has working here. Good job!!!!

U5HOyEYFgz_zhXPPEoGWwQ.text: My husband & I had the Surf & Turf taco combo and the Baja Seafood Combo.  I had their house margarita and my husband had a beer.  The meal came steaming hot and everything was delicious.  We left with full, happy stomachs.  Our waiter, Vince T. did an excellent job!!!

zAXqBflhmow1Pk3BKkTzxQ.text: Nachos were soggy because they put too much stuff on them. The long Island i got was very boozy... So much that I was almost not able to enjoy it (what? ). Overall okay, but not five stars.

0o6RYRicfRthfShV67SElw.text: I gave Nacho Daddy a second try due being quite the nacho aficionado. I then realized the chips were less flavorful than my home nacho chips because they need to be. The structural integrity of the chip is superior to anything on the commercial grocery market and quite the feat of culinary engineering. Once I was able to embrace the positives rigid tortilla chip, I began to pile the toppings on: Spicy shrimp, ground beef, quac, chicken tenders, quesadilla, more chips, didn't matter, the base chip could hold it all. I was then able to enjoy the flavors presented on the chip and thoroughly enjoyed my second chance try at Nacho Daddy.

b1KtWd1iKWr4Pp3ItxcQcQ.text: Food was really good and quick and plus  funny server!!! Matthew was great!! Every chip covered

UBCtm32o-R4ZASrx07fsVg.text: Loved this place, will go back. Got my free margarita, fried lobster tacos and nacho supreme. Friendly staff! Excellent food!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

8YnMkkEK1oHBktghh6oMwA.text: Gonna keep this short and sweet. Everything was average. Not good enough for me to eat there again. I had the triple dip (I believe it's called) and Filet Mignon Nachos. The spicy salsa tastes much like plain tomato salsa with some jalapeno peppers on top to make it spicy. The queso dip wasn't bad but the guacamole tasted like smashed avocados with nothing else added. I thought the steak on the nachos would have a grilled flavor and there would be a little more of it. Your staff however was very pleasant and the service was good. I don't mean to be harsh but those are my honest thoughts.

foDClmKdzGt7ZVzt-OlDZw.text: We kept walking by.  Then since it was within walking distance we stopped in.  To our surprise great wings good salsa and the kids quesadillas were hot and good.  The free margaritas for Checking in didn't hurt.  The bill rolled less than expected. I'm good!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Wings better than Wild wings. Quesadilla is just as good from kids menus and Daddy&#39;s margaritas can get you tipsy.

9r1ghHVH-dZXqdGn-b4HNg.text: My wife and I walked in and asked to be seated at the bar. We sat down, 10 minutes passed and no service. The bartender and fellow coworkers were hanging out at the end of the bar.  The bartender walked pass us twice with no acknowledgement.  I wish I would have taken a picture of them huddled at the end of the bar but I didnt even think about it.  If anyone from management sees this,, please check your cameras from January 21st 11:20pm-11:35pm. I had on a camo hat and red flannel shirt, my wife had on a white jacket. Unbelievable lack of service.

PHc7OWzJFyO6x2choInvrg.text: I'm totally underwhelmed by the food. Everything is bland. Margs yech. Service ok. We had nachos and seafood combo - nothing was spicy unless you threw a jalapeno on it. No complex flavors. Even the salsa was kind of dull.

J8D3c7rg6iypO2BROM4O9w.text: Food was absolutely delicious. Margaritas were very yummy too!! Tina was our server and she was FABULOUS so sweet and very attentive.  Overall we had a great meal here and will definitely recommend to others.

tYYPWDVgDHVAQpbWzXABQA.text: Very creative nachos, I must say. Cool environment and actually open later. You'd think places would stay open later in Vegas but that's not always the case.

oJhXpa5EBorJhVca6AAZ7w.text: Fantastic food. Loved their vegan options! The frozen margaritas are really good and strong.

R9qstEIu8PKn6o70KUixqw.text: I returned to nacho daddy prior to attending the golden knights party. I sat at the bar and all of the girls were amazing great job to Alex and Sierra for recommending the beer flight and pineapple mint margarita. Because I was headed to watch the knights game I figured I had to have the golden knights nachos, tender filet drenched in cheese sauce with peppers and mushrooms was delicious!!! There truly was not a dry chip on the plate as they like to say at Nacho Daddy. During my visit i was checked on by both managers on duty who are always extremely friendly and polite. Kudos to Edward and Joe for striving and pushing the customer service , it really showed from the moment I came through the door until I left. I'm attending game 7 if it goes that far? so I'll be returning! Maybe I'll finally take that scorpion shot!!! GO KNIGHTS!

JxUAU7CStdEkY5XGZKOc-g.text: Nachos and magaritas were delicious! Filet mignon nachos and watermelon sangria were my faves. But service was even better. Our server Jovanny was so attentive and amazing which made the experience even better.

8W2_4RWF9u1w08mPOSTQkA.text: This place has delicious food. The probably was the service. Our server MJ did not explain to us their nachos which is what their are famous for. My order came out wrong twice and had to wait while the others in my party were more than half way done with their plates. I was charged wrong on my bill, after correcting it, she decided to go to three other tables before coming back to pick up the bill. Other than the service, I would recommend going there for their food.

4hXxQ4GU2k-itGhOqcVoUQ.text: This place is just decent. The food we ordered was bland, I never though Mexican could be bland. Drinks are good and nachos as well but anything else is mediocre. Our waitress forgot to ring in some food for us, waited fifteen minutes for chips and salsa and finally then brought out our main entrees with no chips and salsa so we decided to cancel it. Heard the table behind is complaining about something similar, they ordered salads and then nachos but got nachos and no salad. Maybe the waitress was having a rough day but I'm a server and it's not that hard to ring in appetizers first or tell the kitchen/food runners you want them first. So over all just decent! This place did come recommended to us so maybe our experience was just a fluke thing. But I don't think This place is anything special. Oh and I forgot to mention the horrible rap music they were playing. I like some rap and I don't knock tunes till I hear it but this stuff was awful.

Z8t78YEuKkGLVPgI9tpOHg.text: Great food! Felt fully satisfied. Would definitely come again. Staff were super friendly, always smiling and service was incredibly quick, even for a Friday night. Very happy to have ended my night here.

AozwulTe4MOMZdMlTmB8vg.text: I went there because there was vegan food on the menu, and I was not disappointed! In fact, it's one of the very few places on the Las Vegas strip where we found vegan food. Their melted nacho cheese was the closest thing I've ever come to eating something that tasted like real dairy. It was so good that we ate there twice in the same day! The staff is also really friendly.

No2MaCytk56kovuySZECEA.text: Went to Nacho Daddy around 11:30 on a Tuesday. Restaurant was not busy at all. We waited about 5 minutes at the hostess stand before being greeted. Once we were seated we waited another 15 minutes before we were greeted by a server. During that time we watched the other tables struggling to get the attention of the server for a drink they had already ordered. We left before ordering and saw a line of 15+ people waiting to be greeted by a hostess.

ihyyfbC4b-LiE7R-cFw0_w.text: Tried out this place coming into Vegas prior to checking into our hotel Planet Hollywood. Very clean and great ambiance... our waitress was the best, Areanna was very friendly and attentive and recommended the best dishes!!! We were a group of 6 and my brother and his girlfriend had the scorpion tequila shot and yes real scorpions inside !!! They were adventurous and brave. We all ordered different dishes and they were all delicious!!! Vegan fully loaded nachos with real cheese and real sour cream for myself the vegetarian, burger with garlic cotija cheese fries for my boyfriend,carne asada nachos shared by my brother and his girlfriend , chicken sandwich  with side salad for mom and also shared half chicken sandwich with my brother and mexcobb salad for my dad, all delicious and we ended with the deep fried ice cream which was the perfect dessert shared by all of us just to satisfy our sweet tooth... most definitely will be visiting this place again. Thank you Areanna for the great service!!!

OKKUwNlSyVj_f6CS6qYX5w.text: Jovany was one of the best waiters I've ever had! Awesome service. Definitely will come back! Very nice, very helpful.

vdHHogGmm4_lN8QTUPBBMw.text: This place is great. Loved the nachos. Tacos. And main course. Staff are very nice. Place is clean on the inside.

-LDnci5go1vWTDVF8CGEAw.text: Terrible service. Waited 20 minutes and nobody came by. Left and asked to speak to the manager and nobody could point out who that was. Never going back to this location. Fucking horrendous

5ux8suPVX7LuKGDyGAZcZQ.text: Delicious food, large portions, cool layout, easy to have conversation with the people you came with, entire vegan section of menu! Service was attentive but food took a while to come out even though the restaurant wasn't busy. I got the vegan burrito with Chik'n, kale and beans -- yum! Affordable and fun place just steps off the Strip.

rL8wL5hG4nj-Uvr2zK0Kiw.text: Was told I didn't know how to order.  Umm excuse me you don't know what specials you have and the prices that they are so duh I'll have a question or two.  Have never been treated so rudely

CxKqnSoIHRBxmQ3Db1oncw.text: Everyone here was so nice, especially our server Daria who made us feel so special after a hectic experience flying in. Daria was so sweet and her food and drink recommendations were ON POINT. So glad we came in here and can't wait to come back.

CnOnwlVP5m7ARAY7T3UB1Q.text: Nacho Daddy is so so good! This was my first time in Vegas, and this was definitely my favorite spot! Cool atmosphere, great service. GREAT MARGARITAS

MomYD8xJJQhWhNYI3_Ig2A.text: Enjoyed our visit tonight. Great food and even better service. Our server MJ was attentive, cheerful, and helpful. Best server we have encountered on our visit to Vegas.

pgVu7P8H96Dje-rlEDP31w.text: First time here.. awesome service from the hostess to our server Jovany. Jovany was cheerful, fun and most importantly professional. Food is awesome and variety is great. Definitely making this place a must every time we're in Vegas!

cmgVmnXZoWiVOtZHbmwfbg.text: The bbq chicken nachos were great and the service was even better. I will definitely make sure to go back next time I'm in Las Vegas.

8Ga66GggryC0wdCHw_nrIw.text: Love Nacho Daddy Summerlin so decided to go to Nacho Daddy at the PH. Sucks to say we waited at the hi top tables in the bar area, where the bartender noticed us, but neglected to say hi or even acknowledge us. (sierra was the bartender), we waited for 10 minutes, then decided to wait another 5 minutes...before going to the hostess stand. Ran into a server named Serena who gladly saved the day, big-ups to Serena... thank you for your great service!!!!

SOCjlVkvdz37JuTC_9VoZA.text: I had the Thai nachos, steak and shrimp tacos, and the spicy pina margarita. The food was delicious and margarita was spot on. All served up by Dean! Great customer service! Definitely coming back the next time I'm in Vegas.

vkkVArutcxq8Ky3dgWXaYA.text: Had the shrimp nachos, they were amazing!! Judy rocks, we were undecided and her recommendations were spot on. Will definitely be back.

aoU1u0vtKBsrwVfDmV8yGA.text: A little tricky to find because we thought it was part of the miracle miles shops but it's entrance is actually on a side street. They had all different nacho plates to choose from as well as general Mexican dishes. We sat at the bar for a quick bite and shared a plate of nachos. The portion was huge! And very reasonably priced. I'd return!

cb414r1B_0-MlZwgx5U2Qw.text: The food and the service was great, Rachel our server was as very attentive and checked on us frequently. The surf and turf tacos was excellent. I recommend you try this restaurant

6kL0xleCbV0rwVwmDzuaiA.text: Last night was my second time here and it was just as good as the first time!  Quesadillas, burritos, and chimichanga are all good.  The house margarita is awesome!!!

G0Vwj3NRN9HSywW0cuisig.text: Well this place was a great find. We where in Vegas and looking for quick stop before heading out. We seen the menu and they have a ton of gluten free options. The wife has gluten allergies so we figured we would give a try. Nachos are Huge plates. Margaritas are excellent and service was Vegas style awesome. If you in the area you need to check this place out. They also have margaritas to go!

pxEkEXn3UNumv4Ngdw-laA.text: Is was so good we came back twice!! First time we had shrimp tacos and chips with guacamole very good! Margarita was good!! Second time we got the beef nachos even better!! Try the raspberry margarita it's on point!

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. What&#39;s left from Beef nachos!! So good! A must

PRJeP2151QHAT86j1zwY7Q.text: Ouch !!!  I didn't know these ratings could be so deceiving. Worst part of this place is the very thing that names this place. Worst nachos ever. Everything was way to salty.  Service was good though to bad for the food.

Un3qNC_oOEGrMHrXaKmMFg.text: Excellent service, good food.  We sat at the bar to avoid a wait. Service from the bartender was quick and attentive...  I got the house margarita, frozen...the yelp check in freebie. I appreciated the choice of on the rocks or frozen, as that's not always a choice for a freebie. I got the frozen, and it was a delicious balance of salty and sweet.  We weren't too hungry, so we ordered the seafood enchiladas and boneless bbq wings to share.  The enchiladas were delicious! The refried beans and rice were also wonderful...not dry or tasteless as they are in so many Mexican places. I especially loved the pico de gallo...a blend of jalapenos, onions, and cherry (!) tomatoes.  The wings are good, not great. The breading is very crunchy, the sauce flavorful. The chicken itself was a little dry, but not inedible.  Overall, I very much enjoyed our experience here! If we were going to be in Vegas longer, I'd definitely return.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Free house margarita with yelp check in!

ItNjDm6dK_Y-PJ0eX33jcg.text: I ordered delivery through Uber eats. We had the vegan chick'n quesadilla and the vegan chimichanga- yummy!!! It was sooo good! My favorite of the two was the quesadilla.

4Gs0Z7UPNS0K9SjftA9PLg.text: Great service, great food, large portions, and a fun atmosphere made this a great dining experience. They also were very good about dietary restrictions. I would definitely recommend stopping in here.

QnNdU1RITtACrKt_SnMJwg.text: I heard great things about this place so I had to try it before heading back home.  The food was mediocre and the service was just the same. Maybe the others are different, but the 4th St location I will not be going back to.

HfuzCLCpBY2uFEOUVEhyCg.text: Nacho Daddy was awesome. Over crowded but really good! I had the enchilada nachos and I've been craving them since. They need to come to Washington state, we'd welcome you with open arms! My hubby had the buffalo nachos and against my advice had the scorpion shot. Very gross. But him and another guy from Washington state took them together. So it was fun. Will be returning when we visit Las Vegas again.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpion tequila shot

MY_xixRULMj36kxo8AV1CQ.text: We decided to have some Micheladas here, based on all of the positive Yelp reviews. We were pretty disappointed. They tasted as if the were watered down...and no, the ice hadn't melted yet.   We even went as far as nicely letting them know of the situation, and asking them to provide us with another round. It was the exact same experience. Awful. I was tempted to try their Scorpion shot, however considering our current experience, I decided not to waste the additional $20.00.

kkBy1Xgt9u-1gK3NeLJ3yw.text: WooooOW..... their nachos were great, margaritas were pretty good too. The waitress as the PH location was so nice and genuinely personable. My two sisters and i ordered three nacho dishes; we all picked from each other's plates. I had some steak or filet something or other, my younger sister got the cheeseburger nachos - we finished her plate first as they were the best (sorry sis)... cant wait to go back.

pakbGA96BIlj3deousyf1w.text: I always heard about this place but never had the chance to stop in until recently with a friend from out of town. The inside was beautiful, with the bar towering over you. I joked with the bartender about getting me the bottle at the very top shelf; for a minute I actually thought she was going to climb up there and get it! I ordered a shot with a scorpion in it.. because why not!? The presentation of the shot was great! Needless to say, the service from the bar staff was 100% awesome, the front host was super friendly and encouraged me to come back again. I will be back, for sure!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Not your average Tequila.. with a SCORPION! Yum!

08GjPa2y-ZDTkUlWnSCtSg.text: I brought my daughter here because she requested to have the Best Burrito for her Birthday. We found this place via Yelp and it is highly rated. The place was already packed when we got there. We were greeted by the hostess and got seated right away. Our orders came out faster that I expected which is awesome. And it didn't disappoint! The tacos I ordered taste so savory and my daughter's California Burrito was the best Burrito she had according to her. They even customized my mojito. Since I don't really drink alcohol, they made me a Raspberry Mockjito (non-alcoholic). I love the vibe in that place, there's flat screen TVs in every area and a huge projector by the kitchen area playing top pop hits. The servers are also nice and friendly. We are definitely coming back to this place.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Entrance to Nacho Daddy
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster Taco

qjcSTfp-2MI9GMmwstIanQ.text: Very good nachos with inventive ideas. We got the fiesta nachos with chicken on the side. Lots of good flavors! My only complaint about the nachos was they were served cold. I understand they were trying to bring all our food out at once which I appreciate but nachos really shouldn't be served cold. Besides that, cool environment and good service. My only other complaint is one of the waiters had very bad body odor that I kept having to smell every time he walked by. A little off putting when I'm trying to eat. But definitely would come back here again!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta nachos

9lDZW9f-6Lg1y7HGtAS-Qw.text: Soooooo good. Their vegan chicken was amazing!! This is definitely worth your money. The portions are a very good size. The foooood - so good. I definitely suggest the vegan chocolate cake too!  They delivered on the time.

nGVh4K4lJ7UcBnWKphzJUA.text: Nachos were really good. But the customer service was horrible. Sat at the bar and took about 15 min for them to realize I was there. Ordered my nachos and modified it a bit and came out completely wrong. Had to wait for them to remake. Was waiting for another drink refill and took so long a different bartender came and asked me if I wanted a refill. Would possibly come here again just for the food. But don't come here looking for a great experience. Peter the manager isn't the friendliest either.

1InDPm8iLVuEjIszmfTvxA.text: This was awesome the music was a throw back along with the food nachos for nacho lovers so different even though my bf didn't like his nacho he ordered we switched and both loved them. He even did a scorpion shot weird but super cool.

Mts6NsGt1iPVTPXXPECaWg.text: My food was really good. Just a few things though: 1. The quac was saltless 2. The chips are really salty 3. The rice is salty as well 4. The local wild life (birds) are annoying Other than these things great food

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

BSKGIlQx2rAOlaHiQrwsnw.text: Staff is very nice. Food is waaaay over priced. My wife got wings and they may have been the worst chicken wings I've ever tasted at a restaurant. Frozen Tyson wings taste the same. We got the filet mignon nachos and I'd love to see the "filet mignon" they used. Food gets 1 star. Staff gets five. Edited this review. Staff is nice but it's taking forever to get the check. Legitimately 15-20 mins after we were done eating.

cM4_byq1DdBq6Pp1X8wHyg.text: I came for a 2nd visit and had 3 teenage girls with me. I loved the Triple Dip the first time I was here and ordered it again as a starter. The girls loved it and liked the variety of the salsa, queso, and guacamole. We ordered the mojo pork enchiladas, chicken enchiladas, BBQ chicken nachos, and the fajita salad with filet instead of chicken. Everyone enjoyed the food and the girls loved the nachos. I am happy to say that the steak in the salad was perfect, not salty. I did not have a cocktail so I can't update there. This is a solid choice for good food.

4HeIC1W0V2HY3G-mLDIS5A.text: Amanda was an excellent waitress!!! The nachos are truly amazing and it has a perfect location, coming here twice in one trip!!!

30gBBLSFcXJz08Jvp1LScQ.text: Ive been several times now and every single time i get the absolute best service from Jovanny and the absolute best food! I tried the surf and turf taco combo tonight! Delicious!! And i had the watermelon margarita. Amazing. Love this place. Great staff. Great food!

NjY23l0YQ7S0g62qEo6b8g.text: This place is awesome! Had an overall great experience. We ordered the Vegan Chickn Tacos and the Vegan Loaded Nachos with chickn added. This was seriously the best vegan chickn we've had in a meal.. we couldn't believe it. Our waitress Audre was great and let us know all about the vegan options such as how they make their chickn and queso in house. Wish we were staying longer.. one of the best meals we've ever had!!   Will be back any chance we get!

zrFv9L4lzJF2NAZFIkhnyA.text: Came in expecting to munch on some nachos and enjoy some margaritas and we got much more. Definitely enjoyed our food and drinks but Jovanny R. Was an amazing server! Greeted us right away and even joked around with us! Checked on us several times and made sure we had everything throughout our dinner. That's how all servers should be! I'd definitely be back!

8cM_dYQXMEHbjtVBpMcGDw.text: We had breakfast 3 times while here- was excellent! Food and service was the best! Kimberly and Charlene at the bar were very nice and attentive! Recommend very much!!

Mi0nIGqQ3nfMh4j4ktxw6w.text: For something different off the strip, go here for a casual dinner.  Fantastic nachos reasonably priced, clean and attention to detail with the service.    Our server was Desiree and host Jaylen.

y8_RSldPERZHIis91Amrtg.text: love this place.  we showed up with a party 30+ and ryan took great care of us!!  she and chris were amazing.  patient, hilarious, friendly and not annoyed with our huge group and special requests.  the beer is great, the food is insane, everything was perfection.  so good i considered going twice in our trip to vegas.  can't wait to go back and get some bbq chicken nachos and the daddy hefe beer.  highly recommended.  special thanks to ryan and chris!!!

PegL-2jlf01Sww8eIk7BSg.text: The new guy, that's what he told us, Damond or DJ killed it...he was great and the new bartender Booker was great as well...A+ for this place.

f9B2liCfzbS1BglD_nlFJA.text: Amazing nachos, amazing homemade margaritas and amazing homemade tortillas. Best Mexican food ever!

YXnhSGLWdAEgfR6pcxrgbA.text: First and foremost, Nacho Daddy needs to expand to Arizona. We had the Fiesta Nachos and they were outstanding! I would also like to give a shout out to Jaclyn behind the bar. I have never seen a harder worker in this industry all the while making sure every one of her customers have everything that they needed. She is worth a visit to the bar over the dining room any day of the week. We are in town for three more days and we are going to come back just to see her again. She truly is the best in the business.

3V9hU2D7m0niYIT-PwFIdA.text: WOW!  What a wonderful experience. Audre was our waitress and did a fabulous job making us familiar with the menu and making us feel nice. We shared Thai chichen nachos and sizzling shrimp tacos. Flavors were incredible.  Presentation full and colorful. Would definitely recommend to those looking for a truly creative and explosive taste. Coming back for breakfast!

P5xeaHtCDHNw3Ug6T-u3Ag.text: First time here visiting Vegas, the staff was very friendly, our waiter Jovanny was awesome! He went above and beyond for us, with suggestions and our requests. We ordered the Thai Nachos and the Vegan Loaded Nachos, both were great. The white queso and spinach chips used on the Thai Nachos were so good. I will definitely make this place a must visit next time I'm in Vegas.

olGXJtwZwnTnf7Oeo_Luyw.text: Really liked the name and popped in to try it. Food was actually pretty good. Our server got the order wrong but the great margarita and scorpion shots made up for it. Reasonably priced.

iGjVDYQu0Bhv-EU2m-UIAw.text: Absolute worst service. The management blamed it on being short staffed, but it was so slow.

JShOlzU4bQ62lO4raqFHGw.text: Great price and a lot of food for the money.  Service was very bad, and they tried to sit us right in the sun, they need sun shades on the second floor above the entrance.  When we asked to move our seats, they had this attitude as if we were putting them out.  There were plenty of other tables they could have sat us at.

CYNXQKpqzhqMwqvwwyD_rA.text: I was so happy to find a vegan salad here that I could have for breakfast! It's nice to find some healthy food on the strip. Also watching music videos during our meal was fun!

G3wCYq-DHSVdEGjAM_ZAdg.text: Good, reasonably priced food on the strip. Technically it's half a block from Las Vegas Blvd. on Harmon. We had the Fiesta Nachos and the Mexican corn on the cob. Very delicious. Shredded chicken and we chose the hot salsa. They will customize your nachos. Corn was fantastic. Margaritas were very good. We sat at the bar and the bartender was great. It's a big bar so service can take slightly longer if there is only one bartender but really can't complain.  All I can say is go there you will not be disappointed.

J8uX6Dx_izDoRsVQhnciQw.text: Jovanny and Scarlett are absolutely amazing! It was almost 2am in the morning and they still were enthusiastic about their job and providing the best guest experience. Love that! Will definitely return to see them.

IUH4HRTGXmoiZfrOPjFl1g.text: Very good! Loved the lobster enchilada! Pretty pricey though if you have a family. We have three kids and the bill was around $65. For Mexican that's a bit high. Kids enjoyed it though, they really like the name of the place. Very good servers too. We had a girl that was training and she made sure drinks were refilled without asking. We have some thirsty kids so that always a plus when they refill without us asking.

qsCYBXy6qiZtLZd21PXn2g.text: OMG I could not get enough. I meet with friends who came from out of town and we all had a blast. The Margaritas are really good and the Boneless BBQ extra crispy wings are just epic. I can't recall the names of the nachos that were ordered, all I can tell you is that the portions are huge and they did not skimp on the Guacamole and Sour Cream. The wait is not that bad, yet is recommended that you make reservation. Parking is relatively okay, but let's face this location is on the strip and you know you have to walk a little more to get there unless you Ride-share.  I really liked the atmosphere and ambience that Nacho Daddy created. I feel it's a great meet up for friends who visit from out of town due to its location and even to gather with your coworkers after work.

LSpKHn2PZmMGtEF9D4BjsA.text: Came here at 11am, a handwritten sign on the door says "We will not be open until 12pm, sorry for the inconvenience." Okay, an hour to walk around the mall not bad. By 11:55am, we come back and the sign changed to 2pm?!? WTF!? I'm starving and they push the opening time later. :/ Never coming back...

5VY5l4L7mba9E8zXl96L5g.text: Ordered the filet mignon nachos and 2 chicken tacos. The tacos were completely bland and the nachos were good but the meat felt like it was stewed, had literally no flavor. Didn't care for the tomato salsa on the nachos either. It was ok but I was really expecting to be wowed. Very disappointed!

E9l5WYH8C8jSX1NO1BjXbA.text: The food was awesome and the portions were large! The chicken tinga nachos were FULL of flavor, layers, and cheesy goodness.   The shrimp and filet mignon fajitas were awesome too-- they server lights them on fire tableside, which makes for a cool experience.   Our waitress was covering a lot of tables so she didn't get to us very often and we were left without plates or napkins for some time.   The music wasn't my favorite, but the food made up for it two fold! Very cool spot.

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Tinga Nacho

TXv_jEvpZLZ62IhrrzQgBg.text: Stopped here for brunch before we left town. The restaurant was nicely decorated and had a good vibe about it, staff was friendly and attentive. I ordered a Bloody Mary and it was delicious, however, my order of the Bacon-Cheese Enchilada Rancheros was less than appetizing. For me it was very bland tasting, I probably only ate a few bites and was done. My 2 friends both ordered the nachos (BBQ Pork Nacho & Chicken Tinga Nacho) both had mentioned they were good, lots of flavors going on so it was a little much.

7YzmBnTtCtafJiY9V2Zpsw.text: Super chill place that does one thing and does it well - serve up super dank nachos. Also with a name like Nacho Daddy how can you say no?  My wife and I sat at the bar which is always fun in Vegas as you can meet some really interesting characters. After sizing up our delicious feast of crab and lobster nachos, the two guys next to us not only ordered the same thing, but also bought their famous scorpion shot... now with real scorpions! I had a similar experience in China once, but that is a different story for a different time. I decided to pass on this one.  Overall a fun place which I would definately take friends to next time I'm in Vegas.

VshN5gswoQYperpskq_0vw.text: The food here is great!!!! Why I'm only giving this place only 4 stars is because the service here is not very great,which is a shame. I came here with my girlfriends and we all ordered our food at the same time and the never put in on of the orders. We waited and waited and still nothing. At the end the server didn't charger us for the forgotten meal but he seemed unhappy with us for a mistake caused by the employees... I'd come back here tho! Lol

LSn9s7X3RE5a6R5bo1MrmA.text: After a frustrating Uber ride, we walked into the restaurant and were seated right away. We were able to redeem our free margarita for checking in without hassle. We had the fiesta nachos and wings, and they were delicious. Our waitress was efficient and so on top of everything (it was 2am!). I will definitely go back!

5uktU9Us-OxhdZ96Ad9v-A.text: These nachos are unbelievable.  The BBQ chicken nachos are the top menu item we had.  Great mix of toppings and plenty of food for a meal.  The cheeseburger nachos were also good and very unique.  Get the corona margarita to top it all off with the mini corona bottle mixed into the margarita.  Others in the group had the fajitas and said they were great.  The experience with the fire next to the table was cool and worth having someone order.

tbHNfBML2eFAWl1MJ2aJwQ.text: The vibes in this restaurant is very chill! The workers are super helpful and nice. The food came out pretty quick and it was delicious!!! One pro is that they had a menu for vegans and vegetarians. The food portions were a lot so I would recommend to share if you're also getting appetizers.
