Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ntE6p0WT7T30nQkjVEgFwQ.text: Rachel is the best server in all of Las Vegas. Came into Nacho Daddy on a late night (party of 6) and Rachel was very patient, kind, and understanding towards my family (who was a bit indecisive). My grandmother ordered a mahi bowl that was too spicy for her and Rachel went above and beyond to accommodate and make sure she was satisfied. Check in to yelp for a free house margarita. Will definitely come back again!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. lobster and crab nachos

AhvzmQ2vYbkCcEZUrk014g.text: The fact that I was staying at the Elara right next to this place was kind of dangerous. Lunch food, dinner, drunchies, whatever your heart desires, Nacho Daddy delivers (not literally). Irregardless, the food here was fantastic, and super filling because the portions were quite large. I had the Buffalo Hot Nachos and loved every bite, the little bits of chicken were great! Also the margaritas are quite nice to beat the Vegas heat. It's a huge location so you usually won't have to wait all too long and its well worth it for a good priced, filling and delicious lunch on the strip.

_bWb5CtFndzq_wluObmnxg.text: Good vegan nachos! Can't complain. For anyone from the Northwest, I don't think this place is as good as No Bones Beach Club vegan nachos, but as far as vegan food in Vegas, can't go wrong!

AHRxEeOfizjKqqMJGVHCew.text: They had me at "free margarita" with check-in!  Fun restaurant, right off the strip and the Miracle Mile Shops. Didn't wait too long and got a high-top table in the midst of all the action. Big TV/music videos screens. Pretty loud (so fine to bring your kids, but also a little painful).  The fajitas were plentiful and good. Not out-of-your world good, though. The service was just okay. Had to ask for chips, water refills and the check.   This is a good place if you're hankering for Mexican food that isn't Chipotle or Taco Bell, and is close to the strip and casinos.

JT9do8nLZnHgo1auNoteuw.text: This place is SO GOOD!! I first visited a couple years ago and got one of the nachos and I remember them being delicious. This time, I was not starving so I ordered shrimp taco appetizer and I was not disappointed!! The shrimp was very tasty and the salsa they put on top was so good. One of my friends got the vegan nachos and she ate them all! Also the margaritas were so refreshing, I just got the house one but I wanted to try the others! Will definitely be going back next time I'm in Vegas!

XMWkt8qMlaN_-9VZ08t3qw.text: Everything was amazing...the food, the environment and our bartender Scarlett!!! She is very good at what she does and brightened our day with her fun personality. Definitely coming back.

5_fHkd6N0xFfVfAB3XYhCg.text: Nacho Daddy is just off the Las Vegas strip on Harmon. Park in Planet Hollywood/Miracle Mile shopping parking lot, which is one of the last free parking on the strip. Easily walk to Nacho Daddy from the shopping mall.   This place is very, very, good and lives up to its name, "Nacho Daddy" The amount of choices is crazy endless. The portions of the food is crazy HUGE! Go here with a big appetite. Wash down the food with the good beer which, for a strip restaurant, is not too bad. $5 during happy hour, and $8 during regular time (16oz)  I ordered a appetizer, Endless chips and salsa. The salsa comes in 3 heats, low, med, and hot. The chips are corn chips made fresh on site and are very good. If you have a big party this is the way to go. If it's just 2 of you don't order this. Instead order the chips and guacamole. The amount of chips they give you is enough for 2 people and you won't be able to go through "endless" before your Nachos arrive.   For my Nachos,  I tried one of their Exotic Nachos;  Lobster and Crab - Butter poached lobster and crab, white queso, Serrano aioli, Mango pico de gallo, fresh Jalapeno, and Sriracha on top of house made corn chips. $23.95  All the flavors were noticeable in this dish. The serrano aioli, the mango pico, everything. Most importantly, the lobster and crab were plentiful.  Every bite had ample amounts of lobster and crab. They do not go weak on this dish. When the Nachos were finished, I was still eating lobster and crab off the plate.   I am glad I am a Vegas local. Now I can come back and try all the other Nachos. One last thing, the service was very on point and prompt. I can't wait to come back.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster and Crab Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Starting out with endless chips and salsa

guwE8Xf7K9h4u-XAeL6uRw.text: Vegans, vegetarians, carnivores, and pescatarians there is something for everyone! It's very rare a vegetarian or vegan has a portion of the menu dedicated to exactly that but NACHO DADDY IS THE ANSWER because they have just that!! The nachos are INSANE(I opted for the vegan and it was sooo good). They are LOADED! The vegan chocolate cake is just  WOW I can eat that everyday! Hands down the best vegan cake I have ever had. With my check in I got a free margarita and IT WAS SO GOOD!! I highly recommended any type of nachos or margaritas here! The fried avocado tacos were also BOMB! As for the whole scorpion thing, as an animal lover not really into a dead scorpion in a drink/shot or the live scorpion at the entrance in a cage but whatever floats your boat. STAFF IS SO NICE!! I'm definitely going to come back here next time I'm in Vegas ! Reviews definitely live up to hype! Highly recommend!!

tbGm0Ni2K7mx6qlzf6dOcw.text: Holy hell, if you like this place you clearly don't have taste buds, or taste for that matter.

m9BeC3ilHJfTYSb5k9penA.text: Food so good, but the service was horrible. Maybe I'll try another location . Our visit felt like we were not wanted .    Again the food was awesome .

ZZRhpN3RwsZciJuwNq8lvg.text: Fun spot, great food!! Bryce was fun and personable!! He makes a great margarita!! Check in and get a free house margarita. We split the filet mignon nachos and it was a perfect meal prior to a night out! Will definitely come back to try all the different nachos!!

a2_V3-aItiQOivYmWkuh6g.text: Best place for yummy drinks and late night snacks!! My favorite place on Fremont. Don't forget the all day breakfast and the awesome waitstaff.

QL3HABhiwKWO4dugSTM_8Q.text: Great setting... open air ...roll up door.  Enjoying the free drink and remarkable nachos!  Bartender Sierra spot on and extremely friendly.  Oh, did I mention the scorpions?  Wife defines as "interesting place".  Take the time to visit.  Sierra is worth it!!!!!

6G29ab71iMOFwKXxfRS2cw.text: I was back in Vegas and decided to give this place a second chance because the food was so good. As we were seated, we told the host (who turned out to be the assistant manager) about our first experience. We had excellent service and the fiesta nachos, quesadilla and fried ice cream were amazing!! I just wish there was a Nacho Daddy in Cali :)

ZfM42uPfKcrj242Q0-0xng.text: Found this on Yelp whilst looking for nearby Mexican fare.  Judy was our waitress and she was knowledgeable, enthusiastic, and helpful.  We ordered based on her recommendations from our delicious margaritas to the super nacho and sizzling shrimp tacos.  You will not be sorry if you give it a try.

oJh13RLSgax-IgHYdhxwpw.text: Im a local and have been to this location about 3 or 4 times now. Service is always pretty slow, takes about 20 minutes to get the drink order every time and they're always short staffed. Love the food and the fact that they have a vegan section on their menu... but this time around I ordered a vegan chicken taco salad and was brought a salad with actual chicken, and when I had it sent back they brought me the correct order but with real cheese. Other locations around the valley are great.

PUVlh4-woJilAbLqc5wfwA.text: Salt and sauce. That's what I remember.  Food is not good when there is too much salt and sauce.  This place is a chilis wanna be. Trying to be hip but it just did not work.  Service was just ok too. The location is horrible.  Off strip. You gotta wanna go here and I don't wanna come back.

H2Q-YAQh8Ts4CSj4P658Wg.text: Let me start off by saying the food was amazing. Drinks were right on point! Best part of it was our waitress. Short little thing named Gabby! She was so sweet, very helpful and fun! She really made our first time here a great one!!! My Hunny buns and i will be coming back soon! WOO HOO to Gabby(waitress)!

AdmCt-CPIpAngxC2I_txfQ.text: This place is awesome! Had the best blueberry margarita and avocado tacos! Everything was amazing, especially our server Hazel! 5 stars for sure!

3da8JivR63LJfXo6QoO3cg.text: Amazing food but the worst service. They seated other before us after we waited. Then the server only gave us our drinks and we never saw here again. Couldn't even get another drink. We waited a long time before we saw someone walked by to ask for our check. We then saw our server basically sleeping at a table.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Impossible to get service since our server was sleeping.

a0uohmUzQA9aD7_H9U7Umg.text: Found this place last minute. Free house margarita w/check-in and the food was awesome. Portion sizes were very large all around.

FHXnWwiRgOYl1a-_QMXtkg.text: What an awesome experience all around. This place is new and hip. And the food is delicious. We came here on NASCAR weekend. Tried Friday night and it was 1 1/2 hour wait. Made reservations for Saturday night. Came here with 8ppl. The food is very fresh and everything is made daily. No joke every single person in our group enjoyed their meal. The nachos are by far the house specialty and they do it very well. Chips are bottomless all you can eat. The guacamole was fresh like it was just combined in the kitchen. If you can ask to sit in Ryan's section. He's the hardest working waiter in the joint. Free shot of any liqueur you like as long as it has a scorpion in it. This place has really great food and atmosphere. It's just off the strip so it's super easy to get to. No doubt Nacho Daddy will be a top stop every time we are in town. Oh yeah, full bar.

n4rptDTfFCELvxYcOnSSbQ.text: Decent food. Unfortunately not great service until the end when we were saved by an amazing waitress. But fun atmosphere and love the indoor/outdoor feel at the bar area.

Rw33iUnfARsmicbg__hPNQ.text: So honestly, most of the service here in Vegas has been pretty sub par.. UNTIL we came here to have lunch. Victoria and Gerhard were amazing - super attentive and pleasant. We'll definitely be coming back any time we're in Vegas. Also the white peach margaritas, nacho average burger nachos and the enchilada nachos are superb. They also have mobile phone charging bricks for people to use. :) Definitely come here!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mmm nachos. Nacho average burger nachos, enchilada nachos &amp; supreme nachos.
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. White peach margaritas

FoxWfj1ffAauXA9WGqcs5Q.text: This was our first meal out during our recent trip to LV.  Easy walk from our hotel, seated right away.  2 in our party, had GREAT service from Arienna! She let us know about a free margarita if we checked in on Yelp, so we did! She gave us great food suggestions, with no rush! Decisions were tough because it all sounded so good.  We shared the kale salad and fish tacos- delicious!  Fresh! Creative! fast! The food was beautiful and tasted great.  One down side- I wanted to eat and talk, not feel like I'm at the club.  I know its Vegas, but if I wanted to go to the club, I'd go there.  Highly recommend.  We got carry out later in the week too, yum!

be7YMmw_eGnVwINtHd3usQ.text: We ordered the chilaquiles, shrimp nachos and a taco.  Chilaquiles weren't bad but the rest won't bring us back. Service was 5 star though; cute gal with black rimmed glasses (sorry, forgot her name).

zvRFubYV8meqb_K0hyGTIg.text: Bachelorette party got started with free margs. Jovany was a great and accommodating server!

A810zINSVu9SOFVnlcF3ng.text: We got the filet mignon nachos, beer and free yelp house margarita.  Nachos were very good, toppings on each heaping layer and the steak was very flavorful.  The margarita was good and strong.  The atmosphere was great and I would recommend this place to anyone!

mx65vfh__zQy6lNnTnUmQA.text: Triple Dip apatizer and Chilequiles were amazing!!!! Our bartender Cerah was absolutely amazing too! Very attentive and made strong delicious drinks! Will defiantly be back.

rRhldTw7n7hkvQ_IssYj-g.text: I ordered the tortilla soup, and nothing else. Place felt dirty. Soup was great though! Seems like a run place, with lots of special nachos, creative! So yeah, if you need a meal, do it! Lots of people outside who will follow you until you give them your leftovers.

RzI2GzRe7q3QiBXvt_MpXA.text: For a touristy location I was really surprised at how good the nachos were and the margaritas. Wait staff was awesome. All in all a great meal.

U1Z6yreYS-orIWD5MnYc2A.text: I'm vegan and I love that they have a full page of options on their menu. Their house margarita is also really incredible. I've been here twice and I've never been less than completely satisfied.

mTGeWPnY1INQ_xqU3kwgjQ.text: Wonderful place, great food, my server Vince was very excellent!!!! I will be coming back. Cali burrito n shrimp tacos were amazing thanks Vegas

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. House

yBB_r83TkujghHXSVoVziQ.text: Quite a novelty place. The teens who work there didn't seem to pay attention because of the service is only fair. Seems like a fast food place with some bells and whistles. Not bad to try once.

TyBleRNqoZZFw_tRVJMp3Q.text: Probably one of the best nachos I had. Also, it was so cheap! I went during happy hour and ordered off the happy hour menu, it was 10 bucks! Definitely recommend if you are making a stop in Downtown Vegas.

duOO4vn6UiRflCo9zE3-EA.text: Sooo yummmy had nachos and my buddy had enchiladas so we swapped and both soo delish ! Customer service was meah but not bad .. an exciting environment to take friends after work ..

KpXcGZBMs397hzApgx6IIA.text: Great place! Great Food! Great Margaritas! Love this place first time here. Will be eating here frequently now.

kcSenmMrDfUhCemmAP0nbg.text: love this place and the scorpian is a tradition for us. Highly recommend nachos and margaritas

6e-0KEZMdSvexPMs2snJzA.text: Tried it on recommendation from an uber driver, and was not disappointed! Great food, awesome service, delicious drinks. Will definitely return on our next vegas adventure.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Amazing food and service. New favorite Mexican restaurant in Vegas!

34SmEXuVkzgfsTIcO4RMVg.text: This has been my favorite restaurant in Vegas so far. Lexy was our waitress and she was incredible. The triple dip was delicious. Shared fajitas for two and the flavor was amazing. Scorpion shot was expensive but worth the unique experience. Also, free house margarita with a yelp check in.

aulkbqF1fB5rMlbWp9CI5g.text: This is my favorite stop every time I'm in Vegas.  Fillet Mignon Nachos...  3 words that will change your life and definition of "Amazing Nachos!"  This most recent visit deserves a review due to the fact I had the most amazing bartender Sandra!   Sandra is simply the Best-is-tists ever! Super friendly and fun to talk to on a chill Tuesday afternoon.    I come back for the amazing nachos... i stay for the amazing staff who I love chating with while enjoying a cold Pacifico that they wisely have on draft!

ApQdM-c6oeuZ2KSGnpu0Jg.text: Someone told us about this place. Glad we came here. It was fricken awesome. Got BBQ chicken nachos to split and they were delicious. Wife got American Tacos , she enjoyed them and I got the grilled fish tacos and they had an awesome taste , tender and juicy. Very good value for cost. The service was also very good. Shame there isn't one in Los Angeles. At least when we come here it's a place we know. Will be back for sure.

qswJi-zRyjfbqzBKCeKAcw.text: My favorite place we visited on the strip for a meal! Completely awesome food, atmosphere was super fun, service was the best we had in Vegas and drinks were delicious! Will hit this place up whenever we come back!

JttptF2k_hQJQ_36-KG8tw.text: Fun atmosphere with solid food. We had the tostada nachos which is plenty for two people. The topping proportion was huge and delicious. We also ordered the mixed enchilada plate. It was okay but definitely not TexMex (speaking as a Texan).  I would stick with the nachos ;)

bhJ3u9Llho2DzOTmRdI-sw.text: I am in Vegas and found this restaurant on Yelp when I searched for vegan restaurants on the Strip. The service was friendly and we received our food in a respectably short period of time. I'm sorry to say- I received the wrong meal- I ordered the vegan chimichanga but received the vegan kale salad instead. The waitress apologized and I ate the salad rather than reorder. It was really delicious- the vegan chicken was so tasty and it had avocado and various other veggies with an agave citrus vinaigrette. The 4 stars is because of the order error- because I was really looking forward to the cheezy chimi! I'm still in Vegas for one more night- so it's possible I'll stop in for a chimi  later

sYSjFijt4z6Vz1XobqtEXQ.text: We ordered all the mini nachos and street tacos and they were delicious and definitely worth it. Kudos to Dymond for providing a fantastic and friendly service! We need guys like him in Seattle! He made our first experience the best ever and we will definitely come back because of the the food and his wonderful service.

S9lQGT0rNCvj7N158gMmXA.text: Awesome nachos! We had the filet mignon and it was a huge delicious pile! The service is great too.

-UQUdL7OV21eA3jmPHJJdg.text: Nice looking and friendly barmaids and great nachos. Go for the steak nachos and ask for extra salsa. Great looking restaurant as well. Right around corner from Planet Hollywood.

cnA-K2GXXVgaTpg2NUEdBA.text: Omg this nachos are addictive!! Me and my hubby come here like every weekend the thai nachos are my favorite! Can't get enough of this place highly recommend.

F4z82I6Tu-a3dBtnjzDh0Q.text: Good spot right off the strip.  Came in for breakfast early in the morning.  Very good authentic mexican food at good prices, considering it's in Vegas.  I ate at the bar, and the bartender provided good service.  I used the yelp check-in to get a free margarita.  I substituted mezcal for tequila.  The house mezcal they used did not have that strong smokey flavor I was hoping for.  The house sour mix was ok, but you could clearly tell it was some sort of mix.  I would return again for the food, but would not order a margarita here.

OIYdq99j0ZI2ZqfZykPj7g.text: Great service! Jake was awesome and very helpful with the menu options. Great atmosphere and most of all great food. The music and at atmosphere is really cool and relaxed. The menu has a variety of options to include an entire page of vegan options. The female restroom needed a little TLC, one sink was broken, the lighting was dim and stall doors are old and worn.

mVDAeFVJ3QecysCB-EPr5g.text: It's awesome that there's a whole page of vegan options, including an incredible chocolate cake (for which we returned twice). It might not hurt to diversify the meat-alternative options a bit, but the chick'n was certainly well prepared. The chips could stand to be thicker as well, though a certain degree of saturation kind of comes with the territory of loaded nachos.

t3xHEWohZDi_Ftg2ZuX09g.text: Fun spot for yummy food! We ordered the spicy shrimp nachos and the chimichanga. Both were super tasty! Fresh, pretty fast, no dry chips and generous servings. We shared these two things and are glad we didn't get an appetizer. Great margaritas too! My husband loves spicy things so the spicy cucumber jalapeno marg was a hit! I had a white peach marg and really enjoyed it! Hands down best fried ice cream we've ever had.  Fresh and delish!

8oAckGC8y7NaDDAhrnejGQ.text: Very good. Love the crab nachos with lobster. The atmosphere is fun, and not too crazy.

I do feel like it's pretty expensive for Mexican food, it's not like it's super high end or anything. The servers are usually really nice and they are open pretty late so it's a decent late night option for sure. It's just not...amazing?

47umiI_2-P9wmE-p4rZc8w.text: I loved Nacho Daddy! It was a great experience! I would definitely recommend going here in Vegas ! I know I definitely will be a returning customer ! The food was good ! And a free margarita with a yelp check in !

We came at happy hour and got the BBQ pork sliders and BBQ chicken mini nachos which were fantastic! Great service too, Litzs was great!!! Definitely recommend and will return!

kxrbOyixNXdBrnUDbEKrJQ.text: Awesome happy hour, great food had the tacos(2) for $5, great bar staff, loved the friendly atmosphere, made new friends from different cities at the bar. Left with a smile on my face and would definitely visit them again once I come in town.

IhC-_ZcAswOckhBJ8w49OQ.text: I expected more lobster on the nachos. Over seasoned. Left most of the behind. It was not like the pictures.  Update: Thank you Taylor. The picture for the lobster and crab nachos are not piled high. There is clearly 80% more lobster and crab in the picture than we had. Ordered the DADDYS MARGARITA and a house margarita...amazing there is a difference. I like Daddy's much better but you get a free house margarita if you check in using YELP...greater starter. BV7QIDIUCO7AR23I8AfCIg.text: Huge portions, bottomless chips & salsa for a few bucks, and great quality food! Awesome white peach margarita and the nachos were amazing and enough more 2 or more people to share. I would definitely come back the next time I'm in Vegas!

Ylyv0suWNWkFz80ubKpn2A.text: Good food always worth the return. Filet Mignon Nachos were really good. Come check-in for the free margs.

RUEl0RZShlX4TtYYedXMIw.text: So-so nachos.   So given that the name implied that nachos were their specialty, I was expecting a great foodie experience. Unfortunately, after spending $20 on one order of filet mignon nachos, we realized (like many places in the strip area) that this place was nothing more than another tourist trap. The filet was over cooked and tough (which is the opposite of why you buy a filet to begin with) and it was covered in an awful salsa. Had the salsa been left off, the nachos would have been better. We also ordered chicken tortilla soup. It was supposed to come with chicken breast, however the chicken was left off but our server quickly corrected the error.   Overall, the food was good, I just wouldn't recommend spending top dollar on the filet nachos, and I would ask for the salsa to be left on the side.

gGrdHE-1BQZ_QnMb_omwsw.text: Food and drinks were excellent! This was my second experience at Nacho Daddy in Vegas and both times they did not disappoint. The first time I had the flaming shrimp tacos and this time I had steak and chicken fajitas both are excellent choices!! The margaritas are huge and delicious not watered down the white peach is my favorite!!! This is a now a must every time I'm in Vegas!!! Well worth the wait!!

Y0gbvrXXxBiEwxBaC16kMQ.text: Vegan options galore!  We shared the queso, kale salad, and spicy burrito. Everything was great. The dressing on the kale salad was amazing and that was one of the best burritos I've ever had. Good margaritas. Loved it. Can't wait to go back!  Staff was good.

tOWWvuLLB89HP8EnEWk8Ng.text: This place has good food at a reasonable price for the strip. The service is great. All day breakfast (which is great for waking up at 1pm in Vegas), but I love the name! You don't know me.... I am Nacho Daddy!! :-)

-YiS6uKTr3LjRaceqEnKuw.text: What a bust! Just went in because yelp reviews claim vegetarian friendliness. While they have a VEGAN menu this place is the worst for vegetarians. So little help from the hostess or the bar. Nothing is marked vegetarian on the menu - tho they have an icon - and even their chips and salsa remain unmarked. So unless you're a carnivore or don't eat cheese I would avoid this place. Also service was awful. It took at least 15 mins before I could ask about vegetarian menu items... overall I'm just so disappointed...   Service: 1 star. Vegetarian friendly: less than one star.   That's all I can attest to because we left.

g0U7XwU7w-FRFZLV2DUFSg.text: I wasn't sure what to expect but this place rocks. Nachos are excellent with lots of toppings without being too greasy. The house margaritas are spot on without too much sugar that makes you feel sick and even get one free if you check in on Yelp! Service was really friendly and I'll be back here for more nachos or maybe give an entree a try.

vXXkTbZPVzvqH5AI4iDG1w.text: Can't say enough good things about this place!! The food is amazing! The service is outstanding! Can't wait to go and do the scorpion shot!! I will be a regular at this spot for sure!

mbHiDja9YDBFBPafg-Fwcw.text: Nacho Daddy is our favorite, go-to place in Sin City! We stumbled upon the location in downtown last year and found that they opened this new location off the strip.       On this trip to Vegas, we've eaten here twice.   All of the menu is good, as a large group of us have tried multiple food choices!  Being from Texas and getting chips & salsa as an appetizer with your meal for free, is the norm. Here it is not. So we bought the chips & salsa appetizer. They make three different in-house sauces and two of the three we really enjoyed. The mild and the hot are excellent salsas, but the medium just didn't cut it for us. We enjoy the Naked Grilled wings in buffalo sauce. They are quality wings with lots of meat!  Let me also rave about the white queso dip! It's basic, but really good.  My wife loved it!            For this review, I only took pictures of the meal that we ate this time. This meal was the Hot Buffalo Chicken Nachos, which are chips covered in queso with popcorn chicken that has been tossed in their buffalo sauce. Then they drizzle a ranch dressing across the top, add some celery, some green onions and, wallah, you have spicy nachos! On our first meal, just 2 days prior to this review, I had the Nacho Average Burger Nachos, and they were delicious.  Others had the Filet Mignon Nachos. We all drank buy 1 get 1 free margaritas, and they were excellent.       The service is great.  The first visit we had Mark as our server.  He was very attentive and quick.  Great personality.  On this review visit, we had Victoria as our server.  She was great.  Very bubbly and sweet. Outgoing and willing to get what we needed. There is also a food Runner / assistant named Humberto.  Let me tell you, this guy was fantastic! I told the manager, Mikey, that Humberto was a great employee and Mikey appreciated hearing that about him.       I very rarely will give five stars, but Nacho Daddy on the strip in Vegas is well deserved. I even went as far as telling them they should bring this restaurant to the DFW area in Texas. If you're ever in Vegas, go check them out. I don't think you'll be disappointed!

hr-hP2F3mp0y-N-se2BEzQ.text: VEGAN WIN!!! My fav spot in Vegas, hands down. I usually UberEats or Postmates bc it's well-priced and comes to you anywhere on the strip super fast... to your hotel, the pool. Anywhere. I get the chick'n fajitas or loaded nachos, but the shrimp nachos and burritos are amazing too for meat eaters. It's also a cool vibe and great spot for drinks in-person.  Cassandra is the best bartender.... super nice and solid drinks.  Pineapple Mint margarita is BOMB. Vegan and meat options for everyone in your group. Eat here. You won't be disappointed.

2beDLnANQfTiIyLiocPYoQ.text: This was the first restaurant we ate at during our visit in Las Vegas. The food was great although I liked the ground beef enchiladas over the chicken enchiladas. Our waiter was cool and even suggested some cool places to check out during our trip.

d7GgStcvFbNFJWiWLXf7mw.text: Amazing nachos and the margaritas are well balanced. The service was great! A great stop for happy hour.

XHLN1hGCqnTzfSTevCNyRQ.text: We were seated quickly, and service was excellent. Litzs was our server. She was awesome! I order fiesta nachos based on her recommendation and they didn't disappoint!

2B3x92qmqqgItmkL_7gSCg.text: Litzs WAS AMAZING! Came in for a friends birthday we were already in a good vibe and she boosted us up with scorpion shots and house margaritas . Very great service and recommendations !!!

316zBFyOPUKd8GLGBINy_w.text: Nacho Daddy was delish! My friends and I stopped by after arriving late in Vegas. On a Wednesday, there were limited late night options. I had researched this place before our trip, so I pretty much had an idea of what I wanted to eat. We all ordered different nacho dishes and margaritas and tasted each other's food. Hands down, the best thing we ate was the thai chicken nachos. They were a smaller portion than the other two plates we had (tostada nachos and barbecue chicken nachos), but they were extremely flavorful! I was very impressed by this dish. The margaritas were good, but (unfortunately) not too strong. They were also very sticky from being overfilled, resulting in the drink running down the side of the glass.  The Famous Scorpion Shot: I ordered it. I thought I could drink it, Scorpion included. That didn't happen. The Scorpion looked tiny in other photos and videos I had seen on previous reviews. I assure you, it is not! It's about an inch and a half long, served as a garnish on top of the lime. I asked the server how to eat it. He said he preferred chewing. That wasn't going to happen. Then, I thought about swallowing it whole. So I dropped it in the shot, thinking I could swallow the whole thing and not even flinch. WRONG! Once I put the Scorpion in the shot glass, it magnified the size. Now it looked like a yellow and brown monstrosity, and all I could think was, "This thing has got to come out of me at some point." I chickened out and grabbed the nearest fork and fished that sucker outta there! I did, however, drink the entire shot of tequila without flinching. I should get some credit for that.  My friends mentioned we were there to celebrate my birthday, and the server didn't hesitate to offer me a free shot! That was pretty nice. I definitely didn't expect any freebies in Vegas, on the strip, during a holiday (Halloween) weekend. Overall, this restaurant and service was great! And we talked about those thai chicken nachos for the rest of our trip.

zyKkeXJiUH9wzi1FwNwTtw.text: Love this place! They have some amazing food! Every time im in Vegas I will stop here! And pricing is not that bad

kM1jjgqy8vkqawVQoKxDgw.text: Delicious! Ordered the spicy shrimp nachos and spicy cucumber margarita.  Waiters were nice as well!

26XFag160KWMrDxkiX3xvQ.text: This is such a cool little spot. We sat at the bar and they had the garage style window open, which was really nice. I started with a white peach margarita and it was SO good! I had to restrain from chugging the whole thing right away. My husband got the blood orange margarita and it was good too (a little tart for my liking). I then tried another margarita that was one of their specials. I don't remember the exact name, but it was something sunrise related? It had fresh raspberries and agave. It was delicious! And these margaritas are enormous!   My husband and I shared the appetizer street tacos. We got the lobster and crab variety. They're served in doubled corn tortillas and with a delicious corn salsa. So yummy!   I ordered the supreme tostado nachos. Seasoned ground beef, shredded cheese, yellow queso, refried beans, pico de gallo, fried jalapenos, lettuce, avocado lime salsa, sour cream and guacamole.  Amazing! Honestly we probably could've shared these as well. It's a HUGE portion!   My husband got taco-enchilada combo with chicken on both. I personally would've ordered the mojo pork simply because I prefer pork, but I tried a piece of the chicken and it was very good! Super tender and juicy and very flavorful!   They lose a star because we waited a substantial amount of time for our food to come out. And our appetizer came at the same time as our entrees. We also received our food after the people next to us even though we ordered before them. Not the end of the world, but I'm talking 30 minutes we waited. Luckily we had our margaritas and fun atmosphere to keep us entertained   We will definitely be back in the future!

7Pe46Dgm9jk4Kndf92_mJQ.text: Nachos are sick--in the best way!!! So delicious and filling!!  The food was fantastic and the Cadillac Margarita tasty!!  The service was very good!!  Would definitely come back and highly recommend!!

1CnOeDpp6JRTnPw9O7TSag.text: Very cool look to it inside,  rustic industrial style.  Staff was friendly & comped our app because they forgot to bring it out until we were almost done eating, very nice of them,  we didn't expect it & just wanted to try the food! Food was good,  a little on the oily side if youre health conscious. Overall I'd recommend it for some tasty eats!

HFCR5uSTMhNGOw0urWdjvQ.text: The food was really good. Highly recommend the sampler dip it comes with salsa guacamole and cheese dip with a side of chips. I got the surf and turf taco plate and I only ate 1 taco because they were pretty big. To drink I got the house margarita and it was ok not too strong or light. Happy hour is on the week days and I cannot get enough of those pulled pork sliders and strawberry margaritas! Keep up the good work. I'll continue being a loyal customer!:)

pBHxC9hFtHA6lKGNxh6Vsw.text: Nacho Daddy won me over as my favorite restaurant in Vegas.  We had a blast with the Scorpion Shots.  I came back to Phoenix bragging that I ate a Centruroides scorpion and didn't get stung... my toxicology friends corrected me and pointed out the type I swallowed actually is not a Bark Scorpion and am not quite as cool as that (apparently the shape of the tail was the clue).  Our group took the shots together, and one of my friends made the mistake of chewing the little bugger... don't do that.  Margaritas were excellent, nachos were killer (one of the best bangs for your buck in Vegas - try the shrimp or the filet mignon nachos!), but honestly the service was even better.  Audre was our hostess and was absolutely amazing.  We actually came back a second night during our week-long stay to take more scorpion shots, mainly because of the friendly atmosphere.  It feels like a nice local bar in a small town, and it's able to avoid the flashiness that covers the rest of Vegas.  Keep it up Nacho Daddy!

a15fN8dbfell0Ze9FZKC3Q.text: Food, drinks and service were excellent! Our server Cala was awesome! Highly recommend a visit to Nacho Daddy on your next trip to Vegas

3ZTH7fahgw-RgloVY-kwsw.text: Yum!! I consider myself to be a nacho snob. Excellent flavor and the chips were awesome.

Ix1Ab49HdtQ4p-zFGgM4SA.text: Absolutely love the vegan options especially the vegan queso!!! Service was great and I loved the ambiance, also awesome that they're open late. Only thing I'd change is bringing nacho daddy back to Henderson lol.

jKkXlKMTDoMm7E0lw3nOdw.text: Great food at this place. Had the triple dip and a la carts tacos. Michelada could've been better but still no complaints. Servers were all nice and attentive great time great food

lOh7J8H2SWtP7UCEG79nNQ.text: OMG!!!! This place is awesome! We had the guac, quest and chips. Very delicious!! Then the Thai Chicken nachos. Best nachos I've ever had. Lots of chicken and delicious sauce. They will getting in my belly at least one more time on our trip!!! Our server was Ryan and he was great!!!  Went back for a second night of Thai Chicken Nachos. Just as delicious as the first time!! Our server Victoria was beyond amazing!! So bubbly and friendly!!  It's a must stop in Vegas!!  Had to go back one more time for the breakfast! Our server was Daria. Again, another amazing server. What a ray of sunshine! I ordered an orange juice and she asked if I wanted ice in it. No one has ever asked me that before. I always want ice in my juice. Yes.....ORANGE WITH ICE IS A THING!!! Great breakfast, great service, great place! Sad it's our last day,. Would have liked to try dessert,

RbUx-V3ZM3aIURGIa4HGVg.text: Stopped here on a Wednesday at noon - zero wait and had food and drinks within 30 minutes of sitting down. AEYrH27-7_LZjlb1ohQ29g.text: What a fun way to begin our Vegas stay.  We were served by Jovanny and he had us all hyped the hell up. We started out with some great drinks he recommended and he also brought us out waters with our drinks. I LOVEEE when servers do that and I really appreciate them knowing without me having to ask. To eat, I had the vegan nachos (yes, there is vegan options here!!) and my boyfriend had a giant ass burrito (literally), while my friends had some Filet  Mignon nachos. All meals were satisfying and definitely great portions. We will be back next time we are back in Vegas and hopefully the service is just as good and gets us just as hyped. The perfect warm up for the strip!

VubgXSPXD6wT6TIjA5meGw.text: This place is my new favorite. The food was amazing and our waitress Kristen was so nice and attentive. She did a very good job taking care of us. Our food came out a little late, which we didn't even notice and Kristen provided us an update and let us know that they had discounted our meal because of the delay. Thank you for the wonderful food and great customer service.

x_Z5rN45s5oO8ljWx7drJQ.text: What a great place. And how can you go wrong with Nachos? They even have a self-service Craft Beer dispenser. The staff was very helpful and friendly. I wish there was one where I lived. I guess for now I'll have to enjoy Nacho Daddy when I visit the in-laws.

80FRZiaYW9Tgk2uG4jtmkw.text: The staff was super friendly and nice. I waitress Darla was a sweethart. Are drinks took a while to get to us, so they were comped.  We had cheese enchiladas and the chicken street tacos with some watermelon margaritas. The rice was a bit dry but they rest of the food was okay.  They have a decent vegam selection, more than other places on the strip. I would come again

P-3nV_6uZbf0rms27JgHvA.text: I don't even know where to begin. First off, the 5 star option doesn't do this new restaurant justice.  I would do 10 if I could base it on the same scale. I was so impressed from the moment I walked in. Jaylon greeted us with enthusiasm and character. From that moment things were over the top exceptional. We sat down with an ambience that I could only imagine will be perfect for a Friday night. We came on a Saturday afternoon so it was quite relaxing. This is where we meet our server Mark. Mark was the BEST server I have ever had hands down. He was funny, lively, and went out of his way to make our experience here the BEST it could have been. He was prompt, precise and engaging. I had an issue with a coupon code for another nacho daddy and he corrected the issue with NO problem.   The food: oh my gosh. We first got the triple dipper which was frankly okay. I love queso so I was most excited for that, which is the reason for my okay status. But the triple dipper didn't even matter once we got our entrees. First of all we only wanted one basket of chips (even though we were offered a refill) and by the time we picked up the last chip our food was arriving. I would like to say thank you to Ruben for running the food, he was just as courteous as Mark and treated our table with respect. He and Mark were more than we could have asked for for exceptional service. So the main courses. I NEED to talk about the street tacos. This is a MUST. If you're a Tex mex connoisseur like me, you know NEVER to order chicken from a Tex mex place you've never been to ( for those who may not favor this type of food as much as me, you don't because it's typically dry). It was DRIPPING with juices and I was shocked! My friend ordered them because I was steering clear of anything chicken because of the previously stated reasoning. I regretted not getting them. They were so amazing and flavorful. Side note: EVERYTHING besides the guac was peak perfection for flavoring ( guac wasn't bad, you just had to add a little something like salt which I thought was thoughtful for people with salt sensitivities). I ordered for me and my friend to share the filet mignon nachos. They were so delicious and the perfect plate of nachos. I went ahead and added the queso from the triple dipper and there was no going back. We didn't have room for desert but it was so good without it.  Overall: I am so pleased that I chose this place and would recommend it to anyone, I even raved about the place to the couple that walked in as I was sitting at my table. My hope is that they can make their way out to LA soon so I can get the chance to experience this restaurant again!  Thank you to Mikey as well for leading a GREAT team!  - edit : the margaritas are from God himself but be careful because they taste like juice and they will creep on you!

My boyfriend and I are gluten free and dairy free, and we love Mexican food. We got the vegan queso, which was delicious. We also got the filet minion nachos, they were very tasty but did not have much meat. I got the free margarita with check in and our waitstaff recommended other vegan friendly area restaurants. We will definitely return in the future.

-paf7n0DjIQP-yZtS_VQuw.text: Absolutely delicious! I loved the filet mignon nachos and the house margarita. I think they use pineapple in the margarita which made a huge difference! The service was also great! It's just 10 seconds off the strip, sort of behind the Planet Hollywood mall. So much better than any food in the mall! We will be returning!

-cC9-el3Qs3qzPjDtrq2Fg.text: Awesome experience. Though it was a little confusing to get to, the whole space is very inviting. Loved the 80s music videos playing on all the screens at the time. Staff was SUPER friendly.   We had the Triple dip to start, it was a great appetizer with queso, guacamole and salsa. We also tried a couple different margarita flavors but personally I loved the mango.   As entrees I had the signature tacos with pork which were gigantic! It comes with two tacos absolutely stuffed with meat. The tortillas were really good and fluffy sort of like Cafe Rio's. My favorite part of the dish may have been the rice it was SO good.   I also tried the buffalo nachos. Definitely would be a good hungover or drunk food but I got pretty full at that point! The last thing we tried was the churro sundae which came with two churros and three scoops of ice cream. I feel like they could have reversed that with two scoops of ice cream and three or four churros. The ice cream seemed to melt before we could get to it.  Overall it was an awesome experience and I think people will have a really good time here. They also have scorpion shots which I witnessed but don't think I'll be participating in. Good times, great food and drinks!

XFnOxJV5PG6vL_3zpPx9Kw.text: Wow. First time here from California. Great food at awesome prices. Sat at the bar & our bartender/server Chase was friendly and super helpful. Very extensive vegan options to choose from. I highly recommend this place. Will be coming back here soon.

H1ttgBgWt00qdTAFrr4d5w.text: Great food, cool spot. Our server Ryan was super helpful, just a great guy. Would definitely come back

5EXBu7b08TXQ14x9llUQzQ.text: We stopped in to grab a late dinner. Sat at the bar. Didn't want anything too expensive and read the decent reviews . We had the steak nachos (split between 2 people) and they were ok. It was a large portion but Not a ton of steak considering they were $18. The salsa on the nachos tasted more like tomato sauce than salsa. Looked like the staff was still figuring everything out. Wouldn't go back.

fWO8CiwsRS8GtwEv3i5g6g.text: very good nice friendly service and the food was excellent my only complaint is that its a little pricy

977zlsB9j9megiOxpv467Q.text: Eh. Great reviews so we decided to give it a try. It was OK. Certainly nothing nothing to write home about. Will not go back. Waitress ignored us most of the time.

u6hzAuWkNy7Y4etBtPuc4w.text: Came here for the scorpion shots and ended up staying for the food.  Our table ordered nachos (figured we should order some since the name of the restaurant is Nacho Daddy), tacos, enchiladas and chips and guacamole.  We were seated at the bar and served promptly.  The bartender (Cassandra) was awesome and made some great recommendations.  Definitely try the blueberry margarita.

9MZecxp-yr-eK1HUe6yWHw.text: This place is awesome Gabby is the shit great margaritas great nachos good times with my boys good times with my girls everyone wins  PS ask for Gabby

G4jm4jhn7sFnzzGPObbffQ.text: This is our second visit to Nacho Daddy and it's one of our favorite places to eat already. The food is excellent and the service is even better. The Nachos are a MUST when in Las Vegas.

Wii54WjxeH253MNl5tuzhg.text: Awesome margaritas. They have a cool af scorpion tank.They also have scorpion shots-which is cool. Very gourmet nachos- but also other food like enchiladas and burritos if you're not into nachos. Awesome good stuff- the Shrimp nachos are the best.

d7qI616xkkxcU6hqqGtzBw.text: I'll leave 3 stars because of 2 big reasons. 1 service at first was horrible the door guy checked me in ... I don't know if there was suppose to be a hostess there or not b/c after he sat us he went behind the bar to bartend. I waited ... And waited ... And waited, until about 12-15 min later the same guy walks over and asked if we have been helped.  He apologized and said he would tell his MgR, and so he did.  He took great care of us afterwards. Food was great and delicious.  Drinks (I got micheladas) were on point and really good too!  The waiter promised me he would take care of 1 drink and my appetizer.  I thanked him and told him he was great and maybe someone was having an off day that I understood.  The 2nd part comes in when I get the bill, he took care of my appetizer and 2$ extra but not my drink as promised.  I would have been ok if he told me he was going to take care of my appetizer only, but don't tell me your going to do something and not do it.  That's the worst !   Worst part about the experience is it was dead, so they had no excuse on the amount of time to attend someone.  Would I recommend it to someone ... I don't know if they have service like that maybe not, but the food is really good!  I think the Mgr should have been out on the floor helping if they were short handed, or whatever the case was.  I saw a few employees just standing in the back just staring right back at me ! WTF! That is another management problem.

axLRpJkjgssTEbVUSciYlg.text: Love this spot! Seriously the food is great and so were the staff members that helped us out! Danny and Arnold were great and had us laughing the whole time! We will definitely be back

xzqFHakyGL544tHPg1FfqA.text: This place is good, reasonably priced. They have an entire vegan section and GF options which is fantastic! Drinks were good and service was great. We had a great time at Nacho Daddy and were very pleased with the value we received for our money!

BSdDpeRZN58pniD22a5b9A.text: I would give it one star, but the nachos were really good. Aside from that, me and my bf came in on a quiet night and there were only a few other people in the place. For some reason, it took us 20 minutes for someone to take our order. This blonde guy was scurrying around, but he wasn't doing much and he finally took our order and disappeared. We waited an hour before we got our food (which was really good), but even people who came in after us got served before us. It was disappointing because it was dead in there, but our server SUCKED!!! Then we paid cash, and he didn't bring the change and said "you don't want the change right?" Excuse me? Weirdest guy ever. And we bought the over-priced scorpion shot, and no one made it a huge, cool deal like they made it out to be. The weird server brought it out and walked away. Weird. Good food, but I wouldn't go back unless I was drunk and could stand the wait.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Over-priced scorpion shot!!! Whooooo!

l1-n7VKyiua4gkt8hN72mg.text: Do not go here. The meals are so salty, you won't be able to eat your food. They advertise as the best margarita in las vegas however it is sub-par.  Just your average tasting margarita and extremely salty food that has no flavor other than salt. The service was mediocre hence the two stars.

BsxC7JOMpym20QSHOydU4w.text: Let me first say that the service provided by our server Job was excellent. This review is solely based on the food and drinks we had. The margaritas were nothing to write home about. Margaritas are my thing and theirs just didn't cut it. The Thai Bowl was ok. I needed to ask for more sweet chili sauce to get more flavor. Hubby got the smothered burrito, which he enjoyed.

lvUsYxDBD9MgiF7WCFi3SA.text: I came here on taco Tuesday and had the chicken tacos. Sat outside in a nice chill atmosphere. Our service from Mark was fantastic! I'd come come back for sure!

jcHh3TX4j1qOMpWRXMu-cA.text: The food is delicious. Doing a scorpions shot was fun. But please note that free margarita doesn't mean free. After we received our drinks we were told we needed to order an entree to receive the free drink so we had to change our appetizer to a meal. It ended up being ok but I just don't like free not meaning free. Plus there's nothing  in the print that says a meal is required so that was annoying.

Kv_fKovmNZRmKy-zWHNVQg.text: Awesome nachos. Service was fast and polite. The bottomless chips were amazing. I had American Tacos and they were delicious. All 8 of us got something different and not a single negative comment. Even our non Mexican food eater got really decent burger. We will definitely eat here again.

KIzLYTmc2pO1W6B40XEP3Q.text: This place had great service and my server Magahan was great and just what I wanted a few days after returning from serving my country. Thank you for making this a great meal

jGubA_q9hKHFSXPG_ZiGUg.text: Ryan and Kimberly took really good care of us!!!! Ryan was very friendly, handsome and accommodating!!!! He had a lot of patience with us and treated us very nice. I highly recommend Nacho Daddy and the Scorpion Shots!!!!!!

iFQ8IfyuwzaWXYl8xFSyYA.text: I'm not sure if it was just bad timing. Multiple servers dropped their serving tray and spilled things all over when we were there. Service was also quite slow. Our margaritas were very inconsistent even when we ordered the same thing. One glass taste like juice and the other taste like it's pure tequila. The food also didn't impress me very much.

tUeGSOb5suaI_4G5pJSOLw.text: Visiting from LA have heard nothing but great things about this place. The food was everything we hoped and more, the service however was some of the worst I've ever received. In the span of over an hour we saw our waitress 5 times total and We only got our drinks refilled once(after multiple requests). When we wanted the check she was no where to be found. We tell the hostess "we can't find her and we'd like our check split" and she tells us to tell our server. So then we flagged someone else to get our waitress to get our check. Our server was Hazelynne I'd say avoid her section but we saw another server waiting to finish her texts before she brought put people food. So I can't imagine any of the other servers are any good. Very disappointing because the food is excellent to bad there's no standards for customer service.

K9xpVkyqSq1zGen1vCmjTQ.text: We came in at 11:30pm on a Friday night n were seated right away...It wasn't too crowded but it took a long time for our food to come out...I like the horchata margarita n the white peach margarita...My friend got the spicy pina margarita but it had a weird earthy taste to it...The filet mignon nachos were good but a little too salty...My friends ordered the fish tacos n chicken sandwich n said they were good

8OiSY4xtDvSnD7XVKJxRXg.text: I had a great meal here. Between the manager and Judy I was taken good care of. I had the moco loco nachos and they were perfect for after a night of drinking.

P6Thm07wY1sWThAlX7SQhw.text: Went to Nacho Daddy late night. Our waitress was very nice and sweet. She was very patient with us as we were doing more talking then looking at the menu. They have a variety of vegan options available which was a plus.  I went with the 4 cheese nachos and added black beans. They forgot to put the Queso on my nachos.. not sure how you forget that when question tends to be a big part of nachos. The waitress was nice and brought me queso on the side when I brought it to her attention.. Had to take off a star for the queso mistake as the navjos we're good, but the queso is my favorite part lol... I definitely suggest Nacho Daddy and will go again.

ynDZY_g7dbsMRKdmX1SgTg.text: We spent one week in Las Vegas in July, and man does it get hot! Nachos are my all time favorite food, and Nacho Daddy delivered on two out of three occasions. The first two visits were perfect and would receive five stars! From the server to the food quality it was A plus, but then we returned on a Tuesday morning, and all was not right with the world. First- tables were dirty and not bussed. There seemed to be only one waitress and she seemed overwhelmed. The worst thing was when we asked for the Supreme Nachos and were told there was no beef?!!! I should back this review down to two stars, but the first two visits really were perfect. The four cheese nachos and the nacho supreme would bring us back when we return to Las Vegas.

59PSDACpJy71Fx-5cAaRxA.text: Great gluten free options! Enchiladas nachos are divine! Cadillac margaritas hit the spot during a football game or anytime! Try the corn on the cob, though! Friendly service by Tyler...even though he's a broncos fan. Go Hawks!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yummy food and drinks. Tyler our server is a delight!

4Mer5je50klRCM57QekjcA.text: When we got here we got fast service from Serena . She was amazing and very helpful. UnfortunatelyI got gum that was stuck under the table on my new shirt. She was so nice to get me club soda but it didn't work . Her manager Peter offered to give me one of their t-shirts , have mine dry cleaned , and pay for my nachos . Best service u ever had . Most places don't care . Definitely coming back

QepgxBVw1GRhbJRyrwLmmw.text: This place was amazing ! The first time I was there was unfortunately during the mass shooting but I went back the next day & even thoe you felt the hurt in Vegas , the employees at nacho daddy made it feel better. Btw our waiter the night before really honestly saved us , don't remember her name but she was awesome!! Try the tacos  and the margaritas were amazing

uYuKuLK5LGKX94WQxyMf0w.text: Desi was my bartender/waiter. Very fun and excellent server! Loved her! My crew and I had an awesome time  Food was awesome as well as those drinks

2azfbXwg3YlYRAvOSUCmRw.text: My 4th night in town and I was looking for something off the beaten path, less expensive, and just fun. This place fit the bill and more. The waiter, Ryan guided us through the margarita choices and nachos with real insight and knowledge. The price is half what I would have spent a block away on the strip and the food and drinks were great. A must visit for that casual fun night.

ZQqHUjYrIa4B0_jxa4VipQ.text: Was just OK.  Not terribly authentic. Pork taco was good.  Chicken enchilada was passable but dull.

OHcjhcLMd25dxx_t-PvX8g.text: Absolutely delicious vegan options! We ordered the Kale Salad and the Loaded Nachos (both vegan) - the kale salad was REALLY fresh and had a nice light dressing (maybe vinegar, sugar, lime, chili seasoning?). The vegan nachos were totally awesome and nobody would ever know they were vegan. I'm thrilled. Also our server, Ryan, was really friendly and helpful.

3enWeYLHfF3MEwDO2VnT8g.text: We were seated outdoors and Jovany was extremely friendly and gave great service. Free margaritas with checkin! We got the filet mignon nachos because we were craving some bomb nachos.

04me5QHIAc_9akenzMyfpQ.text: This place was great! They have so many different and unique options for nachos. I tried the thai chicken and my husband tried the buffalo chicken. Both were delicious! In addition there are many other items (mostly Mexican) on the menu. Our waiter was very friendly and attentive even though we had a large group of 8.

a5WeRfgbQOoFOhyrXEYOCw.text: Looking for something different on the strip and found Nacho Daddy.  The staff was friendly and very attentive.  Ordered the triple dips which is salsa, guacamole and white queso.  The salsa and guacamole were good but the queso was da bomb.  Ordered the bacon, egg and cheese enchiladas from the all day breakfast menu.  It was good but it would've been better if the sauce was actual enchilada sauce not salsa.  Overall a good experience.  Next time I'm trying the nachos.

PHE416DfhPw1jtKjlgUKCA.text: Great place! Happy hour til 6pm and amazing nacho selection. Great location with drop off for Lyft. Kimberley is the best!

t5hDw5JmRSs4-jjqtgjv_w.text: The All American Cheese Burger W/Cheddar Cheese not American Cheese and Garlic fires are so fricken good I have eaten them more than once.  Even home delivery from BiteSquad or something like that.

dmpa7kghxkDFr4bJKA18JA.text: Terrible service from Cassandra sitting up at the bar. Waited 20 minutes to have my card ran, no waters, not interested in serving us at all. Food was ok but with service like that I have no desire to return.

R7LJLUb0sYClEfd-Of1Jfg.text: Run-of-the-mill chain Mexicanish food and not that great of beverages. Look elsewhere for a family Mexican establishment.

bs2fy7DZM91xd4SssHPrDw.text: food was good and the staff was nice and attentive.  at first i was a little thrown by the bugs in the tank at the entrance and realized they were the scorpion's food.

obHZzMRxMzirqdf2JdTDvA.text: Stopped here for happy hour- some of the best happy hour prices on the strip! Good drinks and bartender was great too. 2 margs, nachos and street tacos and my bill was $20; Can't beat it in Vegas!   Food was delicious, I had the Burger Nachos and chicken street tacos. If you're not an onion lover let them know, luckily I am. Looking forward to visiting again soon!

kM0fkM22aoTvre_mW8UbnQ.text: This place was great for what you were getting. The serving staff was very friendly and seemed like they all enjoyed working there! This place is very vegetarian and vegan friendly plus giving meat eaters a lot of choice of American Mexican food. I had the crispy avocado street tacos and they were very delicious! My husband had the American tacos and was pleased with his meal as well. You get a lot of quality food for the price on the strip. I would recommend anyone who doesn't want to leave the strip but is looking for a good deal American Mexican place!

2b0j9fxCjcNSxTaUz_C9nQ.text: I felt that the prices were a little high. Our food was just mediocre. My husband ordered the $24 seafood nachos, and they were certainly not worth the price. Our service was average. If I could make a recommendation, it would be to offer different sized portions of nachos with variable prices. For being a tourist location, it doesn't allow many the option to take "leftovers" back to their hotel room, or to sit in a car all night. I would've preferred a smaller portion versus wasting food and $$.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

QrlGCYQ7dm02IHMgQtYIIQ.text: When they say they do not believe in a single dry nacho chip, they are not lying. They spread everything out beautifully. Our server was such a sweet and nice girl. (Kelsie) Our enchiladas were delicious and not overly seasoned. And they carry Coke products here instead of Pepsi which is amazing. All our our food was out within 7-8 minutes. This place is not over priced. Definitely will come back my next time in Vegas!

MiqpGfoJghG8wUdeIrVgAQ.text: Lobster nacho was on point. The toppings also had mango so it was different but good different, I liked it a lot.   We also got the chicken and pork tamales, the chicken was good. The pork one was a little too salty.   All the staff were really nice and fun. Went here for a quick bite before day club so didn't get too much food. I will come back to try more nachos!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pork tamale
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster nacho

y7j6os6rPTYfJ_DCYGGZfw.text: This is the best mexican restaurant i have ever been..nachos too good..we were big group and everyone enjoyed and loved it..

sOTCb3YYes3sU6rf7MgwxA.text: So I read the "consumer alert" about this place and I hesitated before deciding to come here. If a place has to write their own reviews to boost up their star rating, they must not be doing something right.   So I came with a good amount of awareness that this meal may not go very well, but much to my surprise, I had a very pleasant breakfast. We had a mad hankering for some nachos and this place seemed to fit the bill.  Our server was prompt and willing to give us lots of recommendations. She did have a hard time explaining the switch over from the old beer list to whatever they had on tap now. Either way, the pale ale being offered was good.   The supreme tostada nachos were plentiful and came out all gooey. Quite the site to see.  The chilaquiles were so good! The tortilla chips were not soggy, even though it had the enchilada sauce tossed on it. The chicken on it was so good too!  Also, they have a great Yelp check-in deal! If so inclined, You can even pay the difference for better tequila in your margarita!  Honestly, this place was awesome! No need to post their own reviews, just keep dishing out those awesome nacho dishes!

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme tostada nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Daddy&#39;s margarita!! Very delicious!

XHocSWmic-zolDVb3O1e4w.text: Delicious nachos and a free margarita with check in! Great atmosphere and friendly staff. Highly recommend!!

aQWP6UHHNXpNyxzOrdOuZw.text: Lookin for places in Vegas that we're vegan friendly. This place has a great selection of Vegan food and taste great. Would highly recommend.

JmxqUfKKRtKcjZ_ToN-3kg.text: I went here on impulse with my sister and we loved it! The house margaritas we got from yelp check in were tasty and strong. Lots of good nacho options that we're delicious. Would recommend if you need something fast and easy!

-VKK0XYlIJSYEiEJBj0SvA.text: Great place to eat if walking split a chicken nachos & was good for the 2 of us nice place staff.

eytZB-YDQ7TnjukIJnpq8A.text: Very intimate place that you can enjoy a nice meal that won't break the bank! Queso dip is a great appetizer and the Fajita bowl was more than I could eat! Definitely recommend for small gatherings! Very friendly and social staff! Drink was never empty!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Queso Dip appetizer

E9PoLTOI9uy74tEcoJsPnQ.text: The nachos were really good especially the white queso w jalapeno! The atmosphere was cool and happening. The only thing was the service it was slow, hence the 4 stars. The waitress didn't come by and my water never got refilled.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Dessert
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vege nachos

T3RURgs8lCLA86xmeIvZeg.text: Nacho Daddy is hands down THE BEST nacho place EVER! All their location are equally great. I've been to all of them multiple times. They have sooo many different types of nachos that there is definitely a style to please everyone's palate. They also have a plethora of flavored magaritas with real fruit muddled in. They are to die for! 2 of those will get you feeling real good!

Am45XnBPUr_9JArocf3dNA.text: Wait time here was long, and very inaccurate from the hostesses time estimates. She was adding on ten minutes to every party that signed in, by the time we got to the front it was a 40 minute wait. We waited a little over 20 minutes before we were called, which was ok, but I'm sure they loose business by people going elsewhere bc of the inaccurate estimates. When we were seated, most of the tables were empty! We were almost immediately greeted by our server who took our drink orders... Thought that was a great sign of a good server... Boy was I wrong. The rest of the time we were sitting there, she was literally running past our table and completely ignored us every time we tried to stop her. It took about 20 minutes to finally track her down to take our order. A runner brought out our food, we needed to ask the busser for a knife and cilantro and another server for our bill. Our first waitress finally brought the bill, but then never came back. After ten minutes, I walked the check and our credit card to a manager at a computer and told him we just wanted to get out of here. Five minutes after that, our waitress came back go ask for our check. The food was good, we had the vegas knights nachos and the filet mignon was super soft but the service was incredibly terrible

TM6sGb1EgJj1y4e19MZlBA.text: Nice place to come have a chill and relax dinner came here on a Sunday before we headed out to California. Good service and food. I had the chicken enchiladas and we also tried the chilaquiles both red sauce which were good both came with rice and beans.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

f5LNotr-57p94Tm3NOhwSw.text: In Vegas for my 21st Birthday and I am so glad we were craving nachos. BEST NACHOS EVER, hands down. Every chip had a generous amount of toppings giving you the best bite every single time.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Z5YCf4QmrCheGLMwElZiPQ.text: It was so bomb! I really enjoyed my food. The platter waa huge, it's enough for two. Not knowing that, my boyfriend and I definitely had to take it to go. I got the supreme nachos and he got the bbq chicken. It wasn't a long wait at all. Definitely worth to stop by!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BBQ Chicken Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Nachos

bpSfBQPljrQ-xMM50m4TZg.text: This place was so good! The chips alone are so yummy, we had the ceviche and the fajita nacho (nacho of the month) my hubby and I definitely enjoyed eating here. The nachos were so good, the service was amazing. Our waiter checked on us all the time, made sure we were taken care of. I definitely will be returning for the quality and taste of the food... the great service, cleanliness and fast service. We spent 5 min waiting on our food. I would give more stars if I could.

mBnOK4coWJmsOe_rZlHjRA.text: I've been here twice, once after my wedding the service & Nachoz were fantastic.   Great choice, will definitely be back!

kAWwO6kxa5RwLkPy71pOuA.text: Terrible service!!! Our waiter who we will call man bun because he didn't introduce himself was the worst. He avoided us most of the time ( probably cause we had children with us) had to be asked for a water refill when it sat empty for ten minutes. We waited almost fifteen minutes for our check and another ten for our change. As someone in the hospitality industry I expected better service from a grown man instead of him acting like a teenager. I understand that it was a Saturday night and things were starting to get a little busy (but there was no wait) but you need to step up and do your job a lot better.

jLOoUvWwNkzkqy1wODRIeA.text: Great! Food was good and drinks were awesome. Good ambiance and friendly staff. I ate the filet mignon nachos and chicken burrito.

EuNjoKgwwBZZH78TPYzqHQ.text: I wanted to give a great review. I am vegan, so I can say the food is delicious. But I checked in on yelp and got the free margarita. It was so sweet, I couldn't drink it. I told my waitress and she brought me another one which was worse than the first. I told her it was sweeter than the first and her response was "at least it was free" and didn't offer to help me get a margarita that was correct.  Not the right response in my book, especially for a place giving a free margarita to check into yelp... which is a place for reviews.  Vegan food=good

7Xt6JogwOo0LmCAmXCdw6A.text: Went in for chips and salsa, the cheese dip was really good the salsa was good not great we got the hottest and it was lacking. The staff was very nice and welcoming from the moment we walked in they asked if they could take my drink into the cooler instead of asking me to toss it.

sc8P4yB0sSUGZRcN-WU6Kg.text: Omg the nachos was amazing!!!  If u near by you have to try!! We sat at the bar because the place was crowded the bartender he helped with questions .

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Amazing!!

Mw9ABf-mdsWar0bHzjef9w.text: Amazing service!! Food was absolutely delicious as well! Drinks were yummy. We all had the best time ever. Everyone in there has the most exceptional customer service my whole party was so amazed. This place is definitely going to become a regular outing for us.

-ZOyrUFD7eizpUS7NuPjAA.text: Kimberly pointed me to the pork taco and enchiladas. Fantastic choice!! Buffalo nacho mini hot the spot as well.

lx2YSh0ndAxE6Py-ZKP-yw.text: This was one of the places my boyfriend and I had on our list to check out for the past 2 vegas trips. We finally got the time and it definitely didn't disappoint. We got the burger nachos and the lobster and crab nachos and also was able to get a free margarita for checking in via yelp! We sat at the bar and Our server, Arnold, was one of the best bartenders we've ever had! His cool and calm demeanor makes you feel like you've known him for years! We could tell he was super busy but that didn't stop him from being attentive and answering all of our questions about the menu! We will for sure visit again. Thanks Arnold for all of your help!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

SXE6J845ioTcQbU0gsvqiA.text: Love the fact that they have a great vegan menu option , servers are very attentive and knowledgeable !

r0Z8AcEegghikAcLjZJR1w.text: I've passed this place many times saying I was going to try it. I can't believe it took me this long, will be back. Super friendly staff

4xaEzX12BpOKKwXvOE_m5g.text: Great atmosphere and good food. Definitely liked the filet mignon nachos, my wife and I barely finished them. Plus when you check-in you get free margarita which was actually pretty good. Our waitress Allison was awesome.and very attentive. The reviews were the reason we came here and we're not disappointed at all. Definitely would come back here.

t43-gWk91QQ6ca3zsCn9TQ.text: An establishment completely dedicated to nachos. Tons of choices, great melted queso, and plenty of industrial feel. This place is on Harmon behind Planet Hollywood next to Buffalo Wild Wings.  We received excellent service from Jovany and he explained a bit of the building's history (it used to be a club called Crave). Well it's 2017 and honey, This place is still popping at all hours of the night.  Music videos play on all the screens while you enjoy the numerous cocktails, nachos, tacos and many other Southwestern and Mexican fusion dishes.  With an airy layout, open kitchen, music videos playing loud and a generally upbeat and curated vibe, they have carved out a space where they can serve out Nachos to impress.

8J2rtksUIFhNNT7aPT2OcQ.text: Yasssss! This place is amazing. Not only is the food delicious but the specials are amazing. it was bit hard to find as I was circling the Miracle Mile mall trying to find this place but then realized that it was outside. A man was handing out coupons for free margaritas with an order of an entree....SCORE! My ultimate goal was to try to the seafood nachos but I decided to go with the carne asada tacos as I didn't want to seem like a complete hog. The tacos were amazing and very flavorful. The bartender was a complete sweetheart and made sure I was taken care of. I'm coming back to Vegas in April and ND will definitely be on my list.

eN_O-k2UaFFBCqsZdmwgsw.text: This place was pretty good. I would have to rave about the queso! My friend ordered three orders of it! I had the bbq nachos and it was delicious. I would've liked more BBQ sauce but I really try not to be a picky customer. I will definitely be going back on my many trips to Las Vegas.   Also! If you're already on Yelp, check in for a free house margarita!

xIRySz4iO64RNoeuMnTj3g.text: We came in on a Friday night with a large group, to include 4 small children and a couple "tweens". They were able to accommodate 10 of us in one space, We were seated quickly, service was prompt and our server was courteous and stayed on top of our orders, drinks and desserts. The food portions (for children and adult meals) were a decent size and we left with several to-go boxes at the end of our meal.

zm7bcjfr4gYM01qDVkoMZg.text: Breakfast nachos are the best after a rough night of drinking. The staff was very friendly and accommodating.  The bloody Mary gets about 3.5 stars.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mmmmmmmm

-CW-QCBrF3V3A3QfTA2pRg.text: The beer flight was tasty, however the nachos left a bit to be desired. I has the filet nachos and it was a bit flat in flavor for the steak.

wHXLY8myb5Ctgg3_3h5MWQ.text: Great food and service. Had the fiesta nachos and smothered burrito for brunch following a crazy night at life is beautiful. Delicious and big portions. Staff very helpful with the menu. No complaints!

UMRt4S1Lmw_wSYnIUO5t8Q.text: Great margaritas! Can get a house one for free if you check in on Yelp! Tacos pretty good. Queso + beef REALLY good!

oWMQbQ2OXSGXpbpcOoPadw.text: More like nacho dinner ever again. Good atmosphere but food selection and execution were disappointing!

Y17rqGo_--jTZeSCrQDfSw.text: Went here for the nachos but ended up getting the American breakfast and it did not disappoint! Great portion sizes and awesome food! Excellent sausage and perfect after a night out! Also got a free marg after checking in on yelp which was great! Would definitely come back when in Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. American breakfast!

794C_KaAmyLwPTq5xJo_Kw.text: Visiting from Maryland and if you love nachos or tacos, this is the definite place for you.  The customer service is out of this world!  If you are staying at any surrounding hotels, Uber to the restaurant.  When I visit Vegas again, I will be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. NACHO DADDY HEY!!!!

vkh5Yk9FmzR2-jThMNVUJQ.text: We landed pretty late in Vegas and were pretty tired from a long trip. Nacho Daddy was really close by our hotel (the Marriott) so we decided to give it a try by walking over.  It was my first time here, so I decided to get the Supreme Tostado Nacho (per our waitress's recommendation)  The supreme tostada nacho is what you would typically expect from Nacho supreme from Taco Bell, it is ground beef based, guacamole, sour cream, cheese, etc.  The size of one nacho plate was definitely intended for 2 people or more The cherry on top was that we even received two free house Margaritas for doing the yelp check-in!  Overall, I was very happy with the choice to get nachos from here, the staff was very friendly :)  Would love to come back to try some of their exotic nacho dishes!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Tostada Nacho and house Margaritas
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Tostada Nacho and House Margaritas

GxGQjGVPXd-pxos04VEx4g.text: After a long night, i needed a great breakfast burrito the next morning.  My first inclination was to go off strip, but my need for speed was more important than desire.  I walked across the street to Nacho Daddy.  Immediately i had high hopes for something good.  The restaurant was very well decorated and calming and I sat at the bar and Andy introduced herself as my breakfast saviour.  It was early and the place was happily quiet, but it was very comfortable sitting at the bar.  I ordered the breakfast burrito and a greyhound.   I waited patiently for my food but sipped on my delicious drink.  The burrito arrived and it was definitely worth waiting for.  Everything was put together perfect . . . fresh eggs, crisp bacon, rich cheese, and crispy hashbrowns.    Top it off with the most delicious (very unexpected) and spicy salsa and jalapenos and i was in heaven.  Definitely what i needed and will now desire.  So, conversation with Andy kept going and it turned towards tequila.  She hooked me up two delicious shot and set my day up perfectly for gambling and more drinking.  Peter, the manager, and I had a great conversation too.  Next time i go to Las Vegas and I am looking for Mexican food, Nacho Daddy will be on the top of my list.    I hope that Andy and Peter will both be there!  Made for a great experience.

Epl07t5LejaAqlMuQ8UjYw.text: The BEST nachos (and Mexican food in general) I've ever had in my life! My friends and I ate there three days in a row during our trip to Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margarita

EYPUk3baEhNjW6PG1dnogw.text: We ventured quite a way down to get here from our hotel. The good reviews were too enticing! It did not disappoint! We checked in on yelp to get the free house margarita, we got the triple dipper (YASSS, must get! The queso is out of this world!), the filet mignon nachos, shrimp tacos, and a few other items I can't remember. All of it was fabulous though. And reasonably priced. A must visit!

aoH78CcQHS83XwC5wsjL1g.text: Decided to check this place out due to their amazing reviews. It's didn't disappoint! I ordered the sirloin steak nachos with Chimichurri sauce and it was soooo delicious. The nachos were sprinkled with Oxacan cheese which is one of my favorites. The atmosphere  is casual and comfortable. Overall had an awesome experience with some awesome good.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sirloin Nachos with chimichurri sauce

2ZhpysbapO-TReh5o4QfFA.text: Place was so GOOD! The filet mignon was literally filet mignon, not basic meat haha.   Everyone else loved their food, price was good as well! Food was worth the money!  This vegas trip was definitely good filled and glad this was added to the check off list, been to Vegas over 20 times and passed by this place a lot but never been.  Glad we finally got to come here after all this time.   Big bar and big kitchen! The wait time wasn't long at all, food came out fresh and under 10/15 mins.   MARK, our waiter, was awesome, super friendly and funny! Glad he helped us out.
