0J8gfawNbc7NC7eI8A-abw.text: Amazing place for some Tex mex! My favorite thing about this place is their vegan section. They offer just about every regular option with a vegan twist! Which means so much for us plant based people who like to still eat real food and not sides. I get the vegan chick'n chimichanga. It's delicious! This place does get pretty busy around dinner time but they still seat you pretty quickly. Be sure to utilize the one free house margarita yelp coupon! The house margarita is kinda sour, like tarty. It's not the best but you get one for free. And if it's free, it's me! The location is very convenient. And I have no complaints about the service! Definitely try this place!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan chick&#39;n chimichanga

ys0A9rGGxdMRfyckpqB0FQ.text: The waitress was prompt and very friendly. She recommended these nachos. The spice on the chicken had a nice heat to it. The pickled onions sealed the deal. Loved these nachos. 10/10 would eat again.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

p0ShbrXrCy_vks1JH7xwQg.text: Cinco de Mayo in Vegas?!?!? This place is a must today and any day.  Great food, wonderful service, and nice music.

XIqrhVZ4PMyL6179-N1RFg.text: Wow, this place rules! Found it on Yelp and convinced my group to join me for some delicious food, we were not let down. We got seated quickly for it being a busy night at a spot on the strip. We had an awesome bartender at the bar who made the experience even more enjoyable.   We started by getting free house margarita's with our Yelp check-in, they were strong and delicious! The chips and salsa were great. The vegan chicken quesadilla was unbelievable. We questioned whether it was really vegan, we were so blown away. This was our favorite dining experience of our whole trip! DELCISIOUS!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Chicken Quesadilla- a meal I&#39;ll dream about forever

VSewcJlsRC6mSTLo8VhBUw.text: Good food.  Good prices.  We waited along time.  I loved the homemade tortillas. The waitstaff didn't come around much while we were eating and we waited along time for refills.

QeEVbmFfCjrB69CPpNBT-g.text: Check in for a free margarita!  We had great and consistent service.  The trio of dips, queso, salsa, and guacamole were delicious. Our table had the Filet Mignon tacos, and chicken fajitas. So so so delicious. The rice was great, and the veggies were crisp. I'd definitely return when back in Vegas!

OBV3V4BVhf0AnaqUJytTtg.text: Group of 3 got in pretty quickly (although we opted to sit at the bar to avoid a 15 min wait). Bartender/waitress was honestly SO NICE. 2/3 of us had strict dietary issues (vegan or gluten-free) and this place was AWESOME for them. SO MANY options and genuine concern on the waitress's part to meet their needs.  I got chicken tacos with rice and beans. The taco shells were DELICIOUS. Best of all, my final bill was $14!! CHEAPEST VEGAS MEAL EVER. I was thrilled and it was so tasty. Will definitely be going back for the tasty bites and great service!!

GgDpSCBLPPRzRJOH-a-Nyg.text: As we walked in it took some time before we were even acknowledged. We ended up sitting at the bar top since no one asked us if we wanted a table. The bartender wasn't super friendly but she did serve us in a timely manner. We ordered the hamburger nacho and added beans and shredded cheese. It was really good size portion and all the chips actually had toppings on them instead of just the top layer. It was pretty good and had great flavor. The prices were also really reasonable. I would for sure come back again.

48oqyx6h3HKnHIFtKLe4iw.text: Wow!  I am so full I have a nacho baby.  Amazing nachos.   Get more than one and share. Don't forget to check-in to get a free margarita.    Big daddy margaritas are good - get an extra shot to make it better.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Having trouble finding the location? Look for a sign.
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nachos!  Yumm!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fajita Nachos!

VIowxAGzRTEe9sPXAG_D0A.text: We decided to try this place because of close proximity to our hotel and its over 2K positive reviews. I mean what else catches your attention fellow Yelpers?  If you checked in on Yelp, you can get a free margarita drink. We didn't know that it was a specific one and that we don't get to choose the flavor. We ended up ordering more from the menu but sadly cannot indulge since we were heading out to a show immediately after dinner. The complimentary one we tried was really good mix.  We ordered BBQ chicken nachos and deep fried lobster tacos. The BBQ chicken nachos was YUMMY! It had the tanginess from the BBQ sauce, the chicken meat was good amount, and the white cheese added creaminess to top it off. All of the flavors married well together.   Now- I wish I can say similar great review to the deep fried lobster taco. Sadly, I cannot. Although it came with mango salsa and a slice of avocado, it felt lacking. It needed a sauce or cream to lighten up and cut down the deep fried taste.   Our server was nice and apologetic about the confusion regarding the margarita. That didn't really bother us. I wish I could have gone one more time to try other nachos.  Why don't you head over to the Midwest?!! I'm sure you'll be welcome!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

TvfVxf0vSUc1M3iDtZFq4w.text: Came here for happy hour on a Monday and its packed! You have folks watching the game.   All $5.00 Happy Hour from Monday to Friday 3:00 pm to 6:00pm but must sit at the bar or patio. We sat at the bar.  My friends ordered the strawberry margarita. They said its Very Good! I took my straw and took a sip of it and it was a little overpowering with sour and sweetness altogether. My go to Well  is Vodka and cranberry! On happy hour food menu you must get the Southwest Chimichanga which is very tasty.   I love the happy hour here because it's affordable and you can still ordered everything on happy hour menu and NOT go broke.  Our bartender, Alex I am assuming that's her name  (which I had to look up her name on her tank top ) service was not up to standard.  Our bartender did Not introduce herself to us  or  gauge in conversations or small talk. Not very personable or even a smile. After we put in our order and food  she did not ask to  see if we need anything else.  But our food and drinks came out fast. I get it if you may have a rush but after while it died down. Once we got our food the Bartender did not check up on us.   I felt I had to get her attention. I had to ask for our checks.   With that said I would just come out here for happy hour for the $5.00 happy hour.

eu8DB8xo_rytDNnWe71z-g.text: I had been craving Nachos the entire weekend we were in Las Vegas - of course when we walked by here we made a mental note to stop by before we left to satisfy the Nacho Craving. For the prices they charge - you would expect a mountain of nachos. NOPE. At $15-$20 for a plate of nachos - that are smaller portions than the $8 nachos at Dave & Busters and Buffalo Wild Wings - it was quite a disappointment. They have a lot of "specialty" nachos - which is great for the variety - but the prices are ridiculous. The waitress, when we asked about portion size, told us we could probably all three share 1 nacho order and be fine and full. We were so hopeful! We still ordered 3 plates of different nachos - no one left full - we all left hungry with no food left. Ridiculous. Go somewhere else for nachos. This was a waste of money.

VakSRiJPQwdG5RfZwzqJ2A.text: Wow! 2 of us visited Nacho Daddy on a Thurs pm, dinner time. We had a 15 minute wait to be seated, and the server greeted us within 2 minutes. We had Dean as a server, and he was kind, "with-it" and a great server. Our meal...house margarita (comp'ed with Yelp check-in), vegan queso app, giant side of pico de gallo (yum), and smothered pork burrito. Meal was monstrous and delicious. Service time was great for a crowded dinner time. (Make a reservation, it's a pretty tiny spot.) The bar had lots of tv screenage for sports with one screen on the restaurant side.  I'll note I liked the way staff worked together well, maximizing service efficiency. Too often anymore, servers minimize service for the section they work in, and ignore the guests next to their section because there is no tip in store. Not the case at Nacho Daddy. Kudos to the mgr and service team! If I lived in Vegas, I'd eat here, often. Our experience was great!

2Ww1uNXnzh-t88OTte5Eog.text: They need a larger waiting area considering they're on the strip and the wait time during dinner can be a bit long. If you're a local, I'd just recommend going to the other location. Parking and waiting is a nightmare. The nachos are great and they have the best vegan chocolate cake I've ever had.

eH7Fa2ZFm4iVlEGlN_GorQ.text: Back for a second time this trip. The first go was a little rocky, but the girls loved the food and the Assistant Manager Erica came in with the save...our Server MJ also helped to make the night better.  Erica absolutely made an impact so here we are back for round two already off to a great start. We are loving our server Miss Ryan.

y572Vq0XOfHfDxvaa5ItJQ.text: Excellent place. Great service. Nice getaway from the strip. Prices on food & drink are excellent compared to other places in or near the strip. The Thai chicken nachos were awesome!! Definitely go back again!

4ywP_8BO86NyRsMQhgD9zA.text: Nachos were good. We ordered the most popular ones. Something with tostada in the name. The check in for the free maragarita was easy. We didn't stay very long. Just split the nachos and had a couple of drinks. No issues.

atRznZEIR4IYpoCwM_KQDQ.text: This is a must for anyone who loves nachos! I ordered the enchilada nachos with red sauce and they were hands down the best nachos that I have ever had! I ordered the spicy shrimp nachos covered with beans, fresh jalapenos, delicious homemade salsa (with cilantro), and sour cream, it was scrumptious. My boyfriend ordered the breaded fish tacos with beans and rice, the breading on the fish was to die for. Definitely a must try restaurant... Enjoy!

wiOfap9ZFEAp8aQTlnJY4w.text: This was one my go to places while I visited Las Vegas. The best nachos I've had. The environment was a bit noisy, waitress was great, service was quick, and was inexpensive.

fsJJsivu49zJIrckxlm_eA.text: Had the filet mignon nachos and they were fantastic!  Huge portion that can be shared by a bunch.  This was our breakfast meal for 2.  Definitely need to check them out.  They are right off the strip behind Planet Hollywood so not far off the strip.

0IdDjxaceOWy7s0lagnR1w.text: This place was good, but definitely not for kids due to the music they were playing. The food was good, but I asked for the guac and sour to be on the side, but other than that it was good american-mexican food.

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nachos for the wifey.

9432gk6bWxP40zwlONe0Rw.text: I REALLY loved this place! We were out after midnight and i had a hankering for nachos. So we yelped nachos nearby and came across this gem. It is slightly difficult to get to this place because it seems like it is in the Miracle Mile shops, but it is actually outside and to the side. We had a tiny bit of trouble finding it. But that could just be our poor navigation skills.   Once we found our way in we were seated pretty quickly. Although the table was still dirty. They wiped it down right away and apologized. Not a big deal.   Our server was Chase who I believe is also a bartender. (I remembered his name because i have a toddler who loves Paw Patrol). Chase was fantastic! I personally cannot do tequila as it makes me sick. So i asked him besides margaritas what could i have? He told me he could make the margaritas with rum instead. I was so happy with that. I ordered the White Peach Margarita (with rum). My Hubby got the Nacho Daddy Margarita. They were big and tasted great! They each had 3 oz of alcohol.   For food we ordered the Vegas Golden Nights Nachos (Nacho Daddy). OMG! Incredible. These nachos were everything. A perfect ratio of chips to toppings. Piled with marinated filet mignon, provolone, yellow queso, sauteed onions, mushrooms, bell peppers and pickled peppers.  We added jalapenos.   I would go back to Vegas just for these Nachos. It will be very difficult to find something similar in California. Keep up the good work Nacho Daddy. We will be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Most amazing Vegas Night Nachos with added Jalapenos.
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. White Peach margarita with rum instead of tequila &amp; Nacho Daddy Margarita

nrsGSg-dy82S1C1Fd6KLFQ.text: Let me start by saying I live in Portland, OR, which is often referred to as Vegan Mecca. We have vegan restaurants for pretty much any kind of food you can think of. Not a single place in town has nachos that even hold a candle to Nacho Daddy. My husband and I STILL talk about the meal we had at NachoDaddy and it was 10 months ago. We also recommended it to everyone we know who is going to Vegas.   The server was super knowledgeable of the menu, and took a minute to show us where to find the vegan menu and explained what could be made vegan upon request.   I had the Loaded Nachos and my husband had the Spicy Chick'n burrito. Both were amazing. I want to try every vegan option they have.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. vegan chik&#39;n burrito
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. vegan loaded nachos

kBrMTiVQraJ0Myy5w8a4Kg.text: Delish nachos. Known for their scorpion shot, featured on Tanked. Saw they are around $20 each. You keep the shot glass.  We ordered the tostada nachos $18, hold the beef. This was our breakfast, shared between two hungry adults that didn't eat dinner the night before. We ate every chip and felt full towards our last bite. Great restaurant! I would go back.

AIXyZO3H6mIXr7a3yUgcHQ.text: Pretty nasty I guess I should've known not to order a chicken sandwich from a Mexican restaurant.   I promise you I've ate better ones from when I was in high school in the cafeteria . Also I ordered bbq nachos which were just alright but not a fan of this place. I don't know how they have so many good reviews I can't believe any are real after eating there.

TTgRmosgtYzkxZszDxi-Ww.text: Nacho Daddy is a fantastic place to come and grab dinner with a group before hitting the town! Loved the Nachos and the guacamole is super fresh. Drinks are strong and delicious and the service was super fast. Definitely a fan.

0GSkRbTe3OVbv4FVlEZL8g.text: BEST NACHOS EVER!!! Hubby and I did the Scorpion  shot and then Hubby and I shared the had Shrimp nachos on spinach chips. Talk about the best ever, WOW! The side of guacamole was the smallest I had ever seen and disappointed to say the least. Great atmosphere! Very spacious and clean inside.

-liAEIRfCfJ5_iAXPXKrpA.text: NACHOS will never be be same for me. SO good.  I ordered and split the filet mignon nachos. I ordered a side of queso and that really just made them that much better - if it was possible.  The pico wasn't all watery and chunky tomatoes & onions. The guacamole was perfect amount. Sour cream drizzle was devine.  The filet was cooked juicy, and not dried out.  The cheese and beans all blended together very well!!! Loved it. The name is hilarious as well.  You get a house margarita if you check in on Yelp - but you can also put that $8.95 toward a "nicer" margarita.  Definitely worth going.

8l_CCera8GaBSJ5mgq1SRA.text: OMG! What a good nachos. Unless most places nowadays that they just put lots of cheese and not enough of everything else, Nacho Daddy is not shy of giving you plenty of everything and that's what makes them so good!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Feasta Nachos with extra fresh jalapeños!

_wRtHzxz2PP6lACEq5Hjsw.text: All I can say is my mouth is drooling just thinking about coming back here. By far the most amazing nachos I've had in a long time. Perfectly crisp chips, balanced queso, amazing guacamole, and an all around wonderful meal. Highly recommend!!

oMlVErnfzhlL9VEt2RFsPw.text: I had low expectations for breakfast but Nacho Daddy surprised me. Their Huevos Rancheros was delicious, the service excellent and the prices light on the wallet. It is just off the Strip and that is often where you find better values.  They had plenty of vegan options and my partner was happy with his vegetable omelet. Me? I ordered mine with bacon. Yum!

qgJQI9yHTahZIoLId-iiiA.text: This place is awesome and has something for everyone on the menu! It's like the cheesecake factory of Mexican restaurants! Our friends had picked it.. I went and got the American Breakfast (because my stomach wasn't ready for Mexican food yet) and it was super yummy! Everyone at the table loved their food as well. Good portion sizes too! Our waiter made sure our drinks were always kept full and I ended up ordering some salsa & gwack before we left which turned out to be a great choice too!! The building was really neat inside as well. Just an overall wonderful experience! A must try!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nacho Daddy in Vegas is awesome! It&#39;s like the cheesecake factory but of Mexican food - something for everyone!! So good!

1cHTae7eYcCUDcGGjhsdTQ.text: Great spot for some nachos while in Vegas!  I got the crab and lobster nachos for lunch one day.  You do not need anything else after you eat these. I know it's a weird place to enjoy a cup of coffee, but I needed some! You know they've got good coffee when they also use french presses--it was perfect!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

P1OqjJ1lHVBE2MruJBGw5A.text: Fun place to try. Nachos are huge and delicious. They light the fajitas on fire. Very cool.

It1V9aTtBP6pm880wtwaMw.text: Saw the menu and read the reviews so we had to try it. There was about a 30 minute wait and we had to wait outside as their waiting area was full. Once inside we were well accommodated as one of our party was on a mobility scooter. Ordered the Mexican street corn off-the-cob, Supreme Tostada Nachos, and the Chimichanga. The corn was absolutely outstanding! If I could have it flown to my home, from Vegas, I would! The chimi and the nachos were good as well. The nachos were a little too hot thanks to the jalapeno but we forgot to ask to remove them. Still enjoyed our meal though. The nachos was a very large plate as well. The decor had an old bookstore/antique look about it; very laid back and cool. Definitely a place we'll be back to. I'd say our only issue was the fact that the waiting area was very small and when it's 108, it's a little tough to have to wait outside. Otherwise, we enjoyed our visit.

4Igfzl-qu7FoFzdG0nrA8g.text: Friendly service, extensive menu selection, well-built nachos and delish house margaritas, all in a fun, casual atmosphere.

LYKwSDBw_Tl6TSgoVuCDZw.text: To me food it's a 50% of my rating!other 50% goes to employe and serve..food was awsem, clean and nice resturant also I don't want to say there name but front lady and our waitress was super nice and helpful to us

CeeMpNjxjKmdxXGqS7CzZg.text: We drove 20 minutes and parked in the miracle mile and walked just for this place. Started off bad walking in with  scorpions in a tank right by the door. Not a fan as a vegan... the hostess and waiters were nice. But they sat us at a table that was all wet underneath and did not clean it. My feet were wet from having sandals.  We ordered the loaded vegan nachos that were pretty good. They weren't as big as other orders so we were a bit disappointed. Then we ordered the chimichanga and a salad. The vegan "chicken" was probably the worst we've had. It was burnt, and tasted like burnt dry chicken. Not even with a nIce flavor.  Meanwhile they have something called a scorpion shot which the table next to us were all having very loudly. Eating little scorpions.  Just because they have a vegan menu, they are not a good vegan friendly choice. With so many other amazing options in Vegas, I would go elsewhere. Especially with the prices.

lmzkLbNqUxmKmx0zVcWBtw.text: Everything was awesome, loved seeing an entire page full of vegan options on their menu.  Will definitely be coming back next time I'm in Vegas!

XAXkmpGnFQs0VLIXHjEHQQ.text: Hands down some of the best food I've had in a LOOOONG time! I think I found my go to spot for when I am in Vegas. Definitely recommend EVERYONE to check them out!

peo6Ie9Y4ZStXgKCnRKVPQ.text: Rachel was the BEST waitress I've had since being in Vegas. She was friendly, accommodating and very patient with our party. This was my first time here and I'll be back.   The food was great!

sHLVilfCscOeogQW51vF3w.text: Are you a fan of scorpions? Not the rock group, the creepy crawly creatures that have claws and a tail that stings its prey before devouring it. I'm a fan of scorpions but I never considered eating them. I have eaten grasshoppers and crickets but never scorpions. They have the scorpion shot for ~$20, depending on type of tequila you select. I ordered up one for me and the bartender. They are able to drink 2 a shift. Just chew the little creature first and then shoot the tequila. Don't worry the stinger is removed. Little chewy but nothing a True yelper couldn't handle.   Since it was Tuesday they had a great Tacos Tuesday deal. Tacos were dirt cheap and full of meat. They were probably some of the meatiest tacos ever. You could easily share an order or just eat the meat. The tacos don't come with too many extras, so they're a little plain. We also ordered the filet mignon nachos. Those things were bomb! Huge chunks of meat as well.   Service was excellent. Our bartender was very entertaining and knowledgeable about all the dishes and drinks. We also scored a house margarita courtesy of the yelp check in offer. I was a bit skeptical at first because the yelp page had a consumer alert warning for multiple positive reviews from same IP address but it was Tuesday and I wanted tacos.   I wouldn't bring the kiddos here. Cool spot to have date night or hang with some friends. Happy eating/drinking!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Taco Tuesday chicken tacos, $5
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Taco Tuesday pork tacos, $5
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon nachos

TnOFHrOIa68xsLZcDVSyFg.text: This was the first place we ate at in this trip and after a few hours on a plane and getting checked into our hotel, the nachos hit the spot! We ordered the BBQ pulled pork nachos and the hamburger nachos. I highly highly recommend the BBQ pulled pork nachos. Bother were delicious, but the pork ones were not your ordinary nachos. I highly recommend going. Three of us split two nachos and it was just the right amount.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nacho average hamburger nachos and the BBQ pulled pork nachos

o6hrGFldQm8N8qHs3yoO8Q.text: We were on the fence about where we wanted to go have dinner and thank goodness we picked this place.  I ordered the Tostada Nachos and my taste buds are STILL going crazy even 17 hours later. It was quite the treat. The portions are HUGE. I couldn't finish it so next time I will definitely be sharing it with someone else.   My boyfriend got the Shrimp & Lobster (maybe it was Crab) but he had a hard time getting himself to stop eating it. Lol he was so addicted! They gave him a free shot for his birthday.  It's a cool little place with so many different choices! Service was great, as well. Highly recommended!!

hij_0TuNGMUNPG0OhaV6yg.text: Ok I am shook at how bomb this place was. First of all the menu is amazing it is so hard to choose! Thanks to yelp for the check in we got the free house margaritas that we assumed would be not strong but you will get a good buzz off of just one! My boyfriend had the nachos and I had the tacos. They were so amazing and flavorful. I mean the beef is so soft and tender! We literally didn't speak our whole meal because we were stuffing our faces!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. House margaritas
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet Mignon Nacho Surf and Turf Taco Combo

9K4gDpQTAsC5211Q4ZhwNw.text: First night in Vegas and we saw this place. Being a nacho lover, I had to stop by. We were able to sit at the bar for full service and no wait. Elise was our server and she was AWESOME. So sweet and patient with us, giving us recommendations and being attentive to our beverages getting low. My husband got the flaming shrimp tacos and he loved them. He's very picky about his shrimp tacos so that was a surprise. I got the bbq chicken nachos and even though the sauce was a little sweeter than I expected, they were still very delicious. Great atmosphere, great food and amazing service! Very happy we decided to stop here for dinner!

-UpLrnAXxdDhOeXaMlCHiA.text: Service wasn't great but the vegan menu was really good. We are vegetarian and usually prefer cheese on our food but didn't miss it. I had the vegan chimichanga and my fiance had the vegan chicken tacos. He said "these are stupid good". We waited 40 minutes for our table and when we got sat there were a few empty tables. It just took our server forever to check on us and get refills. He also asked me if I "wanted another coke" but I could see him refill it with Dr Pepper both times.

4kwg5RS93xk3aTd5o55UHw.text: Family and I came here on thanksgiving day. I'm the lone vegan in the family. They offer a menu for vegans in addition to their regular menu. Service was good - wouldn't say great. Food was good also. My siblings checked in via yelp and received a free house margarita.   The vegan chocolate cake was better than the vegan fajita chicken. All in all a good experience.

IzOXRxxM6XArKBOB4GHqrA.text: One of my go 2 spots when I'm in Vegas. Great Nacho variety and ice cold tap  Friendly bartender's and server's, nice atmosphere and did I say they got REALLY GOOD NACHOS!!!!!!! they were so good I forgot 2 take a pic.....

5R38_Q1IPoxgIS18iAzYvg.text: Free House Margarita?? Yes, please! Cheers to Yelp for this awesome checkin offer. Just an FYI you must order an entree to redeem this offer. This restaurant was on our list of places to visit!!   While on vacation with my husband and cousins, we walked over to Nacho Daddy. Lucky for us our hotel (The Elara) was on the same block.   We arrived with a party of six, there was no wait time. The service and food was great! Our food didn't take long. I ordered the chicken enchiladas with rice, of course I had my complementary Margarita. Which wasn't very strong.... but hey! It's free! So drink up! Bottom line everything was delish! The rest of the table ordered nachos, no complaints. I took some food to-go, the leftovers were even more DELISH the next day!

ml--UoQrjntwJT8cn4O1GQ.text: I heard about this place and was so disappointed I never had the chance to try it out when I lived in Vegas so on a recent visit we went for it! Now, if you read my other reviews, nachos is life for me. I could eat nachos every day if I let myself. That's the first thing I get from every Mexican place I go to and this place did NOT disappoint. It took us a while to decide after going down their huge nacho list but with the help of our server we decided on the enchilada nachos with queso added on top. Man, I am not lying when I say these are the best nachos I have ever had in my LIFE (and that is a LOT of nachos). Make sure to put this place on your list to try in Vegas. You won't be disappointed.

kdL6HCo_ZpXBpky9NhN4oQ.text: According to my boyfriend... it's the best Nachos he has ever had! I definitely agree! Its delicious!! We are going back!!

-s7cMxRE_6Hlhj5KTBQcQw.text: Nacho daddy doesn't disappoint. We got exceptional, fun, and efficient service from Mr DJ. The food was amazing; try the BBQ chicken nachos. The chips themselves had the perfect amount of crunch and weren't oily or overwhelming. Very delicious, and I can't wait to return to try more

q2eSZ5kkjALjET_LvZE-fw.text: This place is amazing! Everything was delicious. The Mexican corn is awesome. Ashley, our waitress, was very knowledgeable about every item on the menu that we inquired about. She was able to assist us with ordering items we could enjoy and adjusting anything we didn't like. She really catered to our liking, no onions then no onions. The queso was delicious and the house margarita is wonderful. The house margarita doesn't taste strong but after two, when you get up, watch out.

6TDnoN_rfHWpRXMqgOCI_A.text: Worse nachos I ever had - they also have a lot of staff but the service is not the best. I had the filet mignon nachos and they had so much tomato sauce  it killed them. I do not recommend this place

ZZpxEMlMU35E2SPtqIH_0Q.text: Very good food and service. Easy to find and centrally located by Fremont street. Food is amazing and beer is served frosty cold. Nachos and fajitas were a good recommendation by server. Was recommended by concierge and she was not wrong

QvPWPjmQABB47gEUeCzVhA.text: It was good but had more salt then what I like. The customer service was good and fast.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster nachos

usL3UkQDfiOf3pf3THU3xw.text: Nacho Daddy is the BOMB, and a must for munchie's cravings any time you're on the Las Vegas Strip!    We drove up to Vegas this past weekend on a whim for a quick getaway, and after checking into our hotel, our first idea for food was Nacho Daddy!  They stay open until 2 am, so you have plenty of time to pop on by in the evening for some delicious nachos and the other food offerings that they provide.    The nachos themselves are AMAZING, and we love the white queso dip that it comes with - the jalapenos add a great kick to its rich, creamy flavor.  But it has more than just nachos, despite it being its namesake!  The street tacos I ordered here were some of the best I've ever had.  They were full of meat and toppings and very filling!!  The rice and beans were very satisfying as well, so it was an all around delicious meal.    We ordered it to go and ate in the room, but the atmosphere in the dining area is awesome as well, and we've eaten in there before.  It's like a more lively and fun Buffalo Wild Wings!  The prices are also quite reasonable for something on The Strip and for the quality and size of the portions!    I love Nacho Daddy!  I'll definitely be coming back every time I'm in Vegas!!

IWEsM0difn1BMwGLskmVzA.text: Was looking for a spot open late close to where we were staying (MGM Signature). After a quick Yelp search, found this spot. No parking lot. Located on the corner of the strip.   Inside has good music playing (hip hop)with several TV's playing sports and music videos . Table and bar / counter seating . Upstairs seating too. Appeared clean.   Hostess and waitress were friendly. A lot on the menu . A bit pricey since it's pretty much on the strip. A lot of hearty food on the menu . Breakfast served all day. Decent selection of specialty drinks .   Appetizer: spicy wings - OK, enough for two, a little burnt on outside , served with ranch and celery.   Meal : Cali Burrito - Good, filling , served with chips and salsa . Chips just mediocre , salsa is plain no authentic salsa flavor.

giKhfmPP4BjmkdOpFxvTvg.text: Best steak nachos ever!! Keep doing what you do,  you're the best!! Normally nachos get soggy when taken out but somehow yours don't.... how do you do it lol. Lifelong customer here

HMWF-xF-2oODfDGNd1zVog.text: We had the Buffalo Chicken Nachos and they were very very good.  The queso and hot salsa were good too. The frozen margarita was superb.

UkDMnfKvLK7hIeWskFlcGw.text: So so good! Awesome service. The ambiance was beautiful. The food quality and taste was trying expectations!

eUYZuweXrrHTziOx5EMaTw.text: Good nachos and free house margarita if you check in. Prices were reasonable and the food was good.

rOf0UHfgQihibPXMz5K9-Q.text: Crappy overpriced place. Would rather eat a cat turd than go here again. How is this place still in business? I've talked to several people who have been here once and will never go back, when will they run out of first time victims?!

8s5xc70LD5Rhrj7vOQit3g.text: Came here for breakfast & service was amazing! The scorpions in the tank at the front of the restaurant are SO COOL.   Chips & salsa was pretty great. I love the option of mild & hot. Our waters were refilled every two minutes. I got a breakfast burrito with bacon on the side. It wasn't the best, but it was pretty damn good after a night of drinking. Huge portion of bacon on the side (5-6 pieces).   4 stars. I recommend & will be back for dinner.

nZjNIpeoBPP4zH3vmuF-iw.text: Best bloody Mary's ever, Shannon was the best waitress with awesome suggestions.  The atmosphere is very relaxed with easy seating lots of entertainment

zDHlK_dxQc6XUQLoQ4-VoQ.text: The name saids it all!!!! Got to come for the nachos, tacos styles(street tacos,gringos tacos, and tacos)!!! Amazing place!

yFeWZhvHoNf_xCLCb5NDjA.text: Don't even consider this "restaurant" they never deliver their food on time and IF you get it the food will be cold,soggy, and still missing items you ordered. Customer service was no no help. My order was 30 minutes late and they said they would get in contact with the driver then received confirmation that they could not contact driver. Ignore this restaurant because it and grub hub are useless.

8mgRogUyQaesDOxQU7cqeQ.text: We had an amazing experience at Nacho Daddy, the service was amazing and Rico was the best waiter we have have encountered in Las Vegas.

QajPX3nacA9lTlEl0vXtdg.text: Naked wings are everything!!!!! Margaritas were on point. Service was efficient. My go to every time I'm in Vegas.

TFpdPgCz6id6CcEvTkdzSQ.text: We had the breakfast burrito delivered to our hotel, it was delicious and huge, enough for two breakfasts. Great value compared to the crappy hotel fare.

lsYQMOl-fn_nyatry2tkdQ.text: I eat here at least twice every visit to Vegas. We even had our wedding rehearsal dinner at the downtown location, everyone loved it!

5brf9Gg7XZ43G1r19CPj-w.text: Best nachos ever. I went this past weekend and was recommended to go here. And best decision me and my boyfriend ever made. Portions were good,  food was bomb.

yFTVKgI9_2CXi7ddDF2IUA.text: Delicious, great service, and really nice decor. We sat at the bar and received quick service. The menu had a great variety, but we had to get nachos because of the name of the restaurant! The food arrived quickly. Warm and so good! Would absolutely go again!

ArcsUHdbGvLiJoEOJvnFGw.text: Good food and nice size portions. We ordered the trio dip with chips, the mini chimichangas and the fajitas. Service was friendly. Would go back again.

uZFFXRUQbddHcnOl9jp8qg.text: Amazing food, great service, great for kids and vegetarians. I almost never leave reviews, but if I could leave 6 stars here I would! What a great place to eat, drink and hang! Edward the Ass. Manager and Luz our server was the bomb.

sv238LeVdu6M3wHQxlwBXQ.text: I am so glad we ate here.  Nacho Daddy gave me exactly what I wanted: a unique twist on an old favorite that only Vegas can do.  Great ambiance.  The chicken enchilada nachos were amazing.

ny7UHnR2B_4-D47saKxTXw.text: Yum! Had the house margarita.. whoa it was strong and tasty! Food is excellent and service  was great.

zfQYNigtkvRu04llwo2mTQ.text: Great place to eat! I love the fact that while you're waiting for a table they text you with updates. The food was awesome! I recommend the smothered burrito with cheese on top. My friend and I left very full and satisfied. Will definitely be coming back!

GRsx9ZM1bK7pB0uC6K2L7w.text: "NAWT YO DADDY" nacho daddy... hmm? It's the name of the restaurant that drew my family & I to this place, LOL! Until we saw reviews, we really wanted to check it out. Came here for lunch only to get their nachos to-go. We ordered 3 of their nachos to take back to our hotel for a party of 8.   * Ordered:  - Filet Mignon nachos (5/5 stars): As soon as we got our order & had to wait for our uber driver to pick us up.... we completely finished this entire box between 4 of us before uber even got to us! LOL! We had to order another box. The mixed fish, cheese, & salsa make this a good combo with chips.  - Seafood nachos (3/5 stars): This was our least favorite, but was still finished by the end of the day. I think the mango was too fresh that it didn't taste as well with the seafood & my cousin agreed.  - Fiesta nachos (4/5 stars): This was our 2nd favorite. Packed with meat, cheese, & colorful chips. Definitely looks like a fiesta in a box. There was a lot of meat in this one.  Missed out on the full sports bar & drinks but they do serve happy hour, gear, & games to participate to win in! All 3 boxes were good for a party of 8. Not a full entree, but good enough for a filling snack in between drinking throughout the day!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. filet minon nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 21+
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. seafood nachos

ZrDd7DD5rVfqgD7VUH7Ogg.text: So, the food is good. We got some tacos and burritos to take out to handle our late night needs. There are plenty of reviews that talk about the food,but I really wanted to give a shout out to the hostess Sarah (with the tattoos) she is the Energizer Bunny of hostesses. While we waited we watched as she greeted guests, took orders, checked out guests, cleaned, took out the trash, collected and stacked menus and even had to dance along a little to 'Thriller.' Never standing still always working on doing something.

bmIcU0cgfKyl6PnpCo3Fww.text: Awesome experience zach was great constantly checked in on us. Made sure we were fine the whole time. Wanna come back.

Zcye6_9YZlbLBW1XAnXLcg.text: Food was amazing!! One entree of nachos was easily enough to feed two. Great place for groups as you can easily share your different selections. Service was great from the get go! Jovany took care of us from the moment we sat down to the seconds we walked out.   Location was great as well. Easy access from the Planet Hollywood miracle shops. Not too much foot traffic on the harmon side, so no worries about bumping into too many people turnt up. Haha.   Also want to mention that there are TVs every where! So if you wanna catch a game without all the Vegas intricacies, then this place is an easy option.

8s7UeELZ0O3ZTvswv1kvSQ.text: bad ass vegan options!!!!!! everything we had was awesome!!! keep it rad guys thanks!!!

eYvwt9xzi5I7gYroaYbOIg.text: Service was good. Didn't have to wait long for server after we sat down and she was very nice and helpful.   Drinks were pretty good. We got the Daddy's Margarita which was a good size and not completely filled with ice like most places. You could actually taste the alcohol and it was only $12.   Food was absolutely delicious.  Chips and salsa were good, but salsa was a little too runny. Fiesta nachos were SO GOOD.  I also got pork street tacos (mini appetizer size) and there was so much meat packed in I had to take some out just to fold the taco and I could only eat 2 out of the 3.   If there are 2 of you, chips and salsa and an order of fiesta nachos would have been plenty to share.   On my way out I saw a terrarium and thought, oh interesting, but saw a bunch of crickets (eww) in there and wondered what was up with that. Later I read about the scorpion drinks and I'm glad I didn't know about it while I was eating in the restaurant. I don't need a tub full of insects lurking around in the restaurant that I'm eating at thank you very much!

95bDBxfDmF_iAREWpKAzdw.text: I while I am tempted to say, "I've never met a nacho I didn't like", that would be unTrue - I am a picky nacho eater. I am passionate about my nachos and Nacho Daddy did not disappoint! The nacho menu options were broad and included both traditional and more interesting toppings. I ordered the Supreme Taco Nachos, which our excellent server Ryan "spiced up" by adding hot salsa and extra jalapenos! The ratio of toppings to chips was good with the toppings distributed throughout the chips so there were very few plain chips. The toppings were not too wet which helped avoid "chip sog". Thumbs up to the nachos!  In addition to nachos, the Nacho Daddy menu offered lots of choices including delicious-looking appetizers, soups, salads, tacos, burros, enchiladas and more. The drink options, including a full bar, also added to the enjoyment.   We will definitely return...perhaps tonight!

c1tGCGuxEIw5LMOfmmPLgQ.text: Great atmosphere, LEGIT nachos, and the biggest dam tv I have ever seen.  Great service. Overall, a quality MNF at Nacho Daddy,  the free check in margarita was an added bonus.

WFRmUnir1bTUt-S0HjfFww.text: If you want to eat off the vegan menu, call ahead and make sure they haven't run out of ingredients to make items on the vegan menu.  We went and were told they'd had too many vegans recently and hadn't been given enough of the vegan queso from their distribution center and had run out a while back.  Ugh, wasted $20 round trip in Uber to go here, wait for a table and then not have what we went there for.

lT6QDn2BMDRPXiF_t_Vcsw.text: Wow is all I can say affordable, good and great food!! The nachos were soooooo good, I went twice while in vegas

jyPPAotUqzhOXUIZsZc-wA.text: This is the worst location for all the nacho daddy in Vegas. Nacho daddy is actually a good place for food but this one on the strip sucks. Let's talk about  it. I am a local and came in for happy hour and obviously set at the bar. The bartender her name started with a C and she was Caucasian with dreads. She literally distributes the worst customer service known to man. We had to ask repeatedly for water, our alcohol drinks and sour cream. She didn't care; she was in her own rude world. I felt neglected as a customer; she made cynical comments like "I work for tips" etc. I complained to the host and asked for a manager but one never came over. Just avoid this location . Please note it wasn't busy and we received no silverware !

f8QqRFSengFms599NzQtIg.text: Great service and delicious nachos!!! This place is a must when you're in Vegas! We ordered the chicken buffalo nachos and the enchilada nachos, they were both so good! We will definitely be back!!

0DokPaALoOkOWNayTydv8Q.text: Surprise surprise, Nacho Daddy has an extensive vegan/vegetarian menu that I would definitely recommend. I went with some friends convinced I would have to get a cheese quasadilla or some nachos but they offer so much! It was great to find in downtown Vegas when all the other options are so unhealthy. Downside is the service was slow, probably because we ordered at the bar. I bet the actual tables had great service!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken substitute tacos!

CI6S7Xbdux9-EdHC1fL0JQ.text: This place is awesome and I highly recommend it!! I dined here on Wednesday for my birthday lunch and it did not disappoint. The service and food were fantastic!! Our server Huck was so much fun and very attentive. Chris, the GM, brought me a special birthday shot, on the house!! Good service is hard to find these days but Nacho Daddy has it! My friends and I have already said that we will be going back every time we visit Vegas. Thank you for the memorable birthday!!

c3mhTypCPXGq6MYZNaTWzw.text: I almost sent back the vegan chicken tacos cause they tasted like chicken. Vegan options galore and amazing service. Desi our server was such a doll. Super accommodating and a real sweet heart.

Hlolm0Cadl76aIC8aYY46A.text: Use the free yelp margarita!! Sooo good! I loved the vibe in here. Huge projector with music videos and really spacious industrial decor. I was so impressed with all of the vegetarian options. I ordered way too much but I'm not in Vegas often so I had to try as much as I could. Highly recommend! The hostess and servers were really nice.

vTJML2UmAeLCEHgcay8CfQ.text: Loved the tacos with avocados....house margarita was refreshing.....great ambiance and service by Michael, our server.

jzblepbd_HraXH9f2wzD7Q.text: Amazing place. Never had nachos this good in my life. Legit! This place was so good.

DUkf9d0aerSAAbQf-__SWA.text: This place absolutely sucks! Decided to give it another shot. Worst tacos ever. I'm going to keep typing because Yelp wants a longer review. This place is terrible.

jatrJKQSrpiYRD12nYrtPg.text: Quick review.  I didn't have high expectations, but was still disappointed. The cheese dip we had as an appetizer was pretty good, but the chicken fajitas were sub par. Worse than a Chili's. The chicken was dry and overcooked and the side dish of rice and beans were inedible in my opinion. Won't be going back.

aaNIbA-Ek7AehKkve0Pawg.text: Stopped by Nacho Daddy's off Las Vegas Blvd and Harmon. Great atmosphere, music and the food is always good. Arnold the bartender rocks the drinks and was very helpful and attentive. These Las Vegas locals will definitely be back!!!

gccf0GhCr6ATyF7Z94UJLA.text: Best place Ever and you always get more than enough the waiters and waitresses are amazing doesn't matter what time you walk in that's what I'm sucking about shut out to you guys on Fremont at Nacho daddy love it love it love it

Sw5l_JNHAPXGZY2QmxUI3w.text: It was a great atmosphere...I got in really late alone and the bartender was very nice and helpful. My meal came out quickly and it was awesome. I'm definitely going back when I come back to Las Vegas.

x-HezOBZfBpZcUeklgsydg.text: God stuff. If you like nachos this place is for you. They have other Mexican food on the menu but the nachos are the attraction. I always get the Golden Knights nachos and they are incredibly good. It's a mountain of chips covered in gooey cheese, meat, jalapenos, and  bell peppers. Simply put it's amazing.   Also, they have great micheladas.

R2YqMaOEQ6zTLwcJC0p0fw.text: Nice place for a quick bite. I wasn't expecting the amount of onions that came out on my taco but it was still delicious. Beans and rice were ok, the Margarita was amazing! Service was great: friendly and fast.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Surf N Turf Tacos

gl8ucWtDRi_AlUhR98K0ag.text: I have been here twice while in Vegas. The location is convenient-it is adjacent to Planet Hollywood. I come here for the awesome vegan menu. The food is very good and so are the prices. The service is 3 stars, but I am rating 4 stars because of the vegan menu. On my first visit, the service was friendly, but slow, although the place was not crowded. On my second visit, it was crowded and the wait staff was busy. The service was even slower than the first time. The waitress never showed up to our table. Thankfully, another waiter saw the hungry look on our faces and realized that we had been waiting 20 minutes and had not even placed a drink order. The waiter that was not assigned to our table went out of his way to make sure that our orders were taken and that we got our food. Overall, I like the food and the atmosphere. I'm hoping for better service on my next visit.

eC5x1ThYqnIR2vkVTqY6eQ.text: Nacho daddy is probably one of my all-time favorite Mexican restaurants in the city. They have super delicious Mexican food with tons of options for vegans which is honestly a little rare. Having a full piece in the menu for vegans and vegetarians is really exciting. Their margaritas and happy hour always make for a good time. I absolutely love both locations but prefer the downtown location because of how close it is to where I live but both have really good food

Mi-zDwiBPQp-aluxGL3moQ.text: We were in Vegas.  It was midnight. Yelp check-in for a free Margarita didn't hurt. :)  We ordered some special-of-the-day nachos and enjoyed them without being attended to too much. The way we faced, we watched the music videos on the gigantic screen, enjoyed our "quiet" booth, and couldn't drink the margarita..not tasty at all.(but it was free so I ain't complaining!)  Good place for late night food.

gHFWRM1R3tj7pdViUZgfjg.text: No complaints at all. No dry chips is accurate. Supreme tostada nachos are a must try. Option to do a live scorpion tequila shot; did not partake. :/ Just posting to share photos. Actually dined 2/4; posting late!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

EUvMI-5696BdLGYwNMiz8A.text: It was Late and I was a little buzzed but the nachos were GREAT. .. Has several different types and both were supper Good.  Service was fast and friendly but not alot of people there so not sure how they do when it's packed. Next time I'm in town will definitely eat there again..

0PCrnotpOSkaefPNav9Q7Q.text: Great atmosphere, attentive staff, and amazing food! Menu has options for just about everyone.  I typically don't drink but tasted the spicy cucumber margarita and it was AMAZING!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Enchilada nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Avocado tacos

KP5qRhIaXt9kjGQabWq_NA.text: Delicious filet minion tacos and enchilada Nachos! We loved the food and environment! We will be back for sure!

jXVF20nybMFjEXyLosN33g.text: super friendly staff with yummy street tacos, Marge and bottomless chips and salsa. great atmosphere, fresh food and quick service!!

teyDx5vnGE6bzghoUkoW6A.text: Walking into Nacho Daddy, we were looking for a quick bite to eat. We got a lot more than that - great food and great service.   We got here a little after noon and was quickly seated inside. As the hour progressed, more and more people came. Yelp has a free margarita for a check-in so that was the first thing we were on the mission for. Jovanny was our waiter and he just exuded warmth and hospitality (I might be biased because he called me exotic looking ;) He brought us out our margaritas right after taking our orders. I'm not a huge fan of margaritas but this was good! Plus, it came in a cute mason jar which was nice.   Jovanny came by with some chips and salsa on the house (this guy is such a sweetheart!). Our food came by pretty quickly. I got the dry chicken wings with BBQ sauce and my fiance got the supreme tostada nachos with vegan chick'n. I LOVED my wings - they were crispy and I got to dip it in as much sauce as I wanted. My fiance devoured the nachos but the few bites I was able to get, it was so good! For people who like spicy, that is a great option!   Bottom line, this is a great place to grab a bite and a drink. Make sure to ask for Jovanny :)

B09O4epvP4KJMBK4l3eaLw.text: The nachos were exceptionally good. I recommend the nachos with filet and the spicy one with spinach chips and shrimp. Delicious!

Cf5QgY5Z32RO8d_izEEqiQ.text: Garbage !!!! So disgusting the place is filthy the floors are moist !!! Trash everywhere !!! And the place is lonely !!!!!! EVERYWHERE ELSE IS PACKED BUT THIS PLACE !!! The nachos are made with re-fried beans !!! And the meat is can ground beef !!!! Taste like hornets can chilli  avoid this place ! The onions were soggy and looked old !EVEN THE CHIPS WERE STALE !!! What's more incredible is all the cooks are Hispanic !!!! I'm Hispanic and that food is disgraceful!!!!! ZOOM INTO THE "steak" THEY CALL IT ON THE MENU GROUND BEEEF !!!!!!!! From a can !!!!!!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

V4Ix5esE5g_Jc1wdN9jcbg.text: If you love nachos like I do, this is a must eat. I love creating my own at home, but when I saw their menu, I knew I had to give them a try. I had the chicken Tringa, shared with my wife and we struggled to finish the plate. We went nacho overdose.  Extremely tasty. Next time we are going to try the fajita nachos. The plate looked huge and the aroma made me hungry again, even though I could not eat anymore. Being your friends to help.

L-i5S5W6RGWjQgBQiejpMg.text: Great dips - Guacamole, salsa, and queso all delicious.  The burrito was ok at best.  Very fast delivery, right to my hotel room. Definitely recommend!

-WQzm6gILOEdn45ydefS4Q.text: Came by before the Knights game and if I wasn't going to the game then I'd come here to watch it! Tons of tvs and a giant projector with a great sound system. It's half outside and half in so you get the best strip experience while staying in air conditioning. Margaritas are on point and the food is incredible, incredible! Great value for your money, especially for being located on the strip! Peter is an awesome guy and our bartender Sierra was efficient and amazing! I love this place and will be back!!

Xffm9fOv5-vd-iUwzyDOnA.text: I saw the high reviews and decided to give them a try.   I ordered to go because the wait was 40 min. for two people.  I asked the enchilada nachos with green, and NO jalapenos. I opened my box to FRESH jalapenos added on top of the nachos. I thought, fine, I'll just pick them off. Too bad I forgot about the little seeds that blended in with my chicken. Anyway, I noticed right away there were missing ingredients; no green sauce, no sour cream, no salsita, and hardly any beans. What a let down that I couldn't enjoy the nachos as described on the menu, but what I did receive was still tasty.   I attached photos to show my order, what they should look like, and the receipt. I took off one star for the person who took the order, and one star for whoever made them without any other toppings.

JwA8XID4P1Zy7PL4oESwJg.text: Can't wait to try the supreme nachos. The reviews and customers say it's great. My husband's having bottomless  salsa and chips with street tacos. They made sure we weren't just sitting here waiting ro be  served. They went and grabbed our server Cori. She had a lot of suggestions regarding what's good and what's great on the menu.

4MMNhSdXekElTomEiUUZNA.text: Just opened on the Harmon side of Planet Hollywood. We had our fantasy football draft here on a Friday night 7pm. The place was fairly busy, but the hostess knew of our party and promptly, without even asking, guided us to the stairs that led to our party. Point for knowing the situation.  Service was ok, just a bit slow at times but understandable since our party had about 18 people all putting in various orders at various times, and only one server, MJ. She did a great job handling all of us. Billing was perfect, no issues there.  I had the beer battered lobster tacos, that came with a side of rice and side of beans....standard fare. The tacos were tasty, loaded with salsa that almost overwhelmed the entire dish. I wish the lobster would have been a bit larger so it balanced out all the lettuce and salsa better.   I'll give them 3.5 stars. I'm not a huge fan of Nacho Daddy, based on a few meals at the old Henderson location.

meLhqhtnOJEOIYQ5M7Hu2g.text: This happy hour is amazing. The service is killer too. I like their tacos and sliders.

dlS_Dv31936UZzATd4tSHg.text: This place is awesome!!!!! We got the Golden Knights nachos and the sausage and egg slider. The marinade on the steaks was to die for! Food was out in a flash and there was so much food we had to share. Our server Huck was the best!!!! I totally recommend this place!!! Comfortable atmosphere too!
