ZJEQkLFbxsLopLiD6KlwOg.text: This place was amazing!!! We had the filet mignon nachos and the fireball margarita!! To die for and the service was great too.

aXJfDGbJCwOTqlHuZRnfag.text: Best Place in town ! Come on in and see Aly she knows her stuff! Great service AWESOME FOOD! We had the  Supreme nachos there wasn't a dry chip in the house! The wings will be the best you ever tasted I promise.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mexican candy margarita a must try !
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Round 2 loce this place
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mango Margarita so yummy

IdbjCbIyfWcpYICoNzWuhg.text: Fun place and the food is pretty good but the service left something to be desired.  Matt waited on us today and he didn't check back on us one time after food was delivered. I finished my tacos and never got hot sauce. .  That being said, the ambiance is cool and margaritas are decent but not strong at all.  We will try again and hope for better service.

UDsPsOw4WZnLjuVMIqH68Q.text: Yo, Nacho Daddy is the place to be on a Saturday evening! Our server DJ took good care of us. From the moment we sat down to the moment we left.

k58H1112XEpQ5n21z3H0Mg.text: Got ours to go and everything looked amazing. My husband loved it but unfortunately they couldn't accommodate to garlic allergies so no nacho daddy for me

IoQ-UxsWyKmNwNwzeUox1Q.text: This place has bottomless mimosas and giant, delicious portions of creative nachos? Hello my hangover's new favorite place! We sat at the bar on a Saturday with thankfully no wait. Our bartender was nice and helpful with suggestions, and real fast on the refills on those mimosas. First we ordered the spicy shrimp nachos, and the bartender TOLD us they were spicy, and usually I can handle some spice, but damn, those were spicyyyy. Fiance loved them. So then I ordered the pulled pork nachos, white queso, BBQ sauce, pulled pork, crispy onions, yum! We also ordered an app of the queso. I'm not saying that I ate all of it...but I ate all of it. It's cheese sauce in a skillet in your face!   Bottom line: mimosas and nachos are actually a really good combo.

aLmFnKmR1zrLSitc47KjsQ.text: Awesome food! Great atmosphere, definitely a stop while in Vegas We had nachos and plenty to share for two.

B-vO1hdoeDJ09lZi8R1tjQ.text: Amazing Mexican food and phenomenal service! The fajitas were awesome and cooked to perfection, must try this place.

Bq-mTMfWAr-G_tmH3wboAg.text: I wanted to try this place on a recent trip to Vegas, but my parents had gone on the night before I arrived. So instead I just ordered a breakfast burrito to go one morning for second breakfast. The burrito was incredibly large and came with a side of chips and salsa which was a nice touch. But it took almost 20 minutes to prepare despite the restaurant being almost completely empty. And without the addition of the salsa from the side of chips and salsa, the burrito itself was a little bit bland. It is a nice large space, with plenty of TVs for watching sports, and nice bar area. I could see this as a casual snack or dinner location and they have very reasonable price points compared to many restaurants on the strip nearby.

hF0bmJcSxF6h7kk6v0NV3A.text: Seriously? My new favorite restaurant in Las Vegas. The enchilada nachos were out if this world. We did half green sauce and half red sauce. Drop the mic right there. Add to it a delicious margarita served my Elise at the bar. HEAVEN.

8kSINUX35O7xw5cbHFqbkA.text: This was our first meal during our Vegas trip and it did not disappoint! We all got different margaritas which we all loved (I got the frozen house margarita and it was tasty and strong!) We got the trio with chips which came with salsa, guac, and queso which were all surprisingly good since guac is always a hit or miss. I got the shrimp tacos which were a make your own and came with a side of tortillas which was a perfect meal. Overall, for a yummy lunch or dinner right off of the strip, this place is reasonably priced and GOOD.  The atmosphere is also great - when we went they were playing 90s rock music and had the patio open. We set right on the edge of the restaurant and the patio and it was perfect.

ECUgW1ZMbvTJ0X3oJKWJmw.text: Tried out this place bc of the reviews. There was a wait list when we got there but we were seated in about 10 minutes. The food was okay and portions were big.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

eldAovCu9m2RFcnebxxCJg.text: Great service, great food. Quick service by friendly staff and the BBQ chicken nachos were amazing. Split them between 2 and it was perfect portion size

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Wz6uHgHOeWqzQw_9KSJd8w.text: Not much to say. It's great for the Fremont experience crowd that's looking to drink and fill their stomachs

5WEFWnOHnwHy0YZIzh6F2g.text: I am shocked at the good reviews. It is why we picked this place. You can get better Nacho's almost anywhere else. We went mid day and the server recommened breakfast and it was downright horrible.

c7yDWyZlPP2v3Er3pJzKqw.text: Went for lunch and we got two plates of nachos the chimichanga and breakfast burrito... I have spent most of the next 24 hours in the bathroom while my friends had stomach troubles as well.... make sure you have a lead stomach

5UDAD1ihcBg3xekX79oARw.text: Probably better service later in the day.  8 am was poor on service and the place was empty.   They were out of filet and we came for the filet mignon nachos.  Okay, got contacted by Tyler about my review right away and he made everything right.  Got to have the filet mignon nachos any they are the bomb.  Huck was our server and he was very nice and attentive.    Had the scorpion shot and it was fun, haven't done a shot on years so I'm feeling it.   This is a must when in Vegas,  nachos are great and so is Huck.

bnqSbvOENh1nkWqDP37dOA.text: The free margarita when you check in is so good! The nachos were amazing especially the ones with the queso on top! Mmmm definitely coming back next time I'm in Vegas!

VfxXSarst5OoAGNBZlCnjA.text: Go to the Nacho daddy downtown. This one is clearly suffering from "franchising."  The staff were very friendly and attentive; however, the food quality was not on par with the old location. I have been going to downtown for years. It looks like a total hole in the wall but the food is a better experience. If you just want drinks this a a fine place and fun set up.

7uKOeDnvU0D4mF0N8ZElbw.text: Went here with a two of my coworkers during our work trip and thought to try this place out since everywhere was booked (It was valentines day).  We made reservations and when we got here, the place was pretty dead (that was a hint) and then we got seated in about five minutes.  We had requested a booth from the supervisor on site and he said we will be getting one but when the host seated us, she didnt give us a booth until we asked  again.  Their communication was not all that great.    Guest 1 - Spicy Cucumber Margarita, Lobster Tail Tacos (Drink made me sick) My first round of spicy cucumber margarita tasted like sweet juice.  i even ate the jalapenos and they tasted like green pepper......  The second round I tried it and it was almost like the first round's spicy japaleno was forgotten on the first drink, and doubled on the second.  It made my stomach hurt and i have never experienced that before in my many spicy margaritas.  Then my food came out and the presentation was very nice.  Things tasted great but I felt like the lobster tail was very minimal.  I was not impressed at all.  Definitely overpriced for it.    Guest 2 - White Peach Margarita, Chicken Fajitas (food made her sick) FIrst round of white peach margaritas tasted very well, but the second round was so sweet, my coworker could not drink it.  Her food presentation was very nice but she said after her first taco, her stomach started to hurt. She barely finished her food... was not full nor buzzed.    Guest 3 - Malibu bay breeze, shrimp fajitas First round of her drink was very good, in a tall glass cup. Her second was downsized to HALF the size.  Her food was not cooked right and we're not sure what made her stomach hurt but even the next morning after, she was not feeling it.    I will spare you the lack of service from our waitress who I felt like kept on kicking us out (it was very dead, and we were there for less than an hour)   IN SUMMARY - We ALL got different food and we ALL got sick.

PRps5tdOyHwh9VZqul3S8g.text: Rare VEGAN oasis on the strip! Nacho Daddy is tucked away on Harmon just outside of the Miracle Mile shops with street/sidewalk access only (a little hard to find at first.) They have a separate vegan menu section and use Gardein chick'n product (optional) in their vegan quesadilla, fajitas, burrito and nachos. Kudos to Nacho Daddy for making their vegan cheese (cheddar style) in-house -- it was delicious. I had four meals here spanning my week in Vegas; thus, I tried several vegan meals, and all were delicious. I highly recommend the vegan burrito and vegan chick'n nachos (huge portion for $16.50). I like hot/spicy ... and be warned their hot salsa is definitely "hot." On the downside, their is a large aquarium at the front entrance which houses large, disgusting black scorpions. Clue to Nacho Daddy: This is more disgusting than cute. Perhaps a health hazard and certainly and stomach-churning site for some. You're doing so many things right (include the large screen TVs) ... why be "cute" with the live scorpions? Just get rid of this weird and creepy addition.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan loaded nachos with Gardein brand Chick&#39;n -- large portion for $16.50

28NzeNkO__GRTCl7sjhrsA.text: I was skeptical about going to this place. When one opened up near where I work I decided to give it a try.  The food here is fresh for Vegas. It also has flavor. So many places are "saucers" because the chefs don't have any talent or creativity. These guys do. I've asked for changes due to an allergy and it still tastes great. Thank you.  The servers seem like they are happy. You can tell a fake smile anywhere. The manager has been over to check on me every time that I've been in. Drinks are refilled, plates are cleared. I am surprised Nacho Daddy! Keep it up.

65zzo2aPtrtcJVy9Z-uObg.text: The nachos were cold with clumpy cheese upon arrival. Not to mention the order was placed at 4:25 and didn't arrive until 6:52 p.m. I was starving and quite perturbed.

FyDCfWogwM_1EOQm-7zbgg.text: Our server Ryan was the highlight of our dinner experience! The food and drinks were great as well. We will definitely visit again the next time we're in Vegas!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpion shot
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

3AXoTLp5CHFnIK9WiiD1rg.text: The name alone of this place is enough to give it a try. If you love nachos, definitely try this place. My group of five was pretty hungry so we each ordered our own nachos and shared family style. The waitress said one nacho order could feed 2 to 3 people but she didn't know how we do. We ordered the Filet Mignon nacho (BEST!), Buffalo Hot nacho (yummy for those buffalo wing lovers), Nacho Average Burger nacho (tastes like a cheeseburger), Carnitas nacho (SO YUMMY) and some other one that is not on the yelp menu. Obviously, the last one wasn't that memorable so that can be skipped.  They are open 24 hours on the weekend so definitely give this a try on your next Vegas trip.

eAO-dFLdNogYeJhv48EQUw.text: Wife and I stopped in late night on Thursday, drawn in by the significant vegan options on the menu. Rolando was our server/bartender.   Rolando was awesome, made us feel welcome, and was one of the best servers we have ever had, anywhere.  The food was great too!  Rolando and the food made such a good impression, we came back for lunch and late dinner on Friday. Yes, we ate here 3 times in less than 24 hours.   Food and service were great.   Highly recommended.   Back in Vegas for the weekend, and stopped in 2 more times. Definitely didn't disappoint. Food and atmosphere are wonderful.   Arienna was my server today, and she was great as well!

ohWxCzMX1FoRuKriBHWVpA.text: Always great nachos and a fun atmosphere. Cassandra makes a great margarita!   The scorpions in the front tank are awesome.

2-OOf34YvY0YFw8CxSlq0Q.text: A whole menu page of vegan options!! Vegan queso dip is the best of had yet and the beer battered avacado tacos were delicious! Fantastic food! Fantastic service!

cIam8N0lbMT7EN0c6B-2Mg.text: Displeasure to eat here, take it from a local. So many better options on the strip.

WEGrHdFWdUv0lqnle_y80Q.text: This place has some of the best Fajitas I've tasted! Got mix and match Shrimp and Filet Mignon fajitas, they were great! Sat at the bar and the service was awesome! Waitresses constantly checked up and asked if you needed anything else (tortillas, refills, etc)! This is a great place to eat in Vegas!

sNSL5huYGQiGRdh52sP_9A.text: IF you like nachos this is the place for you. They will put the kitchen sink on your chips if you want. They make their own chips which are thin and really not oily. Just the way I like. All the chips on your plate will have "stuff" on them which makes it where you don't have these leftover naked chips at the end. Enjoy!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

YzFCmTgAnGNTdr_T9FFl3w.text: We came in for lunch and our server was Kirsten....Amazing doesn't even begin to describe her service, she made sure our visit was enjoyable......will definitely be back

43zGbJpvAL6xK8bmBkis4A.text: Chase was the best server and he put up with all our bs and David aka muscles was awesome!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

HxbcwclOcNUDXXmGnTpRyg.text: DJ is the best!!! Awesome spot to get food in Vegas. Come here every year! Cool spot and the food is delicious.

YSUgFmbKRLux3xKqp2SE8A.text: Good food and great service, not the best food I've ever had but interesting concept. I removed one star from my review since I'm Celiac, and after reading the yelps I thought it was a safe place for me. I was informed that once there that there may be cross contamination in the fryer. I'm still sick from eating gluten and it's been two days since eating there. I don't recommend this place to other gluten free people, it's not safe though the menu has things marked gf, they are not since cross contamination is a big issue there!

ybdfjlQ1UweW3HULupZtWQ.text: This is my first time checking this place out and all I can say is it's damn good! Our server Ari was funny and had great suggestions! The margarita and BBQ Nachos were insane! We I'll be back and will definitely request our girl Ari!

lw4GC3UvLiIAbUPVJQ4jjQ.text: Food was decent but nothing to write home about. Had the kale salad and nachos with three dips. Flight of beers was fun.

zHWserZNk3ABabjWIMLVrA.text: Best nachos I've ever had but could use a little work on the drinks. Still crave those nachos every time.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

7V_DCYJlrZyU00-nuugBRw.text: Overall great environment, we did not have to wait long for a table. We had a party of 7. The server was attentive and the food was delish. We did get our free margaritas at check in which was nice! Overall, i think the best part was the presentation of the flaming shrimp. They were super delish. We cant wait to return and try out other dishes. We also ordered the fish tacos and the mango pico de gallo topping was seriously AMAZING!

rjln-hxBjp_2dBO16kllwQ.text: Randomly decided to come here for dinner on a Wednesday evening. Although it was a bit busier than we expected (mostly in the bar area) we got seated pretty quickly. Our servers asked if it was our first time at the restaurant and answered any questions we had. They also made sure to keep our waters filled and brought out extra plates for us to share our orders. We ended up getting the Chicken Breast Tacos (just the 3 tacos, not the meal set) and the Golden Knights Nachos. The tacos were okay. There was a lot of chicken on them, but it was a bit dry. The nachos though - those were delicious! The meat was juicy and tender, and the toppings were generous without making the chips soggy or anything. The flavors were pretty well balanced, not too spicy or salty. They were definitely the star of the show. I'm interested in coming back and trying more of their nachos and their flaming items!

iyXsP-lWIqjbqEexfePsjw.text: Good mexican for cheap and fairly quick. I had the chicken tacos, corn, and guac. It was good and had nice flavors. The guac could have used a little more like and salt to flavor it a bit more. All and all I would be back!

QgFiLhqKKBSWYKYXwvG7jQ.text: This place had some amazing food! We split the filet mignon nachos along with the lobster and crab tacos between 3 people and it was the perfect amount of food. Definitely worth a try!

qLSH5firdo93yiNBsYhkPg.text: Nacho Heaven!!!!!! Wow this place was absolutely amazing!!! Very accommodating with any dietary restrictions. I have to eat Gluten-free and my twin is a Vegan, we were very pleased to have plenty of options to choose from. We really enjoyed our waiter too! All of us had special requests with our orders and he got them right! We were impressed with our waiter and how delicious the food was! My mouth is watering for those nachos. We will definitely be back when we return to Vegas

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

c0Z1vqqSTQIRh4pi-mck0g.text: Definitely recommend nachos. So much cheese and not a even a dry chip! Not a fan of the margaritas, too much sweet and sour in my opinion.

yGuWYTUori0-j1EHfbntUw.text: This place has the best Thai Sweet Chili Nachos. The service was great at the Sahara location as well.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpion Tequila Shot
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpion Tequila Shot

Tu1i3lr7geqt1SlfX3DOkg.text: Shout out Vince for making our visit super awesome. I came to Las Vegas for my 50birthday with my girlfriends to have a good time. And if you want to have an awesome time and service come to Nacho Daddy...... Just saying the name is fun. Happy hour is amazing both food and prices. Delicious vegan options. Which is great because everyone can eat and have fun no matter your diet...  the vegan nachos are a must....

dSlnt9RIMQfneKEmdalLwA.text: I went during happy hour and was so happy  The mini nachos wss good and the happy hour strawberry margarita was great. The customer service alone make me want to return . I love to see people work for a company they love.

8wHpMZ36HHq-jhMmLYyCgA.text: We came here one night on the strip and were so glad we did! We each got a nacho and then all shared the triple dipper. Our server was so kind and inviting!   We also tried the scorpion shots! insane!

1qaY-fJW-9ysqNMkmgsrxw.text: Best Nachos EVER!  I cannot recommend enough. We still talk about these nachos. Awesome vegan options too!  And the vegan nachos are delicious...and I eat meat!!! You won't regret trying this joint!!

SCPjZ9f4x2HNdEGJxQlftw.text: I've been here twice, the service is excellent and the food is amazing! They have a good selection for Vegans which was great and the servers are super friendly!  I will return!

iwwzV5lG5EIY7JEiuDEfDA.text: I Love my nachos! So glad I took the time to come by Nacho Daddy's. Great food. Also had a white peach margarita, it was made with perfection. I am a happy camper!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The food is absolutely fantastic!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The nachos and wet burrito is awesome. So glad I came.

WRBOqXBlIQDKjlERw3zLzA.text: Ok my Back st my Fav spot. This white peach margarita is my life right now! Lol be sure to try it with Patron

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Wings are amazing :-)

IuoQgcULLaVEoknKnwLhQA.text: Beware of the server Kelsey!!!!!!  I ordered seafood combo.  The fish taco was good, the crab and lobster enchilada was cold.  I attempt to get Kelsey's attention on 3 different occasions and she walked passed me each time.  I had to tell another server that my enchilada was cold and she has to find Kelsey and let her know..  Kelsey never came back to the table until it was time to pick up the bill which another sever has to bring because she was no where to be found..( I wish I would've gotten her name)..  Kelsey takes my credit card and brings back only the receipt, I had to get up and go find her and was like where is my credit card, she runs to the back to get it saying oh I'm sorry..   she knew exactly what she was doing.  I believe she is a racist....   The sever who helped me got her tip...    WATCH YOUR CREDIT CARD WITH KELSEY!!!!!!

njywUyO16myPr_l5sqd-iQ.text: Such a great meal here. The toppings to nacho ratio on our cheeeseburger nachos were perfection. I was afraid to order seafood but wow the baja seaside combo was amazing. We also started with the mexican corn which was awesome. I will definitely be back next time i am in vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

bCWFwDBGK0qMlPSFaKy57Q.text: Great! Thanks for the good food and service! I'll be back with the fam.  Happy holidays!

L1sJJLmb1c37bLZqeZFt1Q.text: Whew! Another Vegas afternoon recovering decided to come check this place out. The hostess Dominique was awesome. She made sure where she was going to seat us was going to be mist comfortable for my husband in a wheelchair. She sat us nit too long after checking in.  Once we were seated we ordered our drinks and food. As we were sitting there it seemed a little long if a wait for our food but no sooner we mentioned it there it was.   I ordered the chicken fajitas which came out nice and hot and had tons of onions and peppers. My husband ordered the filet mignon nachos. When my food came out it didn't come with the plate that had the sides and the tortillas, so I had to wait for the server to come back.   Over all the food was great, hostess was awesome server had a few flaws. It was nice that management waived my meal since I didn't get everything timely. I would def come back here when I'm in town.

nLmb9hQNodmjji9CyWfgGg.text: Really cool place with nicely portioned plates for a decent prize. The place is kind of hidden past the Taco Bell Cantina as it may appear you're going to hit a dead end by the elevators. Atmosphere was nice as it had a very western, Texas, Mexican feel. Ordered the cheese enchiladas, rice and beans combo and tacos. Left the place spending less than $25 for 2 people. Not a bad deal at all! While waiting there we had one girl who kept coming out to throw up in the corner and then going back in and coming back out to throw up again using her finger. Maybe have a person standing in the front to monitor such people. Overall, a good visit and good tasting food.

olWabbBIaA2T8tMeWcSQ6w.text: I love that this restaurant gives back to the community. And you have to get the nachos. Any of them are good!! The service was a bit poor - it took a while for a server to come to our table and then she didn't check back that often on us. But the food is good

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

xBt9Y_jIzAHifyVUWnYhYg.text: Great place for Mexican breakfast! Awesome margaritas and the nachos are sooo good. Now give me my free margarita!

4UgaUs6-7fyTmfArEwwAYw.text: This place was awesome. My favorite meal in Vegas so far. I had the tostada supreme nachos and wifey had a Thai chicken bowl. Both very good. But the nachos. Man. The nachos. Every nacho was full of toppings. We also did the yelp check in for a free house margarita. You can upgrade to a different flavor for just the price difference. We opted for the blackberry margarita with a sugar rim. Soooo good.

YuWZu98bVYiwwWjf_JXVZA.text: Was taken aback by the many choices for nachos. Ended up getting the Supreme Tostada Nachos, they did not disappoint! They also have a full vegan menu which is nice if you're looking for that. We ate at the bar and our bartender was extremely friendly and showed us the scorpions for the scorpion shot!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Tostada Nachos

B1KBkML3rW0XRk7TUdhx1g.text: I went to Nacho Daddy for breakfast and it was really good.  I ordered the breakfast burrito and it was not dry at all and was great when dipped in the salsa.  It came with a side of chips which was a little weird until you remember that this is really a specialty nacho place. The service was excellent and it was fairly priced.

WlTTE76pStFwIZaLQW6hzA.text: Went here for the very first time on New Year's night. The waiter and the entire staff were pleasantly nice. Our drinks were also made to perfection. I will be going back here again.

erHFxVi8k2YEUs5pc7_-ug.text: After reading good reviews and appreciating the affordable prices on the menu, my husband and I decided to walk down to Nacho Daddy for dinner last night. It was excellent! Great service, great food, and great prices. We'll definitely be heading back.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The fried ice cream is a must!

F3ZiZtoDXomlGNzlSlx1-g.text: Filet nacho are amazing. We also got the naked wings with buffalo sauce and ranch.... super tasty!

6kmTx6LgWo2mL17GtvxVUQ.text: Food was amazing. Guacamole was in point and queso amazing. We had the pork burrito and the standard nachos. Serving was amazing and very attentive. Hidden gem!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Mkijjwl7ayZLmr76XzkTjA.text: Go here! Now!!! The food uugh so good. 3 of us one had the cheeseburgers nachos they were great just like a cheeseburger. The tostada nachos were amazing. I like my food like I like my men, spicy but you might want to hold off on the jalapenos oh hawt! The BBQ nachos were tasty as all get out.   Please go. Server is so cute and so pleasant so great food, great service what??? So head over.

r-wRsDWJct1KmjiWp4vDsA.text: Great food. Great drinks. Great location. Service was amazing. Drink the scorpion shot.

F2RCbJ9MlkgNGgaDTOj2xQ.text: We came here based on the reviews and the reviews were very accurate. The place was packed so we sat in the bar. The service wasn't great but the food was amazing. We had the standard nachos and we had to order some more because they were so good.

B1qyuEiCxz2Om2yi_n8JwQ.text: We checked in on YELP & got 3 FREE Margaritas!  It's a mix, but STRONG & good!  We're Texas Girls & Nacho Daddy rivals Texas Mexican Food.  We loved the queso & guac!  The food was fantastic!  If you're in Vegas & need a cheap meal....go here!  Not crazy loud, but yummy & filling.  3 of us split an app & a Supreme Nacho skillet.  YUM

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

dyn7502J-9NtAXshSabJpQ.text: OMGoodness I love this place. It has become a common haunt whenever I am in the city. The GN nacho special is amazing if you like jalapenos. Make sure you leave room for desert - not something I would say at most Mexican restaurants.

iewqFsfOg6Fi3KCqu5wmNA.text: Heard a lot about this place before going. We were in the mood for Mexican food and were on the strip. The food was good, we had the burger nachos for appetizer, they were delicious, gooey cheese and beef almost on every chip. I had the grilled fish tacos for my entree, again solid, they were not cheap with the filets. The soft flour tortillas were cooked alittle to make them crispy, and the mango salsa was a nice touch. My friend had the smothered burrito, it looked very good. Neither one of us could finish our meals. There was only one thing preventing this restaurant from a 5 star rating and that was the service. The server did not write down our order, even though I asked him if he could remember everything including the modifications we ordered. He assured me "I got this", needless to say the app came out wrong. Other then that he was friendly and nice. I would definitely recommend this place as a causal place to visit when u don't want to pay the outrageous prices they charge in other restaurants on the strip.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Grilled fish taco

Xt-DzEmDE4DkqW6zc0Ecqw.text: Holy crap, if I could have sex with these nachos I would. You simply cannot order something you won't like here. Impossible. And for those of you crazy not to get nachos, they do have many other offerings comparable to a full-access Mexican restaurant. But get the nachos. Unless you're against mouth orgasms, and America.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

qyi5SWCT1dC7vDjm13WREQ.text: Amazing place and staff!!! Arieanna was beyond amazing!!  PLEASE VISIT! Came here on a Monday day so the strip was slow but the service was great. From the moment we walked in, we were greeted and treated like loyal customers. Quickly seated and the food selection is just perfect. Our server arieanna was great with answering questions, communication, conversation and good service. If you're ever in Las Vegas, I recommend you stop by for lunch or dinner to continue enjoying a great night l.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

oVRdiJZCmBlq7kgnlm-8Tw.text: Great food and huge portions at a great value.  I was pleasantly they had so many vegetarian choices and the egg white omelet was delish.  The free margarita for breakfast by checking in - sure why not?!   Our waitress was friendly and gave awesome service.  It was only a short walk off the strip so convenient to get to and our kids loved the food as well as the scorpions.  Would definitely go back next time we're in Vegas.

Ei7kepyG1I3AusEFQ0KHPQ.text: Great Experience. Big Tvs. They play old school music videos which was awesome to see on a TV while games are going on. went back to back days this weekend. Spinach Chips and shrimp nachos are great. Lobster and Crab Nachos not so much. could be better with a sauce instead of the mango Pico de Gallo but just my opinion. Good environment. Will come back again to try breakfast menu.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spicy Shrimp Nachos on Spinach Cbips

tvVtXfptZHgRZf1owicYlg.text: Had such a great experience at nacho daddy!! The drinks are insane our server Ari recommended the sunrise bliss margarita it was sooo good !! She also hooked us up with coupons so we will be back for breakfast tomorrow !!

kAeivB-4e7amhR4GwUamcQ.text: It was our first visit and everything was great. Aly was our server and she was great. Good personality, made helpful recommendations, and was very efficient. She even helped us check in for our free margarita.  I has the Thai Chicken Nachos and they were great. Everyone else in our party loved their food as well. We're going back again today for breakfast.

GAlcIJBPESdPo1ObLYEObg.text: The atmosphere of this place was really cool. The menu choices was a wide variety of items that all looked delicious. However, the service was extremely slow. Our server forgot to put out order in and what was delivered to the table was incorrect. I would not recommend this place.

d9KH9kJwUj0G_azZCFdnRQ.text: If you are looking for a yummy, good size, breakfast or lunch. This is the spot. I love the open ceiling concept, also lots of tvs to catch games. Amazing salsa and chips. During the day time they have awesome music videos (when I was there they had 90s-00s playing). Service is great. I had the egg with enchilada meal with their breakfast sandwich which were both amazing. Pretty good spot with out braking the bank. I'm definitely recommending and coming back.

jjUR24Qihli-4VjxGoJibA.text: A.J. is a fantastic server  (no I'm not his mom). Great guy and helpful,  knowing how to answer questions you didn't even know you had,  at a great restaraunt.  Food is stellar, very good value, and atmosphere is fun. Take the scorpion shot!

-ZvPkFqkty-GQhYH5CXZ-Q.text: I didn't realize this was a large chain restaurant. I was hoping for a small-ish nacho speciality shop. That being said the food and service were all average. We probably won't make it a priority to go back though.

5iAvSQi50LSM8-ICxgI1EQ.text: My husband and I went to this place after he found it on Yelp. It's a little difficult to find since it's behind the miracle mile shops. Once we entered we were in for a treat! We decided to sit at the bar since it was football Sunday. We were greeted right away by the bartender. Toop notch service. Every bartender, food runner and barback always stopped to make sure you were taken care of. I got the hot buffalo nachos and my husband got the filet mignon nachos, both were excellent! I will definitely return here my next trip to Vegas.

laAfr5Rrb4MeJZiVpZENKA.text: Great job Victoria! Thanks for the great service and attentiveness. The drinks were great and the food was amazing!!!! Definitely a go-to spot when visiting Vegas!

rRrYgKWiGqzRfWSSyQW1yw.text: Tyler was our server today. He was super helpful and very friendly. The margaritas are very good, and I love all the vegan options! They need one of these on every street.

9MkfPAsPoE-N-oitu-2_qQ.text: Nacho daddy is amazing! Ask for luz. She is so sweet. Always have a great experience ! The food is always on point. The restaurant is always clean and inviting. Never a dry chip

KqdcSuJ00tLm93wxtSJcwA.text: Great Mexican food and good service. A little hard to find, however. Could use more signage.

GZjOTAoBpc9KbDWjuKpZPQ.text: Queso is to die for! House margarita is better than most. Good atmosphere, great prices! Staff is friendly and attentive!

57h9dVxOQWnbuRckYGgJKA.text: Great start with getting a free margarita by checking in. Ordered the queso and cheese enchiladas and both were fantastic. Super great food if you are in downtown Las Vegas. Excellent service as well! Would come again

99Jg1rGNq1vzSkyIKcPYaQ.text: Audre took great care of our table, helped us with recommendations, and was very friendly!!

8Dupvx8wFjHGjc1LhArJwA.text: Jovany was amazing! He took great care of us and we will definitely come back next time we are in Las Vegas. The margaritas are excellent and the nachos are fantastic!

3c5XKRTEOZtRVxSbPNQboA.text: We love this place. The vegan menu has so many delicious options that it is hard to pick. We have always had amazing service. Our favorite waiters are AJ and Mark. Great service. Amazing food. Must try.

cOLp1JLiwQj4aWYXwud3-Q.text: Awesome spot! We had a great server named Jovanny. He's so friendly and makes your visit here feel like home. Great service! We are visiting from LA and decided to try some new spots. I definitely recommend this place! And thank you to Jovanny for taking care of us and our 1 year old while we dined here! We tried the Vegan Loaded Nachos and Filet Mignon Nachos.. both were very yummy! Both had a good spicy kick as well. Also tried the House Margarita, not overly strong and very tasty.

XfSNivcLF6I8SiU8HdLkWQ.text: Nacho Daddy is close to the Cosmopolitan where I was staying.  They have many good reviews so I decided to give them a try (I love Mex food).  I went during their happy hour which they gladly promoted and told about (some places try to hide these value items).   Marcello was the bartender and was very helpful and personable. Not only with me but other patrons. A couple next to me asked about strip bars and he whipped out his phone and started giving them suggestions. Just a nice and sincere server.  I only had a snack and 1 margarita so my bill was pretty cheap but I was more than happy with the food, service and atmosphere.  I'll definitely return!  Thanks Marcello M!

UC49eaJwWlCGnXy7RXh07A.text: This place is great! Bryce is an excellent bartender and makes the best drinks, A++. I hear the food is great and we'll try that soon!

m5nXVcRVZLQtfDFBob2Quw.text: I came here for vegan food and was not disappointed.   Bryce is cool as hell.  I had a great time here.

d3Kwh3jih8iapbQ6ZaYAkA.text: I wish you guys could expand to the Bay Area like San Francisco! Out of our two nights in Vegas we had to go here twice! It was that good and I will definitely be coming back and be recommending the place. The servers here know how to do their job. They are very chill people and gave the best service I've had in a while. Would give them more stars if i could!

WaYaYUbTjGdyjQfHnwVzjQ.text: Wow! This place is amazinggggg!!!  I came here with some friends for their happy hour 5$ margaritas and left with a full stomach. I decided to get their loaded shrimp nachos and they were absolutely delicious, margaritas too. The atmosphere is nice and it helps that this restaurant is located right on the strip. Of course it's a little pricy but you must remember this is Las Vegas we're talking about.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Loaded nachos and margaritas( kinda blurry since it&#39;s a screenshot from a video)
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My shrimp loaded nachos ( not the best picture since it&#39;s from a video)

dferDWGE6SuMxKU0qQKMeA.text: Stopped in on a hot day and were promptly seated at a table in the bar area. Server was knowledgeable and cautious when I asked about gluten free options. What she recommended (burrito bowl) isn't marked as gluten free, but by subbing for wild rice it was perfectly fine. She even made sure with me what to sub with in case the wild rice wasn't gluten-free. The chips are fried in the same fryer that they fry some flour tortillas in, so that was lame, but the burrito bowl was delicious anyway.  We also each ordered a margarita and when they took a long time to come out, someone who we assume is a manager came over and apologized and said they'd comp the drinks. We seriously considered ordering one to go as a thank you, but they're so much drink and the portions are generous so we left too full for another drink, even split between two people.

jaELg4UMg3OnAodrNQ_0fA.text: What a find! A vegans dream for Mexican food!  With the sour cream, cheese and chikin being all plant based, this is on the las Vegas Strip and a MUST go to!  Shout out to the manager,  Edward!  He was SO knowledgeable and personable,  we came back the next day.  Now we just need one in the South Houston area,  because there's a mind blowing huge community there that NEEDS this restaurant!   did I mention that the skinny margaritas are the bomb!?  Cuz they are super amazing!  Can't say enough greatness about here!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

inKYhTSNeCc05JgNCvrTow.text: I wish I knew they give a free house margarita when you check in on yelp lol still great food and great service will go again.

Pylrxe2uZSxv9Xb3Q1-sag.text: All I can say is that I was beyond impressed. Serving size of the nachos and fajitas were way more than enough and delicious. I would have given 5 stars but it was really loud with the music blazing. Everyone at my table had to yell to hear each other. But. That won't stop me from going again on our next trip to Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Waiting for the delicious nachos!

ZJyGWrsgzp0Smv36LXJ75w.text: I've never known about this place until looking on Yelp. Excellent food, service, and drinks! We split the filet mignon nacho and chicken quesadilla. Way too much food but so so good!

EFXHVOxSnf4ZrVPbYpEPHA.text: The food was great and the setting was cool, we waited about an hour to be seated even though we were quoted 25 minutes, which was really unpleasant. What really earned the five stars despite the long wait was our server, I believe his name was Vince. He was extremely patient with our party of 7, made sure all our orders were delivered, and even put in an expedited last minute fish taco order so it can come out quick. There are so many good food options out there to choose from, but not all places have great customer service.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Daddy&#39;s Bowl
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Grilled Fish Taco Plate

6YoLw1YitrcMp3FQ59n0UA.text: This is the third Nacho Daddy location I've been to now and probably my second in choice. It's located right outside Planet Hollywood on Harmon Ave. This one is definitely a lot bigger than the downtown spot & has some pretty cool, trendy decorations.  Service wise I could tell some kinks still needed to be worked out like having a hostess up front and ready to greet people. My friend and I ended up sitting at the bar during visit so our bartender was great. She was super friendly and quick.   As for the food they have various options like enchiladas, tacos, salads and obviously nachos. They have a decent handful of vegan and vegetarian options which is awesome. I had the loaded nachos this most recent time which were quite tasty. The only downside for me was that the chips get soggy too quickly.   Overall I'd come back to this location again if I'm around the strip and would recommend it for others visiting to check it out.

tPK4bfuex6fpqcYxFcuMMA.text: The food was okay on the most part. We ordered Fiesta Nachos, a type of fajitas, and three fish street tacos. The rice that came with the fajitas was the best Mexican-style rice I have ever had. The award-winning margarita was really good. The service is good; the waitress was really nice and informative.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Award-winning margarita

5X6hRX8EvTe5UXS8cSrqQA.text: Easy place to over eat. Probably because upselling is part of the deal here. Hoppin vibe is good. Quality is predictable but less flexibility in the menu offerings as one would've expected.

-JpmHL-JftJEny-gMWEKEw.text: This place was on point! Best nacho I've ever had in my life! (Filet nachos) and the margaritas will knock you on your butt! Great prices and great food and our server Marty was so great! Definitely an awesome place for a chill dinner/happy hour!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet nachos

yR6b6ta0IlUBBrvbbu0Vzg.text: Looking for something tasty and a dish that can be shared amongst a group - go to Nacho Daddy! The restaurant is loud and fun but makes you want to move and dance while waiting for your food. They have a great variety of options and will surprise you with the different flavors in their creative nacho dishes!  When I visited Nacho Daddy with two others we ordered: The Moco Loco Nachos, Lobster & Crab Enchiladas and Chicken Tamale. The table favorite was the Moco Loco Nachos. It was so delicious that I stopped eating my own plate (enchiladas) to eat this plate more! Although I didn't get to try the Chicken Tamale, my friend was raving about it and cleaned her entire plate. The Lobster & Crab Enchiladas were a risk and unfortunately weren't my favorite. I only finished one with the help of my husband. It may just not have been a dish for me. The flavors didn't go together so well and were in no comparison to the Loco Nachos.   I rate this place 5 stars and will visit again because there were so many options, the service was good and the restaurant was clean and upbeat. Loved the music selection and vibe overall. Try it out - you won't be disappointed.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Tamale
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster &amp; Crab Enchiladas
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Moco Loco Nacho* - absolutely delish! Table favorite!

3RkMjLQ4eq8cuWvjGLfiQg.text: Outstanding service and wonderful food at a reasonable price. Highly recommend the Mexican corn, spinach chips, and shrimp fajitas!

GeAJhf94l0G42QqsvXz7HA.text: Had a great time last night at Nacho Daddy's restaurant near the Las Vegas strip. I had the fajitas which were awesome! A lot of food for 1 person. My server Scarlett was awesome too! Prices are very reasonable.

CzA_Gg5N5Dbt_qlVhhERNw.text: Was craving that melty type of cheesy queso and this place definitely satisfied that craving! So packed with extras on the top! Wish we had one here close by in SoCal.   Not to mention, they gave a free margarita if you check in via Yelp. Great place to go if you want a hearty meal after walking hella miles on the strip and are down for some delicious, messy food!

Iv7p4qHdZgEps5x9YSVjYw.text: Every time me and my gf visit Vegas we have to go eat at nacho daddy, the nachos are amazing and very filling, the margaritas are delicious and the staff is very friendly.

menY2w_PjGrCzU4f_E1TMQ.text: Great food, great atmosphere! I highly recommend the Lobster & Crab nachos. Plenty big enough for two people to share.

OChd9p2pGmmsUM20KGdchg.text: $5 Happy hour, where everything really is $5? Yes! A big screen showing the Thursday night football game? Yes! Smaller screens playing nostalgic videos to throw you back to the I want my MTV days? Yes! A beautiful server that was patient with my lost his filter mouthy husband? Yes!  Thank you for taking great care of us Alex. She recommended a bottled beer when my husband was being picky and he really enjoyed it.  I had a glass of the happy hour white wine and it hit the spot.  We shared happy hour bbq chicken nachos and they were so tasty, we ordered a second round of them. We also loved the southwest chimichangas, super crisp on the outside, rich and tasty on the inside.   We watched someone take a scorpion shot and although it's fun to watch, I don't think that will ever land on my bucket list. The aquarium with scorpions in it is pretty cool!

e2pfTbErZIkD1OnBq5bAsw.text: Very good food and service. My first time and enjoyed it. The salsa was served warm and delish. The beef nachos were awesome. The restaurant has a cool vibe. I highly recommend this restaurant. My only complaint is the floor was dirty thru the dining room. The management lacks leadership on cleaning the rest thru out the day.

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Beef nachos

OjnAxGsDKHFKKQvjaB8KfQ.text: I searched out this place for dinner when we were on the strip based on the good reviews. We were not disappointed! There was a small wait for a table, but seats opened up at the bar so we jumped in. Our server was Elise, very helpful and attentive. We used the "check in" on the Yelp app for our free house margaritas. Not the best I ever drank but they were free! We ordered the guacamole and chips as our appetizer. The guacamole had bits of tomato mixed in and a very good flavor with a little spice (jalapeno?). The chips were crispy with a touch of salt and held up without breaking during scooping. I ordered the grilled fish tacos with mango salsa, delicious! My husband ordered the chicken tacos that he said were equally delicious. We left feeling stuffed and wishing for bigger stomachs to eat more. This is definitely a great place to visit and I'll keep it on my list for my next visit to Vegas.

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fish tacos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken tacos

Bb9zHUTE5WaVkaqMpmd14g.text: Oh my gosh nachos for days!!! I don't think there would ever be a day when I would turn down nachos. This place is so good that my family ate here two nights in a row.   We eat mainly vegetarian food, and they had an entire separate vegan menu. I appreciate Mexican restaurants that are starting to provide more vegetarian options. And their vegan menu truly emulates their regular menu, with a variety of options. The two star dishes for us were the vegan fajitas and the massive vegetarian nachos.   They fire the fajitas at your table so it's really a sizzler. It's not all just show - the flavors all come through amazingly, blending the veggies, soy chicken, sauces, etc. I probably ate 2 or 3 fajitas all on my own.   Now onto the nachos!!! These are massive omg. We shared them for the 4 of us and everyone got a good amount of nachos. They top them with all the goodies - including guac, beans, sour cream, jalapenos, etc. If I could, I would just order nachos and eat a whole plate of these without ordering any entrees.   Ok the cherry on top - Yelp check ins get a free margarita!! Nachos + margaritas? Night made. You can upgrade to a special margarita and just pay the difference between the house marg and the special one. Pretty great deal if you ask me.   Final words - service was great for a busy restaurant on the Strip. Our waitresses on both nights were accommodating to our preferences and attentive to when we needed them at the table. I'd come back here 10 out of 10 times!

sXnsL-Pm-ubvnycIXGl4XQ.text: Love this place. Best Nachos ever! Whenever we are in Vegas, we eat there at least one time. Friendly staff. Great margaritas. Thanks

OkvhMyM-aVfOTOfZvmwS2g.text: We have eaten at the the Nacho daddy downtown but had never visited the newer location on the strip! As I remembered the food was great and the service was top notch. We spent a few hours here at the bar.   Several jalapeno margaritas later we had one of the famous scorpion shots! "Don't worry they aren't alive"  We also had the dip sampler and Fajita Nachos! Definitely recommend this place!  Laid back attitude and not to crazy loud either! Will definitely be back!

c_we3V0T20optUY8Wc-vNg.text: I come to this place all the time during my Vegas trips and it never disappoints. The atmosphere is fun, open, and great for large groups.   The selection of nachos are ridiculous and they have crazy combinations of meats, cheeses, sauces etc. They also have a great bottlemless chips and salsa appetizer for the party people. In our group we ordered the taco salad, shrimp and steak fajitas, and nachos. I was pleased with the food, it was kind of oily but maybe if I had gone into the restaurant a little more intoxicated I would have been okay with it. All in all it's still a great time and I'll be back my next Vegas trip I'm sure.

They have meat options too so if you're going with a group of friends, there's something for everyone.  Service is good and attentive. It gets busy so try to book a reservation if possible. Highly recommend

Bu4m3itsr87ADZK-JbRuGw.text: Just to get this out of the way: Nacho Daddy is not "great" Mexican food. It is GOOD Mexican food that tastes much better when you're drunk or hungover ^_^   However, their service is wonderful, the margaritas are delicious, and prices are cheap compared to other stuff on the strip. They're a very convenient stumble from Planet Hollywood and surrounding hotels.

0LcA1NFF769t9PPU88zxgw.text: Fast service and a wonderful vegan menu. My husband and I shared the Vegan Chick'n Nachos and he liked it as much as me. He usually doesn't like the vegan version of food, but this was the exception. Thanks for catering to everyone's tastes!

hZb8FOxISq3pwpqstOHGng.text: After a tiring day roaming around Vegas and nearby areas, we stopped for a late night meal. Reviews were too good to pass this place without trying. Unfortunately they had limited vegetarian options unlike other Mexican restaurants. Chips and guacamole dip were good but Quesadilla was just okay, nothing special. House Margarita was too strong for my liking.  All in all, an okay place but nothing special as said in reviews. Maybe it was one of the nights and they were out of other vegetarian options but not worth a second visit.

UkdJnnWHPlWcDy1Duu8NCg.text: Excellent food and service! Jovany was so energetic and kind. Also the spicy cucumber margarita is delicious. Highly recommend!

CRPqn6BWTgHZLvj0xcw5EA.text: This place has great nachos and service. Our bartenders Sierra and Bryce were great! Over our week stay in Vegas, my husband and I came here twice. We tried the Fiesta nachos, supreme toastada nacho(fave), & chicken chimichanga (which is huge).  We did the #scorpionshot and one of the (off duty) bartenders did it with us. It's a small pickled scorpion in a tequila shot that you swallow whole. Overall Nacho Daddy was a fun & unique experience which is quite a lot to say considering it's Vegas!

DMoOolt3UycobDZ7XSq-yA.text: I would have to say, if you love Nacho then this is the place to be! We order the Thai Nacho, considering the fact I'm half Thai and never would even thought of anyone coming up with this dish was pretty amazing! Along with corn on the cob, and ceviche and some beers and don't forget too TRY the scorpion shot it's a must! Desiree our server extremely persistence, down too earth, and made us feel like home! By far the whole experiment was awesome, good energy and most important good vibes

TTW0fXGOCea0ezghsPsRSg.text: Grand Opening...  Huge Failure!!  What a disappointment!  I was told how great this place was per their other locations.  Not only was it not great, it, in all ways, redefined mediocre.  The food portions were smaller than should be, toppings scarce and waitress not well informed or may have been stoned.  Either way, I was totally underwhelmed.    If I am opening a new location I make sure the nachos are loaded with cheese and toppings.  Not the case.  This is nachos, not beef wellington.  Should not have been that hard.  Maybe they need to send their staff to the other locations to see what it SHOULD be.  If they can't afford food costs which have to be maybe 10%, don't bother.  And neither should you.

8ykBhIZ431yThMsMLb05Rg.text: Where do I start?  It sounds like a cheesy place (get it?  Cheesy??), but this place is amazing!  We had wonderful service on our first visit from Scarlett at the bar.  She made wonderful suggestions, provided kind service, and engaged us with small talk and banter to make the meal that much better.  We had nachos, the daddy michelada (OMG YUM), and the peach margarita (yummmmmm).  The service was so good that we decided to come back.  I returned yesterday for breakfast and once again this place did not disappoint.  Our food and the service were once again top notch!  Brandon was sooo helpful and so nice.  He was our food runner and while there I mentioned that all of the employees were nice and constantly on the move running from place to place.  Hats off to the management, you've done good!

vGHXJAqP2xfG1ZEzpsTqfA.text: Cool ambience, Scarlett was on it, all in all a great experience for my first trip to the new Nacho Daddy!! Triple dip add refried beans to queso is a must :)

BQLXq7dmmAZr6s5eDEQZOw.text: Kiel was an amazing server!! Super friendly and recommended delicious dishes when we couldn't decide what to order!

My boyfriend really wanted to go here (had decided this would be our first eating destination well before our arrival in town), and RAVED about the shrimp nachos; I found the enchiladas just okay.  The Cadillac Margarita was not strong at all, which surprised a lightweight like me.  The staff is friendly, and they have all kinds of videos playing on the tv, so it's a relaxing, inexpensive place to pass the time.  We did not try the scorpion shots, but it was fun to look at the the scorpions in the tank by the front door.

We also had the burrito, excellent with sides of rice & beans.  Just off the strip less than 1/2 block & so worth it to experience it.  Woody decor inside with an upper & lower level.

08MsvUPfz4dTbfnC0WKo4A.text: The food here is phenomenal. If you really like nachos this is the place to go. I like how they have a guaranteed "every chip is wet". I sat at the bar in the bartenders were very friendly. They help me very quickly. And my food came out quickly but it was still fresh. The place is kind of hard to find because it's around the corner connected to Planet Hollywood. However, it's right past the Buffalo wild wings on Harmon and Las Vegas Blvd.

VRa_dmQEJYTUaSiLc-hZ0g.text: LOVEEEE. A huge group of us came to Nacho Daddy for lunch and we all loved our food. The restaurant itself is huge, with big screens playing a very random assortment of old hits. There are also a bunch of birds inside, which I wasn't a huge fan of because it felt like they were going to fly into me or poop on me.  There's a free margarita with check-in, and they do NOT skimp on the alcohol. You can have it either regular or blended, or even upgrade to a fancier margarita and just pay the difference.  The nacho servings here are so huge that we shared 1 plate of nachos for every 2 people. My friend and I got the spicy shrimp nachos and we loved them!! They're a perfect amount of spicy, and the shrimp is seasoned and so flavorful!! I love how there are so many toppings that no chip has to be eaten dry.  The prices are more than reasonable too- I believe our spicy shrimp nachos were $18.95. We paid less than $10 each for a huge plate of nachos and a margarita!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spicy shrimp nachos, enough for 2 people! (-$20)

You can split every entree...especially the Burritos and Chimichangas, they are HUGE! Love the Blood Orange Margarita. Check in with Yelp and you get a free house margarita or the cost of the house margarita applied to any other margarita of your choice. Well worth the visit!!!

RRNjRrSFquaGPs7mKmezqw.text: I did like coming here, if you love nachos like me come here but prefer to pay a premium like $5 dollars more compared to the hole in the wall.  We did a Yelp check in and got a free margarita and a choice of on the rocks or frozen.  They are not cheap on the alcohol though as they put in quite a bit as it was too strong for me.  We order the filet mignon nachos for $20 dollars and they do give you quite a bit and we shared.  They do have happy hour, but they did not tell us about it until we saw the pork rinds for $4 dollars and decided to order that and wished we saw the menu first before ordering.  I would recommend this place.

iilqLIyTSOU9_-nYc-qm9w.text: Nacho Daddy never fails us. Good drinks (the free house margarita with a yelp check in is actually pretty good, and strong), good food, and good atmosphere! I recommend the Flaming Shrimp for the appetizer.

SdguSzpvUwuHexTrlwNMWA.text: The free margarita check in offer drew us here, as well as the pics of good looking nachos. We were freaked out by the photos of the scorpion shots (not our kind of deal), but actually the tank with a few scorpions in it at the front was pretty cool. I hope they keep those ones alive.  For our late night dinner/snack, we shared the Thai chicken nachos, which are interestingly made with spinach chips. Portions were sizeable and the chicken was well flavored. The veggies turned out to be bean sprouts and bell peppers. Overall happy with the food, it was a nice light dish without being too heavy.  Gabby was our server, and she was awesome! She got us both margaritas, including one strawberry margarita. Yum!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Thai chicken nachos (half eaten lol) with house and strawberry margaritas

lScbYbxSgHMX_xdJ3A6x1Q.text: Tasty and fun. The staff was really friendly and helpful and the free yelp margarita went down nice and easy. If you're looking for something quick and tasty, this is the place, esp if you love nachos!

6ANS6pYMcgdJJwTiOz3jww.text: Good quality food, decent service and ice cold drinks. You can customize your order to fit your dietary needs.

v5yp8Qk92oTWTkU8I3XDmQ.text: I am a huge fan of Nacho Daddy. It's a little pricey but it's a nice place to take family and friends that come in from out of town. They have a great tasting and real cool looking menu items and a lot of choices. It's a fun place you should check it out!

Vwn8rYjynCOwHi3ywy_zgA.text: Food was pretty alright, got free margs with a check in through the yelp app which was fun. Scorpion tank in the front of the restaurant was awesome!

qtC67J4eMXpR5jKnSxVIXw.text: Excellent food and service! The lobster crab street tacos were amazing, paired with 'Daddy's margarita' it was the best lunch I've ever had! Huck was my server and is the absolute best, sit in his section and you are in great hands!

Fn0fik9_WD6TLXvmlUUGKQ.text: I stopped here on my last trip to Vegas. I was really interested in trying the vegan queso.   Food: I ordered the avocado tacos and the vegan queso. The tacos were really good. I wasn't sure that I would like fried avocado, but it worked. The salsa was perfect because the batter wasn't really seasoned, so it wouldn't have tasted good without it. The queso was also good. The toppings have to be stirred in otherwise it could be bland. I ordered a root beer, but it looked like they had a really good selection of alcohol if interested. I sent my husband back the next day to get more queso for me.   Service: because I went by myself, I just sat at the bar. Rebecka was very nice and checked on me fairly often.

K4EvM6H1tTppA5-5Wn1GUg.text: Great atmosphere and fun bar on the strip. Nachos were very tasty! Drinks were good with nice variety.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chase makes the best Marguerites!!

5rmODWM0EwYLZRwOnilRWA.text: Cool location and attentive bartenders. Really liked the appetizer (queso dip) and our friends loved their nachos but the drinks were way too sweet. I couldn't give the place 3 stars because I enjoyed our time there but I would have a hard time ordering anything but beer in the future.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

bJiIyS0d7itZyNSx0nOJMQ.text: Stayed at the Elara and was looking for a tasty relatively inexpensive place to eat aside from the big names (that suck) on the strip. Yelp came to the rescue and I saw the Nacho Daddy was within the Miracle Mile which is connected to the Elara. It feels like you're exiting the property which you are but when you turn right, the establishment is right there close to - couple yards from the intersection of Las Vegas Blvd. If you sit outside you can hear and see a lot of the hustle of the strip.   Nachos were really good, I was happy to see all the vegetarian options. I would have liked my nachos to be more cheesy. They were perfectly spiced however and the flavors all melded very well. Huge portions and so two people can easily share. I had a peach margarita along with my meal which was quite strong but good. I was happy with the prospect that I could take it to go as I had an early morning but still wanted to enjoy it back in my room. They had live music while I was there and it was a fun little joint to enjoy when you sort of just want to get away from what is the strip. Will defiantly be back when in Vegas. Not for that scorpion shot though!

0mjZkbZZQIc8YAmYGd47_g.text: I went to Vegas for an event and looked up best Vegan restaurants, so I went to this place. It has a easy going vibe, kind of a cross between old Mexico meets American cowboy. They have an entire section for Vegans. All the food selections looked delicious. We chose several different dishes and shared them between the 3 of us. The food was incredible! The flavor was unbelievablely tasty and fresh. I couldn't get over it! I went back the next day and had the chocolate cake and coffee. Like the rest of the food it looks as good as it tastes. They brought out my very own French press, a classy touch. Thank you especially to the wait staff Ally, Ari (sp)? and Peter the manager. They all had terrific attitudes! FYI they are opening one in Georgia for those of us who live on the East coast. * I wanted to add that this restaurant is not solely Vegan, but that they have a terrific selection and how thankful I am that they have Vegan food!!

g3vjmEnVAnLkpCRSYE2OEA.text: I have fallen in love! This place was fantastic and I will make a point to come back EVERY time I come to Vegas. The service was fast and friendly. Food came fast and hot. It tasted fantastic (I picked spicy shrimp nachos) and portions were big and filling . House beer choices were also great and cold. A perfect end to long day. Highly recommend to all who come to Sin City.

EuW0GCk2vnzKkpgX7kqsPQ.text: Had the Enchilada Nachos really good, its really dark needs better lighting , the hostess kept pushing the bar for some reason with everyone who kept coming in only a 10 min wait and my waitress brought me a flat coke she came back after 10 mins but I would definitely go back

niVzhHpIDR8NPZl72SFi2w.text: My best friend & I were craving Mexican food and stumbled upon this place on Yelp. When I saw that we get a free Margarita by checking in, I instantly wanted to go. We liked this place so much, we came twice on our vacation!   The bottomless chips and salsa were great! I got the chicken enchiladas (smothered in queso) the first time and Daddy's Bowl the second. I liked how my server allowed me to create my own crispy tortilla bowl. That was my favorite out of the two meals.   Our strawberry margarita was a bit more than free because we got a flavor add-in, but that was fine. The only downfall was that the margaritas weren't strong at all; they tasted like a slurpee from 7-Eleven (which was delicious)! On our last visit, we got the regular house margarita (it wasn't strong either). You would think being in Vegas the drinks would have more liquor, but no complaints because it was free.   I personally thought this restaurant wasn't that  expensive, which is another reason why I enjoyed it. The food filled me for a great price! I plan on visiting Nacho Daddy again when I travel to Vegas!

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Daddy&#39;s Bowl (crispy tortilla shell/added shredded chicken)

06wxiMgKKCq2XKmpBG3HgQ.text: Nacho Daddy was good.  We ordered the Filet Nachos.  Very yummy.  We blame ourselves, we ordered poorly.   The breakfast taco was served on  possibly the most yummy soft shelled taco I've ever tasted, however the eggs were smothered in a queso sauce... so it simply wasn't what I expected. Keep it simple, eggs and a strip of bacon would have been perfect.   My wife had the chicken taco.  The shell was the highlight, it was also very good.  Cool spot on the Strip and very good service.  Rachel took excellent care of us.  Super quick, super smiley and upbeat for dealing with many Vegas hangovers.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet Nachos - very good - end up using a fork!  Too much going on!

xqei93fInqN08FDXw6G2-g.text: Awesome service at the bar. Scarlett is an amazing bartender. Great food. Can't beat it especially when you have a nacho craving even late night after drinking in Vegas. Not quite right on the strip but well worth the extra few steps that it takes to get here. Definitely a must have and we will definitely be back!!!

4PE766pframqQeWpBMBxYg.text: Excellent! The food was favorable,  portions were huge(plenty for later), the service was excellent. Most places do not have ground beef tacos anymore, therefore, I was soooo excited.  The drinks were a little pricey, but powerful. Great margaritas. It will be our spot for great Mexican food in Vegas. Will be recommending to friends and family.

ZPvN1rBprWsXN5xxhZo1-A.text: This is a great place!  We were here for three days and visited every day, once for lunch, the other 2 for breakfast.  We had their nachos, their specialty of course, and they were awesome!  The breakfast menu might be a little small, but still really good.  Had the bacon cheese rancheros and the Chilaquilas with bottomless mimosas!  Our service was impeccable!  Bartenders are very friendly.   Would definitely recommend this place to anyone.  They are on Harmon Ave just a short walk away from Miracle Miles Shops.

73abk9aoshJ0DyLvaRVABg.text: MJ is always fantastic. Smiling and prompt. Great atmosphere and staff. They are always busting their butts to get you a table quickly. Always clean. The food is always excellent. Edward was fantastic as well. Very professional and courteous. We always come back to this location.

d_mTd9lojRTqjCZfmFLHPQ.text: Nachos are pretty good but the service is worse than horrible. Got here  and it was pretty empty but had to wait to be seated, so sat at the bar instead. We sat at the bar for 20 minutes and asked repeatedly to be served. Finally just went back to the greeter and got a seat at a table and service was still slow AF.

-OUuvlyFHx037AGnx7ls6Q.text: This place is such a hidden gem. It's right around the corner from PBR and Buffalo Wild Wings which means it's 50ft off the actual strip and everything is priced really well! Don't feel like paying $20 for a margarita or $30 for a meal? Turn the corner and go here because it's amazing! My husband ordered the Thai Nachos and had no complaints! We sat at the bar and had the best service of the entire weekend. The street tacos were just as good if not better than any local Mexican place in soCal. Most importantly, the drinks are strong and yummy! Definitely give this place a try if you're on this end of the strip!

uLGVYjB38qnYvqlwVcm2dg.text: Great service while in Vegas! Food was delicious, especially during the late night venture we had. Our waiter was extremely courteous and made us feel extremely important when he noticed our food took a little too long to come out of the kitchen. Will remember this place the next Vegas trip.

x_z8ZAde8ZCb5lK6sPDKpA.text: We dropped in on a rainy day for some nachos and a quick Margarita.   We were not disappointed there are several nacho choices as you would expect from Nacho Daddy :-)   And plenty of great margaritas to sample and of course you can take one to go in Las Vegas!  Comfortable place to chill with the music in booths tables bars or even a loft area.

Q0hQ4BWE_aVY7EV9ReYSCw.text: So our service was ok, but there was drama between the servers that caused things to be not as good as it could be. And that basically sums up the atmosphere there. If you just want booze and a giant plate of nachos and care not about service or the quality, it's a good option. The food was average, it wasn't bad, but it is not something I really want to have again.

kGIA_92wOGj_aETLdE7hKQ.text: Overall, the visit was amazing! My girlfriend and I shared the Salsa Verde Nachos, it fed us perfectly and tasted awesome. My Father got the Nacho Supreme I tried it and it was great, too my Aunt and Uncle got the Filet Mignon Nachos they were very good, also. We got the Queso appetizer and that was just as superb. The only issue I had was that the menu doesn't specify if the jalapenos are picked or fresh for each meal. So I suggest asking if you care. We will definitely be going back next time we're in Vegas.

Qta6mPwFtfoFp7aMd84bZg.text: Allison at front is so unprofessional, she gave us an attitude for asking for a different table, no smile, no friendliness, and she moves so slow from one place to another, she looks so unprofessional with that dumb, ghetto bini, but she sure smiled and acted friendly at the white family that came in after us, the food was madicocre and bland, what a disappointment, never going back as long as they hire racists like Allison

3J9VfYNXEfrUZYNzxnU6wg.text: My wife and I had just finished the Rock and Roll 5K and were looking for something relatively quick and near our timeshare. This place was right across from the hotel (it's part of PH's Miracle Mile Shops), and it was new, so we opted to try it out. As it was Saturday night, there was a fairly long line, of course, so we were expecting a ~15-minute wait. The host hooked us up, though, by giving us a spot at the bar - probably since we were the only, or one of the only, couple(s) (i.e., nongroup) there.  In my at times utterly futile, but steadfast, quest to go vegetarian, I went right to the menu's vegan section (it's quite a nice selection, BTW), and opted for the Vegan Chick'n Tacos. It came with wild rice, black beans, chipotle onions and salsa (along with the chick'n, obviously). Honestly, this faux chicken tasted as close to actual poultry as anything I can remember in some time - marinated nicely, fresh, cooked just right. Really good. The beans and rice went well with all of that. Didn't mess with the chipotle onions too much - whew, were they hot! Between my lemonade and water I was guzzling for a couple minutes there.  Not a drinker, so can't speak about the quality of their spirits; the Ms. enjoyed her Mai Tai, FWeTW, as well as the chicken - the "e" included - enchiladas (and they did look really good).  I wish I'd gotten our bartender/server's name - she was a hoot! Energetic, attentive, and friendly. The atmosphere was laid-back and relaxed, at least at the bar.  All told, everything came out to ~$40 or so - not bad for what turned out to be dinner on the Strip.  Glad we tried this spot. Will definitely return next visit to Sin City.  (Sorry for the pic-less review - I'm new to Yelping. Next time, though!)

90TES6VB3RT_EykbIcSqLA.text: Spicy vegan burrito and vegan nachos are really really good if your vegan. Great service and very friendly. Highlet recommend. AJ is very nice and has great information about Vegas and other Vegan restaurants. Thank you

Lv0vFBZkU5UvEkPUqO5eGg.text: Desi was awesome and the food was great. I love nachos and a good time, thanks for showing me both nacho daddy!!! Your the best!!

And the chicken tortitia soup is so good, I highly recommend it. There's so much chicken swimming around, the soup is full meal by it self. Definitely a go-to restaurant when in Vegas. Those restaurants on the strip with same price range dont even come close. More bang for your buck$. You won't be disappointed.

Filet Mignon Nachos - wow, never have I ever had such amazing nachos. the filet mignon was cooked well and the cheese, toppings, and chip ratio was perfect.   Free margarita with check-in too! It literally tastes like lemonade. I loved it!

sxwDBrypcofV_-DuoaPnRA.text: Best nacho place in the whole world! Lol this is my go-to place when I'm in Vegas. The nachos are beyond delicious, especially the filet mignon nachos.   The menu offers a ton of options, even vegan ones which is amazing for my vegan friends. I've been there so many times and the food has always been excellent. Two of my friends took the scorpion shot! I wouldn't do it myself but it's definitely a fun experience, and that's what makes this place so unique.  Bonus point: I love the song selection there, they always play some great Backstreet Boys, *NSYNC songs . Five stars all around.

PE5yMQgnrlzADTRZ-Rfs_A.text: Worth the wait. Just off the strip. Delicious food with a good atmosphere, lots of locals dining in.

DBn66OoqsRZWuUbqARVA1g.text: This was my first time to order take out from this restaurant. It was in walking distance from my hotel and I wanted to see what the hype was with these nachos. I ordered the vegan nachos and I am truly impressed. You would never know that it was dairy free either. That's what was so mind boggling. Definitely an experience worth trying. I was convinced.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Nachos!! Omgosh so yummy, dairy free, nut free, simply delicious

5pwSUBJarb3XIaDNsnWrbg.text: Nacho lovers gather here!  The menu is definitely dedicated to the different styles and types of nachos you can get. However they do have some other options like burritos and enchiladas to choose from.  We got a Daddy Margarita (basically a house marg) and a nacho supreme with beef. The nachos were pretty good, decent sized for $19. You do have to order chips and salsa separate for $3 if you're wanting some.   The service was meh. I felt like it took a long time and was a definite buzzkill to the frozen daiquiri I drank before.  Inside is cool - lots of different decorations like old bookshelves, western decor & much more.  Nacho Daddy is located right next to the new Buffalo Wild Wings outside and around the corner from Planet Hollywood.  Check in on Yelp to get a free house margarita!

pIfzKseB51aA6nPh7S2lYA.text: This place is bomb! We order vegan loaded nachos and Thai Chicken nachos with vegan chicken. They both are very nice. We also ordered 4 cheese nachos this is something I like to order every single time, also they have free margaritas if you checkin on Yelp. Definitely recommend this place to everyone.
