eP_QHGTyUoHWXafmhXDY5g.text: Delicious!!! Great variety of nachos.  You can toy something different every time.  Fun atmosphere.  Bartender super nice

ixfjZJuuFcSVAXd8cmSvxg.text: When you walk by and you see a tank full of scorpions, you kinda have to stop in.  Located on the south side of the Planet Hollywood building, Nacho Daddy is a hub of great Mexican cuisine and fun Las Vegas drinks and music. With waves of people coming in throughout the night, laughing and drinking on the patio, you will always feel like you belong. The bartenders have a laid back, but attentive, attitude while mixing a delicious house margarita (which was in fact on the house when I checked in on yelp)!  I had the Fajitas, wings, chips and salsa and the blanco queso - I actually didn't order the cheese dip, but it was seriously good on everything. I ended up dipping my wings in it, putting it on my fajitas and of course dipping my chips in it.   One of the owners was there that night and he was hanging and partying with the chef, who was a lot younger than I thought he would have been.   An overall fun night and I look forward to making Nacho Daddy my return to place in Vegas!  Enjoy!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpion shot with your choice of poison!

svLApbTUbnTHt24tDDX0fQ.text: Food was great. They have a full vegan menu option. Staff was friendly. Fun place clean and portions are perfect. I recommend to give it a try.

Cs-z1q7ltU4mcIk2M_wfhQ.text: I went to have some drinks and appetizers, food and drinks were good but if this Is a Mexican concept why there is not Hispanic music

02cPzY1QXslIM9r1J1B5Jg.text: WOW!! This place is the best. The BEST. I wish we found it sooner on our trip. They have an entire vegan section that is to die for. We got one of every vegan item. The loaded nacho plate was just unbelievable. The chicken tacos were mouthwatering. Oh man, it was all so good. I can't stress how amazing this was. How they made the vegan food taste so good I'll never know.  The atmosphere is loud and almost bar like. There is a bar in the middle. Big TVs all around. Very nice service and waitress.   Would absolutely 10000% go back.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

TtNYA61RrJvqB3H3uLu7MA.text: I am going to say 3.5 to 4 stars.  I know it was the holidays when we came but it was a really long wait for the host to come. I get the holidays and such but there were servers and bartenders looking at us and no one could even acknowledge or say hold on a second that sort of killed my vibe.  They have cute stuff like #getstung if you down get the scorpion shot.  I got the crab and lobster enchilada  and it was just okay when I had the meat without the anything else it sort of tasted meh like just defrosted. The rice was really good and so was the queso.  LOVEEEE ME SOME GOOD QUESO.  My boyfriend got the mojo pork tacos and it was really meaty and juicy but I really wish it had more seasoning it was missing something.  also they offer a margarita when you do yelp check in and that was pretty good.

NIx1C8DZDvxKe4NWVRDc-Q.text: Second visit, as good as I remembered. Went to the one just off the Strip this time. Seemed to have a larger menu then the one on Freamont St. More seating and run atmosphere. Had BBQ Nachos, excellent suggestion from waitress. Chicken Quesadilla was "yummy". Able to switch out fries with salad for the side.   Great place you have to visit.

B9tDZUF1Ib9q7DFao5Hbzg.text: I was expecting WOW experience since it is in Vegas, will it was okay. I had better Mexican food and Margaritas. I would have to say this place is one hit wonder place.

6j59owg34ML2hoOFxMI1sA.text: Love this place. The tequila is great too. The nachos will not disappoint. Huge portions. You can probably share. Great friendly staff. Just eat at the bar. We will come back here next time we visit. Check in for free margaritas.  Yes we tried the house tequila. Very smooth.

xDfkrKVNlD0aUIFhsutKRA.text: This was a fun lunch we stopped in for a casual experience that looked fun.  Got some great nachos and fajitas, with some tequila of course, haha. I enjoyed it and would recommend; no issues, but it was a more causal spot.

47CiQTi5TBKBswaBez4X7g.text: We were looking forward to this place for months preparing for Vegas. Super. Excited about the shot of. Tequila with scorpion for our friends birthday.  The place looks awesome, food from a distance looked great, staff lighting food on fire was cool. We ordered our shots waited with anticipation till the bomb was dropped. Our waitor says "we are out of scorpion, actually its company wide outage" Company wide scorpion shortage? Your claim to fame? Waitor just found out? Hmmm  Out nachos arrived looked awesome smelled awesome, and that's about as good as it got. Lots of chips very little cheese. I realize maybe I have eaten at one to many fuzion and pub establishments that have pampered my lust for large amounts of cheese, but let's face it. Perfect nachos don't run out of the complementing ingredient way before the chips! So two strikes...  Maybe next time I'll give it a shot as long as scorpion are back

sRIxjx5bdPQL_i1BunJM2g.text: Great food and big portion!  If you are looking for reasonably priced meal, this is a place to go!

6YJh5Clfzi3vvGPQXBUFUw.text: Love the variety of the menu and if you are doing a protein diet! Check out the spinach chips

46uMnVqwTzUoSAjyNRI0gQ.text: Food was delicious! Ordered the fiesta nachos and just like others mentioned, it was really crispy.  The battered fish tacos are a MUST.

AlRBsopjOwx_9hIVSy-haw.text: Got kicked out for not liking Las Vegas. Manager wearing a Dallas Cowboys jersey claimed I was abusing his employees. Booker and several other bartenders were more than accommodating and did an amazing job. I spent well over 100 dollars on drinks. All the while I was never belligerent or disrespectful. I dislike Vegas, but that shouldn't be a limiting factor on my ability to spend money quietly. Nacho daddy seems like a good bar. They merely have a simple minded and below average manager on duty. 2/10 will only go back to support the real team there. Fix your management problem and I will spend far too much at nacho daddy.

Z_d6xDvf_fhsb5OP7y_KIQ.text: Decent food at a decent price. The margaritas were pretty good too! The wait wasn't too bad.

wSLMCRKQa1kMSYuFfJsXgA.text: Nachos are terrific. Probably the best anywhere. The burritos were almost all rice; very disappointing. They need to fix that. Service was below average. The waitress was like a robot and seemed tweaked when I broke out the yelp free margarita.  Despite the service and average burrito, I would go back for the nachos and try something else on the menu.

qeA5GxpDxg4K-PY9at7QYw.text: Food comes in huge quantities but needs some spice to it. If you're sitting at the bar, find Lauren. She's awesome!

6rxDxdV4CFcG98OrizDfdg.text: I came here with my family got there and was seated right away which was great. Then I got some menus and proceeded to wait 25 minutes. Nobody stopped by I didn't even get courtesy water offered to us. One star from me.

AI6Cl6Pdu-h-xn8xTd-16Q.text: With BWW next door, you would be surprised to get far superior wings at a "nacho" restaurant. It is an excellent value, with great food and service!

Q0kEfP5S49jpXhHK-vsJfw.text: Nacho daddy was awesome!! Great drinks. Great atmosphere. Great Food! I didn't try the scorpion shots but its there for you!!!

XgeCctMZRJSSRqSet_XBGA.text: Updated review. I've been speaking to Tyler Smith who works in the HR department. I was reached out regarding my review on the experience I had at nachodaddy.  This company I must say really does care about the customers and their experience here.   My bad experience was heard, and was offered a gift card (which I accepted the offer)  I'm now talking to another HR person Peter who  wants to hear my experience at nachodaddy also. I'm very impressed how quickly they responded to my Yelp review and my email and my call. I'm really hoping the next time I come to nacho daddy I will have a better experience with the staff.  And my food experience remains the same. The nachos I had ( enchilada nachos) were very very yummy.

CX1l_xafYnRE4160srKaHg.text: Found this place while looking for places to eat near the Miracle Mile shops.   Located outside the Miracle Mile Shops on Harmon Nacho Daddy portions are large the 2 of us split a plate of the CHICKEN TINGA NACHOS )Tender chicken breast marinated in our own smoky chipotle & tomato tinga sauce, yellow queso, melted Jack & Cheddar cheese, refried beans, sour cream, avocado, pickled onions, & queso fresco on top of our house-made chips) which are a Vegas thing and were so delicious.  Each plate of Nachos is around $15  Plus since we were there during Happy Hour we split 2 street Tacos and each had a strawberry margarita.    The wait for a table was 20 mins which I did find odd since there were alot of empty tables so we sat at the bar which was fine.  Only two complaints I would have are one the ladies restrooms were dirty and dark, the other was there were 2 young women at the bar who were drunk ( 3 shots each in 15 mins) were asking the bartenters if they had real breast or implants & asked to feel one of the bartenders breast.    I chalked it up to being in Vegas

yH6mTjuXQYI92hhXWQutDA.text: Had the Crab & lobster nachos. They were okay but next time, I would prefer to get the steak nachos instead. The atmosphere was cool. Decent customer service. I visited the location inside Planet Hollywood Las Vegas

nfZ8g2IhlOW766Ck9CYLkQ.text: The atmosphere at nacho daddy was awesome. Great tunes, great food and plenty of it. I ordered the tostadas nachos and they were delicious! I'm not big on spicy and could have done with less jalapenos but these still made a great meal!  Margarita's were delicious as was the happy hour deal on Mexican draft beers!

EChn4oSetU6rE2cFfg9JIA.text: Tons of great vegan options! The staff was very accomadating for our big happy hour party (~12 people). Great deal to get a free margarita for checking in on yelp.

2ffU_lZonnLaQJ5UdH8dhg.text: Nachos were very well made except for being a bit skimpy on the meat which is what is to be expected for a $16 filet mignon nacho plate on the strip. Add on a $8 premium margarita to this monthly special plus a free yelp check in house margarita and it was a very good bang for buck meal for two.

yFUj_TNdHiWgrivop-ScCw.text: Had the Flaming shrimp tacos and they were great.  Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is we got the trio dip and they bring such a small portion of chips so you have to get waiters attention for more chips.  Also, didn't feel like waiter stayed on top of drinks like I would expect.

tPiPSx3uwrhwWvKoJk2hLg.text: Had a good time at this restaurant they definitely have a good vibe going on I ordered the grilled wings they were  so good a friend got the enchilada nachos and another friend got chicken nachos both were delicious chicken nachos were better in my opinion servers were really friendly

SHEi7_1DNcFARYsgiQXiZQ.text: Fabulous! Service was perfect, attentive but not too much so,  and the menu was creative and fun to read. We had the shrimp tacos and the chimichanga. Both were incredibly flavorful and wonderful all around. Skinny margarita was excellent as well. Loved this place!

dxM-sIbEhfVxEOCCXFHkVg.text: Overall very mediocre environment and food quality. In addition our service was quite lackluster even though we attended for a friends 21st birthday dinner. Would most likely not go back again. However, if you check in on yelp you do in fact get a free margarita.

iyLFw8glIfFnUy7AcjKbbQ.text: Died and went to food heaven. Amazing food and drinks. Nachos are CRAZY good!!!  Thao's recommendations: - Lobster & Crab Nachos (oh gawd, one of the best things I've ever eaten in my of life!) - Surf & Turf Taco Combo  Other Mentions: - Portions are large and shareable. - They usually have Yelp Check-In offers, like a free margarita. Do it!

ebVafDifSYrwjzx8KhTypg.text: I LOOOOOOOOOOVE nachos!!!  This is the place to get your nacho on!  No lie, no dry chips.

X2Vd9azj6Gcnzt47h9MdtA.text: Las Vegas is like my second home and with that I had the opportunity to try out Nacho Daddy. Unfortunately when I got robbed of my phone my pictures were in my phone :( so I didn't get to post my savory eats.  First off this establishment is in Planet Hollywood which is one of my Favorite spots on the strip. Upon arrival we were greeted there were families and kids here but we opted to sit at the bar.  The Bartender was friendly but the drink I ordered sucked. It was too strong and did not taste like a bended Margarita should taste like. The bartender was more than happy to craft a home made Margarita that my taste buds liked.  The music was amazing and I was tempted to get up and dance but not the time and place. But it hit all the points for me good food and second time around good drinks.  I ordered my Signature nacho which was Chileques Nachos with red sauce. It was good, I also got to try the Enchiladas nachos which I was not a fan of at all! But I liked my nacho. After being here for a few hours it was packed! The staff was very friendly and informative. They also have their signature Scorpion shot - which if I was an adventurous person I would have tried but I'm not!   It is definitely a nice place to try Nachos you would not have thought to try, the atmosphere is amazing and fun. They even have catering I believe because every time I come to Vegas I see Nacho Daddy cars on the freeway.  Definitely a great place to try! I highly recommend. Enjoy!

Qe2USxiLnqXQfS1aTXJkNQ.text: So I got the chance to go to @nachodaddylv and those dang beer battered lobster tacos were so freaking delicious!!! Lawd  Jesus!! Our waitress Sophia was amazing and treated us really well! I wanted nachos but it was such a huge portion I knew I would have to throw my leftovers away so me and Vondrae said we gonna go back and split some before we leave. Also, I got a chance to see the scorpion tank that was made by my favorite Las Vegas based aquarium company ATM I absolutely love the Tanked show on Animal Planet so it was an honor to see their work in person!

rHk18r_jmFDzNSlzPxQMpg.text: Nice to find a place with a whole page of Vegan/Vegetarian options. The margaritas started us off just right and went down smoothly.   From the appetizers to the Entree to the waitress everything was top notch. I certainly would recommend this to anyone I knew.

q8Bjw53qnQLz29bUQzHBVA.text: This was one of my last stops while in town. It's located right outside of the Miracle Mall Shops so it made for a nice little trip. The vegan chick'n nachos were good but there was just something missing in the seasonings. I'd try it again when back in town though. The show stopper for me was the raspberry lemon drop martini! It was delicious.

CmOg04FQXiHLkiZLUtzA9w.text: Wow! This place blew my mind! Excellent service and delicious food!  Perfect for large groups and the wait wasn't bad at all for a Saturday night!   Why I was here // randomly decided that this place looked 100 times better than any of our restaurants in our hotel. Came with a group of 6 and we were seated, no problem!   Love that they have vegan and gluten-free options! This makes me sooo happy, since I have so many vegan/gf friends that never really get options, this is the perfect place!   Service // friendly, quick, and checked up on us every once in awhile!  Atmosphere // they have big screens playing old music videos (example: alternative, rock, etc..) wooden interior - almost like their were going for old timey dessert west   Food // OMG where to start, but AMAZEBALLS  -Ceviche // hearty shrimp and a generous amount of chips with just the right amount of tang and sour from the lemon juice, yum!   -Lobster and Crab nacho // kind of rich for me, but my bf looked mighty happy also sweaty, because it has quite a bit of kick! Those jalapenos though!   -Margarita pitcher // their margarita was amazing , i don't remember which one it was but I'm sure they all taste great!   Overall // I would be down to come back! Food is honestly amazing and the price is more than fair for the portions.

zzXI47Pm3vKDBvBoR2eOjQ.text: 3 out of 4 staff suggested a specific nacho. It wasnt very good. The atmosphere felt like a dungeon. Margaritas sweet no kick. The best thing was the Quesadilla. Good size tortilla and fabulous cheese melted completely through. No cheese strands in site till you cut it then the string cheese madness begins. Get there earlier to avoid late night munchie crowd.

HiVJ8h46NvE4L8TuFMkvXw.text: 3.5 stars... How can you not go to a place where paternity tests and nachos are done under one roof?!? Just kidding the only specialize in the latter, and they do it well. Ordered the supreme tostada nachos..a tower of tortilla cheesy goodness. Everything you could ever want in a nacho. Check in on Yelp for a free margarita!!!  Ambiance is hipster cantina, prices are Vegas inflated, and service was great(ask for Shannon!)  If I'm back in town and looking for nachos I know where to come!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme tostado nacho

FkPdSfm4Axy_8WzAdk4FSQ.text: I drug my friends and family half way down the strip to visit here, based on their reviews. We arrived at 9:30 on a Friday night. Wait was only about 10 minutes. We waited about 15 minutes for our server to take our drink orders. We ordered five drinks and "unlimited" chips and salsa (4 bucks). The server brought our drinks and chips and took our food orders. This would be the last time we saw him for over 45 minutes. No drink refills or "unlimited" chips and salsa refills. It took about 30 minutes to get our food (not horrible), but is was brought by other staff. We didn't see our server for at least 15 more minutes. Food was ok, atmosphere was ok, but the server totally blew the experience. So, if you want ok Mexican food, with crappy service, this is the place for you.

0rsd7--Z18MCmUoqZ1Y6mQ.text: The best nachos I've ever had in my entire life of living. can you guys please make a location in the bay area? I please request of you. Danm these nachos are to die for. From the no chip ever stale to the freshest and tastiest ingredients that get thrown into the nachos, omg those pickled onions were something else- blessing in a nacho dish! Ahh to the amazing sauces oh man my tastebuds were screaming nothing of joy! Think about a pug that got all the hugs for a century lifetime haha! Oh man I'm in bed right now slobbering looking at my pictures from few weeks back when trying the chicken tinga nachos! The sweet host recommended this to my friend and I and dang we were satisfied to the maxxxxx.   Just go try them, promise you won't be disappointed one bit! Oh man come to the Bay!!!

0YloMjxIuup5GVZYIxnsqQ.text: This place is busy and popular. Even though we missed the lunch rush, we still ended up waiting about 25 minutes for a table for two. To avoid the wait, I recommend making a reservation via OpenTable. We were here for a late lunch around 4pm. We had the beer sampler and shared some chimichurri nachos. The beer was great, food was awesome, highly recommended.

G8VZc87kGBulO-Mf9nuH4A.text: If you haven't tried it!!! It's a must, the enchilada nachos red and green sauce was amazing.  We walked out so full but it was delicious!

VD6DtJSuTExmCej4bN4q4A.text: I never thought I would be stopping in somewhere with a win dancing tortilla chip but I'm so glad I did. After checking out some reviews and snagging the yelp deal, we decided to check this place out. I was more than impressed.   The inside decor does not match the outside Vegas strip look. The inside is fun and funky and leaves plenty of opportunities for a good Instagram shot.   Service was on point. Everyone was extremely helpful and knowledgeable. I'm super indecisive and they were patients and gave great recommendations.  The food was AMAZING! My boyfriend and I shared multiple things and I couldn't complain about any of it.   Drinks were also great and the staff was knowledgeable on different tequila and cocktails.   Great experience overall- if you're looking for good Mexican food in Vegas that isn't overpriced or in the middle of chaos, this is a great spot! I highly recommend and will definitely be back.

IdUDvqk3v0Mt96hPefhncg.text: If you love nachos, this is the place to be. Both of the nachos we had (BBQ and Fajita) we're both fully loaded and very good. You won't have one dry chip. This is a must have if you are in Vegas. ALSO the orange blood margarita was to die for. One of the best margaritas I've had in a long time

f7GN-nr4v_OG9KGJ8CpC2g.text: Based on Yelp reviews and that I was staying at PH and needed to grab a quick lunch, decided to Give it a try.  Two of us sat at the bar and had very quick and friendly service.  Of course we had to order their signature nachos -- we got the lobster and crab one which was huge and easily shared between the two of us.  My Yelp checkin margarita was solid for a free drink, and my husband's Modela Negro michelada was supersized and quite delicious.  The menu is expansive and we would have no qualms visiting again for a casual meal Or snack, especially if there was a game on TV.

x3oshFgxMrbM4CJXYNdrtw.text: Nachos here are nothing short of amazing!  I love nachos but hate when you get about halfway through and it's just a soggy mess.  Nacho Daddy solved the hell out of that problem! Each chip hot and crispy from top of the stack to the bottom of the pile. I will be back!

I2kaImAshO3co8C4g2dXlQ.text: There needs to be a Nacho Daddy in my home town- yum frigging yum!!!  First off kudos to having a TON of vegan options (the chik'n chimichanga was soooo yummy!), oh and their frozen strawberry margarita was spot on!  Make sure you Yelp check in when you get there for a free house margarita (which was pretty decent for a house margarita.)  Restaurant was clean with lots of friendly attentive staff.  Best of all we weren't rushed and it was a pretty chill place (sometimes it's nice to escape the Vegas mayhem.)  I'd go back today if I could (vacation over, womp womp).

ZkirP5mE-Uyv7kwtgFejOQ.text: Definitely NACHO average Mexican restaurant. I'm not a nacho kinda gal, but these gourmet dishes are worth the hype. The guacamole is made fresh to order, the ground beef is premium quality and the drinks are superb (hands down the best margarita I had in Vegas).  The portion sizes make each entree shareable. The staff was super friendly and down to earth, my kinda vibe. There's nothing fancy about the venue, but who cares, it's all about the food.

wibhDdMXxoQLQob5obH6mQ.text: The chips & white cheese susce was delicious, salsa ok!  We ordered the fajita they were just ok.  As I was pay, we were sitting in bar area by the aquarium and I noticed on the back of a TV by outdoor sliding doors it had Rat Droppings all on the back of it that you could see had dripped and slide down!!  When I got home I called and told the manager who tried to say it was from birds!  I had to tell him I know what bird dropping look like without a doubt and what Rat Droppings look like and without a doubt it was Rats!!  The manager stated he would have to get with his exterminator.

O-jIZCtmU2dVGYPK-mJhRA.text: A must-stop when visiting Las Vegas! The nachos were really gooood! They're motto was "never a dry chip" that was very True! We ordered the Tinga nachos yellow queso, melted jack and cheddar cheese, refried beans , sour cream, avocado, pickles onions, queso fresco and of course the delicious adobe chipotle marinated chicken. All very delicious!   You can not leave that place without trying they're famous scorpion shot! Patron Anejo was very smooth. And the scorpion was very chewy, taste like chicken LOL  it was neat that we got to take the shot glass home for proof that we did it!   I love Nachos!

rguo10lMlfOt-8X3-6KWZA.text: I really wanted to love this place, but unfortunately, I didn't.  It doesn't seem to be mentioned much, but it's in a really strange location.  It's supposedly in Miracle Mile, but you have to go outside to get to it.  And there aren't even signs inside telling you where to go.  If I could have found it on my first trip to Vegas, I'd have gone here then, but I never walked by it.  If I hadn't looked at a map this time, I'd have never found it.  I always knew people really liked it here, and Mexican is my favorite, but once I saw they had a vegan menu, I had to go!  I am vegetarian rather than vegan, but I love veggie chicken, and there aren't many places that have it, so I had to check it out.  It was a Wednesday at lunch time, and there were not many people here.  It was just me, so I sat at the bar.  They do full service at the bar, and if you check in on Yelp, you get a free margarita.  I did this, and used the amount as a credit toward the White Peach margarita.  The margarita was fantastic!  I'd have gotten another one except that I was really hungry, and I didn't want to drink that much on an empty stomach.  I ordered the quesadillas with the vegan chick'n.  I really wanted the nachos, but there was just too much on them that I didn't want, and I feel ridiculous when I order something and don't get half of what comes on it.  In hindsight, I wish I'd have tried those though.  The tortillas on the quesadilla were hard.  They were crispy, and if you pulled on it, it would break off.  I'm used to a softer tortilla.  And the cheese inside was very runny.  I tried to pick up the quesadilla to dip it, and I couldn't,  The tortilla would fall apart and the cheese would run out.  I ended up eating it with a fork, which was odd, but ok.  Maybe the cheese was so runny because it's vegan?  I'm not sure.  And the chick'n was ok, but again, nothing special.  It was pretty flavorless.  The sour cream and guacamole with them were both good though, and I wouldn't have known it was vegan.  So overall, I was pretty disappointed with my meal.  It was fine, but nothing I'd ever want again.  I'd try the chick'n in something else though, but I definitely wouldn't get the quesadillas again.  I was possibly going to order something to go for dinner one night, but I wasn't walking over there in the dark alone.  It's not in a great location, and there was a homeless guy rolling around on the sidewalk the first time I went.  I really wish it was inside the mall, or there was a way to get to it from inside.  So overall, the margarita was awesome.  The quesadillas were not.  So if you like Mexican, or you're vegetarian, I'd still say you could try this place, but order something else.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Outside
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Inside vegan quesadilla
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan quesadillas - not very good

dSr0VlcP7PJdsX2enPjchw.text: Welp, I think this place was over-hyped for me. With 3,000+ Yelp reviews, I was expecting some amazing nachos, and Nacho Daddy just didn't deliver.  First thing to know: this restaurant is not located on The Strip. That wasn't clear to me on a map, but it's actually a block or two down a side street. And unfortunately, after our walk to find it, we had super slow service and just kinda okay food. The margaritas (free with Yelp check-in) were waaaay too sour. And as a self-proclaimed nacho addict, I thought the chips were flimsy and the toppings lacking in flavor. The concept was cool, and the food wasn't bad by any means. But the actual experience was just kinda like a bad nacho take on Chili's.   If you do come here though, definitely split an item! Everything we ordered was way too much for one person, despite what our server told us. Bonus: that makes the $18+ pricing easier to stomach too.

W5sttGIm5-vBOjdZDCzoog.text: Holy HUGE serving! Came here to get something in our stomachs besides alcohol for the day haha. So glad we chose to come here! We ordered the guacamole and chips, and it was a pretty decent size. The guacamole has a little spice, so if you don't like that...I'd steer clear. My friend ordered a burrito and it was the size of about 3-4 pushed together. It is served with the sauce of your choosing, salsa, sour cream, etc. I ordered the fiesta nachos and they were stacked and all covered! Chicken, guacamole, sour cream, salsa, etc. Such a good nacho plate and definitely well worth it. Very big portions though, so come in hungry! We only ate about half of our plates each because we didn't expect that and weren't super hungry. We sat at the bar cause the wait to be seated was about 15 minutes, but it worked for us! They do have other options other than nachos, so check out their menu! Staff was polite and took care of us.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nacho

KuJftXtfEIq6M7__PA2Gpw.text: Rolled in on a weeknight for dinner and had a darn good meal!    No reservations, so a slight wait.  But no more that 15 minutes?  Not bad considering it was prime dinner hour.    Our server was great, recommended a good beer and quickly took our drink orders.    We started with chips and salsa.  The chips were warm and crispy.  The salsa was good and had a nice kick.    For meals, my wife went with chicken soft tacos, I went with the pork version.  Outstanding!  Good sized portions and nice heat!  I like spicy food and these had a decent kick.  Next time, I'll see if they can boost the heat a little in my order.   This was an overall really good experience; service, food and value.    If you are lucky, someone near you will order the flaming fajitas and you'll get a nice pyrotechnics show by your table.

DsK7K7pbKc3gznCYApl6fQ.text: Bomb ass Nachos! HUGE PORTIONS I enjoyed the filet mignon nachos, evey bite was perfectly balanced. Chips were fresh, wings were on point, the ambiance was super chill... The service was awesome, definatly going back we went just before closing so we didn't wait long at all

x3EDTsg0HOZxsbDyrdOG2w.text: First time visiting Nacho Daddy and it won't be the last. Excellent service and everyone very nice and friendy.  Had the house margarita and the filet mignon nachos. The nachos are huge and perfect for sharing. Had sports and music videos on the TVs. Would be a fun place to watch a game with a group.

OBsLCEIvB5uryfYy3O0MVw.text: Food was really good, different from the traditional choices and the environment is relaxing. Sid was our waitress and she was awesome!!  My favorite part of the night was chatting with the hostess as she walked us to our table. She is the nicest and most personable hostess I have encountered in Vegas! Ms. Hannah May be new to the company/job but she's a keeper in my opinion!  Thanks for a great dinner and experience in Vegas  Update: we had breakfast on Thursday morning and Ari was an awesome waitress! The breakfast burrito was good and the breakfast taco which Ari suggest that I get, phenomenal!! Get breakfast and mimosas here as well!

RKRRFsz7pyNrb32cy78P8w.text: Every time I'm in Vegas I come here. It's a vegetarian/vegan staple in Vegas. The nachos here are great and the entrees are ok. I think the nachos steal the show and are the highlight here. The prices here are also pretty steep, $18 for nachos and entrees around $13-15.   There are plenty of options for everyone, even salads and all day breakfast which I love.  All is Mexican except for one entree for breakfast: churros pancakes (still Mexican inspired).   We took advantage of the free checkin offer of free margarita with the order of an entree. They also offer 5% cash back with yelp so make sure you register your credit cards.    We wish they had some more outdoor seating to enjoy the day but we sat at the bar and enjoyed the sun still. Inside the restaurant I always feel like it's dark. You will not leave here hungry that is for sure so if you need some drunk food, they are open late and if you need to cure a hangover this is a great place too.  I love the vegan chick'n and love love that they have it here. Thanks for thinking of us non-meat eaters! Cheers

_dm7bFIjUbfrAho8_fHkIg.text: Staying at The Venetian, Nacho Daddy was a bit of a trek. It would have been a little difficult to find if it weren't for someone's excellent directions. It's best to walk along the front of Planet Hollywood, and wrap around it until you get to a small side street. Nachos aren't exactly a brunch food, but my bf and I did some nacho brunchin' that day. The supreme tostada nachos were loaded, crunchy, and tasty. I ordered it without beans bc beans tend to make my nachos soggy. My bf and I also shared the fajitas. I would pass on the fajitas next time as our order did not have much meat in it. We enjoyed our free frozen margaritas with yelp check-in. Our server was super friendly. I would def come back for some more nachos next time I'm in Vegas.

_gcN9v2Ikz7mZSPWNdmpGA.text: This was a great place right on the strip. The nachos were unbelievable and you can't beat a free margarita. I would definitely suggest this spot if your trying to grab something quick while exploring the strip and different casinos. Great mid day snack

kzuut-n9vvNypBttaxeVjA.text: Many people come in and out of our lives every day. But some people you never forget.   Javony is one of those people.  As we walked in, it was hard to miss his presence in the room. He was teaching an impromptu salsa class to a bachelorette party while chatting up a nearby table of WWII Purple Heart veterans, impressing them with his deep knowledge of twentieth century post-war geopolitics. At the same time he was calmly performing the heimlich on an over excited frat boy. All smiles, casually exuding Bill Clinton levels of charisma, Javony welcomed us to Nacho DaddyTM.   The conversation zigged and zagged between unconscious bias, the Syrian refugee crisis, Chinese calligraphy, and his recent paper published in the New England Journal of Medicine. His fresh take on tired issues reinvigorated my views and forced me to question everything I knew. The hours flew by - as I felt the conflicts between mind, soul, and body melt away in his calming presence.   Javony would never say this himself but following his double stint in the peace corps (Malawi and Haiti) he donated both kidneys (and two thirds of his liver) to a baby panda.  Having passively made millions in Silicon Valley selling his car safety algorithm to Tesla (saving millions of future lives), Jovany decided that with all options ahead of him and no need to work a day in his life, he would help people from all over the world find their True selves. What better place to do that than Nacho DaddyTM Las Vegas - the veritable crossroads of human civilization (try the queso it's like making out with Buddha Jesus and Moses at the same time).  I can only hope you, too, can share even a moment, a glance, a thought, a smile, or a margarita with Jovany at Nacho DaddyTM - a professional human being.

_C-9AoTtWmRvX_cW9LfaMw.text: Super pleased with this place. Was expecting a mass produced, "get em in, get em out" experience but ended up going for breakfast two days in a row! The food was really good and quality, service was attentive, and I was impressed because it looks like they do a lot for their community. We got the churro pancake! Say no more, right?! I noticed they have some awesome looking margarita flavors too. Will have to come back for those!

Then the manager replied in 2 Minutes to let me know they make them in house fresh daily which is almost unbelievable because as I've said, they taste like cheap store bought chips that are so thin and tasteless that they break and crumble before you can even scoop anything on them, so I've now changed this to 3 stars because the chips are an epic fail.

EEHJ2Ijn82qUwM0DNg4EsQ.text: Hands down the best experience. Came here just for the scorpion shots. It was Saturday night , 9pm, you get the picture.  What better to do before the club then have some nachos and shots. Our server was amazing. I wish I could remember his name but he's been working there for a while. Rocker style and has had over 100 scorpions while working here. I did my free margarita for checking in through yelp and my the margaritas are good here. Decided to do a whole round for everything. The nachos were off the hook. Lobster was my favorite. Fajitas and wings were good as well. Our server even took a video for us and was so informative. He even held our shot glasses for us until tomorrow morning. I do recall before leaving I let his manager know about his extraordinary service. I've been recommending this place to all my friends. Seeing this place on yelp, it didn't really appeal to me but I was so glad I came!!!!  Can't wait till my next vegas trip

I1TcRGZax-5424cP3DF6cA.text: Our server was Hazelanne L., she provided exceptional service and always checked in on use to make sure we had everything we needed. The manager on duty Pete, also checked to see how we were doing. Great touch! Food was delicious. We had the three chicken tacos and the kale salad which was full of flavor and veggies! This was a little snack before dinner. Great food, good service, and awesome drinks. Look forward to visiting again. Love the location because it was on our way to our hotel plus they honored the Marriott discount card. Thanks again!

nhGEiZDKLTATIUsVsKVECw.text: Ok..Nacho Daddy has been on my radar to visit for a while based upon the stellar reviews and my love of nachos. Visited on Saturday-1st weekend of March Madness around 11am. Walked in, got seated right away and promptly greeted by our Server. Drinks came out quick and we ordered our food-very accommodating on being able to order exactly what you want, with exactly what you do or do not want on it. My GF ordered a crispy taco which she said was pretty good and she is very critical when it comes to tacos. I ordered the fiesta nachos-Now this is where it goes from 5 stars down to 4 stars. They looked amazing when they were delivered to the table! Now the bad part-all the chips were soggy and mushy. When I order nachos, I am expecting crunchy chips, not mushy chips. I think they may have sat on the counter a little too long before they were delivered to the table causing them to be soggy, or maybe this is just how they are are prepared. The flavors were great and the chicken was very tender(and there was a lot of it on the nachos!)I know the Managers or Owners read their reviews and actually care, so if this is how they are prepared, maybe you could offer some crunchy chips on the side so you can have that crunchy nacho effect. Overall, great service, good tacos, but the jury is out on the nachos. I will go back next time I am in Vegas, but not too sure if I would get the nachos again.

s8eS3rnOJqnM8FO8kNHzgw.text: First stop on our Vegas weekend and  our server Jovanny rocked it! Must stop for Daddy's Margarita and Nachos!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

YiTcrdVQIdri4okHm-VX_Q.text: Fun place with a cool atmosphere!! Great homemade chips and tortillas shells!! Plus the best name for a Mexican Restaurant ever Nacho Daddy!!!!

VnunXsZYVT23yya-8cr_jg.text: We had the peach and house margarita.  Both were super tasty! The star of the night were the local vegan nachos which even my carnivore boyfriend enjoyed.

1bohVGRDxclFRwbKk2T7UA.text: If you like nachos, you have to come here!!! I recommend the Thai chicken nachos! We ate here three times on this trip. It's our favorite restaurant in Vegas. They have their original location off of Fremont street. Also, if you're feeling really daring try the scorpion shot. Makes for a great Facebook Live video! It's a real scorpion (dead and stinger removed) that you put in a shot with tequila and go for it! My husband did it! He got a free shot glass! They say you can use any liquor but my husband tried the recommended house tequila and said it was super smooth.

nQ-yQTGUCToLPDBTQmbJDw.text: Good food, great veggies options! Roy and MJ = impeccable service. highly recommend.!

W2ddRW9BUlv9Z7hYBAaoTw.text: Jovanny was the best server/supervisor I've had a restaurant in years. Awesome customer service, extremely friendly, very outgoing, keeps a smile on his face and made us feel at home.

zURp_BJmvoL3jY8m_tamPg.text: We stayed at Planet Hollywood and wanted something within walking distant of the hotel. It's literally right around the corner. We were immediately seated, and while being seated I had my phone open to the yelp app and a FREE MARGARITA promo appeared. The waiter didn't even question it and asked me what FREE margarita I wanted. You can get the house margarita completely free or get a specialty margarita and pay the difference ($3). I got the jalapeno cucumber margarita and it was sooo good! Strong an did not taste artificial. Had big chunks of jalapenos and cucumber. My husband and I both ordered their famous nachos. Be for warned you can split it between 2 people, they're that big! I got the beef, my husband got the shrimp. Both were loaded with other toppings but literally not a dry chip on the plate. While mine was ok (not a fan of the flavoring of the beef. Reminded me of Taco Bell's beef.) my husbands was delicious! The shrimp nachos are VERY spicy but very good! We like spicy! I would def. return for the margarita, but next time I might just try something other than the nachos. Def. recommend Nacho Daddy if you're looking for a quick not "fast food" place to eat.

GrBhCjnwjVwHCXARCJm8Tw.text: Fun atmosphere, friendly staff, and great nachos and margaritas...  what else do you need?

ZCDXSOXJI90yLykn93IzWA.text: AMAZING food and AMAZING service! Serrena was our server and she was very attentive and very helpful in decision making. It's pretty pricey but what do you expect being a restaurant right on the strip? The amount of food was worth the price to me! Satisfying pork tacos and the enchilada was delicious! We also had the deep fried ice cream and we demolished it! I would definitely come back here if I'm in town and craving Mexican cuisine.

eGp6ttO6TDfYHXvtv_nMWg.text: Desi was a very attentive bartender that made sure she kept the strong margaritas and Mexican food coming quickly. Arriba!

KpxsAeiRvujlJLhSmNhwLw.text: Ate here our first night in Vegas. We arrived late (10:30pm) in Vegas and airport food was already closed so, we were happy to find this place close to our hotel. Nachos were delicious and scrumptious. We had the chicken enchilada nachos with half green and half red sauce, a great suggestion made by our hostess. We then ordered the Mexican corn, which was also tasty with the coho cheese, cilantro, chili and lime. All was delicious and very good. Chicken was shredded and juicy, not dry. Very impressed with this place and recommend if you like delicious Mexican food. Staff was nice and ambience was good. Prices were a little high, but portions were large so it balanced out. Go,  you won't be disappointed.

LpU9ynTIIAeSOVmwu_RXHA.text: Nacho daddy is the place to go in Vegas!! From the moment you walk in your greeted by friendly staff and our server Jovany is the best! He was so friendly and down to earth made you feel like you were eating at home. Jovany also introduced us to the chef and also the manager which i thought was cool cause usually you don't get to meet the chef behind the delicious food! We got the triple dip nachos, supreme nacho tostada and filet mignon nachos, margaritas and we had scorpion shots!! Definitely will be coming back soon ! Thank you nacho daddy and Jovany for your awesome hospitality!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme nacho tostada and margaritas
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scorpion shot!

axjhWhqUUjJ46RveQMlMOw.text: Vegan items galore!  I ordered the vegan Chick'n Fajitas. They were so good. Hubby got the chilaquiles (breakfast is available all day). Portion sizes are big. Love this place!

aewdwHHWIyOKBndm_TDFYw.text: Good nacho. A bit of over priced. Great margarita and beer.

zJsvCt3buy8Tb9O4wUt3DA.text: Nacho Daddy proves that you can find food that is both affordable and delicious on the strip.   The service was great and the restaurant & kitchen were spotless!   But back to the food, the Supreme Tostada Nacho is more than a meal for one person size-wise.  But, the ingredients are what makes this dish so special - everything was super fresh and tasty.  The chips were crisp, the beef was well seasoned, pico was perfectly spicy, and the guacamole was on point!   I can't find nachos this good in Texas!   Add one of their margaritas and this made for the perfect early evening meals!    Chef Ruben knows what he's doing!

tWOAD0iVGIWp2Eh-sKaRjQ.text: Amazing. Service was slow, but the filet mignon nachos and chicken tacos were unreal. The wife and I were blown away by the amazing flavors. Probably going back tomorrow, and will be sure to stop here on all future vegas trips.

Z4ULc6bXUucOHJ_FYNb2pg.text: Loved this place!! Came back a 2nd time! Great service and great food!! Tried regular and vegan menu options between the 6 of us! We had Chase and Jacob--both were awesome!!!!

jX25bvKWinAI9zcZrZtQqQ.text: We came to this spot on New Years Day with high hopes from all of the Yelp reviews and after seeing numerous signs posted throughout The Miracle Mile Shops. The place was pretty quiet when we arrived, perhaps because people were still recovering from all of the excitement from the night before, or maybe because the location of the restaurant is off the beaten path... it sits on East Harmon a little away from the corner of Las Vegas Blvd, getting overshadowed by the infamous Taco Bell Cantina. We opted to sit at the bar and was greeted by the bartender immediately. We kept it simple and decided to share an order of Ultimate Supreme Nachos. They were good, not overly outstanding, and could've been warmer. I do appreciate that there was a really good toppings-to-chips ratio and the bartender even offered to bring a few extra chips, if needed. Pricewise, it was a little more than I'd prefer to pay for nachos but given that it was a restaurant near The Strip, the higher price is pretty much expected. Perhaps we will return again on the next trip and try out the seafood nachos.

IU220kgo_JVDgKHVBouR1w.text: A group of us decided to eat here. Its a small cozy place, clean...but the wait staff are very pleasant and courteous always making sure your drinks are refilled. Their nachos are great enough to share and the fajitas are very tasty...i really enjoyed the chicken wings full of flavor its not just a typical buffalo wing. I would definitely recommend this place for lunch or quick snack

5sd0QqhYgU2LTjx4SuQBUg.text: Ryan was an awesome server. He made some great suggestions and gave us an overall amazing experience. The nachos are bomb too!

BgeAnAEwMBX-cZTcKVEubQ.text: HUGE PORTIONS! The cost was about $16 for the nachos that I wanted. Our friends decided to have a few drinks in our suite and grub on some to go food so we ordered from Nacho Daddy and Hot N Juicy (located next door). I was slightly surprised that Nachos would cost so much, but realized that we are getting food on the Strip so I considered myself lucky. The staff was quick and our food was ready before we even arrived! the nachos were great paired with our drinks. The only downside I would say would be that there wasn't as much topping for the chips, but it could also have been because it was to go and not dine in. It was delicious and totally worth it none the less. Definitely recommend for anyone who loves a good nacho!!!

-wJULiEVfX9Ma7pwP8ZVkw.text: We are here twice while in Vegas for a convention and had great food & service both times! Great margaritas!

5ke_GhdoEfWfXN0nkRfKeQ.text: This is probably my favorite nacho place. Absolutely love it. I'm a new vegan past meat eater and it's extremely hard to find places to eat with meat eating family. This place made it happen. Food was fantastic and our waiter jovanny was awesome, he was super patient, polite and made this place feel like home. From Hanford CA, will for sure come back!

Hzla9CTYlWnp7MmgzoPJUA.text: The supreme tostado nacho had really good flavor. The fiesta nachos were a little bland. Pretty decent sized portions of nachos!

PwH-EMFJeOFgnzY4ZZe92g.text: Michael is the best bartender ever !!!! I love him !! Thank you Michael for a great time and great drinks ! You da best

trRDbi0xpmQemDjX1UgXrg.text: Great experience at Nacho Daddy! I did the scorpion shot. The Herradura was was smooth. Our server Ryan was super on point. He had the best suggestions with the filet mignon nachos and the quesadilla. I would totally come back here and see Ryan again.

1I-wNR6GInTT_5jn3azBrQ.text: Ate here in a pinch late night... Mainly because the name sounded delicious. And their log line is something about gourmet nachos. Gourmet they are not. I was disappointed with the type of chip they used - more like Tostitos than anything authentic to great Mexican cuisine. They do have a good number of vegan options so that was nice. Limited craft beer menu as well. Margaritas were OK.

ve9Dj2Ss7Aa8cgydOsLQkg.text: This place was very tasty. Only bummer was that our waitress was so insanely slow. We were in the restaurant starving for 25 minutes until we finally got to order. Then it was impossible to hunt her down for utensils and the check. We got the bbq chicken nachos, yum. And I personally got the fajita salad, this was good too and I liked the dressing.

CvfmtJI7GeHfBoqANkvClg.text: Second time in tonight jovany took great care care of us we had an amazing experience Rolando was also our server and did a great job we are from Palm Springs and we will be back just for jovany great service awesome atmosphere

8dpiy9MBhEJqqvCauBynGg.text: I give nacho daddy 4 stars, only because the staff needs to understand that a smile and kind demeanor will get you much further ( as well as higher gratuities) over a grumpy , frown of a face . Perk up, have pride in your job, no matter what it is, because that's having pride in yourself as a being. Food is awesome, staff at multiple locations should be more aware of bringing their attitudes and problems into work however.

68mcPCMwYC3XMpWr7ia5sQ.text: First time in Vegas and this spot was amazing! Their nachos are really good and margaritas are even better!

_5MrE3l_t7PONazSmhhOmA.text: If I could give this place a -5 I would. I was excited to check this place out. I am here and I am excited to leave.  -Soggy grease tacos that fall apart when you pick them up.  -poor service...I was never asked for another beer ( I had one) -don't ask for a sports event that is not on a national tv channel, they don't have any sports packages.  -I had to ask for a fork -our table was dirty and the bartender threw my date a rag to clean the spilled food and liquid from the last party.   This place is a dump. They must write their own reviews as warned by Yelp...STAY AWAY.

TpiLiCrUcX2KdJQZu0oSwQ.text: I was very disappointed by this place. The service was not good at all, it was hard getting a drink or any kind of attention. The food was very greasy, I litteraly saw the grease dripping out of my tacos... Oh and they don't have any tv sports packages, so please don't bother coming here if you want to watch your favorite team play!

8Q3vkxBOP8f4b7bufzVKKg.text: Jovanny was awesome!! First time here and he took great care of us. Highly recommended!

LS_zWn2hV6rptq0-ewlXgw.text: Awesome customer service, good food and enjoyed watching the music videos on their big screen. My fiance and I both checked in on Yelp and got two free house margaritas.

QfZaHAIvJwHJ5IVAggugXw.text: Best margaritas in town!!! A big thank you to Jovany and Serena for your hospitality!!

fd1t011g2mJbUZkm5P0iMQ.text: I came in happily to be seated and recommended to go to the bar due to the happy they're having right now. I was served really quick and was impressed due to other restaurants I've been in LV. The house Margarita is really really good! I would recommend this place to people who want to get out of the sun!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

SUhkldduvgj0s3IfxbEG5Q.text: Amazing food and company here...got the supreme nachos and Bangkok tacos! Scarlett was awesome, highly recommend this place over the other noise in Vegas.  You can get a scorpion shot, with a scorpion in it (pinchers removed). Awesome concept, viva las vegas

3T5Hd0E5SR79Kzkqp69GBw.text: So glad they opened a new location.. The other locations went to crap and closed down so I was really excited to see a fresh new one. The food was amazing. Service was great. Thai Chicken Nachos are my FAVORITE... Great meeting spot for people on the strip too. This will be my go-to spot when friends come to town!

4P-Ok-AW5yCMFMM4uQt36w.text: Excellent food, good service, no issues here. Has Vegan options for those who aren't meat friendly. The beer dispensers are a good idea, I just haven't tried it yet.

nsvDBMZuA3YmGKvCg7_wKw.text: Delicious! Free margarita you get with check in is yummy! Wide variety of vegan options is amazing! My husband and I came back twice during our 4 day trip to Vegas. I had the vegan chick'n nachos which are amazing but HUGE! Second time I had the vegan quesadilla with chick'n which was also delish! Husband loves the shrimp tacos!!

bSAZ1_-k2k7jIQBzefIGfQ.text: Good fiesta nachos. Enchilada nachos are better, in my opinion, with the green sauce.

EC8OOsW0Xc5gfRbXwM2-vA.text: Great.place. The food was absolutely delicious and very affordable. The atmosphere is really laid back with a BWW feel to it. This is a great place to go for authentic Mexican food. Good Stuff!

3pAtS-vzGSIXUzNequnvUw.text: This review is based on the only time that I've been to this restaurant. The staff seemed to be overwhelmed and unorganized. Even the manager didn't seem to have it together. I started to feel concerned about what the food would be like. It look a very long time to get our meals and drinks. The food was actually very good. We were all pleasantly surprised. With that said, if you're not in a hurry and you don't mind spending two hours here then give it a try.

d8wJ49GatHtu3nC5xmrxNw.text: We tried here as it was right across from our hotel when we arrived in Vegas and we were all starving! We were super happy we ate here as our waiter was so friendly and got chatting to us! I forget his name as this was in June 2017 but he was super polite and even gave us his friends number who was a rep in Vegas to help us enjoy our night. Thank you! I feel so bad I forget his name as it was over a year ago but he had blond hair with glasses. The service was so quick and food wasn't too expensive, it was just what we needed after the long journey to Vegas.

ydNsqehZkeRJJUILxeLKzA.text: Surprisingly good! Their nacho game is truly on point. Plus they have happy hours & check-in deals which is very unusual for any restaurant on the strip.  Filet mignon burrito is super legit but you must actually order it medium-rare or else they may over cook it.   Service is pretty good too.

DAf_cijBF1SU_TGWd53bhA.text: This is the absolute best place for nachos and strong margaritas that my husband and I have ever enjoyed. The atmosphere is fun with music videos playing loud and friendly staff. It is a must go place every time we are in Vegas.

Ah1P6qhYYJo2HRvvL5i8Zg.text: Best chicken-less fajitas ever!!! They make their own vegan  cheese,  and sour cream... OH GOD SOOO GOOD!!  UPDATE **** You can't go wrong with Vegan Chick*n fajitas and NACHOS  from here!!! I visit this restaurant every time I go to Vegas, I really wish you guys had a location in Riverside, CA

FwcUxOqOYBHddHle2VQ4Bw.text: First time here, had the unlimited chips & salsa, loved the hot salsa. I also had the pork soft shell tacos. I wasn't a fan but the rice was very good. Had the grilled corn as an appetizer, that was delicious. Next time I visit Vegas I'll skip the unlimited chips and salsa and just go for one of their specialty nachos which is what I wanted to try anyway. Also, we did get our free Margarita thru Yelp and it was delicious, nice & strong.

YtTTayHytTtK7arxdoylBQ.text: Absolutely amazing! We had the Fajita Nachos...out of this world good! Our server Huk was professional and funny - always a winning combination! I also love that they have hot French Press coffee...perfect for Las Vegas.

DVIOW3xnsyOEEZEXUW3zCA.text: We decided to give this place a try and oh boy! I'm so glad we did, wonderful staff and the food was outstanding. We actually liked it so much, we are here twice during our trip .
