Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Hfe6yVLyd8R6rwke-N373w.text: This place is definitely overrated but they had great boneless wings! Cocktails weren't that good, every thing seemed really rushed.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

P1YkNkBDF0WI26cOQGnr-Q.text: My first encounter with Nacho Daddy was late at night, when I had a little fun and found myself ravenous. I ordered the vegan loaded nachos and had them delivered to my hotel. In 30 min, I had a pile of perfectly gooey nachos at my disposal. Their vegan nacho cheese is legit!!! This is not a couple of daiya shreds thrown about, this is cheeeeeese, on every single chip. They loaded them up right, with smoky, spicy salsa and beans. They were so good, my cheese-hating (vegan or otherwise) husband dived right in with me. Thank god, too, because there were a ton of nachos!  My second encounter was when I stumbled upon their storefront just when I was feeling hungry. I saddled up to the bar and was served by Scarlett, who was super sweet and made me feel right at home. It's hard eating alone anywhere, but in Vegas it can feel especially isolating. I felt right at ease with my complimentary margarita (free when you check in!), chick'n tacos, and vintage Kelly Clarkson.  I love that this chill place has lots of vegan options, delivery, and multiple locations across Vegas. I don't love the tank of scorpions, and how they dare you to take a scorpion shot. Eek! Creepy and unkind, not a great mix. The nachos are fantastic, though, and I look forward to coming back after a fun night on the town.

VyylzEwWKPIKJqljO72-3g.text: Awesome place.  Found on yelp    Location. Was easy to find.   Drinks were super strong and food was good.

YBb5TnM-J4fAJ__fzGwezQ.text: Great selection and the price was reasonable. We ordered the Flaming Fajita for two and a nacho appetizer., both great! Carly and Diamond were very attentive  servers. Convenient to Cosmopolitan Resort, located on Harmon (not LV Blvd.) in the Hard Rock. The only minus was the horrible music and videos that had nothing to do with Mexican food.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

3N55lyAHrmP5NPFK7Ix0Jw.text: Great food here! Huge menu and their nachos are great! We are vegan and this place had the best vegan menu on the Strip. Would highly recommend if you are after some good Mexican food. Huge televisions to watch sport, and it seemed like a fun place to grab a few drinks before heading out on the Strip!

sRmN38r6CXM6xev5qXvwaQ.text: Great happy hour- we tried the nachos, tacos and sliders (all only $5 each) and we tried both the margaritas (also $5 each) and we loved everything. We sat in a booth and it was very relaxed, with sports screens and friendly servers. We'd definitely be back next time we are in vegas

xUhMFbq3uegZ4sjhhruu2w.text: Nacho Daddy is pretty legit. I didn't have Nachos, but watching everything come out was pretty good looking. I had breakfast and the chilequiles were pretty good. The beans were excellent, the eggs were tasty, chips with sauce was decent but needed a little more sauce. The salsa was supposed to be hot, but was really more mild to medium, so don't expect hot. I did have the free House Margarita because of my check-in. It was just ok. Seems like very little alcohol, but it was free, so no complaints. Overall, prices were decent and good was worth it. Good stopping spot!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Open look kitchen. Pretty hip and cool ambiance.

nVC1t48NeoYU95OLefKC4A.text: This was easily my favorite of all the places we ate at during our trip. The food was delicious and the portions were enormous. We went in just after the lunch rush and didn't have to eat for the rest of the day.   There were a nice selection of vegetarian and vegan options on the menu. I strongly recommend the vegan nachos if that is what you are looking for.   The value was far better here than other places on the strip, so you can't go wrong.

_JcbgCCNibJwioU-inoxHg.text: So what do you do when you wake up first thing in the morning after a late night with a hangover? You go and get something fatty. At least, that's what I would do. I wasn't hungover when I came here, but I bet this place would hit the spot after a wild night out. We ordered the Fiesta Nachos and the kitchen staff at Nacho Daddy did it right. The nachos were mixed with both rich (cheese, refried beans, guacamole, and sour cream) and savory ingredients (pico de gallo, sauteed onions, salsa, and chicken). The pico de gallo actually fooled me into believing I was being a little healthy. LOL.   Service was okay. It was early when we went and I don't think they were all that attentive, but we were fine with it. There's no rush when you're in Vegas anyway.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

55MyL7Lzsk-uMJNhx3xh3g.text: My wife and I had a fast & furious happy hour on a Monday afternoon at NotYoDaddy, and were pleased with the freshness of the viddles and potency of the libations without being overly sweet. NotYoDaddy could've been content to be lame, them being located on the strip(kinda) but totally showed up to work with pride. We had queso, margaritas, and a Pacifico to start out our afternoon of debauchery in Vegas.    We were slightly slowed up by fiending out on the queso that was super rich, but was garnished with sliced serranos, onion, tomato and jalapenos that provided a little acidity to cut through the fat, but only made it easier to shove in our faces so vigorously, therefore making us exhausted but still scraping out the little plastic molcajete that it came to us in. We still had a bit of sense at that time and ordered some happyhour taquitos, chimichangas, and a Kale entree salad from the regular menu to go along with the 4 fritas (frozen margaritas) and 5 tequila shots we each had over the next 90 or so minutes bellied up to the bar. Needless to say, it was hammertime in wifeypoo&markypoo's head but managed to make it back to the Cosmo with some to-go leftover nibbles in hand. We paid a paltry 82ish pesos americanos and tipped our cracker-jack bar attendant 30 buckarinos for recognizing that she was dealing with 2 happyhour True play-uhz like your humble narrator and his beautiful lady. MOS DEF will be back for another happyhour at Nacho Daddy's. We were quite pleased with ourselves for doing our Yelp  homework prior, but were even more pleased with N.D. (Smileyface)

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Already bellied up to the bar amigos!

1uGlq6BXUo8gpGxFUgwFqQ.text: We stayed at Planet Hollywood and noticed this restaurant so we decided to check out the menu. My husband and niece are both vegan so once we noticed they had vegan options on the menu we decided to try it out. We waited about 30 minutes before we got seated which wasn't too bad.  Our server was very friendly and quick, we got free margaritas for checking in, and we loved the food that we all ordered.  We ordered the California burrito, vegan chimichanga, vegan spicy burrito sub fries instead of rice, and the Mexican corn off the cob appetizer. All were very flavorful. We would definitely come back to eat here again.

Cp5ONWZMBEZLJ2xZQoT68w.text: OMG!!!! This place was wonderful! The food was piled high, the drinks were on point and the service was magnificent! I definitely can't wait to return to Sin City for more. I just have one request Nacho Daddy.... Please put one in the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex.

dihj9bq-1Gw-xZVv0r25QQ.text: Tourist trap. DO NOT DO NOT get suckered into believing the yelp reviews. The "meat" is dry and flavorless. They give you a lot of food but it's so bad. It's also very loud in there.

ekzLyVKBlyBuY6BA0kcVnw.text: Good for oily food lovers and sports watching but their chips are great! perfectly thin and crunchy.... nom nom

YabrVohB1aEBK6tWnC-bEg.text: Davor was absolutely great!!! Awesome service great food wonderful way to end a Vegas visit!

TXI657HqZmDm7mRrFp8NQA.text: We ate here before leaving for the airport. We sat at the bar and Brandon was amazing! The best service we had during our entire stay. The skinny margarita was good. The enchilada nachos were good too but agree with other reviews, they get soggy fast. Overall, this was a great experience but get Brandon the bartender!

kG9Ql0VIrtgnAAAKy7trGQ.text: Very good food and service. I tried the soup and avocado street tacos. Both were excellent.

aCvxq_j63nfYubUBC-lppg.text: Amazing service! Kimberly was the best bartender! The way she put the limes on our scorpion shots was incredibly elegant! 10 out of 10, would recommend and go visit her!

vqqVvt8mZEOv0egks12WDQ.text: Just ate here while on vacation with my Gf.  Came during happy hour and took advantage of the free house margarita via Yelp check Inez  Best house margarita I've ever had.  Ordered a strawberry one after that and it was even better... best margarita I've ever had, sweet but not too sweet.   I got the filet Mignon nachos, pretty darn good.  We also got the triple dip, salsa, queso and Guac  All 3 were good.   The service was pretty good. We sat at the bar and often you feel a bit ignored at the bar of busy places but we got great service.  I highly recommend this place. I would definitely eat here again.

nB_znnHBlCLeorRiQYLPog.text: Food: I ordered the Lobster Crab enchiladas, and they were OK. My guess is Nacho Daddy is known for their Nachos, so get the Nachos!  Atmosphere: I sat at the bar, got a 25oz IPA, watched part of a football game on one of the many TV's. Pretty good music playing. Not very crowded for a Saturday night.  Service: Everyone was great, always asking if I needed anything.   Tip: Decent food, good selection of drinks, and Yelp has a deal for Margaritas, but I drink beer!

I7GDK6ymqPVTt15E9RWvKw.text: I ordered the filet mignon nachos and they were fabulous. The chips were excellent and the margaritas all were so good. My wife loved her kale salad and my other friends got the vegan queso. The queso was excellent. The chips were a bit over salted but I just wiped it off. The salsa was also good. The server was very attentive and brought the food out fairly promptly considering how busy they were. It has a lot of TVs and is a good place to watch football, baseball, etc.  I'd definitely go back any time.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan queso. As a meat eater, it was quite delicious
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margaritas for days
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Aforementioned vegan options

dl7q2LGGK5HsvCrkaIAtPA.text: The food here is outstanding!! I had the supreme nachos and tortilla soup and was extremely pleased. My friend got the spicy shrimp nachos which were also delicious. The only reason I gave 4 out of 5 stars was because the service was lacking. We waited way to long to be seated and the place was no where near busy. *We went July 1st at 715Pm and our waiter was a blonde girl with dark rimmed glasses. Sounds like a busy dinner time but the place was less than half full. Plus we waited forever to get our check and when we finally got received it the check was wrong. Besides the poor service the atmosphere and food were a hit. Great place to visit and not outrageously priced..you get huge portions for your buck.

1GJ3-dpPccdRg4s1-wekrg.text: This is an easy place to meet with friends all planning a Vegas trip. The food is great especially the nachos and everyone needs to try their fajitas! The margaritas are inexpensive during happy hour and tasty!

e24rSc-RNT4rKiEWk6Rl4Q.text: I usually never leave reviews but Mexican food is my weakness! This place is amazing! Great food and great service.

Zaw4QCvXvLjRd4jf3YS-zw.text: Best nachos I've ever had! The Thai chicken nachos are worth the trip.  I will never visit Vegas again without stopping at Nacho Daddy. The service was great,  the atmosphere was relaxed,  and the nachos were DELICIOUS! ... not sure about "never a dry chip," though, but they are so good they get a pass.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Thai Chicken Nachos

aDQ5cEqtANAkW0pC_GCc3g.text: Great food, great atmosphere. Bar is first come first serve but there was only a 15 min wait. We decided to sit at the bar and the bartenders were very nice and helped us immediately after sitting down. Peach margarita was delicious!! Open face chicken tamale and chick tacos were fantastic. The food came out super fast as well. Definitely a great find! So glad we came!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

8fkPyBLjkVfiZ9xTqxCopg.text: This place is amazing! We got the 4 cheese nachos, enchiladas, 2 house margaritas, and the churro ice cream. Everything was absolutely delicious, but clearly you go here for the nachos. While the enchiladas were pretty good, the nachos were out of this world!

QrOX91z-EwVKMEDGSANogw.text: The food was pretty good. The service was okay. The prices are really good. Would definitely come back.

3yTfMxlq2ZnMf2wV3_gReg.text: Nachos are good but very heavy (literally and appetite wise). I suggest asking for side plates so you can eat them with a fork! My group of 5 came here during lunch and had the 3 different nachos, 1 with filet mignon, chicken enchilada, and cajun seafood. All were delicious but I'd probably eat this for more of a late night meal :)

anYNkzlpMXYuCkfcs3vhfQ.text: Hands down great food at a reasonable price!! The nachos here will make your mouth wanting more lol. I recommend this place to anyone!

7rRCUUw1vDm3uUZ69GcB1w.text: This place is by far the best vegan food ive had in las vegas hands down! We had the chickn tacos,  skinny dip  and chickn fajitas our first night and man was our mind blown!!!! We also have micheladas and they were bomba! We were so excited to find such a vegan friendly place. We travel alot and we always have such a hard time finding vegan friendly places. At the end of our meal i got the vegan chocolate cake. Although no one could tell me what it was made of besides that there was oreos in it which the bartender informed us that oreos are indeed vegan me and my husband looked at eachother like no way! But a quick google search informed us that it was False bummed! But the cake was still delicous ;)   Our second night we had crispy avocado street tacos, spicy burrito and the grilled corn with sour cream instead of mayo and the lovely waitress gave me the option to have the corn cut off the cob! I even had a non alcoholic michelada this time and it tasted just as great! I loved every dish at this place im super bummed we live so far away. Nacho daddy has a loyal customer anytime i come to vegas!

IWzIvEOnlWAiwBDJ7iA4ZA.text: Best nachos I have ever had. Ordered the fiesta chicken nachos subs Redford beans for black beans and added fresh jalapenos. Perfect! The chicken was nicely seasoned and so moist. Highly recommend this place. However, not a big fan of their margarita.

jHFRxxkW_NtwTMTT59Bdkw.text: This place came highly reviewed, and it didn't disappoint. We came in for breakfast. I got the steak Omelet and my wife got the Huevos Rancheros, both were pretty amazing.  Portions were large (wife didn't finish hers). Service was pretty on point too. Water glass was never empty, coffee refills on the spot. Our server (Cassandra) was pretty awesome.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast menu

OKXIVhknYzyDxkbV4Azaug.text: Yummy food and drinks, with actual good vegan options on the strip.  Brought a party of 9, and everything came quickly.

EquevdlLAmVprCpjMnu0cg.text: Best vegan Nachos. I go out of my way to get to this place, and best margarita I've ever had! Always fast and friendly service

onJCRhSXLmL97efti2C1eQ.text: I almost want to knock off another star because their enchiladas were bad, but that was my fault for trying enchiladas at a place that obviously touts their nachos. I must say that this place served the best nachos I've ever experienced. It's also a lot of food and toppings! 80% of the time that I order nachos, I'm always unsatisfied with the amount of toppings supplied, but this place strikes the perfect balance of toppings to chips ratio.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon nachos and enchiladas. Don&#39;t get the enchiladas.

I925EUAtU_z5BRX-HZ6vug.text: GREAT place for chips & queso! This has become one of my favorite places to go to  whenever I am in Las Vegas. It is an easy walk across the street from the Cosmopolitan where we were staying.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken enchiladas
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Queso and chips, so good!
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

FCRByB5q0pseMSiUNZqrKw.text: Delicious nachos that were definitely worth breaking keto. Cleaned that plate right up!

lLr0Wu3DTXQypxInddBeHQ.text: Look it may just be sour grapes that I'm in a casino for a convention and the "inexpensive" food options are still priced at a premium while the food itself is Mall food court level, but I was pretty disappointed with this "Authentic" Mexican food. I had tacos carnitas and while nothing was off or unpleasant about them, I wouldn't know if I could spend $15 for 3 tacos again and still look in the mirror knowing I get insane street tacos from legit places for $2/each (and those come with Surly Abuelas who judge you for your bad Spanish, i.e. Authentic).

pmOpMAjnhWQwtMqIR8T2dw.text: Cassandra was AMAZING!!! Go to her next time she'll hook you up.  I ordered the beef enchiladas and it was really good. It's also reasonably priced. I would recommend this place for watching games and having a chill time.

9u0Oa6bdIx3Z9wclc6JWnw.text: This place was awesome! We had a great server and I felt like the nachos lived up to the hype. Plus if you Che k in or yelp you get a free margarita and, it was real not some water down mostly syrup drink. Also I don't know if they do this all the time but they were playing 90's rock music videos and it was amazing!

EXjaGhRsMjLJGoO3n2T3GQ.text: Nacho Daddy was delicious! Love that the Nachos are big and delicious, good value for your buck. We placed two orders of Nachos, a breakfast burrito, and the seafood enchiladas. The Nachos and breakfast burrito were the most exciting.

d4WZN9bYTKag2iEoaOi9Eg.text: Cerah was such a great bartender and server! She was so helpful and friendly and made our experience there one of a kind! Definitely recommend visiting!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

jScAlpxmLx-UjaUT0k9uPQ.text: Our waitress was pretty amazing. The first plate that we ordered was cold and looked poor, but when we said something about it she immediately offered to bring out a fresh dish which was amazing. The difference was day and night. So the 5 stars is mainly for our waitress and the second dish that we got.

U59Hu6D4TK8p1wLfqMSTaA.text: Everything was good.  The free margarita you get for checking in was way better than I expected. We went twice during our 4 day trip. The first time, we got the buffalo chicken nachos and the spicy shrimp nachos. I opted out of the spinach chips (the bf is a picky eater) and got regular chips. I wish I would've tasted the spinach ones though.   Second time we got the buffalo chhicken again (the white queso is yummy) and the tostada nachos. I think out of the four, the tostada nachos are the largest. Two orders were enough to share for sure.   The place is a little confusing to find; make sure you turn left (southbound) on Harmon from Las Vegas boulevard. It's there on the left. I don't think you can get in there from the inside of the planet Hollywood mall.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tostada nachos

ZYq6OtzbKLM0UFraw6IiVQ.text: Love this place... nachos are amazing love the bartenders and the margaritas Num num num!! It's like CHEERS for Down!!

QgWDnPdkRA5N8RPVccX_gA.text: I can't stand when businesses sacrifice quality during "happy hour". I wish they would just keep quality and charge normal prices. There was nothing happy about the hour I was with Nacho Daddy. Except the GM Peter flirting and from his mouth "spoiling his women bartenders." The bartenders on duty left their sink running for awhile causing their area to flood. They left out a flood fan which caused the bar area to smell like whatever was on their shoes. With better supervision I think this place has real potential to bring back return customers. The food was decent but the happy hour margarita made me wish I want to a near by restaurant. I kept having to add water to it because it was too sweet.

aw4_yfJ7cfmW4dEGpXY70g.text: Nacho Daddy was nothing short of amazing! From its grand entry way to the gigantic tv screens and it seemed as if there weren't any bad areas to be seated  in this place and the overall atmosphere was vibrant even at 11am on a Sunday am.   Of course I had the vegan nachos and the portions were large enough for us to share one plate. These nachos were simply AMAZING !!! Every bite was better than the last and I was in vegan queso heaven. I checked in through Yelp which presented us with a free margarita       Our waitress let us know that we could have any Margarita with $8 off if we didn't want the one they were offering for free. So of course we upgraded and grabbed two with $8 off of each drink. I'm not much of a margarita guy but I will definitely reconsider from now on. In addition to these delicious margaritas I was given a birthday shot of.....I'm sorry I forget what it was called as I became pretty tipsy by that point (I will find out later).   Our waitress displayed exceptional customer service. She was knowledgeable, accommodating and delivered prompt service to our table.  I do not remember her name either but I'm sure she remembers us .   There is so much to love about this place that I can't write enough about it to express my overall satisfaction. In addition to how awesome Nacho Daddy is (love the name btw) they have MULTIPLE Vegan options so that everyone can enjoy their delicious nachos.    I had a very happy birthday here and I will definitely return to Nacho Daddy for more nachos, only this time I will not be sharing    Side note: they are a little pricey so come with enough cash and be sure to tip their wonderful customer service. They're well worth the price.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

BIbXY0dFDN7c3nRZ1awJVA.text: Second trip to Nacho Daddy and it did not disappoint! Phenomenal food and amazing service by Litzs! Always a fun environment. We will continue this tradition on making this stop each Vegas trip!

gsq3sO4FEpgOzAbXXabUlg.text: Ventured to Nacho Daddy since a coworker recommended the place. We were on a business trip and thought we tried something different. The nachos are bomb, don't get me wrong and the Yelp Check-In to get you a free margarita was cool...but the service wasn't as great.   Let's talk about the food first. We all got nachos, you have to get the nachos, why would you get anything else at..Nacho Daddy. The plates you can easily share with two people but no. We all got our own plates = bad idea. The plates were good and I do recommend sharing since it is big. Or just go in there hungry cause we did and we finished our plates...again bad idea LOL.  We checked in with Yelp to get our free margarita and that was great...till the bill came. I know couple places that do this and if you don't check your receipts or they hear that you're on a business trip, they add on random things on your bill. Please always check your bill before you pay cause our waitress did not take off the drinks even though she knows it was FREE. She handed the bill to us not checking if it is correct?! So when we waved her down, we told her all three of us didn't get that taken off the bill, her response didn't seem like it was the first time she seen it happen. It sounded like "I hope they don't realize I didn't take it off their bill". Long story short, make sure to always check your bill before you pay~

7CLWTMUgipF5NtAtVDrUdQ.text: I can easily say this was my favorite spot in Vegas this trip. Daria was our waitress, and really made us feel welcome. I shared the BBQ Pork Nacho with my husband, and we also got the house margaritas and Arnold Palmer's. Everything was perfect, and the food was out very quickly.   I wondered if one could feed both of us hungry people, and it totally did.  We sat and watched the Kentucky Derby on the huge TV's inside. What a fun spot.  For the price and location the food was incredible. I'll definitely be back!

grtRkkpsA6hx7xwJCO0iQw.text: We stopped in Nacho Daddy upon our arrival to Vegas excited by their good reviews and location to where we were staying. We got there during Happy Hour so figured why not? We ordered chimichangas which were ok, BBQ nachos which were pretty good, Thai tacos which we liked pretty well. It's obvious we didn't hate our food but I just didn't think it was worth the hype. The best part was the service, the bartender/server was great and the margarita was tasty and refreshing. If I could give 3 1/2 I would but just not a 4.

s_2l8cLUA7Qi-MubUxg-kA.text: This was a fun place to eat when we first moved here. Unfortunately, they closed the location closest to our home. Now the alternative location is a disappointment.

daeE341wbPr5cibKnIesTw.text: The food was really delicious, but super heavy. The service was a bit slow, but nothing super terrible. My family split a plate of nachos, and they were perfect. Overall, I would return to this location!

m5NIGVve4Tjb5bkiLNhepw.text: Excellent food and reasonable price for strip Area dining. Fast and friendly service.

9f2K01eWvHCF95Hd-ryWGw.text: This place is great. Super big portions for sharing. One plate of nachos is plenty got two or three! Amazing

YiV2p2rk9St4nkpxGOsBwA.text: Delicious!!! Vegan menus with SO MANY CHOICES! Must try for vegan Las Vegas travelers!

O49TphNiCyaX45Uqr2iASg.text: The filete mignon nachos are Amazing,very loaded and filling and the free margarita was pretty darn good!

871JebH_8zZIcjHFWXLBRA.text: Great happy hour. Good margaritas. Great nachos. Came for a quick bite and loved it .

U5StPWy9kIfRihY1kk60zw.text: This place is overhyped. The food is good but a bit salty. You get a big portion so the price is fair. It just took a long time and it wasn't very busy.

xGPNjMZmSQRQbCL9zscvBw.text: We came here for happy hour and it was bomb! We got the bbq mini nachos and Mexican corn and the margaritas. It was delicious!!! And a good deal!

xRHoc4yk6vX4OEd6mO_wfQ.text: Food is tasty, guacamole is good restaurant is clean the only thing that I would highly recommend is tell them NO ONIONS! They put so much onion on everything and in everything.

ctF2jQn58YK9ipT4-QCl9A.text: Loved the fish tacos so much we eat here again on the same trip. Nachos were a bit disappointing. The place has a great atmosphere.

zOIBypa5Q1OxXFZkteLJ-g.text: This place is the best Mexican place near the miracle mile mall. The food I had was phenomenal. The burrito was tasty, meaty, and somewhat juicy. I will criticize mojo pork. It was more or less dry. But everything else made up for it, with the guacamole, sour cream, and salsa that came with it. 5 stars.

LT-9LR2qL0UTeZUjKKG1Nw.text: Great "Tex-Mex" food, comfortable atmosphere and great happy hour! Small plates, drink specials and great price for downtown Vegas.

P9dLtI68wd3apSwaY5JLOg.text: Although this place is just odd from the entrance having a huge tank of crickets from what we saw...servers aren't your stereotypical Hispanic because of the name/ that's where I fell in love with this place! The diversity made me feel right at home!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shrimp Nachos....BOMB!!!!!

m5OXz4Kn0lZYHGdJHEYKTw.text: So I decided to try this place on the strip due to its proximity to my hotel and it's high YELP reviews.  My wife my stepson and I walked into a restaurant and while it was busy it didn't seem packed.  We were told it was a 25 minute wait.  The wait was accurate and we were sat by a very friendly hostess.  There was a pretty good delay between being sat and being greeted but once we were greeted our server was friendly and attentive.  We did not order any appetizers but I had three different margaritas.  I had the house (nacho daddy), the pineapple mint and a blueberry margarita I saw on a previous review but was told wasn't available but they made one for me.  My favorite was the house margarita.  Their sweet and sour mix was quite good.  For dinner I had the not your average burger nachos.  They were very good.  I added sour cream, but it was the ground beef, bacon and lettuce mix on top that really did it for me.  My son had the filet fajitas.  He destroyed them.  My wife had the burrito.  It was ok, it was a burrito.  Nothing really stood out about it.  The restrooms were tidy and this place has a great YELP check in incentive.  We will be back.

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Wet Smothered Burrito
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Not Your Average Burger Nacho with Sour Cream

M5clhuWChQYKO76nst2BlQ.text: This had amazing customer service that I've seen in a very long time. Were told there was a 45 minute wait time, ended up waiting for about an hour. Manager brought us appetizers and drinks on the house due to unexpected wait time. Service was absolutely great. The food was amazing. If you are looking for vegan options this is the spot. Veggie tacos were beyond amazing and Vega nachos were the best I've ever had. Try this place out, you won't regret it!

shyp0egzu68xBIYzNAJppw.text: The name was so intriguing, but the food wasn't all so good, lack of flavor kinda made the food nasty. The customer service was great made up for the dry food.

EKpSBs_Z1ie_k-FsBi11iA.text: Great margaritas served in a generous sized glass. Love the fiesta nachos, there are enough for two people to share or one if you're super starved. The Cadillac margarita is my favorite. Date got the Cucumber jalapeno margarita .

e_iy5j-mQ3Ole99d1ZROLg.text: Awesome place to get some late night food with some friends or coworkers! It's convenient for my coworkers and I since we don't get off of work till 12am most nights so it's the perfect place for us! Their filet mignon nachos has got to be the best ever

5jHDSrcyPl_G4LAByPefDg.text: Excellent food and service. Would definitely recommend this to friends and family. Food was timely and drink were on "fleek"

9khznJVQEvTms7Zv3rV_kw.text: First time here after finding all my usual Vegas taco spots had bit the dust...gotta say, this place is pretty sweet!  Seemed more like a chain establishment---and very well could be--but it was a very chill spot to just hang out and have drinks.  Lucky first us, we arrived during happy hour so we got some deals as far as tacos and nachos.  Tacos on special were all street taco style--pretty good, though my favorite ended up being a nacho dish with hamburger meat.  Definitely will be back to chill here the next time im in Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

LpSWtaiQ3_5mLlwIacxOWg.text: Gio is great!!! Great customer service, very friendly and knowledgeable of the menu. Food is great. Queso dip is delicious. Definitely a great local find!

8QaXqkJcABd2mgyiAdpGrw.text: Delicious margaritas with our late breakfast! My husband had the amazing steak omelet & I ordered the churro pancake which btw is about a foot across!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

De95PU6PXMbBZcnf81RulQ.text: Awesome variety of nachos, staff super friendly (shout out to Michael at the bar) , & chill atmosphere. Would totally come again!

ywPKxXdUDpr4gFtkHYc_ig.text: Holy shit we loved this place. We went in search of a not too expensive place to grab some breakfast (which isn't so easy on the strip anymore). We ran across this absolute gem and ended up staying 4 hours. The staff was genuinely amazing. The bartender chatted with us for a long time as we eat and was great with the other patrons as well. The food portions are large and was of good quality. This place is a must visit!

zURJzp_Cn5r5hWc94EcFpQ.text: Nacho Daddy was decent not the best food but it was good. Reason I'm giving this only 3 stars is because the SERVICE here is God awful. Our server hardly came to our table and everytime we would ask if something was good she would say no and say get this instead and it's the most expensive item. Everytime we were ordering she did it. When we ordered appetizers she basically said don't get that and get this and the price difference would be 10 dollars. I'm not cheap and I understand up selling but don't throw huge up sells at your tables constantly when their ordering. Food good. Service bad.

bJVTvbQR4BfT3755C2FPVQ.text: Great choice if you want something a little different. We got the sizzling shrimp tacos and filet mignon nachos...yeah, get those.

FQu-_vjZuUvv9QiC8yKWXg.text: This place is amazing. Great drinks and the nachos. Holy cow. We asked Arienna recommendations and she nailed every one. Right off the strip so super convenient to get to.  Definitely coming back while we're still in town.

iHwLsvOwxr-21Lp_RWz1sQ.text: Friendly service and great nachos. Had the Thai chicken that was delicious, but the shrimp one was on the bland side for me. Nacho portions were small but nicely presented on a hotplate.

2WiEXkbXaMmyEwnfDixIVQ.text: Bacon enchiladas and XX for breakfast!!!server (AJ) was attentive and gave us our privacy

ZkyAzDRufVN3dJjnw73Vwg.text: I looked into your foods and made a phone call about the vegan chick'n and it's a vegan meat alternative. I apologize or the trouble and hopfully I'm the only customer that had the mistrust that I had because it felt and tasted like meat. Nacho Daddy is the best and I appreciate that you have that amazing Vegan Menu!

SmlP-HDOkGTAwL27tgVj4w.text: When I'm vegas make sure you come to Nacho Daddy!!  Jovany was amazing! Make sure to come visit him!! :) Great Margaritas and food!

TcWdwR1yS9RCLXvIA9hn6Q.text: First time at Nacho Daddy and I have to say I really liked my experience. Our server, Jovany, was super fun, generous and very attentive. He's also the manager ;) so we got great service. The food was delicious and very impressive. Definitely would recommend this hidden gem since it is not located directly on the strip.

lwlIowKTPxgEkYJF1hawsg.text: The staff was awesome here! Very friendly and helpful! Got a great plate of nachos i couldn't get anywhere. Jovany, my server was prompt but, not hovering. He made my meal a great experience. Will definitely be back.

vnhzPQT47QckSrgWihzDHQ.text: Jovany is amazingggg. He made our party feel so welcome and taken care of! Had so much fun even though we were too scared to take the scorpion shots! Thanks, Jovany!!

nBUNMfghOzMo9DXOGeNlpw.text: We placed a take-out order for Four Cheese Nachos and Cheese Enchiladas with red and green sauce, since we had brought our pet on vacation and the staff said the patio was not pet-friendly over the phone. When we got back to our hotel, the top layer of nachos were sticking to the top of the container and the enchiladas were just barely warm. However, the portions and flavor were decent, so I think the experience would be better if we were to dine in. That said, I wouldn't mind returning to dine in and to try some of their desserts! Friendly hostesses, and the interior seemed to be decorated nicely.

rpvR09xDAdxOtrPl-1rrDQ.text: Damn this place is good. Arieanna was an awesome waitress and made some great recommendations. Had a huge jalapeno marg with some bacon and egg enchiladas. Perfect hangover cure. Will definitely be back and highly recommend.

ML0Fd1t-NliK1X_2w-3VEg.text: We loved this place.  Everything was excellent no left overs.  Also the had a huge tv screen and played the best videos ever.

Mk3n3k8sXosczDM6tGwnvw.text: First off anywhere that has vegan food is pretty good in my book.. but that doesn't excuse memorable service. Sooo. I've been a good couple times but I will say every time I've went super random but I've had to wait on a waiter for long AsF. Idk why it's not like it's super busy every time I've been. Any the wait would be no problem if I was getting something small or to go but it's like super expensive and you want to tip well but slow services always equals not really trying to services customers to the best of you ability.. what good is eating out at restaurant and you feel forgotten about by you waiter? Just my opinion. I'm vegan and have enjoyed the burritos and drinks and I really liked the food there But I digress, I'm a perfectionist and an integral person. So I'm always thinking about what kind of review people would leave after an interaction with me in an employee customer service experience. Thanks for reading.

IqKwJgv6zuNq8CPqKbE2yA.text: This weekend I was in vegas and walking down the strip we wanted to grab dinner I search on yelp and I saw this place had great reviews we decided to give it a chance we got seated almost right away yovanny was our server he was awasome there was a free margarita with the yelp check in and yovanny validate it right away for me   It was delicious we order queso dip and chips so delicious we also tried buffalo wings and they were so delicious too we will be back next time we are in town for sure!!!!

ySexf3eBbNAespxBA2e84A.text: We went in the restaurant a while back...I had my 94 year old Mother with me...the place was not busy...the staff was busy chatting....when I asked about a table they said give us a few minutes...after a few minutes I asked could I have my Mom sit down as I pointed at a table and was told there is no server for that area...I stated I only wanted her to have a seat while we waited...and then I proceeded to ask could we sit at this table and be served and was told NO... I was very surprised by the staffs reply and I said to my family...we need to leave here the staff is awfully rude....I told them how I felt and there was NO response to try and get us to reconsider staying..I find it very sad since I have enjoyed many a meal here...oh well...have a nice day...

RnLNweyFgf0LJQBTo4dBJQ.text: Had steak fajitas and Margaritas, both were very good.Also enjoyed the patio and people watching. Staff was friendly.

pwRrYjWMN2zlwrcvn_4S1A.text: Lovvveeee this place!! We were sat right away. Plenty of food options. The supervisor Jovanny took excellent care of us! He answered all our questions, was super professional and polite and very friendly. Five star service! (:

YU9mBCO0MR6nySIVUtvAfA.text: The food was good and customer service was above average. I'd recommend as a quick lunch and margarita for anyone hitting Vegas

1JZ0pq9wqF7LaEoSU6laag.text: We have a favorite place at home for nachos, but now that we've been here we're really sad there isn't one where we live! They stay True to their "no dry chip" slogan. Loaded with meat and beans and not over doing it with cheese. The perfect nachos!!! The tamales were delicious as well and even if you don't have room for dessert, still order the apple pie nachos. They'll be gone so fast!!

K5Q9ocKFLqB3UY5RA5e9pA.text: We had a great experience here! Our server was super nice and made tasty recommendations and we definitely took advantage of the free marg with check in, yummy!

lrDgiujBxuHEPzR483rLfA.text: The food was great! We got some nachos, tacos and quesadilla. It was delicious! Server was also very nice and attentive. Atmosphere of restaurant was great!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken tacos, beef super nachos (I don&#39;t remember exact name) and chicken quesadilla!

iF4IbUW6SY02cu2aZ0Wdpg.text: Amazing place! Took the kids here and they had a blast. Good service! Would recommend this place to others. Prices weren't too high either and food was amazing! Will be coming back.

lTzDUqSol2eHhMGcp4kgsA.text: I wanted a late night spot to check out after a show, Nacho Daddy was it! They're open 24 hours, great food, and our server Kiel was especially helpful and attentive! Definitely recommend if you want some good around the clock eats :)

m0Ld-v72q8bH6rf74PvhSg.text: Not bad - just a notch above Chilis. They do have some good nachos though and its in a convenient location on the strip, but not really directly on the strip. You can get a free margarita if you check in on yelp so make sure you do that.

YLWMLT7i9ohSdpGmfxCHUw.text: I got the vegan nachos and a blended blueberry margarita. PERFECTION. Service was also great and quick!

7dN5etlmmL3nlnLvNklzIw.text: Great customer service from JOVANNY! Friendly, fast and funny! Cool place to try out for different types of NACHOS!

kmtRvorL1_Uh5HjOyeXgCw.text: Awesome! Quick walk from the hotel, food was delicious and reasonably priced. Would highly recommend

gIdNRrNqANN0Xpxy7QMgTA.text: First timer here at Nacho Daddy been wanting to come in but never made the time. So decided to come in here with some friends after church. Was greeted by this cute server who introduced herself as Daria, Darla one or the other. She was very bubbly and personable and funny. To start off had a casa migos shot of tequila to get the taste buds going than ordered a dogfish IPA to sip. You know what hey say. Liquor before beer your in the clear. Than for appetizers our table started with the triple dip, and sizzling shrimp. For my entree I had the shrimp and steak fajita and my ___ that shizz was bomb dot com. Definitely a great first time experience. Would recommend this place. Thanks to our server for not being one of those boring order takers and making our experience a great one.

t5anH1g1GDi5Q84CvB4LUg.text: I've been here multiple times and service is usually average. But I love the V selection, so I come back. today Aimee was just awful, one of the worst servers I've ever had. Just bad all the way around

n0sDkZ5c51SyYVic6SQepA.text: Was great! Even chips and salsa alone were to die for. Free margarita with Yelp check in was awesome, and strong enough. Will definitely visit from here on out when we come back to Vegas.

9vRNt3-HDbzr8z1Jr4WqTg.text: Kimberly was an awesome bartender!!! Food is the best. I'm vegan and having this available on the strip is amazing.

1N_hTsvPZ2l33Mo7Wbf8XQ.text: The food here is really good!  Definitely worth the walk to this place.  Kimberly is the best bartender in the world and hooked us up with margaritas that were delicious.  Highly recommend!

Z_9wQJBVbzNW2o72iS0Dhg.text: Bad bad texmex. Guess I'm spoilt in Austin. If you want bottled taste sauces on precooked meat and then on chips, this could be for you! Service (at the bar) very sporadic...   Hey, ya come to the strip you get bar fast food .. my bad ... Adding two stars for the follow up by mgmt!

dWcTpDDDWyo_U2z6GI6VBQ.text: I had an early lunch at Nacho Daddy and I was pleasantly surprised how yummy my tortilla soup and how fresh my kale salad was. I had good service from my host Jaylen and my server wasn't bad either, I think she may have been new. I think this is good spot to take friends or eat by yourself. My only compliant is the music was a little loud for my taste. Overall I would defiantly eat here again.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Liked the little decor picture :)
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tortilla soup with shredded chicken (Yum) and a very fresh kale salad. Skinny margarita for hair of the dog ;)

Endo8TME_4fe8SiPdcZgnw.text: Passed this place several times while staying nearby. Always down for some good Mexican and was surprised to see so many great reviews. Split the nacho and got a single cheese enchilada to share. The nachos were perfectly loaded, we almost didn't have enough chips. Enchilada was tasty. Unlocked the yelp check in deal for a free house margarita and that was kind of syrupy and sour, but it was free so I wasn't too worried about it. Definitely will come back next time I'm in town!

dsvHLv9R1l6XQtRTPW9x0g.text: Came out to eat after a day of shopping, let's just say service was great and food is good. Also there is no wait time because you can just go to the bar or get a table right away. If you haven't ate all day I would recommend to get the nachos by yourself but if you aren't hungry hungry then I would split one plate for two people. Because it is a lot of nachos. They do serve more stuff than just nachos but It was a good experience. Definitely would come back.

LYN2ni1vkvewOTvYPODVbQ.text: Loved that they had a vegan section on the menu. So much to choose from! I ordered the vegan fajita salad. The prices are also reasonable. Took advantage of the free house margarita check in deal. I will definitely be back next time I'm in Vegas.

IkJksX1ovjUiiMzyPOpOQA.text: Came here when we came to Vegas last time and it was amazing! The nachos were the best I've ever had. Great food and great service. Will be coming back this year when I go to Vegas for my husbands and I's annual Thanksgiving trip.

Cx3ydEFPGmhRE9nTGCukwA.text: The vegan loaded nachos were excellent some of the best I have ever had. The service was great too and the place is lovely. They definitely deserve all 5 stars.

p8tXoIRh7A_RuHcgvk_mOQ.text: Second visit to this location, but not sure I'll be back to this one as much as I wanna like Nacho Daddy...Stopped in on a weeknight for dinner and drinks. Pretty empty by the looks of things, but the hostess had us wait quite a while to be seated. Had some time to peek into the scorpion terrarium near the door, but only saw crickets waiting to be eaten. We'll revisit that part later.  Used my check-in offer for the house marg which was super sweet and not very buzz-inducing, but a nice gesture nonetheless.  Food came out quickly in generous portions. BBQ chicken nachos hit the spot and were packed with flavor, not lacking any meat or toppings. Their BBQ sauce is a surprising winner.  Now for our uninvited table guest...Lord knows if he came from outside or the terrarium up front, but a big juicy cricket hopped right on up to look me eye to eye just as I was finishing my nachos. Not very appetizing. The manager gave us 25% off the bill which amounted to about $6. Maybe more of a concession would've been made if I had bitten into the darn thing, but glad I had a gift certificate to use anyway to cover the rest.  I know eating scorpions is the thing here, but the only animal I wanted was chicken.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BBQ Chicken Nachos 5/5

OtXrcdjlNvDwc2Yt2-BlEw.text: One of our usual stops when we go to vegas. Always great service, nachos and drinks are very good.

27ixhIqUM46Ij-s2ggcUtA.text: I love this place. I've been vegan for almost a year and this is a perfect spot to bring my non vegan friends also. I've tried almost all on the vegan menu and have not been disappointed. I usually sit outside and people watch while I eat too. Good atmosphere and good food.

QnAjerywLLxxM40_E9kNEg.text: Soooo good! I got the fiesta nachos & they were amazing. My boyfriend got the tanga chicken nachos & was equally satisfied. We did the scorpion shot which was pretty fun. Great customer service & great food. We will definitely be back when visiting Vegas.

GbRHavkEYxXgcz68CirBzw.text: Went here for my birthday and was definitely a great place to celebrate!  Great menu especially if you're vegan such as myself. We ordered vegan chicken quesadillas, vegan loaded nachos, the vegan chicken chimichanga and had the vegan chocolate cake.  We were being served by Vince and he was attentive with our table. Refilling our waters often and even went back to our table and topped mine off when the pitcher ran out.   He made sure we had everything we needed like napkins, cleared our table of the dishes we finished and asking how our food was.  The loaded nachos were plentiful and the ingredients were fresh and flavorful. The quesadilla was well cooked with the tortilla being soft, warm and had a somewhat crunchy, flaky texture which went well with the tender vegan chicken.  The vegan cheese by itself was tasty and the food in general was hot out of the kitchen and it was difficult waiting for it to cool down because it was so delicious!   Vince kept highly recommending the vegan chocolate cake and I'm glad we had room for dessert because it's the most delicious cake I've ever had!  The cake was moist and was a pretty big slice! The sweetness of the chocolate went well with the sweet raspberries and raspberry glaze!  We requested to speak with a manager, and Vince was worried at first, but it was to give our compliments for the excellent food and service!  When my brother had told the manager it was my birthday, he offered me a free birthday shot, if I drank alcohol I would've accepted his offer, either way I appreciated the sentiment!  I'll for sure be revisiting Nacho Daddy to try out the rest of the menu!

zMMenNbxrRVDiqD2v32KUQ.text: Best nachos I've had in awhile. Good variety of choices and you get a BIIIGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG!!! Lol portion size. Customer friendly and quick service and environment is good. I'll definitely be back hopefully with my wife to be she picks good locations and this was a good one

NgA6eA0YGQ87z6Xx274Sww.text: This place is amazing the food is always spot on, the service is great and they have great veg and vegan options I have never been disappointed.

rXHgjBm_lNI-ivsYKUrbHw.text: Absolutely amazing. We ordered two margaritas (white peach and cinnamon w/ Fireball) which were GREAT. We ordered the Triple Dip as an appetizer. The queso, guac and salsa were all fabulous. I ordered the BBQ pork nachos. Very delicious, BBQ sauce is sweet. Enough to feed two people. My wife ordered the enchiladas. She loved them. I would HIGHLY recommend this place if you are looking for a good Mexican meal. Diana, our waitress, was outstanding and very friendly. This place is a hidden gem just a little ways off the strip. You can't go wrong here. The prices are great for the quality of food and drinks. I could eat here daily!

MerQUX47CNFihcNiwrwjTw.text: After a full day at the Punk Rock Bowling music festival, we were dying for some sustanence that was vegan friendly. They have a whole friggin menu page full of vegan options!! PLUS vegan dessert. It was a perfect spot for me as a vegan and my partner as a flexitarian to grab a late night meal to settle out a day full of fun. Staff was super friendly and helpful too!

1dnqVXiLwZ3IXyVgRpUOjA.text: Discovered this place on Yelp. Great spot. The service was great, I got a free margarita for checking in on Yelp and the nachos we ordered were more than enough for 2. The free marg was pretty decent. I've gotten a few other places and they are often too sweet, sour, or gross to drink. Not here! The hubby got a mezcal margarita and that was way better than mine. But again... mine was FREE. Highly recommend! Great low cost delicious option on the strip.

wuJgF1wvZXirPIT3hcqt4Q.text: Great atmosphere! Had a great time. We had the spicy shrimp nachos and they were very good. Enough for two people to share.

lNfpTwNleiZo9yxiEedyrw.text: This is probably one of MY favorite places to stop by when in Vegas, my boyfriend loves nachos so when we saw Nacho Daddy we decided to give it a try and let me tell you everything from the tasty margaritas, green enchiladas, chicken nacho plate, French fries where delicious and exceeded our expectations! The staff were very nice when welcoming us in and the waiter was very friendly and helpful when asking questions about the menu! Also our food came fast which was great and overall the experience was great! It was a great atmosphere in there and I will definitely be making a stop there again when I go visit Las Vegas again! Give them a try, I'm sure you won't regret it!

0t_AScCyyQxYQkQLG2hkKQ.text: Kimberly was super annoying and overrated as fuck.   Just kidding. She was hilarious and charming and very helpful. The food was unbelievable and the marg was exceptional. It was one of the highlights in Vegas to come here. We are always looking for good Mexican places on the road, and this was a treasure. The bar area is extremely clean and has a cool, almost steampunk vibe.  Come for the marg, stay for the food and cool people.

LEXfg8tGdDCFycp8Qt3AEw.text: Ooooohhh so good! My husband and I split a order of filet mignon nachos...very tasty and very fulfilling. Also, took advantage of the free house margarita with the Yelp check in offer...it did not disappoint and they were very generous with the tequila. We will definitely be back next time we are in Vegas! New favorite spot! #NachoMama

vZxAuhKoce6CuhljrteXGQ.text: saw the reviews wanted to try it for myself.  had the filet fajitas absolutely delicious.  so tender.  huge portions.  excellent.  everyone should try it.    5 star.  will absolutely  go again.  great server.   great service.  luv this place.  will go again.

I9iEVpPxn69NnB7_x50cuw.text: Food was so good, open late, and service was decent. Recommended this to other friends and will continue to visit when it's convenient.

OXqBMlUNPPR1gYetz1O0bg.text: Wow. I went to Nacho Daddy about 5 hours after already spending close to 2 hours at a buffet and this place was INCREDIBLE! I already had a food baby when I arrived but by the time I left I had to unbutton my pants and pull my shirt down. My friends and I ordered the guacamole, cheese, and chips appetizer and the cheese was mouth watering. For our entree, we ordered the chicken nachos and at first I was like okay, I never order chicken anything...I'm more of a carne asada girl but boy, did we get THIS RIGHT! These nachos were more beautiful than me. I am a huge fan of toppings and these nachos came TOPPED. I have often thought about making the 4 hour drive to Vegas just for these nachos.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Nachos!

mxezWaAFysf6Qz3POZXYOw.text: This restaurant was awesome!! Our waiter was very attentive and nice! The margaritas are so, so yummy especially that mango one. I'm so glad they're able to give you a to-go cup if you didn't finish the margarita! The Fish Tacos and BBQ Pork Nachos was to die for! I wish I got to try more of the menu! Will be back to try more!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

0LjLW5VOw1LwSoZZJSA7eQ.text: I love nachos, so you can imagine how excited I was when we found this place!   The food: the nachos were great! Everyone loved their food. We got a fiesta nacho, and filet nacho, and a pulled pork nacho. The chips were crunchy, the sauces were excellent. I also have a tomato allergy, and they were able to accommodate (my order of the fiesta nacho) easily and accurately. They also have gluten free items marked on the menu, as well as vegan options. Really plenty of options for everyone!   The drinks were wonderful, we saw a girl at another table have a scorpion shot too! (They claim they're famous for these shots with an actual scorpion in it)   The service: our waitress was only in her third day of work, but she was still really great. When she was unsure of something, she quickly asked a manager, which was great.   I'd definitely return to nacho daddy if I was in the area again!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Modified fiesta nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet nachos

FlUeAyyI98zf2Z7YTAUeZw.text: So good I came back for more. Today I ordered the exotic Thai Sesame Chicken Nacho's & added egg to make it a breakfast. Such an amazing combo, you have to try it! Food is great but I also really like the theme and ambiance here.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Thai Sesame Chicken Nachos + Egg

dPLwAnGOm1T34jnxwLHlNg.text: Clever fun name of this restaurant/bar in Las Vegas! The ambiance is great and just an awesome place to kick back and have some food an drinks. The bar can get quite crowded, but is nice as it is open and airy open patio brings the cool air into the restaurant.  DRINK: Daddy's Signature Margarita FOOD: Mexican Corn and Burger Nachos  Their signature margarita was fresh and boozy goodness! The Mexican Corn was perfect, and their nachos are generous in portion and very appetizing! Overall, neat spot with great service to satisfy your thirst and hunger with a variety of nacho options and more.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Burger nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mexican corn
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Daddy&#39;s signature frozen margaritas

P63kBb6IXyqU47K-Ay7MFQ.text: We've been here twice now.   Which we try not to do in Las Vegas, because there's SO many places to eat at! We do our best to try something new for every meal.  We were just craving the amazing meals here. They have brunch & unlimited mimosas everyday. (yaaaaaaaassss!)   My husband this time got the chicken nachos on the exotic menu, added a fried egg on top to make it brunch-y. Literal HEAVEN.   I got the ceviche with a side of bacon. So gooddddd!! Last time I got the flaming fajitas. Drool. Soooo good. Highly recommend trying this place out!

yQ22_RZ0vLnW7ypInkmFUQ.text: Nacho nacho nachos !! Vegan at that!! This is a staple here in Vegas for me who doesn't love a nice vegan Mexican plate and a margarita !!!!! Thanks nacho daddy for always having good quality food and service . Love the nachos , daddy bowl , avocado tacos and the chicken tacos !

UubqomWlwb548wnrRwABAg.text: I have recently become obsessed with nachos so when we ended up here for dinner I was beyond excited. We had a reservation for a Saturday night however it seemed like there were still a decent amount of open tables were you could walk in without reservations. There were so many nacho options to choose from- typical "mexican" style choices and also more unique choices like lobster and crab. We started dinner with the chips trio - I couldn't decide if the queso or guac was better but both were delicious! Our server was a little rude throughout the night and appeared like she was out of it and not wanting to be there, but outside of her it was a fun experience. Also, we had a special perk for checking in on yelp and we got a free margarita- can't complain!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chips Tripe Dip
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BBQ Chicken Nacho
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu

iFCqDu_nwB44_Cm4aFQx2w.text: You can't go wrong with nachos, and this place delivers. Located under the pedestrian bridge on Las Vegas Boulevard and its worth the trip to find it. Cheap eats, great drinks and fun, lively atmosphere. We ordered the Fiesta Nachos and split it between two hungry adults.  The menu is huge and has something for every palate.  It's seriously worth the trip!

fQDKIiEz8S1CbpKNzGaAmQ.text: First off, let me say I LOVE Nacho Daddy but I was greatly disappointed this last time. LOVE the vegan options but hated the service from the kitchen. We ordered 4 vegan dishes. We were told that our last dish was coming and so everyone got their food except for one and then we were told about 5 minutes later that they ran out of the dish. We ordered another dish and by the time it got to our table the rest of us had finished eating. Also, we ordered the Vegan fajitas which were BOMB except we ran out of tortillas and it took another 5-10 minutes to flag our waiter to get more. Ordered corn and got flour.   DONT FoRGET TO USE YOUR YELP CHECK IN AND GET YOUR FREE MARGARITA  Sorry Nacho Daddy. I still love you but I disliked my last experience very much.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

T37cx_linrmz3RqARS205Q.text: My family took a trip to Vegas and after we watched a Cirque du Soleil show, we were starving! My brother took us to Nacho Daddy and we waited about 25 minutes before being seated on a Saturday evening. After being seated, we ordered the Fiesta Nachos, Thai Chicken Nachos (per servers rec) and the California Burrito.   I will say that the food is on the heavier side but it is VERY delicious. The fiesta is a must on the menu and the Cali burrito is supposedly a best seller. The Thai chicken nachos was recommended by our server but we thought it was a bit too sweet for our taste buds. I don't know when I'll be back in Vegas but the next time I come, I'll be revisiting Nacho Daddy.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Thai Chicken Nacho
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Nacho
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cali Burrito

RhVlhX19h-6fcqOkNhuKqQ.text: At one time Nacho Daddy's vegan loaded nachos were one of my all time favorite meals. I used to get them regularly. I hadn't had them in about a year until last weekend. What a let down. They still taste good but not like they used to. Hopefully when the Nacho Daddy in Salt Lake opens up, they will be the nachos I remember!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Loaded Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Loaded Nachos

xwb3gmnsI3owlpub-qmRZA.text: Stopped in today for a quick bite during Happy Hour on our way to catch a show. 2 in our party enjoyed the $5 HR options, myself and another were starving as we had not eaten all day and went for the massive nachos and big margs as we were short on time and didn't want to seem like pigs ordering 4 HR mini meals. I enjoyed the chicken tinga nachos but the chips got gooey really quick so a few minutes in you have to eat them with a fork. Not much can be done about that and I guess I should have expected that with a queso sauce. Loved all the toppings though. Needed a little more spice.  I had the Blood Orange margarita and it was very icey and lacked much flavor or booze. I just think they added too much ice and not enough mix/booze when blending. I'd come back for the nachos another time but would try another drink.   Service was excellent and fast. We were in and out with fully bellies in 45 minutes and off to our show.  If not for the bad marg it would have been a 4 star.  $95 before tip for 4 adults.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Happy Hour menu
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tostada Nachos
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Tinga Nachos

BzenFygI09qjyzojcMsjqw.text: We came here this week for dinner and really enjoyed ourselves. This location is right in the Fremont  district of LV and super convenient if you are hanging out down here. We were all so done with fancy dinners from our work convention so this place really hit the spot. Once inside pretty spacious and we were seated right away. The menu is your typical Mexican restaurant with some other twists. Like their name they specialize in nachos with lots of great choices and toppings. We decided to share some apps and should've just stuck with that because their chips, salsa, guacamole and queso dip are amazing. I could've easily just had a couple of beers and their chips and been good.   The dumb part of me decided to also order some filet mignon fajitas as well. These are pretty cool when they literally bring them over to you flaming with fire. It was a really cool added touch. The flavors where also very good with just the right amount ratio of meat and veggies. My coworker got these spicy chicken nachos and holy chicken there was a ton of nachos and chicken in his plate. After muscling through this everyone was in a tortilla chip , salsa and meat coma. The drinks here however a little on the weak side and a little disappointing but they made up for it with a great beer selection and we enjoyed a pitcher of IPA. Either way great spot and would highly recommend any local or visitor.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chips and salsa
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. nachos

i4enFxJLNgJX9mkssjJjgg.text: Amazing food! The nachos were piled high with stuff. I got filet mignon nachos with vegan cheese. It had a thick tomato salsa on it I didn't care for. The beans and guacamole were delicious.   My son got a burrito with filet mignon, beans, rice and guacamole. He raved about it and said the rice was really delicious.   I also got the tortilla soup and for me this was the best thing I tasted here. It was mildly spicy, warm and the chicken was tender.   Overall, the ambience is upbeat and carefully chosen music videos play on big screens while you dine. It was busy but they still got our order right and the food took less than 30 minutes from when we ordered. I will definitely come back!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon nachos with vegan cheese
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nacho Daddy store front
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon, bean, rice &amp; guacamole burrito

1pcZZBeYPY9qLJcn3j-6zQ.text: Craving a marg and a taco, this place hit the spot. Atmosphere was casual cool. I appreciated that they played music videos. There's a tank of scorpions to entice you to take their notorious scorpion shot if you're feelin bold.   Ordered queso which arrived with a flame beneath the bowl to keep it the perfect consistency. It arrived with the salsa trio dip and endless chips. Surprisingly affordable for vegas and for the top both quality of service, food, drink and atmosphere.    Easy to wander in with a large group.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

zCLgbfwOuFMAKvbGFifW8g.text: Summary: Excellent service, food, and value. A great place to come on the strip when wanting some casual food with good quality at a reasonable price.  I totally get why Nacho Daddy has such high marks on Yelp. It is a decent sized place, they have happy hour, it's casual, it's affordable for solid food, the menu is quite large, they have good drinks, the service is friendly and attentive, and the vibe is cool. Having the full combo is surprising on the strip, so it makes sense that they stand out.  During CES week I went here with two friends for dinner and happy hour. We checked in on Yelp to get our free margaritas and ordered tortilla soup (excellent and filling) and quinoa bowls of different types (excellent). All throughout our meal, our server kept checking on us and the food came out quite quickly. We'd definitely come back again.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nacho time!

X7KdVZQ4ZbATtSUcEvI-5A.text: This place was a pleasant surprise.  I didn't expect much but the nachos were good.  My buddies complained about the drink prices but that doesn't matter to me.  I'd go back!

VIsNpMqSOed8AEHH1uxqcw.text: **VEGAN REVIEW**  Great selection for vegan food! They have a whole page of vegan dishes to choose from!   Vegan chimichanga- so good! It comes out crispy and filled with veggies, chicken and beans.  Vegan chick'n nachos with sour cream - the cheese has a bit of a cashew taste to it but over all it's delicious.   Vegan crispy avocado tacos - I was looking for Something different so I chose these tacos off the menu. Nothing special about it. They weren't the best but it was still good. I'd come back here but won't be ordering this again.

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Chick&#39;n Nacho with vegan sour cream
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan Crispy Avocado Street Taco

dcynQPobglbs38M-1ywiBw.text: Arnold is the best bartender and waiter in the house he made the experience great all the way around

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The best waiter at nacho daddy
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

_8dlMr7DJKAmzIUt9iNsyQ.text: We just got off our flight and checked into the MGM it was about 11:30 pm. We walked from the MGM to the restaurant around midnight. Walked in and the lady who saw us and was up front walked away. So we stood by the entrance for almost 10 minutes watching her walk around, luckily there was a fish tank there to occupy our time. We then saw one of the bussers and asked if we could sit anywhere. He then went to someone who we assumed was the manager and he came up to us and we were told to sit anywhere. Everything else was ok from here on out but those first 15 minutes or so were horrible. My wife also ordered the enchiladas with red and green sauce, but they came out with no sauce. We were tired and hungry so we grabbed to go boxes. We tipped our waitress and said thanks to the big guy watching the floor and left.

iSU0tDvGsZ2IbYHpTTtHJQ.text: The nachos were average. Unfortunately our order was lost somehow, but they did comp some of our meal. The atmosphere makes for great people watching!

RRZMFQOejhMDrNwgmE3u5Q.text: A must try in Vegas.  The jalapeno and cucumber margarita is awesome!  I enjoyed the surf and turf tacos as well.   My server Ariana was the best and thank you Peter for the hospitality!

GYNi5H8bkc_7EpImrBwCOA.text: MUST GO HERE!!! Whose hungry and hungover and/or sleep deprived in Vegas?!?! My family was and thank goodness for Yelp! We decided to order for take out since the others were falling asleep....The best part was it was hot and fresh! Crunchy nacho chips, toppings were fresh, cooked to perfection and ohhhhh so good!!! We had the Filet meal mignon, lobster and crab, and fiesta nachos! FOODGASM! There's no words to describe because it was so flavorful!! Don't take my word for it, just go try it out! Don't bother trying the other usual Mexican menu items when you can have it all in the nachos!   Located on the Vegas strip in South Las Vegas Blvd near the Cosmopolitan and across the shops at crystal center. 4 stars because it was a challenge for Uber to pick up and drop off at this location. GO and TRY!

71MbY5QPlsAUWNVT1rHEfQ.text: Delicious breakfast and lunch, large portions.  Fun decor inside and good service too.  Best Burgos rancheros I've had.

kO9isvSCoz-fxhEGmDdzJw.text: We checked into the Marriott Grand Chateau and, after dropping our bags in the room, headed across the street to Nacho Daddy for an early lunch.  It was absolutely delicious!  We shared a single order of chicken nachos.  And ate every bite!  Sad we were unable to go back for happy hour.....most reasonably priced food we found in Vegas!

60ciWx4pcB1ScaatfE2Sqw.text: great name & idea. Poor execution. Drinks were fast food good.

I17Wg2N7ZITi4NJnzqYN6g.text: It's easy to dismiss nacho daddy as a tourist trap with their scorpion shots and nacho food theme. But beyond that is actually some pretty great food.  Feeling a bit frisky and you can try their awesome Thai nachos or lobster and crab nachos. Feeling healthy and you can get a salad. Gluten free and vegan options abound and are marked in the menu.  They even have a great breakfast, huevos rancheros were excellent.   Tequila selection was pretty good but the bartenders were clearly hired for other credentials than tequila knowledge, if you catch my drift.   All in all though my favorite cheap eats from my last Vegas trip.

Wmu6Fcv1QPzE2EEklN8apg.text: Outstanding service. Great food. A bit pricey. About 20$ each order we made. Big portions though, so you can share with family

9myOErHyHtn7b5wbMD-HmQ.text: the BEST nachos i've ever had. every single chip was fully loaded. the chips were gone and there was still a ton of filling all over the plate. the meat was so juicy and tender. no fat on it. just full of flavor. this is the second time we've eaten here in 24 hours and i'd do it again if we could!!

ZUgaPrdayVHlnlt2gkNSdw.text: Jovany, our waiter, was amazing! We came for the margs but stayed for the fantastic service. The music was poppin as well. We came before the Britney show and had the best time! The nachos are delicious, super generous portions, perfect margaritas.

j3uhApAsELxmDiikGVsnEw.text: We had such a great experience at Nacho Daddy on the 4th of July! We walked in and it wasn't very busy.  Our server was VERY friendly and attentive. We ordered Mexican Churro Pancakes, Steak Chilaquiles, and Bacon-Cheese Enchiladas Rancheros. We all agreed that our breakfast was very good! We will definitely go there next time we are in town! BTW order a mimosa with breakfast super DELISH. :)

Kvr7EHD5To4JtVMSVO8HzA.text: What a fun restaurant! The atmosphere is great (music videoa playing on the TV's) and the food lived up to our expectations. We ordered the Taco Supreme Nachos and they were awesome! We weren't sure if we were hungry enough for entrees so my husband and I decided to split tacos... I am glad we did! They were really good. The only reason I am not giving a full five stars is the service could have been better. It wasn't miserable but our server was not very attentative.

GEOmswxBznKsbUlb33eW2g.text: After entering the restaurant, we were welcomed in with smiling faces and our wonderful server and supervisor Jovany was such a caring and welcoming person. I felt accepted and flattered by his sweet choice of words. Their portions are great as well which makes it much better & their prices are nice for the strip. Hello from Turkey ! Love you guys !!!
