ONZ4D0fxC1NluFTE9k9vFQ.text: I was excited to try it on account of the high ratings. I thought it was just ok. It was really crowded but we were seated right away I got the Supreme nachos which were huge. I figured my mom was going to share but she was too full off of her meal. The nachos were bland. There was no flavor and there wasn't a dry chip in the mountain of nachos. Usually that's a good thing but the chips were saugy. My mom really liked hers though. She got the fajita bowl.

nVqPJrodSJe3_Z2XSXSDpw.text: One of my favorite nachos I've ever had. The environment there is great. Highly recommend this place. Watch out for the scorpion.

XMfoy0MEwowkPSJ3nrBm7w.text: We needed a quick bite before stopping in for our evening Cirque du Soleil show and found this little gem located near our hotel on the strip. Margaritas, nachos, and tacos, can't really go wrong there! Yelpers receive complimentary margaritas; they also have a variety of delicious cocktails anyone will enjoy. The nachos come fully loaded with meats and veggies based on your preference; the fish tacos we ordered were a bit bland, but the nachos made up for it. Overall positive dining experience -  Best, Charlie

es6Z9FkKOidcUVw9Ou7lIg.text: Food was really great. Me and my friend ordered the scorpion shots but took the scorpion out before taking it hahaha ew

qphi2rRtiM9j2rZ8qKWEdg.text: Best nacho style Mexican food I have ever tried and it's not close.  Margaritas are also on point.  Definitely a worthwhile dinner here on the Vegas strip.  Try the scorpion shot if you are from out of town.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Happy hour

rU1n6c83WjVOke7ql-BbgQ.text: While the best place to start is the beginning, I'm gonna start at the end.  My wife asked what I had for dinner with my friends, and my answer was 12 POUNDS OF NACHOS!  That being said, T'was a cold and rainly night... but seriously, this place is great with a group (as is Vegas)!  This place is in Planet Hollywood, but we came over from the Tropicana... there's a place for Uber/ Lyft/ Taxi to drop you right by the door!  While we waited for a table (just a few minutes), we got to check out the black desert scorpions in the tank by the door.  We hoped to see them eat the tiny crickets while were there, but they didn't.    We were seated, and hit YELP for our FREE MARGARITAS!  They were really decent, especially for FREE!  Our waitress was amazing, and quick with our food and drinks!  She was quick to try the upsell of the Scorpion Shot (actual scorpion on the lime), but we passed!  We started with the white queso (which is holy in our book), and it was really good!  It was thick and flavorful, and we were happy!  We decided to go family style, and try everything... and it seemed to be the best choice.  The plates are HUGE! We started with the Enchiladas nachos, and they were okay... nothing to write home about. Then came the Filet Mignon Nachos, which were killer!  Huge fan!  Then we closed out with Lobster and Crab Nachos!  Just Shut the Hell Up good!  If this can't make you happy, you can't be happy!  How do you top it all off?  Dessert Nachos!  Piles of baked apple, whipped cream, and cinnamon sugar on crispy tostadas!  Get ya some of this!  So this place also has a HUGE Vegan menu!  Apparently, they also serve stuff other than Nachos' and Liquor... but why would you want that, LOL? We will be back for Tacos, Enchiladas, and Burritos!  They also have Mexican breakfasts (chiliquilies, huevos rancheros, and breakfast burritos) and American Breakfasts (omelettes, eggs, breakfast sliders).    If you are looking for Awesomeness, or just Nacho's this is the place!  Plus, lots of stuff for your "other friends" as well!  5 STARS for nailing it!

oYPcm_DSQbvN8_NzlreYSw.text: Good environment, lively and fun. Seated quickly with attentive and informed staff. Food was okay, I enjoyed the drinks more. Appreciated the free drink upon check in (with food order), I'd go back.

9ZsweQzYz1_-0VAAQ2Rl8g.text: I really don't get the hype for this place. The food was bland, the drinks were weak, and the customer service was horrible. This is nowhere near good nachos. The carne asada meat was the best thing out of the 3 different types of nachos we got. The drinks were full of sugar with barely any alcohol. The waitresses don't even check on you and are nowhere to be found when you need something. Our drinks weren't refilled and we didn't have silverware for the longest time. Don't waste your time coming here, go to Tacos El Gordo down the strip.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

U7Uygs9vr9aU_bSipaj9Vw.text: Bomb! Perfect drunk good! LoL. Nachos are really good and their portions are very generous.

bs7DLeDveZbHqgwsUBZnsA.text: Ooooooooooh yeeeeeeeeeeah this is the Macho Man and I'm hear to review Las Vegas's own Nacho Daddy. Diggit! Well sadly not even a legend like Randy could help me kick out from my recent experience at Nacho Daddy.  I had been eyeing this for a few trips now and finally wanted something new so I decided to give it a shot and while it was nice and all I have to say it really didn't stack up at least for me.   After tossing between their nachos or a burrito I decided on the burrito and I actually requested to have it paired with lobster just to feel fancy. For me the flavor overall just fell flat. I was disappointed that it was a mixture of lobster and crab, but the taste just did not pop out and got overshadowed with the mixture of everything. I was very disappointed. To put it blunt as possible it really wasn't a good meal, but in fairness it wasn't all a bad meal either. A credit was the red and green sauce as I did find that flavorful, but if that has to be a highlight then you know the meal was a flop.  Perhaps I just got the wrong thing as their nachos did look pretty good and they do quite the table side presentation with their fajitas. They are flaming literally because the table next to us ordered it and they seemed to duck for cover from the sizzling going on. Made me wish I had that as I was walking out.  Our waitress was very nice and accommodating to our party which I always find a plus, but beyond that i just can't give it any higher or I'd be doing a disservice to what I stand for here.  Would I be back? Not willingly. Could I be back? Never say never because people who dined with me seemed to enjoy things so I see a return visit down the road either way. If you're in the mood for hit home Mexican food at least in my view this should be nacho first choice (sad to say).

JIChOaN5BNMVyUDG-kj20Q.text: This is an honest review if you decide to deliver which I recommend against. This isn't the restaurants fault at all and if I ate there I probably would give it five stars. We had the lobster nachos and filet mignon. If I could do it again I wouldn't order the lobster. Too fishy but the filet mignon was properly cooked and super flavorful. The chips were super soggy because of delivery. I would recommend the restaurant next time to put the cheese sauce in a side dish so it doesn't make it soggy but the portions are huge. Definitely try it out. Super loaded

pbZAe67n1XYWh93yC61k-w.text: We really enjoyed this place. Sat at the bar and watched the Astros play. The nachos were some of the best we've ever had.  Giving 4 stars instead of 5, because they were out of the beer I wanted and my wife said the margarita wasn't the best flavor. Service was great. Overall great experience.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Tostada Nacho (sour cream and guacamole on the side)

xBkz629WW2Wn17jjca0Usw.text: I love the concept of this place. Nachos are offered several different ways along with appetizers and breakfast options. I came here late at night very hungry and ready to eat. We first took a seat at the bar. I started with ceviche which was very good. The nachos came a little later and the portion size was large, enough to satisfy the largest of appetites. All the ingredients were hot and gooey. I enjoyed everything on the nachos except the ranchero sauce. It didn't quite accompany the other flavors, but this did not stop me from indulging until everything was consumed. The atmosphere was lively and infused with energetic music. Despite the unlikable sauce, I would return to explore the other nacho options.

zIho9GE_myXFCubQ8ouTdw.text: AMAZING NACHOSSSSS!!! Ahhhh I'm spazzing, they're delicious! A must try in Vegas especially when you're tipsy. Also when u check u get a free margarita

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

TG8qGQlXSogp__xUphgVDA.text: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING. I actually had to unbutton my pants at the table because I was so full but continued to eat all of the amazing food. I got the jalapeno margarita and the buffalo chicken nachos. I'm still dreaming of this delicious meal. I wound up eating here twice during my 4 day trip. Cute patio and great for large groups!  Service: A+++ Food: A+++ Drinks: A+++ Location: A+++ Pricing: A+++  I cannot wait to eat here again!!

ws6bw6VmqGBXj2e_gDpf_w.text: Yes please! Big portions, free margarita with check in and at an affordable price! And if you got the balls please do the scorpion shot :D   Let's start with the drinks, who else gives you a free margarita with a check in and be on the strip in Vegas? Nacho daddy does! My only complaint is the huge inconsistency between the drinks. Our table had 3 check-in margaritas and the drink strength had a huge difference: practically juice with a hint of tequila, a little less juice and more tequila, and a True margarita with a good amount of tequila. I was quite shocked when we tried each other's drinks but it is free so I can't really complain. If you love tequila, this is the best place for you. They have a whole page for you to choose from.   Ok next, food!!! The entree portions are huge! We shared the wings app which was a bit of a letdown, it was small and dry. So I do what all gf would do, take a bite and dump it on the bf's plate . But hey on the flip side, that chimichanga I ordered was huge and crispy and stuffed like no tomorrow. If this place was near home you would see me here pretty often and leaving with my leftovers :)

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

M4Yw6-PLsrxjPAz0TJH0hw.text: If you're looking for a place to get pretty good Mexican food along the Vegas strip, stop in at Nacho Daddy. My friends are I discovered this place after looking for places to eat on Yelp. We booked a reservation through OpenTable. I highly recommend making reservations, it looked super busy even at 9:25 at night. When we arrived they were still preparing our table but it gave us time to look around. The first thing you notice is the aquarium tank filled with bugs. They're known for the Scorpion shot which is a shot of your choosing served with a scorpion.  Back to the food. We all ordered a margarita. I got the house one free since I checked in on Yelp. And it was absolutely delicious. The perfect mix of tequila and limes. I loved that it was served in a mason jar but I'm basic like that. I ordered the queso as my entree and I'm so glad I did. The chips were warm and fresh. And the queso was served with a little tea light under it to keep it warm. Honestly I don't think it helped at all but it was a nice touch. The queso was smooth and is a White queso. It had the perfect amount of heat. It comes with a side of pick de Gallo which is also fresh and the perfect amount of heat. Overall we had a great time here and I would definitely come back in the

LnV35u2wsxGZYiTYJV5-QA.text: 3500 review definitely going here. Gonna get all of the nachos. Hopefully they will be the ultimate nacho.

7ooz9v_WxZjoocjSDGB2Xg.text: This is a must go place in Vegas. Everything was really great.  The drinks were better than other places. And ofcourse nachos were amazing!!

H21VcaaxgWSfIvD2mEYeow.text: I'm not sure how I missed this place each time I've been to Vegas but what the heck; this place is So. Freaking. Good. I wish they'd open one up close to LA. My husband and I both ordered two different nachos and both enjoyed them. Also- totally took advantage of the free marg with the check in. That's was also really great!

EXjLLn-0VJSEUElaB7sh2Q.text: Great food. Very good fajitas. Servers were awesome and easy on the eyes. Never hurts.

ID-hj3KVng7f3MkNo3ZynQ.text: We came here on Friday night for a late snack. It wasn't too busy and it had the COOLEST vibes with  throwback music videos and its hole-in-the-wall feel. We honestly sat for an extra hour just sipping and enjoying the 90s playbacks!   The margaritas are HUGE and DELICIOUS for margarita fanatics. Ask the severs for their recommendations on taste- they won't steer you wrong.   I loved the ample amount of BBQ on the BBQ Chicken Nachos. So tasty and covered in good toppings!   My husband said his Filet Mignon Burrito was the best burrito he's ever tasted in his life-- from my one bite I would definitely agree. A thick burrito with fillings and perfectly tender meat.   We agreed that we would go here every Friday if we weren't from out of town!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

GB-1VpCUYU43UhH2sn5xAw.text: The feel of the restaurant felt more like a sports bar rather than a Mexican restaurant. I heard there were good nachos so had to try it. I did my normal check in and got a free margarita which was cool. I opted out of the house margarita and went with the Blood Orange margarita with a sugar rim.  They took $8 off that instead.  To be honest, that poor drink didn't have a chance. Sweet orange flavor without the harsh tequila taste. For my meal, I shared the Supreme Tostada Nachos but I requested no beans. This plate was massive. Took two of us to share to finish most of it. The portion side was large. No complaints from me. Under $20 to feed two people to the point of where you want to undo that top button of your pants to relax like it was Thanksgiving says a lot about the portions. Only complaint was that due to the game (insert sports team here) on, I heard loud drunk people shouting at the TVs. Not the fault of the restaurant; plus it is Vegas after all. So I should have expected that being on the strip.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Tostada Nachos

uOnNRcam2PyhghgvikY-sA.text: This is a casual spot just off the strip in Vegas. It was nice to get away from the crazy crowds and enjoy a good meal after a great show. We ordered naked wings and a few nachos. From my seat I could see the kitchen and I noticed that the nachos were sitting there for almost 10 minutes under the heat lamp. It turns out that they were waiting for our wings to come out and they take a while. Eventually a waiter came to our table and asked if we would like to start with the nachos, even though the wings are technically the appetizer. We, of course, said yes!   I shared the Fiesta Nachos. So good. The chicken was shredded and had a lot of flavor. The chicken itself wasn't spicy in my opinion, but there were some jalapenos throughout the nacho mound. I do think that the chips got a little soggy because they were sitting out for a while, but the flavor was still good. The naked wings were also fine. I'm not a huge wings person but they've tasted good to me and came with a variety of sauces on the side.   Everyone in my party used the Yelp check in to get a free house margarita. One of the best margaritas I've ever had, and it was free!! If you love nachos and other Mexican type cuisine, check out Nacho Daddy at any hour of the day or night.

dBiBViJmechbtsjJ31KuvA.text: I love the food and the drinks are good. All the staff from the girl at the door to our waitress to even the guys walking around very polite and friendly. I will be back

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Traditional nachos are the best. Perfect to share. The bloody mary was amazing as well perfect spice. The staff were very friendly

Hd10oJLB_zQjJVr85FveGw.text: My friends and I were in Vegas for the Rock n Roll Half Marathon. After running 13.1 miles we figured this would be the perfect place to sit down and celebrate. We had a group of 5 and we waited no more than 5 minutes for a table. Our waiter came out and got us our drinks quickly which was nice.   The atmosphere is very laid back. The TV's inside the restaurant were playing mainly rap music videos which my party really enjoyed.   The food was amazing. We ordered the bottomless chips and salsa and didnt have to wait too long to get refills on chips. We also got the trio sampler which came with some of the best queso I've ever eaten. One of my friends ordered the nachos to share and my mind was blown by how huge the nachos were. They definitely don't skimp out on the food here.   Overall the service was about average. Towards the end of our stay our waiter got busy and didn't visit us as often and we had to try and find her to get our checks.   I would definitely recommend going here and I will be coming back next time I am in Vegas.

f0gY3qxl0HAj43KiEf5DqA.text: I highly recommend the Cuban Nachos and Filet Nachos (Golden Knights). Both as simply amazing and very filling! Don't forget to check in Yelp for a free house Margarita!  I'm definitely coming back with my friends next time I'm in town.

By0ioUvJiMA5s526hQxIjA.text: Love their vegan menu! We ordered the vegan chicken nachos and it was flavorful and filling! Other people at our table got the real chicken nachos and said that they were amazing. Along with lots of customizable nacho options, there are burritos, tacos, and other Mexican food that was all of high quality. Being a Los Angeles-native, I was initially apprehensive about what the quality of food would be, but I was very impressed! Service was friendly and fast, location is convenient for a great lunch or dinner while strolling the strip, and prices are decent, especially considering most of the meals are larger portions and shareable. I would definitely return here whenever I'm in Vegas!

AIuxEOWJsOwWJ4Vtr3sEtA.text: The food here of course doesn't really taste like authentic Mexican food and that kind of threw me off because that's what I expected since I'm so close to California. Despite that the food was super delicious and our server exceeded our expectations. I think I would come here again if I'm ever in Vegas

OMG8i78teqDLVADKkUDUJQ.text: Great tasting food. I loved the avocado street tacos. The queso was delicious too.  The service is good but lunchtime is really busy so expect a little bit of a wait.  I wasn't brave enough to take the scorpion shot!

IGstpD5TEm7frSf1K7KjsQ.text: FIRE!!! Omg, we walked passed here a few times before actually stopping in and I wish we had come sooner. My brother is vegan and we needed a place that catered to all tastes. Nacho Daddy delivered!! The nachos were HUGE (feeds 1-2 hungry people) and the vegan nachos looked amazing. The Cali Burrito was delicious too. The bottomless mimosas were strong and a great value. The staff was so friendly and attentive too. I'm so glad we tired this spot out! It does not disappoint!

I got the filet nacho and they are good amazing!! Fajita is another must try. Get the for two versions.  I don think it

WfMrpwfh8sqfjzxyZ9bSOg.text: The food was amazing, as usual. We ordered the fiesta nachos and they did not disappoint.  Although, our waitress, MJ, did. She took an unusually long amount of time to come to our table when we were seated. In fact, the host actually walked over and interrupted her story time she was having with another server to remind her that she now has a table.   The service after that was decent UNTIL she brought the bill. We put our card in and she walked past 3 different times without grabbing it. After the 3rd time, she was across the way, chatting with another server for at least 7 or so minutes. We tried to make eye contact, get her attention and nothing worked. Finally, her manager walked up and nudged her to come over. My boyfriend mouthed "thank you" to the manager and he replied with a "you're welcome."   To the waitress, I am sorry that our business took away from your gossip time. We seriously felt like we were invisible.

6m7JJzqql3hQ6ZXLb_N1pQ.text: If you need a reasonably priced Mexican restaurant VERY CLOSE to The Strip - right around the corner from Planet Hollywood, I highly recommend this spot. I don't like walking off Las Vegas Blvd. but this is a mere 1/4 of a block off the beaten path.  I am giving this place 5 stars for several reasons. Taylor, the server, was warm and professional.   The namesake nachos are delicious and can be shared as an appetizer by 4 people. We got the filet mignon nachos but I really wanted to try the buffalo chicken.  The chicken fajitas for two ($23) is a very large portions of white meat chicken, peppers, onions, wraps, rice, beans, guac, sour cream, lettuce, pickled onions and salsa. It's a lot of food but don't worry, we gave it a good home.  Free House Margarita with Yelp check in but we didn't partake of the deal because no one at the liked margaritas.

Full of chicken, sauce, flavor and juicy yummy-ness for only $14.   So far these nachos are on my top 10 list for nachos. Will go back next time in Vegas.

IJrJnmUUMpjKkc95x-YJ7Q.text: Any time I'm back in Vegas I'm coming here. The food is amazing, great atmosphere, and great service.

mSgBnhZsNv3F_QcVVbkizQ.text: Sat here alone while I waited for friends to get in and the staff was super friendly. Amazing Margaritas!

zmZgi5IZi748Uru8uoUkUQ.text: Good food and service. Have been twice now....first time two days ago for dinner. We shared the boneless bbq chicken wings, they were okay, slightly dry. I had the grilled lobster tacos which were very good, soft corn tortillas and a good mango salsa. I also ordered a side of black beans instead of refried, and they were good. Hubby had a pollo burrito, solid choice, and it came wet(but not very). The other two in our group had a Carne Asada burrito and enchiladas. Both enjoyed their dinners as well.  Today we went back to try breakfast. I ordered the breakfast burrito with sausage. It definitely is big(I only ate 1/2), but here's the thing....it was okay....but not one of my top ten. So, in my humble opinion, and being a native Cali, this was pretty plain, and had a fair amount of grease dripping out. The contents were hash browns, scrambled eggs, cheese put on top and then it appeared that the sausage were patties that had been weirdly chopped and put on top of the hash brown/egg/cheese. It almost looked layered. No pico, no crema, no guac or avocado.....just plain. I literally was dumping the salsa(that came on the side), and Cholula to get some moisture/flavor. Hubby had the steak omelette and really liked it.   We probably would return, but I feel like you need to know what to order, as not everything is a standout. But I do think they are known for their nachos(hence the name, lol), and we did see a lot of them being served around us.  In the end it's not going to beat any of our favorite Taqueria's in Nor Cal, or the Central Coast, but the food here is fresh, and the service is great.  I don't want to forget....we did enjoy two pitchers of margaritas with dinner, Patron Anejo, on the rocks. Not cheap on the pours, and tasty!

nX1hBVB7v59SuPa6VMCQ-g.text: One of the best restaurants I've had in Las Vegas! Friendly, relevantly quiet and tasty! I had the tacos and my husband had the burrito, both were delicious and good quantity.

R-vMj85wp73ewXDNssPz9g.text: Always great and friendly service! Amazing atmosphere despite it being on the busy stripe.

HETuOYZN-GeWaZ8Cf72Ieg.text: Food was really good . I just went there for a quick snack and got an appetizer! Service was quick while sitting at the bar. I will definitely be back next time I am visiting Vegas!

yDvyM3Umcj_BCmV3bbaFxA.text: Sadly, the Henderson location on Eastern Ave. closed in May 2016. I was bummed because it was close to where I live.  But thankfully, this new location opened up on The Strip! This location is great!  Technically, it's located on Harmon Ave., right across from the Harley Davison casino, but you need to access the restaurant by going to the Planet Hollywood resort. And when you do, you won't be disappointed.   The grilled shrimp appetizer is tasty, the filet mignon nachos are great, and the margaritas are awesome! The service is amazing, too! Our waitress, Serena, and the general manager, Mikey, were very friendly and very attentive. I have only good things to say about the new Nacho Daddy location at Planet Hollywood.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Daddy Margarita. This drink, along with the filet mignon nachos, and the service, is awesome!

BZLe4LSNNQ1tWKuqVYDAPA.text: Had steak nachos at Nacho Daddy. Yumm! Went back for breakfast on our last day in Vegas. Delicious!

CVrtV7I3OL0PGzRfeLzIzw.text: First time going to Nacho Daddy was great! I ordered the Thai Chicken Nachos. It was the best nachos I've had IN. MY. LIFE. It was packed with so much flavor! If you want to step outside of the box and out of your comfort zone then order the Thai Chicken Nachos. You will be impressed!!!!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margarita

HN-4FNXW74cvADbPX0Pndw.text: Cool place for large groups. Had the fajitas, chicken enchiladas, and crab nachos. Food didn't particularly stand put, this place is more like a franchise, buffalo wild wing, yard house type quality. Prices were reasonable. Nothing really stood out.

Ki4-Mg2M1S7gKDxywpJjoQ.text: We were strolling the strip and needed some nutrition after a long day of walking (and drinking). Pulled up Yelp and this place was right next to us, so we ventured in. Sat at the bar, talked to some locals who gave us other great food ideas, the bartenders were super nice, and the happy hour nachos, tacos, and margaritas made us very happy. It's slightly off the main drag so it wasn't full of tourists which was pleasant.

ZhDYrSOzgobYF16LsoNM0g.text: We went for Labor Day Weekend getaway and were looking forward to the nacho daddy filet mingon nachos, since we had them at Fremont Street 4 months ago but were so disappointed! This place should not be called Nacho Daddy it does not compare to the fremont street location! Location is great for drink and good vibes but for the food your better driving to the Fremont street location.

s5GYFt1OBffy4faiU_lcyw.text: Gotta love Vegas... Hello Nachos! Cool roadhouse vibe, loud music, bar, lots of sports on tv's. Pretty big menu, lot's of choices and some Vegan choices...How cool is that?!!  We started with a pitcher of white peach margaritas...Yum They were stiff strong and delicious!  We all ordered different dishes and got to taste each other's food...   All the food was on point. We ordered a Lobster crab nacho ...WOW! A spicy shrimp nacho, yummy! A vegan spicy burrito, it was good, woulda been better w salsa, but our waitress disappeared... we wanted to order an appetizer of jackfruit tacos, they were sold out... They must be good if they are sold out before 5pm on a Monday... Return visit is planned to try them. Instead we got fried avocado tacos,  Omg they were amazing! The one meat eater in the group ordered Filet mignon nachos and loved them! All the flavor profiles were delicious even the vegan ones. Would have given 5 stars cuz I really liked it, but our waitress who started off great. Disappeared, we tried to get change at the bar and he said NO! I still don't want that to negatively affect a really fun good meal. Plus our food coma's didn't last that long lol! I would recommend them and tell you that you can park at the miracle mile mall or get dropped off there and walk thru the REALLY cool miracle mile either before or after "NACHO DADDY"

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fried avocado tacos were amazing and vegan!

Street tacos, mexican street corn( off the cob), mini bbq nachos, chimichangas, mini buffalo nachos. The drinks were good too! Everything was delicious! I would definitely recommend going there if you visit Freemont!

rF-y4B3-ZmxnnrTxzzhqHw.text: This place had quite possibly the best nachos I've ever had. The serving size was extremely generous (more than enough for 2 people) and I love how you could literally modify any order to your liking (add more jalapenos, substitute for chicken, etc)   The ambiance was great and the free margarita for checking in was also a great bonus! This place is just off the strip and so worth the little detour! Not to mention they allow you to take drinks with lids and will store it in their cooler until you leave!

MIQTuDwCzL8a_5DOFd0QZw.text: I have been hearing about this place for awhile, and been hesitant to try it since it's on the strip and location wasn't too good. I finally tried it for dinner and debated between the nacho and burrito, but instead ordered the Seafood Combo, lobster and crab enchilada and fish taco which was recommended by the server.   By the time I got my food, it was cold already. I was expecting the portion to be bigger for the price. Enchilada was so small and barely taste the lobster or crab, overall the taste was flat. I was really disappointed. I tried the fish tacos, and it was the same. I barely taste the fish, it was overshadowed by all the salsa. You can tell the food wasn't fresh when you got beans and the cheese didn't even melt. You can tell the beans was cold. I didn't even try the rice, it look dry.   I definitely will not recommended this location.

Took our order after a half hour wait, then a half hour after that told us our order had disappeared and needed to put it in again. Never got a refill of water and our order was wrong. Worst experience ever.

0itq13dGfBeImMFpGR12tw.text: I landed here quite randomly but boy, am I glad! I am a Mexican food snob after having lived in Mexico for a year and this s#%! Is the BOMB! The beans are amazing, the meat fresh, the presentation gorgeous. I'm in love!!!

hKw1rlUHb9ONLOusabidyg.text: Went here for the vegan options.  Really great selection and food was great.  A little too much vegan cheese for outer taste, but next time we go back we will just see if we can get on the side.

V2uTLQqZwfRHLK31DYnAFA.text: Great food, great service and great margaritas at a reasonable price! Family friendly and very courteous staff, answered any questions we had and even made helpful recommendations!

1LtH_0pG8a45RMSopT-pdA.text: Really liked this place! Would recommend to anyone. After a long night of drinking, I definitely needed a good Bloody Mary. Could of used a little more vodka in it but the flavor was still good. Chips were fresh. We had queso with ground beef as a app, then the bbq nachos and the philly queso cheese steak. All was delicious. My only complaint is there was a bit to much bbq sauce on the nachos. Huge portion. Could definitely share with another person.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Queso philly cheesesteak
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Queso with ground beef and a delicious Bloody Mary.

Im9YexA-Lac6hbFz4Ym4hw.text: I do believe their nachos are the best I've ever had, for the flavor alone! Period! Plus, I ordered delivery and it was still hot and crunchy and delicious when my order arrived! It exactly his the spot! Now I need to go there in person to sample their menu live!

ROAVNI9Ho6Uh1l2gbjE1kQ.text: YES! Like most, we were drawn to Nacho Daddy for the amazing name! Our entire experience was great! A quick check in prompted a free drink with the purchase with an appetizer which was a great start. Very Friendly, attentive service made us feel extremely welcome. Now to the reason we were there. NACHOS! who doesn't like nachos? Especially from a place that is named after them! So we gave their giant menu a long look and of course ended up getting one of their Nacho Options. I couldn't believe how many Nacho options they had! We went with the Pulled Pork Nachos and Knew we had made the right decision when they were set in front of us. I don't think we had a single chip that was left without toppings! Not to mention the serving size was more than enough or two people. Two drinks and a meal for $30 in Vegas is unheard of. We will absolutely return and try something new. The group we went with was sick of hearing about how much we loved this place. If you are on the fence at all, i hope this review pushes you to try this wonderful restaurant. If you have even close to as good of an experience as we had then I am convinced you will be thrilled with your decision.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

UZ3bj4Scr-JJZrndMAZYcQ.text: Food was great ppl where hellla friendly you get a mountain of nachos every chip had sauce too enchilada nachos are the best

aRknQyYOS5hfexU06WE4VQ.text: Excellent food, great service, fun ambience.  I highly recommend the Thai chicken nachos if you happen to like sweet, peanuty, tangy Thai flavors. The portion size is generous and can be easily split between two. I like the fact that the nachos were filling without leaving you feeling like you ate a bowl of greasy cheese. We also ordered a kale salad which was fresh and offered a nice balance to the hearty nachos.   The place was spacious and had a fun but low key vibe. I also loved the music videos from the early 2000s that were playing in the background!  Overall, I had a experience. The prices are reasonable, food was delicious (no, I wasn't drunk), and the service was friendly. I would definitely come back.  Also, don't forget to check in on yelp for a free house margarita!

1B286HvPTG00QSyp8v7s8A.text: This was our first visit to Nacho Daddy.  The Supreme Tostada Nachos were outta this world. Soooo good, and love their guac.  Great customer service as well.

k7M96De9Z5FNYDBtC962Rw.text: My husband and I are in Vegas every 1-2 months and we LOVE Nacho Daddy. Last we we were in town for four nights and we made it to Nacho Daddy every night. The margaritas are the best we have had and you can't beat happy hour with $5 appetizers and house margaritas. We have tried most of the menu and have no complaints. The atmosphere is fun and the bartenders are AMAZING. So, friendly and offer great service, our personal favorites are SCARLET and SHANNON, they always take great care of us and are such hard workers. Scarlet can multitask like nobody else:) A new bartender started Thursday night, I don't remember her name, but she was super sweet. The next two nights we watched her comfort level grow and by Saturday night she fit right in with the Nacho Daddy family. We hope to see her there on our next trip. We highly recommend Nacho Daddy to everyone we know and highly recommend Nacho Daddy to everyone reading these Yelp reviews.

8hao6rrjFmSdtv2hVNK7tQ.text: Oh my lord, the food, the drinks, the atmosphere. EXCELLENT!!!  Wait staff is attentive but not bothersome. Food is well prepared and presented with reasonable portions.

_TEPpW93badZqaGtGWs1jQ.text: Did not disappoint .  Food was so good and quick. The salsa was too spicy, they should have had levels.  Without the salsa, the other seasoning was perfect. Try it, you will be happy you did. Check in on Yelp and get a free margarita.

O-JoxDCiCbgnto801l8Ynw.text: Can't wait to go back. I absolutely loved the vegan nachos yumm. The vegan fajita were so realistic tasting that I had to ask my husband over and over if he was sure he ordered the right thing, because I thought I was eating real chicken, Fortunately it wasn't :)

0LGjNLVexwq1Sx-MyiFZgg.text: got the filet mignon nachos and they were the best nachos i've had. people were nice and the inside is clean and nice

7X6Mw8GTsbaGXawMq4gqKA.text: Best nachos - best re-fried beans - top 5 corn tortillas (including real deal TX tortillas) good drinks. Recommended.

Z2QQO8MQ0ESGLr1qkbZERg.text: The absolute best damn vegan nachos you'll ever lay your taste buds on. Really best nachos ever in general. The cheese sauce was out of this world good, scary good. Loved it! The vegan chocolate cake was tremendous also. Service was nice, she checked in on his multiple times. I wanted to get the scorpion shot but my wife was upset with me after losing money on the black jack table.

aw9yho_k85-W9wooeczsxw.text: The food here was awesome. I ordered the fish tacos and they were great. Everything tasted fresh and all of the flavors went so well together. We came here a little later in the night and it didn't seem super busy but it still took a very long time for our food to come out, even the appetizer. However, our server was kind enough to stop by in between and brought us some chips and salsa to snack on while we waited so that made up for it. Would definitely recommend stopping here if you're in the mood for some tacos or a burrito! The house margarita was also a hit!

p5OMVW55JDqppDL4PPVJ4w.text: Excellent service.  Good drinks.  Our server gave us an extra order of micheladas because they made too many.  What a score...The micheladas were really good and they can make them spicy if you prefer (A real nice kick to them). They were too big and we took them to go.  The burritos were very good, and filling. We got the breakfast burrito with sausage and the burrito with filet mignon. Recommend both. A table of 4 beside us ordered nachos and the size of them were so big the table couldn't finish it.  If you get the nachos maybe share between 2-3 people. The servers were all very friendly and welcoming.  Will make this a must-stop for our next Vegas trip.

z2JHCAKLDuCVpZGNIL1OwQ.text: Amazing nachos and the waitresses were super nice! Loved the vibe of the place as well

3acOzjsmzJ5nymc4vwxrFg.text: Great flavors. Could've used more cheese considering I did order nachos but a lot of meat and other toppings and delivery was on time and food was good. Would definitely recommend.

XT3_SyEXUm2WuJalh_vSPQ.text: This place was delicious and sooo much good. Wish my tacos werent so soggy from grease but other than that amazing. Our server vince was awesome good job!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

dixjWKCJr--iWR3EkTWHUg.text: This place is delicious! Our server was helpful with any questions and the food is bomb. My husband ordered the pulled pork nachos and I got the vegan fajitas. We also got the street corn for an appetizer. It was great! Wish we had a Nacho Daddy in San Diego.

5R_94UtJStT9JUFn2diuQA.text: I l oui ve this place! Their taco is great and the price is good too. I would drop by here for quick meal or happy hours.

C89O3r9mZtMAsSrLsd_viA.text: Love this place Always a must stop in Las Vegas  Good food good drinks and free margarita with check in

sRtU8cmWUzbBeeTvGxXh5w.text: Nacho daddy was the first place I ate at when I moved to Vegas and it is hands down one of my favorite places! They nachos are BOMB, the free margarita check in is BOMB, the service is BOMB. Everything about this place is amazing and I highly recommend to anyone!

XNXz6iAmWwmodMfhD96Y_A.text: Excellent stop in the city for an authentic nacho "bar". Food had wonderful flavor and texture. Freshness straight outta the gate with margaritas "thirst quencher " and nachos to the chips and salsa and homemade guacamole. If in the mood for good nachos and cold drinks a desire than this place is for you. . A must for a Vegas vacationer.  Great ambiance and wait staff.

Bl-1LZjPhJyPdR6fnayjkA.text: Always have a great time at Nacho Daddy. Even if you went there just for the chips and bean dip and a couple margaritas, the atmosphere is chill, always a different crowd and their tacos are fabulous! Plus they have a scorpion shot that'll put hair on your chest

xI5aLoDgnuiFKK8tfHMZeA.text: After watching the show Tanked and I had to go take a scorpion shot! Food was phenomenal I can confidently say I will be returning . Great Service , quality drinks , lovely people.

hOTi87O2hRPAhK4jmmeqOA.text: The nachos were delicious!! My husband got the shrimp tacos and they were very generous with the shrimp and it was a little show when they cooked the shrimp when they brought it out. Great service & Great food. Only concern was the birds flying around inside.

gW5mqV_Pnmh2UB5DjU0FBA.text: Good food, service was fast. I had the shrimp nachos and my bf had steak tacos.  We chose to sit at the bar and the atmosphere was great. We went around 11am and we sat there for awhile just talking to each other and the staff no rush.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

DtAT3HRByTbx1EXiMjwcXA.text: Loved the avocado tacos!  It was nice to find some yummy plant based food on the strip.  It was so good I came back twice.

tG8ny5lfqdBFe5u96itWqQ.text: This place was pretty good I had the vegan spicy chicken burrito and was pleasantly surprised. I also got a free margarita and for checking in and the waitress let me upgrade it to the mexican candy margarita. It was good especially if your vegan.

v0EKxJbKxp0Poxogrri0sg.text: Yes! Finally! A spot I came to in Vegas that I LOVED! Let's get the bad out the way. Service isn't quite hitting here. The hostess who sat us put us in the corner so we were out of sight, out of mind. It took us nearly 15 minutes before the waitress even came out to take our drink order. After that, everything we got just took longer and longer for her to return. I thought this was going to be another 2-3 star Vegas joint until the food came.  I got the BBQ pork nachos. They were OFF THE CHAIN. PLENTY of nachos! Great tasting BBQ sauce. Pork was perfectly tender and covering all of the nachos as they claim. The cheese hit it all off wonderfully. I got a pomegranate margarita; it tasted great and was very potent, loved it.  My wife and I split a fried ice cream dessert. It was certainly ON POINT. The ice cream was really good, accompanied by the perfect crunch of the "fried" shell and the nachos and the drizzled syrup makes it very tasty. Awesome place overall; wish there was one in Chicago! If they can improve their service, it would be a 5-star hit every time!

_va4L39kASvO_j0BwcguhA.text: Taco Bell is much better and way more cheaper. Nacho daddy is very overrated on yelp and maybe it's rigged. The burritos are way to salty and so are the nachos. The worse part was the diarrhea in the morning, no bueno.

dOiY7gu2PBiHlhu1lvL0Ww.text: We really liked the selection of nachos and loved the Tonga enchilada nachos with the Mexican corn appetizer. The music and ambiance were great!

v5sZGt6L80-MlZ9IeSWdEg.text: Wow! This place was amazing! Highly recommend the filet minion nachos!! Service was awesome too!

lzEWSzigPC7mr3EVikGWVA.text: Gave this place 2 more tries on my next Vegas visit. I like the food and the drink. Not bad prices for good food on the strip. The menu selection will make you want to come back and try something else. The signature nachos were a hit with me and my friends.  Pretty sure I'll be back next time I'm in Vegas!

OBeeZGk8nyMqdu27VXuqug.text: I love Nacho Daddy. The food is really good and the service is excellent. I visit the restaurant on West Sahara, which is very convenient for me. I ate their Tuesday night! Mmmm! Can't say enough positive things about Nacho Daddy!

VUqt_4fhDgXMnWnh-1N7Gg.text: Good vibes. Huck was an attentive waiter and the House margs are huge and the potion sizes are good for anyone. 2/3 of us left with food to go.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

R0FwaO1boD9Phfo44Vj_Zw.text: First time visit to Nacho Daddy on the Strip. We really enjoyed the friendliness and attentiveness of our server, Kiel. When Zach delivered our small child's meal, we had a question about the temperature of the skillet it was on. He grabbed the handle to show us it was a cool plate, which we greatly appreciated. Then chef Reuben stopped by on his way out and we were able to express to him how much we enjoyed the meal and that the vegan Chickn Tacos (and our daughter's meals with meat) were yummy. The Vegan Chickn Tacos were on the spicy side, which we enjoyed, but you should be aware of it if sensitive. To top it off, we were able to speak to the manager, Brian, to express our appreciation for his staff. Everyone was amazingly friendly and attentive, which we were particularly grateful for after a long day of driving with kids.

FZyMQx3bBhJ1-4EkFZDhsA.text: Just had a great dinner and an amazing tamale. One of the chefs, Rueben Garcia even visited the table to ask if we liked our food. Very nice!

7yQuqEkt9Daqyq2gksAkcw.text: We found this place on our last day in Vegas. The name was catchy so we figured we'd give it a try, and I'm glad we did. The nachos were well worth the stop and the michelada I had was one of the best drinks I had all weekend. The atmosphere was very chill and the waiter we had (Mark) was very nice. It was the perfect place to end our getaway. I look forward to going back on our next trip.

7F68TDD0KXurf_08q3ZiqQ.text: Great food but some confusion with my order and final tab. If not for these issues would have rated 5 stars. The manager Angie was the absolute best and she definitely deserves 10 stars. THANK YOU ANGIE for saving our experience.

oF9S2t1dPNMHRKf-ELfrtw.text: Awesome place to eat! Great atmosphere and friendly staff. Ryan was a great server and told us how to a get free house margarita. Will definitely eat there on every Vegas trip.

CnujuJSoFUway9pp2CQavg.text: Oh wow!!!! So glad I found this place.  The Kale scramble is delicious and Jaylon went out of his way to make sure we had a great time!!

dvBwjCwsb102aTsup9NJcA.text: This place is awesome.... The food is great. Fresh ingredients which makes the difference but what tops the cake is the service. My waitress Arieanna was hands down the best server I have ever had. Genuinely cared about us and making sure we were happy. Definitely be back. Keep it up Nacho Daddy!!

XlaUvK5lF4DS5stqxbNUEg.text: Brian and Jovanny were awesome and the food and margaritas were amazing. The manager, Brian, put together an amazing area for the Brooks wedding party in the loft with a beautiful view. Brian made sure the place was perfect with lighting and flowers for the table that coordinated with the wedding colors. Because we were from out of town, Brian was so helpful by personally having a wedding cake made by a local bakery, and it was absolutely perfect. The food was so good! The service was beyond our expectations in every way. Thank you for making the Brooks wedding party so memorable!

yp9KuuJLi0G0RZN0lwgLRA.text: My wife & I were in Vegas for our anniversary and stopped into Nacho Daddy for a late dinner.  The only thing better than our fantastic food was the great service!  We sat at the bar and our bartender couldn't have been better... she was attentive, knowledgeable about the menu, and very personable & friendly.  We didn't want to leave!  Beyond that, we fell in love with their food so much, I emailed the company when I got home asking if they'd surprise my wife with some of their salsa, and sure enough they were happy to do so (Thanks again Taylor)!  If you're looking for great Mexican food while on the Vegas strip at a great value, Nacho Daddy is the place!

gtyt6VercyxhUQni67ubsQ.text: Jovanny was our server and was so helpful and had amazing customer service! Food was great but having an amazing sever always helps the experience. Definitely recommend!

ymsiOGEnVG1GOtYR1ayMAQ.text: Excellent place for breakfast and dinner.  Very friendly staff, great service. This is our second time back.  We will be coming back every trip back to Vegas

6753RT5lycqUSLrJKCcqjQ.text: This is some of best food I've had during my stay in Vegas. Our waiter, Jovanny, was very friendly, accommodating, and attentive. Super fast service and great atmosphere.

fwRudK1g_dZ5pFMXttjSig.text: Mark took great care of us...the drinks were flowin' at a reasonable price!  We'll be back!

OGgF1gcNoH4DzrdBAVcuUg.text: Arieanna is so incredibly awesome. She gave us great recommendations since this was our first time. Could not have asked for better service. Food was delicious and prepared perfectly. Arieanna was patient and so perfect. Make sure you ask for her next time you are here.

tqeC69fYg5pa0gn0FTocWQ.text: Keil is awesome. Great place everyone is friendly, and the nachos are amazing!

G9tn4V39bqhdx2LKmTycIA.text: Great food and and drinks! Ask for Amanda...one of the BEST servers I've ever encountered in a restaurant.

febbYktSeeBOCV_p4zJ7uw.text: We stopped in for a late afternoon snack while visiting Las Vegas and were pleased to find you received a sizable portion of nachos to share.  We tried the BBQ Chicken nachos and ordered 6 naked BBQ wings, which were also great! The wings had a spicy dry rub and came with the BBQ sauce on the side.  The nachos were piled high with pulled chicken, although they had a bit too much BBQ sauce for my opinion and could have used a bit more salsa and cilantro.  Happy hour was also starting and we couldn't pass up $4 draft Mexican beer.  Just off the main Las Vegas Strip with outdoor seating in the Miracle Mile shops its a nice place to grab a quick eat!

EInb9gb3bTifygmx4tIA6w.text: My wife and I happen on Nacho Daddy by chance and so happy we did. Great service, inviting atmosphere, very reasonable priced. The menu is several pages with everything from traditional to imaginative. What really sets Nacho Daddy apart from the competition is unbridled flavor; nothing bland here. When chef Rubin came out to visit each table, he was sincerely interested in our opinions. We are going back tonight. See you there!

jFpe90N_nNdmjr1uqE0UrA.text: This was my first experience at Nacho Daddy. The nachos were alright but I will go back just because of the exceptional service by Britney! She made sure our drinks were full and my group was happy, despite we were completely indecisive. She made plenty of reccomendations which turned out to be successful especially for my never satisfied husband. Thank you Britney I won't lose any sleep tonight!

L_8lQz4hEyqne8bYhJqX_Q.text: Great place.  This one is a bit more polished that the one in downtown but it still has the same great food.  Great non-casino food!

n-lsI9KC9031AOn-kS74-A.text: I had the vegan nachos to go and they were amazing! I've sat down to eat at the otherlocation and had the avocado tacos and vegan burrito my favorite vegan Mexican food! You can see it on my YouTube channel search: sherrysynthesis Vegas

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Burrito

NrLGbeTpU9MVbITi0YPtGQ.text: The BEST vegan nachos I've ever had in my life! I only had the lunch portion and it was enough! Also they gave us a free margarita for checking in! Staff were super nice and our waiter was beautiful!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ds60JbLzJ9VuwILMPFYHdw.text: Quick service, excellent quality with a punch of mouthwatering flavor! Can't go wrong with the all you can eat chips and salsa. So good. If you want a place to eat on the strip that won't be way overpriced check this place out. You definitely won't be disappointed.

XVpLCoUQ_4jz0V8eOfoGEw.text: I absolutely have to give this place five stars, no doubt about it.  Prior to EDC, I made a post on reddit asking for recommendations on late-night eats, based on where I was staying. A number of people recommended this place because it was directly across from where I was staying (Marriott Grand Chateau).  Other than EDC, I planned my trip around eating. My flight was supposed to get in around close to midnight, which means I'd have sufficient time to drop off my bags and go to Tacos El Gordo, but unfortunately, my flight got delayed!!! So by the time I got to my hotel, it was too late :'( luckily, Nacho Daddy was still an option and we walked across the street for some nomsss.   That night, we ordered the triple dip appetizer and the filet mignon nacho to share between the five of us. It was enough for me to get full and for the others' midnight snack. THE QUESO IS SO BOMBBB. no idea what kind of cheese it is but I highly recommend it. The filet mignon nachos on the other hand, literally cannot go wrong. We inhaled it.  So anyway, this place was so good...that we came here Saturday morning with our party of 9, of course, no shame. We ordered the triple dip appetizer and three orders of nachos: filet mignon, lobster and crab, supreme tostada. Again, I think the filet mignon was the favorite of the three.   Our servers were generally attentive, but I think the most important part of dining during EDC weekend is keeping us fed, so they did their jobs. I'm definitely coming back if I'm in the area.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. One of the only meals I ate during EDC.... no regrets

wF6UW1RBAkRzGqorSesvUQ.text: I ordered the Loaded Vegan Nachos...They were divine. Vegan cheese is hard to love let me tell you this cheese was not store brought and delicious. If they sold it in the store I would buy it. Not too many places care if vegans have sour cream but at Nacho Faddy they want you to have an experience as if you were not vegan. I devoured my plate not a chip was left behind.

enGfd5IIz5REW0NEhIeJjA.text: Soo good!! Definitely recommend their fish tacos ! Even got a free shot for my birthday ( even though my birthday was a month ago) Awesome service !

0RbGBlG872IecpqyvhLo3A.text: The nachos were good but nothing out of the ordinary. My husband had the burrito and he said it was good as well. I had a michelada and it wasn't my favorite but wasn't bad. Overall the Service and the food were good.

pfppHtlNMCbhq_mZCyzxuw.text: To be honest, I came in with high-hopes based on the reviews but left a little disappointed. Everyone in my group seemed very underwhelmed. Maybe it's because we didn't order the right things, maybe we came on an off night. I got the Street Tacos of the starters plate and although tasty, they weren't anything to rave about, my husband who ordered the same meal (because we weren't hungry enough for the rice and beans that came with the street taco meal) felt the same way. My brothers burrito was cold. I also think any Mexican-style restaurant (especially with a higher price-point menu) should offer complimentary chips and salsa.   Our service was kind and friendly but the highlight of the meal was the real of early 2000s music videos they played behind us.

NOMeBpXG_8jyBCaXbLyVzw.text: Came here after a pool party drunk with my girls and was greeted by the nicest host ever who immediately sat us and the server came shortly after with several suggestions. Everything about this place is awesome- from the service, atmosphere, music, menu, and especially the VEGAN MENU. They had the best vegan nachos! My friends also loved their shrimp nachos and shrimp tacos that were seasoned to perfection

h9bj4s9huYqtZQTqxYORlw.text: Best kept secret off the strip!!    Beer battered fish tacos were the best I've ever had!!!

pDTMIoKL4x0EYGC7NDO6nQ.text: Lots of Vegan options and cool atmosphere hard to find for first timers but worth it . A little pricey but for 8 plus Vegan options it's cool.

Tvnqwyf6SE6wO8XwHrI2Eg.text: I have so much to say about this place! FIRST, THERE IS A FULL PAGE of vegan options. Not vegan and vegetarian but just straight vegan. I for one in my vegan existence had trouble deciding on food Bc I had SO many options. I eventually settled on the original nachos Bc it is the name of the restaurant after all, to which I added the fake chicken as well.   The nachos came piled high with everything I love in life. Creamy vegan queso, vegan sour cream, black beans, jalapenos, Pico, guac etc. It was SOOOOOOO delicious. I was amazed. But then I notice not only do they have a dozen or more entrees but they ALSO have vegan dessert. A BEAUTIFUL layered chocolate cake with a rasberry glaze. It was unbelievably perfect. Get this cake to go and eat it in bed while doing a face mask and you'll sweat you have died and gone to vegan heaven.  But the kicker on this whole place is they ACTUALLY had outstanding service as well. Now I am a realistic person . I don't go to Las Vegas city of drunk out of Towners and expect overly great service from anyone. So to go somewhere where I had more vegan options than I knew what to do with AND get great service??? Well that was the unexpected icing on the cake!!! Ohhhh that delicious cake   My servers name was Brandon (booker) and he was a genuinely nice person with excellent customer service. I'll definitely be going back here to try more from their vegan menu before I head home. And to get more cake

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegan nachos with vegan chkn

ay4kwtEJWwLA5DP9IRUfSQ.text: Drinks and nachos? Sign me up! Share if you want! Don't if you don't want to! It's a big serving of nachos and I'm not complaining! Pair it with a margarita and it's perfect.   They also have a decent size vegan menu so bring all your vegan friends to join you.   Digging some scorpion and alcohol? They have that too!   It's a great place to forget about the heat and just dig in and get dirty.

oKpV8ixf5pFgjgbqFvwleQ.text: stopped by here for a quick bite to eat and it was really yummy! we ordered the filet mignon nachos and an ultimate enchilada combo and they were both tasty, however the next time i go i think i'll order two nacho options instead. the enchiladas were good, but nothing special and the spanish rice that came with it was kind of hard and bland. nonetheless it was still really good! the portions were pretty big so we shared it family style between 4 people. would definitely recommend trying for anyone who is visiting vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

HNNJzAOL7Z0AooWLbbEYzw.text: Visited twice in a week while in Vegas. Had nachos the first visit and brunch items, shrimp tacos & a white Peach Margarita the second visit. Everything was amazing. Will definitely be back next time I'm in Vegas!

27iYQExBOvCatQKFWar4Iw.text: Food was good. Slightly on the pricier side. However service was prompt They have a lot of selections to choose from. The ambience here is phenomenal as it takes you back to the roots. Would definitely come back if there was more availability of their lunch menu into their dinner menu. Staff was very pleasant to deal with and they even remembered us from last time which is great knowing you are being acknowledged

CUq_audsWGfS566043opBA.text: I ordered the vegan nachos. They were good. There vegan cheese was a little gritty could have been smoother. Overall I would highly recommend.  Plan I'm waiting to be seated place gets extremely busy

7Tw999aRI42VBMRz2xFnzQ.text: The best Nachos around. And it's worth every penny. Plenty of choices and very very very delicious. Kudos Nacho Daddy. I give you five thumbs up baby....

jwhaNPR7yOdu1UCxeg0Brw.text: Late night meal ... absolutely perfect! Our waiter, Ryan, was engaged with us from the beginning. All of his suggestions were spot on ... even the shots with a scorpion in them. My family had a wonderful experience.

Cug9EO6721qRFpRsoYTJKw.text: Casandra was our waitress at the bar and she was great. She was sweet and helpful. Did a great job explaining the menu. Would come back!

H5Hp-TJlSivjL7bzdEpyHQ.text: We have AJ and he's the best server ever, he's so friendly and so fast, highly reccomended !!!

tQ9lURj4UTcvl8Oy7-dS0w.text: Great service. The bartender. Arienna was so nice and knowledgeable. The scorpion shot is definitely a much do and the supreme tostada nachos were amazing.

NiCspptn1Z6xHZCJja6fLQ.text: Food was great but a bit disappointed in the service. Three out of four drinks came out before the meal, but the fourth hadn't come by the time our meal came--and neither had the chips and salsa we ordered. We inquired, and the chips came out, but the last drink didn't. It took another reminder, after we were almost finished with our meal, to finally get the last drink.  Their nachos are very good, and so are the margaritas. I preferred the Daddy's margarita, which was more balanced, over the house margarita, which was too sweet.

UZKQhky4W7dVTotLAVab3g.text: Where do I start? Loved the atmosphere, food, drinks and customer service! The specialty nachos are amazing as well as the enchiladas. HIGHLY RECOMMEND. One server that stood out was Jovanny. Unbelievable customer service. Truly made me and my family have an outstanding dining experience!!! All I have to say is go here! And request Jovanny!

7L08ZwQ724PPQj49BfjHJg.text: Well I must begin by saying this is by far hands down one of the best restaurants I've been too here in Las Vegas & that's no exaggeration by all means!! I was searching online for some of the best reviewed restaurants and this one came up so we decided to go check it out and it was one of the best decisions we ever made, first of all our waitress was very nice and extremely helpful. When I was there I had ordered from their breakfast menu since they serve it all day (+extra brownie points) and had the enchiladas with scrambled egg.. it had a side of pico de gallo, guacamole & beans & my father had ordered the supreme nachos which were quite the big order as well and to top things off we both received a complementary margarita drink each. Everything was just excellent, customer service great, food great, environment overall great and at the end of the day I left a very satisfied customer and you bet next time I'm around town I'll be making sure to go back and eat from this place once again!

ox3ui0G5UxQwbY5kpUuk8w.text: Favorite place to eat in Vegas. During my 1 week stay we went to Nacho Daddy multiple times! Jovany and Joseph both did an excellent job taking care of us. Hands down most friendly wait staff we had! Foods was wonderful. Offered a wide variety of dishes ranging from traditional to exotic.

99VQALluQ3uaJ5nufJUnKg.text: Joveny hooked us up!! Good food and margaritas, but the best part was his service and great attitude! So much fun! Would definitely recommend and come again!!!

YxAdRE_g-15IOcISDaBPLw.text: Great food and service. Breakfast all day and I highly recommend the Churro Pancake, absolutely delightful and it's covered in churro pieces. The homemade Salsas are so good. I'll be back for sure

LeJte3tEd1FLuBYyRmY_XA.text: This was our first time here. Our waitress, Ryan, was awesome! She was kind enough to let us know of the check in offer for a free margarita. We had the BBQ pulled pork nachos - highly recommend! Overall, service was fast, staff was great, and the nachos were delicious!

VrlwISOcqNZ6G6zNF5ccAg.text: Great food. Wish they had one in California. I really enjoyed the nachos. There was so much i wanted to try. Will be going back the next time I visit Vegas.

ngm7Am3ghybOmA_L3HbpgA.text: We had the lobster and crab nachos and asked the bartender to make us his best Cadillac. Very pleased with both the food and drink. Great service and ambience!

QNB8b54nlUQYkcwbiwlb_A.text: Had nachos!  Best nachos I ever had.  The 4 stars is for nachos though.  Daughter had a taste for them and this was perfect.  One in my party had a breakfast burrito and they really liked it.  Breakfast served all day.  No idea they even had breakfast.  Service was just ok.  The server appeared to have a lot of tables.  It's not really on the strip if you want to people watch.  It faces Harmon Ave but a short walk.   I mean short walk not a Vegas short 1/2 mile walk.  Cabo Wabo  is better for the strip feel.

gbrUTfUvlNlCBwAfN31B9A.text: GEO is AMAZING!!!  Excellent food, impeccable service. Great night & Brian is the best!! Arieanna we LOVE her!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

8Z6XloFBuoP9wEzRM4OSGQ.text: The spicy shrimp nachos were very good but Kayla our server was AMAZING! I'll definitely be back the next time I'm in Vegas!!

jvmG_sYrK6pWGKRIRmxQYQ.text: The place was not busy but understaffed had to wait 15 minutes for a table then another 10 minutes for the waitresses to take our order prefer the other locations because they have better service then the strip. Also the wait staff is nonexistent  we asked for refills and sides and were never brought either this is my first and last time here at this location.

nj22_U2Oe6U8HI_qlIbsEQ.text: Wasn't any better than other nachos I've had, and it also cost more. They ripped us off on the pitchers. Pitchers were 35 and the single serve size was 10. The pitcher poured like 2 drinks maybe... so if you want average nachos and ripoff drinks, then I guess it's fine. There's simply better places to go, but most of Las Vegas is designed to rip you off. I mean, it's the gambling capitol of the world, so I guess by Vegas standards this place deserves the 4 stars or so it has, but otherwise it's a 2. Would be 3 if the prices were more reasonable. Then a 4 if the food was actually better than average.

Iu6no2jmLTzsWEXn-69PMg.text: We recently dined at Nacho Daddy as we saw it while driving to an event earlier in the day. -Atmosphere was great -Menu & Happy Hour menu had awesome and creative options -Super friendly and knowledgeable server and server assistant  When we got there it was only our table of 4 and two other small groups and our server was great. about 5-6 more tables arrived within 10 minutes but no one else was helping on the floor. The poor girl could not keep up with everyone, especially during happy hour. She was constantly apologizing to every table as she was not able to service everyone in a timely manner. Also, there wasn't really anyone sitting at the bar but for some reason drinks ordered by tables took FOREVER to be made & delivered.  I feel as if the restaurant would have bee staffed better or had the support of management it would have been a much smoother & enjoyable experience.

nHoaBqG3eDP3OK-bXlbbbg.text: If I ever had to go to a restaurant to skip the food and get dessert I'd definitely recommend this place. I'm not saying the nachos were bad, in fact they are awesome. But the caramel apple nachos were sent from the heavens. Hell it was raining and all of a sudden the sky split and Javony our waiter appeared with this deliciousness sent from heaven. 5 stars on the dessert alone.

GFFLSWW4TAIcNHFScabEjA.text: AJ was our server and he was excellent! Great attitude and wonderful service! Not to mention the food is delicious. Try a chimichanga or quesadilla, delicious!

pcJpWzrsKS5JU0pZijXwxA.text: Service is wonderful Judy was very on top of things and informative, the food was great portions look small but are very filling so be careful how much you order or there will be left overs. All portions are easily shareable and the manager stopped to visit everyone is very friendly and cost is low.  Definitely a return date day local for us.

bDbVQgBLpDomUAmoeZw7wQ.text: This place was great. We were greeted and seated right away. It had a sports bar atmosphere without being so loud but still had a restaurant feel. Our server was Dezi and she was great and gave great recommendation on what to order. We had the filet mignon tacos. It was soooo good. We will be going back...

Neg3tDBskwXYNDF_PXo4yg.text: I saw this place on the Tanked Tv show.  It didn't disappoint!  Scorpion Tank by the door is a neat started.  I had the nachos and would recommend.  I had the Tostada Nachos.  Great atmosphere!

treYDqpByOgQr9ABZcaNqg.text: Great food, great service. The nachos are excellent, and also a wonderful atmosphere.

0AUzky7cduTnVO3-qkEFxA.text: I usually try to not eat on the strip.  The nachos here are pretty good.  Like their motto says not a dry chip.  We had a great server named Gio.  They got the football game on the big screen when we asked.  I recommend the BBQ Pulled Pork nachos and Margaritas.  Both were fantastic!  Only drawback was the kids quesadilla, it was super soggy and didn't look very appetizing.

gcVTshBmhl8GT0Zqch22KA.text: Service was great. Food was amazing! The enchilada nachos were absolutely amazing. Judy was super great and super helpful with recommendations!

y2hkRT1sy5cpoHT-kbe6MA.text: Lauren K. was what made this experience so much better. She was really pleasant and helpful and made me feel at ease for my first time in Vegas. The nacho daddy experience is not the same without her here. Also I recommend the naked wings. Solid.

FqQ31t9bF_mNdy1__ncyyA.text: I've eaten here twice and I'm still impressed with how friendly the staff are! Very tasty Texmex food (best fajitas I've had on the strip), the chips and salsa are indeed bottomless, all day long breakfast menu, plenty of TVs to catch the game, and yes, a variety of nacho options. I look forward to my next visit to Nacho Daddy

-mXevvOyt_TppZwsUTpVqQ.text: great food, prices and drink deals ....luv me the fajitas and margaritas!

5xQPKbGAs268e_kfsY6e-w.text: I loved the food & our waitress Ari was so sweet! Ari made sure we got what we needed without having to ask. Great customer experience from Ari at #NachoDaddy!

CRPjRM_AjgiYZiiNRrlxiQ.text: Amazing breakfast. Our first stop in Vegas and we are 1 for 1. Ask for Ari. Best waitress ever!!!  Nacho Daddy - a definite must for great food and service.

-7wPU91UyY3Q_6KMYSVuzQ.text: The staff was very friendly and accommodating. The manager was great. The food was very good! Definitely coming back.

vKGuwKwIzD1B2rItp2SWGg.text: Came in on a Monday evening while vacationing in Vegas with my husband. We were hooked in by the free margaritas with check in. Bryce helped us out at the bar and recommended the filet mignon nachos which were terrific! The service was fast & friendly. Great music and chill vibe. Portions were huge for the price. I was stuffed and we still had to get a take home box for the leftovers. Screw you chiptole, Nacho Daddy all the way! Would definitely come back and ask for Bryce!

4WY5kTC354xtSdmDhs8J8A.text: Me and my husband went here for dinner and got the vegan chicken burrito and nachos, nachos were awesome but the chicken burrito had real chicken I'm sure of it, my husband got so grossed out after taking two bites and spitting out the chicken, we've eaten at different locations multiple times and never had a problem, right away he could tell it was real chicken, we brought it to the waitress attention and she tried telling us that it was vegan chicken but we know that it wasnt, it tasted like chicken and even had the texture of chicken, the vegan chicken although it replicates it well we can always tell it's fake meat, and this was not, we were not offered another which wouldn't matter because my husband was so grossed out, but also we weren't offered to get that taken off the bill even after seeing that the burrito was still almost all on the plate, (we dissected the burrito to see if the rest looked like real chicken) what a waste of money, so disappointed! Maybe it's just this location because since then we've gone to the other locations where the vegan chicken burrito was actually vegan chicken  lesson learned will never go here for vegan menu! And if you decide to go just double check the chicken!

Z454DhYf2b0BjqUkWAeDdw.text: Good environment, good food, and good drinks. I had the chicken fajita salad which had a great flavor, nice and fresh. Guacamole is to die for!

hJd_7CwuHzeSkPWmn1ltpQ.text: Met all of our expectations. Went because it was highly rated and reviewed on here. Had the filet mignon nachos and they were delicious. I've never had anything like it and will be craving more later. Would highly recommend.

5f2MIih4OaZBLl13qCq9CA.text: I'm not a review person... but I could not resist! Best FRESH food you could eat and you have to go see Arieanna!! She was so helpful and honest! Her food and Margarita suggestions were off the chain!!! We will be back for more!!!!  GO TO NACHO DADDY!!

6qxiwchRI_MUuw9ddEFgRA.text: The serve here is great. I love this place always keep coming back. The food and drink are bomb.

oHO-j3T4RGm773uHBBx1kA.text: When I come to Vegas , this place is what I look forward to.  Love the nachos!!!! Everything is awesome here.

cAIKWAvueZJLWXkQdrEp7g.text: Great fresh food and ingredients. The environment was actually fairly calm and enjoyable. Our server was super friendly, helpful, and not pushy. I would definitely stop in here again!

-QNXI-Srn8VdJPhAqT_o1w.text: Nacho Daddy is an absolute must when visiting Vegas. I have been to both locations (Downtown and & Strip) and both are delicious! The white queso on the nachos is everything. I think I would make a trip to Vegas especially for Nacho Daddy. The BBQ chicken nachos are amazing, Thai Nachos are delicious, the buffalo chicken are super, and my husband has ordered the crab and lobster nachos several times! You can't go wrong!!

vrNUuROjIsg_Smb8dO1OVg.text: Had the lobster and crab nachos.  They were made perfect.   Toppings were balanced throughout and the white queso was tasty.  I wouldn't change anything.  Also had the scorpion shot.  Glad I did.  It's a little expensive ($20.00) but a fun experience and you keep the shot glass

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The scorpion shot

ZRbp0NERKZhJFMf-wMRtLA.text: This place has really gone downhill. I love Nacho Daddy and I have been to all three locations. I usually choose this location because of the great service, however I am sad to say this location has lost it. I will not be coming back. From the moment I walked in I was not greeted by the hostess, rather nonchalantly glanced at and told it would be "35 minutes for two." I let her know that we actually had all four people standing with me in our party. Once we finally got to the table the waitress seemed overwhelmed and rushed. Horrible customer service. Someone in our party asked for plain nachos with just cheese. The waitress said that they could not do that. She didn't offer any solutions or accommodations. How hard is it to put cheese on chips? This place is called Nacho Daddy. Throughout our meal (Salina, our waitress) was inattentive and hard to reach. We ordered a beer that did not come until after another drink was ordered almost 15 minutes later.   From now on I will be visiting/ recommending the Summerlin location.

ONs1U9VD9atQaIjnEshl_w.text: My fiance, 15 year old sister and I were looking for a place to eat in Vegas on the strip and found this place on Yelp so we decided to give it a try! We had trouble finding this place after thinking it was in one of the malls (it's not...walk on the streets to easily get to it).  We arrived around prime dinner time and the wait wasn't long at all (20 min or so). The BEST part is if you check in on Yelp, you get a free house margarita so my fiance and I both got one!! You will have to order an entree for every free margarita you receive just FYI. We ordered the BBQ chicken nachos, pork tacos and beer battered lobster tacos. Everything was so good but the BBQ chicken nachos were AMAZING!! I mean...the word nacho is in their name so one would assume that they have the best nachos!

uJ4ZqEn74cv5ShoCD4lmUQ.text: First time going and can't wait to go back. Best nachos ever! Margarita was good also.

-1A8FNnbVacdbgFCxKwzHg.text: Okay, I have an obsession with Mexican food & let me tell ya... this place has it ALL. Highly recommend their happy hour and their chicken burrito. It is amazing! I don't recommend the "free" house margarita that they usually offer on yelp though, you can tell it's pretty much all sour mix (but it is free, so makes sense). The staff is very interactive and quick on their feet which I appreciated. I'll be going back to this place every time I'm in Vegas!

O8xlnr7TbJ2AuNHpgyxJmQ.text: A whole page of vegan options -  - YES! It is always hard to find somewhere my husband and I can both eat, I was happy to see we found a place surrounded by nachos that we both can enjoy.  To start we checked in to unlock the free house margarita since we both knew we would be ordering an entree. I've read a few things stating how the marg was soooo good, but honestly it didn't do it for me. Too sour, either they don't make their own sours and it was the awful bottled kind or it just had too much. The first sip was also, warmish. So I'm assuming the bartender didn't shake it and just dumped all of the ingredients into the cup then added ice. Either way, I couldn't drink it, I'm happy it was free because I would have sent it back.  To eat -- I had the vegan nachos, which were honestly amazing. They were served nice and warm. Filled with black beans, salsas, guac, jalapenos, v sour cream and their v cheese. I'm some times not the biggest fan of the vegan cheeses but it was so tasty!  My husband had the buffalo chicken nachos. He cleared his skillet with no problem, they were delish! He said they were pretty dang spicy and he loved it. I appreciated the fact they add pieces of celery to help with the heat.  Our service at the bar was pretty slow and I felt like we kept being forgotten. Even when I asked for recommendations on the vegan menu, our bartender had nothing to offer to help me decided. She seemed less than interested in being there, but hey the food totally made up for it!

GGB4L6PTSbUk5k_bxcd0iw.text: Great nachos and cool atmosphere. I ordered the Cuban nachos and it was awesome. It is huge enough to share if not super hungry.  Had the frozen margarita and it was nice too. Got it for free through yelp! Yey!

zwA36SkQIkJDbvu5FKiShA.text: Visited Las Vegas from the central valley of California and I'm so glad I stopped here! I had read about their scorpion shots online and I was not disappointed. The shotglasses you get with it are great souvenirs and Sofia hyped up our whole table. We had such a great time! Would definitely recommend.

Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

RzE1rDQteSQncujeSRlJiQ.text: What a great find, Thank you yelp! We were staying downtown, looking for a late night bite to eat,  what a fun little spot and the free margarita for checking in was delicious. Shrimp tacos, off the hook! Nachos were loaded and delicious. Our server was vivacious and engaging, definitely will eat here again when visiting.

photos.caption: Photo of Nacho Daddy - Las Vegas, NV, United States

5SmYFyrHUOvwpLzkS9A2Sw.text: The manager Elgin was very helpful and courteous. He went above and beyond in providing excellent customer service and making sure that my party and I were satisfied with our visit. Definitely appreciate the good service!!

al_hU1uc71WIjS9RoMIL6g.text: Amazing food and margaritas  everything is delicious  nachos, shrimp , fajitas,  and the prices are great

uIkfj-9VIZ3uh6E7ScU2WQ.text: Excellent "Mexican Candied Margarita " rim was salted with a chipotle salt and sweet with heat.  We thoroughly enjoyed the lobster and crab enchiladas.

YPLv0aTRbIYloejO14C9kw.text: Of course I was drunk but had the California burrito with flirt mignon. It was delicious. Only get some chips and salsa with it but it filled me up. Definitely be back. Probably try the nachos.

5V8guPyKi4EtizfIN3_Aog.text: Loved this place went for my birthday and everyone was so nice the food was amazing and I even got a free margarita
